40001001	KO E tohi hohoko ‘eni ‘o Sīsū Kalaisi, ‘a ia ko e Hako ‘o Tēvita mo e Hako ‘o ‘Epalahame.
40001002	Ko e hako ‘o ‘Epalahame ‘a ‘Aisake; pea ko e hako ‘o ‘Aisake ‘a Sēkope; pea ko e hako ‘o Sēkope ‘a Siuta mo hono fototehina;
40001003	pea ko e hako ‘o Siuta ‘a kelesi mo Sala, ‘a ia ko ‘ena fa‘ē ‘a Tema; pea ko e hako ‘o Fēlesi ‘a ‘Esilome; pea ko e hako ‘o ‘Esilome‘a ‘Ālame;
40001004	pea ko e hako ‘o ‘Ālame ‘a ‘Aminatape; pea ko e hako ‘o ‘Aminatape ‘a Na‘asoni; pea ko e hako ‘o Na‘asoni ‘a Salemone;
40001005	pea ko e hako ‘o Salemone ‘a Poasi, ‘a ia ko ‘ene fa‘ē ‘a Lēhapi; pea ko e hako ‘o Poasi ‘a ‘Ōpeti, ‘a ia ko ‘ene fa‘ē ‘a Lute; pea ko e hako ‘o ‘Ōpeti ‘a Sese;
40001006	pea ko e hako ‘o Sese ‘a Tēvita ko e Tu‘i. Ko e hako ‘o Tēvita ‘a Solomone, ‘a ia ko ‘ene fa‘ē ‘a e fefine na‘e nonofo mo ‘Ūlaia;
40001007	pea ko e hako ‘o Solomone ‘a Lehopoame; pea ko e hako ‘o Lehopoame ‘a ‘Apaia; pea ko e hako ‘o ‘Apaia ‘a ‘Asa;
40001008	pea ko e hako ‘o ‘Asa ‘a Sihosafate; pea ko e hako ‘o Sihosafate ‘a Siolame pea ko e hako ‘o Siolame ‘a ‘Ūsaia,
40001009	pea ko e hako ‘o ‘Ūsaia ‘a Siotame; pea ko e hako ‘o Siotame ‘a ‘Āhasi; pea ko e hako ‘o ‘Āhasi ‘a Hesekaia;
40001010	pea ko e hako ‘o Hesekaia ‘a Manase; pea ko e hako ‘o Manase ‘a ‘Āmone; pea ko e hako ‘o ‘Āmone ‘a Siosaia;
40001011	pea ko e hako ‘o Siosaia ‘a Sekonaia mo hono kāinga–ko e kuonga ia ‘o e Fetuku ki Pāpilone.
40001012	Pea hili ‘a e Fetuku ki Pāpilone pea ai ‘a e hako ‘o Sekonaia, ko Saletili; pea ko e hako ‘o Saletili ‘a Seluipepeli;
40001013	pea ko e hako ‘o Seluipepeli ‘a ‘Apaiuta; pea ko e hako ‘o ‘Apaiuta ‘a ‘Īlaiakimi; pea ko e hako ‘o ‘Īlaiakimi ‘a ‘Esoa;
40001014	pea ko e hako ‘Esoa ‘a Sētoki; pea ko e hako ‘o Sētoki ‘a ‘Ākemi; pea ko e hako ‘o ‘Ākemi ‘a ‘Elaiuti;
40001015	pea ko e hako ‘o ‘Elaiuti ‘a ‘Eliesa; pea ko e hako ‘o ‘Eliesa ‘a Mātani; pea ko e hako ‘o Mātani ‘a Sēkope;
40001016	pea ko e hako ‘o Sēkope ‘a Siosifa, ‘a ia ko e husepāniti ‘o Mele ko e fa‘ē ‘a Sīsū ‘a ia ‘oku ui ko Kalaisi.
40001017	Ko ia ko e lau ‘o e ngaahi to‘utangata meia ‘Epalahame kia Tēvita ko e to‘utangata ‘e hongofulu mā fā; pea meia Tēvita ki he Fetuku ki Pāpilone ko e to‘utangata ‘e hongofulu mā fā; pea mei he Fetuku ki Pāpilone ‘o a‘u kia Kalaisi ko e to‘utangata ‘e hongofulu mā fā.
40001018	Ko e anga ‘eni ‘o e tupu ‘a Sīsū Kalaisi. Kuo polo‘i ‘ene fa‘ē ko Mele kia Siosifa, ka ‘i he te‘eki ke na nonofo, na‘e hā kuo feitama ia ki he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni.
40001019	Pea ko Siosifa ko hono hoa, neongo ko e tangata tauhi tu‘utu‘uni, ka na‘e ‘ikai te ne loto ke faka‘ilo ia, ka na‘a ne pehē ke tukuange fakafufū pē.
40001020	Pea lolotonga ‘ene fifili ki he ngaahi me‘a ni, ‘iloange na‘e hā kiate ia ha ‘āngelo ‘a e ‘Eiki ‘i he misi, ‘o ne pehē, ‘E Siosifa, hako ‘o Tēvita, ‘oua na‘a ke teteki ke ‘omi ‘a Mele ko ho uaifi; he ko ia kuo ne tu‘itu‘ia ai ‘oku mei he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni.
40001021	Pea te ne ‘alo‘i ha tama, pea te ke fakahingoa ko Sīsū; he ko ia ia te ne fakamo‘ui hono kakai mei he‘enau ngaahi angahala.
40001022	Pea na‘e fai ‘eni kotoa pē, koe‘uhi ke fakamo‘oni ki he me‘a ne folofola‘aki ‘e he ‘Eiki ‘i he palōfita, ‘o pehē,
40001023	Vakai, ‘e feitama ‘a e tāupo‘ou, pea te ne ‘alo‘i ha tama, pea te nau fakahingoa ia ko ‘Imānuela, ‘a ia ko hono ‘uhinga, ‘oku ‘iate kitautolu ‘a e ‘Otua.
40001024	Pea kuo ofo ‘a Siosifa mei he‘ene mohe, na‘a ne fai ‘o hangē ko e fekau ‘a e ‘āngelo ‘a e ‘Eiki kiate ia, ‘o ne ‘omi ‘a hono uaifi:
40001025	pea na‘e ‘ikai te na fe‘iloaki kae‘oua ke ne ‘alo‘i ‘a e tama; pea na‘a ne fakahingoa ia ko Sīsū.
40002001	PEA hili ‘a e ‘alo‘i ‘o Sīsū ‘i Pētelihema ‘i Siutea, ‘i he kuonga ‘o e tu‘i ko Hēlota, ‘iloange na‘e hoko ki Selusalema ‘ani Maki mei Hahake,
40002002	‘oku nau fehu‘i, Kofa‘ā ia kuo ‘alo‘i ko e Tu‘i ‘o e kakai Siu? he na‘a mau mamata ‘i Hahake ki hono fetu‘u pea kuo mau omi ke hū kiate ia.
40002003	Pea ‘i he fanongo ki ai ‘a e tu‘i ko Hēlota, na‘a ne puputu‘u, ‘a ia mo Selusalema kātoa.
40002004	Pea na‘a ne fakataha ‘a e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki kotoa pē, mo e kau sikalaipe faka-Siu; ‘o ne ‘eke kiate kinautolu pe ‘e ‘alo‘i ‘i fē ‘a e Mīsaia.
40002005	Pea nau tali kiate ia, ‘i Pētelihema ‘i Siutea; he ‘oku pehē hono tohi ‘e he palōfita,
40002006	Pea ko koe, Pētelihema, konga ‘o Siuta, ‘oku ‘ikai ‘aupito ko e si‘i taha koe ‘i he hou‘eiki ‘o Siuta; koe‘uhi ‘e ha‘u meiate koe ha takimu‘a ‘a ia te ne pule‘i hoku kakai ko ‘Isileli.
40002007	Pea toki ‘omi fakafufū ‘e Hēlota ‘a e kau Maki, ‘o ne ‘eke kiate kinautolu ke mahu‘ingamālie ‘a e taimi ‘o e hā ‘a e fetu‘u.
40002008	Pea ne fekau ke nau ō ki Pētelihema, ‘o ne pehē, Mou ‘alu ‘o ‘eke fakatotolo ki he tamasi‘i; pea ka mou ka ‘ilo pea mou tala mai, koe‘uhi ke u ‘alu mo au ‘o hū kiate ia.
40002009	Pea kuo nau ma‘u ‘a e fekau ‘a e Tu‘i pea nau ‘alu; pea ‘iloange, ko e fetu‘u na‘a nau mamata ki ai ‘i Hahake, na‘a ne tataki kinautolu ‘o a‘u atu ki he potu na‘e ‘i ai ‘a e tamasi‘i, ‘o ne tu‘u ai mei ‘olunga.
40002010	Pea ‘i he‘enau sio ki he fetu‘u, na‘a nau fiefia ‘aupito, ‘aupito.
40002011	Pea ‘i he‘enau hū ki he fale, na‘a nau ‘ilo ‘a e tamasi‘i, ‘oku ‘i he‘ene fa‘ē ko Mele; pea nau fakatōmape‘e ‘o hū kiate ia: pea na‘a nau tangaki ‘enau ngaahi ‘angame‘a, ‘o nau ‘atu kiate ia ‘a e ngaahi me‘a‘ofa, ko e koula mo e laipeno mo e mula.
40002012	Pea ‘i he valokia kinautolu ‘i ha misi ke ‘oua te nau foki kia Hēlota, ne nau ‘alu ki honau fonua ‘i ha hala kehe.
40002013	Pea kuo nau ‘alu, ‘iloange, na‘e hā kia Siosifa ha ‘āngelo ‘a e ‘Eiki ‘i ha misi, ‘o ne pehē, ‘Ā hake, ‘o to‘o ‘a e tamasi‘i mo ‘ene fa‘ē, pea ke holataki ki ‘Isipite; pea ke nofo ai kae‘oua ke u toki fakahā atu; he ‘oku teu kumi ‘e Hēlota ‘a e tamasi‘i ke fakapoongi.
40002014	Pea ‘ā hake ia, ‘o ne to‘o ‘a e tamasi‘i mo ‘ene fa‘ē ‘i he pō ko ia, ‘o nau ‘alu ki ‘Isipite;
40002015	pea na‘a nau nofo ai ‘o a‘u ki he pekia ‘a Hēlota: koe‘uhi ke fakamo‘oni ki he me‘a na‘e folofola‘aki ‘e he ‘Eiki ‘i he palōfita, ‘o pehē, Na‘a ku ui mai hoku foha mei ‘Isipite.
40002016	Pea ‘i he toki hā kia Hēlota kuo va‘inga‘aki ia ‘e he kau Maki, na‘a ne tuputāmaki ‘aupito; ‘o ne fekau ke tāmate‘i ‘a e tamaiki kotoa pē ‘i Pētelihema mo e ngaahi ‘api na‘e kau ki ai, ‘o ngata meiate kinautolu na‘e ua ta‘u ‘o fai ki mui; ‘o fakatatau ki he taimi na‘a ne ma‘u mei he kau Maki.
40002017	Pea na‘e toki fakamo‘oni ki he me‘a na‘e lea‘aki ‘e he palōfita ko Selemaia, ‘o pehē,
40002018	Na‘e ongona ‘i Lama ha le‘o, ko e tangi mo e fu‘u tangilāulau; ko e tēngihia ‘e Lesieli ‘ene fānau, pea ‘ikai te ne tali ha fakafiemālie koe‘uhi kuo nau mole.
40002019	Pea ‘i he hili ‘a e pekia ‘a Hēlota, ‘iloange, na‘e hā mai kia Siosifa ‘i ‘Isipite ha ‘āngelo ‘a e ‘Eiki ‘i ha misi,
40002020	‘o ne pehē, ‘Ā hake, pea to‘o ‘a e tamasi‘i mo ‘ene fa‘ē, pea ‘alu ki he fonua ‘o ‘Isileli; he kuo mate ‘a kinautolu na‘e kumi ki he tamasi‘i ke fakapoongi.
40002021	Pea ‘ā hake ia, ‘o ne to‘o ‘a e tamasi‘i mo ‘ene fa‘ē, pea ne ‘alu atu ‘o hū ki he fonua ‘o ‘Isileli.
40002022	Ka ‘i he‘ene fanongo ko ‘Akileosi ‘oku pule ‘i Siutea, ko e fetongi ‘o ‘ene tamai ko Hēlota, na‘a ne manavahē ke ‘alu ki he potu ko ia: pea na‘e valokia ia ‘i ha misi, ko ia na‘a ne fononga ki he ngaahi feitu‘u ‘o Kāleli.
40002023	Pea ne ‘alu ‘o nofo ‘i he kolo ‘oku hingoa ko Nāsaleti; koe‘uhi ke fakamo‘oni ki he me‘a na‘e lea‘aki ‘e he kau Palōfita, ‘o pehē, ‘E ui ia ko ha Nāsaleti.
40003001	‘I he kuonga ko ia na‘e ha‘u ‘a Sione Papitaiso, ‘o malanga ‘i he toafa ‘o Siutea,
40003002	‘o ne pehē, Mou fakatomala, he kuo ofi ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o e Langi.
40003003	He ko eni ia na‘e lea ki ai ‘e he palōfita ko ‘Aisea, ‘o pehē, Ko e le‘o ‘o ha toko taha ‘oku kalanga he toafa, Mou teuteu ‘a e hā‘ele‘anga ‘o Sihova; Fakatonutonu hono ngaahi hala.
40003004	Pea ko e kofu ‘o Sione ko ia na‘e ngaohi mei he fulufulu‘i kāmeli, pea fakama‘u leta ‘i hono kongaloto: pea ko ‘ene me‘akai ko e he‘e mo e honi ‘o e vao.
40003005	Pea na‘e toki ‘alu atu kiate ia ‘a Selusalema, mo Siutea kotoa, pea mo e feitu‘u kotoa ‘o Soatani:
40003006	pea nau papitaiso ‘iate ia ‘i he vaitafe ko Soatani, he vete ‘enau ngaahi angahala.
40003007	Pea ‘i he ene vakai ki he tokolahi ‘o e kau Fālesi mo e Sātusi ‘oku nau ha‘u ki he papitaiso, na‘a ne pehē kiate kinautolu, ‘a e hako‘i ngata fekai, ko hai ne fale‘i kimoutolu ke hola mei he houhau ‘oku tu‘unuku mai?
40003008	Kapau ko ia, pea mou fua ‘o taau mo ha fakatomala.
40003009	Pea ‘oua te mou hanga ‘o fuataki ‘i homou loto, ‘o pehē, Ko ‘Epalahame ‘a ‘emau tamai: he ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘oku mafai ‘e he ‘Otua ke fokotu‘u mei he ngaahi maka ni ha fānau kia ‘Epalahame.
40003010	Pea ‘oku lolotonga tu‘u ni ‘a e toki ‘i he tefito ‘o e ngaahi ‘akau: ko ia ‘ilonga ha ‘akau ‘oku ‘ikai fua lelei, ‘oku tā ‘o laku ki he afi.
40003011	Ko au ‘oku ou papitaiso vai kimoutolu ki he fakatomala: ka ko ia ‘oku muimui mai ‘oku ne mālohi ‘iate au, ko e Toko Taha ia ‘oku ‘ikai te u taau ke takitaki hono topuva‘e: ‘e papitaiso kimoutolu ‘e ia ‘i he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni mo e afi.
40003012	Ko e Toko Taha ia ‘oku ‘i hono nima ‘a e ī, pea te ne tapili ke ‘osi ‘a ‘ene ‘au‘au‘anga: pea te ne tānaki ‘ene ngaahi fo‘i uite ki he feleoko, ka te ne tutu ‘a e kafukafu ‘aki ‘a e afi ‘oku ‘ikai matāmate‘i.
40003013	Pea toki ha‘u ‘a Sīsū mei Kāleli ki Soatani kia Sione ke papitaiso ‘iate ia.
40003014	Ka ka teke‘i ia ‘e Sione, ‘o ne pehē, Na‘e totonu mu‘a ke u papitaiso ‘iate koe, pea ‘oku ke ha‘u koā kiate au?
40003015	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū ‘o ne pehē kiate ia, Tukuange pē ‘i he taimi ni: he ‘oku taau pehē mo kitaua ke fakakakato ‘a e tu‘utu‘uni kotoa pē. Pea ne toki tukuange ia.
40003016	Pea kuo papitaiso ‘a Sīsū, na‘a ne ‘alu hake leva mei he vai; pea vakai, na‘e matangaki ‘a e langi kiate ia, pea ne mamata ki he Laumālie ‘o e ‘Otua ‘oku ‘alu hifo ‘i he tatau ‘o ha lupe, ‘o ne a‘u kiate ia
40003017	Pea ‘iloange, na‘e ai ha le‘o mei he langi na‘e pehē mai, Ko Hoku ‘Alo Pele ‘ena, ‘a ia kuo u hōifua ai.
40004001	NA‘E toki ‘ohake ‘a Sīsū ‘e he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni ki he toafa ke ‘ahi‘ahi‘i ‘e he Tēvolo.
40004002	Pea hili ‘ene ‘aukai ‘i he ‘aho ‘e fāngofulu mo e pō ‘e fāngofulu, pea ne toki hālofia.
40004003	Pea ha‘u ‘a e Toko Taha Fakatauvele, ‘o ne pehē kiate ia, “Kapau ko e ‘Alo koe ‘o e ‘Otua, fekau ke hoko ‘a e ngaahi fo‘i maka ni ko e ngaahi fo‘i mā."
40004004	Ka ka tali ‘e ia ‘o pehē, Kuo tohi, ‘Oku ‘ikai mo‘ui ‘a e tangata ‘i he mā pē, ka ‘i he ngaahi folofola kotoa pē ‘oku ‘alu atu mei he fofonga ‘o e ‘Otua.
40004005	Pea toki ‘ave ia ‘e he Tēvolo ki he Kolo Tapu, ‘o ne fokotu‘u ia ki he tu‘ahivi ‘o e Temipale,
40004006	mo ne pehē ki ai, Kapau ko e ‘Alo koe ‘o e ‘Otua, hopo ki lalo; he kuo tohi, He kouna ‘e ia ‘ene kau ‘āngelo telia ‘a koe; pea te nau fataki nima koe na‘a pākia ho va‘e ‘i ha maka.
40004007	Pea lea ‘a Sīsū kiate ia, kuo tohi foki, ‘E ‘ikai te ke ha‘aki ‘ahi‘ahi‘i ‘a e ‘Eiki ko ho ‘Otua.
40004008	Pea ‘ave foki ia ‘e he Tēvolo ki ha mo‘unga na‘e mā‘olunga ‘aupito, ‘o ne faka‘ali‘ali ki ai ‘a e ngaahi pule‘anga kotoa pē ‘o māmani mo honau nāunau;
40004009	‘o ne pehē kiate ia, ko e ngaahi me‘a ni kotoa pē te u ‘atu mo‘ou, ‘o kapau te ke fakatōmape‘e ‘o lotu kiate au.
40004010	Pea toki pehē ‘e Sīsū, Sētane, fei mo ‘alu! he kuo tohi, Ko e ‘Eiki ko ho ‘Otua te ke lotu ki ai, pea ko ia pē toko taha te ke ‘otua ‘aki.
40004011	Pea toki tukuange ia ‘e he Tēvolo: pea ‘iloange na‘e ha‘u ha kau ‘āngelo ‘o fai ha tauhi kiate ia.
40004012	Pea ‘i he‘ene fanongo kuo tuku ‘a Sione ki he pilīsone, na‘a ne ‘alu ange ki Kāleli.
40004013	Pea ne hiki mei Nāsaleti, ‘o ne ‘alu ‘o nofo ‘i Kāpaneume, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘i he matātahi, ‘i he ngata‘anga ‘o Sepulone mo Nafitalai:
40004014	koe‘uhi ke fakamo‘oni ki he me‘a na‘e lea‘aki ‘e he palōfita ko ‘Aisea, ‘o pehē,
40004015	He fonua ‘o Sepulone, He fonua ‘o Nafitalai, He potu hanga ki tahi, ‘A Tu‘a Soatani, ‘A Kāleli ‘o Senitaile;
40004016	Ko e kakai nofo he po‘uli Na‘a nau mamata ki ha maama lahi; Pea ko e nofo he fonua tonu mo e malu ‘o Mate Na‘e hopo ha maama kiate kinautolu.
40004017	Mei he taimi ko ia na‘e kamata ‘a Sīsū ke malanga, ‘o pehē, Mou fakatomala, he kuo ofi ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani.
40004018	Pea ‘i he‘ene ‘eve‘eva ‘i he matātahi ‘o e Tahi Kāleli, na‘a ne vakai ki ha tautehina, ko Saimone ‘oku ui ko Pita, pea mo ‘Anitelū ko hono tehina ‘oku na sili, he ko e ongo toutai.
40004019	Pea pehē ‘e ia kiate kinaua, Mo omi ‘o muimui ‘iate au, pea te u ngaohi kimoua ko e ongo toutai tangata.
40004020	Pea na li‘aki leva hona kupenga, ‘o na muimui kiate ia.
40004021	Pea kuo ne laka atu mei ai, na‘a ne vakai ki ha tautehina kehe, ko Sēmisi ko e foha ‘o Sēpeti, pea mo Sione ko hono tehina, ‘oku nau ‘i he vaka mo Sēpeti ko ‘ena tamai, ‘o fai ‘enau pena kupenga. Pea na‘a ne ui kinaua.
40004022	Pea na tuku leva ‘a e vaka mo ‘ena tamai, ‘o na muimui kiate ia.
40004023	Pea na‘a ne foli ‘a Kāleli kātoa, he‘ene faiako ‘i honau ngaahi falelotu, mo ne malanga‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli ‘o e Pule‘anga: pea neongo pe ko e hā ha alangamahaki na‘e ‘i he kakai ‘Isileli, pe ha mahamahaki, na‘a ne fakamo‘ui ia.
40004024	Pea mafola atu hono ongoongo ki Sīlia kātoa; pea nau ‘omi kiate ia ‘a e kakai kotoa pē na‘e puke, ‘a kinautolu na‘e mo‘ua, ‘i he ngaahi mahaki kehekehe ‘o fakamamahi, ‘a e ‘āvea mo e puke fakataimi mo e mamatea, pea na‘a ne fakamo‘ui kinautolu.
40004025	Pea na‘e tulimui kiate ia ha ngaahi fu‘u kakai lahi, mei Kāleli, mo Tikapolusi, mo Selusalema, mo Siutea, pea mo Tu‘a Soatani.
40005001	PEA ‘i he‘ene sio ki he ngaahi fu‘u kakai, na‘a ne ‘alu hake ki he mo‘unga, pea ‘i he‘ene nofo hifo ke malanga na‘e ‘unu‘unu atu kiate ia ‘ene kau ako:
40005002	pea ne ‘ofa‘aki ‘ene lea, ‘o ne ako‘i kinautolu, ‘o pehē,
40005003	Monū‘ia ā ka ko kinautolu ‘oku ongo‘i masiva honau laumālie; he ‘oku ‘onautolu ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani.
40005004	Monū‘ia ā ka ko kinautolu ‘oku fakamamahi: he ‘e fakafiemālie ‘a kinautolu.
40005005	Monū‘ia ā ka ko kinautolu ‘oku fa‘a kātaki: he ‘e tō mo‘onautolu ‘a e fonua.
40005006	Monū‘ia ā ka ko kinautolu ‘oka fie kai mo fie inu ki he mā‘oni‘oni: he ‘e fakamākona ‘a kinautolu.
40005007	Monū‘ia ā ka ko kinautolu ‘oku manava‘ofa: he ‘e fai manava‘ofa kiate kinautolu
40005008	Monū‘ia ā ka ko kinautolu ‘oku ma‘a honau loto: he te nau mamata ki he ‘Otua.
40005009	Monū‘ia ā ka ko kinautolu ‘oku fakatupu melino: he ‘e ui ‘a kinautolu ko e ngaahi foha ‘o e ‘Otua.
40005010	Monū‘ia ā ka ko kinautolu ‘oku fakatanga‘i koe‘uhi ko e failelei: he ‘oku ‘onautolu ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani.
40005011	Monū‘ia ā ka ko kimoutolu, ‘oka manukia kimoutolu, mo fakatanga‘i, mo lohiekina ‘i he kovi kehekehe, koe‘uhi ko au.
40005012	Mou fiefia mo hākailangitau: he lahi ho‘omou totongi ‘i Hēvani; he na‘e pehē ‘enau fakatanga‘i ‘a e kau palōfita, ‘a ia na‘e holomu‘a ‘iate kimoutolu.
40005013	Ko kimoutolu ko e māsima ‘o e fonua: pea ka mole mei he māsima hono kona, ‘e fakamāsima ‘a e māsima ‘e he hā? ‘Oku ‘ikai kei ‘aonga ki ha me‘a, ka ke laku pē kitu‘a ke molo ai ‘a e kakai.
40005014	Ko kimoutolu ko e maama ‘o māmani: ko e kolo ‘oku tu‘u ‘i ha funga mo‘unga ‘oku ‘ikai te ne lava ke puli.
40005015	Pea tala‘ehai ‘oku tutu ha maama ‘o ‘ai ki he loto puha fua, ka ki he tu‘unga maama pē, pea ‘oku ulo atu ia ki he kakai kotoa pē ‘oku ‘i he fale.
40005016	Pehē foki, ke ulo atu ho‘omou maama ke hā ki he kakai, ke nau mamata ki ho‘omou ngaahi ngāue lelei, pea fakamālō‘ia ‘a ho‘omou Tamai ‘oku ‘i Hēvani.
40005017	‘Oua te mou mahalo kuo u ha‘u ke tāmate‘i ‘a e Lao, pe ko e Tohi Palōfita: na‘e ‘ikai te u ha‘u ke tāmate‘i, ka ke fakakakato.
40005018	He ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Lolotonga ‘oku te‘eki mole ‘a e langi mo māmani, ‘e ‘ikai mole mei he Lao ha mata‘itohi ‘e taha, pe ko ha fo‘i kohi, kae‘oua ke fai hono kotoa.
40005019	Ko ia, ‘ilonga ‘a ia te ne tāmate‘i ha taha ‘i he ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni ni ‘oku kihi‘i si‘i, pea ako pehē ki he kakai, ‘e lau ia ko e kihi‘i si‘i ‘i he Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani: ka ‘ilonga ‘a ia te ne fai ki ai mo ako‘aki, ‘e lau ia ko e lahi ‘i he Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani.
40005020	He ‘oku ou tala atu, Kapau ‘e ‘ikai lahi hake ho‘omou mā‘oni‘oni ‘i he mā‘oni‘oni ‘a e kau sikalaipe mo e kau Fālesi, ‘e ‘ikai, ‘aupito te mou hū ki he Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani.
40005021	Kuo mou fanongo ne folofola‘aki ki he mātu‘a ‘i mu‘a, ‘o pehē, ‘oua na‘a ke fakapō; pea ‘ilonga ‘a ia te ne fakapō, ‘e fakamāumatea ia ‘i he fakamā‘anga fakakolo:
40005022	ka ‘oku ou tala kiate kimoutolu ‘e au, ‘Ilonga ‘a ia te ne ‘ita ki hono kāinga, ‘e fakamāumatea‘i he fakamāu‘anga fakakolo; pea ka ‘ilonga ‘a ia te ne pehē ki hono kāinga, Siana vale, ‘e fakamāumatea ia ‘i he Sanetalimi; ka ‘ilonga ha taha te ne pehē, Siana angatu‘u, ‘e fakamāumatea pea tutu ‘i he afi ‘o Kihena.
40005023	Ko ia, ka kuo ke ha‘u mo koe ha feilaulau ki he ‘ōlita, ‘o ke toki manatu‘i ai ‘oku ai ha me‘a ‘oku kovi‘ia ai ho kāinga kiate koe:
40005024	tuku pē hena ho‘o feilaulau ‘i he ve‘e ‘ōlita, pea ke mole atu mu‘a ‘o fakalelei ho kāinga, pea ke toki ha‘u ‘o ‘atu ho‘o feilaulau.
40005025	‘Alu vave ‘o ‘ahi‘ahi fakamolemole ki he tangata faka‘ilo, ‘o toutou kole ‘o a‘u ki ho‘omo fangafanga hū ki he fakamaau; na‘a ‘iloange; ‘e ‘oatu koe ‘e he faka‘ilo ki he fakamaau, pea ‘oatu ‘e he fakamaau ki he ‘ōfisa, pea ‘e lī koe ki he pilīsone.
40005026	Ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘E ‘ikai te ke ‘alu mei ai kae‘oua ke ‘osi ho‘o totongi ‘o a‘u ki he toenga sēniti.
40005027	Kuo mou fanongo na‘e folofola‘aki, ‘oua na‘a ke tono fefine:
40005028	ka ‘oku ou tala kiate kimoutolu ‘e au, ‘Ilonga ‘a ia te ne fakasio ki ha fefine ke tafunaki ‘ene holi ki ai, kuo ne tono‘i ia ‘i hono loto.
40005029	Ko ia, neongo ko ho mata to‘omata‘u ‘oku fakahingaki koe, kape‘i ia ‘o li‘aki: he ‘oku lelei mu‘a kiate koe ke mole hao kupu pē ‘e taha, ‘i he lī ho sino kotoa ki Heli.
40005030	Pea neongo ko ho nima to‘omata‘u ‘oku fakahingaki koe, tu‘usi ia pea li‘aki; he ‘oku lelei mu‘a kiate koe ke mole hao kupu pē ‘e taha, ‘i he a‘u ho sino kotoa ki Heli.
40005031	Ka na‘e folofola‘aki, ‘Ilonga ha taha te ne li‘aki hono uaifi, ke ne ‘ange ki ai ha tohi vete:‘
40005032	ka ‘oku ou tala kiate kimoutolu ‘e au, Ko ia ‘oku ne li‘aki hono uaifi, kae ‘ikai ‘i ha‘ane faihala mo ha taha, ‘oku ne tuku ia ke tonoa: pea ko e tangata te ne mali mo ia kuo li‘aki ‘oku ne tono fefine.
40005033	Ko eni foki, kuo mou fanongo na‘e folofola‘aki ki he mātu‘a ‘i mu‘a, ‘oua na‘a ke fuakava loi, ka ke vete ki he ‘Eiki ho‘o ngaahi fuakava:
40005034	Ka ‘oku ou tala kiate kimoutolu ‘e au, ‘oua ‘aupito na‘a lea tuki, ‘oua ‘e lea ki he langi, he ko e taloni ia ‘o e ‘Otua:
40005035	pe ki he fonua, he ko hono tu‘ungava‘e; pe ki Selusalema, he ko e kolo ia ‘o e Tu‘i Fakaleveleva.
40005036	‘Oua ‘e lea tuki ki ho ‘ulu, he ‘oku ‘ikai te ke mafai hano liliu ‘o ha tu‘oni lou‘ulu ‘e taha ke hinehina pe ‘uli‘uli.
40005037	Ka ke peheni ho‘omou lea, ‘Io, ‘Io, ‘Ikai, ‘Ikai: he ka ai hano fakalahi ‘oku mei he Fili ia.
40005038	Kuo mou fanongo na‘e folofola‘aki, Ke totongi ‘aki ‘a e fo‘i mata ha fo‘i mata, mo e fo‘i nifo ha fo‘i nifo:
40005039	ka ‘oku ou tala kiate kimoutolu ‘e au, ‘oua na‘a taliteke‘i ho fili; ka ‘oka sipi‘i ‘e ha taha ho kou‘ahe to‘omata‘u, hanga koe, ‘o fulihi ki ai ho to‘ohema.
40005040	Pea ka loto ha taha ke mo hopo, pea ke ne ma‘u ho sote; tuku kiate ia mo ho pulupulu.
40005041	Pea ka fakafatongia koe ‘e ha talafekau ke ke ‘ave ia ‘i ha maile ‘e taha, pea mole mo ia ‘o maile ua.
40005042	Ka fai ha kole ‘e ha taha kiate koe, tali pē; pea ka loto ha taha ke nō meiate koe, ‘oua na‘a ke fulitu‘a ki ai.
40005043	Kuo mou fanongo na‘e folofola‘aki, Te ke ‘ofa‘i ho kaungā‘api, kae fehi‘a ki ho fili:
40005044	ka ‘oku ou tala kiate kimoutolu ‘e au, Mou ‘ofa‘i homou ngaahi fili, pea hūfia ‘a kinautolu ‘oku nau fakatanga‘i kimoutolu.
40005045	Koe‘uhi ke mou hokosi ho‘omou Tamai ‘oku ‘i Hēvani: he ‘oku ne fakahopo ‘ene la‘ā ki he kovi mo e lelei, pea ‘oku ne faka‘uha ki he faitotonu mo e faihala.
40005046	He kapau te mou ‘ofa‘i ‘a kinautolu pē ‘oku ‘ofa mai, ko e me‘a ia ‘e fakakoloa? ‘ikai ‘oku fai pehē mo e kau pōpilikane?
40005047	Pea kapau ‘oku mou fetapa ki homou kāinga pē, ko e hā ha me‘a ‘oku mou fai ‘oku hulu atu? ‘Ikai ‘oku fai ‘e he Senitaile foki ‘a e me‘a ko ia?
40005048	Ka mou haohaoa pē ‘a kimoutolu; ‘o hangē ‘oku haohaoa ‘a ho‘omou Tamai Fakalangi.
40006001	KAE vakai, telia na‘a mou fai ho‘omou tō‘onga fakalotu ke hā ki he kakai, koe‘uhi ke nau siofia kimoutolu; he ka pehē, ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘amou totongi mei ho‘omou Tamai ‘oku ‘i Hēvani.
40006002	Ko ia, ‘oka ke ka fai ha foaki, ‘oua na‘a ke ifi ha me‘alea ke fakahā koe, ‘o hangē ko e fai ‘e he kau mālualoi ‘i he falelotu mo e hala, koe‘uhi ke nau ma‘u ‘a e fakamālō ‘a e kakai. Ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Ko hono ngata ia ‘o ‘enau totongi kuo nau ma‘u.
40006003	Ka ko koe, ‘i ho‘o fai ha‘o foaki, ke‘oua na‘a ‘ilo ‘e ho nima to‘ohema ‘a e me‘a ‘oku fai ‘e ho to‘omata‘u:
40006004	koe‘uhi ke lilo pē ho‘o foaki; pea ko ho‘o Tamai, ‘a ia ‘oku ne ‘afio‘i ‘a e lilo, te ne totongi kiate koe.
40006005	Pea ‘oka mou ka lotu, ‘e ‘ikai te mou hangē ko e kau mālualoi; he ‘oku nau manako ke tu‘u ‘i he falelotu mo e tuliki ‘o e mala‘e ke fai ‘enau lotu, koe‘uhi ke nau hā ki he kakai. Ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Ko hono ngata ia ‘o ‘e nau totongi kuo nau ma‘u.
40006006	Ka ko koe, ‘oka ke ka lotu, hū ki ho loki, pea tāpuni ho matapā, pea fai ho‘o hū ki ho‘o Tamai ‘a ia ‘oku ‘i he lilo: pea ko ho‘o Tamai, ‘a ia ‘oku ne ‘afio‘i ‘a e lilo, te ne totongi kiate koe.
40006007	Pea ‘i ho‘omou ngaahi lotu, ‘oua te mou fakafanafana mo launoa, ‘o hangē ko e hīteni: he ‘oku nau mahalo ‘e ongo atu ‘enau me‘a ko e lahi ‘o ‘enau lau.
40006008	Ko ia, ‘oua na‘a fakatatau kimoutolu kiate kinautolu: he ‘oku mui ho‘omou kole, ka kuo toka mea‘i ‘e he Tamai ‘amoutolu ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku mou masiva ai.
40006009	Ko ia ke peheni ha‘amoutolu lotu: Ko ‘emau Tamai ‘oku ‘i Hēvani, ke tāpuhā ho Huafa,
40006010	ke hoko ho‘o Pule, ke fai ho Finangalo, hangē ko ia ‘i he langi ke pehē foki ‘i māmani.
40006011	Ke ke foaki mai he ‘aho ni ha‘amau me‘akai ki he ‘anai,
40006012	pea fakamolemole homau ngaahi mo‘ua; hangē kuo mau fakamolemole foki ‘a kinautolu ne mo‘ua kiate kimautolu.
40006013	Pea ‘oua na‘a ke fakahū kimautolu ki he ‘ahi‘ahi; ka ke fakahaofi kimautolu mei he Fili.
40006014	He kapau te mou fakamolemole ‘a e ngaahi hala ‘a e kakai, pea ‘e fakamolemole kimoutolu ‘e ho‘omou Tamai Fakalangi:
40006015	pea ka ‘ikai te mou fakamolemole ‘a e ngaahi hala ‘a e kakai, pea ‘e ‘ikai foki fakamolemole ‘e ho‘omou Tamai ho‘omou ngaahi hala.
40006016	Pea ka mou ka ‘aukai, ‘oua te mou fakamatapeko, ‘o hangē ko e kau mālualoi: he ‘oku nau fakalālāfua‘a honau mata, koe‘uhi ke nau hā ki he kakai ‘oku nau ‘aukai. Ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Ko hono ngata ia ‘o ‘enau totongi kuo nau ma‘u.
40006017	Ka ko koe, ‘oka ke ka ‘aukai, pani ho ‘ulu mo fufulu ho mata:
40006018	koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a hā ho‘o ‘aukai ki he kakai, ka ki ho‘o Tamai pē ‘oku ‘i he fufū: pea ko ho‘o Tamai, ‘a ia ‘oku ne ‘afio‘i ‘a e fufū, te ne totongi kiate koe.
40006019	‘Oua na‘a fa‘oaki koloa ma‘amoutolu ‘i māmani; he ko e potu ia ‘oku keina ai ‘e he ane mo e ‘ume‘umea, pea haea ‘e he kau kaiha‘a ‘o nau kaiha‘asi:
40006020	kae fa‘oaki koloa ma‘amoutolu ‘i langi, he ko e potu ia ‘oku ‘ikai keina ai ‘e he ane mo e ‘ume‘umea, pea ‘oku ‘ikai hāea ‘e he kau kaiha‘a ‘o kaiha‘asi:
40006021	he ko e potu ‘oku ‘i ai ho‘o koloa, ‘e ‘i ai foki mo ho loto.
40006022	Ko e māma‘anga ‘o e sino ko e mata: ko ia kapau ‘oku hu‘ufataha ‘a e sio ‘a ho mata, ‘e maama pē ho sino kotoa: ka ka kovi ho mata, pea ‘e fakapo‘uli ho sino kotoa.
40006023	Pea kapau ko e koto po‘uli ia, ‘a e me‘a ‘iate koe na‘e ngaohi ke fakamaama, huanoa ‘a e me‘a ‘iate koe ‘a ia ko hono anga ke po‘uli.
40006024	‘Oku ‘ikai ke lava ‘e ha taha ke ne ‘eiki ‘aki ha ‘eiki ‘e toko ua: he te ne fehi‘a ki he taha kae ‘ofa‘i ‘a e taha, pe te ne piki ki he taha kae ta‘etoka‘i ‘a e taha, ‘oku ‘ikai te mou lava ke ‘eiki ‘aki ‘a e ‘Otua mo Koloa fakatou‘osi.
40006025	Ko ia ai, ‘oku ou tala kiate kimoutolu, ‘oua na‘a mou lotomo‘ua koe‘uhi ko ho‘omou mo‘ui, ha me‘a te mou kai, pe ha me‘a te mou inu; ‘uma‘ā homou sino, ki ha me‘a te mou ‘ai ki ai. ‘Ikai ‘oku lahi ‘a e mo‘ui ‘i he me‘akai, mo e sino ‘i hono kofu?
40006026	Vakai ange e fanga manupuna ‘o e ‘atā; he ‘oku nau tūtuu‘i pe tu‘usi, pe fa‘oaki feleoko? Ka ‘oku fafanga kinautolu ‘e ho‘omou Tamai Fakalangi. ‘Ikai ‘oku mou mahu‘inga noa pē ‘iate kinautolu?
40006027	Pea neongo ho‘omou lotomo‘ua ki ai, ka tala‘ehai ‘e lava ai ‘e ha taha ke tolo‘i atu hono ta‘u ko ha momo‘i hanga pē ‘e taha.
40006028	Pea ko ho‘omou loto mo‘ua ki he kofu koe‘uma‘ā? Mou sivi ‘a e ngaahi lile ‘o e kelekele, pe kuo fēfē ‘enau tupu: he ‘oku nau fiu ‘a ngāue, pe ‘oku nau filo?
40006029	Ka ‘oku ou tala atu, Na‘a mo Solomone, ‘i he‘ene ‘ai hono nāunau kotoa, na‘e ‘ikai ke vaha‘a teunga‘ia ai ha taha ‘o e ngaahi lile ni.
40006030	Pea kapau kuo kofu fakatafu‘ufu‘u pehē ‘e he ‘Otua ‘a e mohuku ‘o e kelekele, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘i ai ni he ‘aho ni, kae tafu ‘aki ‘a e ‘ōvani ‘apongipongi, huanoa ‘a kimoutolu, ‘a e kau tui vaivai.
40006031	Ko ia, ‘oua te mou lotomo‘ua, ‘o mou pehē, Te tau kai ai e hā mo inu e hā? Mo kofu ‘aki ‘a e hā?
40006032	He ko e ngaahi me‘a ko eni ‘oku hehenga ki ai ‘a Senitaile: pea ‘oku mea‘i ‘e ho‘omou Tamai Fakalangi ‘oku taau mo kimoutolu ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia kotoa.
40006033	Ka mou kumi mu‘a ki hono pule‘anga, mo e mā‘oni‘oni ‘a‘ana, pea ‘e ‘atu mo ia foki ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia kotoa.
40006034	Ko ia, ‘oua te mou lotomo‘ua koe‘uhi ko e ‘apongipongi, he ‘e mo‘ua ‘a e ‘apongipongi ‘i he me‘a ko ia. ‘Oku lahi pē ki he ‘aho ni ‘a hono kovi ‘o‘ona.
40007001	‘OUA te mou fakaanga, na‘a anga‘ia kimoutolu.
40007002	He ko e fakaanga ‘oku mou fakaanga ‘aki, ko ia pē ‘e fakaanga ‘aki kiate kimoutolu; pea ko e fua ‘oku mou fua ‘aki, ko ia pē ‘e fua ‘aki kiate kimoutolu.
40007003	Pea ko e hā ‘oku ke tokanga ai ki he malamala‘i ‘akau ‘oku ‘i he mata ‘o ho kāinga, ka ko e fu‘u lalango na ‘oku ‘i ho mata ‘oku ‘ikai te ke ‘ilo ki ai?
40007004	Pea te ke lea fēfē ki ho kāinga, ‘Ē, tuku ke u to‘oa mai ‘a e malamala‘i ‘akau mei ho mata: ka tā ko e fu‘u lalango ‘ena ‘i ho mata ‘o‘ou?
40007005	‘a e ‘afungi, motu‘a to‘o mai mei ho‘ou mata ‘a e lalango; pea te ke toki sio totonu ke to‘o ‘a e malamala mei he mata ‘o ho kāinga.
40007006	‘Oua na‘a ‘ange ‘a e ngaahi me‘a tapu ki he fanga kulī, pe laku ho‘omou ngaahi mata‘itofe ki he fanga puaka: na‘a ‘iloange te nau a‘a ai, pea foki mai ‘o tui‘i kimoutolu.
40007007	Kole, pea ‘e foaki kiate kimoutolu: kumi, pea te mou ‘ilo: tukituki, pea ‘e to‘o kiate kimoutolu:
40007008	he ‘ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku ne kole ‘oku ne ma‘u, pea ko ia ‘oku kumi ‘oku ne ‘ilo, pea ko ia ‘oku tukituki ‘e to‘o kiate ia.
40007009	He ko e tangata fē ‘iate kimoutolu, ka kole ki ai ‘e hono foha ha fo‘i mā, te ne ‘ange koā ha fo‘i maka?
40007010	Pea ka kole ki ha ika, te ne ‘ange ha ngata?
40007011	pea kapau ā ‘oku mou ‘ilo ke foaki me‘a‘ofa lelei ki ho‘omou fānau, neongo ko e fa‘ahinga kovi kimoutolu, huanoa ho‘omou Tamai ‘oku ‘i Hēvani, ha‘ane foaki me‘a lelei kiate kinautolu ‘oku kole kiate ia.
40007012	Ko ia, ‘ilonga ha me‘a ‘oku mou loto ke fai ‘e he kakai kiate kimoutolu, fai pehē foki kiate kinautolu: he ko e Lao ia mo e Tohi Palōfita.
40007013	Mou hū ‘i he matapā fāsi‘i: he ‘oku fālahi ‘a e matapā, pea ‘atā ‘a e hala, ‘oku fakatau ki mala, pea tokolahi ‘a e kakai ‘oku hū atu ai:
40007014	koe‘uhi ‘oku fāsi‘i ‘a e matapā, pea ‘efi‘efi ‘a e hala ‘oku fakatau ki he mo‘ui; pea toko si‘i ‘a e kakai ‘oku ‘ilo ia.
40007015	Ka mou lamalama ‘a e kau palōfita loi, ‘a e fa‘ahinga ‘oku ha‘u kiate kimoutolu ‘oku nau kofu hangē ha sipi, ka ‘i loto ko e fanga ulofi fekai kinautolu.
40007016	Ko honau ngaahi fua te mou ‘ilo lelei ai kinautolu. He ‘oku toli kālepi mei he vao talatala, pe ko e fiki mei he ngatae?
40007017	Pehē, ‘ilonga ha ‘akau lelei ‘oku ne fua ‘aonga: ka ‘ilonga ha ‘akau tamaki ‘oku fua kovi.
40007018	‘Oku ‘ikai lava ‘e he ‘akau lelei ke fua kovi, pe ko e ‘akau tamaki ke fua ‘aonga.
40007019	‘Ilonga ha ‘akau ‘oku ‘ikai fua ‘aonga, ‘oku tā ‘o laku ki he afi.
40007020	‘Āua, ko honau ngaahi fua te mou ‘ilo lelei ai kinautolu.
40007021	‘Oku ‘ikai ko ia pē ‘oku ne lau mai, ‘Ēī, ‘Ēī, te ne hū ki he Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani; ka ko ia ‘oku ne fai ‘a e finangalo ‘o ‘eku Tamai ‘oku ‘i Hēvani.
40007022	Ko e tokolahi te nau lea mai ‘i he ‘aho ko ē, ‘o pehē, ‘Ēī, ‘Ēī, ‘ikai ko ho huafa na‘a mau palofisai ai? Pea ko ho huafa na‘a mau kapusi tēvolo ai? Pea ko ho huafa na‘a mau feia ai ‘a e ngaahi mana lahi?
40007023	Pea te u toki vete kiate kinautolu hoku loto, ‘o pehē, Te‘eki te u ‘iloa kimoutolu: ‘alu meiate au, ‘a e kau maumau lao.
40007024	Pea ko ia, ‘ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku ne fanongo ki he ngaahi tala ni ‘a‘aku, mo ne fai ki ai, te u fakatatau ia ki he tangata fakapotopoto, ‘a ia na‘a ne langa hono fale ki he maka:
40007025	pea na‘e tō ‘a e ‘uha, pea tafe mai ‘a e ngaahi vai, pea angi ‘a e ngaahi matangi, ‘o nau fa‘afa‘aki ki he fale ko ia: ka na‘e ‘ikai holo, he ne tu‘unga ki he maka.
40007026	Ka ‘ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku ne fanongo ki he ngaahi tala ni ‘a‘aku, kae ‘ikai fai ki ai, ‘e fakatatau ia ki he tangata vale, ‘a ia na‘a ne langa hono fale ki he ‘one‘one:
40007027	pea na‘e tō ‘a e ‘uha, pea tafe mai ‘a e ngaahi vai, pea angi ‘a e ngaahi matangi, ‘o nau tuki ki he fale ko ia, pea holo ia: pea ko e holo ‘o e fale ko ia ko e holo lahi.
40007028	Pea ‘i he faka‘osi ‘e Sīsū ‘a e ngaahi tala ni, na‘e to‘oa ‘a e kakai ‘i he‘ene fai:
40007029	he ko e anga ‘o ‘ene faiako kiate kinautolu na‘e ngali ko ha pule ia, ‘o ‘ikai hangē ko ‘enau kau sikalaipe.
40008001	PEA ‘i he‘ene ‘alu hifo mei he mo‘unga, na‘e muimui kiate ia ha ngaahi fu‘u kakai.
40008002	Pea ‘iloange na‘e ha‘u ha kilia ‘o ne hū kiate ia, ‘o ne pehē, ‘Eiki, ka ne ke loto ke fai, te ke lava ke fakama‘a au.
40008003	Pea mafao atu ‘e ia hono nima ‘o ala ki he tangata, ‘o ne pehē, ‘oku ou loto pē: ke ke ma‘a koe. Pea na‘e fakama‘a leva hono kilia.
40008004	Pea pehē ‘e Sīsū kiate ia, Tokanga ke ‘oua na‘a ke tala ha me‘a ki ha taha; ka ke mole pē ‘o fakahā koe ki he taula‘eiki, pea ‘ange ‘a e me‘a‘ofa na‘e tu‘utu‘uni ‘e Mōsese, kōno fakamo‘oni kiate kinautolu.
40008005	Pea ‘i he‘ene a‘u ki Kāpaneume, na‘e ha‘u kiate ia ha senituliō, ‘o kole kiate ia, ‘o pehē,
40008006	‘Eiki, ko si‘eku tamaio‘eiki ‘oku fokoutua ‘i ‘api, kuo puke ‘i he mamatea, pea fakamanavahē ‘ene mamahi.
40008007	Pea pehē ‘e ia ki ai, Te u ‘alu atu ‘e au, ‘o faito‘o ia.
40008008	Ka ka tali ‘e he senituliō, ‘o ne pehē, ‘Eiki, ‘oku ‘ikai te u taau ke ke hū mai ki hoku poko‘i fale, ka ke fai pē ha fo‘i folofola, pea ‘e mo‘ui ai ‘eku tamaio‘eiki.
40008009	He ko au foki ko e tangata pule‘ia, pea ‘oku ai ha kau sōtia ‘oku fakaongo kiate au: pea u pehē ki ha taha, ‘Alu, pea ‘alu ia, pea ki ha taha, Ha‘u, pea ne ha‘u; pea u pehē ki he‘eku pōpula, Fai ē, pea ‘oku ne fai.
40008010	Pea ‘i he fanongo ki ai ‘a Sīsū na‘a ne ofo; ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu na‘e muimui mai, ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Na‘e‘ikai te u ‘ilo mei ha taha ‘i ‘Isileli ha tui ‘oku pehē fau.
40008011	Pea‘oku ou tala atu, ‘E ha‘u ha tokolahi mei Hangahake mo Hangahifo, ‘o nau nonofo mo ‘Epalahame mo ‘Aisake mo Sēkope, ‘i he Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani:
40008012	ka ko e fānau totonu ‘o e Pule‘anga ‘e kapusi ki he po‘uli ‘o tua‘ā. Ko e potu ia ‘e toki hoko ai ‘a e tangi mo e fengai‘itaki ‘o e nifo.
40008013	Pea pehē ‘e Sīsū ki he senituliō, ‘Alu pē ā: ‘e fai kiate koe ‘o hangē ko ho‘o tui. Pea na‘e mo‘ui ‘a e tamaio‘eiki ‘i he taimi pē ko ia.
40008014	Pea ‘i he hū ‘a Sīsū ki he fale ‘o Pita, na‘a ne ‘ilo ‘a e fa‘ē ‘a hono uaifi, ‘oku tokoto kuo puke‘i he mofi.
40008015	Pea ne ala ki hono nima, pea mahu‘i ‘a e mofi mei he fefine, pea ne tu‘u ‘o tauhi kia Sīsū.
40008016	Pea kuo efiafi, na‘a nau ‘oange kiate ia ‘a e tokolahi na‘e ‘āvea; ‘o ne kapusi ‘a e ngaahi fa‘ahikehe ‘aki ha lea pē, pea ne fakamo‘ui mo kinautolu kotoa pē na‘e puke:
40008017	koe‘uhi ke fakamo‘oni ki he me‘a na‘e folofola‘aki ‘ia ‘Aisea ko e palōfita, ‘o pehē, Na‘a ne to‘o ‘e ia ‘etau ngaahi vaivai, Mo ne fua ‘etau ngaahi mahaki.
40008018	Pea ‘i he vakai ‘e Sīsū ki he ‘ālopaki ha fu‘u kakai lahi, na‘a ne tu‘utu‘uni ke ‘alu mei ai ki he kauvai.
40008019	Pea na‘e ‘unu‘unu mai kiate ia ha toko taha, ko ha sikalaipe, ‘o ne pehē ki ai, Tangata‘eiki, te u muimui kiate koe, neongo pe ko e fē ha potu te ke me‘a ki ai.
40008020	Pea lea ‘a Sīsū kiate ia, ‘o pehē, Ko e fanga fōkisi ‘oku ai hanau tafu, mo e fanga manupuna ‘o e ‘atā hanau pununga; ka ko e Fanautama ‘a Tangata ‘oku ‘ikai si‘a potu ke ‘olunga ki ai hono ‘ulu.
40008021	Pea toki lea mo ha taha kehe ‘o e kau ako, ‘o ne pehē ki ai, ‘Eiki, tuku mai au ke u lele mu‘a ‘o tanu si‘eku motu‘a.
40008022	Ka ka tali ‘e Sīsū, Muimui koe kiate au, pea tuku ki he kau mate ke nau tanu ‘a e mate ‘anautolu.
40008023	Pea kuo heka ia ki he vaka, pea toki heka mo ‘ene kau ako.
40008024	Pea ‘iloange na‘e hoko ha hou lahi, pea fakapūlou ‘a e vaka ‘e he ngaahi peau: ka ka mohe pē ia.
40008025	Pea ‘unu‘unu atu ‘a e kau ako, ‘o nau fafangu ia, he‘enau pehē, ‘Eiki! Tokoni mai! ‘Oku tau tu‘utāmaki!
40008026	Pea pehē ‘e ia kiate kinautolu, ‘a e kau tui vaivai, ko e hā ‘oku mou lotosi‘i ai? Pea ne toki tu‘u ‘o lolomi ‘a e matangi mo e tahi, pea na‘e hoko ha tofu lahi.
40008027	Pea ofo ‘a e kau tangata ‘o nau pehē, Ko e tangata hā ‘eni! He na‘a mo e matangi mo e tahi, ‘oku na fakaongo kiate ia!
40008028	Pea ‘i he‘ene a‘u ki he kauvai, ki he fonua ‘o e ha‘a Katala, na‘e fakafetaulaki mai kiate ia ha ongo tangata na‘e ‘āvea, ko ‘ena fehuufi mei he ‘aaki fonualoto; ko e ongo me‘a ngaohingata‘a ‘aupito, ko ia na‘e ‘ikai ‘uhia ‘a e hala ko ia.
40008029	Pea ‘iloange na‘a na kalanga ‘o pehē, Ko ho hā kimautolu, ‘e ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otua? Kuo ke ha‘u ke fakamamahi‘i leva kimautolu, ka ‘oku kei tuai hono taimi?
40008030	Pea na‘e ai ha fu‘u fanga puaka na‘e huhua mei he mama‘o;
40008031	pea kole kiate ia ‘e he kau tēvolo, ‘o pehē, Ka ko ho‘o kapusi kimautolu, tuku ke mau hū ki he fanga puaka na.
40008032	Pea pehē ‘e ia kiate kinautolu, ‘Alu pē. Pea nau hū mai kitu‘a, ‘o ‘alu atu, ‘o hū ki he fanga puaka: pea fakafokifā na‘e ‘oho kotoa ‘a e fanga manu ‘i he tahifohifo ki loto tahi, ‘o nau melemo ai.
40008033	Pea hola ‘a e kakai na‘e tauhi kinautolu, ‘o nau ‘alu mei ai ki he kolo, ‘o ongoongoa kotoa pē, kae‘uma‘ā ‘a e ngaahi me‘a na‘e kau ki he ongo ‘āvea.
40008034	Pea vakai, na‘e ‘aukau mai ‘a e kolo kitu‘a ke fakafetaulaki kia Sīsū: pea ‘i he‘enau ‘ilo ia, na‘a nau kole ke ne hiki mei honau feitu‘u.
40009001	PEA heka vaka ia ‘o ‘alu ki he kauvai, ‘o ne a‘u ki hono kolo ‘o‘ona.
40009002	Pea ‘iloange na‘a nau ‘omi kiate ia ha tangata mamatea, kuo ‘ai ki ha mohenga. Pea ‘i he vakai ‘e Sīsū ‘enau tui, pea ne pehē ki he tangata mamatea, Fiemālie, nga‘ata; kuo fakamolemole ho‘o ngaahi angahala.
40009003	Pea tā na‘e ai ha ni‘ihi ‘i he kau sikalaipe na‘a nau pehē ‘i honau loto, ‘oku lea fie ‘otua ‘a e siana ni.
40009004	Pea ‘ilo ‘e Sīsū ‘enau mahalo, ‘o ne pehē, Ko ho‘omou mahalo kovi ‘i homou loto koe‘uma‘ā?
40009005	He ko e fē ‘oku faingofua; ‘a e pehē, Kuo fakamolemole ho‘o ngaahi angahala: pe ko e pehē, Tu‘u ‘o ‘eve‘eva?
40009006	Ka koe‘uhi ke mou ‘ilo ‘oku mafai ‘e he Fanautama ‘a Tangata ke fakamolemole angahala ‘i māmani, (pea toki hanga ia ‘o lea ki he tangata mamatea), Tu‘u, pea to‘o ho mohenga, pea mole ki ho ‘api.
40009007	Pea ne tu‘u, ‘o ‘alu ki hono ‘api.
40009008	Pea ‘i he sio ki ai ‘a e kakai na‘a nau manavahē; pea nau fakamālō ki he ‘Otua, he‘ene tuku ha fu‘u mafai pehē ki he tangata.
40009009	Pea ‘i he ‘alu ange ‘a Sīsū mei ai, na‘a ne sio ki ha tangata ‘oku nofo ‘i he fale tute, ‘a ia na‘e hingoa ko Mātiu: pea ne pehē kiate ia, Muimui kiate au. Pea ne tu‘u ‘o muimui kiate ia.
40009010	Pea ‘i he keinanga ‘e Sīsū ‘i he fale, tā na‘e ai ha tokolahi ‘o e kau pōpilikane mo e kau angahala, na‘a nau ha‘u ‘o fetākoto‘i mo ia mo ‘ene kau ako ‘i he kai.
40009011	Pea ‘i he mamata ki ai ‘a e kau Fālesi, na‘a nau pehē ki he‘ene kau ako, Ko e hā ‘oku kai fakataha ai ho‘omou tangata‘eiki pea mo e kau Pōpilikane mo e kau angahala?
40009012	Ka ka ongo‘i ‘e ia, ‘o ne pehē, Ko e tangata faito‘o ‘oku ‘ikai ma‘a e mālohi, ka ma‘a e mahaki.
40009013	Ka mou ‘alu ‘o kumi ki he ‘uhinga ‘o e me‘a ni, Ko e meesi ‘oku ou tangi ki ai, ‘o ‘ikai ko e feilaulau: he na‘e ‘ikai te u ha‘u ke ui ‘a e angatonu, ka ko e angahala.
40009014	Pea toki ha‘u kiate ia ‘a e kau ako ‘a Sione, ‘o nau pehē, Ko e hā ‘oku mau fa‘a ‘aukai ai ‘e kimautolu, mo e kau Fālesi; ka ko e kau ako ‘a‘au ‘oku ‘ikai te nau ‘aukai?
40009015	Ka ka pehē ‘e Sīsū kiate kinautolu, He lava ‘e he kakai ‘o e fale ta‘ane ke fakamamahi, lolotonga ‘oku ‘iate kinautolu ‘a e tangata ta‘ane? Kae tokaange ha taimi ‘e hiki meiate kinautolu ‘a e tangata ta‘ane, pea te nau toki ‘aukai.
40009016	Pea ‘oku ‘ikai ha taha te ne ‘oposi ha kofu motu‘a ‘aki ha konga tupenu fo‘ou: he ko e me‘a ‘oku ‘oposi ‘aki ‘oku ne maikiiki‘i ‘a e kofu motu‘a, pea ‘oku hoko ai ha fu‘u mahae ‘oku lahi ange.
40009017	Pea ‘oku ‘ikai te nau ‘utu uaine fo‘ou ki he ngaahi hina leta ‘oku motu‘a: he ka pehē, ‘e mahae ‘a e ngaahi hina; pea mahua ai ‘a e uaine, ‘o maumau mo e hina. Ka ‘oku nau ‘ai uaine fo‘ou ki he ngaahi hina fo‘ou, pea fakatou tolonga.
40009018	Pea lolotonga ‘ene lea‘aki ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ni kiate kinautolu, ‘iloange na‘e ha‘u kiate ia ha matāpule, ‘o ne tū‘ulutui kiate ia, ‘o ne pehē, Ko e ki‘i fefine ‘a‘aku kuo toki pekia ni: ka ke me‘a mai, ‘o ‘ai ho nima kiate ia, pea te ne mo‘ui.
40009019	Pea tu‘u hake ‘a Sīsū ‘o muimui atu, ‘a ia mo ‘ene kau ako.
40009020	Pea tā ko ha fefine, kuo ‘au toto ‘o ta‘u hongofulu mā ua, na‘a ne ‘unu‘unu atu ‘i hono tu‘a, ‘o ne ala ki he pao ‘o hono kofu:
40009021	he na‘a ne pehē ‘i hono loto, kapau te u ala pē ki hono kofu, ‘e fakamo‘ui au.
40009022	Ka ka tafoki ‘a Sīsū ‘o ‘ilo ia, ‘o ne pehē ki ai, ‘oua te ke manavahē, nga‘ata; kuo fakamo‘ui koe ‘e ho‘o tui. Pea na‘e mo‘ui ‘a e fefine mei he taimi ko ia.
40009023	Pea ‘i he hū ‘a Sīsū ki he fale ‘o e matāpule, mo ne mamata ki he kau ifi fangufangu, mo e fu‘u kakai ‘oku vālau,
40009024	na‘a ne pehē, Mou mātuku atu: he ‘oku ‘ikai pekia ‘a e ta‘ahine, ka ‘oku mohe pē.
40009025	Pea nau luma kiate ia. Pea kuo kapusi ‘a e kakai, na‘a ne ‘unu‘unu atu ‘o puke hono nima; pea tu‘u ‘a e ta‘ahine.
40009026	Pea pavake atu hono ongoongo ‘o e me‘a ki he fonua kotoa ko ia.
40009027	Pea ‘i he ‘alu ange ‘a Sīsū mei ai, na‘e toupili ‘i mui kiate ia ha ongo kui, ‘oku na kalanga ‘o pehē, Hako ‘o Tēvita, ‘alo‘ofa mai.
40009028	Pea ‘i he‘ene hū ki fale, na‘e ‘unu‘unu atu kiate ia ‘a e ongo kui: pea pehē ‘e Sīsū kiate kinaua, ‘oku mo tui te u lava ‘a e me‘a ni? Pea na pehē ki ai, ‘Io, ‘Eiki.
40009029	Toki ala ‘e ia ki hona mata, mo ne pehē, Ke fai kiate kimoua ‘o fakatatau ki ho‘omo tui.
40009030	Pea ‘ā ai hona mata: pea na‘ina‘i mamafa ‘e Sīsū kiate kinaua, ‘o pehē, Tokanga ke ‘oua na‘a ‘ilo ia ‘e ha taha.
40009031	Ka ka ‘alu kinaua, ‘o na ongoongoa atu ‘a Sīsū ‘i he fonua ko ia kotoa.
40009032	Pea ‘i he‘ena ‘alu atu, vakai na‘e ‘omi kiate ia ha noa kuo ‘āvea.
40009033	Pea ‘i he kapusi ‘a e tēvolo na‘e lea ‘a e noa: pea ofo ‘a e kakai, ‘o nau pehē, Kuo te‘eki hoko pehē ‘a e me‘a ko ia ‘i ‘Isileli.
40009034	Ka ko e Fālesi na‘a nau pehē, Ko e Pule ‘o e kau tēvolo ‘oku ne fai ai ‘ene kapusi tēvolo.
40009035	Pea foli ‘e Sīsū ‘a e ngaahi kolo mo e ngaahi vilisi, ‘o ne faiako ‘i honau ngaahi falelotu, mo ne malanga‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli ‘o e Pule‘anga: pea neongo pe ko e hā ha alangamahaki, pe ha mahamahaki na‘a ne fakamo‘ui ia.
40009036	Pea ‘i he‘ene sio ki he ngaahi fu‘u kakai, na‘e langa hono fatu ‘i he ‘ofa kiate kinautolu: he na‘a nau nofo ongosia mo tukuhāusia, ‘o hangē ko ha fanga sipi ta‘ehanau tauhi.
40009037	Pea toki pehē ‘e ia ki he‘ene kau ako, Kuo lahi ‘a e ta‘u kuo motu‘u, ka ‘oku kaungatāmaki ‘a e kau ngāue;
40009038	ko ia mou kole ki he ‘Eiki ‘oku ‘a‘ana ‘a e ta‘u, ke ne kouna atu mo ha kau ngāue ke utu ‘ene ta‘u.
40010001	PEA ne ui ange ‘a e kau Hongofulumāua ‘o ‘ene ako; ‘o ne tuku kiate kinautolu ke fa‘iteliha ki he ngaahi fa‘ahikehe, koe‘uhi ke nau kapusi kinautolu; mo ne ‘ange ‘a e mafai ke faito‘o ‘a e fa‘ahinga alanga mahaki kotoa pē mo e mahamahaki.
40010002	Pea ko eni ‘a e hingoa ‘o e kau Hongofulumāua ‘Aposetolo. Ko e ‘uluaki ko Saimone, ‘a ia na‘e fakahingoa ko Pita, mo ‘Anitelū ko hono tehina: ko Sēmisi ko e foha ‘o Sēpeti, mo Sione ko hono tehina;
40010003	ko Filipe mo Pātolomiu; ko Tōmasi pea mo Mātiu ko e tānaki tukuhau; ko Sēmisi ko e foha ‘o ‘Alefiusi, mo Lepiusi;
40010004	ko Saimone ‘o e kautaha Mamahi‘i Fonua, pea mo Siutasi ‘Isikāliote, ‘a ia foki na‘a ne lavaki‘i ‘a Sīsū.
40010005	Ko e kau Hongofulumāua ni na‘e fekau atu ‘e Sīsū: ‘o ne na‘ina‘i kiate kinautolu, ‘o pehē, ‘oua te mou afe ‘i ha hala ‘oku ‘alu ki ha Senitaile, pea ‘oua te mou hū ki ha kolo Samēlia:
40010006	ka mou ō mu‘a ki he fanga sipi kuo mole ‘i he hako ‘o ‘Isileli.
40010007	Pea ‘i ho‘omou ō, mou fanongonongo, ‘o pehē, Kuo ofi ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani.
40010008	Pea mou faito‘o mahaki, mo fokotu‘u ‘a e pekia, mo fakama‘a kilia, mo kapusi tēvolo: kuo mou ma‘u ta‘etotongi pea mou ‘atu ta‘etotongi.
40010009	‘Oua te mou tokonaki ha pa‘anga koula ke fakapona ‘i homou no‘o, pea na‘a mo e siliva ‘e ‘ikai, kae‘uma‘ā e me‘a tēpū, ha pa‘anga kapa.
40010010	‘Oua na‘a kumi ni ha kato ‘oho ki he hala, pe tangi ke ua ha sote, pe ha sū, pea na‘a mo ha tokotoko, ‘oua. Seuke, ‘ilonga ha taha ‘oku ngāue, ‘oku taau ke ne ma‘u hono tauhi.
40010011	Pea ka mou ka a‘u ki ha kolo, pe ha vilisi, ‘eke pe ko hai ha taha ‘oku taau ke mou ‘alu ki ai: pea nofo pē ai kae‘oua ke mou hiki ki ha potu kehe.
40010012	Pea ‘i ho‘omou hū ki he fale, tāpuaki‘i ia.
40010013	Pea kapau ‘oku taau mo‘oni ‘a e fale, ‘e toka ai ho‘omou tāpuaki; pea kapau ‘oku ‘ikai taau, pea ko ho‘omou tāpuaki ‘e foki mai.
40010014	Pea ‘ilonga ‘a ia ‘e ‘ikai te ne tali kimoutolu, pe ma‘u ho‘omou ngaahi lea, pea ka mou ka hū mai mei he fale ko ia, pe ko e kolo, mou tūtuu‘i hono efu mei homou va‘e.
40010015	Ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘E kātaki ngofua ‘i he ‘Aho Fakamaau ‘a e fonua ‘o Sōtoma mo Komola ‘i he kolo ko ia.
40010016	Vakai, ‘oku ou tuku atu kimoutolu ke mou hangē ko e fanga sipi ‘i he lotolotonga ‘o e fanga ulofi: ko ia, ke mou fakapotopoto ‘o hangē ko ha ngata, pea vale ‘i he kovi ‘o hangē ko ha lupe.
40010017	Ka mou lamalama telia ‘a e kakai: he te nau faka‘ilo kimoutolu ki he ngaahi fakamāu‘anga, pea te nau haha kimoutolu ‘i honau ngaahi falelotu:
40010018	‘io, ‘e ‘ave kimoutolu ki he ngaahi kōvana, mo e ngaahi tu‘i, koe‘uhi ko au, ke ai ha fakamatala kiate kinautolu Siu pea mo e kau Senitaile.
40010019	Pea ‘oka nau ka faka‘ilo kimoutolu, ‘oua te mou loto mo‘ua pe ‘e fēfē ha‘amou tali, pe ki ha me‘a te mou lea‘aki: he ‘e ‘atu kiate kimoutolu ‘i he taimi ko ia ha me‘a ke mou lea‘aki:
40010020	he ‘oku ‘ikai ko kimoutolu ‘e lea, ka ko e Laumālie ‘o ho‘omou Tamai ‘e lea ‘iate kimoutolu.
40010021	Pea ‘e faka‘ilo ‘e he ta‘okete hono tehina, koe‘uhi ke tāmate‘i, pea ko e tamai ‘ene fānau: pea ‘e tu‘u ‘a e fānau ki he‘enau mātu‘a ‘o tāmate‘i kinautolu.
40010022	Pea te mou hoko ko e fehi‘anekina ‘e he kakai kotoa pē koe‘uhi ko hoku hingoa: ka ko ia te ne kītaki ‘o a‘u ki he iku‘anga, ko e toko taha ko ia ‘e mo‘ui.
40010023	Pea ka nau ka fakatanga‘i kimoutolu ‘i he kolo ko ē, mou hola ki he kolo ko ē: he ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘i he te‘eki ke mou ‘osiki ‘a e ngaahi kolo ‘o ‘Isileli, kuo ha‘u ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata.
40010024	Tala‘ehai ‘oku mahili ‘a e tama ako ‘i he faiako, ‘uma‘ā ‘a e pōpula ‘i he‘ene ‘eiki.
40010025	Mālō pē ‘o kapau ‘e fai ki he tama ako ‘o tatau mo ‘ene faiako, mo e pōpula ‘o tatau mo ‘ene ‘eiki. Pea kapau kuo nau hingoa pā‘usi‘i ‘a e tangata‘eiki ko Pelisipupe, huanoa hono kau nofo‘anga.
40010026	Ko ia, ‘oua te mou manavahē kiate kinautolu: he ‘oku ‘ikai ha me‘a kuo fufū ‘e ta‘efakahā, pe lilo ‘e ta‘e‘iloa.
40010027	Ko e me‘a ‘oku ou tala po‘uli kiate kimoutolu, mou fakahā ‘aho; pea ko e me‘a ‘oku fanafana‘aki ki homou telinga, mou fanongonongo mei he tu‘a fale.
40010028	Pea ‘oua te mou momo‘i manavahē kiate kinautolu ‘oku tāmate‘i ‘a e sino pē, ka ko e laumālie ‘oku ‘ikai te nau lava ke tāmate‘i: ka ke mou manavahē tu‘u kiate IA ‘oku mafai ke faka‘auha ‘i Heli ‘a e laumālie mo e sino fakatou‘osi.
40010029	‘Ikai ‘oku fakatau ha ongo ki‘i misi ‘e toko ua ki ha konga sēniti pē? Ka ‘e ‘ikai patū ki he kelekele hana taha ta‘eme‘a ki ai ‘e ho‘omou Tamai.
40010030	Ka ko e me‘a kiate kimoutolu, ko homou ngaahi tu‘oni lou‘ulu kuo ‘osi lau fakalāutelau.
40010031	Ko ia ‘oua te mou manavahē: ‘oku mou mahu‘inga kimoutolu ‘i ha fanga misi tokolahi.
40010032	Pea ‘ilonga ‘a ia te ne fakahā ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e kakai ‘ene kau kiate au te u fakahā foki ‘e au ‘eku kau kiate ia ‘i he ‘ao ‘o ‘eku Tamai ‘oku ‘i Hēvani.
40010033	Ka ‘ilonga ‘a ia te ne fakafisinga au ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e kakai, te u fakafisinga foki ‘e au ‘a e tangata ko ia ‘i he ‘ao ‘o ‘eku Tamai ‘oku ‘i Hēvani.
40010034	‘Oua te mou mahalo na‘a ku ha‘u ke velo mai ha melino ki he fonua: na‘e ‘ikai te u ha‘u ke veloaki mai ha melino, ka ko ha heletā.
40010035	Seuke, na‘a ku ha‘u ke fakavahavaha‘a ha tangata ki he‘ene tamai, ha fefine ki he‘ene fa‘ē, ha ta‘ahine ki he fa‘ē hono husepāniti;
40010036	pea ‘e hoko ai ko e ngaahi fili ‘o ha tangata ‘a hono kau nofo‘anga.
40010037	Ko ia ‘oku lahi ‘ene ‘ofa ki he‘ene tamai, pe ko ‘ene fa‘ē, ‘i he‘ene ‘ofa kiate au, ‘oku ‘ikai taau ia mo au; pea ko ia ‘oku lahi ‘ene ‘ofa ki hono foha, pe ko hono ‘ōfefine ‘i he‘ene ‘ofa kiate au, ‘oku ‘ikai taau ia mo au:
40010038	pea ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai te ne puke hono kolosi ‘o muimui ‘iate au, ‘oku ‘ikai taau ia mo au.
40010039	Ko ia te ne kalofaki ‘ene mo‘ui, ‘oku ne tuku ia ke mole: ka ko ia ‘oku ne tuku ‘ene mo‘ui ke mole koe‘uhi ko au, ‘oku ne kalofaki ia.
40010040	Ko ia ‘oku ne tali kimoutolu ‘oku ne tali au, pea ko ia ‘oku ne tali au, ‘oku ne tali ia ‘a ia na‘a ne fekau mai au.
40010041	Ko ia ‘oku ne tali ha palōfita, koe‘uhi pē ko ‘ene palōfita, te ne ma‘u ‘a e totongi fakapalōfita; pea ko ia ‘oku ne tali ha tangata lotu, koe‘uhi pē ko ‘ene lotu, te ne ma‘u ‘a e totongi ‘o ha tangata lotu.
40010042	‘Io, ko ia te ne ‘ange ha inu ki ha taha ‘i si‘i fānau ni, koe‘uhi pē ko e toko taha ia ‘i he‘eku kau ako, neongo ko ha hu‘a vai momoko pē, ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito mole ‘ene totongi ‘a‘ana.
40011001	PEA kuo faka‘osi ‘e Sīsū ‘ene fai tu‘utu‘uni ki he kau Hongofulumāua ‘o ‘ene ako, na‘a ne hiki mei he potu ko ia ke faiako mo malanga ‘i honau ngaahi kolo.
40011002	Pea fanongo ‘e Sione ‘i he pilīsone ki he ngaahi ngāue ‘a e Mīsaia, ‘o ne fekau atu ‘i he‘ene kau ako ke fehu‘i kiate ia,
40011003	‘o pehē, Ko koe ia na‘e pehē ke ha‘u, pe te tau ‘amanaki ki ha taha kehe?
40011004	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū ‘o ne pehē kiate kinaua, Mo ō ‘o fakahā kia Sione ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku mo fanongo mo mamata ki ai:
40011005	‘oku ‘ā ‘a e kui, pea ‘eve‘eva ‘a e heke, ‘oku fakama‘a ‘a e kilia, pea ongo ‘a e tuli, pea fokotu‘u ‘a e mate, pea malanga‘aki ‘a e ongoongo lelei ki he masiva:
40011006	pea monū‘ia ā ka ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai tūkia ‘iate au.
40011007	Pea kuo na ō, pea hanga ‘e Sīsū ‘o lea ki he kakai ‘ia Sione, Ko ho‘omou ‘alu atu ki he toafa ke siofi ‘a e hā? Ko ha kaho ‘apē ‘oku lulu‘i ‘e he matangi, ‘ō?
40011008	Ka ko e hā nai na‘a mou ‘alu ke mātā? Ko ha tangata ‘apē na‘e kofu silika fakatafu‘ufu‘u, ‘ō? ‘Ē, ko e fa‘ahinga ‘oku kofu silika ‘oku ‘i he ‘api ‘o e ngaahi tu‘i.
40011009	Ka ko ho‘omou ‘alu atu ki he hā? ke mamata ki ha palōfita? ‘āua; tala atu, ‘oku lahi ia ‘i ha palōfita.
40011010	Ko eni ia na‘e kau ki ai ‘a e folofola; Vakai, ‘oku ou fekau atu ‘e au hoku fakamelomelo ke mu‘omu‘a kiate koe, ‘a ia te ne ngaohi ho hala mo‘ou.
40011011	Ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘I he kakai kotoa kuo fanau‘i ‘e he fefine kuo te‘eki ke fokotu‘u ha toko taha ‘oku lahi ‘ia Sione Papitaiso: ka neongo pe ko hai ‘oku faka‘ange‘ange ‘i he Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani, ka ‘oku lahi ia ‘ia Sione.
40011012	Talu meia Sione Papitaiso ‘o fai mai, mo e ‘ohofia ‘o e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani, mo hono fa‘ao ‘e ha kau fakamālohi.
40011013	He ko e kau Palōfita kotoa pē mo e Lao, ‘o a‘u mai kia Sione na‘a nau palofisai pē.
40011014	Pea hei‘ilo pe te mou tali ‘a e lea, ka ko eni ia ‘a e ‘Ilaisiā ka hoko mai.
40011015	Ko ia ‘oku telinga, ke ne ongo‘i.
40011016	Ka te u fakatatau ki he hā ‘a e to‘utangata ni? ‘Oku hangē ko ha tu‘unga tamaiki ‘oku nofo ‘i he mala‘e, ‘o kalanga ange ki ha tamaiki kehe,
40011017	‘o pehē, Ne mau tā nafa atu, kae ‘ikai te mou me‘e; pea mau hua ‘a e ‘oiauē, kae ‘ikai te mou sī fatafata.
40011018	He na‘e ha‘u ‘a Sione ‘o ‘ikai keinanga mo faikava; pea nau pehē, ‘oku ‘iate ia ha tēvolo.
40011019	Na‘e ha‘u ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata ‘o keinanga mo faikava; pea nau pehē, ‘Isa, ko e tama fa‘a kai mo fa‘a inu kava, ko e kaume‘a ‘o e kau pōpilikane mo e kau angahala. Ka na‘e fakatonuhia ‘a Poto ‘e he‘ene fānau.
40011020	Toki hanga ‘e Sīsū ‘o valoki‘i ‘a e ngaahi kolo ‘a ia na‘e fai lahi ai ‘ene ngaahi ngāue mamafa, koe‘uhi na‘e ‘ikai te nau fakatomala.
40011021	‘Oiauē koe, Kōlesini! ‘Oiauē koe, Petesaita! he ka ne fai ‘i Taia mo Saitoni ‘a e ngaahi ngāue mamafa ne fai ‘iate kimoua, ne loa pē ‘enau fakatomala, ‘o ‘ai tauanga‘a mo pani efuefu.
40011022	Ka ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘E kātakingofua ‘i he ‘Aho Fakamaau ‘a Taia mo Saitoni ‘iate kimoua.
40011023	Pea ko koe foki, Kāpaneume; ‘e hiki koe koā ki langi? ‘e hifo koe ki Hētesi: he ka ne momo‘i fai ‘i Sōtoma ‘a e ngaahi ngāue mamafa ne fai ‘iate koe, pehē ne tolonga ‘o a‘u mai ki he ‘aho ni.
40011024	Ka ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘E kātaki ngofua ‘i he ‘Aho fakamaau ‘a e fonua ko Sōtoma ‘iate koe.
40011025	‘I he taimi ko ia na‘e tali ki ai ‘e Sīsū, ‘o ne pehē, ‘oku ou fakatonuhia‘ia koe, ‘e Tamai, ko e ‘Eiki ‘o e langi mo māmani, ‘i ho‘o fufū ‘a e ngaahi me‘a peheni mei ha kakai ‘oku poto mo ‘ilo‘ilo, ka ke tatala ki ha kau tamaiki.
40011026	‘Io, ‘e Tamai: tonuhia ho‘o finangalo ke pehē.
40011027	Kuo tuku mai kiate au ‘e he‘eku Tamai ‘a e ngaahi me‘a fuli pē: pea ‘oku ‘ikai ha toko taha ‘e ‘ilo lelei ‘a e Foha, ngata pē ‘i he Tamai; kae‘uma‘ā ‘a e ‘ilo ‘o e Tamai ‘e ha taha, ngata pē ‘i he Foha, pea mo ha taha ‘e loto ‘e he Foha ke faka‘ilo ia ki ai.
40011028	Ha‘u kiate au, ‘a kimoutolu kotoa pē ‘oku fakaongosia mo mafasia, pea te u fakamālōlō kimoutolu.
40011029	‘Ai ‘eku ‘ioke kiate kimoutolu, pea mou ako ‘iate au: he ‘oku ou fa‘a kātaki mo anga fākatu‘a, pea te mou ‘ilo ha mālōlō ‘i homou laumālie.
40011030	He ko e ‘ioke ‘a‘aku ‘oku molū, pea ko e kavenga ‘a‘aku ‘oku ma‘ama‘a.
40012001	‘I he taimi ko ia na‘e fononga ‘a Sīsū ‘i he ‘aho Sāpate, ‘o ne hala loto ngoue: pea na‘e fiekaia ‘ene kau ako, ‘o nau kamata toli ‘a e ngaahi fo‘i uite, ‘o kai.
40012002	Pea ‘i he sio ki ai ‘a e kau Fālesi, na‘a nau pehē kiate ia; Vakai, ‘oku fai ‘e ho‘o kau ako ‘a e me‘a ‘oku ‘ikai ngofua ke fai ‘i he Sāpate.
40012003	Ka ka pehē ‘e ia kiate kinautolu, Na‘e ‘ikai te mou lau ‘a e me‘a na‘e fai ‘e Tēvita ‘i he‘ene hālofia mo kinautolu na‘e ‘iate ia?
40012004	‘a ‘ene hū ki he Fale ‘o e ‘Otua, ‘o ne kai ‘a e mā fono, ‘a ia na‘e ‘ikai ngofua kiate ia ke kai, ‘uma‘ā ‘a kinautolu na‘e ‘iate ia, ngata pē ‘i he kau taula‘eiki?
40012005	Pea na‘e ‘ikai te mou lau ‘i he Lao, ‘o pehē, Ko e kau taula‘eiki ‘oku ‘i he Temipale ‘i he Sāpate, ‘oku nau maumau Sāpate kae ‘ata‘atā pē?
40012006	Pea ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘oku ‘i heni ha me‘a ‘oku lahi ‘i he Temipale.
40012007	Pea ka ne mou ‘ilo hono ‘uhinga ‘o e me‘a ni, Ko e meesi ‘oku ou tangi ki ai, ‘o ‘ikai ko e feilaulau, pehē ne ‘ikai te mou fakahalaia ‘a e ‘ata‘atā.
40012008	He ko e Fanautama ‘a Tangata ko e ‘Eiki ia ‘o e Sāpate.
40012009	Pea hiki ia ki ha potu kehe, ‘o ne hū ki honau falelotu.
40012010	Pea tā na‘e ‘i ai ha tangata ‘oku nima mate. Pea nau fehu‘i kiate ia, ‘o pehē, ‘oku ngofua ‘apē ke faito‘o ‘i he Sāpate? Koe‘uhi ke nau faka‘ilo ia.
40012011	Ka ka pehē ‘e ia kiate kinautolu, Ko e tangata fē ‘iate kimoutolu, ‘a ia ‘oku ne ma‘u ha sipi ‘e toko taha, pea tō ia ki ha luo ‘i he Sāpate, ‘e ‘ikai te ne puke ia ‘o ‘ohake, ‘ō?
40012012	Pea hono ‘ikai mahu‘inga ha tangata ‘i ha sipi? Ko ia ‘oku ngofua pē ‘i he Sāpate ke ngāue ‘aonga.
40012013	Pea toki pehē ‘e ia ki he tangata, Mafao atu ho nima. Pea ne mafao atu. Pea na‘e toe mo‘ui lelei mai, ‘o hangē ko e nima ‘e taha.
40012014	Pea ‘alu kitu‘a ‘a e kau Fālesi, ‘o nau puleaki‘i, pe ‘e fēfē ha‘anau tāmate‘i ia.
40012015	Ka ka ‘ilo ki ai ‘e Sīsū, ‘o ne ‘alu mei he potu ko ia; pea muimui ki ai ha tokolahi, pea ne fakamo‘ui ‘a kinautolu kotoa pē;
40012016	pea ne na‘ina‘i ki ai, ke ‘oua te nau fakae‘a ia.
40012017	Koe‘uhi ke fakamo‘oni ‘a e me‘a na‘e folofola‘aki ‘ia ‘Aisea ko e palōfita, ‘o pehē,
40012018	Ko eni ‘eku Sevāniti kuo u fili, ‘A ‘eku Pele, ‘a ia na‘e hōifua ai hoku finangalo: Te u ‘ai hoku laumālie kiate ia, Pea te ne fakahā ki he Senitaile ‘a e fai fakamaau.
40012019	‘E ‘ikai te ne fakakikihi, ‘uma‘ā ha lea lahi; ‘Io, ‘e ‘ikai fanongo ‘e ha taha mei hala ki hono le‘o.
40012020	Ko e kofe kuo foa ‘e ‘ikai te ne laiki, Pea ko e vavae ‘oku kohu ‘e ‘ikai te ne tāmate‘i, Kae‘oua ke ne ‘ai atu ‘a e fakamaau ke ikuna.
40012021	Pea ‘e falala ‘a e Senitaile ki hono huafa.
40012022	Pea na‘e toki ‘omi kiate ia ha tangata ‘āvea na‘e kui mo noa; pea ne fakamo‘ui ia: kae‘uma‘ā ne lea ai ‘ene noa, mo ne ‘ā.
40012023	Pea fakatumutumu ai kotoa pē ‘a e kakai, ‘o nau pehē, ‘oku ‘ikai nai ko e Hako ‘o Tēvita ‘eni, ‘ē?
40012024	Ka ko e kau Fālesi, ‘i he‘enau fanongo ki ai na‘a nau pehē, ‘oku ‘ikai fai ‘e he siana ni ‘ene kapusi tēvolo kae ‘ia Pelisipupe pē, ko e ‘eiki ‘o e kau tēvolo.
40012025	Ka ka ‘ilo ‘e ia ‘enau fakakaukau, ‘o ne pehē ki ai, ‘Ilonga ha pule‘anga ‘oku mavahevahe mo fetu‘usi, ‘e lusa: pea ‘ilonga ha kolo pe ha ‘api ‘oku mavahevahe mo fetu‘usi, ‘e ‘ikai tu‘u:
40012026	pea kapau ‘oku kapusi ‘e Sētane ‘a Sētane, tā ‘oku vahevahe ia, ‘o fetu‘usi mo ia: pea tu‘u fēfē hono pule‘anga?
40012027	Kae‘uma‘ā kapau ‘oku ou fai ‘eku kapusi tēvolo ‘ia Pelisipupe, pea ‘oku fai ‘ia hai ‘e ho‘omou kau tama? Ko ia ko kinautolu te mou halaia mei ai.
40012028	Ka ‘o kapau ko e Laumālie ‘o e ‘Otua ‘oku ou fai ai ‘eku kapusi tēvolo, pea tā kuo a‘u mai kiate kimoutolu ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua.
40012029	He lava fēfē ‘e ha taha ke hū ki he fale ‘o ha to‘a, ‘o vete ‘ene koloa? kae‘oua mu‘a ke ne ha‘i ‘a e to‘a, pea te ne toki lava ke vete hono fale.
40012030	Ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai kau mo au ‘oku ne tu‘u kiate au; pea ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai te ne kau mo au ‘i he fakatahataha ‘oku ne fakamovetevete.
40012031	Ko ia ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘Ilonga ha angahala, pe ha lau‘ikovi ‘o e ‘Otua, ka ‘e fakamolemole pē ki he kakai: ka ko e lau‘ikovi ‘o e Laumālie ‘e ‘ikai fakamolemole.
40012032	Pea ‘ilonga ‘a ia te ne ‘ai ha lea ‘oku kau kovi ki he Fanautama ‘a Tangata ‘e fakamolemole ia: ka ‘ilonga ‘a ia te ne ‘ai ha lea ‘oku kau kovi ki he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni, ‘e ‘ikai fakamolemolea ia, pe ‘i he maama ko eni, pe ‘i he maama kaha‘u.
40012033	Kehe pē ke mou lau ‘oku lelei ‘a e ‘akau mo lelei hono fua, pe te mou lau ‘oku tamaki ‘a e ‘akau mo tamaki hono fua: he ko hono fua ‘oku ‘ilonga ai ‘a e ‘akau.
40012034	‘a e hako‘i ngata fekai, te mou lava fēfē ke lea‘aki ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku lelei, ka ko e fa‘ahinga ‘oku kovi? He ko e talanoa ‘a e ngutu ‘oku mei he me‘a ‘i he loto ‘oku hulu atu.
40012035	Ko e tangata lelei ‘oku ne laku atu ‘a e me‘a ‘oku lelei mei he koloa lelei kuo fa‘o ai: pea ko e tangata kovi ‘oku ne laku atu ‘a e me‘a ‘oku kovi mei ke koloa kovi kuo fa‘o ai.
40012036	Pea ‘oku ou tala atu, Neongo ko ha fo‘i lea papūnoa ‘a e kakai, ka te nau fakamatala ki ai ‘i he ‘Aho Fakamaau:
40012037	he ko ho‘o ngaahi lea ‘e tautau ki ai ho‘o tonuhia, pea ko ho‘o ngaahi lea ‘e tautau ki ai ho‘o halaia.
40012038	Na‘e toki tali kiate ia ‘e he ni‘ihi ‘o e kau sikalaipe mo e kau Fālesi, ‘o pehē, Tangata‘eiki, ‘oku mau fiema‘u meiate ko e ha faka‘ilonga ke mau sio ki ai.
40012039	Ka ka tali ‘e ia ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Ko ha to‘utangata faikovi ia, mo ha to‘utangata alafia kae fe‘auaki, ‘oku tangi ki ha faka‘ilonga: ka ‘oku ‘ikai ha faka‘ilonga ‘e ‘ange ki ai, ngata pē ‘i he faka‘ilonga ‘o Siona ko e palōfita:
40012040	he ‘oku hangē ko e ‘i he kete ‘o e fu‘u ika ‘a Siona, ‘o ‘aho tolu mo pō tolu; pehē ‘e ‘i lolofonua ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata, ‘o ‘aho tolu mo pō tolu.
40012041	‘E hopo mo e to‘utangata ni ‘i he fakamaau ‘a e kakai Ninive, pea te nau fakahalaia ia: he na‘e fakatomala ‘e kinautolu ‘i he malanga ‘a Siona: kae vakai, ‘oku ‘i heni ha me‘a ‘oku lahi ‘ia Siona.
40012042	‘E tutu‘u ‘i he fakamaau ‘a e Kuini ‘o e Feitu‘u Tonga, pea mo e to‘utangata ni, pea te ne fakahalaia ia: he na‘a ne ha‘u mei he ngata‘anga ‘o māmani ke fanongo ki he poto ‘a Solomone: kae vakai ‘oku ‘i heni ha me‘a ‘oku lahi ‘ia Solomone.
40012043	‘Io, ka ‘alu atu ‘a e fa‘ahikehe mei he tangata, ‘oku ne ‘osiki ‘a e ngaahi potu mamate ‘ene ‘alu, ko e ha‘ao ha mālōlō‘anga, kae ‘ikai ‘ilo.
40012044	Toki pehē ‘e ia, Ka u foki mu‘a ki hoku fale, ‘a ia na‘a ku ‘alu mei ai. Pea ‘i he‘ene a‘u mai, tā ‘oku kei ‘atā, kuo tafi mo teuteu.
40012045	‘Alu leva ia ‘o ma‘u mai mo ha fa‘ahikehe ‘e fitu, ko ha fa‘ahinga ‘e taha ‘oku kovi ange ‘iate ia, pea nau hū mai, ‘o nofo ai. Pea hoko ai ki he tangata ko ia, ‘o lahi ‘ene kovi ki mui ‘i he‘ene kovi mu‘a. ‘E pehē pē foki ki he to‘utangata faikovi ni.
40012046	Pea lolotonga ‘ene kei lea ki he kakai, ‘iloange kuo tutu‘u mei tu‘a ‘ene fa‘ē mo hono ngaahi tokoua, ko ‘enau fie lea kiate ia.
40012047	Pea pehē ange ‘e ha taha kia Sīsū, ‘Ē, ko ho‘o fa‘ē mo ho ngaahi tokoua ‘oku tutu‘u mei tu‘a, ‘oku nau fie lea kiate koe.
40012048	Ka ka tali ‘e ia, ‘o ne pehē kiate ia na‘e lea mai, Ko hai ia ‘eku fa‘ē? Pea ko hai ‘a kinautolu ko hoku ngaahi tokoua?
40012049	Pea ne mafao atu hono nima ki he‘ene kau ako, ‘o ne pehē, Ko eni ia ‘eku fa‘ē mo hoku ngaahi tokoua!
40012050	He ka ‘ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku ne fai ‘a e finangalo ‘o ‘eku Tamai ‘oku ‘i Hēvani, ko ia ia ‘a hoku tokoua, mo hoku tuofefine, mo ‘eku fa‘ē.
40013001	‘I he ‘aho ko ia na‘e ‘alu atu ‘a Sīsū mei he fale, ‘o ne nofo ‘i matātahi.
40013002	Pea fakataha kiate ia ha ngaahi kakai tokolahi, ko ia na‘a ne heka ia ki ha vaka ‘o nofo ai, kae tu‘u ‘a e fu‘u fakataha ‘i he matā‘one‘one.
40013003	Pea na‘e lahi ‘ene lea kiate kinautolu ‘i he ngaahi fakatātā, ‘o pehē, Ko eni, na‘e ‘alu atu ha tangata tūtuu‘i ke tūtuu‘i:
40013004	pea ‘i he‘ene tūtuu‘i, na‘e ngangana ha tenga ni‘ihi ‘i he ve‘ehala, pea puna mai ‘a e fanga manupuna, ‘o nau kai ‘o ‘osi ia.
40013005	Pea ngangana ha tenga ni‘ihi ki he ngaahi potu maka, ‘a ia na‘e ‘ikai ke loko lahi ai ‘a e kelekele: pea tuaiekemo ‘ene ‘oho hake, koe‘uhi na‘e ‘ikai ke matolu ‘a e kelekele:
40013006	ka ‘i he ‘alu hake ‘a e la‘ā ne velehia; pea ko e me‘a ‘i he ‘ikai fai aka ne mate ia.
40013007	Pea ngangana ha tenga ni‘ihi ki he potu ‘akau talatala; pea tupu hake ‘a e ngaahi ‘akau talatala, ‘o kāsia ia.
40013008	Pea ngangana ha tenga ni‘ihi ki he kelekele kuo lelei, pea fua, ‘o taki fuo teau ‘a e ni‘ihi, fuo onongofulu ‘a e ni‘ihi, fuo tolungofulu ‘a e ni‘ihi.
40013009	Ko ia ‘oku telinga, ke ne ongo‘i.
40013010	Pea ‘unu‘unu atu ‘ene kau ako ‘o nau pehē kiate ia, Ko e hā ‘oku ke lea fakatātā ai kiate kinautolu?
40013011	Pea tali ‘e ia, ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Koe‘uhi kuo tuku kiate kimoutolu ke ‘ilo ‘a e ngaahi misiteli ‘o e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani, ka ko kinautolu ‘oku ‘ikai tuku ki ai.
40013012	He ‘ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku ma‘u ha me‘a, ‘e ‘ange ki ai mo ha me‘a, pea te ne hulu atu: ka ka ‘ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku ‘ikai ke ma‘u, na‘a mo e me‘a ‘oku ne ma‘u ‘e to‘o meiate ia.
40013013	Ko hono ‘uhinga ‘eni ‘o ‘eku lea fakatātā kiate kinautolu, koe‘uhi ‘oku nau mata, ka ‘oku ‘ikai te nau mamata, pea ‘oku nau telinga ka ‘oku ‘ikai te nau fanongo, ‘uma‘ā ha ongo‘i.
40013014	Pea ‘oku fakamo‘oni ‘iate kinautolu ‘a e palofisai ‘a ‘Aisea, ‘a ia ‘oku pehē, Te mou mātu‘aki fanongo, Kae ‘ikai ongo‘i; Pea te mou mātu‘aki sio, Kae ‘ikai ‘ilo‘i.
40013015	He kuo fangapesi ‘a e loto ‘o e kakai ni, Pea ongongata‘a honau telinga, Pea ko honau mata kuo nau tāpuni; Na‘a ‘iloange te nau sio ‘aki honau mata, Pea fanongo ‘aki honau telinga, Pea ‘ilo ‘aki honau loto, ‘o nau tafoki, Ka u fakamo‘ui ‘a kinautolu.
40013016	Ka ko ho‘omoutolu mata ‘oku monū‘ia, he ‘oku nau mamata, mo homou telinga, he ‘oku nau fanongo.
40013017	He ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘oku tokolahi ‘a e kau palōfita mo e kakai lotu, na‘a nau faka‘amu ke mamata ki he ngaahi me‘a ‘oku mou sio ki ai, ka na‘e ‘ikai te nau mātā; pea ke fanongo ki he ngaahi me‘a ‘oku mou fanongo ki ai, ka na‘e ‘ikai te nau fanongoa.
40013018	Pea mou fanongo mai kimoutolu ki ha fakatātā ‘o e tangata tūtuu‘i.
40013019	‘Ilonga ha taha ‘oku fanongo ki he folofola ‘o e Pule‘anga, kae ‘ikai tau, ‘oku ha‘u ‘a e Fili, ‘o fa‘ao ‘a e me‘a na‘e tō ki hono loto. Ko eni ia na‘e tūtuu‘i ‘i he ve‘ehala.
40013020	Pea ko ia na‘e tūtuu‘i ki he potu maka, ko e toko taha ia ‘oku fanongo ki he folofola, ‘o ne puke fiefia leva ki ai;
40013021	ka ‘oku ‘ikai hano aka ‘iate ia, ka ‘oku fakataimi pē: pea ‘oka hoko ha faingata‘a pe ha fakatanga koe‘uhi ko e folofola, pea tūkia leva.
40013022	Pea ko ia na‘e tūtuu‘i ‘i he potu ‘akau talatala, ko e toko taha ia ‘oku fanongo ki he folofola; pea ko e lotomo‘ua ki māmani, mo e fakahekeheke ‘a koloa, ‘oku kāsia ai ‘a e folofola, pea ne ta‘efua.
40013023	Pea ko ia na‘e tūtuu‘i ki he kelekele kuo lelei, ko e toko taha ia ‘oku fanongo ki he folofola, pea tau: pea ko eni ia ‘oku fua, ‘o fuo teau ‘a e taha, fuo onongofulu ‘a e taha, fuo tolungofulu ‘a e taha.
40013024	Ko e fakatātā ‘e taha na‘a ne ‘ai atu kiate kinautolu, ‘o pehē, Kuo hoko ‘o tatau ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani pea mo ha tangata na‘e tūtuu‘i tenga lelei ‘i he‘ene ngoue:
40013025	pea lolotonga na‘e mohe ‘a e kau tangata, na‘e ha‘u hono fili, ‘o ne toe tūtuu‘i ha tea ‘i he ngaahi vahavaha‘i uite, ‘o ne ‘alu.
40013026	Pea kuo tupu hono sino, pea a‘u ki he fua, pea toki hā ai mo e tea.
40013027	Pea ‘unu‘unu atu ‘a e kau pōpula ‘a e tangata‘eiki, ‘o nau pehē kiate ia, ‘Eiki, ‘ikai ko ha tenga lelei ia na‘a ke tūtuu‘i ‘i ho‘o ngoue? Pea mei fē ai ‘a e tea ni?
40013028	Pea tali ‘e ia kiate kinautolu, Ko ha fili pē kuo ne fai ‘eni. Pea nau pehē ki ai, pea ko ho loto ke mau ‘alu ‘o tufi ia?
40013029	Pea tali ‘e ia, ‘oua; na‘a ‘iloange ‘i ho‘omou tufi ‘a e tea, pea mou ta‘aki fakataha mo ia ‘a e uite foki.
40013030	Tuku pē ke na tupu fakataha ‘o a‘u ki he ututa‘u: pea ka hoko ‘a e ututa‘u te u lea ki he kau tu‘usi, ‘Ē, mou tānaki mu‘a ‘a e tea, pea no‘o ‘ū ke tutu: kae fetuku ‘a e uite ki he feleoko ‘o‘oku.
40013031	Ko e fakatātā ‘e taha na‘a ne ‘ai atu kiate kinautolu, ‘o pehē, ‘oku tatau ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani pea mo ha tenga‘i mūsita, ‘a ia na‘e to‘o ‘e ha tangata, ‘o tō ‘i he‘ene ngoue:
40013032	‘a ia ‘oku si‘i ange ‘i he tenga kotoa pē, kae hili ‘ene tupu, ko e lahi ia ‘i he fa‘ahinga mohuku kai, pea ‘oku hoko ko e ‘akau; ko ia ‘oku ha‘u ‘a e fanga manupuna ‘o e ‘atā, ‘o nofo ‘i hono ngaahi va‘a.
40013033	Ko e fakatātā ‘e taha na‘a ne lea‘aki kiate kinautolu, ‘o pehē, ‘oku tatau ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani mo ha lēvani ‘a ia na‘e to‘o ‘e ha fefine, ‘o tuku fufū ‘i ha tatanga mahoa‘a ‘e tolu, kae‘oua ke fai lēvani hono kotoa.
40013034	Ko e ngaahi me‘a ni kotoa na‘e lea‘aki ‘e Sīsū ki he kakai ‘i he fakatātā; pea na‘e ‘ikai te ne lea‘aki ha me‘a kiate kinautolu,
40013035	‘o ta‘eha fakatātā: koe‘uhi ke fakamo‘oni ai ‘a e me‘a na‘e folofola‘aki ‘i he palōfita, ‘o pehē, Te u tangaki hoku ngutu ‘i he ngaahi fakatātā, Te u ‘a‘au ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ne fufū mei he kamata‘anga.
40013036	Na‘a ne toki tukuange ‘a e kakai, ‘o ne hū ki fale; pea ‘unu‘unu kiate ia ‘e he‘ene kau ako, ‘o nau pehē, Fakamatala mai ‘a e fakatātā ‘o e ngaahi tea ‘i he ngoue.
40013037	Pea ne tali ‘o pehē, Ko ia ‘oku ne tō ‘a e tenga lelei ko e Fanautama ‘a Tangata ia;
40013038	ko e ngoue ko māmani; ko e tenga lelei ko e fānau ‘o e Pule‘anga; ko e ngaahi tea ko e fānau ‘a e Toko Taha Kovi;
40013039	ko e fili na‘a ne tō ia ko e Tēvolo; ko e ututa‘u ko e faka‘osi ‘o ha kuonga; ko e kau tu‘usi ko e kau ‘āngelo.
40013040	Pea hangē ‘oku tānaki ‘a e tea ‘o tutu ‘aki ‘a e afi; ‘e pehē foki ‘i he faka‘osi ‘o e kuonga.
40013041	‘E fekau atu ‘e he Fanautama ‘a Tangata ‘ene kau ‘āngelo, pea te nau tānaki mei hono pule‘anga ‘a e tūkia‘anga kotoa pē, mo kinautolu ‘oku maumau lao;
40013042	pea te nau laku kinautolu ki he fōnise afi. Ko e potu ia ‘e toki hoko ai ‘a e tangi mo e fengai‘itaki ‘o e nifo.
40013043	Kae toki ho‘ata mai ‘a e kau failelei ‘o hangē ko e la‘ā ‘i he pule‘anga ‘o ‘enau Tamai, Ko ia ‘oku telinga, ke ne ongo‘i.
40013044	‘Oku tatau ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani pea mo ha koloa na‘e tanu ‘i ha ngoue: ‘a ia na‘e ‘ilo ki ai ha tangata, ‘o ne fufū, pea ‘i he‘ene fiefia ai ‘oku ne ‘alu ‘o fakatau atu ‘ene me‘a kotoa, kae fakatau ‘aki ‘a e ngoue ko ia.
40013045	‘Oku tatau foki ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani pea mo ha fai fakatau; ‘a ia na‘a ne ‘alu ko e kumi mata‘i tofe lelei:
40013046	pea ‘i he‘ene ‘ilo ki ha taha, ko e mata‘itofe mahu‘inga lahi, na‘a ne ‘alu ‘o fakatau atu ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē na‘a ne ma‘u, ka ne fakatau ‘aki ‘a e mata‘itofe ko ia.
40013047	‘Oku tatau foki ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani mo ha ūloa ne tō ‘i tahi, ‘o ne ha‘o ‘a e ngaahi fa‘ahinga ika kotoa.
40013048	Pea ‘i he‘ene fonu na‘a nau toho hake ki he matā‘one‘one, ‘o nau nofo hifo ‘o fa‘o kato ‘a e ‘aonga, kae li‘aki ‘a e kovi.
40013049	‘E pehē ‘i he faka‘osi ‘o māmani: ‘e ‘alu atu ‘a e kau ‘āngelo, pea te nau vahe‘i mai ‘a e kakai kovi mei he lotolotonga ‘o e failelei,
40013050	pea te nau laku kinautolu ki he fōnise afi. Ko e potu ia ‘e toki hoko ai ‘a e tangi mo e fengai‘itaki ‘o e nifo.
40013051	Kuo mahino kiate kimoutolu ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ni kotoa? Pea nau tali, Ko ē.
40013052	Pea pehē ‘e ia kiate kinautolu, Ka ko ia; pea ‘ilonga ha akonaki kuo ako ‘i he Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani, ‘oku hangē ia ko ha tangata matāpule, ‘a ia ‘oku ne laku atu mei hono ‘ai‘anga koloa ‘a e me‘a fo‘ofo‘ou mo e me‘a mu‘a.
40013053	Pea ‘i he faka‘osi ‘e Sīsū ‘a e ngaahi fakatātā ni, na‘a ne hiki mei he potu ko ia;
40013054	pea ‘i he‘ene ha‘u ki hono fonua ‘o‘ona na‘a ne fai ‘ene ako kiate kinautolu ‘i honau falelotu. Pea nau to‘oa ai, ‘o nau pehē, ‘oku mei fē ki he siana ni ‘a ‘ene poto ni, mo ‘ene ngaahi ngāue fakaofo?
40013055	‘Ikai ko e foha ‘eni ‘o e motu‘a tufunga? ‘Ikai ‘oku hingoa ‘ene fa‘ē ko Mele? mo hono ngaahi tokoua, ‘ikai ko Sēmisi mo Siosifa mo Saimone mo Siutasi?
40013056	pea ko hono ngaahi tuofāfine, ‘ikai ‘oku nau felemofafo kotoa pē ‘iate kitautolu? Pea mei fē ai ki he siana ni ‘a e ngaahi fu‘u me‘a pehē?
40013057	Pea nau tūkia ‘iate ia. Ka ka tali ‘e Sīsū kiate kinautolu, ‘oku ‘ikai masiva faka‘apa‘apa ‘e ha palōfita, ka ‘i hono fonua totonu mo hono fāmili ‘o‘ona.
40013058	Pea na‘e ‘ikai te ne loko fai ai ha ngāue fakaofo, ko e me‘a ‘i he‘enau ta‘etui.
40014001	‘I he kuonga ko ia na‘e fanongo ‘e he tu‘i ko Hēlota ki he ongoongo ‘o Sīsū:
40014002	pea ne pehē ki he‘ene kau tamaio‘eiki, Ko Sione Papitaiso ‘eni: kuo tu‘u hake ia mei he mate, pea ko hono ‘uhinga ia ‘o e ngaahi fu‘u mafai ‘oku ngāue ‘iate ia.
40014003	He ne puke ‘e Hēlota ‘a Sione, ‘o ha‘i ia, ‘o ne ‘ave ‘o lī ki he pilīsone, koe‘uhi ko Helotiasi ko e uaifi ‘o hono tokoua.
40014004	He na‘e fa‘a lau ‘e Sione ki ai, ‘o pehē, ‘oku ‘ikai ngofua kiate koe ke ma‘u ia.
40014005	Pea neongo na‘a ne loto ke tāmate‘i ia, ka na‘a ne manavahē ki he kakai: he na‘a nau lau ko e palōfita ia.
40014006	Pea ‘i he hoko ‘a e ‘aho fakamanatu ‘o Hēlota, na‘e me‘e ‘a e ta‘ahine ‘a Helotiasi ‘i he ha‘oha‘onga, ‘o mālie‘ia ai ‘a Hēlota.
40014007	Ko ia, na‘a ne fuakava ai mo lea tuki, te ne ‘ange kiate ia ‘a e me‘a te ne kole ki ai, neongo pe ko e hā.
40014008	Pea ‘i hono fakaloto‘i ‘e he‘ene fa‘ē, na‘a ne pehē, ‘Omi kiate au heni ‘i ha peleti ‘a e ‘ulu ‘o Sione Papitaiso.
40014009	Pea neongo na‘e mamahi ‘a e Tu‘i, ka na‘a ne tu‘utu‘uni pē ke ‘ange, telia ‘ene ngaahi lea tuki, mo e kakai na‘e keinanga mo ia.
40014010	Pea ne fekau atu ke tu‘usi ‘a e ‘ulu ‘o Sione ‘i he pilīsone.
40014011	Pea na‘e ‘omi hono ‘ulu ‘i ha peleti, ‘o ‘ange ki he ki‘i fefine: pea ne ‘ave ia ki he‘ene fa‘ē.
40014012	Pea ‘alu atu ‘ene kau ako, ‘o ‘ave ‘a e ‘anga‘anga ‘o tanu: pea nau toki ‘alu ‘o tala kia Sīsū.
40014013	Pea ‘i he fanongo ki ai ‘a Sīsū na‘a ne ‘alu mei ai ‘i ha vaka ki ha potu lala, ke fakaekinautolu: ka ka fanongo pē ki ai ‘e he ngaahi kakai, ‘o nau hala ‘uta pē mo tulimui ki ai mei he ngaahi kolo.
40014014	Pea ‘i he‘ene hifo ki ‘uta, na‘a ne ‘ilo ai ha fu‘u kakai lahi; pea na‘e langa hono fatu ‘i he ‘ofa kiate kinautolu, pea ne fakamo‘ui ‘enau kau mahaki.
40014015	Pea ‘i he‘ene efiafi hifo, na‘e ‘unu‘unu kiate ia ‘e he‘ene kau ako, ‘o nau pehē, Ko e potu lala ‘eni, pea kuo tei ‘osi ‘a e ‘aho: ko ia ke ke tukuange ‘a e kakai ke nau ‘alu ki he ngaahi vilisi, ‘o fakatau ha‘anau me‘a tokoni.
40014016	Ka ka pehē ‘e Sīsū kiate kinautolu, Koe‘uma‘ā ‘enau ‘alu; ‘ange ‘e kimoutolu ha‘anau me‘akai.
40014017	Pea nau tali ki ai, ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘atau me‘a ‘i heni, ko e fo‘i mā ‘e nima pē mo e mata‘i ika ‘e ua.
40014018	Pea ne pehē, ‘omi ia ki heni kiate au.
40014019	Pea ne tu‘utu‘uni ke tākoto ‘a e kakai ‘i he musie; ‘o ne to‘o ‘a e fo‘i mā ‘e nima mo e ongo ika, ‘o ne tāngaki hake ki he langi, ‘o ne fai ha tāpuaki; pea ne toki pakipaki ‘a e ngaahi fo‘i mā, ‘o ‘ange ki he‘ene kau ako, pea ‘ange ‘e he kau ako ki he kakai.
40014020	Pea nau kai kotoa pē ‘o mākona: pea nau tānaki ‘a e ngaahi mapakipaki‘i mā na‘e toe, pea pito ai ‘a e kato fakahunga ‘e Hongofulumāua.
40014021	Pea ko kinautolu na‘e tokoni, na‘e toko nima afe nai ‘a e tangata, ‘o ta‘elau ai ‘a e fefine mo e tamaiki iiki.
40014022	Pea ne hanga leva ‘e Sīsū, ‘o fekau fakamālohi ki he kau ako ke fei mo heka ki he vaka, ‘o mu‘omu‘a ‘iate ia ki he kauvai, lolotonga ‘ene tukuange ‘e ia ‘a e kakai.
40014023	Pea hili ‘ene tukuange ‘a e kakai, na‘a ne ‘alu hake ki he mo‘unga fakaeia pē ke lotu: pea ‘i he‘ene efiafi po‘uli na‘a ne ‘i ai toko taha.
40014024	Pea ko e vaka kuo a‘u ki he vaha‘amālie, pea faingata‘a‘ia ‘i he peau, he na‘e tokai ‘a e matangi.
40014025	Pea ‘i hono fā ‘o e uasi ‘i he pō ko ia, na‘e ‘alu atu ‘a Sīsū kiate kinautolu ‘oku ne hā‘ele ‘i he tahi.
40014026	Pea ‘i he sio kiate ia ‘e he kau ako, ‘oku ne hā‘ele ‘i he fukahi tahi, na‘a nau puputu‘u, ‘o nau pehē, Ko e fa‘ahikehe! Pea nau fekekee‘i ko ‘enau manavahē.
40014027	Pea lea leva ‘e Sīsū kiate kinautolu, ‘o pehē, Fiemālie pē: ko au pē: ‘oua ‘e manavahē.
40014028	Pea tali ki ai ‘e Pita ‘o ne pehē, ‘Eiki, kapau ko koe, fekau ke u ‘alu atu ‘i he fukahi vai.
40014029	Pea ne pehē, Ha‘u pē. Pea hifo ‘a Pita mei he vaka, ‘o ne hā‘ele ‘i he fukahi vai ke ‘alu kia Sīsū.
40014030	Ka ‘i he‘ene tokanga ki he mālohi ‘o e matangi na‘a ne ilifia ai; pea ‘i he‘ene kamata fakatoutoumoloto hifo na‘a ne kalanga, ‘Eiki, fakamo‘ui au.
40014031	Pea mafao atu leva ‘e Sīsū hono nima, ‘o puke ia ‘o ne pehē ki ai, ‘a e tui vaivai, ko e hā na‘a ke tāla‘a ai?
40014032	Pea ‘i he‘ena heka ki he vaka na‘e tālolo ‘a e matangi.
40014033	Pea ko kinautolu na‘e ‘i he vaka na‘a nau tū‘ulutui kiate ia, ‘o nau pehē, Tā ko e ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otua koe.
40014034	Pea kuo nau ‘i kauvai, na‘a nau a‘u ki he fonua ko Kenesaleti.
40014035	Pea ‘i he vakai ‘e he kau tangata ‘o e potu ko Sīsū ia, na‘a nau fekau atu ki he feitu‘u kotoa ko ia: pea na‘a nau ‘omi kiate ia ‘a kinautolu na‘e puke,
40014036	‘o nau kole kiate ia ke tuku ke nau ki‘i ala pē ki he pao ‘o hono kofu: pea ko kinautolu na‘e ala ki ai na‘a nau mo‘ui ‘aupito.
40015001	PEA na‘e toki ha‘u kia Sīsū mei Selusalema ha kau Fālesi mo ha kau sikalaipe, ‘o nau pehē,
40015002	Ko e hā ‘oku laka kehe ai ‘a ho‘o kau ako pea mo e lau ‘a e mātu‘a? he ‘oku ‘ikai te nau fanofano honau nima ‘i he‘enau nofo ke kai.
40015003	Ka ka tali ‘e ia, ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Ko e hā ‘oku mou laka kehe ai foki kimoutolu pea mo e lao ‘a e ‘Otua, koe‘uhi ko e lau fakaeono‘aho ‘amoutolu?
40015004	He ko e tu‘utu‘uni ‘a e ‘Otua na‘e pehē, Faka‘apa‘apa ki ho‘o tamai mo ho‘o fa‘ē: mo ‘eni, Ko ia te ne lea kovi ki he‘ene tamai, pe ko ‘ene fa‘ē; ke ne mate tāmate‘i.
40015005	Ka ‘oku mou pehē, ‘Ilonga ‘a ia te ne pehē ki he‘ene tamai, pe ko ‘ene fa‘ē ‘Ā, kuo tuku ki he ngāue ‘a e ‘Eiki ‘a e me‘a na‘a ku mei ‘aonga ai kiate koe:
40015006	pea ‘e ‘ikai leva te ne fai ‘ene faka‘apa‘apa ki he‘ene tamai, pe ko ‘ene fa‘ē: pea tā kuo mou fakata‘e‘aonga‘i ‘a e lao ‘a e ‘Otua ‘aki ho‘omou lau fakaeono‘aho.
40015007	‘a e kau mālualoi! ‘E hala ā ‘a e palofisai ‘a ‘Aisea ‘iate kimoutolu, ‘o pehē,
40015008	Ko e kakai ni ‘oku nau faka‘apa‘apa kiate au ‘aki honau loungutu, ka ko honau loto ‘oku fakamama‘o.
40015009	Ka ko e kula noa ‘enau lotu mai; ‘oku nau ako ‘aki ha ngaahi tokāteline ‘a ia ko e ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni pē ‘a e tangata.
40015010	Pea ne ui ange ‘a e kakai, ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Fanongo mai ka mou ‘ilo.
40015011	‘Oku ‘ikai ko e me‘a ‘oku hū ki he ngutu ‘oku ‘uli ai ha tangata, ka ko ia ‘oku hū mei he ngutu, ko eni ia ‘oku ‘uli ai ‘a e tangata.
40015012	Pea na‘e toki ‘unu‘unu atu ‘e he kau ako, ‘o nau pehē ki ai, ‘oku ke mea‘i na‘e tūkia ai ‘a e kau Fālesi, ‘i he‘enau fanongo ki he lea na?
40015013	Ka ka tali ‘e ia ‘o pehē, ‘Ilonga ha tō ‘akau, ‘a ia na‘e ‘ikai ko e fai ‘e he‘eku Tamai ‘oku ‘i he langi, ‘e ta‘aki fu‘u ia.
40015014	Tuku ai pe ā ‘a kinautolu: ko e koto takimu‘a kui kinautolu, pea ka taki ‘e he kui ‘a e kui, te na fakatou tō ki ha luo.
40015015	Pea tali ‘e Pita ‘o lea ki ai, Fakamatala mai ‘a e fakatātā ni.
40015016	Pea ne pehē, ‘oku kei ta‘e‘ilo mo kimoutolu foki?
40015017	Kuo te‘eki koā ke mahino atu, ka ‘ilonga ha me‘a ‘oku hū ki he ngutu, ‘oku mole ia ki he kete, pea toki laku atu ki tua‘ā?
40015018	Ka ko e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku hū mei he ngutu ‘oku mei he loto; pea ko ‘ena pē me‘a ‘oku ‘uli ai ‘a e tangata.
40015019	He ‘oku mei he loto ‘a e ngaahi fakakaukau pango, ‘a e ngaahi fakapō, ‘a e ngaahi faikovi ‘a alafia, ‘a e ngaahi fe‘auaki. ‘A e ngaahi kaiha‘a, ‘a e ngaahi tukuaki, ‘a e ngaahi laukovi ki he ‘Otua.
40015020	Ko eni ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ‘uli ai ha tangata: ka ko e kai ta‘efanofano ‘oku ‘ikai ‘uli ai ‘a e tangata.
40015021	Pea ‘alu ‘e Sīsū mei he feitu‘u ko ia, ‘o ne mole ki he ngaahi potu ‘o Taia mo Saitoni.
40015022	Pea ‘iloange, ko ha fefine Kēnani na‘e nofo ‘i he tafa‘ifonua ko ia, na‘a ne ‘alu atu ‘o kalanga, ‘o pehē, ‘E ‘Eiki, ko e Hako ‘o Tēvita, ke ke ‘alo‘ofa mai: ko si‘eku ta‘ahine ko e me‘a kovi ange hono ‘āvea.
40015023	Ka na‘e ‘ikai ha‘ane ki‘i lea ki ai. Pea ‘unu‘unu atu ‘ene kau ako, ‘o nau kole kia Sīsū, ‘o pehē, Faka‘ata‘atā ange ‘a e fefine, he ‘oku ne tangi toupili mai.
40015024	Ka ka tali ‘e ia ‘o ne pehē, Kuo ‘ikai fekau mai au, ka ki he fanga sipi kuo mole ‘i he hako ‘o ‘Isileli.
40015025	Pea ha‘u ‘a e fefine, ‘o tū‘ulutui kiate ia, ‘o ne pehē, ‘Eiki, tokoni mai.
40015026	Ka ka tali ‘e ia, ‘o ne pehē, ‘oku ‘ikai ngofua ke to‘o ‘a e mā ‘a e fānau, ‘o lī ki he fanga kulī.
40015027	Pea pehē ‘e he fefine, Ka na‘e fai, ‘Eiki; he ‘oku kai ‘a e fanga kulī foki he ngaahi momo ‘oku ngangana mei he tēpile ‘a honau ‘eiki.
40015028	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū ‘o ne pehē kiate ia, Fefine, tā ‘oku lahi ho‘o tui; ‘e fai ma‘au ‘a e me‘a ‘oku ke loto ki ai. Pea na‘e mo‘ui ‘ene ta‘ahine mei he feitu‘ula‘ā ko ia.
40015029	Pea kuo hiki ‘a Sīsū mei ai, na‘a ne ‘alu ‘o ofi ki he Tahi ‘o Kāleli; pea ne fai hake ki he mo‘unga, ‘o nofo hifo ai.
40015030	Pea ‘alu atu kiate ia ha ngaahi fu‘u kakai, ‘o nau omi mo kinautolu ha ni‘ihi na‘e heke, mo e ni‘ihi na‘e kui, mo e ni‘ihi na‘e noa, mo e ni‘ihi na‘e pai, pea mo ha tokolahi na‘e puke kehe: ‘o nau laku kinautolu ki he va‘e ‘o Sīsū, pea ne fakamo‘ui kinautolu.
40015031	Pea ofo ai ‘a e kakai, he‘enau sio ki he noa ‘oku lea, mo e pai ‘oku mo‘ui, mo e heke ‘oku ‘eve‘eva, mo e kui ‘oku ‘ā: pea nau fakamālō‘ia ‘a e ‘Otua ‘o ‘Isileli.
40015032	Pea ui ange ‘e Sīsū ‘ene kau ako, ‘o ne pehē, ‘oku langa hoku fatu ‘i he ‘ofa ki he kakai ni, he ko e ‘aho tolu mālō ‘eni mo ‘enau nofo mai, pea ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘anau me‘a tokoni: pea ‘oku ‘ikai te u loto ke tukuange kinautolu fiekaia, na‘a ‘iloange te nau pōngingia ‘i he hala.
40015033	Pea pehē kiate ia ‘e he kau ako, Te tau ma‘u mei fē ‘i he lala ha mā pehē, ke totofu ai ha fu‘u kakai ‘oku pehē ni fau?
40015034	Pea pehē ange ‘e Sīsū, ‘oku fiha ho‘omou fo‘i mā? Pea nau tali, ‘oku fitu: mo e ngaahi mata‘i ika.
40015035	Pea ne fekau ki he kakai ke nau tākoto atu ‘i he funga kelekele.
40015036	Pea na‘a ne to‘o ‘a e fo‘i mā ‘e fitu, mo e ngaahi ika; pea ne fakafeta‘i; ‘o ne toki pakipaki, ‘o toutou ‘ange ki he kau ako, pea ‘ange ‘e he kau ako ki he kakai.
40015037	Pea nau kai kotoa pē, ‘o mākona; pea nau tānaki ‘a e ngaahi mapakipaki‘i mā na‘e toe, pea pito ai ‘a e kato ‘e fitu.
40015038	Pea ko kinautolu na‘e tokoni na‘e toko fā afe ‘a e tangata, ‘o ta‘elau ai ‘a e fefine mo e tamaiki iiki.
40015039	Pea na‘a ne tukuange ‘a e kakai, ‘o ne heka ki he vaka, ‘o ne a‘u ki he ngaahi feitu‘u ‘o Makatani.
40016001	PEA ‘alu atu kiate ia ‘a e kau Fālesi mo e kau Sātusi, ko hono ‘ahi‘ahi‘i, ‘o nau tala ke ne faka‘ali‘ali kiate kinautolu ha faka‘ilonga mei langi.
40016002	Ka ka tali ‘e ia ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Tokaange ha efiafi ‘oku mou pehē, ‘E ‘afua, he ‘oku kulokula ‘a e langi.
40016003	Pea tokaange ha pongipongi ‘oku mou pehē, ‘E ‘alotāmaki ‘a e ‘aho ni, he ‘oku kulokula kae fetautau‘i ‘a e langi. ‘Oku mou vavanga koā ki he mata ‘o e langi; ka ko e ngaahi faka‘ilonga kuonga ‘oku ‘ikai te mou lava, ‘ō?
40016004	Ko ha to‘utangata faikovi ia, ko ha to‘utangata alafia kae fe‘auaki, ‘oku tangi ki ha faka‘ilonga: ka ‘oku ‘ikai ha faka‘ilonga ‘e ‘ange ki ai, ngata pē ‘i he faka‘ilonga ‘o Siona. Pea ne mahu‘i meiate kinautolu ‘o ‘alu.
40016005	Pea ‘i he a‘u ‘a e kau ako ki he kauvai ne ngalo ‘iate kinautolu ke ‘ave ha mā.
40016006	Pea fai ‘e Sīsū ‘ene lea kiate kinautolu, ‘o pehē, Mou ‘ā ‘o vakai, telia ‘a e lēvani ‘a e kau Fālesi mo e kau Sātusi.
40016007	Pea nau alea ai ‘iate kinautolu ‘o pehē, Ko hono ‘uhinga ‘apē, ko e ‘ikai te tau ‘omi ha mā?
40016008	Pea ‘i he ‘ilo ‘e Sīsū, na‘a ne pehē, ‘A e kau tui vaivai, ko e hā ‘oku mou alea ai koe‘uhi na‘e ‘ikai te mou ‘omi ha mā?
40016009	Kuo te‘eki koā ke ‘uhinga kiate kimoutolu, pe te mou manatu‘i ‘a e fo‘i mā ‘e nima ‘a e toko nima afe, mo e fiha‘i kato fakahunga na‘a mou ‘omi?
40016010	Kae‘uma‘ā ‘a e fo‘i mā ‘e fitu ‘a e toko fā afe, mo e fiha‘i kato na‘a mou ‘omi?
40016011	‘Oku fēfē nai ‘ene ta‘ehā kiate kimoutolu na‘e ‘ikai ko ‘eku lea atu ki ha mā, ka ke mou vakai telia ‘a e lēvani ‘a e kau Fālesi mo e Sātusi?
40016012	Na‘e toki mahino kiate kinautolu, tā ‘oku ‘ikai ko ‘ene pehē ke nau vakai telia ‘a e lēvani mā, ka telia ‘a e akonaki ‘a e kau Fālesi mo e Sātusi.
40016013	Pea kuo a‘u ‘a Sīsū ki he feitu‘u ‘o Sesalia Filipai, na‘a ne fehu‘i ki he‘ene kau ako ‘o pehē, Ko hai nai ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata ‘i he lau ‘a e kakai?
40016014	Pea nau pehē, Ko e lau ‘a e ni‘ihi, ko Sione Papitaiso; ka ko e ni‘ihi, ko ‘Ilaisiā; pea ko e ni‘ihi, ko Selemaia, pe ha taha ‘o e kau palōfita.
40016015	Pea pehē ange ‘e ia, Ka ko hai au ‘i he lau ‘amoutolu?
40016016	Pea tali ‘e Saimone Pita, ‘o ne pehē, Ko e MĪSAIA koe, ko e ‘ALO ‘O E ‘OTUA MO‘UI.
40016017	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū, ‘o ne pehē kiate ia, Ha monū‘ia ā ka ko koe, ‘e Saimone Pāsiona: he ‘oku ‘ikai ko e kakano mo toto na‘e fukefuke kiate koe, ka ko ‘eku Tamai ‘oku ‘i Hēvani.
40016018	Ko eni ‘eku lea foki kiate koe, Ko Pita (pe Maka) koe; pea ‘i he funga maka ni te u langa ai hoku Siasi; pea ‘e ‘ikai mālohi ki ai ‘a e ngaahi matapā ‘o Hētesi.
40016019	Te u ‘atu kiate koe ‘a e ngaahi kī ‘o e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani: pea ‘ilonga ha me‘a te ke fakangofua ‘i māmani kuo fakangofua ‘i Hēvani.
40016020	Na‘a ne toki tapou ki he kau ako, ke ‘oua te nau fakahā ki ha taha, ko ia ia ‘a e Mīsaia.
40016021	Na‘e kamata mei he taimi ko ia ‘a e fakahā ‘e Sīsū ki he‘ene kau ako, ‘a e pau ke ne ‘alu atu ki Selusalema, pea ke lahi hono fakamamahi‘i ‘e he kau mātu‘a mo e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki mo e kau sikalaipe, pea ke tāmate‘i, pea ke fokotu‘u hake ‘i hono ‘aho tolu.
40016022	Pea ‘ave ia ‘e Pita, ‘o ne hanga ‘o valoki ki ai, ‘o pehē, Molekemama‘o, ‘Eiki. ‘E ‘ikai ‘aupito hoko ha me‘a pehē kiate koe.
40016023	Ka ka tafuli ia ‘o lea kia Pita: Tu‘u ki mui, Sētane: ko hoku tūkia‘anga koe: he ‘oku ‘ikai ko e ngaahi me‘a faka-e-‘Otua ‘oku sio ki ai ho loto, ka ko e ngaahi me‘a fakaetangata.
40016024	Pea toki lea ‘e Sīsū ki he‘ene kau ako, ‘o pehē, Ka ai ha taha ‘oku ne fie muimui mai, ke ne mātu‘aki hangē ha mateaki, pea ke ne fua hono kolosi, pea ke ne hoko ko hoku lahi.
