40016025	He ko ia te ne fai ke fakahaofi ‘ene mo‘ui, ko ‘ene tuku ia ke mole; pea ko ia te ne tuku ‘ene mo‘ui ke mole koe‘uhi ko au, ko ‘ene kalofaki ia.
40016026	He ka ne faifai pea ma‘u ‘e ha tangata ‘a māmani kātoa ‘i he‘ene ngāue, kae mole ai ‘ene mo‘ui, ko e hā tū ha me‘a kuo ne lava? pea ko e hā ha me‘a ‘e ‘atu ‘e he tangata ke fakatau ‘aki mai ‘ene mo‘ui?
40016027	He ‘oku nānāfaki hā‘ele mai ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata, kuo ne ‘ai ‘a e nāunau ‘o ‘ene ‘Eiki, pea ha‘ofia ia ‘e he‘ene kau ‘āngelo: pea te ne toki ‘ange ki he tangata takitaha ‘o fakatatau ki he‘ene ngaahi ngāue.
40016028	Ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘oku ai ha ni‘ihi ‘o kinautolu ‘oku tutu‘u heni, ‘a ia ‘e ‘ikai te nau momo‘i lave ki he mate, kae‘oua ke nau mamata ki he Fanautama ‘a Tangata ‘oku ne hā‘ele fakapule‘anga mai.
40017001	PEA hili ‘a e ‘aho ‘e ono, na‘e ‘ave ‘e Sīsū ‘a Pita, mo Sēmisi, pea mo Sione ko e tehina ‘o Sēmisi, pea ne ‘ohake kinautolu ki ha mo‘unga mā‘olunga fakaekinautolu.
40017002	Pea na‘e fakakehe hono anga ‘i honau ‘ao, pea na‘e malama hono fōtunga ‘o hangē ko e la‘ā, pea ko hono ngaahi kofu na‘e hinaekiaki mai ‘o hangē ko e maama.
40017003	Pea tā na‘e hā kiate kinautolu ‘a Mōsese mo ‘Ilaisiā ‘oku nau talanoa mo ia.
40017004	Pea tali ‘e Pita ‘o ne pehē kia Sīsū, ‘Eiki, ‘oku sai ‘etau ‘i heni: kapau ‘oku ke loto ki ai, pea u ngaohi ‘i heni ha fakahekeheke ‘e tolu; ‘o taha mo‘ou, pea taha mo‘o Mōsese, pea taha mo‘o ‘Ilaisiā.
40017005	Pea lolotonga ‘ene kei lea, fakafokifā na‘e fakapūlou kinaua ‘e ha ‘ao maama: pea ‘iloange ko e le‘o mei he ‘ao na‘e folofola mai, ko hoku ‘Alo Pele ‘ena, ‘a ia kuo u hōifua ai; mou fakaongo kiate ia.
40017006	Pea ‘i he fanongo ki ai ‘a e kau ako, na‘a nau mape‘e ki honau mata, ‘o nau manavahē ‘aupito.
40017007	Pea ‘unu‘unu mai ‘a Sīsū ‘o ne ala kiate kinautolu, mo ne pehē, Tu‘u, pea ‘oua ‘e manavahē.
40017008	Pea ‘i he‘enau hanga hake ke vakai, na‘e ‘ikai te nau sio ki ha taha, Ka ko Sīsū pē.
40017009	Pea ‘i he‘enau ō hifo mei he mo‘unga, na‘e fonosi kinautolu ‘e Sīsū, ‘o pehē, ‘oua na‘a mou tala ki ha taha ‘a e me‘a kuo hā, kae‘oua ke tu‘u mei he mate ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata.
40017010	Pea fehu‘i kiate ia ‘e he‘ene kau ako, ‘o pehē, Pea ko e hā ai ‘oku lau ‘e he kau sikalaipe, kuo pau ke motu‘a ha‘u ‘a ‘Ilaisiā?
40017011	Pea ne tali ‘o pehē, Mo‘oni pē ‘a e pehē, ‘Oku ha‘u ‘a ‘Ilaisiā, pea te ne toe fokotu‘u ‘a e ngaahi me‘a.
40017012	Ka ‘oku ou tala atu, kuo ha‘u ‘a ‘Ilaisiā, pea na‘e ‘ikai te nau ‘ilo ko ia, ka na‘a nau fai ho‘onautolu loto kiate ia. Pehē foki ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata, ‘oku nānāfaki hono fakamamahi‘i ‘iate kinautolu.
40017013	Toki e‘a ki he kau ako, tā ko Sione Papitaiso ‘oku kau ki ai ‘ene lea.
40017014	Pea ‘i he‘enau ha‘u ki he kakai, na‘e ‘unu‘unu kiate ia ha tangata, ‘o ne tō hifo ‘o puke hono tui,
40017015	‘o ne pehē, ‘Eiki, ‘alo‘ofa ki hoku ‘uhiki: he ‘oku puke fakataimi, pea kovi ‘ene puke; he kuo tu‘o lahi ‘ene tō ki he afi, pea tu‘o lahi ‘ene tō ki he vai.
40017016	Pea na‘a ku ‘omi ia ki ho‘o kau ako, ka na‘e ‘ikai te nau lava ke fakamo‘ui ia.
40017017	Ka ka tali ‘e Sīsū ‘o ne pehē, ‘A e fa‘ahinga ta‘etui mo angakehe, ‘e ngata ‘afē ‘eku ‘iate kimoutolu? ‘E ngata ‘afē ‘eku kātaki‘i kimoutolu? ‘omi ia ki heni kiate au.
40017018	Pea na‘e lolomi ‘e Sīsū ‘a e tēvolo, pea na‘a ne mahu‘i mei he tama, ‘o ne mo‘ui mei he feitu‘ula‘ā ko ia.
40017019	Pea toki ha‘u ‘a e kau ako kia Sīsū ‘i he‘enau fakaekinautolu, ‘o nau pehē, Koe‘uhi ko e hā nai, ne ‘ikai lava ai ‘e kimautolu ke kapusi ia?
40017020	Pea ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Koe‘uhi pē ko ho‘omou tui vaivai: he ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu ka, ne ai ha‘amou tui, ‘o tatau mo ha fo‘i tenga‘i mūsita hono lahi, te mou pehē ki he mo‘unga ni, Hiki mei heni ki hena; pea ‘e hiki; pea ‘oku ‘ikai ha me‘a ‘e faingata‘a kiate kimoutolu.
40017021	Neongo ia, ko e fa‘ahinga ni ‘oku ‘ikai lava ke mahu‘i, ka ‘i he lotu pē mo e ‘aukai.
40017022	Pea lolotonga ‘enau fakataha ‘i Kāleli, na‘e lea ‘a Sīsū kiate kinautolu, ‘o pehē, ‘oku nānāfaki ke tukuange ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata ki he nima ‘o e kakai:
40017023	pea te nau tāmate‘i ia, pea ‘i hono ‘aho tolu ‘e toe fokotu‘u ia. Pea na‘a nau mamahi ‘aupito.
40017024	Pea ‘i he‘enau a‘u ki Kāpaneume, pea ko kinautolu na‘e tānaki ‘a e tukuhau fakasiasi na‘a nau ‘alu atu kia Pita, ‘o nau pehē, ‘oku fai ‘apē ‘e ho‘omou tangata‘eiki ‘a e tukuhau fakasiasi? Pea pehē ‘e ia, Ko ē.
40017025	Ka ‘i he‘ene hū ki fale na‘e lea leva ki ai ‘e Sīsū, ‘o pehē, Saimone, ko e hā ho‘o poa? Ko e ngaahi tu‘i ‘o māmani ‘oku nau tānaki tute mo e tukuhau meia hai? mei he fale‘alo, pe mei he kakai kehe?
40017026	Pea tali ‘e ia, Mei he kakai kehe pē. Pea lea ‘a Sīsū ki ai, ‘Āua, pea tā ‘oku ‘ata‘atā ‘a e fale‘alo.
40017027	Ka koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a tau fakatūkia kinautolu, ‘alu koe ki tahi, ‘o lafo ha māta‘u; pea koe ‘uluaki ika ‘e kai, ke ke to‘o ‘o fa‘ai hono ngutu, pea te ke ‘ilo ai ha fo‘i sikeli: to‘o ia ‘o ‘ange kiate kinautolu ma‘aku mo koe.
40018001	KO E feitu‘ula‘ā ko ia na‘e ‘unu‘unu atu ‘a e kau ako kia Sīsū, mo nau pehē, pea ko hai nai ‘e lahi ‘i he Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani?
40018002	Pea ne ui ange ha tamasi‘i, ‘o ne tuku ia ‘i honau lotolotonga,
40018003	‘O ne pehē, Ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Kapau ‘e ‘ikai te mou liliu, ‘o hoko ‘o hangē ko e tamaiki, ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito te mou hū ki he Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani.
40018004	Ko ia, ‘ilonga ‘a ia te ne fakavaivai‘i ia ‘o hangē ko e tamasi‘i ko eni, ko ia ia ‘oku lahi ‘i he Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani.
40018005	Pea ka ai ha taha ‘oku ne tali ha tamasi‘i peheni ‘e toko taha, koe‘uhi ko hoku hingoa, ‘oku ne tali au.
40018006	Pea ka ai ha tangata te ne fakatūkia ha taha ‘i si‘i tamaiki ni ‘oku tui kiate au, ‘e oli ange ki he tangata ko ia ‘oka ne tautau ha fu‘u maka fale ‘i hono kia, ‘o lōmaki‘i ‘i he moana hauhau.
40018007	‘Oiauē ‘a māmani koe‘uhi ko e ngaahi tūkia‘anga! he kuo pau ke hoko ‘a e ngaahi tūkia‘anga; ka ‘oiauē ‘a e tangata ko ia ‘a ia ‘oku hoko ai ‘a e tūkia‘anga!
40018008	Pea ka ‘oku fakatūkia koe ‘e ho nima, pe ko ho va‘e, tu‘usi, pea li‘aki atu: ‘oku ngutuhua ange ke ke a‘u ki he mo‘ui nima taha pe ve‘e taha, ‘i he lī koe nima ua pe ve‘e ua ki he afi ta‘engata.
40018009	Pea ka ‘oku fakatūkia koe ‘e ho mata, kape‘i ia, ‘o li‘aki atu: ‘oku ngutuhua ange ha‘o a‘u mata taha ki he mo‘ui, ‘I ho lī mata ua ki he afi ‘o Heli.
40018010	Vakai ke ‘oua te mou fakasīkaka‘i ha taha ‘i he fa‘ahinga iiki ni; he ‘oku ou tala atu, ko honau kau ‘āngelo ‘i he langi ‘oku nau fakafe‘ao ma‘u pē ki he‘eku Tamai ‘oku ‘i Hēvani.
40018011	He kuo ha‘u ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata ke fakamo‘ui ‘a ia na‘e mole.
40018012	Ko e hā ho‘omou poa? Ka ne ma‘u ‘e ha tangata ha sipi ‘e teau, pea hē hanau taha, ‘ikai te ne tuku ‘a e toko hivangofulu mā hiva ‘i he mo‘unga, ka ka ‘alu ke kumi ‘a ia kuo hē?
40018013	Pea kapau ‘e faifai pea ne ‘ilo ia, ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘oku ‘ange‘ange ‘ene fiefia ‘i he hivangofulu mā hiva na‘e ‘ikai hē ‘i he fo‘i sipi ko ia.
40018014	Pehē, ‘oku ‘ikai ko e tu‘utu‘uni ‘a ho‘omou Tamai ‘oku ‘i Hēvani ke mole ha toko taha ‘i he fanga ki‘i sipi ni.
40018015	Pea kapau ‘e fai hala ‘e ho tokoua, mole pē koe ‘o fakamahino kiate ia, fakaekimoua pē: kapau te ne tokanga kiate koe, kuo ke ma‘u mai ho tokoua.
40018016	Ka ‘oka ‘ikai te ne tokanga, ke ke toe ‘alu mo koe ha toko taha, pe ha toko ua, koe‘uhi ke fakapapau ‘a e ngaahi me‘a mei he fakamo‘oni ‘a ha toko ua, pe toko tolu.
40018017	Pea kapau te ne ta‘etoka‘i kinautolu, tala ki he Fakataha: pea kapau te ne ta‘etoka‘i mo e Fakataha foki, pea ke ne tatau kiate koe mo ha Senitaile, pe ko ha pōpilikane.
40018018	Ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘Ilonga ha me‘a te mou tapui ‘i māmani kuo tapui ‘i langi: pea ‘ilonga ha me‘a te mou fakangofua ‘i māmani kuo fakangofua ‘i langi.
40018019	Mo ‘eni foki ‘oku ou tala atu, Ka ai ha toko ua ‘iate kimoutolu ‘i māmani te na loto taha ‘i ha me‘a pē te na kole ki ai, ‘e fai pē ma‘anaua ‘e he‘eku Tamai ‘oku ‘i Hēvani.
40018020	He ko e potu kuo fakataha ai ha toko ua pe ha toko tolu ki hoku hingoa, ‘oku ou ‘i he potu ko ia au ‘i honau lotolotonga.
40018021	Na‘e toki ‘unu‘unu atu ‘a Pita, ‘o ne pehē kiate ia, ‘Eiki, ‘e tu‘o fiha ‘a e fai hala ‘a hoto tokoua kia kita, ka te fakamolemole pē? ‘O tu‘o fitu ‘apē?
40018022	Tali pē ‘e Sīsū, ‘oku ‘ikai te u pehē kiate koe, ‘o tu‘o fitu: ka, ‘o tu‘o fitu liunga ‘aki ‘a e fitungofulu.
40018023	Ko ia, kuo hoko ‘o tatau ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani pea mo ha tangata, ko ha tu‘i, ‘a ia na‘a ne finangalo ke sivi ‘ene kau tamaio‘eiki.
40018024	Pea ‘i he‘ene kamata ‘a e sivi, na‘e ‘omi kiate ia ha toko taha na‘e mo‘ua ki he taleniti ‘e mano.
40018025	Pea ‘i he ‘ikai ha‘ane me‘a ke totongi ‘aki, na‘e fekau ‘e he‘ene ‘eiki ke fakatau tuki, ‘a ia, mo hono uaifi, mo e fānau, mo ‘ene me‘a kotoa, ke totongi ‘aki.
40018026	Ka ka tōmape‘e ‘a e tamaio‘eiki ‘o hū kiate ia, ‘o ne pehē, Ke ke fakatotoka mai, pea te u totongi kotoa.
40018027	Pea manava‘ofa ai ‘a e ‘eiki ‘a e tamaio‘eiki ko ia, ‘o ne tukuange ia, mo ne fakamolemole hono mo‘ua.
40018028	Ka ‘i he ‘alu atu ‘a e tamaio‘eiki ko ia, na‘a ne ‘ilo ha taha na‘e ‘i he kau ngāue mo ia; pea ko e toko taha ia na‘e mo‘ua kiate ia ko e tēnali ‘e teau: pea ne puke ia ‘o sisina hono kia, ‘o ne pehē, Kapau kuo ke mo‘ua, totongi.
40018029	Ka ka tōmape‘e ‘a e toko taha ko ia na‘a na kaungā ngāue, ‘o ne kole kiate ia ‘o pehē, Ke ke fakatotoka mai, pea te u totongi kiate koe.
40018030	Ka na‘e ‘ikai te ne tali ‘ene kole: ka ka ‘alu mei ai, ‘o ne lī ki he pilīsone ‘a e tangata kae‘oua ke ne totongi ‘a e me‘a ‘oku ne mo‘ua ki ai.
40018031	Ka ko kinautolu na‘a nau kaungā ngāue, ‘i he‘enau vakai ‘a e me‘a kuo fai, na‘a nau mamahi ‘aupito, ‘o nau ‘alu ‘o fakamatala ki he‘enau ‘eiki ‘a e me‘a kotoa kuo fai.
40018032	Toki ui ange ‘a e tangata ‘e he‘ene ‘eiki, ‘o ne pehē ki ai, ‘a e tamaio‘eiki angakovi, na‘a ku fakamolemole koe ‘a e fu‘u mo‘ua ko ia kotoa ‘i ho‘o kole mai:
40018033	‘ikai na‘e mei totonu ha‘o ‘ofa mo koe kiate ia ‘oku mo kaungā ngāue, ‘o hangē ko ‘eku ‘ofa ‘aku kiate koe?
40018034	Pea tuputāmaki ‘a ‘ene ‘eiki, ‘o ne tukuange ia ki he kau fakamamahi, kae‘oua ke ne totongi ‘a e me‘a kotoa na‘a ne mo‘ua ki ai.
40018035	‘E pehē foki mo e fai ‘a ‘eku Tamai fakalangi kiate kimoutolu, ‘o kapau ‘e ‘ikai te mou fakamolemole takitaha hono tokoua, ‘o fai‘aki homou loto.
40019001	PEA kuo hili ‘a e ngaahi lea ko ia ‘a Sīsū, na‘a ne hiki mei Kāleli, ‘o ne a‘u ki he tafa‘aki fonua ‘o Siutea ‘i Tu‘a Soatani;
40019002	pea na‘e muimui kiate ia ha ngaahi fu‘u kakai lahi, pea na‘a ne fakamo‘ui kinautolu ‘i he potu ko ia.
40019003	Pea ha‘u ki ai ha kau Fālesi ke ‘ahi‘ahi‘i ia, ‘o nau pehē, ‘oku ngofua koā ke tukuange hoto uaifi ‘i ha me‘a pē?
40019004	Pea tali ‘e ia, ‘o ne pehē, Ne ‘ikai te mou lau koā, Ko ia na‘a ne ngaohi ‘a e kakai ‘i he kamata‘anga na‘a ne ngaohi tangata mo fefine kinautolu?
40019005	mo ne folofola, Ko e me‘a ko ia ‘e tuku ai ‘e ha tangata ‘ene tamai mo ‘ene fa‘ē, ka ne pīkitai ki hono uaifi; pea ‘e hoko ‘a e toko ua ko e kakano pē taha?
40019006	Tā ‘oku ‘ikai te na kei ua, ka ko e kakano pē taha. ‘Āua; pea ko e me‘a kuo fakahoko ‘e he ‘Otua, ke ‘oua na‘a fakamāvae ‘e ha tangata.
40019007	Pea nau pehē ki ai, Ka ko ia, pea ko e hā na‘e tu‘utu‘uni ai ‘e Mōsese ke ‘ange ha tohi vete, ‘o tukuange?
40019008	Pea pehē ‘e ia kiate kinautolu, Ko e me‘a ‘i he fefeka ‘o ho‘omou anga, ko ia na‘e fakangofua ai ‘e Mōsese ke mou tukuange homou ngaahi uaifi: ka na‘e ‘ikai ke pehe‘i he kamata‘anga.
40019009	Ka ‘oku ou tala atu, ka ai ha taha te ne li‘aki hono uaifi, ‘o ‘ikai ‘i ha‘ane fe‘auaki, pea ne toki mali mo ha fefine kehe, ‘oku ne fe‘auaki: pea ko ia te ne mali mo ia kuo li‘aki ‘oku ne tono fefine.
40019010	Pea lau ‘e he‘ene kau ako kiate ia, Kapau ko hono anga ia ‘o e tangata mo hono uaifi, tā ‘oku lelei ke ‘oua ‘e mali.
40019011	Ka ka pehē ‘e ia kiate kinautolu, ‘E ‘ikai tali ‘a e me‘a ko ia ‘e he kakai kotoa pē, ngata pē ‘iate kinautolu kuo tuku ki ai.
40019012	He ‘oku ‘i ai ‘a e fa‘ahinga ‘iunoke ‘oku tupu pehē mei he manava ‘o ‘enau fa‘ē; pea ‘oku ‘i ai ‘a e fa‘ahinga ‘iunoke kuo feia ‘e ha kakai: pea ‘oku ‘i ai ‘a e fa‘ahinga ‘iunoke kuo nau ngaohi kinautolu ke pehē, koe‘uhi ko e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani. Ko ia ‘oku ne mafai ke tali, ke ne tali.
40019013	Na‘e toki ‘omi kiate ia ha kau tamaiki ke ne hilifaki hono nima ki ai, mo lotua: ka na‘e lolomi ‘a e kakai ‘e he kau ako.
40019014	Ka ka pehē ‘e Sīsū, Tuku pē ‘a e tamaiki, pea ‘oua ‘e ta‘ofi ‘enau ha‘u kiate au; he ‘oku ma‘a e fa‘ahinga ko ia ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani.
40019015	Pea ne hilifaki hono nima kiate kinautolu, ‘o ne ‘alu mei he potu ko ia.
40019016	Pea ‘iloange na‘e ha‘u kiate ia ha toko taha, ‘o ne pehē, Tangata‘eiki, ko e hā ha ngāue lelei ke u fai, ka u ma‘u ai ‘a e mo‘ui ta‘engata?
40019017	Pea tali ‘e ia, ko e hā ‘oku ke ‘eke ai kiate au ‘i he lelei? ‘Oku Toko Taha pē ‘a e lelei: ka ‘o kapau ko ho loto ke ke hū ki he mo‘ui, pea ke ke tauhi ‘a e ngaahi fekau.
40019018	Pea pehē ‘e ia, ‘a e fē fua?. Pea pehē ‘e Sīsū, ‘A ‘eni, ‘E ‘ikai te ke fakapō, ‘E ‘ikai te ke fe‘auaki, ‘E ‘ikai te ke kaiha‘a, ‘E ‘ikai te ke tukuaki.
40019019	Faka‘apa‘apa ki ho‘o tamai mo ho‘o fa‘ē: pea, Te ke ‘ofa ki ho kaungā‘api ‘o hangē pē ko ho‘o ‘ofa kiate koe.
40019020	Pea lea ‘e he talavou kiate ia, Kuo u tauhi kotoa ‘a e ngaahi lao ko ia: ko e hā ‘aku ‘oku kei toe ke fai?
40019021	Pea lea ‘a Sīsū ki ai, Kapau ko ho loto ke ke haohaoa, mole pē ‘o fakatau atu ho‘o nga‘oto‘ota, pea foaki hono pa‘anga ki he masiva, pea ‘e ai ha koloa ‘e fa‘oaki ma‘au ‘i Hēvani: pea ke ha‘u ‘o kau ‘i hoku lahi.
40019022	Pea ‘i he fanongo ‘a e talavou ki he lea ko ia na‘a ne foki kuo mamahi: he ko e toko taha ia na‘e ma‘u me‘a lahi.
40019023	Pea pehē ‘e Sīsū ki he‘ene kau ako, Ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘E faingata‘a ‘a e hū ‘a ha koloa‘ia ki he Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani.
40019024	‘Io, ‘oku ou toe lea atu, ‘oku faingofua ke hū ha kāmeli ‘i ha ava‘i hui tuitui, ‘i he hū ‘a ha koloa‘ia ki he Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani.
40019025	Pea ‘i he fanongo ki ai ‘a e kau ako na‘a nau fu‘u ‘oho, ‘o nau pehē, Ko hai ai tū ‘e ala mo‘ui?
40019026	Pea siofia kinautolu ‘e Sīsū, ‘o ne pehē ange, ‘I he vakai ‘a e tangata ko e me‘a ia ‘e ‘ikai lava; ka ki he ‘Otua ‘oku malava ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē.
40019027	Toki tali ‘e Pita, ‘o ne pehē ki ai; Vakai, ko kimautolu kuo mau li‘aki ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē, ‘o mau muimui kiate koe: ko e hā ai ha me‘a te mau ma‘u?
40019028	Pea pehē ‘e Sīsū kiate kinautolu, Ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Ka hoko ‘a e Fakatupu fo‘ou, pea nofo ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata ‘i hono taloni lāngilangi‘ia, pea ko kimoutolu kuo mou muimui ‘iate au ‘e fakanofo kimoutolu foki ki ha taloni ‘e hongofulu mā ua, ‘o mou fakamaau ‘a e matakali ‘e hongofulu mā ua ‘o ‘Isileli.
40019029	‘Io, ‘ilonga ha taha kuo ne li‘aki ha ngaahi tokoua, pe ha ngaahi tuofāfine, pe ha tamai, pe ha fa‘ē, pe ha fānau, pe ha ngaahi tōkanga ngoue, pe ha ngaahi fale, koe‘uhi ā ko hoku hingoa, te ne toe ma‘u ‘o lōlahi, pea ‘e tō mo‘ona foki ‘a e mo‘ui ta‘engata.
40019030	Ka ko e tokolahi ‘oku mu‘omu‘a te nau muimui; pea ko e tokolahi ‘oku muimui te nau mu‘omu‘a.
40020001	HE ko e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani ‘oku tatau mo ha tangata‘eiki, ‘a ia na‘a ne ‘alu atu hengihengi pē ke unga ha ni‘ihi ke ngāue ‘i he‘ene ngoue vaine.
40020002	Pea ne alea mo ha kau ngāue, ko e fo‘i tēnali ki he ‘aho, ‘o ne fekau atu kinautolu ki he‘ene ngoue vaine.
40020003	Pea ne ‘alu atu ‘i hono tolu ‘o e houa, ‘o ne ‘ilo ha ni‘ihi ‘oku nau tutu‘u noa pē ‘i he mala‘e fakatau,
40020004	pea ne pehē kiate kinautolu, ‘Alu mo kimoutolu ki he ngoue vaine, pea te u ‘atu kiate kimoutolu hono taau, pea nau ‘alu.
40020005	Pea toe ‘alu atu ia, ‘o fe‘unga mo hono ono mo hono hiva ‘o e houa, ‘o ne fai pehē foki.
40020006	Pea fe‘unga mo hono hongofulu mā taha ‘o e houa na‘a ne ‘alu, pea tā na‘e ‘i ai mo ha ni‘ihi ‘oku tutu‘u pē; pea ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Ko ho‘omou ‘aho kātoa ē mo e tutu‘u noa ai pē, koe‘uma‘ā?
40020007	Pea nau pehē kiate ia, Koe‘uhi ko e ‘ikai ha taha te ne fie unga kimautolu, Pea pehē ange ‘e ia, Mole pē mo kimoutolu ki he ngoue vaine.
40020008	Pea ‘i he‘ene efiafi leva, na‘e pehē ‘e he ‘eiki ‘o e ngoue vaine ki he‘ene mu‘a, Ui ‘a e kau ngāue, ‘o tufa ‘enau totongi, ‘o kamata mei he muimui mai ‘o fai atu ki he mu‘omu‘a mai.
40020009	Pea ha‘u ‘a kinautolu na‘e unga fe‘unga mo e hongofulu mā taha ‘o e houa, ‘o nau takitaha ma‘u ha fo‘i tēnali.
40020010	Pea ‘i he ha‘u ‘a kinautolu na‘e tomu‘a unga, na‘a nau ‘amanaki ‘e lahi ange ha‘anautolu: ka ko kinautolu foki na‘a nau ma‘u takitaha ha fo‘i tēnali.
40020011	Pea ‘i he‘enau to‘o ia, na‘a nau lāunga ki he tangata‘eiki he‘enau pehē,
40020012	‘Ā, ko e kau siana na‘e muimui mai ko e fo‘i houa pē taha ‘enau ngāue, pea ko eni kuo ke fakatatau kinautolu kiate kimautolu, ‘a ia kuo mau fua ‘a e mamafa ‘o e ngāue, pea fetakai mo e pupuha ‘o e ‘aho.
40020013	Ka ka tali pē ‘e ia, ‘o ne pehē ki ha taha ‘o e kau ngāue ko ia, Siana, he ‘oku ou kākaa‘i koe? ‘ikai na‘a ta alea ke fo‘i tēnali pē?
40020014	To‘o pē ho‘o me‘a na ‘o ‘alu: ko e ‘ange ki he muimui mai ni ‘o tatau mo koe ko ‘eku fa‘iteliha pē.
40020015	Na‘a ‘oku ‘ikai ngofua koā ‘eku fa‘iteliha ki he‘eku me‘a ‘a‘aku, ‘ō? Pe na‘a ‘oku ke mata meheka koe‘uhi ko ‘eku ‘ofa.
40020016	Pehē foki, ‘e ai ha ni‘ihi muimui te nau mu‘omu‘a, mo ha ni‘ihi mu‘omu‘a te nau muimui.
40020017	Pea ‘i he ‘alu hake ‘a Sīsū ki Selusalema, na‘a ne ‘ave ‘a e kau Hongofulumāua fakaekinautolu; pea ‘i he‘enau ‘i he hala na‘a ne pehē ange,
40020018	Ko eni ‘oku tau ‘alu ki Selusalema; pea ‘e tuku atu ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata ki he hou‘eiki taula‘eiki mo e kau sikalaipe; pea te nau fakamāumatea ia;
40020019	pea te nau tuku atu ia ki he kau Senitaile ke nau taukaea ia, mo haha, mo kalusefai; pea ‘i hono tolu ‘o e ‘aho ‘e fokotu‘u ia.
40020020	Pea na‘e toki ‘unu‘unu kiate ia ‘a e fa‘ē ‘a e ongo foha ‘o Sēpeti, pea ha‘u mo ia ‘ene ongo tama, ‘o ne tū‘ulutui, ‘o kole ha me‘a meiate ia.
40020021	Pea pehē ‘e ia ki he fefine, Ko e hā ‘a e me‘a ‘oku ke holi ki ai? Pea ne lea atu, Ke ke folofola mai ke nofo ‘a e ongo siana ni, ko ‘eku ongo tama, ko e taha ‘i ho to‘omata‘u, mo e taha ‘i ho to‘ohema, ‘i ha‘o ‘afio ho pule‘anga.
40020022	Ka ka tali ‘e Sīsū, ‘o ne pehē, ‘oku ‘ikai te mo ‘ilo ‘a e me‘a ‘oku mo kole ki ai. He te mo lava koā ke inu ‘i he ipu ‘oku ou teu inu ai? Pea na pehē ki ai, Te ma lava pē.
40020023	Pea pehē ‘e ia kiate kinaua, Ko e me‘a ki he‘eku ipu, te mo inu ai: ka ko e me‘a ki he nofo ki hoku to‘omata‘u mo hoku to‘ohema, ‘oku ‘ikai ‘a‘aku ke ‘atu ia, ka kiate kinautolu pē kuo teuteu ia ki ai ‘e he‘eku Tamai.
40020024	Ka ‘i he fanongo ki ai ‘a e toko hongofulu na‘a nau ‘ita ‘i he tautehina.
40020025	Ka ka ui ange kinautolu ‘e Sīsū, ‘o ne pehē, ‘Oku mou ‘ilo pē, ko kinautolu ‘oku pule ki he Senitaile ‘oku nau fakafie‘eiki ki he kakai, pea ko honau kau mā‘olunga ‘oku nau fakamo‘ulaloa‘i ‘a e kakai.
40020026	Ka ‘e ‘ikai pehē ‘iate kimoutolu: ka ko ia ‘oku ne holi ke hoko ko e lahi ‘iate kimoutolu te ne nofo ko homou sevāniti;
40020027	pea ko ia ‘oku ne holi ke tu‘ukimu‘a ‘iate kimoutolu te ne nofo ko ho‘omou tamaio‘eiki:
40020028	‘o hangē foki ko e Fanautama ‘a Tangata na‘e ‘ikai te ne ha‘u ke ma‘u sevāniti, ka ke sevāniti pē ‘e ia, pea ke tuku ‘ene mo‘ui ke huhu‘i ‘aki ha tokolahi, he‘ene fetongi kinautolu.
40020029	Pea ‘i he‘enau ‘alu atu mei Selikō, na‘e muimui kiate ia ha fu‘u kakai tokolahi.
40020030	Pea tā ko e ongo kui ‘oku na nofo ‘i he ve‘ehala; pea ‘i he‘ena fanongo ‘oku me‘a ange ‘a Sīsū, na‘a na kalanga ‘o pehē, ‘Alo‘ofa mai, Hako ‘o Tēvita ē!
40020031	Ka ka lolomi kinaua ‘e he kakai ke na fakalongo pē: ka ka ‘āsili ai ‘ena kalanga, ‘Eiki, ‘alo‘ofa mai! Hako ‘o Tēvita ē!
40020032	Pea tu‘u ‘a Sīsū, ‘o lea ange kiate kinaua, ‘o pehē, Ko e hā ‘a e me‘a ‘oku mo holi ke u fai ma‘amoua?
40020033	Pea na pehē ki ai, ‘Eiki, ke faka‘ā homa poko‘i mata ni.
40020034	Pea langa ‘a e fatu ‘o Sīsū ‘i he ‘ofa, ‘o ne alasi hona ngaahi fo‘i mata: pea na ‘ā leva, ‘o na muimui kiate ia.
40021001	PEA ‘i he‘enau ofi ki Selusalema, pea kuo nau a‘u ki Petefesi ‘i he mo‘unga ko ‘Ōlive, na‘e toki fekau atu ‘e Sīsū ha ongo ako ‘e toko ua,
40021002	‘o ne pehē kiate kinaua, Mo ō ki he vilisi ko ena ‘oku hanga mai, pea te mo ‘ilo leva ki ha ‘asi ‘oku no‘otaki, pea ai mo hono ‘uhiki: vete, ‘o taki mai.
40021003	Pea ka ai ha lea ‘e fai atu ‘e ha taha, pea mo pehē, ‘Ou fiema‘u kinaua ‘e he ‘Eiki; pea te ne tuku mai leva kinaua.
40021004	Pea na‘e fai ‘eni koe‘uhi ke fakamo‘oni ki he me‘a ne folofola‘aki ‘i he palōfita, ‘o pehē,
40021005	Mou lea ki si‘i Saione, Ko ena ho Tu‘i ‘oku me‘a mai kiate koe. Ko e ‘Eiki fa‘a kātaki, pea ‘oku ne heka ki ha ‘asi: ‘Io, ki ha ki‘i manu, Ko e tama ‘a ha manu toho palau.
40021006	Pea ‘alu ‘a e ongo ako, ‘o na fai ‘o hangē ko e tu‘utu‘uni kinaua ‘e Sīsū;
40021007	pea na taki mai ‘a e ‘asi mo hono ‘uhiki, pea nau ‘ai ki ai honau ngaahi pulupulu, pea ne heka ai.
40021008	Pea ko e fu‘u tokolahi ‘o e kakai na‘a nau falikiliki ‘a e hala ‘aki honau pulupulu ‘onautolu; pea ko e ni‘ihi na‘a nau tu‘usi ‘a e ngaahi va‘akau, ‘o falikiliki ‘aki ‘a e hala.
40021009	Pea ko e fu‘u kakai na‘e ‘alu mu‘omu‘a ‘iate ia, pea mo kinautolu na‘e muimui mai, na‘a nau fekālanga‘i ‘o pehē, Hōsana ki he Hako ‘o Tēvita! Hoto ‘ofa kiate ia ‘oku hoko mai ‘i he huafa ‘o e ‘Eiki! Hōsana ki Langi Taupotu!
40021010	Pea ‘i he‘ene hū ki Selusalema, na‘e ngatū ‘a e kolo kotoa, ‘o nau pehē, Ko hai ‘eni?
40021011	Pea tali ‘e he fu‘u fononga, Ko Sīsū ‘eni ko e palōfita mei Nāsaleti ‘i Kāleli.
40021012	Pea hū ‘a Sīsū ki he Temipale, ‘o ne kapusi ‘a kinautolu kotoa pē na‘e fakatau atu mo fakatau mai ‘i he Temipale, ‘o ne fulihi ‘a e ngaahi tēpile ‘a e kau fetongi pa‘anga, mo e ngaahi nofo‘a ‘o e kakai na‘e ‘omi lupe ke fakatau;
40021013	pea ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Kuo tohi, Ko hoku fale ‘e ui ko e falelotu; ka ko kimoutolu ‘oku mou ngaohi ia ko e ‘ananga ‘o ha kaiha‘akau.
40021014	Pea na‘e ha‘u kiate ia ‘i he Temipale ha kau kui mo ha kau heke, pea ne fakamo‘ui kinautolu.
40021015	Ka ko e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki mo e kau sikalaipe, ‘i he‘enau vakai ki he ngaahi me‘a fakaofo na‘a ne fai, mo e kau tamaiki ‘oku nau kalanga ‘i he Temipale, ‘o pehē, Hōsana ki he Hako ‘o Tēvita; na‘a nau ‘ita;
40021016	pea nau pehē kiate ia, ‘oku ke fanongo ki he me‘a ‘oku lau ‘e kinautolu na? Pea pehē ange ‘e Sīsū, ‘Io: pea kuo te‘eki koā ke mou lau, ‘o pehē, Ko e ngutu ‘o e tamaiki mo e valevale Kuo ke tu‘utu‘uni mei ai hao fakamālō.
40021017	Pea ne mahu‘i meiate kinautolu, ‘o ne ‘alu mei ai kitua‘ā kolo, ki Pētani, ‘o ne toka ‘i he potu ko ia.
40021018	Pea pongipongi hake, ‘i he‘ene foki ki he kolo, na‘a ne hālofia.
40021019	Pea ‘i he‘ene vakai ki ha fu‘u fiki ‘oku tu‘u taha ‘o heke mai ki hala, na‘a ne ‘alu ki ai; ka na‘e ‘ikai te ne ‘ilo ai ha me‘a, ko e ngaahi lau pē. Pea folofola ia ki ai, ‘o pehē, Ke ‘oua na‘a toe ai hao fua ‘o ta‘engata. Pea mate leva ‘a e fu‘u fiki.
40021020	Pea ‘i he mamata ki ai ‘a e kau ako, na‘a nau ofo, ‘o nau pehē, Na‘e fēfē ‘ene mate vave pehē ‘a e fu‘u fiki?
40021021	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Kapau te mou tui, ‘o ‘oua ‘e tāla‘a, ‘e ‘ikai ngata ‘i he me‘a kuo fai ki he fiki ‘a e me‘a te mou lava; ka ‘o kapau te mou lea ki he mo‘unga ni, Fei mo mahiki koe, ‘o patū ki tahi; pea ‘e hoko.
40021022	Pea ko e me‘a kotoa pē te mou kole‘i he hū, ‘o mou tui pē, te mou ma‘u.
40021023	Pea kuo ne hū ki he Temipale, pea ko e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki mo e kau mātu‘a ‘o e kakai Siu na‘a nau ‘unu‘unu kiate ia ‘i he‘ene faiako, ‘o nau pehē, Ko e hā ho tu‘unga ‘oku ke fai ai ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko eni? Pea ko hai na‘a ne tuku kiate koe ‘a e tu‘unga ko ia?
40021024	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū, ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Ka u fai atu mo au ha‘aku fehu‘i ‘e taha, pea kapau te mou tali mai, pea te u toki fakahā atu pe ko e hā hoku tu‘unga ‘oku ou fai ai ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko eni.
40021025	Ko e fai papitaiso ‘a Sione na‘e mei fē ia? mei he langi, pe mei he tangata? Pea nau fekīhiaki, ‘o pehē, Kapau te tau tali, mei langi; te ne pehē mai, pea ko e hā ai na‘e ‘ikai te mou tuitala kiate ia?
40021026	Pea kapau te tau pehē, Mei he tangata; kae telia ‘a e kakai; he ‘oku nau lau kotoa pē ko e palōfita ‘a Sione.
40021027	Pea nau tali kia Sīsū ‘o pehē, ‘oku ‘ikai te mau ‘ilo. Pea lea ai mo ia kiate kinautolu, pea ‘e ‘ikai ā te u tala atu ‘e au pe ko e hā hoku tu‘unga ‘oku ou fai ai ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko eni.
40021028	Ka ko e hā ho‘omou poa ki he me‘a ni? Tokua na‘e ai ha tangata mo hono ongo foha; pea ne ‘unu‘unu atu ki he ‘uluaki, ‘o ne pehē, Tama, ke ke ‘alu ‘o ngāue he ‘aho ni ‘i he ngoue vaine.
40021029	Ka ka tali ‘e ia, ‘o ne pehē, ‘E ‘ikai: ka na‘e tautea ia ‘e hono loto ki mui, ‘o ne ‘alu.
40021030	Pea ne ‘unu‘unu ki he tama ‘e taha, ‘o ne lea ki ai ‘o hangē ko e ‘anenai. Pea tali ‘e ia, ‘o ne pehē, ‘Oku lelei, Tangata‘eiki: ka na‘e ‘ikai ‘alu ia.
40021031	Ko e fē nai ‘i he ongo tama ne ne fai ‘a e tu‘utu‘uni ‘a ‘ena tamai? Pea nau pehē, Ko e ‘uluaki. Pea pehē ‘e Sīsū kiate kinautolu, Ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Ko e kau pōpilikane mo e kau fe‘auaki ‘oku nau takimu‘a kiate kimoutolu ‘i he hū ki he Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua.
40021032	He na‘e ha‘u ‘a Sione kiate kimoutolu ‘i he hala ko e tauhi tu‘utu‘uni, pea na‘e ‘ikai te mou tuitala ki ai: ka ko e kau pōpilikane mo e fe‘auaki na‘a nau tuitala ‘e kinautolu: pea ko kimoutolu, neongo na‘a mou sio ki ai, ka na‘e ‘ikai tautea homou loto kimui ke mou tuitala kiate ia.
40021033	Mou fanongo mai ki ha fakatātā ‘e taha: Tokua na‘e ai ha tangata, ko e matāpule, ‘a ia na‘a ne tō ha ngoue vaine, pea na‘a ne ‘aa‘i takai ia, mo ne foa ai ha tata‘o‘anga kālepi, ‘o ne langa ai ha taua, pea ne tuku ke lisi e ha kau fa‘a, ‘o ne ‘alu ki muli.
40021034	Pea ‘i he ofi ‘a e to‘ukai kālepi, na‘a ne fekau atu ‘ene kau tamaio‘eiki ki he kau fa‘a ke ma‘u mai hono ‘inasi:
40021035	ka ka puke ‘e he kau fa‘a ‘ene kau tamaio‘eiki, ‘o nau haha ha toko taha, pea tāmate‘i ha toko taha, pea tolomaka‘i ha toko taha.
40021036	Pea ne toe fekau atu mo ha tu‘unga tamaio‘eiki kehe, ‘o tokolahi ‘i he fua ō: pea nau ngaohi ‘a kinautolu ‘o hangē ko e ‘uluaki.
40021037	Pea na‘a ne fekau atu kimui hono foha, he‘ene pehē, Te nau toka‘i hoku foha.
40021038	Ka ko e kau fa‘a ‘i he‘enau mamata ki he foha, na‘a nau fealēlea‘aki, ‘o pehē, Ko e hoko ‘ena; ‘ē, tau tāmate‘i mu‘a ia, ‘o tau ma‘u hono tofi‘a.
40021039	Pea nau puke ia ‘o toho ki he tua‘ā ngoue, ‘o nau tāmate‘i ai.
40021040	Pea ka ‘iloange ai ‘e hoko mai ‘a e ‘eiki ‘o e ngoue vaine, ko e hā te ne fai ki he kau fa‘a ko ia?
40021041	Pea nau pehē kiate ia, Te ne faka‘auha fakalielia‘i ‘a e kau fakalielia ko ia, pea te ne tuku ke lisi ‘a e ngoue ‘e ha kau fa‘a kehe, ‘a ia ko e fa‘ahinga te nau ‘ange hono ‘inasi ‘i hono taimi totonu.
40021042	Pea lea ‘a Sīsū kiate kinautolu, Kuo te‘eki koā ke mou lau ‘i he Tohitapu? Ko e maka ne fakatale‘i ‘e he kau tufunga Kuo hoko ‘o tuliki tau‘olunga: Ko e me‘a mei he ‘Eiki ia, pea fakaofo ki hotau mata.
40021043	Ko ia, ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘E to‘o meiate kimoutolu ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua, pea ‘e tuku ki ha kakai ‘oku fua ‘o taau mo ia.
40021044	Pea ko ia te ne tō ki he maka ko ia ‘e mafesifesi: ka ka ‘ilonga ‘a ia ‘e tō ‘a e maka ki ai ‘e laiki ke efu.
40021045	Pea ‘i he fanongo ‘a e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki mo e kau Fālesi ki he‘ene ngaahi fakatātā, na‘a nau ‘ilo ‘oku kau ‘ene lea kiate kinautolu.
40021046	Pea nau feinga ke puke ia, ka nau manavahē pē ki he kakai, ko ‘enau lau ko e palōfita ia.
40022001	PEA tali ‘e Sīsū, ‘o ne toe lea kiate kinautolu ‘i ha ngaahi fakatātā, ‘o pehē,
40022002	Kuo tatau ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani pea mo ha tangata, ko e tu‘i, ‘a ia na‘a ne fai ‘a e ta‘ane ‘o hono ‘alo;
40022003	pea ne fekau atu ‘ene kau tamaio‘eiki ke ui ‘a e kakai kuo tala ki ai ‘a e kātoanga: ka na‘e ‘ikai te nau fie ha‘u.
40022004	Pea ne toe fekau atu ha kau tamaio‘eiki kehe, ‘o ne pehē, Fakahā kiate kinautolu na‘e tala, Ko eni, kuo u ‘osi teu ‘eku pongipongi: kuo tāmate‘i ‘eku fanga pulu, mo ‘eku fanga manu tali ‘eiki, pea kuo napangapangamālie kotoa pē: mou omi ki he ta‘ane.
40022005	Ka ka fakava‘iva‘inga ‘aki ia ‘e kinautolu, ‘o nau ‘alu ko e taha ki he‘ene ngoue, ko e taha ki he‘ene fai fakatau;
40022006	pea ko e toe na‘a nau puke ‘ene kau tamaio‘eiki, ‘o nau pā‘usi‘i mo tāmate‘i.
40022007	Pea houhau ai ‘a e Tu‘i, ‘o ne fekau atu ‘ene ngaahi kongakau, ‘o ne faka‘auha ‘a e kau fakapō ko ia, ‘o tutu ‘enau kolo.
40022008	Pea toki folofola ia ki he‘ene kau tamaio‘eiki, Ko e ta‘ane kuo teu; ka ko kinautolu na‘e tala ki ai tā na‘e ‘ikai te nau taau.
40022009	Ko ia, mou ō ki he ngaahi manga‘i hala, pea ‘ilonga ha kakai te mou ‘ilo ai, tala ke nau ha‘u ki he kātoanga.
40022010	Pea ‘alu atu ‘a e kau tamaio‘eiki ko ia ki he ngaahi hala, ‘o nau tānaki ‘a e kakai kotoa pē na‘a nau ‘ilo ki ai, ‘a e kovi mo e lelei fakatou‘osi: pea na‘e ma‘opo ‘a e kātoanga.
40022011	Pea ‘i he me‘a mai ‘a e Tu‘i ke vakai ‘a e kakai na‘e keinanga, na‘a ne ‘ilo ai ha tangata kuo ‘ikai te ne tui ha kofu ta‘ane.
40022012	Pea ne folofola ki ai, Siana, na‘e fēfē ho‘o hū mai ki heni ta‘e te ke ‘ai hao kofu ta‘ane?
40022013	Pea ne mo‘ulongoa. Pea fekau ‘e he Tu‘i ki he kau sevāniti, Ha‘i hono va‘e mo hono nima, ‘o lī ia ki he po‘uli ‘o tua‘ā. Ko e Potu ia ‘e toki hoko ai ‘a e tangi mo e fengai‘itaki ‘o e nifo.
40022014	He ‘oku tokolahi ‘a e ui, kae toko si‘i ‘a e fili.
40022015	Pea toki ‘alu ‘a e kau Fālesi, ‘o nau puleaki‘i pe ‘e fēfē ha‘anau tauhele ia ‘i he alea.
40022016	Pea nau fekau atu kiate ia ‘enau kau ako fakataha mo e fa‘ahi ‘a Hēlota, ‘a ia na‘a nau pehē, Tangata‘eiki ‘oku mau ‘ilo ‘oku ke mo‘oni koe, pea ‘oku ke ako totonu ‘aki ‘a e hala ‘o e ‘Eiki, pea ‘oku ‘ikai te ke toka‘i ha taha: koe‘uhi ‘oku ‘ikai te ke filifilimānako.
40022017	Ko ia ke ke tala mai pe ko e hā ho‘o poa, pe ‘oku ngofua ke tukuhau kia Sisa, pe ‘ikai?
40022018	Ka ka mea‘i ‘e Sīsū ‘enau kovi, ‘o ne pehē, ‘A e kau mālualoi, ko e hā ‘oku mou ‘ahi‘ahi‘i ai au?
40022019	faka‘ali‘ali mai ‘a e pa‘anga tukuhau. Pea nau ‘omi kiate ia ha fo‘i tēnali.
40022020	Pea pehē ‘e ia kiate kinautolu, Ko e fofonga ‘ena mo e hingoa ‘o hai?
40022021	Pea nau pehē, ‘o Sisa. Pea folofola ‘e ia kiate kinautolu, Pe‘i ‘ange kia Sisa ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘a Sisa; pea ki he ‘Otua ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘a e ‘Otua.
40022022	Pea ‘i he‘enau fanongo ki ai na‘a nau ofo; pea nau tuku ia ‘o nau ‘alu.
40022023	Ko e ‘aho ko ia na‘e ‘unu‘unu atu ai kiate ia ha kau Sātusi, ko ‘enau pehē ‘oku ‘ikai ha toetu‘u;
40022024	‘o nau fai ha fehu‘i kiate ia, ‘o pehē, Tangata‘eiki, na‘e pehē ‘e Mōsese, Kapau ‘e pekia ha tangata ta‘eha‘ane fānau, pea ke mali hono tokoua mo e finemotu‘a, ‘o ne fakatupu ha hako ki hono tokoua.
40022025	Pea ko eni, na‘e nofo mo kimautolu ha tu‘unga me‘a ‘e toko fitu, ko e tautehina: pea mali ‘a e ‘uluaki ‘o pekia, pea ko e me‘a ‘i he ‘ikai hano hako na‘a ne tuku hake hono finemotu‘a ki hono tehina.
40022026	Pehē foki ‘a hono toko ua, mo hono toko tolu, kae‘oua ke ‘osi ‘a e toko fitu.
40022027	Pea toki pekia kimui ‘a e fefine.
40022028	Pea ‘i he toetu‘u te ne hoko ko e uaifi ‘o hai ‘i he toko fitu? he na‘a nau ma‘u ia kotoa pē.
40022029	Ka ka tali ‘e Sīsū, ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu, ‘oku mou hē, ko e ta‘e te mou ‘ilo ‘a e Tohitapu, kae‘uma‘ā ‘a e māfimafi ‘o e ‘Otua.
40022030	He ‘oku ‘ikai ha ma‘u uaifi, pe ha ma‘u husepāniti ‘i he toetu‘u, ka ‘oku nau hangē ko e kau ‘āngelo ‘i he langi.
40022031	Ka ko e me‘a ki he toetu‘u ‘a e pekia, ne ‘ikai te mou lau koā ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua kiate kimoutolu, ‘o pehē,
40022032	Ko au ko e ‘Otua ‘o ‘Epalahame, pea ko e ‘Otua ‘o ‘Aisake, pea ko e ‘Otua ‘o Sēkope? Ko e ‘Otua ‘oku ‘ikai ko e me‘a ia ‘a ha kau mate, ka ‘a ha kau mo‘ui.
40022033	Pea ‘i he fanongo ki ai ‘a e ngaahi fu‘u kakai, na‘e to‘oa honau loto ‘i he anga ‘o ‘ene ako.
40022034	Ka ko e kau Fālesi, ‘i he‘enau fanongo kuo ne fakasīlongo‘i ‘a e kau Sātusi, na‘a nau fakataha ki he potu ko ia.
40022035	Pea ko honau toko taha, ko e tufungalao, na‘a ne fai ha fehu‘i ki ai, ko ‘ene ‘ahi‘ahi‘i ia, ‘o ne pehē,
40022036	Tangata‘eiki, ko e fa‘ahinga tu‘utu‘uni fē ‘i he Lao ‘oku mamafa taha?
40022037	Pea ne pehē ki ai, Te ke ‘ofa ki he ‘Eiki ko ho ‘Otua, ‘o fai‘aki ‘a e kotoa ‘o ho loto, mo e kotoa ‘o ho laumālie, mo e kotoa ‘o ho ‘atamai.
40022038	Ko eni ia ‘a e tu‘utu‘uni ‘oku mamafa taha mo tu‘ukimu‘a.
40022039	Pea ‘oku fa‘ahinga mo ia ‘a hono ua, Te ke ‘ofa ki ho kaungā‘api ‘o hangē ko ho‘o ‘ofa kiate koe.
40022040	Ko e ongo tu‘utu‘uni ko eni ‘e ua ‘oku tautau ki ai ‘a e Lao kotoa mo e Tohi Palōfita.
40022041	Pea lolotonga kuo fakataha mai ‘a e kau Fālesi, pea fai ‘e Sīsū ‘ene fehu‘i kiate kinautolu, ‘o pehē,
40022042	Ko e hā ho‘omou poa ki he Mīsaia? Ko e hako nai ia ‘o hai? Pea nau tali, ‘O Tēvita.
40022043	Pea pehē ‘e ia kiate kinautolu, Kae fēfē ai hono ui ko e ‘Eiki ‘e Tēvita ‘i he‘ene Laumālie‘ia, ‘o ne pehē,
40022044	Ne folofola ‘e he ‘Eiki ki hoku ‘Eiki, Nofo koe ‘i hoku to‘omata‘u, Kae‘oua ke u ‘ai ho fili ki ho lalo va‘e?
40022045	Pea kapau ‘oku ui ia ‘e Tēvita ko hono ‘Eiki, pea ko hono hako fēfē ia?
40022046	Pea na‘e ‘ikai ha taha ‘e lava ha‘ane momo‘i tali; pea hili ‘a e ‘aho ko ia na‘e ‘ikai toe ai ha toko taha ‘e fakato‘oto‘a ke fai ha fehu‘i kiate ia.
40023001	NA‘E toki folofola ‘a Sīsū ki he ngaahi fu‘u kakai, pea mo ‘ene kau ako,
40023002	‘o pehē, Ko e kau sikalaipe mo e Fālesi ‘oku nau ma‘u ‘a e tu‘unga ‘o Mōsese:
40023003	ko ia, ‘ilonga ha me‘a ‘oku nau fekau kiate kimoutolu, mou fai ki ai mo tauhia; kae ‘oua na‘a mou fa‘ifa‘itaki ki he‘enau ngāue: he ‘oku nau lea kae ‘ikai fai ki ai.
40023004	Pea ‘oku nau ha‘iha‘i ‘a e ngaahi kavenga mamafa, mo ‘ai ki he uma ‘o e kakai; ka ko kinautolu ‘oku ‘ikai te nau fie ‘ai hanau fo‘i tuhu ke hiki ia.
40023005	Pea ka ai ha‘anau ngāue ‘oku fai, ko e fai pē ke mātā ‘e he kakai: he ‘oku nau failaketeli laulalahi, pea pao lōloa honau kofu;
40023006	pea nau manako ke tākoto ki mu‘a ‘i ha kātoanga, pea ke nofo ki mu‘a ‘i he falelotu,
40023007	pea ke faka‘apa‘apa‘ia ‘i he mala‘e fakatau, pea ke ui ia ‘e he kakai, Lāpai.
40023008	Ka ko kimoutolu ‘oua na‘a ui ko Lāpai: he ‘oku taha pē ho‘omou Faiako, ka ko kimoutolu ko e ngaahi tokoua kotoa pē.
40023009	Pea ‘oua na‘a ui ha toko taha ‘i māmani ko ho‘omou tamai: he ‘oku taha pē ho‘omou Tamai, ko e Tamai Fakalangi.
40023010	Kae‘uma‘ā ‘oua na‘a ui kimoutolu ko e kau takimu‘a: he ‘oku taha homou Takimu‘a, ko Kalaisi.
40023011	Ka ‘oka ai ha taha ‘iate kimoutolu ‘e lahi hake, te ne nofo ko ho‘omou sevāniti.
40023012	Pea ko ia te ne hākeaki‘i ia ‘e fakavaivai‘i: pea ko ia te ne fakavaivai‘i ia ‘e hākeaki‘i.
40023013	Ka ‘oiauē kimoutolu, sikalaipe mo e Fālesi, he mā‘oni‘oni loi! he ‘oku mou songo ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani ki he kakai ‘oku fangafanga hū ki ai: ‘io, ‘oku ‘ikai te mou fie hū kimoutolu, pea ko kinautolu ‘oku fai ke hū ‘oku ‘ikai te mou tuku ke nau hū.
40023014	‘Oiauē kimoutolu, sikalaipe mo e Fālesi, he mā‘oni‘oni loi! he ‘oku mou folo kotoa ‘a e ngaahi ‘api ‘o si‘i kau uitou, pea mou mounu ‘aki ha lotu lōloa; ko ia, te mou ma‘u ‘e kimoutolu ha tautea ‘oku kehe ange.
40023015	‘Oiauē kimoutolu, sikalaipe mo e Fālesi, he mā‘oni‘oni loi! he ‘oku mou foli ‘a e tahi mo e fonua ke fakatafoki ha toko taha; pea ‘oka tafoki ia, ‘oku ne hoko ‘i ho‘omou ngāue ko e tama tātu‘oua ‘a Heli ‘iate kimoutolu.
40023016	‘Oiauē kimoutolu, ‘a e kau takimu‘a kui! ho‘omou lau, Ka lea tuki ‘e ha taha ki he Fale Tapu ko e va‘inga ia, ka ‘oka lea tuki ‘e ha taha ki he koula ‘i he Fale Tapu pea pau ai ‘a e alea!
40023017	‘a e koto vale mo kui! He ko e fē ‘oku lahi, ‘a e koula ko ia, pe ko e Fale ‘a ia ‘oku tu‘u ai ‘a e tapu ‘o e koula?
40023018	Mo ho‘omou lau foki, Ka lea tuki ‘e ha taha ki he ‘ōlita, ko e va‘inga ia; ka ka lea tuki ‘e ha taha ki he me‘a‘ofa kuo hilifaki ki ai, pea pau ai ‘a e alea.
40023019	‘a e koto kui! he ko e fē ‘oku lahi, ‘a e me‘a‘ofa ko ia, pe ko e ‘ōlita ‘oku tu‘u ai ‘a e tapu ‘o e me‘a‘ofa?
40023020	‘Āua, ko ia ‘oku ne lea tuki ki he ‘ōlita, ‘oku ‘ikai te ne lea ki ai pē, ka ‘oku ne lea foki ki he me‘a kotoa pē kuo hilifaki ki ai.
40023021	Pea ko ia ‘oku ne lea tuki ki he Fale Tapu, ‘oku ‘ikai te ne lea ki ai pē, ka kiate Ia foki ‘oku ‘afio ai.
40023022	Pea ko ia ‘oku ne lea tuki ki he langi, ‘oku ne lea tuki ki he taloni ‘o e ‘Otua, pea mo Ia ‘oku ne ‘afio mei ai.
40023023	‘Oiauē kimoutolu, sikalaipe mo e Fālesi, he mā‘oni‘oni loi! he ‘oku mou ‘atu ki he siasi ‘a e vahe hongofulu ‘o ho‘omou minite mo e ‘aneto mo e kumino; ka kuo mou tuku ‘a e ngaahi me‘a mamafa ‘o e Lao, ‘a e fakamaau totonu, mo e fai meesi, mo e lototō: ka na‘e totonu ke fai ‘eni, pea ‘oua na‘a tuku ‘ena.
40023024	‘a e koto takimu‘a kui! ho‘omou sivi mei ho‘omou inu ‘a e namu, kae folofua ‘a e kāmeli!
40023025	‘Oiauē kimoutolu, sikalaipe mo e Fālesi, he mā‘oni‘oni loi! he ‘oku mou fufulu ‘a e tu‘a ipu mo e tisi, ka ‘oku fokotu‘uniu ‘i loto ‘a e fakamālohi mo e ta‘efakama‘uma‘u.
40023026	Fālesi kui! fufulu mu‘a ‘a e loto ipu, koe‘uhi ke hoko ‘o ma‘a mo tu‘a foki.
40023027	‘Oiauē kimoutolu, sikalaipe mo e Fālesi, he mā‘oni‘oni loi! he ‘oku mou tatau tofu pē mo e ngaahi fonualoto kuo vali hina, ‘a ia ‘oku matamatalelei ‘i tu‘a nai, ka ‘i loto ‘oku fokotu‘uniu ai ‘a e hui ‘o e pekia mo e ngaahi fakalielia kehekehe.
40023028	Pehē ‘a kimoutolu foki; ‘i tu‘a ‘oku mou hā ki he kakai ko e kau mā‘oni‘oni, ka ‘i loto ‘oku mou pito ‘i he mā‘oni‘oni loi mo e maumau lao.
40023029	‘Oiauē kimoutolu, sikalaipe mo e Fālesi, he mā‘oni‘oni loi! he ‘oku mou langafale‘i ‘a e ngaahi fonualoto ‘o e kau palōfita, mo fakasanisani ‘a e ngaahi fale fa‘itoka ‘o e kakai lotu;
40023030	‘o mou pehē, ‘Ē, ka ne mau ‘i he kuonga ‘o ‘emau ngaahi kui, ‘e ‘ikai te mau kau mo kinautolu ‘i he tāmate‘i ‘o e kau palōfita.
40023031	Tā ‘oku mou fakamo‘oni kiate kimoutolu, ko e hako kimoutolu ‘o e kakai na‘a nau fakapoongi ‘a e kau palōfita.
40023032	Pe‘i mou fakalato ā ‘a e ngafa hia ‘a ho‘omou ngaahi kui.
40023033	‘a e fanga ngata! ‘a e hako‘i ngata fekai! Te mou hao fēfē mei he fakamaau Kihena?
40023034	Vakai ā! ko hono ō ia ‘oku ou fekau atu kiate kimoutolu ha kau palōfita, mo ha kau poto, mo ha kau sikalaipe: te mou tāmate‘i honau ni‘ihi mo kalusefai; pea te mou haha honau ni‘ihi ‘i homou ngaahi falelotu, pea fakafe‘ātungia mei he kolo ki he kolo:
40023035	koe‘uhi ke ‘eke kiate kimoutolu e toto kotoa ‘o e kakai mā‘oni‘oni ‘a ia kuo lilingi ki he kelekele, mei he toto ‘o ‘Ēpeli mā‘oni‘oni ‘o a‘u ki he toto ‘o Sākalaia ko e foha ‘o Palakaia, ‘a ia na‘a mou fakapoongi ‘i he vaha‘a ‘o e Fale Tapu mo e ‘ōlita.
40023036	Ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘E ‘eke ia kotoa pē ki he to‘utangata ko eni.
40023037	‘A Selusalema! ‘a Selusalema! ‘a e kolo ‘oku fakapoongi ‘a e kau palōfita, mo tolongi ‘a e kakai ‘oku talafekau ki ai! hono tu‘o taha ‘eku loto ke tānaki ho‘o fānau, ‘o hangē ko e tānaki ‘e he motu‘a moa hono fānganga ‘o‘ona ki hono lalo kapakau, ka na‘e ‘ikai te mou loto ki ai!
40023038	Ko eni kuo motuhi atu kiate kimoutolu ‘a homou fale kuo li‘aki.
40023039	He ‘oku ou tala atu, Hili ‘eni ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito te mou toe sio kiate au, kae‘oua ke mou pehē, Hoto ‘ofa kiate ia ‘oku hoko mai ‘i he huafa ‘o e ‘Eiki.
40024001	PEA hū atu ‘a Sīsū mei he Temipale, ‘o kamata fononga: pea ‘unu‘unu ange ‘ene kau ako ke faka‘ali‘ali tala kiate ia ‘a e ngaahi fale ‘o e Temipale.
40024002	Ka ka tali ‘e ia ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu, ‘Ikai ‘oku mou sio ni ki he ngaahi me‘a ni kotoa pē? Ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘E ‘ikai ‘aupito tuku ‘i heni ha fo‘i maka ‘o ta‘eholoki.
40024003	Pea ‘i he‘ene nofo hifo ‘i he funga mo‘unga ko ‘Ōlive, na‘e ‘unu‘unu kiate ia ‘a e kau ako fakaekinautolu, ‘o nau pehē, Tala mai pe ‘e hoko fakakū ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia? Pea ko e hā nai ‘a e faka‘ilonga ‘o ha‘o hā mai, mo e faka‘osi ‘o e kuonga?
40024004	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Vakavakai, na‘a taki hē kimoutolu ‘e ha taha.
40024005	Koe‘uhi ‘e ai ha tokolahi te nau ha‘u ‘i he hingoa ‘o‘oku, mo nau pehē, Ko au ko e Mīsaia; pea te nau taki hē ha tokolahi.
40024006	Pea ‘e faifai pea te mou fanongo ki ha ngaahi tau, mo ha ngaahi tala tau: tokanga ke ‘oua na‘a fakamanavasi‘i ai kimoutolu: he kuo pau ke hoko ia, kae kei tuai pē ‘a e ngata‘anga.
40024007	Koe‘uhi ‘e tu‘u ha kakai ki ha kakai, mo ha pule‘anga ki ha pule‘anga: pea ‘e ai ha ngaahi honge mo ha ngaahi mofuike ‘i he ngaahi potu kehekehe.
40024008	Ka ko e ngaahi me‘a kotoa ko ia ko e kamata‘anga pē ‘o e langā.
40024009	Ko e taimi ko ia te nau tukuange kimoutolu ki he fakamamahi, pea te nau tāmate‘i kimoutolu: pea te mou fehi‘anekina ‘e he ngaahi kakai kehekehe, ko e me‘a ‘i he hingoa ‘o‘oku.
40024010	Pea ko e taimi ko ia ‘e tūkia ha tokolahi, pea te nau tau‘aki faka‘ilo kinautolu, mo fefehi‘anaki.
40024011	Pea ‘e tokolahi ha kau palōfita loi ‘e tupu hake, pea te nau taki hē ha tokolahi.
40024012	Pea ko e me‘a ‘i he ope ‘o e maumau lao, ‘e faka‘a‘au ‘o momoko ‘a e ‘ofa ‘a e tokolahi.
40024013	Ka ko ia te ne kātaki ‘o a‘u ki he ngata‘anga, ko e toko taha ko ia te ne mo‘ui.
40024014	Pea ‘oua ke fanongonongo ki māmani kātoa ‘a e ongoongo lelei ko eni ‘o e pule‘anga, ke ai ha fakamatala ki he ngaahi kakai kotoa pē, pea toki hoko ‘a e ngata‘anga.
40024015	Ko ia, ka mou ka vakai ‘oku tu‘u ‘i he Potu Tapu ‘a e me‘a fakalielia ‘o e faka‘auha, ‘a ia na‘e folofola ki ai ‘i he palōfita ko Tāniela; (‘ilonga ha taha ‘oku lau, pea ke ne tokanga ki ai)
40024016	pea ke toki hola ki he mo‘unga ‘a kinautolu ‘oku ‘i Siutea:
40024017	pea ko ia ‘oku ‘i he tu‘a fale ke ‘oua te ne ‘alu hifo ke ‘ave ‘a e ngaahi me‘a mei hono fale:
40024018	pea ko ia ‘oku ‘i he ngoue, ke ‘oua te ne foki ki ‘api ke ‘ave hono kofu.
40024019	Ka ‘oiauē ‘a kinautolu ‘oku feitama, mo kinautolu ‘oku toutama ‘i he taimi ko ia!
40024020	Pea mou lotua ke ‘oua na‘a hoko ho‘omou hola ‘i he fa‘ahita‘u momoko, kae‘uma‘ā ‘i ha Sāpate:
40024021	koe‘uhi ‘e toki hoko ai ha mamahi lahi, ‘a ia kuo te‘eki hano tatau mei he kamata‘anga ‘o māmani ‘o a‘u mai ki he taimi ni, ‘oi, pea ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito toe ‘i ai.
40024022	Pea ka ne ta‘e‘oua ‘a e fakanounou ‘o e taimi ko ia, pehē ‘e ‘auha ‘a e kakano kotoa pē: kae telia ‘a e kakai fili ‘e fakanounou ai ‘a e taimi ko ia.
40024023	Pea kapau ‘e toki pehē atu ‘e ha taha, ‘Ē, ko e Mīsaia ‘oku ‘i heni, pe ‘i hena; ‘oua te mou momo‘i tui ki ai.
40024024	Koe‘uhi ‘e tupu hake ha kau mīsaia loi, mo ha kau palōfita loi, pea ‘e ha‘u mo kinautolu ha ngaahi faka‘ilonga lahi mo e ngaahi me‘a fakaofo; ‘io, ka ne lava, na‘a mo e kakai fili ‘e taki hē ai.
40024025	Ko eni kuo u sinaki tala atu.
40024026	Ko ia, kapau te nau pehē kiate kimoutolu, Sī, ‘oku ne ‘i he toafa; ‘oua te mou ‘alu ki ai; Sī, ‘oku ne ‘i ha tukunga koloa; ‘oua te mou momo‘i tui ki ai.
40024027	He hangē ko e pā mai ‘a e ‘uhila mei hahake, pea ‘oku hā ‘o a‘u ki hihifo; ‘e pehē foki ‘a e hoko mai ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata.
40024028	‘Ilonga ha potu ‘e ‘i ai ha ‘anga‘anga, pea ‘e fakataha ki ai ‘a e fanga ‘īkale.
40024029	Pea hili leva ‘a e mamahi ‘o e taimi ko ia ‘e fakapo‘uli ‘a e la‘ā, pea ‘e tuku ‘e he māhina ‘ene huhulu, pea ‘e ngangana ‘a e ngaahi fetu‘u mei langi, pea ‘e ngatōtō ‘a e ngaahi mālohinga ‘o e ngaahi langi:
40024030	pea ‘e toki hā ‘i he langi ‘a e faka‘ilonga ‘o e Fanautama ‘a Tangata; pea ‘e toki lau‘aitu ‘a e ngaahi matakali ‘o māmani, pea te nau sio ki he Fanautama ‘a Tangata ‘oku hoko mai, ‘oku ne heka ki he ngaahi ‘ao ‘o e langi pea ha‘u mo ia ‘a e fakangeingei mo e nāunau lahi.
40024031	Pea te ne fekau atu ‘ene kau ‘āngelo ke ifi ‘a e talupite lahi; pea te nau tānaki ‘ene kakai fili mei he matangi ‘e fā, mei he ngata‘anga ‘e taha ‘o e ngaahi langi ‘o a‘u ki hono ngata‘anga ‘e taha.
40024032	Mou ma‘u mei he fiki hono fakatātā; ‘oka muimui hono muka pea ne kamata lau, ‘oku mou ‘ilo ‘oku ofi ‘a e fa‘ahita‘u māfana:
40024033	pehē foki kimoutolu ka mou ka mamata ki he ngaahi me‘a ko ia pea mou ‘ilo kuo panaki ia, ‘io, kuo a‘u ki he matapā.
40024034	He ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘E ‘ikai ‘aupito mole ‘a e to‘utangata ko eni, kae‘oua ke hoko ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia kotoa pē.
40024035	‘E mole ‘a e langi mo māmani, ka ko ‘eku ngaahi lea ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito mole.
40024036	Ka ko e me‘a ki he ‘aho ko ia mo hono houa, ‘oku ‘ikai ha taha ‘oku ‘ilo ki ai; ‘io, pe ko e kau ‘āngelo ‘i he langi; pea na‘a mo e ‘Alo ‘oku ‘ikai; ngata pē ‘i he Tamai toko taha.
40024037	Kae hangē ko e taimi ‘o Noa, ‘e pehē foki ‘a e hoko mai ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata.
40024038	He hangē na‘e nofo ‘a e kakai ‘i he kuonga ‘o e Lōmaki, ‘o nau kai mo inu, ‘o nau ma‘u uaifi mo ma‘u husepāniti, ‘o a‘u ki he ‘aho ko ia na‘e hū ai ‘a Noa ki he ‘a‘ake;
40024039	pea na‘e ‘ikai te nau ‘alo‘iloa kae‘oua ke hoko mai ‘a e Lōmaki, ‘o ‘ave kinautolu fuli pē: ‘e pehē foki ‘a e hoko mai ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata.
40024040	Ko e taimi ko ia, ‘ene tokaange ha ongo me‘a te na ‘i he ngoue; ‘e ‘ave ‘a e taha, kae tuku ‘a e taha.
40024041	‘Ene tokaange ha ongo fafine ‘oku fai ‘ena momosi koane; ‘e ‘ave ‘a e taha kae tuku ‘a e taha.
40024042	Ko ia, ke mou le‘o; he ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo pe ko e ‘aho fē ‘e hoko mai ai ‘a homou ‘Eiki.
40024043	Ka ko e me‘a ko eni ‘oku mou lāu‘ilo ki ai, ‘oka ne tokamea‘i ‘e he Tangata‘eiki pe ko e uasi fē ‘e ha‘u ai ‘a e kaiha‘a, pehē ne le‘o, ‘o ‘ikai tuku hono fale ke haea.
40024044	Ko ia, ke toka teuteu ‘a kimoutolu foki: he ko e hoko mai ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata ‘e fai ‘i ha taimi ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ‘amanaki ai kiate ia.
40024045	‘Io, ko hai nai ‘a e tamaio‘eiki lototō mo fai fakapotopoto, ‘a ia ne fakanofo ‘e he‘ene ‘eiki ke pule‘i hono kau nofo‘anga, mo ‘ange ‘enau me‘akai ‘i hono taimi totonu?
40024046	Monū‘ia ā ‘a e tamaio‘eiki ko ia, ‘a ia ‘e ‘iloa ‘e he‘ene ‘eiki ‘i he‘ene hoko mai, ‘oku ne fai pehē.
40024047	Ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, te ne fakanofo ia ke ne pule ki he‘ene ngaahi me‘a kotoa.
40024048	Ka ‘oka ka pehē ‘e he tamaio‘eiki kovi ko ena ‘i hono loto, ‘oku fakatotoka ‘e he‘eku ‘eiki ‘ene ha‘u;
40024049	Pea ne hanga ai ‘o haha ‘a kinautolu ‘oku ‘i he kau ngāue mo ia, pea ne kai foki mo inu kava mo e kau inu;
40024050	‘e toki ha‘u ‘a e ‘eiki ‘a e tamaio‘eiki ko ia ‘i ha ‘aho ‘oku ‘ikai te ne ‘amanekina ia, pea mo ha houa ‘oku ‘ikai te ne ‘ilo ki ai,
40024051	pea te ne fahi ua ia, pea tu‘utu‘uni ke ‘inasi fakataha ia mo e kau mā‘oni‘oni loi. Ko e potu ia ‘e toki hoko ai ‘a e tangi mo e fengai‘itaki ‘o e nifo.
40025001	‘I he taimi ko ia ko e fakatātā ‘o e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani ko e tu‘unga tāupo‘ou ‘e toko hongofulu, ‘a ia na‘a nau takitaha to‘o ‘ene maama, ‘o ‘alu mei ‘api ke kau ‘i he fakafetaulaki ‘o e ‘eiki ta‘ane.
40025002	Pea ko honau toko nima ko e kau fai vale, ka ko e toko nima ko e kau fai fakapotopoto:
40025003	he ko e kau fai vale na‘a nau to‘o ‘enau ngaahi maama, ka na‘e ‘ikai ha‘u mo kinautolu ha lolo;
40025004	ka ko kinautolu na‘e fai fakapotopoto na‘e ha‘u mo kinautolu ha lolo ‘i he ngaahi hina na‘e kau ki he‘enau ngaahi maama.
40025005	Pea ‘i he fakatotoka ‘a e ‘eiki ta‘ane, na‘a nau tulemohe kotoa pē ‘o mohe.
40025006	Ka ‘i he tu‘uapō na‘e pā mai ha kalanga, Ko e ‘eiki ta‘ane ‘eni, mou ‘alu atu ‘o fakafetaulaki kiate ia.
40025007	Toki ‘ā hake kotoa pē ‘a e kau tāupo‘ou ko ia, ‘o takitaha ngaohi ‘ene maama.
40025008	Pea lea ‘e he kau fai vale ki he kau fai fakapotopoto, Tuku mai ha me‘a mei ho‘omou lolo, he ‘oku tei mate ‘emau ngaahi maama.
40025009	Ka ka tali ‘a e kau fakapotopoto ‘o nau pehē, Ka na‘a ‘iloange ‘e ‘ikai fe‘unga mo kimautolu mo kimoutolu fakatou‘osi: mou ō mu‘a ki he kau fakatau, ‘o fakatau ma‘amoutolu.
40025010	Kae lolotonga ‘enau ‘alu mei ai ke fakatau, mo e ha‘u ‘a e ‘eiki ta‘ane; pea ko kinautolu kuo ‘osi ‘enau teu na‘a nau ‘alu atu mo ia ‘o hū ki he kātoanga, pea tāpuni ‘a e matapā.
40025011	Pea ha‘u tōmui ‘a hono toe ‘o e kau tāupo‘ou, ‘o nau pehē, ‘Eiki, ‘Eiki, to‘o kiate kimautolu.
40025012	Ka ka tali ‘e ia ‘o ne pehē, Ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘oku ‘ikai te u ‘iloa kimoutolu.
40025013	Ko ia, mou le‘o, he ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo hono ‘aho, ‘uma‘ā hono houa.
40025014	He ko e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani ‘oku hangē ko ha tangata na‘e teu ‘alu ki muli, pea ne ui ange ‘ene kau tamaio‘eiki ‘a‘ana, ‘o ne tuku kiate kinautolu ‘ene koloa.
40025015	Ko e toko taha na‘a ne ‘ange ki ai ‘a e taleniti ‘e nima, pea ua ki he toko taha, pea taha ki he toko taha; ‘o fakatatau ki he‘enau mafai takitaha; pea ne ‘alu leva ki muli.
40025016	Pea ‘alu ‘a ia na‘a ne ma‘u ‘a e taleniti ‘e nima, ‘o ne ngāue‘aki ia, ‘o ne fakatupu ‘aki ha nima kehe.
40025017	Pehē foki mo ia na‘e ‘a‘ana ‘a e ua, na‘a ne ma‘u mo ha ua kehe.
40025018	Ka ko ia na‘a ne ma‘u ‘a e taha, na‘a ne ‘alu leva ‘o keli ha luo, ‘o ne fufū ai ‘a e pa‘anga ‘a ‘ene ‘eiki.
40025019	Pea fuoloa, fuoloa, pea ha‘u ‘a e ‘eiki ‘a e kau tamaio‘eiki ko ia, ‘o ne sivi ‘enau tohi.
40025020	Pea ‘unu‘unu mai ‘a ia na‘a ne ma‘u ‘a e taleniti ‘e nima, ‘o ne ha‘u mo ia mo ha taleniti kehe ‘e nima, ‘o ne pehē, ‘Eiki, na‘a ke tuku mai ha taleniti ‘e nima: vakai, kuo u ma‘u mai mo ha nima kehe.
40025021	Pea me‘a mai ‘e he‘ene ‘eiki, Mālō, si‘i tamaio‘eiki lelei mo lototō; kuo ke lototō ‘i ho‘o pule ki ha ngaahi me‘a si‘i, te u fakanofo koe ke pule ki ha ngaahi me‘a lahi: hū koe ki he fiefia‘anga ‘o ho‘o ‘Eiki.
40025022	Pea ‘unu‘unu mai mo ia na‘e ‘a‘ana ‘a e taleniti ‘e ua, ‘o ne pehē, ‘Eiki, na‘a ke tuku mai ha taleniti ‘e ua: vakai kuo u ma‘u mai mo ha ua kehe.
40025023	Pea me‘a mai ‘ene ‘eiki, Mālō, si‘i tamaio‘eiki lelei mo lototō; kuo ke lolotō ‘i he pule ki ha ngaahi me‘a si‘i, te u fakanofo koe ke pule ki ha ngaahi me‘a lahi: hū koe ki he fiefia‘anga ‘o ho‘o ‘eiki.
40025024	Pea ‘unu‘unu mai mo ia kuo ne ma‘u ‘a e taleniti ‘e taha, ‘o ne pehē, ‘Eiki, ne u ‘ilo koe ko e tangata faingata‘a; ko ho‘o anga ke utu ‘i he potu na‘e ‘ikai te ke tō ta‘u ai, pea ke tānaki ‘i he potu na‘e ‘ikai te ke ‘au‘au ai:
40025025	pea u manavahē, pea u ‘alu ‘o fufū ho‘o taleniti ‘i he kelekele: ‘ē, ko ena ā ho‘o me‘a.
40025026	Ka ka tali ‘e he‘ene ‘eiki, ‘o ne folofola mai, ‘a e tamaio‘eiki pau‘u mo fakapikopiko! na‘a ke ‘ilo koā ‘oku ou utu ‘i he potu na‘e ‘ikai te u tō ta‘u ai, pea tānaki ‘i he potu na‘e ‘ikai te u ‘au‘au ai, ‘ō?
40025027	pea na‘e mei totonu ai ke ke lī ‘a ‘eku pa‘anga ki he kau tauhi pangikē; pehē kuo u ma‘u mei ai ‘eku me‘a, mo hono fua foki, ‘i he‘eku ha‘u ni.
40025028	Ko ia, mou to‘o ‘a e taleniti meiate ia, pea tuku kiate ia ‘oku ma‘u ‘a e hongofulu.
40025029	He ‘ilonga ha taha ‘oku ma‘u ha me‘a ‘e ‘ange ki ai mo ha me‘a, pea te ne hulu atu: ka ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai ke ma‘u, na‘a mo e me‘a ‘oku ne ma‘u ‘e to‘o meiate ia.
40025030	Ka mou lī ‘a e tamaio‘eiki ta‘e‘aonga ki he po‘uli ‘o tua‘ā. Ko e potu ia ‘e toki hoko ai ‘a e tangi mo e fengai‘itaki ‘o e nifo.
40025031	Ka ‘oka ‘iloange ‘e hoko mai ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata, kuo ne ‘ai hono nāunau, pea ha‘ofia ia ‘e he kau ‘āngelo kotoa pē, te ne toki nofo ‘i hono taloni lāngilangi‘ia:
40025032	pea ‘e fakatahataha ki hono ‘ao ‘a e ngaahi kakai kotoa pē; pea te ne vahe‘i kinautolu, ‘o hangē ‘oku vahe‘i ‘e ha tauhi sipi ‘a e fanga sipi mei he fanga kosi:
40025033	pea te ne fokotu‘u ‘a e fanga sipi mei hono to‘omata‘u, ka ko e fanga kosi mei hono to‘ohema.
40025034	Pea ‘e toki folofola ‘e he Tu‘i kiate kinautolu ‘i hono to‘omata‘u, Omi kimoutolu, ‘a e fa‘ahinga kuo fakamonū‘ia ‘e he‘eku Tamai, ‘o mou hoko ki he pule‘anga kuo toka teuteu mo‘omoutolu talu e tanu pou ‘o māmani:
40025035	he na‘a ku fiekaia, pea mou ‘omi ha‘aku kai; na‘a ku fie inu, pea mou ‘omi haku inu; na‘a ku ‘āunofo,
40025036	pea mou fakaafe‘i au; na‘e ‘ikai haku kofu, pea mou fakakofu au; na‘a ku mahaki, pea mou omi hoku vakai; na‘a ku ‘i he pilīsone, pea mou ‘a‘ahi mai.
40025037	Pea ‘e toki tali ‘a e kau fai lelei, ‘o pehē, ‘Ēī, ‘anefē ha‘amau ‘ilo koe ‘oku ke hālofia, pea mau tauhi ange? pe fie epu pea mau ‘atu ha epu?
40025038	Pea ‘anefē ha‘amau ‘ilo koe ‘oku ke ‘āunofo, pea mau fakaafe, pe ta‘ekofu pea mau fakakofu?
40025039	Pea ‘anefē ha‘amau ‘ilo koe ‘oku ke tengetange, pe mo‘ua ‘i he pilīsone pea mau ‘a‘ahi atu?
40025040	Pea ‘e tali ‘e he Tu‘i, ‘o ne folofola mai, Ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘I ho‘omou fai pehē ki ha taha ‘o hoku ngaahi tokoua mama‘o ni, na‘a mou fai ia kiate au.
40025041	Te ne toki folofola foki kiate kinautolu ‘i he to‘ohema, ‘Alu meiate au, ‘a kimoutolu kuo mala‘ia, ki he afi ta‘engata ‘a ia ne teuteu ma‘a e Tēvolo mo ‘ene kau ‘āngelo:
40025042	he na‘a ku fiekaia, ka na‘e ‘ikai te mou ‘omi ha‘aku kai; na‘a ku fie inu, ka na‘e ‘ikai te mou ‘omi haku inu;
40025043	na‘a ku ‘āunofo, ka na‘e ‘ikai te mou fakaafe au; na‘a ku ta‘ekofu, ka na‘e ‘ikai te mou fakakofu au; na‘a ku mahaki, pea mo‘ua ‘i he pilīsone, ka na‘e ‘ikai te mou omi haku vakai.
40025044	Pea ‘e toki tali mo kinautolu, ‘o pehē, ‘Ēī, ‘anefē ha‘amau ‘ilo koe ‘oku ke hālofia, pe fie epu, pe ‘āunofo, pe ta‘ekofu, pe tengetange, pe mo‘ua ‘i he pilīsone, ‘o ‘ikai te mau tokoni atu?
40025045	Pea te ne toki tali kiate kinautolu, ‘o pehē, Ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Ko e ‘ikai te mou fai pehē ki ha taha ‘o e fa‘ahinga mama‘o ni, ko e ‘ikai ia te mou fai kiate au.
40025046	Pea ‘e ‘alu atu ‘a kinautolu ni ki he tautea ta‘engata: ka ko e fai lelei ki he mo‘ui ta‘engata.
40026001	PEA ko eni, ‘i he faka‘osi ‘e Sīsū ‘ene ngaahi lea ko ia kotoa, na‘a ne pehē ki he‘ene kau ako,
40026002	‘Oku mou ‘ilo ‘oku toe ha ‘aho ‘e ua pea hoko ‘a e Pāsova, pea ‘e tukuange ai ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata ke kalusefai.
40026003	Ko e taimi ko ia na‘e fakataha ‘a e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki, mo e kau mātu‘a ‘o e kakai ‘Isileli, ki he loto‘ā ‘o e Taula‘eiki Lahi, ‘a ia ko hono hingoa ko Kaiafasi;
40026004	pea na‘a nau puleaki‘i ha‘anau puke fakaolo kia Sīsū, ‘o tāmate‘i.
40026005	Ka na‘a nau pehē, ‘oua ‘e fai lolotonga ‘a e kātoanga, na‘a ai ha maveuveu ‘i he kakai.
40026006	Pea ko eni, lolotonga ‘a e nofo ‘a Sīsū ‘i Pētani, ‘i he fale ‘o Saimone ko e kilia,
40026007	mo e ‘unu‘unu mai ha fefine kuo ha‘u mo ia ha hina ‘alapasita, na‘e fonu ‘i he lolo tākai mātu‘aki mahu‘inga, ‘o ne lilingi ia ki hono fofonga, lolotonga ‘ene tokoto ‘i he kai.
40026008	Pea ‘i he sio ki ai ‘e he kau ako na‘a nau lāunga, ‘o nau pehē, Ko e maumau me‘a pehē koe‘uma‘ā?
40026009	He ka ne fakatau ia, ne ma‘u ai ha me‘a lahi ke foaki ki he masiva.
40026010	Ka ka mea‘i ‘e Sīsū, ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Ko e hā ‘oku mou fakamamahi ai ki he fefine? He ko e ngāue lelei kuo ne fai kiate au.
40026011	He ko e me‘a ki he masiva te mou feangai ai pē mo kinautolu; ka ‘e ‘ikai te mou feangai ai pē mo au.
40026012	He ko ‘ene laku? ‘a e lolo ni ki hoku sino, ko ‘ene fai pē ko e teu hoku ‘anga‘anga ki fa‘itoka.
40026013	Ko au ē ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘Ilonga ha potu ‘i māmani kātoa ‘e malanga‘aki ai ‘a e Kōsipeli ni, ‘e lea‘aki ai foki ‘a e me‘a ne fai ‘e si‘i fefine ni, ko e fakamanatu kiate ia.
40026014	Ko e taimi ko ia na‘e ‘alu ki he hou‘eiki taula‘eiki ha toko taha ‘o e kau Hongofulumāua, ‘a ia ko hono hingoa ko Siutasi ‘Isikāliote,
40026015	‘o ne pehē, Ko e hā te mou fie ‘omi ka u lavaki‘i ia kiate kimoutolu? Pea nau tu‘utu‘uni ma‘ana ha konga siliva ‘e tolungofulu.
40026016	Pea mei he taimi ko ia na‘a ne kumi ha faingamālie ke lavaki‘i ia.
40026017	Pea ‘i he ‘uluaki ‘o e ngaahi ‘aho tapu lēvani, na‘e ‘unu‘unu mai ‘a e kau ako kia Sīsū, ‘o nau pehē, Ko e potu fē ‘oku ke loto ke mau teuteu ai ma‘au ke ke ‘ilo ‘a e Pāsova?
40026018	Pea ne pehē, Mole ki he kolo kia Me‘a, pea lea ki ai, ‘Oku pehē ‘e he Tangata‘eiki, ‘oku ofi hoku taimi, ka u fai ‘i ho fale ‘a e Pāsova mo ‘eku kau ako.
40026019	Pea na‘e fai ‘e he kau ako, ‘o hangē ko e tu‘utu‘uni kinaua ‘e Sīsū, ‘o na teuteu ‘a e Pāsova.
40026020	Pea ‘i he‘ene efiafi na‘a ne tokoto hifo ke kai, fakataha mo e kau Hongofulumāua ‘o ‘ene ako.
40026021	Pea lolotonga ‘enau kai na‘a ne pehē, Ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Ko e toko taha ‘iate kimoutolu te ne lavaki‘i au.
40026022	Pea nau loto mamahi ‘aupito, ‘o nau kamata lea kiate ia tāutaha, ‘oku ‘ikai nai ko au, ‘Eiki, ‘ē?
40026023	Pea tali ‘e ia, ‘o ne pehē, Ko ia kuo ne velo fakataha mo au hono nima ki he tisi, ko ia ia te ne lavaki‘i au.
40026024	‘Oku mo‘oni ko e mole ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata ‘oku hangē ko ia kuo tohi ma‘ana, ka ‘oiauē ‘a e tangata ko ia, ‘a ia te ne lavaki‘i ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata! ne ngutuhua ange ki he tangata ko ia ‘oka ne ‘ikai fanau‘i.
40026025	Pea tali ‘e Siutasi, ‘a ia na‘a ne lavaki‘i ia, ‘o pehē, ‘oku ‘ikai nai ko au, Lāpai, ‘ē? Pea ne pehē ki ai, ‘E toe lau?
40026026	Pea lolotonga ‘enau kai, na‘e to‘o ‘e Sīsū ha fo‘i mā, ‘o ne tāpuaki ia, mo ne pakipaki ‘o tufaki ki he kau ako, ‘o ne pehē, To‘o ‘o kai; ko hoku sino ‘eni.
40026027	Na‘a ne to‘o foki ha ipu, mo ne fakafeta‘i, ‘o ne ‘ange kiate kinautolu, mo ne pehē, Mou inu kotoa pē mei ai;
40026028	he ko hoku toto ‘eni ko e toto fuakava, ‘a ia ‘oku lilingi koe‘uhi ko e tokolahi ke lava ai ‘a e fakamolemole angahala.
40026029	Ka ‘oku ou tala atu, hili ‘eni ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito te u inu mei he fua ko eni ‘o e vaine, ‘o a‘u ki he ‘aho ko ia te u toki inu ia kuo fo‘ou ‘i he pule‘anga ‘o ‘eku Tamai, fakataha mo kimoutolu.
40026030	Pea hili ‘enau fai ha hiva, na‘a nau ‘alu ki he mo‘unga ko ‘Ōlive.
40026031	Pea toki pehē ‘e Sīsū kiate kinautolu, Te mou tūkia kotoa pē ‘iate au he pō ni: he kuo tohi, Te u taa‘i ‘a e tauhi, pea ‘e movete ‘a e fanga sipi kuo ne tauhi.
40026032	Ka ‘oka hili hoku fokotu‘u, te u mu‘omu‘a ‘iate kimoutolu ki Kāleli.
40026033	Ka ka tali ‘e Pita ‘o ne pehē ki ai, Neongo ‘e tūkia kotoa pē ‘iate koe, ka ko au ‘e ‘ikai te u tūkia ‘o ta‘engata.
40026034	Pea lea ‘a Sīsū ki ai, Ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Ko e pō ni, ‘i he te‘eki ke ‘u‘ua ‘a e moa, ‘e tu‘o tolu mālō ha‘o fakafisinga au.
40026035	Pea pehē ‘e Pita ki ai, ‘E ‘ikai ‘aupito te u fakafisinga koe, neongo ‘e iku pē ki ha‘aku mate mo koe. Pehē foki mo e lau ‘ene kau ako kotoa.
40026036	Pea toki hoko ‘a Sīsū mo kinautolu ki ha potu ‘oku ui ko Ketisemani, pea ne pehē ki he‘ene kau ako, Mou nofo hē, ka u ‘alu ki hena ‘o lotu.
40026037	Pea ne ‘ave ‘a Pita, mo e ongo foha ‘o Sēpeti, pea ne kamata ke mamahi hono loto ‘o hoha‘a lahi.
40026038	Pea pehē ‘e ia kiate kinautolu, ‘oku mamahi fu‘u hoku laumālie, ‘o hangē ka mate; mou tatali ‘i heni ‘o fe‘ao mo au.
40026039	Pea ne ‘unu‘unu si‘i atu, ‘o ne fo‘ohifo ki hono fofonga, ‘o ne hū ‘o pehē, ‘Alā Tamai, kapau ‘e lava, tuku ke tolona ‘a e ipu ni meiate au: kaekehe ke ‘oua na‘a fai ki hoku loto, ka ki ho‘ou pē.
40026040	Pea ne ha‘u ki he kau ako, ‘o ne ‘ilo kinautolu ‘oku nau mohe; pea ne pehē kia Pita, ‘oku pehē koā ho‘omou ta‘elava ke ‘ā mo au ‘o houa taha?
40026041	Le‘o pē mo lotu; ke ‘oua na‘a mou hū ki ha ‘ahi‘ahi: ‘oku loto pē ‘a laumālie ke fai, ka ‘oku vaivai ‘a kakano.
40026042	Pea toe ‘alu ia hono tu‘o ua, ‘o lotu, ‘o pehē, ‘Alā Tamai, kapau ‘e ‘ikai lava ke tolona ‘eni, ka ‘i he‘eku inu ia, pea ke fai ho finangalo.
40026043	Pea toe ha‘u ia ‘o ne ‘ilo kinautolu ‘oku nau kei mohe pē: he na‘e mafatukituki honau mata.
40026044	Pea ne tuku kinautolu, ‘o toe ‘alu ke lotu, ‘o ne toe fai‘aki ‘a e lea ko ia.
40026045	Pea toki ha‘u ia ki he kau ako, ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Mohe ai pē ā ‘eni mo mālōlō: ‘ē, kuo ofi ‘a e taimi, pea ‘oku lavaki‘i ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata ki he kau angahala.
40026046	Mou tu‘u, tau ō; vakai kuo ofi mai hoku lavaki‘i.
40026047	Pea lolotonga ‘ene kei lea, tā ‘oku ha‘u ‘a Siutasi, ‘a ia ko e taha ‘o e kau Hongofulumāua, pea ha‘u mo ia ha fu‘u kakai tokolahi ‘oku nau fakaheletā mo faka‘akau, ko e omi mei he hou‘eiki taula‘eiki, mo e kau mātu‘a ‘o e kakai.
40026048	Pea ko hono lavaki kuo ne tuku kiate kinautolu ha faka‘ilonga, he‘ene pehē, Ka u ka ‘uma ki ha taha, ko ia ia, mou puke.
40026049	Pea ‘unu‘unu leva ia kia Sīsū, ‘o ne pehē, Lāpai, si‘oto‘ofa; ‘o ne ‘uma lolomi kiate ia.
40026050	Pea pehē ‘e Sīsū ki ai, Siana, ko e me‘a kuo ke ha‘u ai – Pea toki ‘unu‘unu mai ‘a e kakai, ‘o nau ala mālohi kia Sīsū, ‘o puke ia.
40026051	Pea ‘iloange, ko ha toko taha ‘iate kinautolu na‘e kau mo Sīsū na‘a ne ala ‘o unuhi ‘ene heletā, ‘o ne taa‘i ‘a e tamaio‘eiki ‘a e Taula‘eiki Lahi, ‘o ne tu‘usi hono lau‘i telinga.
40026052	Pea toki pehē ‘e Sīsū ki ai, Fakafoki ho‘o heletā ki hono tu‘unga; he ‘ilonga kinautolu ‘oku ala ki he heletā te nau mate heletā.
40026053	He ‘oku ke pehē koā ‘oku faingata‘a kiate au ke kole ‘eni ki he‘eku ‘Eiki, ke ne ‘omi ha konga kau ‘āngelo ‘e hongofulu mā ua, pe lahi hake, ke tapa kiate au?
40026054	Kae fakamo‘oni fēfē ai ‘a e ngaahi folofola, ‘a ia ‘oku fakahā kuo pau ke hoko ‘o pehē?
40026055	Ko e taimi ko ia na‘e lea ai ‘e Sīsū ki he kakai, Ko ho‘omou omi fakaheletā mo faka‘akau ke puke au, ‘o hangē ko ha kaiha‘akau au! Ko e ‘aho kotoa pē na‘a ku nofo ‘i he Temipale ‘o faiako, ka na‘e ‘ikai te mou puke au.
40026056	Ka ko e fai ‘eni kotoa pē, koe‘uhi ke fakamo‘oni ki he ngaahi folofola ‘a e kau palōfita. Pea na‘e toki li‘aki ia ‘e he kau ako kotoa, ‘o nau hola.
40026057	Pea ko kinautolu na‘e puke ‘a Sīsū na‘a nau taki ange ki he fale ‘o Kaiafasi, ko e Taula‘eiki Lahi, ‘a ia kuo fakataha ai ‘a e kau sikalaipe mo e kau mātu‘a.
40026058	Pea muimui atu ki ai ‘a Pita mei he mama‘o, ‘o a‘u ki he loto‘ā ‘o e Taula‘eiki Lahi, pea ne hū ki loto, ‘o ne nofo mo e kau ‘ōfisa ke vakai ‘a e me‘a ‘e hoko.
40026059	Pea ko e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki, mo e Sanetalimi kātoa, na‘a nau fiu‘a kumi ha tukuaki‘i ‘o Sīsū, ke nau tāmate‘i ia;
40026060	ka na‘e ‘ikai te nau ma‘u, neongo na‘e ‘i ai ha tokolahi na‘e tu‘u mai ke tukuaki‘i ia.
40026061	Ka na‘e faifai pea tu‘u mai ha toko ua ‘o na pehē, Na‘e lau ‘a e siana ni, Faingofua kiate au ke vete ‘a e Fale Tapu ‘o e ‘Otua, ‘o toe langa ‘i he ‘aho ‘e tolu.
40026062	Pea tu‘u ‘a e Taula‘eiki-lahi, ‘o ne pehē kiate ia, ‘Oku ‘ikai ha‘o tali ki he me‘a ‘oku talatalaaki‘i ai koe ‘e he tu‘unga me‘a ni?
40026063	Ka ka fakalongo pē ‘a Sīsū. Pea toe lea ‘e he Taula‘eiki-lahi, ‘o ne pehē ki ai, ‘Oku ou hū atu ‘i he ‘Otua ‘oku ‘afio ni, ke ke tala mai pe ko e Mīsaia koe, ko e ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otua.
40026064	Pea tali ‘a Sīsū ki ai, Ko ia pē ‘oku ke me‘a: ka ‘oku ou tala atu, hili ‘eni te mou mamata ki he Fanautama ‘a Tangata, ‘oku ne nofo ki he nima to‘omata‘u ‘o Mālohi, pea ‘oku ne hoko mai ‘oku heka ki he ngaahi ‘ao ‘o e langi.
40026065	Pea na‘e toki hae hifo ‘e he Taula‘eiki-lahi hono kofu ‘o‘ona, ‘o ne pehē, Kuo ne lea fie‘otua; koe‘uma‘ā ‘etau toe kumi fakamo‘oni? Ko eni kuo mou toki fanongo ni ki he lea fie‘otua.
40026066	Ko e hā ho‘omou poa? Pea nau tali ‘o pehē, Ko e tangata ia ke mate.
40026067	Pea nau toki ‘anuhi hono fofonga, pea nau tuki‘i ia; pea sipi‘i ia ‘e ha ni‘ihi,
40026068	‘o nau pehē, ‘E Mīsaia, mate mai pe ko hai na‘e taa‘i koe.
40026069	Pea nofo pē ‘a Pita ‘i tu‘a ‘i he loto‘ā: pea ‘unu‘unu ki ai ha toko taha, ko ha kaunanga, ‘o ne pehē, Ko koe foki na‘a ke ‘ia Sīsū mei Kāleli.
40026070	Pea ne faka‘ikai ‘i he ‘ao ‘onautolu kotoa pē, he‘ene pehē, ‘oku ‘ikai te u ‘ilo pe ko ho‘o lau ki he hā.
40026071	Pea kuo ne ‘alu ki he falehū‘anga, pea sio kiate ia ‘e ha fefine ‘e taha, pea ne pehē kiate kinautolu ‘i he potu ko ia, Ko e siana ni foki na‘e ‘ia Sīsū mei Nāsaleti.
40026072	Pea toe faka‘ikai ‘e ia, ‘o ne lea tuki, ‘oku ‘ikai te u ‘iloa ‘a e tangata.
40026073	Pea toe si‘i atu na‘e ‘unu‘unu kiate ia ‘a kinautolu na‘e tutu‘u ai, ‘o nau pehē kia Pita, ‘Ā, ‘oku mo‘oni pē ‘oku ke kau koe foki ki he fa‘ahinga ko ia; kae‘uma‘ā ‘oku ke ‘ilonga mei ho‘o fasi.
40026074	Pea toki hanga ia, ‘o tuki mo fuakava, ‘oku ‘ikai te u ‘iloa ‘a e tangata. Pea ‘iloange na‘e ‘u‘ua ‘a e moa.
40026075	Pea manatu ‘e Pita ki he lea na‘e fai ‘e Sīsū, ‘I he te‘eki ke ‘u‘ua ‘a e moa, ‘e tu‘o tolu mālō ha‘o fakafisinga au. Pea ne ‘alu atu kitua‘ā, ‘o ne tangi mamahi.
40027001	PEA pongipongi hake, ko e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki kotoa, mo e kau mātu‘a ‘o e kakai, na‘a nau puleaki‘i ‘a Sīsū ke lava hano tāmate‘i;
40027002	pea nau ha‘i ia, ‘o taki ange, ‘o tuku kia Pailato ko e kōvana.
40027003	Pea ‘i he toki vakai ‘e Siutasi ko hono lavaki, tā kuo fakamāumatea ia, na‘e tautea ia ‘e hono loto, ‘o ne momoi ‘a e konga siliva ‘e tolungofulu ki he hou‘eiki taula‘eiki mo e kau mātu‘a,
40027004	‘o ne pehē, Kuo u faihala, he kuo u lavaki‘i ke mate ‘a e ta‘ehalaia. Ka ka pehē ‘e kinautolu, He ‘oku mau kau ai? ‘oku ‘iate koe pē ia.
40027005	Pea ne laku ‘a e ngaahi konga siliva ki he Fale Tapu, ‘o ne foki, pea ne toki ‘alu ‘o no‘o u‘a.
40027006	Pea to‘o ‘e he hou‘eiki taula‘eiki ‘a e ngaahi konga siliva, ‘o nau pehē, ‘oku ‘ikai ngofua ke lī ‘eni ki he pa‘anga ‘a e siasi, he ko e totongi toto.
40027007	Pea hili ‘enau fakakaukau, na‘a nau hanga ‘o fakatau ‘aki ‘a e ‘api ‘o e tufunga ipu ‘umea mo fa‘itoka ‘o e ‘āunofo.
40027008	Ko hono ‘uhinga ia ‘o e ui ‘a e ‘api ko ia ‘o a‘u ki he ‘aho ni, ko ‘Api ‘o fakapō
40027009	Pea na‘e toki fakamo‘oni ai ‘a e me‘a ne folofola‘aki ‘ia Selemaia ko e palōfita, ‘o pehē, Pea nau to‘o ‘a e konga siliva ‘e tolungofulu, ko e mahu‘inga tokua ‘o e Toko Taha Ma‘ongo‘onga, ‘a ia na‘a nau fua hono mahu‘inga koe‘uhi ko e kakai ‘Isileli;
40027010	pea na‘a nau ‘ange ia ke fakatau ‘aki ‘a e ‘api ‘o e tufunga ipu ‘umea, ‘o hangē ko e tu‘utu‘uni ‘a e ‘Eiki kiate au.
40027011	Pea na‘e tu‘u ‘a Sīsū ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e Kōvana, pea fakafehu‘i kiate ia ‘e he Kōvana, ‘o pehē, Ko koe ko e Tu‘i ‘o e kakai Siu, ‘ō? Pea pehē ‘e Sīsū ki ai, Ko ia pē ‘oku ke me‘a.
40027012	Pea ‘i hono talatalaaki‘i ia ‘e he hou‘eiki taula‘eiki mo e kau mātu‘a, na‘e ‘ikai te ne tali ha me‘a.
40027013	Pea toki me‘a ‘e Pailato ki ai, ‘oku ‘ikai te ke tokanga koā ki he ngaahi me‘a ‘oku nau faka‘ilo kiate koe, hono taha?
40027014	Ka na‘e ‘ikai te ne toe tali ange ha momo‘i lea ‘e taha; ko ia na‘e ofo ‘aupito ‘a e Kōvana.
40027015	Pea ko e anga ‘a e Kōvana, ‘oka hoko ‘a e Kātoanga, ke ‘ofa ki he kakai ‘o vete ange ha pōpula, ha toko taha te nau loto ki ai.
40027016	Pea na‘e ai hanau toko taha ‘i he taimi ko ia na‘e nofo pilīsone, ko e tangata ‘iloa, ko hono hingoa ko Palāpasa.
40027017	Pea ko eni kuo nau kātoa mai, ko ia na‘e pehē ‘e Pailato kiate kinautolu, ko e fē nai ‘oku mou loto ke u vete atu? ‘A Palāpasa, pe ko Sīsū, ‘oku ui ko Kalaisi?
40027018	He na‘a ne ‘ilo ko e meheka pē kuo nau tukuange ai ia.
40027019	Pea ‘i he‘ene nofo hifo ki he nofo‘anga fakamaau, na‘e fekau ange ‘e hono uaifi ke pehē, ‘oua te ke ala ki he me‘a ‘oku kau ki he tangata mā‘oni‘oni ko ‘ena: he ne u hoha‘a lahi ‘anehengihengi ‘i ha‘aku misi ko e me‘a ‘i he tangata ko ia.
40027020	Pea ko e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki mo e kau mātu‘a na‘a nau fakaloto‘i ‘a e kakai ke nau kole ke tuku mai ‘a Palāpasa, kae tāmate‘i ‘a Sīsū.
40027021	Pea toe me‘a ‘a e Kōvana, ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Ko e fē ‘i he ongo me‘a ni ‘oku mou loto ke u vete atu? Pea nau pehē, Ko Palāpasa.
40027022	Pea pehē ‘e Pailato kiate kinautolu, pea ko e hā ai te u fai kia Sīsū ‘a ia ‘oku ui ko Kalaisi? Pea nau pehē kotoa pē, Ke kalusefai ia.
40027023	Pea pehē ‘e ia, He ko e hā ha kovi kuo ne fai? Ka ka fakautuutu pē ‘enau kalanga, ‘o pehē, Ke kalusefai ia.
40027024	Pea ‘i he vakai ‘e Pailato, tā ‘oku ‘ikai ke felave ha‘ane me‘a, kaekehe ‘oku kamata maveuveu, na‘a ne to‘o ha vai, ‘o ne fanofano ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e kakai, he‘ene pehē, Kuo u ‘ata‘atā au mei he toto ‘o e tangata mā‘oni‘oni ni: ‘oku ‘iate kimoutolu ia.
40027025	Pea tali ‘a e kakai kotoa, ‘o nau pehē, Ko hono toto ke ‘eke kiate kimautolu mo ‘emau fānau.
40027026	Pea ne toki vete kiate kinautolu ‘a Palāpasa, ka ne kau‘imaea ‘a Sīsū, ‘o ne tuku ke kalusefai.
40027027	Pea toki ‘ave ‘a Sīsū ki he Palasi ‘e he kau tau ‘a e Kōvana, ‘o nau tānaki ‘a e vāhenga tau kotoa ke va‘inga‘aki ia.
40027028	Pea nau vete hono kofu, ‘o nau takai kiate ia ha pulupulu kulokula.
40027029	Pea nau fī ha kalauni mei he ‘akau talatala, ‘o ‘ai ki hono fofonga, pea nau ‘ai ha kaho ki hono nima to‘omata‘u; pea nau tū‘ulutui ‘i hono ‘ao, ‘o nau toutou luma kiate ia, ‘o pehē, ‘Ēī, Tu‘i Siu!
40027030	Pea nau ‘anuhi ia, ‘o nau to‘o ‘a e kaho, ‘o toutou taa‘i ‘aki hono fofonga.
40027031	Pea hili ‘enau va‘inga‘aki ia, na‘a nau to‘o meiate ia ‘a e pulupulu, pea nau ‘ai kiate ia hono kofu ‘o‘ona, ‘o nau taki ange ke kalusefai.
40027032	Pea ‘i he‘enau ‘alu atu, na‘a nau ‘ilo ha tangata Sailine, ko hono hingoa ko Saimone: ko e toko taha ko ia na‘a nau kouna ke fua hono kolosi.
40027033	Pea ‘i he‘enau a‘u ki ha potu ‘oku ui ko Kolokota, ‘a ia ‘oku tatau mo e pehē, ko e potu ‘ulupoko,
40027034	na‘a nau ‘ange ke ne inu ha uaine kuo hu‘i ‘aki ‘a e ‘ahu; ka ‘i he‘ene kamata ki ai na‘e ‘ikai te ne loto ke inu.
40027035	Pea hili ‘enau kalusefai ia, na‘a nau tufa talotalo hono ngaahi kofu.
40027036	Pea nau nofo hifo ‘i ai ‘o lamasi ia:
40027037	pea nau ‘ai ki hono funga fofonga ‘a e ‘uhinga ‘o hono tautea, ‘a ia na‘e tohi ‘o pehē KO SĪSŪ ENI KO E TU‘I SIU.
40027038	Pea ‘i he taimi ko ia na‘e kalusefai fakataha mo ia ha ongo kaiha‘akau, ko e toko taha mei he to‘omata‘u mo e toko taha mei he to‘ohema.
40027039	Pea ko e kakai na‘e ‘alu ange na‘a nau tālalakulaku ki ai, mo nau kalokalo honau ‘ulu,
40027040	‘o nau pehē, ‘A e tama holoki Fale Tapu ‘o langa ‘i he ‘aho ‘e tolu, ‘ē, fakahaofi koe. Kapau ko e ‘Alo koe ‘o e ‘Otua, pe‘i ‘alu hifo mei he kolosi.
40027041	Pehē foki mo e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki, na‘a nau kau mo e kau sikalaipe mo e kau mātu‘a ‘i he lea fakamāhuahu,
40027042	‘o pehē, Na‘a ne fakahaofi ‘a e kakai kehe; ka ‘oku ‘ikai te ne lava ke fakahaofi ia. Ko e Tu‘i ‘Isileli tokua ‘eni: tuku ke ne ‘alu hifo leva mei he kolosi, pea te mau tui kiate ia.
40027043	Na‘a ne falala tokua ki he ‘Otua, pea ke ne fakahaofi ni ia, ‘o kapau ‘oku ne ‘ofa kiate ia: he na‘a ne pehē tokua, Ko e ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otua au.
40027044	Pea na‘e pehē foki hono manuki‘i ‘e he ongo kaiha‘akau na‘e kalusefai mo ia.
40027045	Pea na‘e hoko ha po‘uli ki he fonua kotoa mei hono ono ‘o e houa ‘o a‘u ki hono hiva ‘o e houa.
40027046	Pea fe‘unga nai mo hono hiva ‘o e houa na‘e kalanga le‘o lahi ‘a Sīsū, ‘o pehē, ‘Īlai, ‘Īlai, lama sapakatani? ‘A ia ‘oku tatau mo e pehē, ‘E hoku ‘Otua, ‘e hoku ‘Otua, na‘a ke li‘aki au kae hā?
40027047	Pea ko e ni‘ihi ‘iate kinautolu na‘e tutu‘u ‘i he potu ko ia, ‘i he‘enau fanongo ki ai na‘a nau pehē, Tā ‘oku ui ‘a ‘Ilaisiā ‘e he siana ni.
40027048	Pea lele leva honau toko taha, ‘o ne to‘o ha oma, ‘o ne unu ki he vinika, ‘o humaki ‘i ha kaho, pea ‘oange ke ne inu.
40027049	Ka ka pehē mai ‘e hono toe, ‘Ē, tau vakai pe ‘e ha‘u ‘a ‘Ilaisiā ke fakahaofi ia.
40027050	Pea toe kalanga ‘a Sīsū ‘o le‘o lahi, ‘o ne tukuange hono laumālie.
40027051	Pea tā ko e tatau ‘o e Fale Tapu na‘e mahaeua mei ‘olunga ki lalo; pea na‘e ngalulululu ‘a e fonua, pea mafahifahi ‘a e ngaahi makatu‘u;
40027052	pea matangaki ‘a e ngaahi fonualoto; pea na‘e fokotu‘u ‘a e ‘anga‘anga ‘o e kakai mā‘oni‘oni ni‘ihi na‘e mohe ai,
40027053	pea nau ha‘u mei he ngaahi fonualoto hili ‘ene toetu‘u, ‘o nau ‘alu ki he Kolo Tapu, ‘o nau hā ki ha ni‘ihi.
40027054	Pea ko e senituliō, mo kinautolu na‘e kau mo ia ‘i he lama ‘o Sīsū, ‘i he‘enau vakai ki he mofuike, mo e ngaahi me‘a kehekehe na‘e hoko, na‘a nau ilifia ‘aupito; ‘o nau pehē, Tā na‘a ne mo‘oni pē; ko e ‘Alo ia ‘o e ‘Otua.
40027055	Pea na‘e nofo ‘i he potu ko ia ha kau fefine, ‘o nau mamata mai mei he mama‘o; ko e fa‘ahinga ia na‘e muimui kia Sīsū mei Kāleli ke tauhi kiate ia:
40027056	ko honau ni‘ihi ‘a Mele mei Makitala, mo Mele ko e fa‘ē ‘a Sēmisi mo Siose, pea mo e fa‘ē ‘a e ongo foha ‘o Sēpeti.
40027057	Pea ‘i he‘ene efiafi hifo, na‘e ‘alu ange ha tangata koloa‘ia mei ‘Alematea; ko hono hingoa ko Siosifa, pea ko e toko taha foki ia na‘e ako ‘ia Sīsū;
40027058	pea ‘alu ‘a e matāpule ni kia Pailato, ‘o kole ‘a e sino ‘o Sīsū: pea toki fekau ‘e Pailato ke ‘ange ia.
40027059	Pea to‘o ‘e Siosifa ‘a e ‘anga‘anga, ‘o ne teu ‘aki ia ha tupenu mahu‘inga mo ma‘a;
40027060	‘o ne telio ia ‘i hono fonualoto fo‘ou ‘o‘ona, ‘a ia kuo ne foa ‘i he loto maka; ‘o ne fakateka ha fu‘u maka ‘o songo ‘aki ‘a e fonualoto, ‘o ne toki ‘alu:
40027061	ka ka nofo pē ai ‘a Mele mei Makitala mo e Mele ‘e taha, ‘o fehangahangai mo e fa‘itoka.
40027062	Pea ko e ‘aho ‘e taha, ‘a ia ko e ‘aho na‘e hoko mo e Tokonaki, na‘e fakataha ‘a e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki mo e kau Fālesi kia Pailato,
40027063	‘o nau pehē, ‘Eiki, ‘oku mau manatu na‘e lau ‘e he siana kākā ko ena ‘i he‘ene kei mo‘ui, ‘o pehē, Hili ‘a e ‘aho ‘e tolu pea u toetu‘u.
40027064	Ko ia ke ke fekau ke malu‘i ‘a e fonualoto, ‘o a‘u ki hono tolu ‘o e ‘aho, na‘a ‘iloange ‘e omi ‘ene kau ako, ‘o nau kaiha‘asi ia, ‘o nau tala ki he kakai kuo ne toetu‘u mei he mate; pea ‘e ‘ange‘ange ‘a e hē mu‘a ‘i he hē kimui ni.
40027065	Pea pehē ‘e Pailato kiate kinautolu, Ma‘u pē ha kau le‘o: mou ō pē ‘o fai homou tūkuingata hono malu‘i.
40027066	Pea nau ‘alu ‘o malu‘i ‘a e fonualoto ‘aki ha kau le‘o; kae‘uma‘ā na‘a nau sila‘i ‘a e maka.
40028001	PEA ‘i he faka‘osi ‘o e Sāpate, pea kamata hoko ‘a e ‘uluaki ‘aho ‘o e uike, mo e omi ‘a Mele mei Makitala mo e Mele ‘e taha ke vakai ‘a e fa‘itoka.
40028002	Pea ‘iloange na‘e hoko ha fu‘u mofuike: he na‘e hifo mei langi ha ‘āngelo ‘a e ‘Eiki, ‘o ne ‘alu ‘o teka‘i mai ‘a e maka, ‘o ne hekeheka ai.
40028003	Pea na‘e hangē ‘ene hā ko e ‘uhila, pea hinaekiaki hono kofu ‘o hangē ko e sinou:
40028004	Pea tetetete ‘a e kau le‘o ‘i he manavahē kiate ia, ‘o nau hoko ‘o hangē ha mate.
40028005	Pea lea ange ‘a e ‘āngelo, ‘o ne pehē ki he ongo fafine, ‘oua na‘a manavahē kimoua; he ‘oku ou ‘ilo ko ho‘omo kumi ‘a Sīsū na‘e kalusefai.
40028006	‘Oku ‘ikai te ne ‘i heni: he kuo ne toetu‘u, ‘o hangē ko ‘ene me‘a. Omi ‘o mamata ki he potu na‘a ne toka ai.
40028007	Pea mo ō ke vave ‘o tala ki he‘ene kau ako, ‘o pehē, Kuo ne toetu‘u mei he pekia; pea ko eni ‘oku ne mu‘omu‘a kiate kimoutolu ki Kāleli; ko e potu ko ia te mou mamata ai kiate ia: ko ena, kuo u tala atu.
40028008	Pea na laka leva mei he fonualoto, ‘oku na manavahē kae fiefia ‘aupito; ‘o na fe‘atungi ke ongoongoa ki he‘ene kau ako.
40028009	Pea ‘iloange na‘e fakafetaulaki mai ‘a Sīsū kiate kinaua, ‘o ne me‘a mai, Si‘oto‘ofa atu! Pea ‘unu‘unu atu ‘a e ongo fafine, ‘o puke hono va‘e, ‘o hū kiate ia.
40028010	Pea folofola mai ‘a Sīsū kiate kinaua, ‘oua ‘e manavahē: mole pē ‘o fakahā ki si‘oku ngaahi tokoua ke nau, ‘alu ki Kāleli, pea ko e potu ko ia te nau mamata ai kiate au.
40028011	Pea lolotonga ‘ena ō, tā na‘e ‘alu ki kolo ha ni‘ihi ‘i he kau le‘o, ‘o nau fakahā ki he hou‘eiki taula‘eiki ‘a e ngaahi me‘a kuo hoko.
40028012	Pea kuo nau fakataha mo e kau mātu‘a, ‘o fai ‘enau fakakaukau, na‘a nau toki ‘ange ha fu‘u pa‘anga ki he kau sōtia,
40028013	‘o nau pehē, Ko ho‘omou lea ‘eni, Na‘e ha‘u po‘uli ‘ene kau ako, ‘o nau kaiha‘asi ia lolotonga ‘emau mohe.
40028014	Pea kapau ‘e faka‘ilo ia ki he Kōvana, te mau fakahehema‘i ia, ka mou ‘ata‘atā.
40028015	Pea nau to‘o ‘a e pa‘anga, ‘o nau fai ‘o hangē ko honau fale‘i: pea ko hono tala ko ia kuo lau holo ‘i he kakai Siu, ‘o a‘u ki he ‘aho ni.
40028016	Pea ko e kau Hongofulu mā taha ‘o e ako na‘a nau fononga ki Kāleli, ki he mo‘unga ne tu‘utu‘uni ‘e Sīsū kiate kinautolu.
40028017	Pea ‘i he‘enau mamata kiate ia na‘a nau hū: ka na‘e tāla‘a ‘a e ni‘ihi.
40028018	Pea ‘i he ‘unu‘unu mai ‘a Sīsū, na‘a ne folofola kiate kinautolu ‘o pehē, Kuo tuku kiate au ‘a e pule kotoa pē ‘i langi pea ki māmani.
40028019	Ko ia, ke mou ō, ‘o ngaohi ‘a e ngaahi kakai kotoa pē ko ‘eku kau ako, ‘i he papitaiso kinautolu ki he Huafa ‘o e Tamai mo e ‘Alo mo e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni:
40028020	mo e ako‘i kinautolu ke tauhi ‘a e ngaahi me‘a kotoa pē kuo u tu‘utu‘uni atu. Pea ko ‘eni, ‘oku ou ‘iate kimoutolu ‘e au ‘i he ngaahi ‘aho kotoa pē, ‘o a‘u ki he ngata‘anga ‘o māmani
41001001	KO E kamata‘anga ‘o e Kōsipeli ‘o Sīsū Kalaisi, ko e ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otua.
41001002	Hangē pē ko e me‘a kuo tohi ‘i he Palōfita ko ‘Aisea, Vakai ‘oku ou fekau atu hoku fakamelomelo ke mu‘omu‘a kiate koe, ‘A ia te ne ngaohi ho hala.
41001003	Ko e le‘o ‘o ha toko taha ‘oku kalanga he toafa, Mou teuteu ‘a e hā‘ele‘anga ‘o Sihova; Fakatonutonu hono ngaahi hala:
41001004	pehē na‘e ‘i ai ‘a Sione Papitaiso ‘i he toafa, ‘oku ne malanga‘aki ‘a e papitaiso fakatomala ki he fakamolemole ‘o e angahala.
41001005	Pea na‘e ‘alu atu kiate ia ‘a e fonua kātoa ‘o Siutea, mo e kakai Selusalema fuli pē; ‘o nau papitaiso ‘iate ia ‘i he vaitafe ko Soatani, he vete ‘enau ngaahi angahala.
41001006	Pea na‘e ‘ai ‘e Sione ha kofu fulufulu‘i kāmeli, mo ha fakama‘u leta ‘i hono kongaloto; pea ne kai ‘a e fanga he‘e mo e honi vao.
41001007	Pea na‘a ne malanga, ‘o pehē, ‘oku muimui mai ha Toko Taha ‘oku mālohi ‘iate au; ko e Toko Taha ‘oku ‘ikai te u taau ke punou ‘o vete ‘a e nono‘o ‘o hono topuva‘e.
41001008	Na‘a ku papitaiso kimoutolu ‘aki ‘a e vai: ka te ne papitaiso kimoutolu ‘e ia ‘aki ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni.
41001009	Pea na‘e hoko ‘i he kuonga ko ia ‘a e ha‘u ‘a Sīsū mei Nāsaleti ‘i Kāleli, ‘o ne papitaiso ‘ia Sione ‘i Soatani.
41001010	Pea ‘i he‘ene ‘alu hake leva mei he vai, na‘a ne vakai kuo mahae ange ‘a e langi pea ‘oku ‘alu hifo kiate ia ‘a e Laumālie ‘i he tatau ‘o ha lupe.
41001011	Pea na‘e ai ha le‘o mei he langi na‘e pehē mai, Ko hoku ‘alo Pele koe; ko koe kuo u hōifua ai.
41001012	Pea fakapuna leva ia ‘e he Laumālie ki he toafa.
41001013	Pea na‘a ne ‘i he toafa ‘o ‘Aho fāngofulu, he fai hono ‘ahi‘ahi ‘e Sētane; pea na‘a ne ‘i he fanga manu kaivao: pea na‘e tauhi kiate ia ‘a e kau ‘āngelo.
41001014	Pea hili ‘a e tuku ‘o Sione ki he pilīsone, na‘e ‘alu ‘a Sīsū ki Kāleli, ‘o ne malanga‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli ‘a e ‘Otua,
41001015	‘o ne pehē, Kuo kakato hono taimi, pea kuo ofi ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua: mou fakatomala ‘o tui ki he Kōsipeli.
41001016	Pea ‘i he‘ene hā‘ele ange ‘i he matātahi ‘o e Tahi ‘o Kāleli, na‘a ne vakai kia Saimone, pea mo ‘Anitelū ko e tehina ‘o Saimone, ‘oku na lalafo ‘i tahi, he ko e ongo toutai.
41001017	Pea lea ‘a Sīsū kiate kinaua, Mo omi ‘o muimui ‘iate au; pea te u ngaohi kimoua ke mo hoko ko e ongo toutai tangata.
41001018	Pea na li‘aki leva hona kupenga, ‘o muimui kiate ia.
41001019	Pea kuo ne laka si‘i atu, na‘a ne vakai kia Sēmisi ko e foha ‘o Sēpeti, pea mo Sione ko hono tehina, mo kinautolu na‘e ‘i he vaka, ‘oku fai ‘enau pena kupenga.
41001020	Pea ne ui leva kinaua; pea na tuku ‘ena tamai ko Sēpeti ‘i he vaka mo e kau ngāue unga, ‘o na ‘alu mei ai ke muimui kiate ia.
41001021	Pea nau fononga atu ‘o hū ki Kāpaneume; pea ‘i he Sāpate na‘a ne faiako leva ‘i he falelotu.
41001022	Pea na‘e to‘oa honau loto ‘i he anga ‘o ‘ene fai: he na‘a ne ako‘i kinautolu ‘o ngali ko ha pule, ‘o ‘ikai hangē ko e kau sikalaipe.
41001023	Pea na‘e ‘i honau falelotu ha tangata na‘e ulusino ai ha fa‘ahikehe: pea na‘a ne kalanga hake,
41001024	‘o ne pehē, Ko ho hā kimaua, ‘e Sīsū mei Nāsaleti? Kuo ke ha‘u ke faka‘auha kimaua? ‘Oku ou ‘ilo koe, ko e Toko Taha Tapu ‘o e ‘Otua.
41001025	Pea lolomi ia ‘e Sīsū, ‘o ne pehē, Tuku ho‘o lea, pea ke mahu‘i meiate ia.
41001026	Pea hanga ‘a e fa‘ahikehe, ‘o ne fakatekelili‘i ‘a e tangata; mo ne ‘ai ‘ene fu‘u kaila, ‘o ne toki mahu‘i mai.
41001027	Pea nau fu‘u ofo kotoa pē; ‘o nau fefakafehu‘i‘aki ‘iate kinautolu, ‘o pehē, Ko e hā ‘eni? Tā ko e fa‘ahinga ako ‘oku mālohi kehe: he na‘a mo e ngaahi fa‘ahikehe, ‘oku ne kouna pea nau talangofua kiate ia.
41001028	Pea pavake atu leva hono ongoongo ki he feitu‘u kotoa ‘o Kāleli.
41001029	Pea ‘i he‘ene ha‘u leva mei he falelotu, na‘a ne hū ki he fale ‘o Saimone mo ‘Anitelū, ‘oku ‘iate ia ‘a Sēmisi mo Sione.
41001030	Pea na‘e tokoto ai ‘a e fa‘ē ‘a e uaifi ‘o Saimone, ‘oku puke ‘i he mofi: pea nau lea leva kia Sīsū ‘i he fefine.
41001031	Pea tu‘u atu ia ki ai, ‘o ne puke hono nima ‘o fokotu‘u; pea mahu‘i leva ‘a e mofi meiate ia, pea ne hanga ‘o tauhi kinautolu.
41001032	Pea ‘i he efiafi, kuo tō ‘a e la‘ā, na‘a nau ‘omai kiate ia ‘a e kakai kotoa pē na‘e puke, pea mo e kau ‘āvea.
41001033	Pea tefua mai ‘a e kolo kotoa ki he matapā ‘o e fale.
41001034	Pea na‘a ne fakamo‘ui ha ni‘ihi ‘iate kinautolu na‘e puke ‘i he fa‘ahinga mahaki kehekehe, mo ne kapusi ha ni‘ihi ‘i he kau tēvolo; pea na‘e ‘ikai te ne tuku ke lea ‘a e kau tēvolo, koe‘uhi na‘a nau ‘ilo ia.
41001035	Pea ofi ki he ‘aho, kae kei fakapo‘uli ‘aupito, na‘a ne tu‘u hake ‘o ‘alu ki tu‘a; ‘o ne mole ki ha potu na‘e lala, ‘o ne lotu ai.
41001036	Pea tuli kiate ia ‘a Saimone mo kinautolu na‘e ‘iate ia:
41001037	pea ‘i he‘enau ‘ilo ia na‘a nau pehē ki ai, ‘oku fiema‘u koe ‘e he kakai kotoa.
41001038	Pea pehē ‘e ia kiate kinautolu, tau ō ki ha potu kehe, ki he ngaahi vilisi ofi mai, koe‘uhi ke u malanga ki ai foki: he ko ia ia na‘a ku ha‘u ai.
41001039	Pea na‘a ne ‘i ai, ‘o malanga ‘i honau ngaahi falelotu ke ‘osi ‘a Kāleli: pea na‘a ne kapusi tēvolo foki.
41001040	Pea ha‘u kiate ia ha kilia, ‘o ne kole mo tū‘ulutui kiate ia, mo ne pehē, Ka ne ke loto ke fai, te ke lava ke fakama‘a au.
41001041	Pea langa ‘a e fatu ‘o Sīsū ‘i he ‘ofa, ‘o ne mafao atu hono nima ‘o ala kiate ia, mo ne pehē, ‘oku ou loto pē; ke ke ma‘a koe.
