41014054	Pea na‘e muimui ki ai ‘a Pita mei he mama‘o, ‘o ne hū ki he loto‘ā ‘o e Taula‘eiki Lahi: pea na‘a ne ‘i ai ‘o nofo fakataha mo e kau ‘ōfisa, ‘o mūmū ‘i he afi.
41014055	Pea ko e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki, mo e Sanetalimi kātoa, na‘a nau fiu‘akumi ha talatalaaki ‘o Sīsū ke lava ai hano tāmate‘i; kae ‘ikai ‘ilo.
41014056	He neongo na‘e ai ha tokolahi na‘a nau tukuaki‘i ia, ka na‘e ‘ikai hoa ‘enau fakamatala.
41014057	Pea tu‘u hake mo ha ni‘ihi, ‘o nau tukuaki‘i ia, ‘o pehē,
41014058	Na‘a mau fanongo kiate ia ‘oku ne pehē, Te u vete ‘a e Fale Tapu ni, ‘a ia na‘e ngaohi nima pea u langa ‘i he ‘aho ‘e tolu ha Fale Tapu ‘e taha, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘ikai ko e ngaohi nima.
41014059	Ka na‘a mo ia na‘e ‘ikai pē ke hoa ‘enau fakamatala.
41014060	Pea tu‘u mai ki loto ‘a e Taula‘eiki Lahi, ‘o ne fakafehu‘i kia Sīsū, ‘Oku ‘ikai ha‘o momo‘i tali ki he me‘a ‘oku talatalaaki‘i ai koe ‘e he tu‘unga me‘a ni?
41014061	Ka ka fakalongo pē ia, ‘o ‘ikai te ne tali ha me‘a. Pea toe fehu‘i ‘e he Taula‘eiki Lahi, ‘o ne pehē ki ai, Ko e Mīsaia koe, ko e ‘Alo ‘o Fakamālō‘ia?
41014062	Pea pehē ‘e Sīsū, Ko au: pea te mou mamata ki he Fanautama ‘a Tangata ‘oku ne nofo ki he nima to‘omata‘u ‘o Mālohi, pea ‘oku ne hoko mai mo e ngaahi ‘ao ‘o e langi.
41014063	Pea hae hifo ‘e he Taula‘eiki Lahi hono ngaahi kofu loto ‘o‘ona, ‘o ne pehē, Koe‘uma‘ā ‘etau toe kumi fakamo‘oni?
41014064	Kuo mou fanongo ki he lea fie-‘Otua: ko e hā ‘a e me‘a ‘oku hā kiate kimoutolu? Pea nau tuku kotoa pē, Ko e tangata ia ke mate.
41014065	Pea hanga ha ni‘ihi ‘o ‘anuhi ia, pea nau fakapūlou hono fofonga, ‘o nau tuki ia, mo nau pehē ki ai, Mate mai: pea pēkalae‘i ia ‘e he kau ‘ōfisa ‘i he‘enau puke ia.
41014066	Pea lolotonga na‘e nofo ‘a Pita ‘i lalo ‘i he loto‘ā, mo e ha‘u ha toko taha ‘o e kau kaunanga ‘a e Taula‘eiki Lahi:
41014067	pea ‘i he‘ene vakai kia Pita ‘oku mūmū, na‘a ne siofia ia ‘o ne pehē, Ko koe foki na‘a ke ‘i he motu‘a mei Nāsaleti, ‘a Sīsū.
41014068	Ka ka faka‘ikai ia, ‘o ne pehē, ‘oku ‘ikai te u ‘ilo ia, pea ‘oku ‘ikai mahino kiate au pe ko ho‘o lau ki he hā. Pea ne ‘alu atu mei ai ki he fale hū‘anga; pea na‘e ‘u‘ua ‘a e moa.
41014069	Pea ‘i he vakai kiate ia ‘e he kaunanga, na‘a ne kamata lea kiate kinautolu na‘e tutu‘u ai, ‘o pehē, ‘Oku kau ‘a e siana ni ki he fa‘ahinga ko ia.
41014070	Pea ne toe faka‘ikai. Pea fuoloa si‘i atu, na‘e toe lea kia Pita ‘a kinautolu na‘e tutu‘u ai, ‘Ā, ‘oku mo‘oni pē ‘oku ke kau ki he fa‘ahinga ko ia; kae‘uma‘ā ko e Kāleli koe.
41014071	Ka ka hanga ia ‘o tuki mo fuakava, ‘oku ‘ikai te u ‘ilo ‘a e tangata ko eni ‘oku mou lau ki ai.
41014072	Pea ‘iloange na‘e ‘u‘ua ‘a e moa ko hono tu‘o ua. Pea manatu hake ‘e Pita ‘a e lea, ‘a e pehē mai ‘e Sīsū, ‘I he te‘eki ke ‘u‘ua tu‘o ua ‘a e moa, te ke fakafisinga au ‘o tu‘o tolu mālō. Pea ‘i he‘ene fifili ki ai ne ne tengihanga.
41015001	PEA pongipongi leva, ko e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki na‘a nau fai ‘enau fakakaukau, pea mo e kau mātu‘a mo e kau sikalaipe, ‘io, ‘a e Sanetalimi kātoa; ‘o nau ha‘i ‘a Sīsū, pea nau ‘ave ‘o tuku kia Pailato.
41015002	Pea fakafehu‘i ‘e Pailato kiate ia, Ko koe ko e Tu‘i ‘o e kakai Siu, ‘ō?
41015003	Pea ne tali ki ai, ‘o ne pehē, Ko ia pē ‘oku ke me‘a. Pea hanga ‘a e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki, ‘o fai atu hono talatalaaki‘i, ‘o lahi ‘a e ngaahi me‘a.
41015004	Pea toe fehu‘i ‘e Pailato kiate ia, ‘o pehē, ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘o momo‘i tali koā? Vakai ki he ngaahi me‘a ‘oku nau talatalaaki‘i ai koe, hono taha?
41015005	Ka ka ‘ikai toe tali ‘e Sīsū ha momo‘i me‘a ‘e taha; ko ia na‘e ofo ai ‘a Pailato.
41015006	Pea ‘oka hoko ‘a e kātoanga, na‘a ne fa‘a ‘ofa kiate kinautolu, ‘o vete ange ha pōpula ‘e taha, ‘a ia pē te nau kole ki ai.
41015007	Pea na‘e ai ha motu‘a na‘e hingoa ko Palāpasa, ‘a ia na‘e nofo ha‘isia fakataha mo ha ni‘ihi na‘e angatu‘u, ‘a ia ko e fa‘ahinga na‘e fai ha fakapō lolotonga ‘a e angatu‘u.
41015008	Pea ‘alu hake ‘a e kakai, ‘o nau kamata kole ke ne fai ma‘anautolu ‘o hangē ko ‘ene fa‘a fai.
41015009	Pea tali ‘e Pailato, ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu, ‘oku mou loto ke u vete atu ‘a e Tu‘i Siu?
41015010	He na‘e hā kiate ia, tā ko e meheka kuo tukuange ai ia ‘e he hou‘eiki taula‘eiki.
41015011	Ka ko e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki na‘a nau o‘i ‘a e kakai ke ne vete mai mu‘a ‘a Palāpasa.
41015012	Pea toe tali ‘a Pailato, ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu, pea ko e ha ai ‘oku mou loto ke u fai kiate ia ‘oku mou ui ko e Tu‘i Siu?
41015013	Pea nau toe kalanga, Kalusefai ia.
41015014	Pea pehē ‘e Pailato kiate kinautolu, He ko e hā ha me‘a kuo ne fai ‘oku kovi? Ka ka fakautuutu pē ‘enau kalanga, Kalusefai ia.
41015015	Pea ko Pailato, ko e me‘a ‘i he‘ene fie fai ‘a e me‘a ‘oku ‘ao mo e loto ‘o e kakai, na‘a ne vete ange ‘a Palāpasa kiate kinautolu, pea hili ‘ene kau‘imaea ‘a Sīsū, na‘a ne tuku ia ke kalusefai.
41015016	Pea taki ange ia ‘e he kau tau, ‘o hūfaki ki he loto‘ā, ‘a ia ko e Palasi; pea nau fakataha ‘a e vāhenga tau kātoa.
41015017	Pea nau ‘ai kiate ia ha kofu kulokula, pea nau fī ha kalauni talatala, pea ‘ai takai ‘i hono fofonga,
41015018	pea nau kamata fetapa kiate ia, ‘o pehē, ‘Ēī Tu‘i Siu!
41015019	Pea nau toutou taa‘i hono fofonga ‘aki ha kaho, pea nau ‘anuhi ia, pea nau tū‘ulutui ‘o hū kiate ia.
41015020	Pea hili ‘enau va‘inga‘aki ia, na‘a nau to‘o meiate ia ‘a e kofu kulokula, pea nau ‘ai ki ai hono kofu ‘o‘ona, pea nau taki atu ia ke kalusefai.
41015021	Pea tā na‘e ‘alu ange, ko ‘ene ha‘u mei ‘uta, ha motu‘a ko Saimone, ko e Sailine ia, pea ko e tamai ‘a ‘Ālekisānita mo Lūfusi; pea nau kouna ia ke fua hono kolosi.
41015022	Pea nau ‘ave ia ki he potu ko Kolokota, ‘a ia ko hono hiki, ko e potu ‘ulupoko.
41015023	Pea nau humaki atu kiate ia ha uaine kuo hu‘i ‘aki ‘a e mula: ka ka ‘ikai te ne tali.
41015024	Pea nau kalusefai ia, mo nau tufa hono ngaahi kofu, ‘o nau talotalo ki ai, pe ko hai fua ‘e ma‘u ‘a e ngaahi me‘a.
41015025	Pea kuo hoko hono tolu ‘o e houa ‘i he‘enau kalusefai ia.
41015026	Pea na‘e ai ha tohi ‘o e ‘uhinga ‘o hono tautea, ‘a ia na‘e tohi ‘o pehē.
41015027	Pea nau kalusefai fakataha mo ia ha ongo kaiha‘akau, ko e toko taha mei hono to‘omata‘u, mo e toko taha mei he to‘ohema.
41015028	Pea na‘e fakamo‘oni‘i ai ‘a e Tohi, ‘o pehē, Pea na‘e fakakau ia mo e kau maumau lao.
41015029	Pea ko e kakai na‘e ‘alu ange na‘a nau tālalakulaku ki ai, mo nau kalokalo honau ‘ulu, ‘o nau pehē, Uē! ‘a e tama holoki Fale Tapu ‘o langa ‘i he ‘aho ‘e tolu!
41015030	‘Alu hifo mei he kolosi, ‘o fakahaofi koe.
41015031	Pehē foki mo e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki na‘a nau kau mo e kau sikalaipe ‘i he lau fetōtō‘aki ‘iate kinautolu, ‘o pehē, Na‘a ne fakahaofi ‘a e kakai kehe; ka ‘oku ‘ikai te ne lava ke fakahaofi ia.
41015032	Ko e Mīsaia tokua ‘eni, ko e Tu‘i ‘Isileli: pea tuku ke ne ‘alu hifo ni mei he kolosi, ke mau sio ki ai pea mau tui. Pea ko e ongo me‘a foki na‘e kalusefai mo ia na‘a na manuki‘i ia.
41015033	Pea ‘i he a‘u ki hono ono ‘o e houa, na‘e hoko ha po‘uli ki he fonua kotoa, ‘o a‘u ki hono hiva ‘o e houa.
41015034	Pea ‘i hono hiva ‘o e houa na‘e kalanga le‘o lahi ‘a Sīsū, ‘Iloi, ‘Iloi, lama sapakatani? ‘a ia ko hono hiki, Ko hoku ‘Otua, ko hoku ‘Otua, na‘a ke li‘aki au kae hā?
41015035	Pea ko e ni‘ihi ‘iate kinautolu na‘e tutu‘u ofi mai, ‘i he‘enau fanongo ki ai na‘a nau pehē, Vakai, ‘oku ne ui ‘a ‘Ilaisiā.
41015036	Pea lele ha toko taha, ‘o lōmaki ha oma ‘i ha vinika, ‘o ne humaki ‘i ha kaho, ‘o ‘ange ke ne inu, he‘ene pehē, ‘Ē, tau vakai pe ‘e ha‘u ‘a ‘Ilaisiā ke ‘ohifo ia.
41015037	Pea he‘aki ‘e Sīsū ‘ene fu‘u kaila, ‘o ne hokotaki.
41015038	Pea na‘e mahaeua ‘a e tatau ‘o e Fale Tapu mei ‘olunga ki lalo,
41015039	pea ko e senituliō na‘e tu‘u ofi mai, ‘o fehangahangai mo ia, ‘i he‘ene vakai ki he pehē ‘ene hokotaki, na‘a ne pehē, Tā na‘e mo‘oni pē ‘a e tangata ni: ko e ‘Alo ia ‘o e ‘Otua.
41015040	Pea na‘e nofo ai mo ha kau fefine ‘o nau mamata mai mei he mama‘o; ko honau ni‘ihi ‘a Mele mei Makitala, mo Mele ko e fa‘ē ‘a Sēmisi Si‘i mo Siose, pea mo Sālome,
41015041	‘a ia na‘a nau muimui kiate ia ‘i he‘ene ‘i Kāleli, ‘o nau tauhi ki ai; pea mo ha tu‘unga fafine kehe, ‘a ia na‘a nau ō hake mo ia ki Selusalema.
41015042	Pea ‘i he‘ene efiafi hifo leva, pea koe‘uhi ko e Tokonaki ia, ‘a ia ko e ‘aho ‘oku mu‘omu‘a ‘i he Sāpate,
41015043	ko ia ‘i he ‘alu ange ‘a Siosifa ko e ‘Alematea, (‘a ia ko e ‘eiki na‘e kau ‘i he falealea, pea ko e toko taha foki na‘e nofo ‘amanaki ki he Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua) na‘a ne fakato‘oto‘a ‘o hū ki Loto‘ā kia Pailato, ‘o ne kole ‘a e sino ‘o Sīsū.
41015044	Pea pehē ‘e Pailato ‘i hono loto, ko e me‘a fakaofo ‘o kapau kuo ne pekia leva; ‘o ne ui ange ‘a e senituliō, ‘o ne fakafehu‘i kiate ia pe kuo fuofuoloa ange ‘ene pekia.
41015045	Pea ‘i he‘ene ‘ilo ki ai mei he senituliō, na‘a ne foaki ‘a e ‘anga‘anga kia Siosifa.
41015046	Pea hanga ia ‘o fakatau ha tupenu mahu‘inga; ‘o ne ‘ohifo ‘a Sīsū, ‘o ne fakakoloa ‘aki ia ‘a e tupenu, ‘o ne telio ia ‘i ha fonua loto, ‘a ia kuo ‘osi foa ‘i he maka, ‘o ne fakateka ha maka ke songo ‘aki ‘a e fonualoto.
41015047	Pea ko Mele mei Makitala, pea mo e Mele ko e fa‘ē ‘a Siose, na‘a na mo‘usioa ‘a e potu kuo telio ai ia.
41016001	PEA kuo ‘osi ‘a e Sāpate, na‘e hanga ‘a Mele mei Makitala, mo e Mele ko e fa‘ē ‘a Sēmisi, mo Sālome, ‘o nau fakatau ‘a e ngaahi fa‘ahinga ahi, koe‘uhi ke nau ‘alu ‘o tākai ‘aki ia.
41016002	Pea nau ‘alu ki he fonualoto hengihengi ‘aupito ‘i he ‘uluaki ‘aho ‘o e uike, kuo hopo ‘a e la‘ā.
41016003	Pea nau fepehē‘aki, Ko hai te ne fai ma‘atautolu ‘a e fakateka ‘o e maka mei he matapā ‘o e fonualoto?
41016004	Pea ‘i he‘enau hanga hake, na‘a nau vakai, tā kuo teka‘i mai ‘a e maka; he na‘e fu‘u lahi.
41016005	Pea ‘i he‘enau hū ki he fonualoto, na‘a nau sio ki ha talavou ‘oku nofo fakato‘omata‘u, ‘oku ne ‘ai ha kofu hinehina tōtōlofa; pea nau fu‘u ‘oho.
41016006	Pea ne pehē kiate kinautolu, ‘oua te mou ‘oho: ko ho‘omou kumi ‘a Sīsū mei Nāsaleti na‘e kalusefai: kuo toetu‘u ia; ‘oku ‘ikai te ne ‘i heni: vakai ko e potu ē na‘a nau telio ai ia.
41016007	Ka mou mole mu‘a, ‘o tala ki he‘ene kau ako, kae‘uma‘ā ‘a Pita, ‘o pehē, ‘oku ne mu‘omu‘a kiate kimoutolu ki Kāleli: ko e potu ko ia te mou mamata ai kiate ia, ‘o hangē ko ‘ene me‘a kiate kimoutolu.
41016008	Pea nau hū kitu‘a, ‘o hola mei he fonualoto, he na‘a nau mo‘u tetetete mo tāfu‘ua, pea na‘e ‘ikai te nau momo‘i tala ha me‘a ki ha taha; he na‘a nau manavahē.
41016009	Pea ‘i he‘ene toetu‘u ‘i he fua ‘aho ‘o e uike, hengihengi, na‘a ne motu‘a hā kia Mele mei Makitala, ‘a ia kuo ne kapusi mei ai ha tēvolo ‘e toko fitu.
41016010	Pea ‘alu ‘a e fefine ko ia, ‘o tala kiate kinautolu kuo kau mo Sīsū, ‘oku nau lolotonga nofo mamahi mo tangi.
41016011	Ka ko kinautolu, neongo ‘enau fanongo kuo mo‘ui ia, pea kuo mātā ‘e he fefine, na‘e ‘ikai te nau tui ki ai.
41016012	Pea hili ia na‘a ne hā ‘i ha anga ‘e taha ki honau toko ua na‘e ‘a‘eva, ko ‘ena ō ki he tuku‘uta.
41016013	Pea ko kinaua ‘i he‘ena liu mai, na‘a na fakahā ‘a e me‘a ki hono toe: ka na‘a mo ha‘anaua na‘e ‘ikai te nau tui ki ai.
41016014	Hili ia na‘a ne hā ki he kau Hongofulu mā taha ‘a kinautolu, lolotonga ‘enau keinanga, ‘o ne valoki‘i kinautolu ‘i he‘enau ta‘etui mo ongongata‘a, koe‘uhi ko e ‘ikai te nau tui kiate kinautolu na‘e mamata kiate ia kuo ne toetu‘u.
41016015	Pea ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Mou ō ki māmani kātoa, ‘o malanga‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli ki he me‘a mo‘ui kotoa pē.
41016016	‘Ilonga ‘a ia te ne tui mo papitaiso te ne mo‘ui; ka ‘ilonga ‘a ia ‘e ‘ikai te ne tui ‘e mo‘ua.
41016017	Pea ‘e ō mo kinautolu ‘oku tui ‘a e ngaahi faka‘ilonga ko eni: te nau kapusi tēvolo ‘i he hingoa ‘o‘oku; te nau lea ‘i ha ngaahi lea fo‘ou;
41016018	te nau puke hake ‘a e fanga ngata; pea ka ‘iloange te nau inu ha me‘a ‘oku kona, ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito te nau konā ai; te nau hilifaki nima ki he mahaki, pea te nau mo‘ui.
41016019	Pea ko eni, hili ‘a e folofola ‘e he ‘Eiki kiate kinautolu, na‘e ‘ohake ia ki he langi, ‘o ne ‘afio mei he to‘omata‘u ‘o e ‘Otua.
41016020	Pea ko kinautolu na‘a nau ‘alu atu ‘o malanga holo; pea ngāue fakataha mo kinautolu ‘e he ‘Eiki, ‘o ne poupou ‘a e folofola ‘aki ‘a e ngaahi faka‘ilonga na‘e hoko ai.
42001001	‘E Tiofilusi, ko e me‘a ‘i he hanga ‘e he tokolahi, ‘o nau fa‘u hano fakamatala ‘o e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku mātu‘aki tui ki ai ‘e kitautolu,
42001002	‘o fakatatau ki hono tala mai ‘e kinautolu na‘a nau sio tonu ki ai mei hono kamata, ‘o hoko ko e kau ngāue ‘o e folofola,
42001003	kuo u fakakaukau mo au foki, Tangata‘eiki, ke tohi hokohoko ia, ma‘au, he kuo u fakatotolo mai kotoa pē ke mahu‘ingamālie:
42001004	koe‘uhi ke ke ‘ilo kānokano ki he mo‘oni ‘o e ngaahi fakamatala, ‘a ia na‘e akonekina ai koe.
42001005	Tokua ‘i he kuonga ‘o Hēlota, ko e Tu‘i Siutea, na‘e ‘i ai ha taula‘eiki na‘e hingoa ko Sākalaia, ‘a ia na‘e kau ki he lakanga ‘o ‘Apaia: pea na‘e ai hono uaifi, ‘a ia na‘a ne ‘i he hako totonu ‘o ‘ēlone, pea na‘a ne ma‘u ‘a e hingoa ko ‘Ilisapesi.
42001006	Pea ko e ongo me‘a na‘e lelei ‘ena fakafeangai ki he ‘Otua, he‘ena laka ‘i he ngaahi fekau mo e tu‘utu‘uni kotoa pē ‘a e ‘Eiki mo e haohaoa.
42001007	Pea na‘e ‘ikai ha‘ana tama, koe‘uhi na‘e pa‘a ‘a ‘Ilisapesi; pea kuo na mātutu‘a fakatou‘osi pē.
42001008	Pea ko e ‘aho ‘e taha na‘a ne fai ‘ene ngāue fakataula‘eiki ki he ‘Otua ‘i he hokohoko ‘o hono lakanga;
42001009	pea ‘i he talotalo, ‘o fakatatau ki he anga ‘o e ngāue fakataula‘eiki, na‘e tō kiate ia ‘a e tutu ‘o e ‘inisēnisi ‘i he‘ene hū ki he Fale Tapu ‘o e ‘Eiki:
42001010	pea na‘e lotu ‘i tu‘a ‘a e fakataha kotoa, ‘i he hokosia ‘a e taimi ‘o e fai ‘inisēnisi.
42001011	Pea na‘e hā kiate ia ha ‘āngelo ‘a e ‘Eiki, ‘o tu‘u ‘i he potu to‘omata‘u ‘o e ‘ōlita tutu‘anga ‘inisēnisi.
42001012	Pea na‘e tāfu‘ua ‘a Sākalaia ‘i he‘ene sio ki ai; pea tō kiate ia ha ilifia.
42001013	Ka ka lea ki ai ‘a e ‘āngelo ‘o ne pehē, ‘e Sākalaia, ‘oua ‘e manavahē; he kuo tau ho‘o hū, pea ko ho uaifi ko ‘Ilisapesi, te ne fanau‘i ha tama kiate koe, pea te ke fakahingoa ia ko Sione.
42001014	Pea te ke fiefia ai mo nēkeneka: ‘io, ‘e fiefia ha tokolahi ‘i he‘ene hoko mai.
42001015	He te ne hoko ko e lahi ‘i he vakai ‘a e ‘Eiki; pea ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito te ne inu ha uaine pe ha kava mālohi; pea te ne fonu ‘i he laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni, ‘o kamata mei he manava ‘o ‘ene fa‘ē.
42001016	Pea te ne fakatafoki ha tokolahi ‘o ha‘a ‘Isileli ki he ‘Eiki ko honau ‘Otua:
42001017	‘a ia te ne fakamelomelo foki ki ai ‘i he tatau ‘o e anga mo e ivi ‘o ‘Ilaisiā: koe‘uhi ke ne liliu ‘a e loto ‘o e mātu‘a ke tokanga ki he‘enau fānau, pea mo e kau talangata‘a ke nau ma‘u ‘a e anga fakapotopoto ‘o e kau angatonu; ke teu‘i ma‘a e ‘Eiki ‘a e kakai ne tokonaki.
42001018	Pea pehē ‘e Sākalaia ki he ‘āngelo. Te u ‘ilo ‘i he hā ‘a e me‘a ni? He ko au ko e motu‘a, pea ko hoku uaifi ko e fefine fuoloa ‘aupito.
42001019	Pea tali ‘e he ‘āngelo ‘o ne pehē ki ai, Ko Kepaleli au, ‘a ia ‘oku ou fakafe‘ao ki he ‘Otua; pea kuo fekau au ke lea kiate koe, pea ke ‘atu ‘a e ongoongo lelei ni.
42001020	Pea ko eni, te ke noa, ‘o ‘ikai te ke fa‘a lea, ‘o a‘u ki he ‘aho ‘e hoko ai ‘a e me‘a ni: koe‘uhi na‘e ‘ikai te ke tui ki he‘eku ngaahi tala, ka ko e ngaahi lea ia ‘oku fai pau ‘oka hoko hono taimi.
42001021	Pea mo‘u talia pē ‘a e kakai kia Sākalaia, ‘o nau ofo ‘i he‘ene fuoloa ‘i he Fale Tapu.
42001022	Pea ‘i he‘ene hū mai, na‘e ‘ikai te ne lava ke lea kiate kinautolu: pea nau toki ‘ilo, tā kuo ne mamata ki ha vīsone ‘i he Fale Tapu; pea kakamo pē ia kiate kinautolu, ‘o ne nofo tuli mo ta‘elea.
42001023	Pea ‘i he faifai pea ‘osi ‘a e ngaahi ‘aho ‘o ‘ene fai ‘a e ngāue tapu, na‘a ne foki ki ‘api.
42001024	Pea hili ‘a e ngaahi ‘aho ko ia, na‘e tu‘itu‘ia ‘a ‘Ilisapesi ko hono uaifi, pea na‘a ne nofo ‘i he lilo ‘o nima māhina, he‘ene pehē,
42001025	Koe‘uhiā kuo pehē fau ‘a e ngāue ‘a e ‘Eiki ma‘aku, ‘i he ‘iloange na‘a ne āfeitaulalo mai, ‘o hiki hoku mā‘anga ki he kakai.
42001026	Pea ‘i hono ono māhina, na‘e fekau mei he ‘Otua ‘a e ‘āngelo ko Kepaleli ki ha kolo ‘o Kāleli na‘e hingoa ko Nāsaleti,
42001027	ke ne ‘alu ki ha tāupo‘ou na‘e polo‘i ki ha tangata ‘i he hako ‘o Tēvita, na‘e hingoa ko Siosifa; pea ko e hingoa ‘o e ta‘ahine ko Mele.
42001028	Pea ‘i he‘ene a‘u atu kiate ia na‘a ne pehē, Si‘oto‘ofa, ‘a koe kuo ‘ofeina: ‘oku ‘iate koe ‘a e ‘Eiki.
42001029	Pea mo‘utāfu‘ua ia ‘i he lea ni, ‘o ne fifili pe ‘e fou fakafēfē ‘a e fetapa ni.
42001030	Pea pehē ange ‘e he ‘āngelo, ‘e Mele, ‘oua te ke manavahē; he kuo ke ta‘imālie mei he ‘Otua.
42001031	Pea ko ‘eni, te ke tu‘itu‘ia, pea te ke ‘alo‘i ha tama, pea te ke fakahingoa ia ko Sīsū.
42001032	Pea ‘e hoko ko e lahi ‘a e toko taha ko ia; pea ‘e lau ia ko e ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Eiki Taupotu; pea ‘e foaki kiate ia ‘e he ‘Eiki ko e ‘Otua ‘a e taloni ‘o ‘ene kui ko Tēvita:
42001033	pea te ne tu‘i ki he hako ‘o Sēkope ‘o lauikuonga; pea ko ‘ene pule ‘e ‘ikai ngata.
42001034	Pea pehē ‘e Mele ki he ‘āngelo, ‘e hoko fēfē ia? he ‘oku te‘eki te u ‘iloa ha tangata.
42001035	Pea tali ‘e he ‘āngelo kiate ia, ‘o pehē, ‘e hoko mai ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni kiate koe, pea ‘e fakamalumalu koe ‘e he māfimafi ‘o e ‘Eiki Taupotu: pea ko ia ‘e ui ai ‘a e hako tapu te ke fā‘ele‘i,
42001036	KO E ‘ALO ‘O E ‘OTUA, pea vakai, ko ‘Ilisapesi ko ho kāinga, kuo tu‘itu‘ia mo ia ‘i ha tama, ka kuo motu‘a; pea ko hono ono māhina ‘eni ‘o ia na‘e lau ko e pa‘a:
42001037	he ‘oku ‘ikai ha fo‘i folofola ‘a e ‘Otua ‘e ta‘emalava.
42001038	Pea pehē ‘e Mele, Ko au ‘eni, ko e kaunanga ‘a e ‘eiki: ke hoko mai kiate au ‘o hangē ko ho‘o me‘a. Pea ‘alu ‘a e ‘āngelo meiate ia.
42001039	Pea faifai pea tu‘u ‘a Mele, ‘o ‘alu fakavave ki he fonua mo‘unga, ki ha kolo ‘o Siutea;
42001040	‘o ne hū ki he fale ‘o Sākalaia, ‘o fetapa kia ‘Ilisapesi.
42001041	Pea ‘iloange, ‘i he fanongo ‘e ‘Ilisapesi ki he fetapa ‘a Mele, ne hākahaka ‘a e tama ‘i hono fatu: pea fonu ‘a ‘Ilisapesi ‘i he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni,
42001042	‘o ne kalanga le‘o lahi, Ha ‘ofeina ā ka ko koe ‘i he kau fefine kotoa pē! ‘Ofeina ā ka ko e fua ‘o ho manava!
42001043	Pea ‘anefē ia ke me‘a mai kiate au ‘a e fa‘ē ‘a hoku ‘Eiki!
42001044	He vakai, ‘i he ongo mai ho‘o fetapa ki hoku telinga, Pea hākailangitau ‘a e tama ‘i hoku manava.
42001045	Pea monū‘ia ā ka ko ia na‘e tuitala! Koe‘uhi ‘e fakamo‘oni ‘a e ngaahi me‘a Na‘e fakahā mei he ‘Eiki kiate ia.
42001046	Pea lea ‘a Mele ‘o pehē, ‘Oku fakahīkihiki‘i ‘e hoku loto ‘a e ‘Eiki.
42001047	Pea neka hoku laumālie ‘i he ‘Otua ko hoku Fakamo‘ui.
42001048	He kuo ne āfeitaulalo mai kia kita me‘avale ko ‘ene kaunanga: He faka‘uta mai, ko e ‘aho ni ‘e kamata Ke lau au ko e monū‘ia ‘e he ngaahi to‘utangata.
42001049	He kuo fai ma‘aku ‘e he Māfimafi ha ngaahi me‘a lalahi: Pea ‘oku mā‘oni‘oni hono huafa.
42001050	Pea ko ‘ene meesi ‘oku laui to‘utangata Kiate kinautolu ‘oku manavahē kiate ia.
42001051	Kuo fai kaukaua hono nima: Ko e ha‘a ‘afungi kuo ne fakavilingia ‘i he ngao‘i ‘o honau loto.
42001052	Kuo ne hifo ‘a e kau pule mei honau taloni, Pea ko lāuvale kuo ne hākeaki‘i.
42001053	Kuo ne ‘ange me‘a lelei ki he fiekaia ‘o nau mākona, Pea ko e ma‘u me‘a kuo ne tuku ke ‘alu mola.
42001054	Kuo ne taukapo‘i ‘a ‘Isileli, ko ‘ene sevāniti, Ke fakamanatu ma‘u ‘ene ngaahi meesi; Hangē ko ‘ene folofola ki he‘etau ngaahi kui:
42001055	”‘E fai kia ‘Epalahame mo hono hako, ‘o ta‘engata."
42001056	Pea na‘e nofo mo ia ‘a Mele, ‘o fe‘unga nai mo e māhina ‘e tolu, pea na toki foki ki hono ‘api.
42001057	Pea ‘i he kakato ‘a e ngaahi māhina ‘o ‘Ilisapesi, na‘a ne fā‘ele‘i ha tama.
42001058	Pea fanongo ‘a e kakai ‘o e feitu‘u ko ia, mo hono kāinga, kuo fakae‘a ‘e he ‘Eiki ‘ene meesi ‘i he fefine ni; pea nau fiefia fakataha mo ia.
42001059	Pea ‘i he faifai pea hoko hono ‘aho valu, na‘a nau omi ke kamu ‘a e tamasi‘i; pea nau pehē ke fakahingoa ia ki he‘ene tamai ko Sākalaia.
42001060	Ka ka tali ‘e he‘ene fa‘ē, ‘o ne pehē, ‘Oua, Ka ‘e hingoa ko Sione.
42001061	Pea nau pehē kiate ia, Ka koe‘uhi ‘oku ‘ikai ha taha ‘i ho kāinga ‘oku hingoa pehē.
42001062	Pea nau kamata kamo ange ki he‘ene motu‘a, pe ‘oku ne loto ke fakahingoa ‘a e tama ko hai.
42001063	Pea me‘a ia ke ‘omi ha makatohi, ‘o ne tohi ai ‘o pehē, Ko hono hingoa ko Sione. Pea nau ofo ai kotoa pē.
42001064	Pea na‘e faka‘atā leva hono ngutu mo hono ‘elelo; ‘o ne kamata lea mo fakamālō ki he ‘Otua.
42001065	Pea, na‘e tō ha ilifia ki he kakai kotoa pē ‘o honau feitu‘u; pea ‘i he fonua mo‘unga kotoa ‘o Siutea na‘e lahi hono talanoa‘i ‘o e ngaahi me‘a ni.
42001066	Pea ko kinautolu kotoa pē na‘e fanongo ki ai, na‘a nau fakama‘u ‘i honau loto, he‘enau pehē, Tokaange ha me‘a ‘e hoko ki ai ‘a e tamasi‘i ni! Pea ne‘ine‘i ā, he na‘e kau mo ia ‘a e māfimafi ‘o e ‘Eiki.
42001067	Pea fonu ai ‘ene tamai ko Sākalaia ‘i he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni, pea ne palofisai ‘o pehē.
42001068	Ha taha ā ke fakamāloo‘i, Pea ko e ‘Eiki ko e ‘Otua ‘o ‘Isileli! He kuo ne ‘a‘ahi mai, mo fai ha huhu‘i ma‘a hono kakai.
42001069	Mo ne fokotu‘u he hako ‘o Tēvita, ko ‘ene tamaio‘eiki, Ha nifo mo‘otau fakahaofi.
42001070	‘O hangē ā ‘ene folofola ‘i he ngutu ‘o ‘ene kau palōfita tapu talu mei mu‘a:
42001071	Ko e fakahaofi mei hotau ngaahi fili, Mo e mālohi ‘o e kakai ‘oku fehi‘a mai:
42001072	Ke fakaai ‘ene ngaahi palōmesi na‘e ma‘u ‘e he‘etau ngaahi kui Mo tauhi ‘ene fuakava mā‘oni‘oni.
42001073	Mo e lea mamafa na‘a ne tutuku ‘aki kia ‘Epalahame ko ‘etau kui.
42001074	Ke ne me‘a‘ofa ‘aki mai ‘a e me‘a ko eni, Ke tau fai ta‘eteteki ‘etau ngāue ki he ‘Eiki, He kuo hamusi kitautolu mei hotau ngaahi fili.
42001075	‘O tau fakafeangai kiate ia ‘aki ‘a e mā‘oni‘oni mo e failelei ‘I he ngaahi ‘aho kotoa pē ‘o ‘etau mo‘ui.
42001076	Pea ko koe, tamasi‘i, ‘e lau ko e Palōfita ‘o e ‘Eiki Taupotu, He te ke fakamelomelo kiate ia ke teuteu hono ngaahi hala:
42001077	Ke ‘atu ‘a e tala ‘o e fakamo‘ui ki he kakai ‘a‘ana, Ko e fakamolemole ‘enau ngaahi angahala:
42001078	Ko e me‘a ‘i he ‘alo‘ofa ‘a hotau ‘Otua, ‘A ia ne ‘a‘ahi mei ai ‘a e pongipongi mei ‘olunga.
42001079	Ke hulu ‘aki he nofo he po‘uli mo e malu ‘o Mate, Mo tataki ki he hala ‘o e fiemālie hotau va‘e.
42001080	Pea na‘e tupu ‘a e tama, ‘o ne faka‘a‘au ke mālohi fakalaumālie; pea na‘a ne ‘i he ngaahi toafa ‘o a‘u ki he ‘aho na‘e fakahā ai ia ki ‘Isileli.
42002001	PEA ‘i he kuonga ko ia tokua, na‘e ‘alu atu ha fekau meia Sisa ‘Akosito, ke tohi kakai ‘a māmani kātoa.
42002002	Pea na‘e fuofua fai ‘a e tohi kakai ko ia, lolotonga na‘e kōvana ‘i Sīlia ‘a Sailinio.
42002003	Pea na‘e ‘alu ‘a e kakai kotoa pē, takitaha ki hono kolo ‘o‘ona ke tohi ai.
42002004	Pea fononga hake mo Siosifa foki mei he kolo ko Nāsaleti ‘i Kāleli, ko ‘ene ‘alu ki Siutea, ki he kolo ‘o Tēvita, ‘a ia ‘oku hingoa ko Pētelihema; (he na‘a ne kau ki he hako mo e fa‘ahinga ‘o Tēvita):
42002005	ke na tohi ai mo Mele, ko e fefine kuo polo‘i kiate ia, ‘a ia na‘e feitama.
42002006	Pea lolotonga ‘ena ‘i ai, na‘e kakato hono māhina ke fā‘ele:
42002007	pea na‘a ne ‘alo‘i ‘a e tama, ko hono ‘uluaki, ‘o ne fakakofu ‘aki ia ‘a e kofu‘i tamasi‘i valevale, ‘o ne fakatokoto‘i he ‘ai‘angakai ‘o e manu: koe‘uhi na‘e ‘ikai te na hao ‘i he fale talifononga.
42002008	Pea na‘e ‘i he fonua ko ia ha kau tauhi sipi na‘e mohe vao, ‘o le‘ohi ‘enau fanga sipi ‘i he po‘uli.
42002009	Pea ‘iloange, na‘e tu‘u mai kiate kinautolu ha ‘āngelo ‘a e ‘Eiki, pea malama mai ‘a e Sikaina ‘o e ‘Eiki ‘o hulu‘ia kinautolu; pea na‘a nau manavahē–ko e manavahē ka ko ha manavahē.
42002010	Pea pehē ‘e he ‘āngelo kiate kinautolu, ‘oua ‘e manavahē; he ko eni kuo u ha‘u mo au ha talanoa mālie, ko e me‘a fakafiefia ‘aupito, ko e me‘a ma‘a e kakai ‘Isileli kātoa.
42002011	He na‘e ‘alo‘i kiate kimoutolu ‘anenai ‘i he Kolo ‘o Tēvita ha Fakamo‘ui, ‘a ia KO E ‘EIKI MĪSAIA.
42002012	Pea ko hono faka‘ilonga ‘eni kiate kimoutolu: te mou ‘ilo ha tamasi‘i valevale, kuo kofu fakatamasi‘i valevale, pea ‘oku ne tokoto ‘i he ‘ai‘angakai ‘o e manu.
42002013	Pea fakafokifā pē na‘e ‘i he ‘āngelo ha tokolahi ‘o e hōsitē ‘o Langi, ‘oku nau fakamālō ki he ‘Otua, ‘o nau pehē.
42002014	KO E KOLōLIA KI HE ‘OTUA ‘I LANGI TAUPOTU, PEA KO E MELINO KI MāMANI KI HE KAKAI KUO HōIFUA KI AI.
42002015	Pea na‘e pehē, ‘i he ‘alu meiate kinautolu ‘a e kau ‘āngelo ki he langi, pea fetālaaki ‘a e kau tauhi sipi, Tau ō mu‘a ‘o hoko ki Pētelihema, ‘o vakaia ‘a e me‘a ni kuo fai, ‘a ia kuo fakahā mai ‘e he ‘Eiki.
42002016	Pea nau ō fakavave, ‘o ‘ilo ‘a Mele mo Siosifa fakatou‘osi, pea mo e tamasi‘i valevale ‘oku tokoto ‘i he ‘ai‘angakai.
42002017	Pea ‘i he‘enau mamata ki ai, na‘a nau fai ‘enau fakamatala ki he me‘a na‘e lea‘aki kiate kinautolu, ‘o kau ki he tama ni.
42002018	Pea ko kinautolu na‘e fanongo ai, na‘a nau ofo kotoa pē ‘i he ngaahi me‘a na‘e lea‘aki ‘e he kau tauhi sipi kiate kinautolu.
42002019	Ka ka kumuni kotoa pē ‘e Mele ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ni, ‘o ne fefilihaki ki ai ‘i hono loto.
42002020	Pea foki atu ‘a e kau tauhi sipi, mo nau fakafeta‘i mo fakamālō ki he ‘Otua; koe‘uhi ko e ngaahi me‘a na‘a nau fanongo ki ai, pea mo ia na‘a nau mātā, ‘oku na tuha mo e me‘a na‘e tala mai.
42002021	Pea ‘i he hokosia hono ‘aho valu ke kamu ia, pea na‘e fakahingoa ia ko Sīsū; ‘a ia ko hono fakahingoa ‘e he ‘āngelo ‘i he te‘eki ke tu‘itu‘ia ia ‘i he manava.
42002022	Pea ‘i he hokosia ‘a e ‘aho ke fakama‘a kinaua, ‘o fakatatau ki he lao ‘a Mōsese, na‘a na ‘ave ia ki Selusalema ke ‘atu ki he ‘Eiki-
42002023	‘o hangē ko ia kuo tohi ‘i he Lao ‘a e ‘Eiki, Ke ‘ilonga ‘a e tama tangata ko ha ‘olopo‘ou, ‘e lau ia ko e tapu ki he ‘Eiki-
42002024	pea koe‘uhi foki ke na fai ‘a e feilaulau, ‘o hangē ko ia ‘oku tu‘u ‘i he Lao ‘a e ‘Eiki, Ko e ongo kulukulu, pe ko ha lupe mui ‘e toko ua.
42002025	Pea tā na‘e nofo ‘i Selusalema ha tangata na‘e hingoa ko Simione; pea ko e tangata tauhi tu‘utu‘uni ia mo lotu mo‘oni, he‘ene nofo ‘amanaki ki he taukapo‘i ‘o ‘Isileli; pea na‘e fa‘a hā‘elea ia ‘e he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni.
42002026	Pea kuo valokia ia ‘e he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni, ‘e ‘ikai te ne mamata ki he mate kae‘oua ke ne mamata ki he Mīsaia ‘a e ‘Eiki.
42002027	Pea kuo ‘alu ia ki he Temipale kuo Laumālie‘ia, mo e ‘oange ‘a e tamasi‘i ko Sīsū ‘e he‘ene mātu‘a ke fai kiate ia ‘o fakatatau ki he anga ‘o e Lao.
42002028	Pea ma‘u ‘a e tama ‘e ia ‘o hapai, mo ne fakamālō‘ia ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘o ne pehē.
42002029	‘ēī, tā ko ho‘o tukuange ‘eni ho‘o pōpula Ke ‘alu kuo fiemālie, ‘o hangē ko ho‘o folofola:
42002030	He kuo mamata ‘a hoku mata ki ‘ao fakamo‘ui‘anga.
42002031	‘A ia na‘a ke teuteu ke hā ki ho kakai kotoa pē;
42002032	Ko e Maama ke tatala ‘aki ‘a e fakapo‘uli ‘o e Senitaile, Pea ko e Lāngilangi‘anga ‘o ho kakai ‘Isileli,
42002033	Pea tutu‘u ‘a ‘ene tamai mo ‘ene fa‘ē, ‘oku na ofo ‘i he ngaahi me‘a na‘e lea‘aki ‘i he tama.
42002034	Pea na‘e tāpuaki‘i kinaua ‘e Simione, ‘o ne pehē kia Mele ko ‘ene fa‘ē, ‘ē, ko e nafa ‘o e toko taha ni ko e holo-mo-toetu‘u‘anga ‘o ha tokolahi ‘i ‘Isileli, pea ko e faka‘ilonga ka leakovia:
42002035	(‘io, na‘a mo koe ‘e ulu ha heletā ‘i ho loto) koe‘uhi kae toki fukefuke ai ‘a e fakakaukau ‘a e loto ‘o e tokolahi.
42002036	Pea na‘e ‘i ai ha fefine palōfita ko ‘Ana, ko e ‘ōfefine ‘o Fanueli, ‘a ia ko e toko taha ‘i he ha‘a ‘āseli. Pea ko e fefine ‘eni na‘e fuoloa ‘aupito: na‘a ne ma‘u husepāniti ‘i he‘ene finemui, ‘o na nonofo ‘o fitu ta‘u;
42002037	pea kuo nofo uitou ia ‘o valungofulu mā fā ta‘u: pea na‘e ‘ikai mahu‘i ia mei he Temipale, ka ne tauhi ki he ‘Otua ‘aki ‘a e ‘aukai mo e lotu ‘i he pō mo e ‘aho.
42002038	Pea na‘e tu‘u mai mo ia ‘i he taimi pē ko ia, ‘o ne tali fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otua; pea ne lea ‘i he tama kiate kinautolu kotoa pē ‘i Selusalema na‘e nofo ‘amanaki ki he huhu‘i.
42002039	Pea kuo ‘osi ‘ena fai kotoa pē, ‘o fakatatau ki he Lao ‘a e ‘Eiki, na‘a nau foki ki Kāleli ki honau kolo ko Nāsaleti.
42002040	Pea na‘e tupu ‘a e tamasi‘i, ‘o ne faka‘a‘au ke mālohi, he fakafonu ia ‘i he poto; pea na‘e toka kiate ia ‘a e ‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua.
42002041	Pea na‘e ‘alu ‘ene mātu‘a ‘i he ta‘u kotoa pē ki Selusalema, ki he kātoanga ‘o e Pāsova.
42002042	Pea ‘i he hoko hono hongofulu mā ua ta‘u, na‘a nau fononga hake, ‘o hangē ko ‘enau fa‘a fai ‘i he Kātoanga.
42002043	Pea kuo faka‘osi hono ngaahi ‘aho, ‘o nau kamata foki atu, na‘e nofo pē ‘a e tamasi‘i ko Sīsū ‘i Selusalema; pea ‘ikai ‘ilo ki ai ‘e he‘ene mātu‘a.
42002044	Pea ‘i he‘ena mahalo ‘oku ne ‘i he kau fononga, na‘a na hanga ō pē, kae‘oua ke ‘osi mai ‘a e vā‘ihala ‘o e ‘aho ko ia: pea na toki kumi ia ki honau kāinga mo honau kau fe‘iloaki.
42002045	Pea ‘i he ‘ikai te na ‘ilo ia, na‘a na foki ki Selusalema ko e kumi kiate ia.
42002046	Pea na‘e pehē, ‘i he hili ‘a e ‘aho ‘e tolu, na‘a na ‘ilo ia ki he Temipale, ‘oku ne lotolotoi ‘i he kau akonaki, ‘o ne fakafanongo kiate kinautolu mo fakafehu‘i kiate kinautolu.
42002047	Pea ko kinautolu kotoa pē na‘e fanongo kiate ia, na‘a nau fakatumutumu ‘i he anga ‘o ‘ene fakakaukau mo ‘ene ngaahi tali.
42002048	Pea ‘i he‘ena mamata ki ai, na‘e to‘oa hona loto; pea na‘e lea kiate ia ‘e he‘ene fa‘ē, Tama, ko e hā kuo ke fai pehē ai kiate kimaua? He ko eni, ko ho‘o tamai mo au kuo ma kumi koe mo e loto lavea.
42002049	Pea pehē ‘e ia kiate kinaua, Ko e hā kuo mo kumi ai au? ‘Ikai na‘a mo ‘ilo kuo pau ke u ‘i he ngāue ‘a ‘eku Tamai?
42002050	Pea na‘e ‘ikai te na lavea hono ‘uhinga ‘o ‘ene lea ko ia kiate kinaua.
42002051	Pea ‘alu hifo ia mo kinaua, ‘o hoko ki Nāsaleti; pea na‘a ne ‘i ai ‘o anganofo kiate kinaua pea kumuni ‘e he‘ene fa‘ē ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ni kotoa pē ‘i hono loto.
42002052	Pea na‘e lalaka atu ‘a Sīsū ‘i he poto, mo e lahi ‘o hono sino, pea mo hono ‘ofeina ‘e he ‘Otua mo e tangata.
42003001	TOKUA ‘i hono hongofulu mā nima ta‘u ‘o e pule ‘a Taipiliō ko e Sisa, pea lolotonga ‘a e kōvana ‘a Ponitō Pailato ‘i Siutea, pea tu‘i ‘a Hēlota ‘i Kāleli, mo hono tehina ko Filipe ‘i ‘Aitulia mo e feitu‘u ko Telakonaitisi, pea tu‘i ‘a Lisaniasi ‘i ‘Apiline,
42003002	pea Taula‘eiki Lahi ‘a ‘ānasi mo Kaiafasi–ko e kuonga ia na‘e hoko ai ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua kia Sione ko e foha ‘o Sākalaia ‘i he toafa.
42003003	Pea ‘alu ia ki he feitu‘u kotoa ‘o Soatani, ‘o ne malanga ‘aki ‘a e papitaiso fakatomala ki he fakamolemole angahala:
42003004	‘o hangē ko ia kuo tohi ‘i he puka ‘o e ngaahi lea ‘a ‘Aisea ko e palōfita, Ko e le‘o ‘o ha toko taha ‘oku kalanga he toafa, Mou teuteu ‘a e hā‘ele‘anga ‘o Sihova; Fakatonutonu hono ngaahi hala.
42003005	‘Ilonga ha tele‘a pea ‘e tanu, Pea ‘ilonga ha mo‘unga pe tafungofunga ‘e holoki; Pea ‘e ngaohi ‘a e pikopiko ke totonu, Mo e tokatāmaki ke tokamālie.
42003006	Pea ‘e mamata ‘e he kakano kotoa ki he fakamo‘ui‘anga ‘a e ‘Otua.
42003007	Pea toki lea ia ki he ngaahi fu‘u kakai na‘e fononga mai ke papitaiso ‘iate ia, ‘o ne pehē, ‘A e hako‘i ngata fekai, ko hai ne fale‘i kimoutolu ke hola mei he houhau ‘oku tu‘unuku mai?
42003008	Kapau ko ia, pea mou fua ‘o taau mo ha kau fakatomala; pea ‘oua te mou kamata fuataki ‘i homou loto, ‘o pehē, Ko ‘Epalahame ‘a ‘emau tamai; he ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘oku mafai ‘e he ‘Otua ke fokotu‘u mei he ngaahi maka ni ha fānau kia ‘Epalahame.
42003009	Kae‘uma‘ā ‘oku lolotonga tu‘u ni ‘a e toki ‘i he tefito ‘o e ngaahi ‘akau: ko ia, ‘ilonga ha ‘akau ‘oku ‘ikai fua lelei ‘oku tā ‘o laku ki he afi.
42003010	Pea fa‘a fehu‘i kiate ia ‘e he ngaahi kakai, ‘o nau pehē, pea ko e hā te mau fai?
42003011	Pea tali ‘e ia kiate kinautolu, ‘o ne pehē, ‘Ilonga ha toko taha ‘oku ua hono sote, ke ne vaeua mo ha taha ‘oku ‘ikai: pea ‘ilonga ha ma‘u me‘akai, ke ne fai pehē foki.
42003012	Pea ha‘u foki ha kau tānaki tukuhau ke papitaiso, ‘o nau pehē kiate ia, Tangata‘eiki, ko e hā te mau fai?
42003013	Pea ne pehē kiate kinautolu, ‘oua na‘a mou ‘eke ‘o fakamahili ‘i he me‘a kuo tu‘utu‘uni kiate kimoutolu.
42003014	Pea fehu‘i kiate ia mo ha kau tau, ‘o nau pehē, Ko e hā te mau fai ‘e kimautolu foki? Pea ne pehē ki ai, ‘Oua te mou fakamālohi ha taha; pea ‘oua na‘a fasitu‘u‘i; pea mou fiemālie ‘i he tokonaki ‘oku ‘atu.
42003015	Pea ‘i he fakanganga ‘a e kakai, mo nau fifili kotoa pē ‘i honau loto kia Sione, na‘a ko e Mīsaia ia:
42003016	pea toe lea ‘a Sione kiate kinautolu kotoa, ‘o pehē, Ko au ‘oku ou papitaiso kimoutolu ‘aki ‘a e vai: ka ‘oku ha‘u ha toko taha ‘oku mālohi ‘iate au, ko e toko taha ‘oku ‘ikai te u taau ke vete ‘a e nono‘o ‘o hono topuva‘e: te ne papitaiso kimoutolu ‘e ia ‘i he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni mo e afi.
42003017	Ko e toko taha ia ‘oku ‘i hono nima ‘a e ī, pea te ne tapili ke ‘osi ‘ene ‘au‘au‘anga; pea te ne tānaki ‘a e ngaahi fo‘i uite ki hono feleoko; ka te ne tutu ‘a e kafukafu ‘aki ‘a e afi ‘oku ‘ikai matāmate‘i.
42003018	Na‘e lahi mo e ngaahi tala mālie, ‘o taha kehe mo eni, na‘a ne fai‘aki ‘i he‘ene tokoni ki he kakai.
42003019	Ka na‘a ne valokia ‘a Hēlota, pea na‘e touia ‘a e loto ‘o e Tu‘i, koe‘uhi ko Helotiasi ko e uaifi ‘o hono tehina, pea koe‘uhi ko e ngaahi kovi kehekehe ne fai ‘e Hēlota:
42003020	pea na‘a ne kanoni ‘aki ia kotoa ‘a e me‘a ni foki, ‘ene lī ‘a Sione ki he pilīsone.
42003021	Pea ‘i he ‘osi papitaiso ‘a e kakai, pea kuo papitaiso mo Sīsū foki, pea ‘oku ne fai ‘ene hū, ‘iloange na‘e matangaki ‘a e langi,
42003022	pea ‘alu hifo kiate ia ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni, ‘i ha sino na‘e tatau mo ha lupe; pea na‘e ai ha le‘o mei he langi na‘e pehē mai, Ko hoku ‘alo Pele koe, ko koe kuo u hōifua ai.
42003023	Pea ko Sīsū na‘e fe‘unga nai ia mo e tolungofulu ta‘u ‘i he‘ene kamata ngāue; pea na‘e lau ko e foha ia ‘o Siosifa, ‘a ia ko e foha ‘o Hēlai.
42003024	‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Mātati, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Līvai, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Melikai, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Sianai, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Siosifa.
42003025	‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Matataiasi, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o ‘ēmosi, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Nēhumi, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o ‘Esilai, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Nākai.
42003026	‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Mā‘ati, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Matataiasi, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Semaini, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Sioseki, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Siota.
42003027	‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Sioanani, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Lesa, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Seluipepeli, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Saletili, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Nēlai.
42003028	‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Melikai, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o ‘ātai, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Kōsame, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o ‘ēlimatami, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o ‘Ea.
42003029	‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Sīsū, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o ‘Eliesa, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Siolimi, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Mātati, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Līvai.
42003030	‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Simione, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Siuta, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Siosifa, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Sionami, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o ‘Īlaiakimi.
42003031	‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Melea, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Mena, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Mātata, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Nētani, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Tēvita.
42003032	‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Sese, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o ‘ōpeti, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Poasi, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Solomone, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Na‘asoni.
42003033	‘A ia ko e foha ‘o ‘Aminatape, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o ‘Atamaini, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o ‘Alanai, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o ‘Esilome, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Felesi, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Siuta.
42003034	‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Sēkope, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o ‘Aisake, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o ‘Epalahame, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Tela, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Nēhoa.
42003035	‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Sēluki, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Le‘u, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Pēleki, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Hepelū, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Sela.
42003036	‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Kēnani, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o ‘Aafakisate, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Semi, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Noa, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Lēmeki.
42003037	‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Mētuisela, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o ‘Īnoke, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Sēleti, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Melilieli, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Kēnani.
42003038	‘A ia ko e foha ‘o ‘Īnosi, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o Seti, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o ‘ātama, ‘A ia ko e foha ‘o e ‘OTUA.
42004001	PEA na‘e foki mai ‘a Sīsū mei Soatani kuo fonu ‘i he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni; pea tākiekina fano ia ‘i he toafa ‘i he mālohi ‘o e Laumālie.
42004002	Pea ‘ahi‘ahi‘i ia ‘e he Tēvolo ‘i he ‘aho ‘e fāngofulu: pea ko e ngaahi ‘aho ko ia na‘e ‘ikai te ne kai ai ha me‘a; pea hili ia na‘a ne hālofia.
42004003	Pea pehē ‘e he Tēvolo kiate ia, Kapau ko e ‘Alo koe ‘o e ‘Otua, fekau ki he fo‘i maka ni ke hoko ko e fo‘i mā.
42004004	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū kiate ia, ‘o pēhe, Kuo tohi, ‘Oku ‘ikai mo‘ui ‘a e tangata ‘i he ma pē.
42004005	Pea ne ‘ohake ia ki ha potu mā‘olunga, ‘o ne faka‘ali‘ali ki ai ‘a e ngaahi pule‘anga kotoa pē ‘o māmani ‘i ha kemo pē taha.
42004006	Pea pehē kiate ia ‘e he Tēvolo, Te u foaki kiate koe ‘a e pule ki he ngaahi me‘a ni kotoa, mo hono nāunau: he kuo tuku ia kiate au; pea ‘ilonga ha taha ‘oku ou loto ki ai ‘oku ou foaki ia ki ai:
42004007	ko ia, kapau te ke punou ‘o lotu kiate au ‘e koe, ‘e ‘o‘ou kotoa.
42004008	Ka ka tali ‘e Sīsū ‘o ne pehē kiate ia, Kuo tohi, Te ke lotu ki he ‘Eiki ko ho ‘Otua, pea ko ia pē toko taha te ke ‘Otua‘aki.
42004009	Pea ne ‘ave ia ki Selusalema, ‘o ne fokotu‘u ki he tu‘ahivi ‘o e Temipale, ‘o ne pehē ki ai, Kapau ko e ‘Alo koe ‘o e ‘Otua, hopo ki lalo mei heni.
42004010	He kuo tohi, He ‘e kouna ‘e ia ‘ene kau ‘āngelo ke vakavakai koe;
42004011	mo ‘eni foki, Te nau fatakinima koe, na‘a pākia ho va‘e ‘i ha maka.
42004012	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū ‘o ne pehē ki ai, Kuo folofola‘aki, ‘e ‘ikai te ke ha‘aki ‘ahi‘ahi‘i ‘a e ‘Eiki ko ho ‘Otua.
42004013	Pea kuo faka‘osi ‘e he Tēvolo ‘a e ‘ahi‘ahi kotoa pē, pea ne ‘alu meiate ia ‘o tali faingamālie.
42004014	Pea na‘e foki ‘a Sīsū ki Kāleli ‘i he ivi ‘o e Laumālie, pea pavake atu hono ongoongo ki he feitu‘u ko ia kātoa.
42004015	Pea na‘a ne fa‘a faiako ‘i honau ngaahi falelotu, pea fakamālō kiate ia ‘e he kakai kotoa pē.
42004016	Pea ‘alu ia ki Nāsaleti, ‘a ia na‘a ne nofo ai ‘i he‘ene si‘i: pea hangē ko ‘ene fa‘a fai, na‘a ne hū ki he falelotu ‘i he ‘aho Sāpate, ‘o ne tu‘u hake ke lau folofola.
42004017	Pea na‘e ‘ange kiate ia ‘a e Puka ‘a e Palōfita ko ‘Aisea.
42004018	Pea ‘i he‘ene folahi ‘a e puka, na‘a ne ‘ilo ‘a e potu ‘a ia ‘oku tohi ai ‘a e lea ni, Ko e Laumālie ‘o e ‘Eiki ‘oku ‘iate au; he na‘a ne pani au ke u ‘alu mo e ongoongolelei ki he masiva:
42004019	kuo ne fekau au ke fanongonongo ‘a e tukuange ki he pōpula, mo e ‘ā ki he kui; ke fekau ‘a e ta‘eliekina ke ‘alu kuo tau‘atāina; ke fanongonongo ‘a e ta‘u ‘o e hōifua ‘a e ‘Eiki.
42004020	Pea ne takai ‘a e tohi, ‘o ‘ange ki he motu‘a tauhi, ‘o ne nofo ke malanga; pea sio fakamama‘u kiate ia ‘a e mata ‘o kinautolu kotoa pē na‘e ‘i he falelotu.
42004021	Pea ne kamata lea kiate kinautolu, ‘o pehē, Ko e ‘aho ni kuo fakamo‘oni ‘a e potu folofola ni ‘i ho‘omou fanongo.
42004022	Pea nau fakamo‘oni ki ai kotoa pē; ‘o nau ofo ‘i he ngaahi lea mālie na‘e tō mei hono fofonga, mo nau pehē, ‘ikai ko e foha ‘eni ‘o Siosifa?
42004023	Pea pehē ‘e ia kiate kinautolu, Kuo pau te mou ‘ai kiate au ‘a e lea ko eni, Faito‘o, fakamo‘ui koe; ko e ngaahi me‘a na‘a mau fanongo ne fai ‘i Kāpaneume, fai foki ‘i heni ‘i ho fonua ‘o‘ou.
42004024	Pea ne fai atu ‘o pehē, Ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala kiate kimoutolu, ‘oku ‘ikai mamalu ha palōfita ‘i hono fonua ‘o‘ona.
42004025	‘Oku mou lāu‘ilo ‘a e me‘a ‘oku ou tala, Na‘e tokolahi ‘a e kau fefine ‘Isileli na‘e uitou ‘i he kuonga ‘o ‘Ilaisiā–‘a e taimi na‘e tāpuni ai ‘a e langi ‘i he ta‘u ‘e tolu mo e māhina ‘e ono, pea hoko ai ha fu‘u honge ki he fonua kotoa-
42004026	ka tala‘ehai na‘e kouna ‘a ‘Ilaisiā ki ha taha ‘iate kinautolu; ka ki ha fefine uitou pē ‘i Salepita, ‘i he fonua ‘o Saitoni.
42004027	Pea na‘e tokolahi ‘a e tangata ‘Isileli na‘e kilia ‘i he kuonga ‘o e palōfita ko ‘Ilaisiā; ka tala‘ehai na‘e fakama‘a ha taha ‘iate kinautolu, ka ko Neamani pē, ‘a ia ko e tangata Sīlia.
42004028	Pea ko kinautolu kotoa pē na‘e ‘i he falelotu, na‘a nau mātu‘aki lili he‘enau fanongo ki he ngaahi me‘a ko ia;
42004029	‘o nau tutu‘u, ‘o kapusi ia kitu‘a kolo, ‘o nau taki ia ki ha lilifa ‘i he mo‘unga na‘e tu‘u ai ‘enau kolo, koe‘uhi ke lī hifo ia.
42004030	Ka ka moulu mai ia ‘i he lotolotonga ‘o e kakai, ‘o ‘alu:
42004031	‘o ne hifo ki Kāpaneume, ko e kolo ‘i Kāleli; pea na‘a ne nofo ai ‘o faiako kiate kinautolu he Sāpate.
42004032	Pea nau to‘oa ‘i he anga ‘o ‘ene fai; he ko ‘ene fakamatala na‘e ngali ko ha pule ia.
42004033	Pea na‘e ‘i he falelotu ha tangata na‘e ‘āvea ‘e ha fa‘ahikehe; pea na‘a ne kalanga le‘o lahi, ‘o pehē, Tuku ā! ko ho hā kimaua, ‘e Sīsū ‘o Nāsaleti?
42004034	Kuo ke ha‘u ke faka‘auha kimaua? ‘Oku ou ‘ilo koe, ko e Toko Taha Tapu ‘o e ‘Otua.
42004035	Pea lolomi ia ‘e Sīsū, ‘o ne pehē, Tuku ho‘o lea, pea mahu‘i mai meiate ia. Pea pe‘ehi ‘a e tangata ‘e he fa‘ahikehe ki he lotofale, ‘o ne toki mahu‘i atu: ka na‘e ‘ikai lavea ‘a e tangata.
42004036	Pea nau fu‘u ofo ai kotoa pē; ‘o nau fealēlea‘aki ‘o pehē, Ko e folofola hā ‘eni! he ‘oku ne kouna ‘a e ngaahi fa‘ahikehe, ‘o ngali ko ha pule mo ha mālohi, pea nau mahu‘i atu.
42004037	Pea pavake atu hono ongoongo ki he potu kotoa pē ‘o e feitu‘u ko ia.
42004038	Pea ‘i he‘ene tu‘u atu mei he falelotu na‘a ne hū ki he fale ‘o Saimone: pea na‘e ‘i ai ‘a e fa‘ē ‘a e uaifi ‘o Saimone kuo puke ‘i he fa‘ahinga mofi lahi: pea nau kole kiate ia koe‘uhi ko ia.
42004039	Pea tu‘u atu ia ‘o hanga hifo ki ai, ‘o ne lolomi ‘a e mofi; pea mahu‘i ia mei he fefine, pea ne tu‘u leva ‘o tauhi kinautolu.
42004040	Pea ‘i he kamata tō ‘a e la‘ā, ‘ilonga kinautolu na‘e ai ha‘anau kakai na‘e puke ‘i he fa‘ahinga mahaki kehekehe, na‘a nau ‘omi kinautolu kiate ia: pea ne kamata fakamo‘ui kinautolu, he‘ene hilifaki hono nima kiate kinautolu tāutaha.
42004041	Pea ‘alu atu foki ‘a e ngaahi fa‘ahikehe mei he ni‘ihi, ‘oku nau kalanga ‘o pehē, Ko koe ko e ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otua: ka ka lolomi ‘e ia, ‘o ‘ikai te ne tuku ke nau lea; koe‘uhi na‘a nau ‘ilo ko e Mīsaia ia.
42004042	Pea kuo ‘aho, pea ‘alu ia kitua‘ā ‘o mole ki ha potu lala; pea fiema‘u ia ‘e ha fu‘u kakai, ‘o nau ‘alu kiate ia, ‘o nau fai ke ta‘ofi ke ‘oua na‘a ne ‘alu meiate kinautolu.
42004043	Ka ka tali ‘e ia kiate kinautolu, Kuo pau ke u ‘ave ‘a e ongoongolelei ki he ngaahi kolo kehe foki, ‘o tala ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua; he na‘e fekau mai au ki he me‘a ko ia.
42004044	Pea na‘a ne malanga ‘i he ngaahi falelotu ‘o Siutea.
42005001	PEA ko e ‘aho ‘e taha na‘e feta‘ota‘omi mai kiate ia ha fu‘u kakai, mo nau fakafanongo ki he folofola ‘a e ‘Otua, pea ‘oku tu‘u ‘a Sīsū ‘i he mata anovai ko Kenesaleti:
42005002	‘iloange na‘a ne vakai ha ongo ki‘i vaka ‘oku tau ‘i he mata ano, pea kuo ‘alu mei ai ‘a e kau toutai, ‘o fō honau ngaahi kupenga.
42005003	Pea heka ia ki ha taha ‘o e ongo vaka, ‘a ia ko e vaka ‘o Saimone; pea ne kole kiate ia ke tukutuku si‘i atu mei ‘uta: pea ne nofo hifo ‘o fai ‘ene ako ki he kakai mei he vaka.
42005004	Pea kuo ‘osi ‘ene lea, na‘a ne pehē kia Saimone, Tuku atu ki he moana, pea ‘a‘au homou ngaahi kupenga ki ha ika.
42005005	Pea tali ‘e Saimone ‘o ne pehē ki ai, ‘ēī, ko e pō kātoa mo ‘emau ngangau, ‘o ‘ikai ma‘u ha mata‘i ika: ka ‘i ho‘o me‘a te u ‘a‘au pē ‘a e kupenga.
42005006	Pea ‘i he‘enau fai ia, na‘a nau ha‘o ha fu‘u tākanga ika, pea kamata mahae honau ngaahi kupenga.
42005007	Pea nau ta‘alo ki honau kaungā toutai ‘i he vaka ‘e taha ke ha‘u ‘o tokoni kinautolu, pea nau ha‘u, ‘o nau fakafonu ‘a e ongo vaka fakatou‘osi, ‘o na kamata ngoto.
42005008	Pea ‘i he sio ki ai ‘a Saimone Pita, na‘a ne hinga atu ki he tui ‘o Sīsū, ‘o ne pehē, Me‘a atu, ‘Eiki, mei hoku vaka, he ko e tangata angahala au.
42005009	He na‘a ne mo‘utāfu‘ua, pea pehē mo kinautolu na‘e ‘iate ia, ‘i he ola ‘o ‘enau ha‘o:
42005010	pea pehē foki ‘a Sēmisi mo Sione ko e ongo foha ‘o Sēpeti, ‘a ia na‘e kaume‘a mo Saimone. Pea tali ‘e Sīsū kia Saimone, ‘oua ‘e manavahē; mei he taimi ni te ke pō tangata.
42005011	Pea kuo nau ‘omi ‘a e ongo vaka ki ‘uta, na‘a nau li‘aki kotoa pē ‘o muimui kiate ia.
42005012	Pea ko e ‘aho ‘e taha na‘a ne ‘i ha kolo, pea ‘iloange, ko ha tangata kilia hoko; pea ‘i he‘ene sio kia Sīsū, na‘a ne fakatōmape‘e atu ‘o ne hū kiate ia, ‘o pehē, ‘Eiki, ka ne ke loto ke fai, te ke lava ke fakama‘a au.
42005013	Pea mafao atu ‘e ia hono nima, ‘o ala ki he tangata, ‘o ne pehē, ‘oku ou loto pē: ke ke ma‘a koe. Pea matafi atu leva ‘a e kilia meiate ia.
42005014	Pea ne na‘ina‘i ki he tangata ke ‘oua te ne lea ki ha taha; mo ne pehē, Ka ke hanga ‘alu pē ke fakahā koe ki he taula‘eiki, pea ‘ange ‘a e me‘a ‘o fakatatau ki he tu‘utu‘uni ‘a Mōsese mo‘ao fakama‘a, kōno fakamo‘oni kiate kinautolu.
42005015	Ka na‘e ‘āsili mafola ai ‘a e talanoa kiate ia; pea fa‘a fakataha ‘a e ngaahi fu‘u kakai ke fanongo kiate ia, pea ke fakamo‘ui mei honau ngaahi alangamahaki.
42005016	Ka ka taka vao pē ia ‘i he ngaahi toafa, ‘o ne toutou fai ‘ene lotu.
42005017	Pea ko e ‘aho ‘e taha ‘oku ne faiako, pea ‘oku ‘i he ha‘oha‘onga ha kau Fālesi mo ha kau Faiako-‘i-he-Lao, ‘a ia kuo nau omi mei he ngaahi feitu‘u kehekehe ‘o Kāleli mo Siutea mo Selusalema: pea ko e mālohi ‘o e ‘Eiki na‘e toka ki he faito‘o.
42005018	Pea ‘iloange, ko e kau siana ‘oku nau lupe‘i mai ‘i ha mohenga ha tangata na‘e mamatea: ‘o nau feinga ke laoaki ia ki loto ke tuku ‘i he ‘ao ‘o Sīsū.
42005019	Pea ‘i he ‘ikai te nau ‘ilo pe ko e hala fē te nau fakahū ai ia, koe‘uhi ko e tokolahi ‘o e kakai, na‘a nau ‘alu hake ki he tu‘a fale, ‘o nau tuku hifo ia mo e fala ‘i he ‘ato ki he loto fale ki he ‘ao ‘o Sīsū.
42005020	Pea ‘i he‘ene vakai ‘enau tui, na‘a ne pehē, Tangata, kuo fakamolemole ho‘o ngaahi angahala.
42005021	Pea kamata fifili ‘a e kau sikalaipe mo e kau Fālesi, ‘o pehē, Ko hai ‘a e siana ni ‘oku lea fie‘otua? Ko hai ha taha ‘oku ne mafai ke fakamolemole angahala, ka ko e ‘Otua pē toko taha?
42005022	Ka ka ‘ilo pē ‘e Sīsū ‘enau fakakaukau, ‘o ne toe lea ‘o pehē kiate kinautolu, Ko e hā ia ‘oku mou fifili ki ai ‘i homou loto?
42005023	Ko e fē ‘oku faingofua; ‘a e pehē, Kuo fakamolemole ho‘o ngaahi angahala: pe ko e pehē, Tu‘u ‘o ‘eve‘eva?
42005024	Ka koe‘uhi ke mou ‘ilo, ko e Fanautama ‘a Tangata ‘oku ne mafai ‘i māmani ke fakamolemole angahala, (pea hanga ia ‘o lea ki he tangata mamatea) ‘oku ou tala kiate koe, Tu‘u, pea to‘o ho fala, pea ‘alu ki ho ‘api.
42005025	Pea tu‘u hake leva ia ‘i honau ‘ao, ‘o ne to‘o ‘a e me‘a na‘a ne tokoto ai, ‘o ne ‘alu atu ki hono ‘api, mo ne fakamālō‘ia ‘a e ‘Otua.
42005026	Pea lelea honau loto kotoa pē, ‘o nau fakamālō‘ia ‘a e ‘Otua, pea nau mate ilifia, mo nau pehē, Kuo tau mata me‘a fakato‘ufeiva he ‘aho ni.
42005027	Pea hili ia na‘a ne ‘alu atu, ‘o ne kilofi ha pōpilikane na‘e hingoa ko Līvai, ‘oku nofo ‘i he fale tute; ‘o ne pehē kiate ia, muimui kiate au.
42005028	Pea ne tuku kotoa pē, ‘o ne tu‘u ‘o muimui kiate ia.
42005029	Pea fai ‘e Līvai ha fu‘u kātoanga kia Sīsū ‘i hono fale; pea ko e fu‘u tokolahi ‘o e kau pōpilikane mo e kakai kehe na‘e ‘i he kātoanga mo kinautolu.
42005030	Pea lāutu‘u ‘a e kau Fālesi mo e kau sikalaipe ‘onautolu ki he‘ene kau ako, he‘enau pehē, Ko e hā ‘oku mou kai mo inu fakataha ai mo e kau pōpilikane mo e kau angahala?
42005031	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Ko e tangata faito‘o ‘oku ‘ikai ma‘a e mo‘ui lelei, ka ma‘a e mahaki.
42005032	Na‘e‘ikai te u ha‘u ke ui ‘a e mā‘oni‘oni ki he fakatomala, ka ko e angahala.
42005033	Pea nau pehē kiate ia, Ko e hā ‘oku fa‘a ‘aukai ai ‘a e kau ako ‘a Sione, mo nau tauhi ‘a e ngaahi feingalotu; pehē foki ‘a e kau ako ‘a e kau Fālesi: ka ka kai pē, mo inu pē, ‘a kinautolu ‘oku ‘iate koe?
42005034	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū kiate kinautolu, He te mou lava hono fakaloto‘i ‘o e kakai ‘o e fale ta‘ane ke fai ha ‘aukai, ‘i he kei ‘iate kinautolu ‘a e tangata ta‘ane?
42005035	Kae tokaange ha taimi ‘e hiki meiate kinautolu ‘a e tangata ta‘ane, pea te nau toki ‘aukai ‘i he taimi ko ia.
42005036	Pea ne lea‘aki foki ha fakatātā kiate kinautolu, ‘o pehē: ‘oku ‘ikai ha taha te ne hae‘i mei ha kofu fo‘ou ha konga ke ‘oposi ‘aki ha kofu motu‘a: he ka pehē, ko e fo‘ou kuo mahae, pea ko e motu‘a ‘oku ‘ikai tu‘o tatau mo ia ‘a e konga mei he kofu fo‘ou.
42005037	Pea ‘oku ‘ikai ha taha te ne ‘utu ha uaine fo‘ou ki he ngaahi hina leta ‘oku motu‘a; he ka pehē, ‘e hae ‘a e ngaahi hina ‘e he uaine fo‘ou, pea mahua ai ‘a e uaine ia, pea maumau mo e ngaahi hina.
42005038	Ka ko hono taau ke ‘utu ha uaine fo‘ou ki ha ngaahi hina fo‘ou.
42005039	Pea ‘oku ‘ikai ha taha kuo ne inu ‘a e uaine motu‘a pea manako ki he fo‘ou; he ‘oku ne pehē, Ko e uaine motu‘a pē ‘oku sai.
42006001	PEA ko eni, ko e Sāpate ‘e taha na‘a ne fononga atu, ‘o hala loto ngoue: pea toli ‘e he‘ene kau ako ‘a e ngaahi fo‘i uite, ‘o milimili ‘i honau nima mo kai.
42006002	Pea pehē ‘e he ni‘ihi ‘o e kau Fālesi, Ko e hā ‘oku mou fai ai ‘a e me‘a ‘oku ‘ikai ngofua ‘i he Sāpate?
42006003	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu, ‘Io, ne ‘ikai te mou lau koā ‘a e me‘a ko ia na‘e fai ‘e Tēvita, ‘i he taimi na‘a ne hālofia ai mo kinautolu na‘e ‘iate ia?
42006004	‘a ‘ene hū ki he Fale ‘o e ‘Otua, ‘o ne to‘o ‘a e mā fono ‘o ‘ilo, mo ne ‘ange kiate kinautolu na‘e ‘iate ia: ka ko e me‘a ia ‘oku ‘ikai ngofua hono kai, ngata pē ‘i he kau taula‘eiki?
42006005	Pea ne toe pehē kiate kinautolu, Ko e Fanautama ‘a Tangata ko e ‘Eiki ia ‘o e Sāpate foki.
42006006	Pea faifai pea hū ia ki he falelotu ‘i ha Sāpate ‘e taha, ‘o ne faiako ai: pea na‘e ‘i ai ha tangata kuo mate hono nima to‘omata‘u.
42006007	Pea ko e kau sikalaipe mo e kau Fālesi na‘a nau lamalama ha‘ane fai ha faito‘o ‘i he Sāpate, ka nau ma‘u ha me‘a ke faka‘ilo ‘aki.
42006008	Ka ka ‘ilo pē ‘e ia ‘enau fakakaukau, ‘o ne pehē ki he tangata kuo nima mate, Tu‘u, ‘o hopo mai ki loto. Pea tu‘u ia ‘o hopo mai.
42006009	Pea pehē ‘e Sīsū kiate kinautolu, ‘oku ai ‘eku fehu‘i ke fai atu, Ko e fē ‘oku ngofua ‘i he Sāpate? Ke fai ha lelei, pe ke fai ha kovi? ke fakahaofi mo‘ui, pe ke faka‘auha ia?
42006010	Pea vakai foli ‘e ia ‘a kinautolu kotoa, ‘o ne pehē ki he tangata, Mafao atu ho nima na. Pea ne fai: pea na‘e toe mo‘ui mai hono nima.
42006011	Pea fakautuutu ai ‘enau sesele; ‘o nau fealēlea‘aki ai, pe ko e hā nai ha me‘a te nau fai kia Sīsū.
42006012	Pea na‘e hoko ‘i he kuonga ko ia ‘a ‘ene ‘alu atu ki he mo‘unga ke lotu; pea ne ‘osiki ‘a e pō ‘i he lotu ki he ‘Otua.
42006013	Pea ‘i he‘ene ‘aho hake, na‘a ne ui ange ‘ene kau ako; ‘o ne fili meiate kinautolu ha toko hongofulu mā toko ua, ‘o ne fakahingoa kinautolu ko e kau ‘Aposetolo:
42006014	ko Saimone (‘a ia na‘a ne fakahingoa foki ko Pita mo ‘Anitelū ko hono tehina, mo Sēmisi mo Sione mo Filipe mo Pātolomiu
42006015	mo Mātiu mo Tōmasi, ko Sēmisi ko e foha ‘o ‘Alefiusi, mo Saimone na‘e fa‘a lau ko e mamahi‘i fonua,
42006016	mo Siutasi ko e foha ‘o Sēmisi, pea mo Siutasi ‘Isikāliote ‘a ia na‘e ne hoko ko e lavaki.
42006017	Pea ‘alu hifo ia fakataha mo kinautolu, ‘o ne tu‘u ‘i ha potu na‘e toka lelei; pea na‘e ai mo e tokolahi ‘o ‘ene kau ako, mo ha fu‘u kakai ‘Isileli, mei Siutea kātoa, mo Selusalema, mo e hāngai-ki-tahi ‘o Taia mo Saitoni, kuo nau ha‘u ke fanongo kiate ia, pea ke faito‘o ‘a honau ngaahi alangamahaki:
42006018	ko kinautolu foki na‘e fakafiu‘i ‘e he ngaahi fa‘ahikehe na‘e fakamo‘ui.
42006019	Pea feinga ‘a e kakai kotoa ke ala kiate ia, he na‘e ‘alu atu meiate ia ha mālohi, ‘o fakamo‘ui kinautolu.
42006020	Pea tāngaki ia ki he‘ene kau ako, ‘o ne pehē, Monū‘ia ā ka ko kimoutolu ‘oku masiva: He ‘oku ‘omoutolu ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua.
42006021	Monū‘ia ā ka ko kimoutolu ‘oku fiekaia ni: He ‘e fakamākona kimoutolu, Monū‘ia ā ka ko kimoutolu ‘oku tangi ni: he te mou kata.
42006022	Monū‘ia ā ka ko kimoutolu, ‘oka fehi‘anekina ‘e he kakai, pea ‘oka nau ka kapusi kimoutolu, mo manuki‘i, mo nau keu‘i homou hingoa ‘o hangē ko ha me‘a ‘oku pango, koe‘uhi pē ko e Fanautama ‘a Tangata.
42006023	‘ē, mou fiefia ‘i he taimi ko ia, mo hākahaka; he vakai ‘oku lahi ho‘omou totongi ‘i he langi: he ko e me‘a pē ia na‘e fai ‘e he‘enau mātu‘a ki he kau palōfita.
42006024	Ka ‘oiauē ‘a kimoutolu koloa‘ia! He ko hono ngata ‘ena ‘o ho‘omou fiemālie ‘oku mou ma‘u.
42006025	‘Oiauē ‘a kimoutolu ‘oku mākona ni! He te mou fiekaia. ‘Oiauē ‘a kimoutolu ‘oku kata ni! He te mou mamahi mo tangi.
42006026	‘Oiauē ‘a kimoutolu, ‘oka lau‘i lelei ‘e he kakai fuli pē! He ko e me‘a pē ia na‘e fai ‘e he‘enau mātu‘a ki he kau palōfita loi.
42006027	Ka ‘oku ou tala kiate kimoutolu ‘oku fanongo na, Mou ‘ofa‘i homou ngaahi fili, fai lelei kiate kinautolu ‘oku fehi‘a kiate kimoutolu,
42006028	tāpuaki‘i ‘a kinautolu ‘oku tutuku‘i kimoutolu, hūfia ‘a kinautolu ‘oku nau ngaohikovi‘i kimoutolu.
42006029	Ka tuki‘i koe ‘e hā taha ‘i ho kou‘ahe, ‘ange ki ai ‘a e kou‘ahe ‘e taha; pea ko ia ‘oku ‘ave ho pulupulu, ‘oua na‘a ta‘ofi mei ai mo ho sote.
42006030	‘Ilonga ha taha ‘e fai ha kole kiate koe, tali ia; pea ka ‘ave ‘e ha taha ha‘o me‘a, ‘oua na‘a ‘eke ia.
42006031	Pea hangē ko ia ‘oku mou loto ke fai ‘e he kakai kiate kimoutolu, mou fai tatau mo ia foki kiate kinautolu.
42006032	He kapau ‘oku mou ‘ofa‘i ‘a kinautolu pē ‘oku ‘ofa mai, ko e me‘a ia ‘e fakafeta‘ia? he na‘a mo e kakai angahala ‘oku nau ‘ofa‘i ‘a kinautolu ‘oku ‘ofa mai.
42006033	Pea kapau ‘oku mou fai lelei kiate kinautolu pē ‘oku fai lelei mai, ko e me‘a ia ‘e fakafeta‘ia? He na‘a mo e kakai angahala ‘oku nau fai ‘a e me‘a ko ia.
42006034	Pea kapau te mou tali ha nonō kiate kinautolu pē ‘oku mou ‘amanaki ke toe ma‘u mei ai, ko e me‘a ia ‘e fakafeta‘ia? Na‘a mo e kakai angahala ‘oku nau tali nonō ki he kakai angahala, koe‘uhi ke nau ma‘u mai hono tatau.
42006035	Ka mou ‘ofa‘i homou ngaahi fili; pea fai lelei mo tali nonō, neongo ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ‘amanaki ‘e toe ma‘u mai ha me‘a; pea ‘e lahi ho‘omou totongi, pea te mou hoko ko e ngaahi foha ‘o e ‘eiki Taupotu; he ‘oku angalelei ia ki he ta‘ehounga mo e faikovi.
42006036	‘ē, mou hoko ko e kau ‘ofangofua, ‘o hangē ‘oku ‘ofangofua ‘a ho‘omou Tamai.
42006037	Pea ‘oua ‘e fakaanga, pea ‘e ‘ikai anga‘ia kimoutolu: pea ‘oua ‘e fakahalaia, pea ‘e ‘ikai fakahalaia kimoutolu: mou fakamolemole, pea ‘e fakamolemole ‘a kimoutolu:
42006038	‘ange pea ‘e toe ‘omi kiate kimoutolu–kuo fua fakalaka, kuo fa‘o tuki ki he puha fua, kuo lulu‘i, kuo fonu mokulu; ‘e pehē ‘a ‘enau toe ‘atu ki homou kona. He ko e fua ‘oku mou fua ‘aki, ko ia pē ‘e fua ‘aki ho‘omou totongi.
42006039	Pea ne lea‘aki foki ha fakatātā kiate kinautolu, ‘o pehē, ‘e lava koā ‘e ha kui ke takihala ki ha kui, ‘ō? ‘ikai te na fakatou tō ki ha luo?
42006040	Tala‘ehai ‘oku lahi ‘a e tama ako ‘i he faiako: ka ka ‘ilonga ha taha kuo haohaoa ‘ene ako te ne hangē ko e faiako.
42006041	Pea ko e hā ‘oku ke tokanga ai ki he malamala‘i ‘akau ‘oku ‘i he mata ‘o ho kāinga, ka ko e fu‘u lalango na ‘oku ‘i ho mata ‘o‘ou ‘oku ‘ikai te ke ‘ilo ki ai?
42006042	Te ke lava fēfē ke lea ki ho kāinga, Nga‘ata, tuku ke u to‘oa mai ‘a e malamala na ‘oku ‘i ho mata; ‘osi, ‘oku ‘ikai te ke tokanga‘i ‘e koe ‘a e fu‘u lalango ‘i ho mata ‘o‘ou? ‘a e ‘afungi! tomu‘a to‘o mai ‘a e lalango mei ho‘ou mata, pea te ke toki sio totonu ke to‘o ‘a e malamala mei he mata ‘o ho kāinga.
42006043	He ‘oku ‘ikai ha me‘a pehē, ke fua tamaki ‘e ha ‘akau ‘aonga, pe ke fua ‘aonga ‘e ha ‘akau tamaki.
42006044	Ka ‘oku mahino ‘a e ‘akau takitaha mei hono fua ‘o‘ona. He ‘oku ‘ikai tufi fiki ‘i he vao talatala, pe toli kālepi ‘i he talatala‘āmoa.
42006045	Ko e tangata lelei ‘oku fisi kitu‘a ai ‘a e lelei mei he koloa lelei kuo fa‘o ki hono loto; pea ko e tangata kovi ‘oku fisi kitu‘a ai ‘a e kovi mei he koloa kovi kuo fa‘o ‘i hono loto: he ko e talanoa ‘a e ngutu ‘oku mei he me‘a ‘i he loto ‘oku hulu atu.
42006046	Pea ko e hā ‘oku mou lau ai kiate au, ‘ēī, ‘ēī; ka ‘oku ‘ikai te mou fai ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ou tala?
42006047	‘Ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku ha‘u kiate au, ‘o fanongo ki he‘eku ngaahi tala, ‘o fai ki ai, te u fakatātā atu hono tatau:
42006048	‘oku ne tatau mo ha tangata langa fale; ‘a ia na‘a ne keli, ‘o toe foa ‘aki, ‘o ne ‘ai ‘a e tu‘unga ki he maka: pea ‘i he mahake ‘a e vaitafe, na‘a ne pā atu ki he fale ko ia; pea na‘e ‘ikai te ne mafai ke lulu ia: ko e me‘a ‘i he lelei hono langa.
42006049	Ka ko ia ‘oku ne fanongo ‘o ‘ikai fai, ‘oku ne tatau mo e tangata na‘e langa fale ‘i he funga kelekele, ta‘ete ne keli ha tu‘unga; ‘a ia na‘e pā atu ki ai ‘a e vaitafe, pea holofa leva ia: pea na‘e hoko ‘a e maumau ‘o e fale ko ia ko e maumau lahi.
42007001	PEA kuo ‘osi ‘ene ngaahi tala kotoa pē kae fanongo ‘a e kakai, pea ne toki ‘alu ‘o hū ki Kāpaneume.
42007002	Pea na‘e ai ha senituliō ‘e taha, kuo puke ‘o tei mate ‘ene pōpula, ‘a ia na‘a ne mahu‘inga‘ia ai.
42007003	Pea kuo fanongo ia ko Sīsū, na‘a ne fakafai ‘i ha mātu‘a ni‘ihi ‘o e kakai Siu ‘ene kole kiate ia, ke ha‘u ‘o faito‘o ‘ene pōpula.
42007004	Pea nau omi kia Sīsū, ‘o nau kole fakamātoato kiate ia, ‘o pehē, Ko e tangata ‘eni ‘oku taau ke ke fai ki ai ‘a e me‘a:
42007005	he ‘oku ne ‘ofa‘i hotau kakai, pea na‘a ne langa ‘e ia pē hotau falelotu.
42007006	Pea ‘alu ‘a Sīsū mo kinautolu. Pea kuo ne mei a‘u ki he fale, mo e fekau ange ‘e he senituliō ha kāinga ni‘ihi ke lea kiate ia, ‘o pehē, ‘Eiki, ‘oua na‘a ke ongosia me‘a mai: he ‘oku ‘ikai te u taau ke ke hū ki hoku poko‘i fale:
42007007	pea ko ia foki na‘a ku pehē ai ‘oku ou ta‘etaau ke ‘alu atu kiate koe: ka ke fai pē ha fo‘i folofola, pea ‘e mo‘ui ‘a ‘eku tamaio‘eiki.
42007008	He ko au foki ko e tangata ‘oku fakaongo ki ha pule, pea ‘oku ai ha kau sōtia ‘oku fakaongo kiate au; pea u pehē ki ha taha, ‘alu, pea ‘alu ia; pea ki ha taha, Ha‘u, pea ne ha‘u; pea u pehē ki he‘eku pōpula, Fai ē, pea ‘oku ne fai.
42007009	Pea ‘i he fanongo ‘e Sīsū ki he me‘a ko ia, na‘a ne ofo ‘i he tangata; pea tafoki ia ki he fu‘u kakai na‘e muimui mai, ‘o ne pehē, ‘Oku ou tala atu, Na‘a mo ‘Isileli, na‘e ‘ikai te u ‘ilo ai ki ha tui ‘oku pehē fau.
42007010	Pea ‘i he foki ki he fale ‘a e kakai na‘e fekau, na‘a nau ‘ilo ‘a e pōpula, kuo mo‘ui.
42007011	Pea ko e ‘aho na‘a na feholoi, na‘a ne ‘alu ki he kolo ‘oku hingoa ko Neini; pea na‘e fononga mai ‘ene kau ako, pea mo ha fu‘u kakai.
42007012	Pea ‘i he‘ene ofi ki he matanikolo, ‘iloange, na‘e fata mai kitua‘ā ha pekia, ko e tama pē toko taha ia ‘a ‘ene fa‘ē, pea ko e fefine uitou ia: pea na‘e ‘iate ia ha kakai tokolahi ‘o e kolo.
42007013	Pea ‘i he mamata ‘e Sīsū ki he fefine, na‘e langa hono fatu ‘i he ‘ofa ki ai, ‘o ne pehē kiate ia, ‘Oua ‘e tangi.
42007014	Pea ne ‘alu atu ‘o ala ki he fata; pea tu‘u pē ‘a e kau fata. Pea ne pehē, Tama, ‘oku ou tala atu, ke ke tu‘u.
42007015	Pea nofo hake ‘a e ‘anga‘anga, ‘o kamata lea, pea ne tuku ia ki he‘ene fa‘ē.
42007016	Pea mo‘u ilifia ‘a e kakai kotoa pē: ‘o nau fakamālō‘ia ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘o nau pehē, Kuo tupu ‘i hotau lotolotonga ha palōfita lahi: mo ‘eni, Kuo ‘a‘ahi ‘a e ‘Eiki ki hono kakai.
42007017	Pea pavake ‘a hono ongoongo ko ia ‘i Siutea kātoa, kae‘uma‘ā ‘a e feitu‘u kotoa ko ia.
42007018	Pea talanoa kia Sione ‘e he‘ene kau ako ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia kotoa pē.
42007019	Pea ui ange ‘e Sione ha tokoua ‘o ‘ene kau ako, ‘o ne fekau ‘a kinaua ki he ‘Eiki ke pehē kiate ia, Ko koe ia na‘e pehē ke ha‘u? Pe te tau ‘amanaki ki ha taha?
42007020	Pea ‘i he a‘u mai ‘a e ongo me‘a kiate ia, na‘a na pehē, Ko Sione Papitaiso kuo ne fekau mai kimaua kiate koe; pea ko ‘ene me‘a mai, pe ko koe ia na‘e pehē ke ha‘u, pe te tau ‘amanaki ki ha taha?
42007021	Ko e feitu‘ula‘ā ko ia na‘a ne fakamo‘ui ‘a e tokolahi mei he ngaahi mahaki, pea mo e ngaahi me‘a fakamamahi, mo e ngaahi fa‘ahikehe, ‘o ne ‘ofa ki ha ni‘ihi kui, ‘o faka‘ā.
42007022	Pea tali ‘e ia ‘o ne pehē ki he ongo me‘a, Mo ō, ‘o fakahā kia Sione ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku mo mamata mo fanongo ki ai; ‘oku ‘ā ‘a e kui, ‘eve‘eva ‘a e heke, fakama‘a ‘a e kilia, ongo ‘a e tuli, fokotu‘u ‘a e pekia, pea ‘oku malanga‘aki ‘a e ongoongolelei ki he masiva.
42007023	Pea monū‘ia ā ka ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai tūkia ‘iate au.
42007024	Pea kuo ō ‘a e ongo talafekau ‘a Sione, pea hanga ‘e Sīsū ‘o lea ki he kakai ‘ia Sione, ‘o pehē, Ko ho‘omou ‘alu atu ki he toafa ke siofi ‘a e hā? Ko ha kaho ‘apē, ‘oku lulu‘i ‘e he matangi, ‘ō?
42007025	Ka ko e hā nai na‘a mou ‘alu atu ke mātā? Ko ha tangata ‘apē, ‘oku kofu silika fakatafu‘ufu‘u, ‘o? ‘ē, ko e fa‘ahinga ‘oku kofu fakalaukau, mo mo‘ui fakananivi, ‘oku nofo palasi.
42007026	Ka ko ho‘omou ‘alu atu ke mamata ki he hā? Ki ha palōfita? ‘āua! tala atu, ‘oku lahi ia ‘i ha palōfita.
42007027	Ko eni ia na‘e kau ki ai ‘a e folofola, Vakai, ‘oku ou fekau atu hoku fakamelomelo ke mu‘omu‘a kiate koe, ‘a ia te ne teuteu ho hala mo‘ou.
42007028	‘Oku ou tala atu, ‘i he kakai kotoa kuo fanau‘i ‘e he fefine, ‘oku ‘ikai ha taha ‘oku lahi ‘ia Sione; ka neongo pe ko hai ‘oku faka‘ange‘ange ‘i he Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua, ‘oku lahi ia ‘ia Sione.
42007029	(Pea ko e kau ‘Isileli kotoa na‘e fanongo, pea mo e kau pōpilikane, na‘a nau fakatonuhia‘ia ‘a e ‘Otua, he‘enau papitaiso ‘i he papitaiso ‘a Sione.
42007030	Ka ko e kau Fālesi mo e kau tufunga lao, ko e ‘ikai te nau papitaiso ‘iate ia, ko ‘enau le‘ei ia ‘a e tu‘utu‘uni ‘a e ‘Otua ‘o nau kovi ai.)
42007031	Ka te u fakatatau ki he hā ‘a e kakai ‘o e to‘utangata ni? ‘io, ‘oku nau hangē nai ko e hā?
42007032	‘Oku nau hangē ko ha tu‘unga tamaiki ‘oku nofo ‘i ha mala‘e, ‘o nau fekalanga‘aki, ‘o pehē, Ne mau tā nafa atu, kae ‘ikai te mou me‘e; ne mau hua ‘a e ‘oiauē, kae ‘ikai te mou fetāngihi.
42007033	He kuo ha‘u ‘a Sione Papitaiso, ‘o ‘ikai kai mā, pe inu kava; pea mou pehē,
42007034	‘Oku ‘iate ia ha tēvolo. Kuo ha‘u ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata, ‘o keinanga mo faikava; pea mou pehē, ‘Isa! Ko e tama fa‘a kai mo inu kava, ko e kaume‘a ‘o e pōpilikane mo e kau angahala!
42007035	Ka na‘e fakatonuhia ‘a Poto ‘e he fānau kotoa pē ‘a‘ana.
42007036	Pea na‘e fakaafe ia ‘e ha Fālesi ‘e taha ke na kai, pea hū ia ki he fale ‘o e Fālesi, ‘o tokoto fakaloloa ‘i he nofo‘a.
42007037	Pea ‘iloange ko ha fefine–pea ko e toko taha ia ‘i he kau fe‘auaki ‘o e kolo-‘i he‘ene ‘ilo pau ‘oku keinanga ‘a Sīsū ‘i he fale ‘o e Fālesi, na‘a ne ha‘u mo ia ha hina ‘alapasita na‘e fonu ‘i he lolo tākai;
42007038	‘o ne tu‘u mei hono tu‘a ‘o ofi ki hono va‘e, ‘o tangi; pea ‘i he viku leva hono va‘e ‘i he lo‘imata na‘a ne hanga ‘o holoholo ‘aki hono lou‘ulu, mo ne toutou ‘uma ki hono va‘e, ‘o ne tākai ‘aki ‘a e lolo.
42007039	Pea ‘i he vakai ki ai ‘e he Fālesi ‘a ia na‘a ne fakaafe ia, na‘a ne pehē ‘i hono loto, Ka ne ko ha palōfita ‘eni, pehē kuo ne ‘ilo ‘a e fefine ni ‘oku ala kiate ia, mo ‘ene anga; he ko e angahala ia.
42007040	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū ‘o ne pehē ki ai, ‘E Saimone, ‘oku ‘i ai ha‘aku lea ke fai atu. Pea pehē ‘e ia, Fai pē, Tangata‘eiki.
42007041	Na‘e ai ha ongo tangata na‘e mo‘ua ki hā matāpule tali-nō-pa‘anga: ko e mo‘ua ‘o e taha ko e tēnali ‘e nimangeau, ko e taha ko e tēnali ‘e nimangofulu.
42007042	Pea ‘i he ‘ikai ha‘ana me‘a ke totongi ‘aki, na‘a ne fakamolemole fakatou‘osi. Ko e fē nai ‘iate kinaua ‘e lahi ‘ene ‘ofa ki he matāpule?
42007043	Pea tali ‘e Saimone ‘o ne pehē, ‘oku ou pehē, ko e toko taha na‘e lahi ‘ene fakamolemole ki ai. Pea pehē ‘e Sīsū kiate ia, Totonu pē ho‘o lau.
42007044	Pea tafoki ia ki he fefine, mo ne pehē kia Saimone, ‘Oku ke vakai ‘a e fefine ni? Ne u hū mai ki ho fale, pea hono ke ‘omi ha vai ki hoku va‘e? ka ko e fefine ni kuo ne fakaviviku hoku va‘e ‘aki hono lo‘imata, pea holoholo ‘aki hono lau,
42007045	Hoke ki‘i ‘uma kiate au? Ka ko e fefine ni, talu ‘eku hū mai mo e ‘ikai tuku ‘ene ‘uma lolomi ki hoku va‘e.
42007046	Hoke pani lolo hoku ‘ulu? ka ko e fefine ni kuo ne pani ‘aki ‘a e lolo tākai ‘a hoku va‘e.
42007047	Ko ia ‘oku ou tala atu, Ko ha‘ana angahala ne hulu atu, pea kuo fakamolemole; he vakai kuo lahi ‘ene ‘ofa: ka ko ia ‘oku si‘i ‘a e fakamolemole ki ai pea si‘i ha‘ana ‘ofa.
42007048	Pea pehē ‘e ia ki he fefine, Kuo fakamolemole ho‘o ngaahi angahala.
42007049	Pea ko kinautolu na‘a nau keinanga mo ia, na‘a nau kamata lea ‘i honau loto, ‘o pehē, Ko hai ‘eni, ‘a ia ‘oku fakamolemole angahala foki?
42007050	Pea pehē ‘e Sīsū ki he fefine, Kuo fakamo‘ui koe ‘e ho‘o tui; ‘alu, ‘o fiemālie pē ā.
42008001	PEA hoko mo ia ‘ene fakatotofu ‘a e kolo mo e vilisi, ‘i he‘ene fanongonongo ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua, mo ne tala hono ongoongolelei.
42008002	Pea na‘e ‘iate ia ‘a e kau Hongofulumāua; mo ha tu‘unga fafine ‘a ia kuo fakamo‘ui mei he ngaahi fa‘ahikehe, mo e ngaahi vaivai‘anga; ko Mele ‘oku ui ko e Mele mei Makitala, ‘a ia na‘e ‘alu mei ai ‘a e tēvolo ‘e toko fitu,
42008003	mo Sioana ko e uaifi ‘o Kusa ko e mu‘a ‘a Hēlota, mo Sūsana, mo e tokolahi kehe: pea ko e fa‘ahinga ko ia na‘a nau tauhi kinautolu ‘aki ‘enau koloa.
42008004	Pea ‘i he fetautaulaki mai ha fu‘u kakai lahi, pea ha‘u mo ha‘u ha ni‘ihi mei he kolo takitaha, na‘a ne hanga ‘o lea fakatātā kiate kinautolu.
42008005	Na‘e ‘alu atu ha tangata tūtuu‘i ke tūtuu‘i ‘ene tenga: pea ‘i he‘ene tūtuu‘i, ne tō ha me‘a ‘i he ve‘ehala; pea mala ai ‘a e kakai, pea kai ‘o ‘osi ia ‘e he fanga manupuna ‘o e ‘atā.
42008006	Pea tō ha me‘a ‘e taha ki he funga maka; pea ‘i he‘ene tupu na‘e mate ia ko e ‘ikai mālūlū.
42008007	Pea tō ha me‘a ‘e taha ki he tu‘unga ‘o ha ngaahi ‘akau talatala; pea tupu fakataha mo ia ‘a e ‘akau talatala, ‘o nau kāsia ia.
42008008	Pea tō ha me‘a ‘e taha ki he kelekele kuo taau, pea ‘i he‘ene tupu na‘a ne fua, ‘o fuo teau. Pea ‘i he ‘ai atu ‘e Sīsū ‘a e me‘a ko ia na‘a ne kalanga, Ko ia ‘oku ‘i ai hano telinga ke ongo‘aki, pea ke ne ongo‘i.
42008009	Pea fakafehu‘i kiate ia ‘e he‘ene kau ako, ‘o pehē, Ko e hā nai ‘a e fakatātā ni?
42008010	Pea ne pehē, Kuo tuku kiate kimoutolu ke ‘ilo ‘a e ngaahi misiteli ‘o e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua; ka ‘oku fai fakatātā pē ki hono toe ‘o e kakai; koe‘uhi ke nau sio, kae ‘ikai tokanga, pea fanongo, kae ‘ikai ongo‘i.
42008011	Ko eni pē ‘a e fakatātā ko ia: Ko e tenga ko e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua.
42008012	Pea ko kinautolu ‘i he ve‘ehala, ko e kakai ia ‘oku fanongo; pea toki ha‘u ‘a e tēvolo, ‘o ne ‘ave ‘a e folofola mei honau loto, na‘a nau tui pea mo‘ui.
42008013	Pea ko kinautolu ‘i he funga maka, ko e kakai ia ‘oku fanongo leva mo tali fiefia ‘a e folofola; ka ‘oku ‘ikai fai aka ‘a kinautolu ni, ka ‘oku nau tui pē ‘i he taimi ko ia, pea ‘i ha taimi ‘ahi‘ahi ‘oku nau hiki.
42008014	Pea ko ia na‘e tō ki he ‘akau talatala, ko kinautolu ia na‘e fanongo, ka ‘i he‘enau fai atu ‘oku ngāpulou kinautolu ‘e he ngaahi mo‘ua ‘o e mo‘ui ni, mo hono koloa, mo hono ngaahi mālie; pea ‘oku ‘ikai ai te nau tō a‘u.
42008015	Pea ko ia ‘oku ‘i he kelekele kuo lelei, ko e fa‘ahinga ia ‘oku nau tali ‘a e folofola‘aki ‘a e loto kuo lelei mo taau, ‘o nau pukenima‘i ia, pea nau fua he‘enau kītaki.
42008016	Pea tala‘ehai ‘oku tutu ha maama, pea pulonga ‘aki ha kumete, pe ‘ai ki ha lalo mohenga; ka ‘oku ne ‘ai ki ha tu‘unga maama, koe‘uhi ke sio ki hono maama ‘e kinautolu ‘oku hū mai.
42008017	He ‘oku ‘ikai ha me‘a ‘oku lilo, ka ‘e faifai pea e‘a; ‘uma‘ā ha me‘a ‘oku fufū ka ‘e ‘iloa pē, pea hoko ‘o fu‘u e‘a.
42008018	Ko ia mou tokanga ki he anga ‘o ho‘omou fanongo: he ka ai ha taha te ne ma‘u ha me‘a, ‘e ‘ange ki ai mo ha me‘a; pea ka ai ha taha ‘oku ‘ikai ke ma‘u, na‘a mo e me‘a ‘oku ne matamata ma‘u ‘e to‘o meiate ia.
42008019	Pea na‘e ‘alu ange kiate ia ‘ene fa‘ē mo hono ngaahi tokoua, pea na‘e ‘ikai te nau lava ke fe‘iloaki mo ia koe‘uhi ko e fu‘u kakai.
42008020	Pea na‘e fakahā ange kia Sīsū, ‘o pehē, Ko ho‘o fa‘ē mo ho ngaahi tokoua ‘oku tutu‘u mei tu‘a, ‘oku nau fie fe‘iloaki mo koe.
42008021	Ka ka tali ‘e ia kiate kinautolu ‘o pehē, Ko ‘eku fa‘ē mo hoku ngaahi tokoua, ko eni ia; ‘a kinautolu ‘oku fanongo ki he folofola ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘o fai ki ai.
42008022	Pea ko e ‘aho ‘e taha, na‘e heka ‘e ia mo ‘ene kau ako ki ha vaka; pea ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Tau ō ki he kau ano ‘e taha. Pea nau tuku atu.
42008023	Pea na‘e mohe ia lolotonga ‘enau folau: pea hifo mai ha ‘ahiohio ki he anovai; pea nau kamata ngoto, pea hangē ka tu‘utāmaki.
42008024	Pea nau ‘unu‘unu atu ‘o fafangu ia, ‘ēī, ‘ēī, ‘oku tau tu‘utāmaki! Pea ne tu‘u, ‘o lolomi ‘a e matangi mo e hou ‘o e tahi: pea fakalolo ia ‘o tofu.
42008025	Pea ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Kofa‘ā ia ho‘omou tui? Pea nau ofo mo ilifia, ‘o nau fepehē‘aki, Uoi! ko hai nai ‘eni! he ‘oku ne tu‘utu‘uni me‘a ki he matangi mo e tahi, pea nau fakaongo ki ai!
42008026	Pea nau tau atu ki he fonua ‘o e kakai Kēlasa, ‘a ia ko ha fonua ‘oku fevaha‘anaki mo Kāleli.
42008027	Pea ‘i he‘ene hifo ki ‘uta, na‘e fakafetaulaki kiate ia ha tangata ‘o e kolo, ‘a ia kuo iate ia ha fanga tēvolo, pea kuo fuoloa mo e ‘ikai te ne tui ha kofu, pea na‘e ‘ikai te ne nofo ki ha fale, ka ko e ngaahi fonualoto pē.
42008028	Pea ‘i he‘ene ‘ilo ‘a Sīsū, na‘a ne kaila, ‘o ne hinga atu ki ai, ‘o ne lea le‘o lahi ‘o pehē, Ko ho hā au, ‘e Sīsū, ko e ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otua Taupotu? ‘oku ou kole kiate koe, ‘oua na‘a ke fakamamahi‘i au.
42008029	He kuo ne kamata fekau ki he fa‘ahikehe ke mahu‘i mei he tangata. He kuo fuoloa hono ‘āvea, pea na‘e fa‘a ha‘i seini ia, pea ma‘u kii‘i hono va‘e; ka ka motuhi ‘e ia hono ha‘i, kae fakaoma ia ‘e he tēvolo ki he toafa.
42008030	Pea fehu‘i ‘e Sīsū kiate ia, Ko hai ho hingoa? Pea ne tali, ko Kongakau au: he na‘e tokolahi ‘a e tēvolo kuo hū kiate ia.
42008031	Pea nau kole kiate ia ke ‘oua te ne tu‘utu‘uni ke nau ‘alu mei ai ki Luo.
42008032	Pea na‘e ai ha fanga puaka tokolahi ‘oku nau huhua ‘i he mo‘unga: pea kole ‘e he ngaahi fa‘ahikehe kiate ia ke ne tuku ke nau hū ki he fa‘ahinga ko ia. Pea ne tukuange.
42008033	Pea ‘alu atu ‘a e fanga tēvolo mei he tangata, ‘o nau hū ki he puaka; pea ‘oho ‘a e fanga manu ‘i he tahifohifo ki he anovai, ‘o nau melemo ai.
42008034	Pea hola ‘a e kakai na‘e tauhi kinautolu, ‘i he‘enau sio ki he me‘a kuo fai, pea nau ongoongoa ia ki he kolo mo e ngoue‘anga.
42008035	Pea na‘e ‘alu atu ‘a e kakai ke vakai ‘a e me‘a kuo fai; pea nau ha‘u kia Sīsū, pea nau ‘ilo ‘a e tangata, ‘a ia na‘e ‘alu mei ai ‘a e fanga tēvolo, ‘oku ne ta‘utu ‘i he va‘e ‘o Sīsū, kuo kofu, pea kuo poto: pea nau ilifia.
42008036	Pea talanoa‘ia kiate kinautolu ‘e he kakai na‘e mamata ki ai ‘a e anga ‘o e fakamo‘ui ‘o e ‘āvea.
42008037	Pea kole kia Sīsū ‘e he kakai kotoa ‘o e feitu‘u ‘o Kēlasa ke ne ‘alu meiate kinautolu; he na‘a nau mo‘u manavahēa ‘aupito: ko ia, na‘a ne heka vaka, ‘o ne foki atu.
42008038	Pea ko e tangata, ‘a ia ne ‘alu mei ai ‘a e fanga tēvolo, na‘a ne kole kia Sīsū ke na ō mo ia: ka ka tekaki ia ‘e Sīsū, ‘o ne pehē.
42008039	Foki pē ki ho fale, pea fakamatala ki he ngaahi fu‘u me‘a kuo fai ‘e he ‘Otua ma‘au. Pea ‘alu ange ia, ‘o ongoongoa ‘i he kolo kotoa ‘a e ngaahi fu‘u me‘a kuo fai ma‘ana ‘e Sīsū.
42008040	Pea ‘i he foki atu ‘a Sīsū, na‘e tali fiefia ia ‘e he kakai; he kuo nau nofo‘aki ‘amanaki kotoa pē kiate ia.
42008041	Pea ‘iloange na‘e ha‘u kiate ia ha tangata, ‘a ia na‘e hingoa ko Sailosi, pea ko e toko taha ia na‘e pule ki he falelotu: pea ne tōmape‘e ‘i he va‘e ‘o Sīsū, ‘o ne kole kiate ia ke ‘alu ange ki hono ‘api:
42008042	he ‘oku taha tofu pē ‘ene me‘a, ko e ta‘ahine, fe‘unga nai hono ta‘u mo e hongofulu mā ua, pea ‘oku fakatau ni ia ke pekia. Pea ‘i he‘ene ‘alu ange na‘e ‘efitu‘ua ia ‘i he kakai.
42008043	Pea na‘e ai ha fefine kuo hongofulu mā ua ta‘u ‘ene ‘au toto, kae‘uma‘ā kuo mole ‘ene me‘a kotoa ki he kau faito‘o, kae ‘ikai lava ‘e ha taha hano faito‘o;
42008044	pea ‘unu‘unu atu ia ‘i hono tu‘a, ‘o ne ala ki he pao ‘o hono kofu: pea tuku fakafokifā ‘ene ‘au toto.
42008045	Pea lea ‘a Sīsū ‘o pehē, Ko hai ia ne ala kiate au? Pea ‘i he‘enau faka‘ikai kotoa pē, na‘e pehē ‘e Pita mo kinautolu na‘e ‘iate ia, ‘ēī, ‘oku kāpui koe ‘e he kakai, mo feta‘omi mai.
42008046	Ka ka lea ‘e Sīsū, ‘o pehē, Ka na‘e ai ha taha na‘e ala mai: he ‘oku ou ‘ilo kuo ‘alu meiate au ha mālohi.
42008047	Pea ‘i he hā ki he fefine ‘oku ‘ikai te ne puli, na‘a ne ha‘u tetetete, ‘o ne hinga atu ‘i hono ‘ao, ‘o ne fakahā ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e kakai kotoa ‘a e ‘uhinga ‘o ‘ene ala kiate ia, pea mo ‘ene mo‘ui ai leva.
42008048	Pea pehē ‘e Sīsū ki ai, Nga‘ata, kuo fakamo‘ui koe ‘e ho‘o tui: ‘alu atu, ‘o fiemālie pē ā.
42008049	Pea lolotonga ‘ene kei lea mo e ha‘u ha taha mei he fale ‘o e pule ‘o e falelotu, ‘o ne pehē kiate ia, Kuo pekia ho ‘ōfefine; ‘oua ‘e fakaongosia ‘a e Tangata‘eiki.
42008050	Kae fanongo ‘e Sīsū ‘o ne tali ki ai, ‘oua ‘e lotosi‘i; kehe pē ke ke tui, pea ‘e fakamo‘ui ia.
42008051	Pea ‘i he‘ene hū ki fale, na‘e ‘ikai te ne tuku ha taha ke hū mo ia, ko Pita pē, mo Sione, mo Sēmisi, pea mo e tamai ‘a e ki‘i fefine mo ‘ene fa‘ē.
42008052	Pea ‘oku fai ‘e he kakai kotoa pē hono tēngihia, mo nau tangi fetuki. Pea pehē ‘e Sīsū, ‘Oua ‘e tēngihia; he ‘oku ‘ikai te ne pekia, ka ‘oku mohe.
42008053	Pea nau luma kiate ia, he‘enau ‘ilo kuo ne pekia:
42008054	ka ka hanga ‘e ia ‘o puke hono nima, mo ne lea ‘o pehē, Ta‘ahine, tu‘u.
42008055	Pea foki mai hono laumālie, ‘o ne tu‘u hake leva: pea tu‘utu‘uni ‘e Sīsū ke nau ‘ange ha me‘a ke ne kai.
42008056	Pea fu‘u ‘oho ‘ene mātu‘a: ka ka fekau ‘e ia kiate kinaua, ke ‘oua na‘a na tala ki ha taha ‘a e me‘a kuo fai.
42009001	PEA fakataha ‘e ia ‘a e kau Hongofulumāua, ‘o ne tuku kiate kinautolu ke mālohi mo fa‘iteliha ki he kau tēvolo, pea ke fakamo‘ui mahaki.
42009002	Pea ne fekau ke nau fanongonongo ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua, pea ke fai faito‘o.
42009003	Pea ne pehē kiate kinautolu, ‘oua na‘a to‘o ha me‘a ki he hala, ha tokotoko, pe ha kato ‘oho, pe ha mā, pe ha pa‘anga; pe te mou taki sote ‘e ua.
42009004	Pea ka mou ka hū ki hā fale, mou nofo pē ai, pea hiki pē mei ai ‘i ho‘omou ‘alu ki ha potu kehe.
42009005	Pea ka ai ha ni‘ihi ‘e ‘ikai te nau tali kimoutolu: ka mou ka hū mai mei he kolo ko ia, tūtuu‘i hono efu mei homou va‘e ko e faka‘ilonga kiate kinautolu.
42009006	Pea na‘a nau ō, ‘o ‘alu atu ‘i he vilisi takitaha, ‘o nau tala ‘a e ongoongolelei, mo nau faito‘o ‘i he potu kotoa pē.
42009007	Pea na‘e fanongo ‘a e Tu‘i ko Hēlota ki he ngaahi me‘a na‘e fai; ‘o ne toumoua ‘aupito, koe‘uhi ko e pehē ‘e he ni‘ihi, Ko Sione kuo toetu‘u mei he pekia,
42009008	ka ko e ni‘ihi, Ko ‘Ilaisiā kuo hā; pea ko e ni‘ihi, Ko e toko taha ‘i he kau palōfita mu‘a kuo toetu‘u.
42009009	Pea pehē ‘e Hēlota, Kuo u tu‘usi ‘a e ‘ulu ‘o Sione: ka ko hai nai ‘eni ‘a ia ‘oku ongo mai ‘ene ngaahi fu‘u me‘a pehē? Pea ne feinga ke fe‘iloaki mo ia.
42009010	Pea na‘e foki mai ‘a e kau ‘Aposetolo, ‘o nau fakamatala kia Sīsū ‘a e ngaahi me‘a kuo nau fai. Pea ne ‘ave kinautolu, ‘o nau ō fakaekinautolu pē ki ha kolo na‘e ui ko Petesaita.
42009011	Ka ka ‘ilo ki ai ‘e he ngaahi kakai, ‘o nau tulimui kiate ia: pea ne tali lelei kinautolu, ‘o ne lea ki ai ‘i he Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua, ‘o ne fakamo‘ui ‘a kinautolu na‘e tangi ki ha faito‘o.
42009012	Pea kamata pale ‘a e la‘ā, pea ‘unu‘unu atu ‘a e kau Hongofulumāua, ‘o nau pehē kiate ia, Tukuange mu‘a ‘a e kakai ke nau fononga ki he ngaahi vilisi takatakai, mo e ngaahi ngoue, ke nau mohe ai mo kumi ‘oho: he ko e potu lala ‘oku tau ‘i ai.
42009013	Ka ka pehē ‘e ia kiate kinautolu, ‘ange ‘e kimoutolu ha‘anau kai. Pea nau tali, ‘Oku ‘ikai te mau ma‘u ha me‘a, ko e fo‘i mā pē ‘e nima, mo e ika ‘e ua; ka na‘a ko e pehē ke mau ‘alu ‘o fakatau me‘a tokoni ma‘a e kakai kotoa ko eni.
42009014	He ko e tangata na‘e fe‘unga mo e toko nima afe nai. Pea me‘a ‘e ia ki he‘ene kau ako, Fakatākoto kinautolu, ‘o fakakalasi, ‘o tautau toko nimangofulu nai.
42009015	Pea nau fai pehē, ‘o fakatākoto kinautolu kotoa.
42009016	Pea ne to‘o ‘a e fo‘i mā ‘e nima, pea mo e ongo ika, ‘o ne tāngaki hake ki he langi, mo ne tāpuaki‘i ia; pea ne pakipaki, mo toutou ‘ange ki he‘ene kau ako ke tufaki ki he kakai.
42009017	Pea nau kai, ‘o mākona kotoa pē: pea na‘e tānaki ‘enau mapakipaki‘i mā na‘e toe, ko e ngaahi kato fakahunga ‘e hongofulu mā ua.
42009018	Pea koe ‘aho ‘e taha, lolotonga ‘ene fai ‘ene lotu toko taha pē, na‘e omi kiate ia ‘a e kau ako; pea ne fehu‘i kiate kinautolu, ‘o pehē, Ko hai au ‘i he lau ‘a e ngaahi kakai?
42009019	Pea nau tali ‘o pehē, Ko Sione Papitaiso; ka ko e lau ‘a e ni‘ihi, Ko ‘Ilaisiā; pea ko e ni‘ihi, Kuo toetu‘u ha taha ‘o e kau palōfita mu‘a.
42009020	Pea pehē ange ‘e ia, Ka ko hai au ‘i he lau ‘amoutolu? Pea tali ‘e Pita, ‘o ne pehē, KO E MĪSAIA ‘a e ‘OTUA.
42009021	Pea ne lolomi kinautolu, mo tu‘utu‘uni ke ‘oua te nau tala ia ki ha taha;
42009022	‘o ne pehē, Kuo pau ki he Fanautama ‘a Tangata ke lahi hono fakamamahi‘i; pea ke fakatale‘i ia ‘e he kau mātu‘a mo e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki, mo e kau sikalaipe; pea ke tāmate‘i; pea ‘i hono ‘aho tolu ke ne toetu‘u.
42009023	Pea ne lea kiate kinautolu kotoa pē, Ka ai ha taha ‘oku ne fie muimui mai kiate au, ke ne hangē ha mateaki, pea ke ne fua hono kolosi ‘i he ‘aho kotoa pē, pea ke ne hoko ko hoku lahi.
42009024	He ko ia te ne fai ke kalofaki ‘ene mo‘ui, ko ‘ene tuku ia ke mole: ka ko ia te ne tuku ‘ene mo‘ui ke mole koe‘uhi ko au, ko eni ia ‘oku fakahaofi ia.
42009025	He ka ne kuo ma‘u ‘e ha tangata ‘i he‘ene ngāue ‘a māmani kātoa, ka kuo ne maumau ai ia, pe kuo ne mole ai, pea ko e hā ha me‘a kuo ne lava?
42009026	He ko ia te ne maa‘i au mo ‘eku ngaahi tala, ‘e maa‘i ‘a e toko taha ko ia ‘e he Fanautama ‘a Tangata, ‘oka hā‘ele mai ia mo hono nāunau ‘o‘ona, pea mo e nāunau ‘o ene Tamai, pea mo e nāunau ‘o e kau ‘āngelo tapu.
42009027	Pea ‘oku ou fakapapau atu, ‘oku ai ha ni‘ihi ‘iate kinautolu ‘oku tutu‘u hena, ‘a ia ‘e ‘ikai te nau momo‘i lave ki he mate, kae‘oua ke nau mamata ki he Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua.
42009028	Pea fe‘unga nai mo hono valu ‘o e ‘aho, hili ‘ene ngaahi lea ko ia, na‘a ne ‘ave ‘a Pita mo Sione mo Sēmisi, ‘o ne ‘alu hake ki he mo‘unga ke lotu.
42009029	Pea lolotonga ‘ene lotu, ‘iloange na‘e hā kehe hono fōtunga, pea ko hono kofu na‘e hinaekiaki, pea tatapa hangē ko e ‘uhila .
42009030	Pea tā ko e ongo tangata ‘oku na talanoa mo ia, ‘a ia ko Mōsese mo ‘Ilaisiā;
42009031	na‘e hā lāngilangi‘ia kinaua, ‘o nau alea ki he‘ene ‘ekisoto ‘oku ne fakatetu‘a ke lava‘i Selusalema.
42009032	Pea ko Pita mo kinaua na‘e ‘iate ia kuo nau tulemohe; ka ‘i he‘enau ‘ā lelei na‘a nau sio ki he‘ene lāngilangi‘ia, pea mo e ongo tangata ‘oku tutu‘u mo ia.
42009033	Pea ‘i he faifai pea na kamata ‘alu meiate ia, pea pehē ‘e Pita kia Sīsū, ‘ēī, ‘oku sai ‘etau ‘i heni pea mau ngaohi mu‘a ha fakahekeheke ‘e tolu; ‘o taha mo‘ou, pea taha mo‘o Mōsese, pea taha mo‘o ‘Ilaisiā: ko ‘ene lea puna pē.
42009034	Pea lolotonga ‘ene lau pehē, na‘e hoko mai ha ‘ao ‘o fakapūlou kinaua; pea nau manavahē ‘i he ‘ena hū ki he ‘ao.
42009035	Pea na‘e hoko mai ha le‘o mei he ‘ao ‘oku folofola mai, Ko hoku ‘Alo ‘ena kuo u fili; mou fakaongo kiate ia.
42009036	Pea ‘i he hoko mai ‘a e le‘o, ko Sīsū pē na‘e ‘iloa toko taha pē. Pea na‘a nau fakalongo pē, pea na‘e ‘ikai te nau fakahā ki ha taha ‘i he taimi ko ia ha momo‘i me‘a ‘e taha kuo nau sio ki ai.
42009037	Pea pongipongi hake ‘i he‘enau ‘alu hifo mei he mo‘unga, na‘e fakafetaulaki kiate ia ha fu‘u kakai.
42009038	Pea ‘iloange, na‘e kalanga ha tangata mei he ha‘oha‘onga, ‘o pehē, Tangata‘eiki, ‘oku ou kole kiate koe, ke ke me‘a mai ki hoku ‘uhiki; he ko si‘eku me‘a pē taha ia.
42009039	Pea vakai, ‘oku ‘i ai ha fa‘ahikehe ‘oku ne puke ia; pea fakafokifā te ne kaila; pea ‘oku ne fakatekelili‘i ia, ‘o koa hono ngutu; pea ‘oku taiki ‘ene mahu‘i mei ai, he‘ene fu‘u laikina ia.
42009040	Pea u kole ki ho‘o kau ako ke nau kapusi ia, ka na‘e ‘ikai te nau lava.
42009041	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū, ‘o ne pehē, ‘A e fa‘ahinga ta‘etui mo angakehe, ‘e ngata ‘afē ‘eku feangai mo kimoutolu, mo ‘eku kātaki‘i kimoutolu? Taki mai ki heni ho foha.
42009042	Pea lolotonga ‘ene ‘unu‘unu mai, na‘e ha‘aki ia ‘e he tēvolo, ‘o fu‘u fakatekelili‘i. Ka ka lolomi ‘e Sīsū ‘a e fa‘ahikehe, ‘o ne fakamo‘ui ‘a e tama, mo ne ‘ange ia ki he‘ene tamai.
42009043	Pea nau to‘oa fuli pē ‘i he māfimafi ‘o e ‘Otua.
42009044	Pea lolotonga ‘enau ofoofo ‘i he ngaahi me‘a kehekehe na‘a ne fai, ne ne lea ki he‘ene kau ako, ‘o pehē, Ka ko kimoutolu, mou ‘ai ki homou telinga ‘a e ngaahi lea ko eni; he ‘oku nānāfaki ke tukuange ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata ki he nima ‘o e kakai.
42009045	Ka na‘e ‘ikai te nau ‘ilo hono ‘uhinga ‘o e lea ko ia, pea na‘e tuku fufū ia meiate kinautolu ke ‘oua te nau ‘ilo ia: pea na‘a nau mālū‘ia ke fehu‘i kiate ia ‘i he lea ko ia.
42009046	Pea na‘e tupu ‘iate kinautolu ha fakakikihi, pe ko hai nai ‘iate kinautolu ‘e lahi.
42009047	Ka ka ‘ilo pē ‘e Sīsū ‘a e fifili ‘a honau loto, ‘o ne puke ha tamasi‘i, ‘o tuku ‘i honau ‘ao,
42009048	pea ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Ko ia te ne tali ‘a e tamasi‘i ni ‘i hoku hingoa ‘oku ne tali au: pea ko ia te ne tali au ‘oku ne tali ia na‘a ne fekau mai au: he ko ia ‘oku nofo kimui ‘aupito ‘iate kimoutolu, ko eni ia ‘oku lahi.
42009049	Pea tali ‘e Sione ‘o ne pehē, ‘ēī, na‘a mau ‘ilo ha taha ‘oku ne kapusi tēvolo ‘i he huafa ‘o‘ou; pea mau fai ke ta‘ofi ia, he ‘oku ‘ikai te ne ‘i he lahi fakataha mo kimautolu.
42009050	Ka ka tali ‘e Sīsū ki ai, ‘Oua ‘e ta‘ofi: he ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai ke tu‘u kiate kimoutolu, ‘oku ne tu‘u ma‘amoutolu.
42009051	Pea na‘e faifai pea hokosia ‘a e taimi ‘o hono ‘ohake, pea tutui ‘e ia hono fofonga ke ‘alu ki Selusalema;
42009052	pea ne fekau atu ha kau talafekau ke fakamelomelo kiate ia: pea ‘i he‘enau fononga, na‘a nau hū ki ha vilisi ‘o e kau Samēlia koe‘uhi ke fei tokoni kia Sīsū.
42009053	Ka na‘e ‘ikai te nau fie tali ia, koe‘uhi ko e hanga ‘ene fononga ki Selusalema.
42009054	Pea ‘i he vakai ki ai ‘ene ongo ako, ko Sēmisi mo Sione, na‘a na pehē, ‘Eiki, ko ho loto ke mā tuputupulefanua ke tō hifo ha afi mei he langi, ‘o faka‘auha kinautolu?
42009055	Pea ne tafoki ‘o valoki‘i kinaua;
