42022029	Pea ko au ‘oku ou tu‘utu‘uni ha pule‘anga mo‘omoutolu, ‘o hangē ko e tu‘utu‘uni ha pule‘anga mo‘oku ‘e he‘eku ‘Eiki.
42022030	Ke mou kai mo inu ‘i he‘eku tēpile ‘i hoku pule‘anga, pea nofo ki ha ngaahi taloni, ‘o fakamāu‘i ‘a e matakali ‘e hongofulu mā ua ‘o ‘Isileli.
42022031	‘E Saimone, ‘e Saimone, tā kuo tala kimoutolu ‘e Sētane, ke ne sivi kimoutolu ‘o hangē ko e uite:
42022032	ka kuo u hūfia koe, ke ‘oua na‘a mate ‘aupito ho‘o tui ‘a‘au: pea ‘oka ke ka toki foki mai, ke ke poupou ‘e koe ho ngaahi tokoua.
42022033	Ka ka pehē ‘e ia ki ai, ‘Eiki, kuo ‘osi teu hoku loto ke ‘alu, ‘io, ki he pilīsone mo e mate, ‘o kapau ko e fakataha mo koe.
42022034	Pea ne pehē, Pita, ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘e ‘ikai ‘u‘ua ‘a e moa ‘anai, kae‘oua ke ke faka‘ikai ‘o tu‘o tolu mālō ‘oku ke ‘ilo au.
42022035	Pea ne pehē kiate kinautolu, ‘i he‘eku fekau atu kimoutolu ta‘eha kato pa‘anga, pe ha kato ‘oho, pe ha ngaahi sū, na‘a mou masiva ‘i ha me‘a? Pea nau pehē, ‘Ikai.
42022036	Pea ne toki lea kiate kinautolu, Ka ‘i he taimi ni, ‘ilonga ha taha ‘oku ne ma‘u ha kato pa‘anga, ke ne to‘o ia, pehē foki mo ha kato ‘oho; pea ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai ke ma‘u ha me‘a pehē, ke ne fakatau atu hono kofu ke ma‘u ‘aki ha heletā.
42022037	He ‘oku ou pehē atu kiate kimoutolu, kuo pau ke fakamo‘oni ‘iate au ‘a e me‘a ko eni ne tohi, pea na‘e fakakau ia mo e kau maumau lao: he ko eni ‘oku faka‘a‘au ke iku ‘a e me‘a na‘e tohi kiate au.
42022038	Pea nau pehē, ‘Eiki, vakai ko e heletā ‘eni ‘e ua. Pea ne pehē kiate kinautolu, ‘Oku lahi pē ia.
42022039	Pea ‘i he‘ene ‘alu atu, na‘a ne fononga ki he mo‘unga ko ‘ōlive, ‘o hangē ko ‘ene fa‘a fai; pea muimui foki kiate ia ‘a e kau ako.
42022040	Pea ‘i he‘ene hoko ki he potu, na‘a ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Mou lotu ke ‘oua na‘a mou hū ki ha ‘ahi‘ahi.
42022041	Pea mahu‘i atu ‘e ia meiate kinautolu, fe‘unga nai mo e lisi‘anga maka, ‘o ne tū‘ulutui ‘o lotu,
42022042	‘o ne pehē, ‘E Tamai, kapau ko ho finangalo, ke ke fakalaka ‘a e ipu ni meiate au: kaekehe ke ‘oua na‘a fai hoku loto, ka ko ho‘ou pē.
42022043	Pea na‘e hā kiate ia ha ‘āngelo mei he langi, ‘o ‘omi ha‘ane mālohi.
42022044	Pea hoko ia ‘o feinga lahi, pea fakautuutu ‘ene lotu fakamātoato: pea hoko ‘ene tauta‘a ‘o hangē ko e ngaahi tulutā ta‘ata‘a, ‘o vāngana ki kelekele.
42022045	Pea ‘i he‘ene tu‘u hake mei he‘ene lotu, ‘o ‘alu ki he kau ako, na‘a ne ‘ilo kinautolu kuo fakamohe ‘e he‘enau mamahi.
42022046	Pea ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Ko e hā ‘oku mou mohe ai? mou tu‘u hake, ‘o lotu ke ‘oua na‘a mou hū ki ha ‘ahi‘ahi.
42022047	Lolotonga ‘ene kei lea, tā ko ha fu‘u kakai ‘oku ha‘u; pea ko e tangata na‘e hingoa ko Siutasi, ko e toko taha ‘o e kau Hongofulumāua, na‘a ne ‘alu mu‘omu‘a ‘iate kinautolu, ‘o ne fakaofi kia Sīsū ke ‘uma kiate ia.
42022048	Pea pehē ‘e Sīsū ki ai, ‘E Siutasi, koe‘uma‘ā koā ‘oku ke lavaki‘i ‘aki ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata?
42022049	Pea ko kinautolu na‘e ‘ia Sīsū, ‘i he‘enau vakai ‘a e me‘a ‘e hoko, na‘a nau pehē, ‘Eiki, te mau taa‘i ‘aki ‘a e heletā?
42022050	Pea ko e toko taha ‘iate kinautolu tokua, na‘a ne taa‘i ‘a e tamaio‘eiki ‘a e Taula‘eiki Lahi, ‘o ne tu‘usi hono telinga to‘omata‘u.
42022051	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū, ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Tuku si‘i ange kae‘oua ke lava ‘eni. Pea ne ala ki he lau‘i telinga, ‘o ne fakamo‘ui ia.
42022052	Pea lea ‘a Sīsū kiate kinautolu kuo hoko kiate ia, (ko e ni‘ihi ‘o e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki, mo e hou‘eiki tau ‘o e Temipale, mo e kau mātu‘a), ‘o ne pehē, Ko ho‘omou omi fakaheletā mo faka‘akau, ‘o hangē ko ha kaiha‘akau au!
42022053	Ko e ‘aho kotoa pē mo ‘eku ‘iate kimoutolu ‘i he Temipale, pea na‘e ‘ikai te mou ala mai kiate au: ka ko hono ‘uhinga, ko homou ava ‘eni, pea mo e tu‘u ‘a fakapo‘uli.
42022054	Pea nau puke ia, ‘o taki ‘o a‘u ki he fale ‘o e Taula‘eiki Lahi. Ka ka muimui atu ‘a Pita mei he mama‘o.
42022055	Pea kuo nau tafu ha afi ‘i he loto loto‘ā, mo nau nonofo, pea nofo ‘a Pita ‘o lotolotoi ‘iate kinautolu.
42022056	Pea ko e kaunanga ‘e taha na‘a ne vakai kiate ia ‘i he‘ene nofo ki he maama; pea ne sio fakamama‘u kiate ia, ‘o ne pehē, Ko e siana ni foki na‘e ‘iate ia.
42022057	Ka ka faka‘ikai ‘e ia, he‘ene pehē, Fefine, ‘oku ‘ikai te u ‘ilo ‘a e toko taha ko ia.
42022058	Pea fuoloa si‘i atu na‘e mamata ki ai ‘e ha toko taha kehe, ko e tangata, ‘o ne pehē, Ko koe foki ‘oku ke kau ki he fa‘ahinga ko ia. Pea pehē ‘e Pita, Tangata, ‘oku ‘ikai.
42022059	Pea kuo mahili nai ha houa ‘e taha, pea fakapapau mai ha tangata ‘e taha, ‘o pehē, ‘ā, ‘oku mo‘oni, na‘e kau mo ia ‘a e siana ni foki: kae‘uma‘ā ko e Kāleli ia.
42022060	Ka ka pehē, ‘e Pita, Tangata, ‘oku ‘ikai te u ‘ilo ‘a e me‘a ‘oku ke lau ki ai. Pea fakafokifā, lolotonga ‘ene kei lea, na‘e ‘u‘ua ‘a e moa.
42022061	Pea tafoki ‘a e ‘Eiki ‘o sio fakamama‘u kia Pita. Pea manatu hifo ‘a Pita ki he folofola ‘a e ‘Eiki, ‘a ‘ene pehē mai, ‘I he te‘eki ke ‘u‘ua ‘a e moa ‘anai, te ke fakafisinga au ‘o tu‘o tolu mālō.
42022062	Pea ne ‘alu atu kitua‘ā, ‘o ne tangi mamahi.
42022063	Pea ko e kau tangata na‘a nau kuku ‘a Sīsū na‘a nau pā‘usi‘i ia, he‘enau haha ia.
42022064	Pea nau fakapūlou ia, ‘o nau fakafehu‘i ki ai, ‘o pehē, Mate mai pe ko hai ia na‘e taa‘i koe?
42022065	Pea lahi ‘a e ngaahi lea kehekehe na‘a nau ‘ai kiate ia, ko e tālalakulaku.
42022066	Pea ‘i he‘ene ‘aho hake, na‘e tefua mai ‘a kinautolu na‘e kau ki he Fakataha Fakamātu‘a ‘o ‘Isileli, ‘o ‘ikai ko e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki pē, ka ko e kau sikalaipe foki; ‘o nau taki ange ia ki he‘enau fakataha mo nau pehē, Kapau ko e Mīsaia koe, tala mai.
42022067	Pea ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Kapau te u tala kiate kimoutolu, tala‘ehai te mou tui.
42022068	Pea kapau te u fai atu ha fehu‘i, tala‘ehai te mou tali.
42022069	Ka hili ‘eni ‘e nofo ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata ki he nima to‘omata‘u ‘o e māfimafi ‘o e ‘Otua.
42022070	Pea nau pehē kotoa pē, ‘Io! pea ko e ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otua koe? Pea ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Ka na‘e fai; ko au.
42022071	Pea nau pehē, Koe‘uma‘ā ‘etau toe kumi fakamo‘oni: he kuo tau fanongo kitautolu ki he‘ene lea ‘a‘ana.
42023001	PEA tu‘u hake ‘a e fakataha kotoa, ‘o nau taki ia kia Pailato.
42023002	Pea nau hanga ‘o talatalaaki‘i ia, ‘o pehē, Na‘a mau ‘ilo ‘a e siana ni ‘oku ne veuveuki homau kakai, mo ne ta‘ofi ‘a e fai tukuhau kia Sisa, mo ne pehē ko Kingi Kalaisi ia.
42023003	Pea fehu‘i ‘e Pailato kiate ia, ‘o ne pehē, Ko koe ko e Tu‘i ‘o e kakai Siu, ‘ō? Pea ne tali ki ai ‘o ne pehē, Ko ia pē ‘oku ke me‘a.
42023004	Pea lea ‘a Pailato ki he hou‘eiki taula‘eiki mo e kakai, ‘oku ‘ikai te u ‘ilo ha hala ‘i he tangata ni.
42023005	Ka ka faka‘utufī pē kinautolu he‘enau pehē, ‘ā, ‘oku ne o‘i ‘a e kakai, he‘ene faiako ‘i Siutea kātoa, ‘o ne fai mei Kāleli ki heni.
42023006	Pea ‘i he fanongo ki ai ‘a Pailato, na‘a ne fehu‘i pe ko e tangata Kāleli ia.
42023007	Pea ‘i he‘ene mea‘i ‘oku mei he pule‘anga ‘o Hēlota ia, na‘a ne fekau ke ‘ave ia kia Hēlota, he na‘e ‘i Selusalema mo ia ‘i he taimi ko ia.
42023008	Pea ‘i he vakai ‘e Hēlota kia Sīsū, na‘a ne fakamālie lahi: he kuo fuoloa mo ‘ene faka‘amu ke mamata kiate ia, koe‘uhi ko hono fa‘a tala ongo mai; pea kuo ne ‘unaloto ke sio ki ha me‘a fakaofo te ne fai.
42023009	Pea na‘e lahi ‘a e ngaahi fehu‘i na‘a ne fai kiate ia; ka ka ‘ikai momo‘i tali ‘e ia ha me‘a.
42023010	Pea tutu‘u ai ‘a e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki, mo e kau sikalaipe, ‘o nau tōtōivi hono talatalaaki‘i.
42023011	Pea fakasīkaka‘i ia ‘e Hēlota mo va‘inga‘aki, he ‘ai kiate ia ha kofu ngingila, pea kau ai mo ‘ene kau tau; pea ne toki fekau ke toe ‘ave kia Pailato.
42023012	Pea na‘e kamata fe‘ofo‘ofani ‘a Pailato mo Hēlota ‘i he ‘aho ko ia: he ne na vākovi mu‘a.
42023013	Pea fakataha ‘e Pailato ‘a e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki, mo e kau pule, mo e kakai,
42023014	pea ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Na‘a mou ‘omi kiate au ‘a e tangata ko eni, ko e toko taha tokua, ‘oku ne taki kehe ‘a e kakai: pea ko eni, ne u ‘eke ‘a e tangata ni ‘i homou ‘ao ‘e au, pea na‘e ‘ikai te u ‘ilo ha‘ane momo‘i hala ‘e taha ‘i he ngaahi me‘a na‘a mou talatalaaki‘i ai ia.
42023015	Kae‘uma‘ā ‘oku pehē mo Hēlota; he kuo ne fekau ke toe ‘omi ia kiate kitautolu; pea tā ‘oku ‘ikai ha me‘a kuo ne fai ‘oku taau mo e mate.
42023016	Ko ia, te u ‘ai hano kini pea vete ange.
42023017	(Pea ka hoko leva te ne vete ange ha pōpula ‘e taha ‘i he kātoanga.)
42023018	Pea kalanga hake ‘a e fu‘u kakai kātokatoa, ‘o pehē, Tafi‘i ‘a e siana ni, pea vete mai ‘a Palāpasa:
42023019	(‘a ia ko e toko taha na‘e mo‘ua ‘i he pilīsone, koe‘uhi ko ‘ene kau ‘i ha angatu‘u ne hoko ‘i he olo, mo ‘ene fakapō).
42023020	Pea na‘e toe lea ‘a Pailato kiate kinautolu, ko ‘ene loto ke vete ange ‘a Sīsū.
42023021	Ka ka lea ange ‘a kinautolu, ‘o pehē, Kalusefai, kalusefai ia.
42023022	Pea me‘a ia kiate kinautolu ko hono tu‘o tolu, He ko e hā ha kovi kuo fai ‘e he tangata ni? Kuo ‘ikai te u momo‘i ‘ilo ha‘ane hiamatea: ko ia te u ‘ai hano kini, pea vete ange.
42023023	Ka ka ta‘omaki atu pē kinautolu, ‘o nau longoa‘a, he‘enau kole ke kalusefai ia.
42023024	Pea na‘e lava‘i ‘e he‘enau longoa‘a. Pea ko e fakamaau ‘a Pailato na‘e fai ki honau loto.
42023025	Pea ne vete ange ‘a e siana na‘a nau kole ki ai, ‘a e siana na‘e lī ki he pilīsone ko ‘ene angatu‘u mo fakapō: ka ko Sīsū na‘a ne tuku atu ke fai honau loto ki ai.
42023026	Pea ‘i he‘enau taki ange ia, na‘a nau puke ‘a Saimone, ko e motu‘a Sailine, ‘i he‘ene ha‘u mei ‘uta, ‘o nau hilifaki kiate ia ‘a e kolosi, ke ne fua atu ia ‘o muimui kia Sīsū.
42023027	Pea na‘e muimui atu ki ai ha fu‘u tokolahi ‘o e kakai, kae‘uma‘ā ha kau fefine, ‘a ia na‘a nau sī fatafata mo ‘oiauē ‘iate ia.
42023028	Ka ka tafoki ‘a Sīsū kiate kinautolu ‘o ne pehē, Si‘i kau fefine Selusalema, ‘oua te mou tangi koe‘uhi ko au, ka mou tangi pē koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu, pea koe‘uhi ko ho‘omou fānau:
42023029	he tala atu, ‘oku tu‘unuku mai ha taimi ‘a ia te nau pehē ai, Monū‘ia ā ka ko e pa‘a, pea mo e manava na‘e ‘ikai fanau, mo e huhu na‘e ‘ikai fai ai ha huhu.
42023030	Ko e taimi ko ia te nau hanga ‘o lea ki he ngaahi mo‘unga, Hinga mai ā kiate kimautolu, pea ki he ngaahi mā‘olunga, Fufū kimautolu.
42023031	He kapau ‘oku nau fai pehē ki he ‘akau mata, ko e hā ‘e fai ki he mōmoa!
42023032	Pea na‘e taki ange mo ia ke tāmate‘i ha ongo angahala kehe ‘e toko ua.
42023033	Pea ‘i he‘enau a‘u ki he potu ‘oku ui ko Kalevale, na‘a nau kalusefai ‘i ai ia mo e ongo angahala, ko e taha mei to‘omata‘u, mo e taha mei to‘ohema.
42023034	Pea me‘a ‘e Sīsū, ‘Alā Tamai, fakamolemole ‘a kinautolu; he ‘oku ‘ikai te nau ‘ilo ‘a e me‘a ‘oku nau fai. Pea ‘i he tufa hono ngaahi kofu, na‘a nau talotalo ki ai.
42023035	Pea na‘e tu‘u ‘a e kakai ‘o mamata. Pea fingofingo foki ‘a e kau pule, he‘enau pehē, Na‘a ne fakahaofi ‘a e kakai kehe; ‘ē, tuku ke ne fakahaofi ia, ‘o kapau ko e Mīsaia ia ‘a e ‘Otua, ko e toko taha kuo ne fili.
42023036	Pea na‘e luma‘i ia ‘e he kau tau foki, he‘enau ‘unu‘unu atu ‘o ‘ange ha vinika.
42023037	Mo nau pehē, Kapau ko e Tu‘i Siu koe, fakahaofi koe.
42023038	Pea na‘e ai mo ha tohi na‘e ‘ai he ‘ulu‘i kolosi, ‘o pehē,
42023039	Pea ko e toko taha‘i he ongo angahala na‘e tautau na‘a ne tālalakulaku kiate ia, ‘o pehē, ‘Ikai ko e Mīsaia koe? Pe‘i fakahaofi koe mo kimaua.
42023040	Ka ka tali ‘a e taha ‘o ne valoki‘i ia, ‘o pehē, Hilinga mo koe ke ke ‘apasia ki he ‘Otua, he ‘oku mo kaungā tautea mo ia.
42023041	Pea tonuhekina ho‘otaua; he ‘oku ta kai ‘a e nunu‘a ‘o e ngāue na‘a ta fai: ka ko e toko taha ni, kuo ‘ikai ha‘ane momo‘i me‘a ta‘etaau ‘e fai.
42023042	Pea ne pehē, ‘E Sīsū, manatu‘i au, ‘oka ke ka hoko mai kuo ke pule‘anga.
42023043	Pea folofola ‘e ia ki ai, Ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Ko e ‘aho ni te ke ‘i Palataisi mo au.
42023044	Pea ‘i he‘ene fe‘unga nai mo hono ono ‘o e houa, na‘e hoko ha po‘uli ki he fonua kotoa, ‘o a‘u ki hono hiva ‘o e houa.
42023045	Pea na‘e fakapo‘uli ‘a e la‘ā, pea na‘e mahae ‘a e loto tatau ‘o e Fale Tapu.
42023046	Pea kalanga le‘o lahi ‘a Sīsū, ‘o ne pehē, ‘e Tamai, ‘oku ou tuku hoku laumālie ki ho nima: pea ‘i he‘ene lea pehē na‘a ne hokotaki.
42023047	Pea ‘i he vakai ‘e he senituliō ki he me‘a na‘e hoko, na‘a ne fakaongoongolelei‘i ‘a e ‘Otua, he‘ene pehē, Tā ko e mo‘oni pē, ko e tangata ta‘ehalaia ‘eni.
42023048	Pea ko e kakai kātoa kuo fakataha ange ke mamata ki he me‘a ko ia, ‘i he‘enau vakai ki he ngaahi me‘a na‘e hoko, na‘a nau sī fatafata, mo nau foki.
42023049	Ka na‘e tu‘u mei he mama‘o hono kau fe‘iloaki kotoa pē, mo e kau fefine foki na‘e muimui mai kiate ia mei Kāleli, ‘o nau mamata ki he ngaahi me‘a ko ia.
42023050	Pea tā na‘e ai ha matāpule na‘e hingoa ko Siosifa ‘a ia na‘e kau ‘i he falealea; ko e tangata lelei ia mo faitotonu:
42023051	(ko e taha ‘eni na‘e ‘ikai loto ki he‘enau tu‘utu‘uni mo ‘enau ngāue) ko e matāpule ia mei ‘Alematea, ko e kolo Siu; pea ko e toko taha na‘e nofo ‘amanaki ki he Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua.
42023052	Ko e tangata ni na‘a ne ‘alu kia Pailato, ‘o kole ‘a e sino ‘o Sīsū.
42023053	Pea ne ‘ohifo ia, ‘o teu ‘aki ha tupenu mahu‘inga; ‘o ne telio ‘a Sīsū ‘i ha fonualoto na‘e to‘oliu ‘i he maka, ‘a ia ‘oku te‘eki ‘aupito toka ai ha taha.
42023054	Pea ko e ‘aho Tokonaki ia, pea na‘e ofi mai ‘a e tapu.
42023055	Pea toupili ‘i mui ha tu‘unga fafine, ko e fa‘ahinga na‘e fononga mo ia mei Kāleli; pea nau vakai ‘a e fonualoto, mo e anga ‘o e fakatoka ‘o hono ‘anga‘anga.
42023056	Pea nau foki, ‘o nau tokonaki ‘a e ngaahi fa‘ahinga ahi mo e lolo tākai.
42024001	PEA lolotonga ‘a e Sāpate na‘a nau mālōlō ‘o hangē ko e tu‘utu‘uni: ka ‘i he ‘uluaki ‘aho ‘o e uike, ‘oku kei hengihengi ‘aupito, na‘a nau ‘alu ki he fonualoto, ‘o ‘ave ‘a e ahi kuo nau teu.
42024002	Pea nau ‘ilo ‘a e maka kuo teka‘i mei he fonualoto.
42024003	Ka ‘i he‘enau hū ki ai, na‘e ‘ikai te nau ‘ilo ‘a e sino ‘o e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū.
42024004	Pea lolotonga ‘enau puputu‘u ‘i he me‘a ko ia, pea tā na‘e tu‘u mai kiate kinautolu ha ongo tangata na‘e huhulu hona kofu.
42024005	Pea ‘i he‘enau manavahē fu‘u, mo fo‘ohifo ki he kelekele, na‘a na pehē kiate kinautolu, Ko e hā ‘oku mou kumi ai ‘a ia ‘oku mo‘ui ki he kau pekia?
42024006	‘Oku ‘ikai te ne ‘i heni, ka kuo toetu‘u: manatu ki he‘ene me‘a kiate kimoutolu ‘i he‘ene kei ‘i Kāleli, ‘o pehē,
42024007	Kuo pau ki he Fanautama ‘a Tangata ke tukuange ia ki he kakai angahala, pea ke kalusefai, pea ke toetu‘u ‘i hono ‘aho tolu.
42024008	Pea nau manatu ai ki he‘ene ngaahi lea,
42024009	pea nau foki mei he fonualoto, ‘o nau tala ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia ki he kau Hongofulu mā taha, pea mo hono toe ‘o e kakai.
42024010	Pea ko Mele mei Makitala, mo Sioana, mo Mele ko e fa‘ē ‘a Sēmisi, ko kinautolu ia na‘e tala; pea ko hono toe ‘o e kau fefine ‘a ia na‘e kau mo kinautolu, na‘e tala foki ‘e kinautolu ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia ki he kau ‘Aposetolo.
42024011	Ka na‘e hā ‘a e ngaahi lea ko ia kiate kinautolu ‘o hangē ko e muna; pea na‘e ‘ikai te nau tui ki he kau fefine.
42024012	Ka na‘e tu‘u ‘a Pita, ‘o ne lele ki he fonualoto, ‘o ne tulolo ‘o sio ko e ngaahi tupenu pē; ‘o ne ‘alu ki ‘api, ‘oku ne ofoofo ‘i he me‘a kuo hoko.
42024013	Pea tā ko honau toko ua na‘e fai hona fononga ‘i he ‘aho ko ia ki he vilisi na‘e hingoa ko ‘Emeasi, ko hono mama‘o mo Selusalema ko e maile ‘e fitu nai.
42024014	Pea na fai‘aki ‘ena talanoa ‘a e ngaahi me‘a kehekehe kuo toki hoko ni.
42024015	Pea lolotonga ‘ena talanoa mo fe‘eke, mo ‘ene fakaofiofi mai ‘a Sīsū ‘e ia, ‘o ō fakataha mo kinaua.
42024016	Ka na‘e ta‘ofi hona mata ke ‘oua te na ‘ilo ko ia.
42024017	Pea ne pehē kiate kinaua, Ko e hā nai ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku mo fekīhiaki ai ‘i ho‘omo ō ni? Pea na tu‘u ‘oku na fofonga mamahi.
42024018	Pea tali ‘e he toko taha na‘e hingoa ko Kaliopasi, ‘o ne pehē kiate ia, Tā ko e sola ‘apē koe ‘i Selusalema, ‘o ke nofo toko taha, ‘i ho‘o ta‘e‘ilo ‘a e ngaahi me‘a kuo hoko ‘i he ngaahi ‘aho ko eni.
42024019	Pea ne pehē kiate kinaua, ‘a e hā koā? Pea na pehē kiate ia, ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku kau kia Sīsū mei Nāsaleti, ‘a ia ko e tangata palōfita na‘e hā ki he ‘Otua mo e kakai kotoa ‘ene mafai ‘i he ngāue mo e lea:
42024020	‘a hono tukuange foki ‘e he hou‘eiki taula‘eiki, mo e kau pule ‘amautolu, ke fakamāumatea, mo nau kalusefai ia.
42024021	Ka ko kimautolu na‘a mau falala tu‘u, ko eni ia ‘oku hapa ke huhu‘i ‘a ‘Isileli.
42024022	Kae‘uma‘ā ‘eni kotoa pē, ‘oku ne ‘i hono ‘aho tolu talu ‘a e fai ‘o e me‘a ko ia; ‘io, pea fakalele mo‘ui kiate kimautolu ‘e ha ni‘ihi ‘i homau kau fefine, ‘a ia na‘a nau uhu ki he fonualoto;
42024023	pea ‘i he ‘ikai te nau ‘ilo hono sino, na‘a nau omi ‘o tala kuo nau sio tokua ki ha vīsone, ko ha ongo ‘āngelo ‘a ia na‘a na fakahā ‘oku ne mo‘ui.
42024024	Pea ‘alu ki he fonualoto ha ni‘ihi ‘iate kinautolu ‘oku mau kau, ‘o nau ‘ilo ‘o hangē tofu pē ko e lau ‘a e kau fefine: ka na‘e ‘ikai te nau sio kiate ia.
42024025	Pea toki me‘a ia kiate kinaua, ‘a e kau ta‘eloto, pea tō‘ohi ke tui ki he ngaahi me‘a na‘e lea‘aki ‘e he kau palōfita!
42024026	‘Ikai na‘e pau ke mamahi pehē ‘a e Mīsaia, ka ne hoko ki he‘ene lāngilangi‘ia?
42024027	Pea ne kamata mei he ngaahi tohi ‘a Mōsese, mo e kau Palōfita kātoa pē, ‘o ne faka‘uhinga mei he Tohi tapu kātoa ‘a e ngaahi me‘a na‘e kau kiate ia.
42024028	Pea na‘a nau a‘u ki he vilisi na‘a na fononga ki ai: pea fai ‘e ia ke mole atu.
42024029	Ka ka ta‘ofi tu‘u ia ‘e kinaua, ‘o na pehē, Afe mai ā mo kimaua: he kuo efiafi ‘eni, pea kuo pale ‘aupito ‘a e la‘ā. Pea ne hū ki he vilisi ke nofo mo kinaua.
42024030	Pea ‘iloange, ‘i he‘ene tokoto mo kinaua ‘i he kai, na‘a ne to‘o ‘a e mā, ‘o ne fai ha tāpuaki, ‘o ne pakipaki ‘o ‘atu kiate kinaua.
42024031	Pea ‘ā ai hona mata, ‘o na ‘ilo tā ko IA; ka ka puli leva ia, ‘o ne mole meiate kinaua.
42024032	Pea na fepehē‘aki, Hono ‘ikai ne vela hota loto lolotonga ‘ene talanoa mai ‘i he hala, mo ‘ene vete kiate kitaua ‘a e Tohitapu!
42024033	Pea na tu‘u hake ‘i he houa pē ko ia, ‘o na foki ki Selusalema; pea ‘i he‘ena a‘u, tā kuo fakatahataha ‘a e kau Hongofulu mā taha mo kinautolu na‘a nau kau.
42024034	Pea nau pehē mai, Kuo toetu‘u mo‘oni ‘a e ‘Eiki, pea kuo hā kia Saimone.
42024035	Pea fakamatala mo kinaua ‘a e me‘a na‘e hoko ‘i he hala, pea mo hono ‘iloa ‘e kinaua ‘i he pakipaki ‘o e mā.
42024036	Pea lolotonga ‘enau talanoa pehē mo ‘ene tu‘u ‘e ia ‘i honau lotolotonga, ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Si‘oto ‘ofa atu!
42024037	Pea nau lilika mo manavahē tu‘u, ko ‘enau mahalo ko ha fa‘ahikehe ‘oku nau sio ki ai.
42024038	Pea ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Ko e hā ‘oku mou puputu‘u ai? pea ko e hā ‘oku ake ai ‘a e ngaahi fifili pehē ‘i homou loto?
42024039	Vakai mai ki hoku ongo nima ni, mo hoku va‘e, ko au mo‘oni ia: fāfā au ‘o ‘ilo; he ‘oku ‘ikai kakano mo hui ha fa‘ahikehe, ‘o hangē ko ia ‘oku mou sio ai ‘iate au.
42024040	Pea ‘i he‘ene lea pehē, na‘a ne faka‘ali‘ali kiate kinautolu hono ongo nima mo e va‘e.
42024041	Pea ‘i he‘enau kei tuingata‘a, koe‘uhi ko ‘enau fiefia mo ofoofo, na‘a ne toe pehē kiate kinautolu, ‘oku ai ha‘amou me‘akai heni?
42024042	Pea nau ‘ange ki ai ha konga ika tunu.
42024043	Pea ne to‘o ia, ‘o kai ‘i honau ‘ao.
42024044	Pea ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Ko ‘eku ngaahi lea ē na‘a ku fai kiate kimoutolu ‘i he‘eku kei nofo mo kimoutolu, ‘o pehē, Kuo pau ke hoko ‘a e ngaahi me‘a kotoa pē kuo tohi kiate au ‘i he Lao ‘a Mōsese, mo e Tohi Palōfita, mo e Tohi Saame.
42024045	Pea ne toki tatala honau loto ke nau ‘ilo hono ‘uhinga ‘o e Tohitapu;
42024046	‘o ne folofola kiate kinautolu, Na‘e pehē pē hono tohi, ‘e feia ‘a e Mīsaia, pea te ne toetu‘u mei he pekia ‘i hono ‘aho tolu:
42024047	pea ‘e malanga‘aki ‘i hono hingoa ‘a e fakatomala mo e fakamolemole angahala ki he kakai kotoa pē, ‘o kamata mei Selusalema.
42024048	Ko kimoutolu ko e kau fakamo‘oni ki he ngaahi me‘a ni.
42024049	Pea ko au ‘eni ‘oku ou tuku atu ‘a e tala‘ofa ‘a ‘eku ‘eiki kiate kimoutolu: pea ko kimoutolu te mou nofo ‘i Kolo, kae‘oua ke fakakofu ‘aki kimoutolu ha mālohi mei ‘olunga.
42024050	Pea ne taki atu kinautolu ‘o a‘u ki Pētani; pea ne mafao atu hono ongo nima kiate kinautolu, ‘o ne tāpuaki‘i kinautolu.
42024051	Pea ‘iloange, lolotonga ‘ene tāpuaki‘i kinautolu, ne mavahe ia meiate kinautolu, ‘o tukutuku hake ki he langi.
42024052	Pea ko kinautolu, na‘a nau hū kiate ia, ‘o nau foki ki Selusalema ‘oku nau fiefia ‘aupito.
42024053	Pea na‘a nau ma‘unganofo ki he Temipale he‘enau fakamālō‘ia ‘a e ‘Otua.
43001001	‘I HE kamata‘anga kuo ‘i ai ‘a FOLOFOLA, pea na‘e feangai mo e ‘Otua ‘a Folofola, pea na‘e ‘Otua ‘a Folofola.
43001002	Ko e toko taha ko ia na‘e ‘i he kamata‘anga, ‘o feangai mo e ‘Otua.
43001003	Ko e hoko mai ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē na‘e fou ‘iate ia; pea na‘e ‘ikai ha momo‘i me‘a ‘e taha ‘e hoko mai, ‘o ‘ata‘atā mo ia.
43001004	‘Ilonga ha me‘a kuo hoko mai na‘e nofo ‘i he toko taha ko ia ko e mo‘ui; pea ko e mo‘ui ko ia ‘a e maama ‘a e tangata.
43001005	Pea ‘oku ulo ‘a e maama ‘i he po‘uli; pea na‘e ‘ikai lava‘i ia ‘e he po‘uli.
43001006	Na‘e hoko mai ha tangata na‘e fekau mei he ‘Otua, ko hono hingoa ko Sione.
43001007	Ko e toko taha ko ia na‘e ha‘u mo‘o fakahā, koe‘uhi ke ne fakahaa‘i ‘a e Maama, koe‘uhi ke tui ‘a e kakai kotoa pē ‘iate ia.
43001008	Na‘e ‘ikai ko ia ‘a e Maama, ka na‘a ne ‘i ai koe‘uhi ke ne fakahaa‘i ‘a e Maama.
43001009	Kuo ‘i ai ‘a e Maama mo‘onia, ‘a ia ‘oku ne huluhulu ‘a e tangata takitaha, pea ‘oku ne ha‘u ki māmani.
43001010	Na‘a ne ‘i māmani, pea ko e hoko mai ‘a māmani na‘e fou ‘iate ia, ka ka ‘ikai ‘ilo ia ‘e māmani.
43001011	Na‘a ne ha‘u ki hono ‘api tonu, ka ka ‘ikai tali ia ‘e hono kakai ‘o‘ona.
43001012	Ka ka ‘ilonga kinautolu na‘e ma‘u ia, na‘a ne fakamafai‘i kinautolu ke hoko ko e fānau ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘io, ‘a kinautolu ‘oku tui pīkitai ki hono huafa:
43001013	‘A kinautolu na‘e ‘ikai fakatupu ‘e ha toto, pe ‘e he loto ‘o kakano, ‘uma‘ā ‘e ha loto ‘o ha tangata, ka ‘e he ‘Otua.
43001014	Pea na‘e hoko ‘a Folofola ko e kakano; ‘o ne fokotu‘u hono tāpanekale ‘i hotau lotolotonga, pea na‘a tau mamata ki hono Sikaina (ko ha lāngilangi na‘e taau mo ha ‘alo-tofu-pē-taha kuo ha‘u mei he‘ene tamai)–ta ‘oku ne fonu ‘i he kelesi mo e mo‘oni.
43001015	(Oku fakahā ia ‘e Sione, ‘io, kuo ne kalanga ‘o pehē, Ko eni ia na‘a ku lea ki ai, Ko ia ‘oku ne muimui mai kuo ne laka ‘o mu‘omu‘a ‘iate au: koe‘uhiā na‘a ne ‘i mu‘a noa pē ‘iate au.)
43001016	He na‘a tau ma‘u kotoa pē mei he‘ene fonu ko ia, ‘io, ‘o taufetongi he kelesi mo ha kelesi.
43001017	He na‘e fou ‘a e Lao ‘ia Mōsese, ko e me‘a tuku mai; ka ka fou ‘a e kelesi mo e mo‘oni ‘ia Sīsū Kalaisi, ‘o mātu‘aki hiki mai.
43001018	Ko e me‘a ki he ‘Otua, kuo te‘eki ke mamata ki ai ‘e ha taha ‘i ha taimi; ko e ‘Otua tofu-pē-taha-ne-fakatupu, ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘oku ne a‘u ki he fatafata ‘o e Tamai, ko IA ia na‘a ne fakamatala IA.
43001019	Pea ko eni ‘a e fakahā ‘e Sione, ‘i he fekau ange ki ai mei Selusalema ‘e ha‘a Siu hani taula‘eiki mo hani Līvaite, ke fakafehu‘i kiate ia, ‘o pehē, Ko hai tū koe?
43001020	Pea na‘a ne fakahā pē, ‘o ‘ikai te ne faka‘ikai‘i; ‘io, na‘a ne fakahā. ‘Oku ‘ikai ko au ia ‘a e Mīsaia.
43001021	Pea nau fehu‘i kiate ia, Pea ko hai nai koe? ko ‘Ilaisiā? Pea ne pehē, ‘Oku ‘ikai. Ko koe ‘apē ‘a e palōfita? Ka ka tali ‘e ia, ‘Ikai.
43001022	Pea nau pehē ki ai, Pea ko hai ai koe? koe‘uhi ke ai ha‘amau tala kiate kinautolu na‘e fai homau fekau. Ko e hā ho‘o poa kiate koe?
43001023	Pea lea ia ‘o pehē, Ko au ‘a e le‘o ‘o ha toko taha ‘oku kalanga he toafa, Fakatotonu ‘a e hā‘ele‘anga ‘o Sihova: ‘O hangē ko e lea ‘a e palōfita ko ‘Aisea.
43001024	Pea kuo fekau mai ha ni‘ihi mei he Fālesi.
43001025	Pea fehu‘i ‘e kinautolu ‘o nau pehē ki ai, Pea ko e hā ‘oku ke fai papitaiso ai, ‘o kapau ‘oku ‘ikai ko e Mīsaia koe, pe ko ‘Ilaisiā, ‘uma‘ā ‘a e Palōfita?
43001026	Tali pē ‘a Sione kiate kinautolu, ‘o pehē, Ko au ‘oku ou papitaiso vai: ‘oku tu‘u ‘i homou lotolotonga ha toko taha ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo ki ai:
43001027	‘oku muimui mai ia, ko e toko taha ‘oku ‘ikai te u taau ke vete ‘a e nono‘o ‘o hono topuva‘e.
43001028	Na‘e hoko ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ni ‘i Pētani ‘i Tu‘a-Soatani, ko e potu na‘e nofo ai ‘a Sione ‘i he‘ene fai papitaiso.
43001029	Ko e ‘aho na‘a na feholoi, na‘a ne sio kia Sīsū ‘oku ha‘u kiate ia, pea ne pehē; Vakai, ko ena ‘a e Lami ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘a ia ‘oku ne ‘ave ‘a e angahala ‘a māmani!
43001030	Ko eni ia ‘a e toko taha ne u lea ki ai, ‘Oku muimui mai ha tangata, ‘a ia kuo ne laka ‘o mu‘omu‘a ‘iate au: koe‘uhi na‘a ne ‘i mu‘a noa pē ‘iate au.
43001031	Pea na‘e ‘ikai te u ‘ilo ia ‘e au: ka ko hono fakahā ki ‘Isileli, ko hono ‘uhinga ia ‘o ‘eku ha‘u ‘o papitaiso vai.
43001032	Pea na‘e fakahā ‘e Sione ‘o pehē, Kuo u mamata ki he Laumālie ‘oku ‘alu hifo mei langi ‘i he tatau ‘o ha lupe, ‘o nofo‘i ia.
43001033	Pea na‘e ‘ikai te u ‘ilo ia ‘e au: ka ko ia na‘a ne fekau au ke papitaiso vai na‘a ne folofola mai, ‘o pehē, Ko e toko taha te ke mamata ki ai, ‘oku ‘alu hifo ‘a e Laumālie, ‘o nofo‘i ia, ko ia ia ‘oku fai papitaiso ‘aki ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni.
43001034	Pea kuo u mamata ‘e au, pea kuo u fakahā, Ko eni ia ‘a e ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otua.
43001035	Ko e ‘aho na‘a na feholoi na‘e tu‘u foki ‘a Sione, pea ai mo ha toko ua ‘i he‘ene kau ako;
43001036	pea ne siofia ‘a Sīsū ‘i he‘ene ‘eve‘eva, ‘o ne pehē; Vakai, ko ena ‘a e Lami ‘a e ‘Otua!
43001037	Pea fanongo ‘a e ongo ako ki he‘ene lea, pea na muimui kia Sīsū.
43001038	Pea tafoki ange ‘a Sīsū, ‘o ne vakai ki he‘ena muimui mai, pea ne pehē kiate kinaua, Ko e hā nai ‘oku mo kumi?
43001039	Pea na pehē ki ai, Lāpai, (‘a ia ko hono hiki, Tangata‘eiki ‘oku ke nofo ‘i fē?
43001040	Pea pehē ‘e ia kiate kinaua, Mo omi, ka mo sio ki ai. Ko ia na‘a na ō, ‘o mamata ki he potu na‘a ne nofo ai, ‘o nau nonofo mo ia ke ‘osi ‘a e ‘aho ko ia: na‘e fe‘unga ‘a pē mo hono hongofulu ‘o e houa.
43001041	Ko e toko taha ‘i he ongo me‘a na‘e fanongo ki he me‘a ‘a Sione, ‘o muimui kia Sīsū, ko ‘Anitelū, ko e tehina ‘o Saimone Pita.
43001042	Ko ia ia na‘a ne motu‘a ma‘u hono tokoua ‘o‘ona ko Saimone, ‘o ne pehē ki ai, ‘ē, kuo ma ‘ilo ‘a e Mīsaia, (‘a ia ko hono hiki, ko Kalaisi).
43001043	Pea na‘a ne taki ia kia Sīsū, pea siofia ia ‘e Sīsū, ‘o ne pehē, Ko Saimone koe, ko e foha ‘o Sione: ‘e ui koe ko Kīfasi, (‘a ia ka hiki mai, ko Pita, pe ko Maka.)
43001044	Ko e ‘aho na‘a na feholoi na‘a ne loto ke ‘alu ki Kāleli; pea kumi ‘e Sīsū kia Filipe, ‘o ne pehē ki ai, Ke ke muimui kiate au.
43001045	Pea ko Filipe ko e toko taha ia mei Petesaita, ko e tupu ‘i he kolo ‘o ‘Anitelū mo Pita.
43001046	Pea kumi ‘e Filipe ‘a Nātaniela, ‘o ne pehē ki ai, ‘Ē, ko e Toko Taha na‘e lea ki ai ‘a Mōsese ‘i he Tohi Lao, mo e Ka u Palōfita, kuo mau ‘ilo ia, ‘a Sīsū mei Nāsaleti, ko e foha ‘o Siosifa.
43001047	Pea pehē ange ‘e Nātaniela, ‘O ala tupu koā ha lelei mei Nāsaleti? Pea lea ‘a Filipe ki ai, Ha‘u ‘o mamata.
43001048	Pea sio ‘e Sīsū kia Nātaniela ‘oku ha‘u kiate ia, pea ne lea ai ‘o pehē; Vakai, ko ena ha ‘Isileli mo‘oni: ‘oku ‘ikai ha kākā ‘iate ia!
43001049	Pea lea ki ai ‘a Nātaniela, Ko ho‘o ‘ilo au mei fē? Pea tali ‘e Sīsū ‘o ne pehē ki ai, ‘I he te‘eki ke ui koe ‘e Filipe, lolotonga ho‘o ‘i he lolo fiki, na‘a ku sio kiate koe.
43001050	Pea tali ‘e Nātaniela, Lāpai, ko koe ia ‘a e ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otua; ko e Tu‘i ‘Isileli koe.
43001051	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū, ‘o ne pehē kiate ia, ‘Oku ke tui koā, koe‘uhi ko ‘eku pehē atu, ne u ‘ilo koe ‘i he lolo fiki? Te ke mamata ki ha ngaahi me‘a ‘oku lahi ange ‘i he me‘a pehē.
43001052	Pea pehē ange ‘e ia, Ko au ē, ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala kiate kimoutolu, Te mou mamata ki he langi kuo fakaava, pea oku ‘alu hake mo ‘alu hifo ‘a e kau ‘āngelo ‘a e ‘Otua ‘i he Fanautama ‘a Tangata.
43002001	PEA ‘i hono tolu ‘o e ‘aho na‘e fai ha ta‘ane ‘i Kena ‘i Kāleli; pea kuo ‘i ai ‘a e fa‘ē ‘a Sīsū.
43002002	Pea na‘e tala foki ‘a e ta‘ane kia Sīsū, pea ki he‘ene kau ako.
43002003	Pea kuo si‘i ‘a e uaine, pea lea kia Sīsū ‘e he‘ene fa‘ē, ‘o pehē, ‘Oku ‘ikai ha‘anau uaine.
43002004	Pea folofola ‘e Sīsū ki ai, Fefine, ko ho hā au? kuo te‘eki hoko mai hoku taimi.
43002005	Pea lea ‘e he‘ene fa‘ē ki he kau sevāniti, Neongo pē ko e hā ha me‘a te ne tala kiate kimoutolu, mou fai.
43002006	Pea na‘e tu‘u ai ha ‘angavai maka ‘e ono, ‘a ia na‘e tuku ai koe‘uhi ko e fakama‘a faka-Siu, ‘e hao ai takitaha ha pate ‘e ua pē tolu.
43002007	Folofola ‘a Sīsū kiate kinautolu, Mou fakafonu vai ‘a e ngaahi ‘angavai na. Pea nau fakafonu ngutungutu ia.
43002008	Pea ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Fakatau leva, pea ‘ave ki he ‘eiki ‘o e kātoanga. Pea nau ‘ave.
43002009	Pea ‘i he kamata ‘e he ‘eiki ‘o e kātoanga ‘a e vai kuo hoko ‘o uaine; (‘osi na‘e ‘ikai te ne ‘ilo ‘a e potu na‘e ‘omi mei ai, ka na‘e ‘ilo pē ‘e he kau sevāniti, ‘a ia na‘a nau fakatau ‘a e vai) pea ui ange ‘e he ‘eiki ‘o e kātoanga ‘a e ‘eiki ta‘ane, ‘o ne pehē ki ai,
43002010	Ko e anga ‘o e tangata ke tomu‘a fokotu‘u ‘a e uaine lelei; pea ka konā ‘a e kakai, pea toki fokotu‘u ‘a e uaine ‘oku faka‘ange‘ange: ka ko koe kuo ke ta‘ofi ‘a e uaine lelei ki he taimi ni.
43002011	Na‘e fai ‘eni ‘e Sīsū ‘i Kena ‘i Kāleli, ko e ‘uluaki ‘o ‘ene ngaahi mana, pea ne fakae‘a ai hono lāngilangi; pea na‘e tui pīkitai kiate ia ‘ene kau ako.
43002012	Hili ‘eni na‘a ne ‘alu hifo ki Kāpaneume, ‘a ia, mo ‘ene fa‘ē, mo hono ngaahi tokoua, mo ‘ene kau ako: pea nau nofo ai, kae ‘ikai fuoloa.
43002013	Pea na‘e panaki ‘a e Pāsova ‘a ha‘a Siu, pea ‘alu hake ki Selusalema ‘a Sīsū,
43002014	pea ne ‘ilo ‘i he Temipale ‘a e kau faifakatau pulu mo e sipi mo e lupe, mo e kau fetongi pa‘anga ‘oku nau nofo ai:
43002015	pea ne ngaohi ha uipi ‘aki ‘a e ngaahi afo, ‘o ne fakateka kotoa pē mei he Temipale, mo e fanga sipi foki, mo e fanga pulu; ‘o ne hua‘i ‘a e pa‘anga ‘a e kau fetongi pa‘anga, mo ne fulihi ‘enau ngaahi tēpile,
43002016	pea ne folofola kiate kinautolu kuo ‘omi lupe ke fakatau, ‘ave ‘a e ngaahi me‘a na; pea ‘oua ‘e ngaohi ‘a e fale ‘o ‘eku Tamai koe fale fakatau.
43002017	Pea manatu ‘ene kau ako ne tohi ‘o pehē, Ko e mamahi‘i ‘o ho fale te ne kai ‘o ‘osi au.
43002018	Pea tali ‘a ha‘a Siu ‘o nau pehē ki ai, Ko e hā ha faka‘ilonga ‘oku ke tuku mai, ho‘o fai ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ni?
43002019	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū ‘o ne folofola kiate kinautolu, Holoki ‘a e fale tapu ni, pea te u toe fokotu‘u ‘i ha ‘aho ‘e tolu.
43002020	Pea lea ai ‘a ha‘a Siu, Kuo ‘osi ‘a e ta‘u ‘e fāngofulu mā ono mo e langa ‘o e Fale Tapu ni, pea te ke fokotu‘u ‘e koe ‘i ha ‘aho ‘e tolu pē.
43002021	Ka ko ‘ene lea na‘e kau ki he fale tapu ko hono sino.
43002022	Ko ia ‘i he hoko hono fokotu‘u mei he pekia, na‘e manatu ‘e he‘ene kau ako kuo ne lea pehē; pea nau tui ki he folofola, pea mo e lea kuo fai ‘e Sīsū.
43002023	Pea lolotonga ‘ene ‘i Selusalema ‘i he Pāsova, ‘i he fai ‘o e kātoanga, na‘e tui ha tokolahi ki hono huafa he‘enau mamata ki he‘ene ngaahi mana na‘a ne fai.
43002024	Ka ko Sīsū na‘e ‘ikai te ne tui ‘e ia, ‘o tuku ia kiate kinautolu, koe‘uhiā ko ‘ene vavanga‘i ‘a e kakai kotoa pē,
43002025	pea koe‘uhi na‘e ‘ikai te ne ‘oua ke faka‘ilo ‘e ha taha ha me‘a ‘oku kau ki ha tangata; he na‘a ne mea‘i ‘iate ia pē ‘a e me‘a ‘oku ‘i he tangata.
43003001	PEA na‘e ai ha tangata ‘i he kau Fālesi, ko Nikotimasi hono hingoa, ko ha taha ia ‘o e hou‘eiki Siu:
43003002	pea ha‘u po‘uli kiate ia ‘a e matāpule ko ia, ‘o ne pehē ki ai, Lāpai, ‘oku mau ‘ilo kuo ke hoko mai mei he ‘Otua ko hamau faiako: he tala‘ehai ‘e lava ‘e ha toko taha ha ngaahi fu‘u mana pehē, hangē ko ia ‘oku ke fai, ka ‘i he kau mo ia ‘a e ‘Otua.
43003003	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū, ‘o ne folofola kiate ia, Ko au ē, ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘Ilonga ‘a ia ‘e ‘ikai fanau‘i fo‘ou mei ‘olunga, ‘e ‘ikai te ne lava ke mamata ki he Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua.
43003004	Pea lea ‘a Nikotimasi kiate ia, ‘O lava fēfē ke fanau‘i ha tangata ka kuo motu‘a? te ne lava koā ke toe hū ki he manava ‘o ‘ene fa‘ē, ‘o fanau‘i?
43003005	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū, Ko au ē, ko au ē, ‘oku ou tali kiate koe, Kapau ‘e ‘ikai fanau‘i ha taha ‘i he vai mo e Laumālie, ‘e ‘ikai te ne lava ke hū ki he Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua.
43003006	Ko e me‘a kuo fanau‘i mei he kakano ko e kakano ia; pea ko e me‘a kuo fanau‘i mei he Laumālie ko e laumālie ia,
43003007	‘oua te ke ofo ‘i he‘eku pehē atu, Kuo pau ke mou fanau‘i fo‘ou mei ‘olunga.
43003008	Ko e ma‘ili ‘a e matangi ‘oku fāinoa pē, ko ‘ene fa‘iteliha pē; pea ‘oku ke ongo‘i ‘ene mumuhu, ka ‘oku ‘ikai te ke ‘ilo pē ko e ha‘u mei fē, pe ‘oku ‘alu ki fē: ko e anga ia ‘o ia kotoa pē kuo fanau‘i mei he Laumālie.
43003009	Pea tali ‘e Nikotimasi ‘o ne pehē ki ai, ‘O lava fēfē ‘a e ngaahi me‘a pehē ni?
43003010	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū ‘o ne pehē ki ai, Ko koe ko e Faiako ‘o ‘Isileli, pea ‘oku ‘ikai te ke ‘ilo koā ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ni?
43003011	Ko au ē, ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘Oku mau lea‘aki ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku mau lāu‘ilo ki ai, pea ‘oku mau fakahā ‘a e ngaahi me‘a kuo mau mamata ki ai; pea oku ‘ikai te mou tali ‘emau fakamatala.
43003012	Kapau kuo u tala kiate kimoutolu ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ‘i māmani, ka ‘oku ‘ikai te mou tui, pea mou tui fēfē, ‘o kapau te u tala kiate kimoutolu ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ‘i he langi?
43003013	Pea kuo te‘eki ke ‘alu hake ha toko taha ‘o hū ki langi, ngata pē ‘iate ia na‘e ‘alu hifo mei he langi, ko e Fanautama ‘a Tangata.
43003014	Pea hangē na‘e hiki ki ‘olunga ‘e Mōsese ‘a e ngata ‘i he toafa, pehē foki kuo pau ke hiki ki ‘olunga ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata;
43003015	koe‘uhi ko ia kotoa pē ‘oku tui ke ne ma‘u ‘iate ia ‘a e mo‘ui ta‘engata.
43003016	He na‘e ‘ofa pehē ‘a e ‘Otua ki māmani, ko ia na‘a ne foaki hono ‘Alo tofu-pē-taha-ne-fakatupu, koe‘uhi ko ia kotoa pē ‘oku tui pīkitai kiate ia ke ‘oua na‘a ‘auha, kae ma‘u ‘a e mo‘ui ta‘engata.
43003017	He tala‘ehai na‘e fekau ‘e he ‘Otua ‘a e ‘Alo ki māmani ke fakamaau? ‘a māmani; ka koe‘uhi ke mo‘ui ‘a māmani ‘iate ia.
43003018	Ko ia ‘oku tui pīkitai kiate ia ‘oku ‘ikai ke fakamaau? ia; ka ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai ke tui, kuo ‘osi fakamaau? ia; koe‘uhi kuo ‘ikai te ne tui ki he huafa ‘o e ‘Alo tofu-pē-taha-na‘e-fakatupu ‘e he ‘Otua.
43003019	Pea ko eni ia ‘a e fakamaau: kuo hoko mai ‘a e maama ki māmani, pea ‘ofa ‘a e kakai ki he po‘uli ‘o ‘ikai ki he maama; he ko ‘enau ngaahi ngāue na‘e kovi.
43003020	He ‘ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku ngāue kovi ‘oku ne fehi‘a ki he maama, pea ‘oku ‘ikai te ne ha‘u ki he maama, na‘a ‘ilonga ‘ene ngaahi ngāue.
43003021	Ka ko ia ‘oku ne feia ‘a e mo‘oni ‘oku ne ha‘u ki he maama, koe‘uhi ke e‘a ‘ene ngaahi ngāue, he kuo fai ia ‘i he ‘Otua.
43003022	Hili ia na‘e ha‘u ‘a Sīsū mo ‘ene kau ako ki he fonua ko Siutea, pea ne nofo ai mo kinautolu, ‘o fai papitaiso.
43003023	Pea na‘e ‘i ai foki ‘a Sione, ‘oku ne fai papitaiso ‘i ‘Ēnoni ‘o ofi ki Sēlemi, koe‘uhi na‘e lahi ‘a e ngaahi vai ‘i he potu ko ia; pea na‘e ‘alu ange ‘a e kakai, ‘o nau papitaiso ai,
43003024	he kuo te‘eki lī ‘a Sione ki he pilīsone.
43003025	Ko ia na‘e tupu ai ha fakakikihi ‘a e kau ako ‘a Sione pea mo ha motu‘a faka-Siu, ‘o kau ki he fai fakama‘a.
43003026	Pea nau omi kia Sione, ‘o nau pehē ki ai, Lāpai, ko e toko taha ko ia na‘e ‘iate koe ‘i Tu‘a-Soatani, ‘a ia kuo ke fakahaa‘ia, ‘ē, ‘oku fai papitaiso ia, pea ‘oku tafe taha ‘a e kakai kiate ia.
43003027	Pea tali ‘a Sione ‘o ne pehē, Tala‘ehai ‘oku ala ma‘u ha me‘a ‘e ha tangata, ka ‘i hono foaki kiate ia mei langi.
43003028	Ko kimoutolu foki te mou fakamo‘oni ki he‘eku pehē, ‘Oku ‘ikai ko au ia ‘a e Mīsaia, ka kuo fekau mai au ke mu‘omu‘a ki he toko taha ko ena.
43003029	Ko ia ‘oku ne ma‘u ‘a e ta‘ahine, ko ia ia ‘a e ‘eikita‘ane; ka ko e moa‘uli ‘a e ‘eikita‘ane, ‘a ia ‘oku ne tu‘u ‘o fakaongo kiate ia, ‘oku ne fiefia–ka ko ha fiefia–‘i he ongo mai ‘a e le‘o ‘o e ‘eiki ta‘ane: ‘āua, ko e fiefia pē ‘ena ‘oku ‘a‘aku, pea tā kuo kakato.
43003030	Kuo pau ke faka‘a‘au ia ki mu‘a, ka u faka‘a‘au au ki mui.
43003031	Ko ia ‘oku ne hoko mai mei ‘olunga ‘oku ne mā‘olunga ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē: ko ia ‘oku tupu mei he māmani ‘oku fakaemāmani ia, pea ‘oku fakaemāmani mo ‘ene lea.
43003032	Ko ia ‘oku hoko mai mei he langi ‘oku ne fakahā ‘a e me‘a kuo ne mātā, mo ia na‘a ne fanongo ki ai: ka hono tali ‘e ha taha ‘ene fakamatala?
43003033	‘Ilonga ‘a ia kuo tali ‘ene fakamatala, kuo ne sila‘i ‘ene fakamo‘oni, ‘Oku mo‘oni ‘a e ‘Otua.
43003034	He ko ia ne fekau mai ‘e he ‘Otua, ko e ngaahi folofola ‘a e ‘Otua ia ‘oku ne lea‘aki: he tala‘ehai ‘oku ne fakafuofua ‘ene foaki ‘a e Laumālie ki ai.
43003035	‘Oku ‘ofa ‘a e Tamai ki he ‘Alo, pea kuo ne tuku ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē ki he‘ene fa‘iteliha.
43003036	Ko ia ‘oku ne tui pīkitai ki he ‘Alo ‘oku ne ma‘u ‘a e mo‘ui ta‘engata: ka ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai te ne talangofua ki he ‘Alo ‘e ‘ikai te ne mamata ia ki he mo‘ui; ka ‘oku nofo ma‘u kiate ia ‘e he houhau ‘a e ‘Otua.
43004001	PEA ko ia, ‘i he mea‘i leva ‘e he ‘Eiki kuo fanongo ‘e he kau Fālesi, Tokua ‘oku fakaului mo papitaiso ‘e Sīsū ha kau ako, ‘o hulu atu ‘i ha‘a Sione;
43004002	(Ka tala‘ehai na‘e fai papitaiso ‘e Sīsū ‘e ia, ka ko ‘ene kau ako pē)
43004003	Ko ia na‘a ne tuku pē ‘a Siutea, ‘o ne toe ‘alu mei ai ki Kāleli.
43004004	Pea na‘e pau ke ne ‘asi atu ‘i loto Samēlia.
43004005	Pea ne hoko ai ki ha kolo ‘o Samēlia, ‘a ia na‘e ui ko Saika, ‘o ofi ki he potu fonua na‘e foaki ‘e Sēkope kia Siosifa ko hono foha.
43004006	Pea na‘e tu‘u ‘i he potu ko ia ha vai, ko e vaikeli ‘o Sēkope. Pea ko eni, kuo hela ‘a Sīsū ‘i he fononga, pea ne ta‘utu leva ki he ngutu vai; ko hono taimi na‘e fe‘unga nai mo e ono.
43004007	‘Iloange na‘e ha‘u ha fefine, ko e Samēlia, ke ‘utu vai: pea pehē ‘e Sīsū ki ai, ‘ē, mai si‘aku inu:
43004008	(He ko ‘ene kau ako kuo ‘alu ange ki he kolo ke fakatau me‘akai.)
43004009	Pea lea ai ‘a e fefine Samēlia kiate ia, Ko e toe tala inu hā e kiate au, ka ko e Siu koe, pea ko e fefine Samēlia kita? he tala‘ehai ‘oku ‘uhi ha Siu ki ha Samēlia.
43004010	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū ‘o ne me‘a ki ai, Ka ne ke ‘ilo ‘a e me‘a‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua, pea ka ne ke ‘ilo pe ko hai ia ‘oku ne pehē atu, ‘Omi haku inu; pehē ko koe ne ke fai ‘a e kole kiate ia, pea kuo ne ‘atu ha vai mo‘ui.
43004011	Pea lea ai ‘a e fefine kiate ia, ‘Eiki, ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘o me‘a ke ‘utu ‘aki, pea ‘oku loloto ‘a e luo; pea mei fē ai ho‘o ma‘u ‘a e vai mo‘ui na?
43004012	He ko e lahi koā koe ‘i he‘etau kui ko Sēkope, ‘a ia na‘a ne tuku mai kiate kimautolu ‘a e vai ni, pea na‘e inu mei ai ‘e ia, mo hono ngaahi foha, pea mo ‘ene fanga manu?
43004013	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū, ‘o ne me‘a kiate ia, ‘Ā, ko ia kotoa pē ‘oku inu mei he vai ko ena te ne toe fie inua:
43004014	ka ‘ilonga ‘a ia te ne inu mei he vai te u ‘atu ‘e au, ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito te ne toe fie inua ‘o ta‘engata; ka ko e vai te u ‘atu kiate ia ‘e au te ne tupu ‘i loto ‘i he toko taha ko ia, ko e matavai mapunopuna hake, ‘o iku ki he mo‘ui ta‘engata.
43004015	Pea lea ‘a e fefine kiate ia, ‘Eiki, foaki mai ‘a e vai ko ia kiate au, koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a ku fie inua, pe ongosia mai ki heni ke ‘utu.
43004016	Pea me‘a ‘e ia ki ai, ‘Alu ‘o ui mai ho husepāniti, pea ha‘u ki heni.
43004017	Pea tali ‘a e fefine ‘o pehē, ‘Oku ‘ikai si‘aku husepāniti.
43004018	Pea pehē ange ‘e Sīsū, ‘Oku mo‘oni pē ho‘o lea na, ‘Oku ‘ikai te u ma‘u husepāniti: he na‘a ke ma‘u ha husepāniti ‘e toko nima; pea ko e tangata ‘oku ke ma‘u ni ‘oku ‘ikai ko ho husepāniti: ko e mo‘oni ho‘o lau ko ia.
43004019	Pea lea ki ai ‘a e fefine, ‘Eiki, tā ‘oku ou vakai ko e palōfita koe.
43004020	Ko ‘emau ngaahi kui na‘a nau fai ‘enau lotu ‘i he mo‘unga ni; ka ko kimoutolu ‘oku mou pehē, ko Selusalema pē ‘a e potu ‘oku totonu ke fai ai ‘a e lotu.
43004021	Pea lea ki ai ‘a Sīsū, ‘e fefine, tui mai kiate au, ‘oku ‘unu mai ha taimi, ‘a ia ‘e ‘ikai te mou fai ‘i he mo‘unga ni, pe ‘i Selusalema, ho‘omou lotu ki he Tamai.
43004022	Ko kimoutolu ‘oku mou lotu ki he me‘a ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo ki ai: ‘oku mau lotu kimautolu ki he me‘a ‘oku mau lāu‘ilo‘i: he ‘oku mei he kakai Siu ‘a e fakamo‘ui.
43004023	Ka ne ongo ia, ka ‘oku ‘unu mai ha taimi–‘io, kuo hoko ni–‘a ia ko e kakai ‘oku lotu mo‘oni te nau fai ‘i laumālie mo fai ‘i mo‘oni ‘enau lotu ki he Tamai: he ko e Tamai foki ‘oku ne kumi ‘a e fa‘ahinga ko ia, ‘a kinautolu ‘oku mātu‘aki lotu kiate ia.
43004024	Ko e ‘Otua ko e laumālie: pea ko kinautolu ‘e hū kiate ia, kuo pau ke nau fai ‘i laumālie pea fai ‘i mo‘oni ‘enau hū.
43004025	Pea lea ‘a e fefine ki ai, ‘Oku ou ‘ilo ‘oku ha‘u ‘a e Mīsaia; (‘a ia ‘oku ui ko Kalaisi) ka toki ha‘u ‘a e toko taha ko ia te ne fakahā kiate kimautolu ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē kotoa pē.
43004026	Pea folofola ai ‘a Sīsū kiate ia, Ko au ia ‘oku lea kiate koe.
43004027	Pea fe‘unga mo ia mo e omi ‘ene kau ako, ‘o nau ofo ‘i he‘ene talanoa mo ha fefine; kae molekemama‘o hanau taha te ne pehē, Ko e hā ‘a e me‘a ‘oku ke fiema‘u? pē, Ko e hā ‘oku ke talanoa ai mo e fefine?
43004028	Pea tuku ai ‘e he fefine ‘ene ‘angavai, ‘o ne ‘alu mei ai ki he kolo, ‘o ne pehē ki he kakai,
43004029	Omi ange, ‘o mamata ki he tangata kuo ne tala mai ‘a e me‘a kotoa kuo u fai: ‘oku ‘ikai nai ko e Mīsaia ‘eni, ‘e?
43004030	Pea nau ‘alu atu mei he kolo, ‘o nau kamata laka mai kiate ia.
43004031	Lolotonga ia na‘e kole kiate ia ‘e he kau ako, ‘o pehē, Lāpai, ke ke tokoni mu‘a.
43004032	Ka ka pehē ‘e ia kiate kinautolu, ‘Oku ai ‘eku kai ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo ki ai.
43004033	Pea fepehē‘aki ai ‘a e kau ako, Ka tala‘ehai kuo ‘omi ‘e ha taha ha‘ane me‘akai, ‘inē?
43004034	Pea pehē ‘e Sīsū kiate kinautolu, Ko ‘eku me‘akai ē, ko e tuli ke fai ‘a e finangalo ‘o ia na‘a ne fekau mai au, pea ke faka‘osi ha‘ana ngāue.
43004035	‘Ikai ‘oku mou lau, ‘Oku toe fā ‘a e māhina, pea hoko ‘a e ututa‘u. ‘Ā, ka u tala atu Mou hanga hake mu‘a ki he ngaahi ngoue na: vakai, kuo fisi hina ia ki he ututa‘u.
43004036	Pea na‘a mo e taimi ni ‘oku ma‘u totongi ‘e ia ‘oku utu, kae‘uma‘ā ‘oku ne tānaki fua ki he mo‘ui ta‘engata: koe‘uhi ke fiefia fakataha, ‘e ia na‘e tō, mo ia na‘e utu.
43004037	He ko ‘ene toki mo‘oni ‘i he me‘a ko eni ‘a e lea ko ē, ‘Oku tō ‘a e tō, kae utu ‘a e utu.
43004038	Na‘a ku fekau atu kimoutolu ‘e au ke utu ‘a e me‘a na‘e ‘ikai te mou fakaongosia ai kimoutolu: ko e kakai kehe na‘a nau fakaongosia ai, pea kuo mou ma‘u ‘e kimoutolu honau kakava.
43004039	Pea ko eni, na‘e ai ha tokolahi mei ha kolo ko ia na‘a nau tui pīkitai kiate ia, ‘a e kakai Samēlia, ko e me‘a ‘i he lea ‘a e fefine, he‘ene fakahā, Kuo ne tala mai ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē ne u fai.
43004040	Ko ia ‘i he a‘u ange ‘a e kau Samēlia, na‘a nau kole kiate ia ke ne nofo hifo mo kinautolu; pea ne nofo ‘i he potu ko ia ‘o ‘aho ua.
43004041	Pea tokolahi ange noa pē ‘a e kakai na‘e tui ko e me‘a ‘i he‘ene folofola ‘a‘ana;
43004042	pea nau pehē ki he fefine, ‘Oku ‘ikai te mau kei tui koe‘uhi pē ko ho‘o talanoa na‘e fai; he kuo mau fanongo tonu ki ai ‘e kimautolu, pea ‘oku mau ‘ilo, ko eni mo‘oni ia ‘a e Fakamo‘ui ‘o māmani.
43004043	Pea hili ‘a e ‘aho ko ia ‘e ua na‘a ne hiki mei he potu ko ia ki Kāleli.
43004044	He ko Sīsū na‘a ne tala ‘e ia, ‘oku ‘ikai faka‘apa‘apa‘ia ha palōfita ‘i hono fonua ‘o‘ona.
43004045	Ko ia ‘i he‘ene hoko ki Kāleli, na‘e tali ia ‘e he kakai Kāleli; he kuo nau mamata ki he ngaahi fu‘u me‘a ne ne fai ‘i Selusalema ‘i he kātoanga: he ko kinautolu foki na‘a nau ‘alu ki he kātoanga.
43004046	Pea ne toe ha‘u ai ki Kena ‘i Kāleli, ‘a e potu na‘a ne liliu ai ‘a e vai ke uaine. Pea na‘e ai ha mu‘a ‘a e Tu‘i, ‘a ia kuo puke si‘ono foha ‘i Kāpaneume.
43004047	Pea ‘i he fanongo ‘a e matāpule ko ia, tā kuo ha‘u ‘a Sīsū mei Siutea ki Kāleli, pea ne ‘alu ange ki ai, ‘o ne kole ke ne me‘a hifo ‘o faito‘o si‘ono foha: he ‘oku ne fakatau ke pekia.
43004048	Pea me‘a ai ‘a Sīsū kiate ia, ‘Ā, kapau ‘e ‘ikai te mou mamata ki he ngaahi faka‘ilonga, mo e ngaahi me‘a fakaofo, tā ‘e ‘ikai si‘i te mou tui.
43004049	Pea lea kiate ia ‘e he mu‘a ‘a e Tu‘i, ‘Eiki, ke ke me‘a hifo mu‘a, na‘a pekia si‘oku ‘uhiki.
43004050	Pea folofola ‘a Sīsū ki ai, ‘alu pē; kuo mo‘ui ho foha. Pea tui ‘a e matāpule ki he folofola kuo fai ‘e Sīsū, pea ne ‘alu.
43004051	Pea lolotonga ‘ene kei fononga hifo, mo e fakafetaulaki mai ‘e he‘ene kau tamaio‘eiki, ‘o nau pehē, tokua kuo mo‘ui ‘ene tamasi‘i.
43004052	Pea ne fehu‘i ai kiate kinautolu ki he houa na‘a ne kamata lelei ai. Pea nau tali kiate ia, Na‘e mahu‘i ‘a e mofi meiate ia ‘i he fitu ‘aneafi.
43004053	Pea ‘ilo leva ‘e he tamai, tā na‘e ‘i he houa pē ko ia, ‘a ia na‘e folofola ai ‘a Sīsū kiate ia ‘o pehē, Kuo mo‘ui ho foha: pea ne lotu, ‘e ia mo hono fāmili kātoa.
43004054	Ko e toe fai mana ‘eni ‘e Sīsū ko hono tu‘o ua, ‘i he‘ene ha‘u mei Siutea ki Kāleli.
43005001	Pea faifai pea ai ha kātoanga ‘a ha‘a Siu; pea fononga hake ‘a Sīsū ki Selusalema.
43005002	Pea ko eni ‘oku tu‘u ‘i Selusalema, ‘o ofi ki he Lepa Sipi, ha lepa ‘e taha, ‘a ia ko e hingoa ‘e taha ‘oku ‘ai ki ai ‘i he lea faka-Hepelū ko Peteseta; ‘oku nima hono fale hala.
43005003	Ko e ngaahi fale hala ko ia na‘e tatoka ai ha fu‘u kakai mahaki, ‘a e kui, ‘a e heke, ‘a e mamatea, ‘o tatali ki he ngaueue ‘a e vai.
43005004	He na‘e ‘alu hifo ha ‘āngelo ‘i ha taimi pau ki he lepa, ‘o ue‘i ‘a e vai; pea ko ia ‘e tomu‘a hopo ki he vai hili hono ue‘i, na‘e fakamo‘ui ia mei hono mahaki kotoa pē.
43005005	Pea na‘e ai tokua ha tangata ‘i he potu ko ia, kuo tolungofulu mā valu ta‘u ‘ene mahaki‘ia.
43005006	Pea ‘i he me‘a ‘a Sīsū ki he toko taha ko ia ‘oku tokoto, mo ne ‘ilo kuo fuoloa ‘e ne pehē, pea ne lea ki ai ‘o pehē, ‘Oku ke loto ke mo‘ui?
43005007	Pea tali ki ai ‘a e mahaki, ‘Eiki, ‘oku ‘ikai te u ma‘u si‘aku taha ke lī au ki he lepa, ‘oka ‘iloange ‘e ue‘i ‘a e vai; pea lolotonga ‘ete ‘alu ‘e kita pē, tā ‘oku laka hifo ha taha, ‘o mu‘omu‘a ‘iate au.
43005008	Pea folofola ki ai ‘e Sīsū, Tu‘u pē, to‘o ho mohenga na, pea hā‘ele.
43005009	Pea mo‘ui leva ‘a e tangata; pea ne to‘o hono mohenga, ‘o ne hā‘ele atu. Pea tā ko e Sāpate ‘a e ‘aho ko ia.
43005010	Ko ia na‘e lea ai ‘a ha‘a Siu ki he tangata kuo fakamo‘ui, ‘ē, ko e Sāpate ‘eni: pea tala‘ehai ‘oku ngofua ho‘o to‘o mohenga.
43005011	Ka ka tali ‘e ia kiate kinautolu, Ko ia na‘a ne fakamo‘ui au, ko ia ia na‘a ne pehē mai, To‘o ho mohenga, pea hā‘ele.
43005012	Pea nau fehu‘i kiate ia, Ko hai ‘a e tangata na‘e pehē kiate koe, To‘o ia ‘o hā‘ele?
43005013	Ka ko e tangata kuo faito‘o na‘e ‘ikai te ne ‘ilo pē ko hai ia; he ne laka ange ‘a Sīsū, koe‘uhi na‘e ‘i ai ha fu‘u kakai ‘i he potu ko ia.
43005014	Faifai pea ‘ilo ia ‘e Sīsū ‘i he Temipale, pea ne me‘a ki ai, Ko eni kuo ke mo‘ui: ‘oua te ke toe angahala, na‘a hoko kiate koe ha me‘a ‘oku kovi ange.
43005015	Pea ‘alu mei ai ‘a e tangata, ‘o ne fakahā ki ha‘a Siu, ko Sīsū ia ‘a e toko taha na‘e fakamo‘ui ia.
43005016	Pea ko hono ‘uhinga e ‘o e fakatanga‘i ‘o Sīsū ‘e ha‘a Siu, ko ‘ene fai pehē ‘i he ‘aho Sāpate.
43005017	Ka ka tali ‘e Sīsū kiate kinautolu, Kuo ngāue ‘a ‘eku Tamai ‘o a‘u ki he taimi ni, pea ‘oku ou ngāue mo au foki.
43005018	Pea ko hono ‘uhinga e na‘e ‘āsili feinga ai ‘e ha‘a Siu ke tāmate‘i ia, koe‘uhi na‘e ‘ikai ngata ‘i he‘ene maumau Sāpate, ka kuo ne lau foki ‘a e ‘Otua ko ‘ene Tamai mo‘oni, ‘o ne fakatatau ai ia ki he ‘Otua.
43005019	Ko ia na‘e tali ‘a Sīsū, ‘o ne folofola kiate kinautolu, Ko au ē, ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘Oku ‘ikai lava ‘e he ‘Alo ke fai ‘iate ia ha momo‘i me‘a, ngata pē ‘i he me‘a ‘oku ne vakai ‘oku fai ‘e he Tamai: he ‘ilonga ha me‘a ‘oku fai ‘e he ‘ene ‘Afio, ‘oku pehē pē mo e fai ‘e he ‘Alo ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia.
43005020	He ‘oku ‘ofa ‘a e Tamai ki he ‘Alo, pea ‘oku ne fakahā ki ai ‘a e ngaahi me‘a kotoa pē ‘oku fai ‘e he ‘Ene ‘Afio: pea te ne fakahā ki ai ha ngaahi ngāue ‘oku hulu atu ‘i he ngaahi me‘a ni, koe‘uhi ke mou ofo.
43005021	He hangē ā ‘oku fokotu‘u ‘e he Tamai ‘a e kau pekia, mo ne ngaohi ke mo‘ui; pehē foki mo e ‘Alo, ‘oku ne ngaohi ke mo‘ui ‘a kinautolu ‘oku ne loto ki ai.
43005022	Kae‘uma‘ā ‘oku ‘ikai ke fakamaau ‘e he Tamai ha toko taha, ka kuo ne tuku ‘a e fakamaau kotoa pē ki he ‘Alo:
43005023	koe‘uhi ke ‘apasia ‘a e kakai kotoa pē ki he ‘Alo, ‘o hangē ko ‘enau ‘apasia ki he Tamai. Ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai ke ‘apasia ki he ‘Alo, ‘oku ‘ikai te ne ‘apasia ki he Tamai na‘a ne fekau mai ia.
43005024	Ko au ē, ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Ko ia ‘oku ne fanongo ki he‘eku lea, pea tui kiate ia na‘a ne fekau mai au, ‘oku ne ma‘u ‘a e mo‘ui ta‘engata, pea ‘oku ‘ikai te ne a‘u ki he fakamaau; ka kuo ne hiki mei he mate ki he mo‘ui.
43005025	Ko au ē, ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘Oku ‘unu mai ha taimi–‘io, kuo hoko ni–‘a ia ‘e fanongo ‘e he kau mate ki he le‘o ‘o e ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otua: pea ko kinautolu kuo fanongo ki ai te nau mo‘ui.
43005026	He hangē ā ‘oku mo‘ui ‘a e Tamai ‘iate ia pē; pehē foki ‘a ‘ene tuku ki he ‘Alo ke mo‘ui ‘iate ia pē;
43005027	pea kuo ne tuku ke ‘a‘ana ‘a e fai fakamaau, koe‘uhi ko ha fānau tama ‘a tangata ia.
43005028	‘Oua te mou ofo ‘i he me‘a ko ia; he ‘oku ‘unu mai ha taimi, ‘a ia ‘e fanongo ai ki hono le‘o ‘e he kakai kotoa pē
43005029	‘Oku ‘i he ngaahi fa‘itoka, pea te nau ‘alu atu mei ai; ko kinautolu na‘e ngāue lelei, ki he toetu‘u ke mo‘ui, ko kinautolu na‘e fai kovi, ki he toetu‘u ke fakamaau.
43005030	Tala‘ehai ‘oku ou lava ke fai ha momo‘i me‘a ‘iate au pē: ‘oku ou fakamaau ‘o hangē ko ‘eku fanongo: pea ko e fakamaau ‘a‘aku ‘oku totonu; koe‘uhi ‘oku ‘ikai te u tuli ki he loto ‘o‘oku, ka ki he finangalo ‘o ia na‘a ne fekau mai au.
43005031	Ka ne ko au ‘oku fakamo‘oni kiate au, tā ‘oku ‘ikai mo‘oni ‘eku fakamo‘oni.
43005032	Ko e taha kehe ia ‘oku fakamo‘oni kiate au, pea ‘oku ou ‘ilo ‘oku mo‘oni ‘a e fakamo‘oni ‘oku ne fai kiate au.
43005033	Ko kimoutolu na‘a mou fekau atu kia Sione, pea na‘a ne fakamo‘oni ki he mo‘oni.
43005034	Ka ko au ‘oku ‘ikai te u tali ha fakamo‘oni mei ha tangata: ka neongo ia, ka ‘oku ou lea pehē, koe‘uhi ke mou mo‘ui.
43005035	Ko e toko taha ko ia ko e maama kuo tutu pea ulo: pea ko kimoutolu na‘a mou loto ke hākahaka ‘i hono maama, ‘o fuoloa si‘i.
43005036	Ka ko ‘eku fakamo‘oni ‘a‘aku ko e toko taha ‘oku lahi ‘ia Sione: he ko e ngaahi ngāue na‘e tuku mai ‘e he Tamai ke u lava, ‘io, ‘a e ngaahi ngāue pē ko ē ‘a ia ‘oku ou fai, ‘oku nau fakamo‘oni kiate au, kuo fekau mai au ‘e he Tamai.
43005037	‘Io, ko e Tamai, ‘a ia na‘a ne fekau mai au, kuo fakamo‘oni kiate au ‘e he ‘Ene ‘Afio: ka tala‘ehai kuo ongo hano le‘o kiate kimoutolu ‘i ha taimi, pea tala‘ehai kuo mou mamata ki hano ‘ata.
43005038	Pea na‘a mo ‘ene folofola, tala‘ehai ‘oku mou ma‘u ia ke nofo ma‘u ‘i homou loto: he ko ia na‘e fekau mai ‘e he ‘Ene ‘Afio, ko e toko taha ia ‘oku ‘ikai te mou tui ki ai.
43005039	‘Oku mou hakule ‘a e Tohitapu; koe‘uhi ‘oku mou mahalo ‘oku tu‘u ai ho‘omou ma‘u ‘a e mo‘ui ta‘engata: pea ko ia ia ‘oku fakamo‘oni kiate au.
43005040	Ka tala‘ehai ‘oku mou loto ke ha‘u kiate au ke mou ma‘u mo‘ui.
43005041	Ko e fakahīkihiki‘i ‘e he tangata ‘oku ‘ikai te u tali.
43005042	Ka kuo u ‘ilo‘i kimoutolu, tā ‘oku ‘ikai ‘iate kimoutolu ‘a e ‘ofa ki he ‘Otua.
43005043	Ko au na‘a ku ha‘u ‘i he huafa ‘o ‘eku Tamai; ka tala‘ehai ‘oku mou tali au: kapau ‘e ha‘u ha taha kehe ‘i hono hingoa ‘o‘ona, te mou tali ‘a e toko taha ko ia.
43005044	Te mou lava fēfē ke tui, ‘a kimoutolu ‘oku mou tali ‘a e fakahīkihiki‘i ‘oku mou fefai‘aki, ‘o ‘ikai te mou kumi ‘a e fakahīkihiki‘i ‘e he ‘Otua Taha-tofu-pē.
43005045	‘Oua te mou pehē, ko au te u talatalaaki‘i kimoutolu ki he Tamai: ‘oku ‘i ai ha toko taha ‘oku ne talatalaaki‘i kimoutolu, ‘a Mōsese, ‘a ‘ia kuo tu‘u ki ai ho‘omou falala.
43005046	He ka ne ‘oku mou tui kia Mōsese, pehē ‘oku mou tui kiate au: he ko e tohi ‘a e toko taha ko ia, ko e tohi kiate au.
43005047	Ka ‘o kapau ‘oku ‘ikai te mou tui ki he‘ene ngaahi tohi, pea fēfē ai ha‘amou tui ki he‘eku ngaahi lea?
43006001	PEA faifai pea ‘alu mei ai ‘a Sīsū ki he kauvai ‘o e Tahi ‘o Kāleli, ‘a ia ko e Tahi ‘o Taipiliō.
43006002	Pea na‘e muimui tu‘u kiate ia ha fu‘u kakai lahi, koe‘uhi ko ‘enau mamata ki he ngaahi mana na‘a ne fai kiate kinautolu na‘e mahaki.
43006003	Pea ‘alu hake ‘a Sīsū ki he mo‘unga, ‘o ne nofo hifo ai mo ‘ene kau ako.
43006004	Pea na‘e panaki ‘a e Pāsova, ko e kātoanga ‘a ha‘a Siu.
43006005	Pea hanga hake ai ‘a Sīsū ‘o ne vakai, tā ko e fu‘u kakai ‘ena ‘oku ha‘u kiate ia; pea ne pehē kia Filipe, Te tau fakatau mei fē ha mā mo kai ‘a e kakai na?
43006006	Ka ko ‘ene lea pehē ko ‘ene ‘ahi‘ahi‘i ia: he na‘e mea‘i ‘e he ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘a e me‘a ‘oku ne ‘amanaki fai.
43006007	Pea tali ‘e Filipe ki ai, Neongo ‘e onongeau‘i tēnali ha mā, ka ‘e ‘ikai fe‘unga ke nau taki taha to‘o ha me‘a si‘i.
43006008	Pea lea kiate ia ha toko taha ‘o ‘ene kau ako, ko ‘Anitelū ko e tokoua ‘o Saimone Pita, ‘o pehē,
43006009	‘Oku ‘i ai ha tamasi‘i ‘i heni, ‘oku ne ma‘u ha fo‘i mā pa‘ale ‘e nima, mo ha mata‘i ika ‘e ua: ka ko e hā ‘a e me‘a ko ia ki ha tokolahi pehē?
43006010	Pea me‘a mai ‘a Sīsū, Fekau ke tākoto ‘a e kakai. Pea na‘e musie‘ia ‘a e potu ko ia. Ko ia na‘e tākoto ai ‘a e kau tangata: na‘e fe‘unga nai hono lau mo e toko nima afe.
43006011	Pea to‘o ai ‘e Sīsū ‘a e ngaahi fo‘i mā; pea ne fai ha fakafeta‘i, ‘o ne toki tufa kiate kinautolu ‘oku tākoto; pea pehē foki mo ‘ene ‘atu mei he ongo ika, ‘o fai pē ki he‘enau tangi.
43006012	Pea kuo nau fu‘u mākona, pea ne pehē ki he‘ene kau ako, Mou tānaki ‘a e ngaahi mapakipaki‘i mā ‘oku toe, ke ‘oua na‘a maumau ha me‘a.
43006013	Ko ia na‘a nau tātānaki, pea nau fakapito ha kato fakahunga ‘e hongofulu mā ua ‘i he ngaahi konga mei he fo‘i mā pa‘ale ‘e nima, ‘a ia na‘e toe ‘iate kinautolu na‘e kai.
43006014	Ko ia ‘i he vakai ‘a e kakai ki he mana kuo ne fai, na‘a nau pehē, Ko eni mo‘oni ia ‘a e palōfita ka ha‘u ki māmani.
43006015	Ko ia ‘i he mea‘i ‘e Sīsū, ‘oku nau teu ke ha‘u ‘o ‘ave fakamālohi ia, ‘o fakanofo ke tu‘i, pea ne toe ‘alu hake ki he mo‘unga ‘e ia toko taha.
43006016	Pea kuo efiafi, na‘e ‘alu hifo ‘ene kau ako ki tahi,
43006017	pea nau heka ki ha vaka, ‘o nau kamata ‘alu ki he kauvai ki Kāpaneume. Pea ko eni kuo po‘uli, pea kuo te‘eki a‘u mai kiate kinautolu ‘a Sīsū.
43006018	Na‘e hou foki ‘a e tahi, ko e me‘a ‘i he fu‘u matangi kuo tō.
43006019	Pea kuo nau ‘a‘alo ‘i he maile ‘e tolu pē fā, pea nau vakai ‘a Sīsū ‘oku ne hā‘ele ‘i he fukahi tahi, pea ‘oku ne fakaofiofi mai ki he vaka: pea nau manavahē.
43006020	Ka ka lea ia kiate kinautolu, ‘o ne pehē, Ko au pē: ‘oua ‘e manavahē.
43006021	Pea nau loto leva ke ma‘u ia ki he vaka: pea ‘iloange ne tau leva ‘a e vaka ki he fonua ‘oku nau ‘alu ki ai.
43006022	Pongipongi hake, ko e kakai na‘e tutu‘u ‘i he kauvai na‘a nau vakai ‘oku taha tofu pē ‘a e ki‘i vaka ‘i he potu ko ia, pea na‘e ‘ikai heka vaka ‘a Sīsū mo ‘ene kau ako, ka na‘e ‘alu ‘a e kau ako pē:
43006023	(Ka na‘e ‘i ai ha fanga ki‘i vaka na‘e omi mei Taipiliō, ‘o nau tau ofi ki he potu na‘a nau kai ai ‘a e mā hili hono fakafeta‘ia ‘e he ‘Eiki)
43006024	Ko ia ‘i he ‘ilo ‘e he kakai, tā ‘oku ‘ikai ‘i he feitu‘u ko ia ‘a Sīsū, pe ko ‘ene kau ako, na‘a nau heka foki kinautolu ki he ngaahi ki‘i vaka, ‘o nau ‘alu ki Kāpaneume, ko e kumi ‘o Sīsū.
43006025	Pea ‘i he‘enau ‘ilo ia ‘i he kauvai, na‘a nau pehē ki ai, Lāpai, na‘a ke ha‘u fakakū ki heni?
43006026	Pea tali ‘a Sīsū, ‘o ne folofola kiate kinautolu, Ko au ē, ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Ko ho‘omou kumi kiate au, ‘oku ‘ikai koe‘uhi ne mou sio faka‘ilonga, ka koe‘uhi na‘a mou kai ‘i he ngaahi fo‘i mā, ‘o mou mākona ai.
43006027	Mou ngāue, kae ‘ikai ki he kai ‘oku mole, ka ki he kai ‘oku tolonga, ‘o iku ki he mo‘ui ta‘engata, ‘a ia ‘e ‘atu kiate kimoutolu ‘e he Fanautama ‘a Tangata: he ko e toko taha ko ia kuo sila‘i ‘e he Tamai, ‘e he ‘Otua.
43006028	Pea nau pehē ai kiate ia, Ko e hā tū te mau fai, ka mau feia ‘a e ngaahi ngāue mei he ‘Otua?
43006029	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Ko eni ia ‘a e ngāue mei he ‘Otua, ke mou tui pīkitai kiate ia ne fekau mai ‘e he ‘Ene ‘Afio.
43006030	Pea nau pehē ai kiate ia, Pea ko e hā ia ha me‘a ‘oku ke fai mo‘o faka‘ilonga, ke mau mamata ki ai ‘o tui kiate koe? ko e hā ho‘o ngāue ‘oku fai?
43006031	Ko ‘etau ngaahi kui na‘a nau kai ‘a e mana ‘i he Toafa: ‘o hangē ko ia kuo tohi, Na‘a ne foaki kiate kinautolu ke kai, ha mā mei he langi.
43006032	Pea folofola ai ‘a Sīsū kiate kinautolu, Ko au ē, ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Na‘e ‘ikai ko Mōsese na‘a ne foaki kiate kimoutolu ‘a e mā mei he langi; ka ko ‘eku Tamai ‘oku ne foaki kiate kimoutolu ‘a e mā mei he langi, ‘a e mā mo‘onia.
43006033	He ko e mā ‘a e ‘Otua, ko ia ia ‘oku ‘alu hifo mei he langi, ‘o ne foaki mo‘ui ki māmani.
43006034	Ko ia na‘a nau pehē ai kiate ia, ‘Eiki, foaki mai kiate kimautolu ‘a e mā ko ia ma‘u ai pē.
43006035	Pea folofola ‘a Sīsū kiate kinautolu, Ko au pē ko e Mā ‘o e Mo‘ui: ko ia ‘oku ha‘u kiate au ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito te ne fiekaia; pea ko ia ‘oku tui pīkitai kiate au, ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito te ne fie inua ha taimi.
43006036	Ka na‘a ku tala kiate kimoutolu, Kuo mou mamata foki kiate au, kae ‘ikai tui.
43006037	Ko e koto me‘a kātoa ‘oku foaki ‘e he Tamai kiate au ‘e ha‘u kiate au; pea ko ia ‘oku fotu mai kiate au, ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito te u kapusi.
43006038	Koe‘uhi kuo u ‘alu hifo mei he langi, ‘o ‘ikai ke u fai ‘a e loto ‘o‘oku, ka ko e finangalo ‘o ia na‘a ne fekau mai au.
43006039	Pea ko eni ia ‘a e finangalo ‘o ia na‘a ne fekau mai au, koe‘uhi ko e me‘a kātoa kuo ne foaki mai, ke ‘oua na‘a ku tuku ke mole hano me‘a ‘e taha, kaekehe ke u fokotu‘u ia ‘i he ‘aho fakamui.
43006040	He ko eni ia ‘a e finangalo ‘a ‘eku Tamai, ke ‘ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku ne siofia ‘a e ‘Alo, mo tui pīkitai kiate ia, ke ne ma‘u ‘a e mo‘ui ta‘engata; ka u fokotu‘u ia ‘e au ‘i he ‘aho fakamui.
43006041	Ko ia na‘e lāutu‘u ai ‘a ha‘a Siu kiate ia, koe‘uhi ko ‘ene pehē, Ko au pē ko e mā na‘e ‘alu hifo mei he langi.
43006042	Pea nau pehē, ‘Ikai ko Sīsū ‘eni, ko e foha ‘o Siosifa, ‘a ia ‘oku tau lāu‘ilo ‘ene tamai mo ‘ene fa‘ē? pea fēfē ai ‘ene lea ni, ‘o pehē, Kuo u ‘alu hifo mei he langi?
43006043	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu, ‘Oua te mou felāutu‘u‘aki.
43006044	‘Oku ‘ikai lava ‘e ha taha ke ha‘u kiate au, ka ‘i he tohoaki ia ‘e he Tamai na‘a ne fekau mai au: pea ko au te u fokotu‘u ‘a e toko taha ko ia ‘i he ‘aho fakamui.
43006045	Kuo tohi ‘i he Tohi palōfita, Pea te nau hoko kotoa pē ko e kau akonekina ‘e he ‘Otua. ‘Ilonga ‘a ia kuo fanongo mei he Tamai, pea kuo akonekina, ‘oku ne ha‘u kiate au.
43006046	‘Oku ‘ikai ko e pehē kuo mātā ‘a e Tamai ‘e ha taha, ngata pē ‘i he toko taha ko ia ‘oku mei he ‘Otua: kuo mātā ‘a e Tamai ‘e he toko taha ko ia.
43006047	Ko au ē, ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Ko ia ‘oku tui ‘oku ne ma‘u ‘a e mo‘ui ta‘engata.
43006048	Ko au pē ko e mā ‘o e mo‘ui.
43006049	Ko ‘amou ngaahi kui na‘a nau kai ‘i he Toafa ‘a e mana, pea nau mate pē.
43006050	Ko eni ia ‘a e mā ‘oku ‘alu hifo mei he langi, ‘a ia ‘oku ha‘u ke kai ai ha taha ‘o ‘oua ‘e mate.
43006051	Ko au pē ko e Mā ‘oku Mo‘ui, ‘a ia ne ‘alu hifo mei he langi: kapau ‘e kai ‘e ha taha mei he mā ko eni te ne mo‘ui pē ‘o ta‘engata: pea ko e mā foki te u ‘atu ko hoku kakano ia, koe‘uhiā ko e mo‘ui ‘a māmani.
43006052	Ko ia na‘e fekīhiaki ai ‘a ha‘a Siu, ‘o pehē, ‘O lava fēfē ‘a e siana ni ke tuku mai hono kakano ke kai?
43006053	Ko ia na‘e me‘a ai ‘a Sīsū kiate kinautolu, Ko au ē, ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Kapau kuo ‘ikai te mou kai ‘a e kakano ‘o e Fanautama ‘a Tangata, mo inu hono ta‘ata‘a, ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ma‘u mo‘ui ‘iate kimoutolu.
43006054	Ko ia ‘oku ne keina hoku kakano, mo inu hoku toto, ‘oku ne ma‘u ‘a e mo‘ui ta‘engata; pea te u fokotu‘u ia ‘i he ‘aho fakamui.
43006055	He ko hoku kakano ko ha kai mo‘oni ia, pea ko hoku toto ko ha inu mo‘oni.
43006056	Ko ia ‘oku ne keina hoku kakano, mo inu hoku toto, ‘oku ne nofo ma‘u ‘iate au, mo au ‘iate ia.
43006057	Hangē ā ne fekau au ‘e he Tamai ‘oku mo‘ui, mo ‘eku mo‘ui ‘a‘aku koe‘uhi ko e Tamai: pehē, ko ia ‘oku ne keina au, ‘e mo‘ui foki ‘a e toko taha ko ia koe‘uhi ko au.
43006058	Ko eni ia ‘a e mā ne ‘alu hifo mei langi: tala‘ehai ‘oku hangē ko e kai ‘amou ngaahi kui, pea nau mate pē. ko ia ‘oku ne keina ‘a e mā ko eni te ne mo‘ui ‘o ta‘engata.
43006059	Ko e ngaahi lea ko ia na‘a ne fai ‘i ha‘ane faiako ‘i ha falelotu ‘i Kāpaneume.
43006060	Pea ‘i he fanongo ki ai ha tokolahi ‘o ‘ene kau ako, na‘a nau pehē, Ko e lea fefeka ‘eni; ko hai ‘e kātaki ke fanongo kiate ia?
43006061	Pea ‘i he mea‘i ‘e Sīsū ‘i hono finangalo ‘oku hanu ‘e he‘ene kau ako ‘i he me‘a ko ia, na‘a ne pehē kiate kinautolu, ‘Oku mou tūkia ‘i he me‘a ni koā?
43006062	Huanoa ‘oka mou ka siofia ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata ‘oku ne ‘alu hake ki he potu na‘a ne ‘i ai mu‘a.
43006063	Ko e laumālie pē ‘oku ne ngaohi ke mo‘ui; ko e me‘a ki he kakano ‘oku ‘ikai momo‘i ‘aonga ia: ko e ngaahi lea kuo u fai ‘e au kiate kimoutolu, ko e koto laumālie ia, pea ko e koto mo‘ui.
43006064	Ka ‘oku ‘i ai homou ni‘ihi ‘oku ‘ikai ke tui. He na‘e toka mea‘i ‘e Sīsū mei he kamata‘anga ‘a kinautolu ‘oku ‘ikai tui, pea mo ia te ne lavaki‘i ia.
43006065	Pea ne pehē, Ko hono ‘uhinga ia na‘a ku lea ai kiate kimoutolu, ‘o pehē, ‘Oku ‘ikai lava ‘e ha taha ke ha‘u kiate au, ka ‘i hono foaki kiate ia ‘e he Tamai.
43006066	Pea ‘i he me‘a ko ia na‘e foki ha tokolahi ‘o ‘ene kau ako, ‘o ‘ikai te nau kei ō fano mo ia.
43006067	Ko ia na‘e pehē ai ‘a Sīsū ki he kau Hongofulu-mā-ua, Ka ‘e ‘ikai te mou fie ō mo kimoutolu, ‘o?
43006068	Pea tali ki ai ‘e Saimone Pita, ‘Eiki, te mau ‘alu kia hai? ‘oku ‘iate koe ‘a e ngaahi lea ‘o e mo‘ui ta‘engata.
43006069	Pea kuo loa ‘emau tui, ‘o mau ‘ilo, ko koe ia ‘a e Toko Taha Tapu ‘o e ‘Otua.
43006070	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū kiate kinautolu, ‘Ikai kuo u fili ‘e au ‘a kimoutolu, ‘a e kau Hongofulu-mā-ua? Pea na‘a mo kimoutolu ko homou toko taha ko e tēvolo?
43006071	Ko ‘ene lea pē kia Siutasi, ko e foha ‘o Saimone ‘Isikāliote: he ko ia te ne lavaki‘i ia–ha toko taha ‘o e kau Hongofulu-mā-ua.
43007001	PEA hili ia, na‘e fononga fano ‘a Sīsū ‘i Kāleli: he na‘e ‘ikai te ne loto ke ‘alu holo ‘i Siutea, koe‘uhi na‘e feinga ‘a ha‘a Siu ke tāmate‘i ia.
43007002	Pea faifai pea panaki ‘a e kātoanga ‘a ha‘a Siu, ‘a e kātoanga nofo fale lou‘akau.
43007003	Ko ia na‘e lea ai kiate ia ‘e hono ngaahi tokoua, ‘o pehē, Ke ke hiki mei heni, ‘o mole ki Siutea; koe‘uhi ke mamata ho‘o kau ako foki ki ho‘o ngaahi ngāue na ‘oku ke fai.
43007004	He tala‘ehai ‘oku ai ha taha te ne fai fufū ha me‘a; ‘osi, ‘oku ne feinga ke ato, Kapau leva oku ke fai ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia, pe‘i ‘ai ke ke e‘a ki māmani.
43007005	He na‘a mo hono ngaahi tokoua na‘e ‘ikai te nau tui pīkitai kiate ia.
43007006	Pea lea ai ‘a Sīsū kiate kinautolu, Ko hoku taimi kuo te‘eki hokosia: ka ko homou taimi ‘oku hoko ma‘u pē.
43007007	Tala‘ehai ‘e lava ‘e māmani ke fehi‘a kiate kimoutolu: ko au pē ‘oku ne fehi‘a ki ai, koe‘uhi ko au pē ‘oku ou fakahaa‘ia ‘oku kovi ‘ene ngaahi ngāue.
43007008	Mou ‘alu hake kimoutolu ki he kātoanga: ‘e ‘ikai te u ‘alu leva ki he kātoanga ni; koe‘uhi kuo te‘eki kakato hoku taimi.
43007009	Hili ‘ene lea pehē kiate kinautolu, na‘a ne nofo pē ‘i Kāleli.
43007010	Ka ‘oka hili ‘a e ‘alu ‘a hono kāinga ki he kātoanga, pea toki ‘alu hake mo ia foki; kae ‘ikai fakae‘a, kae hangē ha ‘alu fufū.
43007011	Ko ia na‘e kumi kiate ia ‘e ha‘a Siu ‘i he kātoanga, ‘o nau pehē, Kofa‘ā ‘a e siana ko ia?
43007012	Pea na‘e lahi ‘a e lāutu‘u ‘iate ia ‘a e kakai: na‘e pehē ha ni‘ihi, Ko e tangata lelei ia: ka ka pehē ‘e he ni‘ihi, ‘Oku ‘ikai; ka ‘oku ne takihee‘i ‘a lāuvale.
43007013	Ka tala‘ehai na‘e ai ha taha ‘e lea mālohi ‘iate ia, ko ‘enau manavahē ki ha‘a Siu.
43007014	Pea kuo ‘osi mai hono vaeua ‘o e kātoanga, pea me‘a hake ‘a Sīsū ki he Temipale, ‘o ne faiako ai.
43007015	Pea ofo ai ‘a ha‘a Siu ‘o nau pehē, ‘Oku ma‘u mei fē ‘e he Siana ni ‘ene poto ‘i he ngaahi tohi, he na‘e ‘ikai te ne ‘i ha ako?
43007016	Pea tali ai ‘e Sīsū kiate kinautolu, ‘o pehē, Ko ‘eku tokāteline ‘oku ‘ikai ‘a‘aku, ka ‘oku ‘a‘ana na‘a ne fekau mai au.
43007017	Kapau ko e loto ‘o ha taha ke fai ‘a e finangalo ‘o ‘ene ‘afio, ‘e faifai pea mahino kiate ia ‘eku tokāteline, pe ko e me‘a mei he ‘Otua ia, pe ko au pē ‘oku ou lea ‘iate au.
43007018	Ko ia ‘oku lea meiate ia pē, ‘oku ne tuli pē ki hono ongoongo ‘o‘ona; ka ko ia ‘oku ne tuli ki he ongoongo ‘o ia na‘a ne fekau mai ia, ko e toko taha ko ia ‘oku mo‘oni, pea ‘oku ‘ikai ha ta‘etotonu ‘i ai.
43007019	‘Ikai na‘e ‘atu ‘e Mōsese ‘a e Lao kiate kimoutolu, ka tala‘ehai ‘oku tauhi ‘a e Lao ‘e hamou toko taha? Ko e hā ē, ho‘omou tuli ke tāmate‘i au?
43007020	Pea tali ‘a e kakai, ‘Oku ‘iate koe ha tēvolo: ko hai ‘oku tuli ke tāmate‘i koe?
43007021	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū, ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Ko e fo‘i ngāue e ne u fai, pea mou ofo ai kotoa pē.
43007022	Ko hono ‘uhinga ia na‘e tuku ‘e Mōsese kiate kimoutolu ‘a e kamu; (ka tala‘ehai ko e me‘a ‘a Mōsese ia, ka ko e me‘a mei he‘enau ngaahi kui) pea neongo ko e Sāpate, ka ‘oku mou kamu pē ha tangata.
43007023	Pea kapau ā ‘oku fai ‘a e kamu ki ha tangata ‘i he ‘aho Sāpate, koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a maumau ‘a e Lao ‘a Mōsese; pea ‘oku mou ‘ita koā kiate au, koe‘uhi ko ‘eku ngaohi ha tangata ke mo‘ui haohaoa ‘i he ‘aho Sāpate?
43007024	‘Oua na‘a mou fakaanga ‘o fai ki he me‘a ‘oku ha kitu‘a; ka mou fakaanga ke totonu.
43007025	Ko ia na‘e lea ha ni‘ihi mei he kakai ‘o Selusalema, ‘Ikai ko eni ia ‘oku nau tuli ke tāmate‘i?
43007026	Pea vakai, ‘oku ne lea mālohi, pea ‘oku ‘ikai te nau momo‘i fai ha lau ki ai. Kuo ha mo‘oni koā ki he hou‘eiki ko e Mīsaia ‘eni, ‘o?
43007027	Ka ko e me‘a ki he siana ni, ‘oku tau lāu‘ilo ‘a e potu ‘oku ne ha‘u mei ai: ka ‘oka hoko mai ‘a e Mīsaia, tala‘ehai ‘e ‘ilo ‘e ha taha, pe ‘oku ne mei fē.
43007028	Ko ia na‘e kalanga ‘a Sīsū ‘i hē, Temipale ‘i he‘ene fai ako, ‘o ne pehē, ‘Oku mo‘oni ‘oku mou ‘ilo au, pea ‘oku mou ‘ilo ‘a e potu ‘oku ou ha‘u mei ai: pea tala‘ehai kuo u ha‘u ‘iate au pē, ka ‘oku ‘i ai ha toko taha, ko e mo‘oni, na‘a ne fekau mai au, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo‘i ‘e kimoutolu.
43007029	‘Oku ou ‘ilo ia ‘e au: he ‘oku ou meiate ia, pea ko ia ia na‘a ne fekau mai au.
43007030	Ko ia na‘a nau feinga ke puke ia: ka na‘e ‘ikai ala mālohi kiate ia ‘e ha taha, koe‘uhi kuo te‘eki hokosia hono taimi.
43007031	Pea na‘e tui pīkitai kiate ia ha tokolahi ‘o lāuvale, ‘o nau pehē, Neongo ‘e ha‘u ‘a e Mīsaia, ‘e lahi koā ‘ene mana te ne fai ‘i he fai ‘a e tangata ni?
43007032	Pea fanongo ‘a e kau Fālesi ki he mumuhu pehē ‘a e kakai kiate ia; pea fekau ‘e he hou‘eiki taula‘eiki mo e kau Fālesi ha kau ‘ōfisa ke puke ia.
43007033	Ko ia na‘e folofola ai ‘a Sīsū, ‘o pehē, ‘Oku toe si‘i pē ‘eku ‘iate kimoutolu, pea u ‘alu kiate ia na‘a ne fekau mai au.
43007034	Te mou kumi au, ka ‘e ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo au: pea ko e potu ‘oku ou ‘i ai ‘e ‘ikai te mou fa‘a a‘u ki ai.
43007035	Ko ia na‘e fealēlea‘aki ai ‘a ha‘a Siu, Ko e teu ‘alu ki fē ‘a e siana ni, ‘a ia ‘e ‘ikai te mau ‘ilo ai ia? he ‘oku ne teu ‘alu koā ki he koto movete na ko e kau Kalisi, ke ako ‘a e kau Kalisi?
43007036	Ko e hā ‘ene lea ko eni ‘oku ne pehē, Te mou kumi au, ka ‘e ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo au; pea ko e potu ‘oku ou ‘i ai, ‘e ‘ikai te mou fa‘a a‘u ki ai?
43007037	Pea ko eni, ‘i he ‘aho faka‘osi ‘o e kātoanga, hono ‘aho lahi, na‘e hanga ‘a Sīsū ‘o tu‘u, ‘o ne kalanga ‘o pehē, Ka ai ha taha ‘oku fie inua, ke ne ha‘u kiate au ‘o inu.
43007038	‘Ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku tui pīkitai kiate au, pea hangē ko e lau ‘a e Tohitapu, ‘e tafe atu mei hono manava ha ngaahi vaitafe ‘o e vai mo‘ui.
43007039	(Ka na‘e kau ‘ene lea ko ia ki he Laumālie, ‘a ia ka ma‘u ‘e kinautolu na‘e tui pīkitai kiate ia: he kuo te‘eki ai ‘a e Laumālie, koe‘uhi kuo te‘eki fakalāngilangi‘i ‘a Sīsū.)
43007040	Pea ko e ni‘ihi ‘o lāuvale, ‘i he‘enau fanongo ki he ngaahi lea ko ia, na‘a nau pehē, Tā ko e mo‘oni, ko eni ia ‘a e Palōfita.
43007041	Pea pehē ‘e he ni‘ihi, Ko eni ia ‘a e Mīsaia. Ka ka pehē ‘e ha ni‘ihi, He ‘oku ha‘u koā ‘a e Mīsaia mei Kāleli, ‘o?
43007042	‘Ikai ‘oku lau ‘e he Tohitapu, ‘e tupu ‘a e Mīsaia mei he hako ‘o Tēvita, pea te ne ha‘u mei Pētelihema, ko e vilisi na‘e ‘i ai ‘a Tēvita?
43007043	Ko ia na‘e hoko ha mavahevahe ‘i he kakai koe‘uhi ko ia.
43007044	Pea na‘e loto honau ni‘ihi ke puke ia; ka tala‘ehai na‘e ‘i ai hanau taha ‘e ala fakamālohi ki ai.
43007045	Pea omi ai ‘a e kau ‘ōfisa ki he hou‘eiki taula‘eiki mo e Fālesi; pea me‘a kiate kinautolu ‘a e hou‘eiki ko ia, Ko e hā kuo ‘ikai ai te mou taki mai ia?
43007046	Pea tali ‘a e kau ‘ōfisa, ‘Ā, Te‘eki ha tangata ‘e lea hangē ko ia.
43007047	Pea tali ‘a e kau Fālesi ki ai, Kuo taki hē mo kimoutolu foki, ‘o?
43007048	Hono ai ha taha ‘i he hou‘eiki kuo tui kiate ia, pe ha taha ‘o e kau Fālesi?
43007049	Ka ko lāuvale na ta‘e‘ilo ki he Lao, ko e koto mala‘ia kinautolu.
43007050	Pea pehē ‘a Nikotimasi kiate kinautolu, (‘a ia na‘e ha‘u kiate ia ‘i mu‘a, ko e toko taha foki ia ‘iate kinautolu),
43007051	He ko e anga ‘o ‘etau lao ke fakamaau ha tangata, ‘i he te‘eki ke fanongo ki ha‘ane fakamatala, pe mahino ‘a e me‘a kuo ne fai?
43007052	Pea nau tali ‘o pehē ki ai, He ko e Kāleli foki mo koe? Hākule mu‘a ‘o ‘ilo, ‘oku ‘ikai ha palōfita ‘e tupu mei Kāleli.
43007053	Pea nau ‘alu takitaha ki hono ‘api.
43008001	KA ka ‘alu ‘a Sīsū ki he mo‘unga ko ‘Ōlive.
43008002	Pea ne toe uhu ki he Temipale, pea tātānaki mai kiate ia ‘a e kakai kotoa; pea ne nofo hifo ‘o ako kinautolu.
43008003	Pea taki mai ‘e he kau sikalaipe mo e kau Fālesi ha fefine, na‘e mo‘ua ‘ene angahala: pea nau fokotu‘u ia ‘i he ha‘oha‘onga.
43008004	Pea toki lea kiate ia ‘e he kau taula‘eiki, ko ‘enau tauhele ia, hei‘ilo te nau ma‘u ai ha me‘a mōno talatalaaki‘i, ‘o nau pehē, Tangata‘eiki, ko e fefine ni na‘e mātu‘aki puke he‘ene tono tangata.
43008005	Pea ko Mōsese na‘a ne tu‘utu‘uni ‘i he Lao, ke tolomaka‘i ‘a e fa‘ahinga pehē: ka ko e hā ho‘o lau ‘A‘au ki ai?
43008006	Ka ka punou hifo ‘a Sīsū, ‘o ne kamata tohi ‘i he kelekele ‘aki hono tuhu.
43008007	Ka ‘i he‘enau nafui ‘enau fehu‘i, na‘a ne mālanga hake, ‘o ne folofola kiate kinautolu, Ko ia ‘iate kimoutolu ‘oku ‘ata‘atā mei he angahala, ke ‘a‘ana ‘a e fuofua tolo ki he fefine.
43008008	Pea ne toe punou, ‘o tohi ‘i he kelekele ‘aki hono tuhu.
43008009	Ka ka hūhū taha ki tu‘a ‘a ha‘a Siu, ‘o fua fai mei he mātu‘a, kae ‘oua ke nau ‘osi ki tu‘a: pea na‘e toe ‘a Sīsū toko taha, pea mo e fefine na‘e kei tu‘u ‘i he ha‘oha‘onga.
43008010	Pea malanga hake ‘a Sīsū, ‘o ne pehē ki he fefine, Kofa‘ā kinautolu? Kuo ‘ikai ha taha te ne fakamāu‘i koe?
43008011	Pea pehē ange ‘e he fefine, ‘Eiki, ‘oku ‘ikai. Pea me‘a ‘e ia, Pea ‘e ‘ikai te u fakamāu‘i koe ‘e au: ‘alu ā; hili ‘eni ‘oua te ke toe fai angahala.
43008012	Pea toe folofola ‘a Sīsū kiate kinautolu, ‘o pehē, Ko au pē ko e Maama ‘o Māmani: ko ia ‘oku ne muimui kiate au, ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito te ne fononga ‘i he po‘uli, ka te ne ma‘u ‘a e maama ‘o e mo‘ui.
43008013	Ko ia na‘e lea ai ‘a e kau Fālesi kiate ia, ‘Oku ke fakamo‘oni koe ‘e koe; ta ko ho‘o fakamo‘oni ‘oku ‘ikai mo‘oni.
43008014	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū ‘o me‘a kiate kinautolu, Neongo ‘oku ou fakamo‘oni au ‘e au, ka ‘oku mo‘oni pē ‘eku fakamo‘oni: koe‘uhi ‘oku ou ‘ilo ‘a e potu na‘a ku ha‘u mei ai, mo e potu ‘oku ou ‘alu ki ai; ka ko kimoutolu, ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo pē ‘oku ou ha‘u mei fē, pe ‘alu ki fē.
43008015	‘Oku mou fakaanga fakakakano pē ‘e kimoutolu; ka ko au ‘oku ‘ikai te u anga‘i ha taha.
43008016	Pea neongo foki ‘oku ou fakaanga, ka ‘oku totonu ‘eku fakaanga: koe‘uhi ‘oku ‘ikai te u toko taha, ka ‘oku ma toko ua mo e Tamai na‘a ne fekau mai au.
43008017	Pea kuo tohi foki ‘i ho‘omou lao, kapau ko e fakamo‘oni ‘a ha ongo tangata, pea tā ‘oku mo‘oni.
43008018	Ko au pē ha taha ‘oku fakamo‘oni kiate au, pea ‘oku fakamo‘oni kiate au ‘e he Tamai na‘a ne fekau mai au.
43008019	Ko ia na‘a nau pehē kiate ia, Kofa‘ā ia ho‘o tamai na? Pea tali ‘e Sīsū, ‘Oku ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo au, pea ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo ‘eku Tamai: ka ne mou ‘ilo au, pehē ne mou ‘ilo mo ‘eku Tamai foki.
43008020	Ko e ngaahi lea ko ia na‘a ne fai ‘i he potu ‘o e seifi, ‘i he‘ene faiako ‘i he Temipale: pea na‘e ‘ikai puke ia ‘e ha taha; koe‘uhi kuo te‘eki hokosia hono taimi.
43008021	Pea na‘a ne toe me‘a kiate kinautolu, ‘Oku ou ‘alu au, pea te mou kumi au, pea te mou mate ‘i ho‘omou angahala: ko e potu ‘oku ou ‘alu ki ai, ‘e ‘ikai te mou lava ke a‘u ki ai ‘e kimoutolu.
43008022	Ko ia na‘e lea ai ‘a ha‘a Siu He te ne tāmate‘i ‘e ia ia, ‘a ia, ‘oku ne pehē ai, Ko e potu ‘oku ou ‘alu ki ai, ‘e ‘ikai te mou lava ke a‘u ki ai ‘e kimoutolu?
43008023	Pea ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Ko kimoutolu ‘oku mou mei lalo: ko au ‘oku ou mei ‘olunga: ko kimoutolu ‘oku mou ‘o e maama ko eni: ‘oku ‘ikai te u ‘o e maama ko eni au.
43008024	Ko ia na‘a ku pehē ai kiate kimoutolu, Te mou mate ‘i ho‘omou ngaahi angahala: he kapau ‘e ‘ikai te mou tui ko au ia, te mou mate ‘i ho‘omou ngaahi angahala.
43008025	Ko ia na‘a nau pehē ai kiate ia, Ko hai tū koe? Pea folofola ‘a Sīsū kiate kinautolu, ‘Ā, ko e hā ‘oku ou momo‘i talanoa ai mo kimoutolu?
43008026	‘Oku lahi pē ‘eku me‘a ke lea ki ai, mo ‘eku fakaanga ke fai ‘iate kimoutolu–ka neongo ia, ka ‘oku mo‘oni ‘a ia ne fekau mai au; pea ko e ngaahi me‘a kuo u fanongo meiate ia, ‘oku ou tala ia ki māmani.
43008027	Na‘e ‘ikai mahino kiate kinautolu, ko ‘ene lea kiate kinautolu ‘i he Tamai.
43008028	Ko ia na‘e folofola ai ‘a Sīsū, ‘Oka mou ka hiki ki ‘olunga ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata, ‘e toki mahino kiate kimoutolu, ko au ia, mo e ‘ikai te u momo‘i fai ha me‘a ‘iate au; kae hangē tofu pē hoku ako ‘e he Tamai, ‘oku pehē ‘eku tala ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko eni.
43008029	Pea ko ia na‘a ne fekau mai au ‘oku ne ‘iate au: na‘e ‘ikai te ne tuku au ke tuēnoa; koe‘uhi ‘oku ou fai ma‘u ai pē ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ne hōhō‘ia ai.
43008030	‘I he‘ene lea pehē, na‘e ai ha tokolahi na‘e tui pīkitai kiate ia.
43008031	Pea lea ai ‘a Sīsū kiate kinautolu ‘o ha‘a Siu kuo tui kiate ia, Kapau te mou nofo ma‘u ‘i he‘eku akonaki, ko ‘eku kau ako mo‘oni kimoutolu;
43008032	pea ‘e faifai pea mahino kiate kimoutolu ‘a e mo‘oni, pea ‘e fakatau‘atāina ‘a kimoutolu ‘e he mo‘oni.
43008033	Pea nau tali ai kiate ia, Ko e hako ‘o ‘Epalahame kimautolu, pea kuo te‘eki ke mau pōpula ki ha taha ‘i ha taimi: pea fēfē ai ho‘o lau na, ‘o pehē, ‘e faifai pea mou tau‘atāina?
43008034	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū kiate kinautolu, Ko au ē, ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘Ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku fai angahala, ko e pōpula ia ‘a angahala.
43008035	Pea ko e pōpula ‘oku ‘ikai te ne nofo ‘i he fale ‘o ta‘engata: ko e ‘Alo pē ‘oku nofo ‘o ta‘engata.
43008036	Ko ia kapau ‘e fakatau‘atāina kimoutolu ‘e he ‘Alo, te mou toki tau‘atāina mo‘oni.
43008037	‘Oku ou ‘ilo pē ko e hako ‘o ‘Epalahame kimoutolu; ka neongo ia, ka ‘oku mou feinga ke tāmate‘i au, koe‘uhi ‘oku ‘ikai ke lalaka atu ‘a ‘eku akonaki ‘i homou loto.
43008038	Ko au ‘oku ou tala atu ‘a e ngaahi me‘a kuo u mamata ki ai ‘i he‘eku ‘i he Tamai: ko ia foki mou fai ‘e kimoutolu ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ne mou fanongo mei he Tamai.
43008039	Pea nau tali ‘o pehē ki ai, Ko ‘emau tamai ko ‘Epalahame ia. Pea lea ‘a Sīsū kiate kinautolu, Kapau ko e fānau ‘a ‘Epalahame kimoutolu, pe‘i mou fai ‘a e ngaahi ngāue ‘a ‘Epalahame.
43008040	Ka vakai, ‘oku mou feinga ke tāmate‘i au, ‘a au ko e tangata kuo u tala kiate kimoutolu ‘a e mo‘oni, ‘a ia na‘a ku fanongo ki ai mei he ‘Otua: tala‘ehai ne fai ‘e ‘Epalahame ha me‘a pehē.
43008041	Ka ko kimoutolu ‘oku mou fai tu‘u ‘a e ngaahi ngāue ‘a ho‘omou Tamai. Pea nau pehē ki ai, Tala‘ehai kuo mau tupu fe‘auaki kimautolu; ‘oku taha pē ‘emau tamai, ko e ‘Otua.
43008042	Pea folofola ‘a Sīsū kiate kinautolu, Ka ne ko ho‘omou tamai ‘a e ‘Otua, pehē te mou ‘ofa kiate au: he ko e ‘Otua na‘a ku ha‘u mei ai, pea ‘oku ou ‘i heni ai; ‘io, ko ‘eku ha‘u foki na‘e ‘ikai ‘iate au, ka na‘e fekau mai au ‘e he ‘Ene ‘Afio.
43008043	Ko e hā ‘oku ‘ikai ai te mou ‘ilo hoku le‘o? koe‘uhiā ‘oku ‘ikai te mou fa‘a tali ‘eku akonaki.
43008044	Ko e tamai kuo mou tupu mei ai ko e Tēvolo, pea ko e ngaahi manako ‘o ho‘omou tamai ‘oku mou loto ke fai, Ko e toko taha ko ia ko e tāmate-tangata mei he kamata‘anga, pea na‘e ‘ikai te ne tu‘unga ki he mo‘oni, koe‘uhiā ‘oku ‘ikai ha mo‘oni ‘iate ia. ‘oka lea loi hamou toko taha, ko ‘ene lea‘aki mei hono fa‘ahinga: he ko e loi ia, pea pehē mo ‘ene tamai.
43008045	Ka koe‘uhi ko ‘eku lea‘aki ‘a e mo‘oni, ko ia ai ‘oku ‘ikai te mou tui kiate au.
43008046	Ko hai ‘iate kimoutolu ‘oku ne mafakamo‘oni ha‘aku momo‘i angahala pea kapau ‘oku ou lea mo‘oni, ko e hā ‘oku ‘ikai ai te mou tui kiate au?
43008047	Ko ia kuo ‘o e ‘Otua, ‘oku ne tali ‘a e ngaahi folofola ‘a e ‘Otua: ko hono ‘uhinga ē ‘oku ‘ikai ai te mou tali, koe‘uhi ‘oku ‘ikai ‘o e ‘Otua ‘a kimoutolu.
43008048	Pea tali ‘e ha‘a Siu, ‘o nau pehē ki ai, Hono ‘ikai mo‘oni ‘a e lea ‘oku mau fai, ‘o pehē, Ko e Samēlia koe, mo e ‘iate koe ha tēvolo?
43008049	Pea tali ‘a Sīsū, Ko au ‘oku ‘ikai te u tēvoloa; kaekehe, ‘oku ou faka‘apa‘apa‘ia ‘eku Tamai, pea ko kimoutolu pē ‘oku mou fakalielia‘i au.
43008050	Ka ko au ‘oku ‘ikai te u feinga‘i ‘a e ongoongo ‘o‘oku: ‘oku ‘i ai ha toko taha ‘oku ne feinga‘i ia, pea ‘oku ne fakamaau ‘a e me‘a.
43008051	Ko au ē, ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Kapau kuo tauhi ‘eku lea ‘e ha taha, ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito te ne mamata ki he mate ‘o ta‘engata.
43008052	Pea lea ai kiate ia ‘a ha‘a Siu, ‘āua; kuo mau ‘ilo ‘eni ‘oku ‘iate koe ha tēvolo. Ko ‘Epalahame na‘a ne pekia, pea mo e kau Palōfita; pea ko eni ‘oku ke pehē ‘e koe, Kapau kuo tauhi ‘eku lea ‘e ha taha, ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito te ne kamata ‘a e mate, ‘o ta‘engata.
43008053	He ‘oku ke lahi koā ‘i he‘etau tamai ko ‘Epalahame? ka kuo pekia ia, pea kuo pekia mo e kau Palōfita: ‘oku ke lau ko hai koe?
43008054	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū, Kapau te u fakahīkihiki‘i au ‘e au, ko e launoa hoku ongoongo; ko ‘eku Tamai ia ‘oku ne fakahīkihiki‘i au, ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘a ia ‘oku mou pehē, ko homou ‘Otua ia:
43008055	ka tala‘ehai kuo mou ‘ilo‘i ia; ka ko au ‘oku ou lāu‘ilo ia; ‘io, kapau te u pehē ‘oku ‘ikai te u ‘ilo ia, tā te u tatau mo kimoutolu, ko e loi: ka ‘oku ou lāu‘ilo pē ‘a ‘Ene ‘afio, pea ‘oku ou tauhi ‘ene folofola.
43008056	Ko ‘Epalahame ko ho‘omou tamai, na‘a ne hākailangitau ‘i he‘ene ‘ilo te ne mamata ki hoku ‘aho: pea na‘a ne mamata ki ai, ‘o ne fiefia.
43008057	Pea lea ‘e ha‘a Siu, ‘Ā, kuo te‘eki ke ke nimangofulu ta‘u, pea kuo ke mamata koā kia ‘Epalahame?
43008058	Pea folofola ‘a Sīsū kiate kinautolu, Ko au ē, ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Te‘eki ke fanau‘i ‘a ‘Epalahame, ‘oku ou ‘i ai pē.
43008059	Pea nau to‘o maka ai ke pe‘ehi kiate ia: ka fufū pē ‘e Sīsū ia, ‘o ne ‘alu atu mei he Temipale.
43009001	Pea ‘i he‘ene ‘alu ange, na‘a ne ‘ilo ha tangata na‘e kui, ‘a ia na‘e fanau‘i ‘oku pehē.
43009002	Pea fehu‘i kiate ia ‘e he‘ene kau ako, ‘o pehē, Lāpai, ko hai ne angahala, ‘a e siana ni, pe ko ‘ene mātu‘a, ‘o tupu ai hono fanau‘i kui?
43009003	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū, Na‘e ‘ikai ko e angahala ‘a e siana ni, pe ko ‘ene mātu‘a: ka koe‘uhi ke fakae‘a ‘iate ia ‘a e ngaahi ngāue ‘a e ‘Otua.
43009004	Kuo pau ke tau fai ‘a e ngāue ‘a‘ana ma‘ane fekau mai au lolotonga ‘oku ‘aho: ‘oku ‘unu mai ‘a e pō, ‘a ia ‘e ‘ikai lava ai ‘e ha taha ke ngāue.
43009005	Ka u ka ‘i māmani, ko e maama au ‘a māmani.
43009006	Pea ‘i he‘ene lea pehē, na‘a ne ‘a‘anu ki he kelekele, ‘o ne ngaohi ‘aki ‘a e fāvai ha me‘i pelepela, mo ne pani ‘aki ‘ene pelepela ‘a e ongo fo‘i mata,
43009007	‘o ne folofola kiate ia, Mole pē ‘o fufulu ‘i he vai ko Sailoame, (‘a ia ko hono hiki, Ko e fekaua). Ko ia na‘a ne ‘alu ‘o fufulu, ‘o ne ha‘u kuo ‘ā.
43009008	Ko ia ko hono ngaahi kaungā ‘api, pea mo e kakai na‘e fa‘a tokanga mu‘a kiate ia, ko e toko taha na‘e mo‘ui kole pē, na‘a nau pehē, ‘Ikai ko e siana ‘eni na‘e nofo hē, ‘o hanganaki kole?
43009009	Na‘e pehē ‘e ha ni‘ihi, Ko eni ia; pea pehē ha ni‘ihi, ‘Oku ‘ikai, ka ‘oku ne hangē pē ko ia: ka ka pehē ‘e ia, Ko au ia.
43009010	Pea nau pehē ange, Na‘e faka‘ā fēfē ho mata?
43009011	Pea tali ‘e ia, Ko e tangata ‘oku ui ko Sīsū, na‘a ne ngaohi ha pelepela, ‘o ne pani ‘aki hoku ongo mata ni, mo ne pehē mai, Mole pē ki Sailoame ‘o fufulu: ko ia na‘a ku ‘alu ‘o fufulu, pea u ‘a hake.
43009012	Pea nau pehē ki ai, Kofa‘ā ‘a e tangata ko ia? Pea ne pehē, ‘Oku ‘ikai te u ‘ilo.
43009013	Pea nau taki ia ki he kau Fālesi, ‘a e tangata na‘e kui mu‘a.
43009014	Pea tā ko e Sāpate ‘a e ‘aho ne ngaohi ai ‘e Sīsū ‘a e pelepela, mo ne faka‘ā hono mata.
43009015	Ko ia na‘e toe fehu‘i kiate ia ‘e he kau Fālesi foki, pe na‘e fēfē ‘ene ‘ā hake. Pea ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Na‘a ne ‘ai ha pelepela ki hoku poko‘i mata ni, pea u fufulu, pea u ‘ā.
43009016	Pea lea ai ha ni‘ihi ‘o e kau Fālesi, ‘o pehē, Tala‘ehai ko ha tangata ia mei he ‘Otua: he ‘oku ‘ikai te ne tauhi ‘a e Sāpate. Ka ka pehē ‘e ha ni‘ihi, ‘O lava fēfē ‘e ha tangata ‘oku angahala ke fai ha ala mana pehē? Pea na‘e hoko ha mavahevahe ‘iate kinautolu.
43009017	Pea nau toe lea ai ki he motu‘a na‘e kui, Ko e hā ha‘o poa ‘a‘au ki he tangata na, he‘ene faka‘ā ho mata? Pea ne pehē, Ko e palōfita ia.
43009018	Ko ia ko ha‘a Siu na‘e ‘ikai te nau tui ne kui ‘a e tangata, pea toe ‘ā, kae‘oua ke nau ui ange ‘a e mātu‘a ‘a e tangata kuo faka‘ā;
43009019	Mo nau ‘eke kiate kinaua, ‘o pehē, Ko eni ho‘omo tama, ‘a e toko taha ‘oku mo pehē na‘e fanau‘i kui? pea ‘oku fakafēfē ai ‘ene ‘ā ni?
43009020	Pea na‘e tali ‘e he‘ene mātu‘a ‘o na pehē, ‘Oku ma ‘ilo ko e siana ni ko homa ‘uhiki, pea na‘e fanau‘i kui:
43009021	ka ‘oku ‘ikai te ma lave‘i pē ko ‘ene ‘ā ni ‘i he hā; pea ‘oku ‘ikai te ma lave‘i ‘e kimaua pē ko hai ne faka‘ā hono mata. Mou ‘eke kiate ia; kuo ne tangata, te ne tali ‘e ia ma‘ana.
