43009022	Na‘e lea pehē ‘ene mātu‘a ko ‘ena manavahē ki ha‘a Siu; he kuo ‘osi tu‘utu‘uni ‘e ha‘a Siu, ka ‘ilonga ha taha te ne fakamo‘oni ko e Mīsaia ‘a Sīsū, ‘e hifo ia mei he falelotu.
43009023	Ko hono ‘uhinga e ‘o e pehē ‘e he‘ene mātu‘a, Kuo tangata ia: mou fai kiate ia ho‘omou ‘eke.
43009024	Ko ia na‘a nau ui ange ‘a e tangata na‘e kui, ko hono tu‘o ua, ‘o nau pehē ki ai, Ke ke ‘a‘apa ki he ‘Otua: ‘oku mau ‘ilo ‘e kimautolu ko e tangata ni ko e angahala.
43009025	Pea tali ai ‘a e siana, Ko e me‘a ki ha‘ane angahala, ‘oku ‘ikai te u ‘ilo ha me‘a ki ai: ko e me‘a pē taha ‘oku ou ‘ilo, ko e kui au ka ‘oku ou ‘ā ni.
43009026	Pea nau pehē ai kiate ia, Ko e hā ‘a e me‘a na‘a ne fai kiate koe? na‘e fēfē ‘ene faka‘ā ho mata na?
43009027	Pea ne tali kiate kinautolu, Kuo ‘osi ‘eku tala kiate kimoutolu, pea na‘e ‘ikai te mou tokanga: ko e hā ‘oku mou toe fie fanongo ai ki ai? na‘a ‘oku mou fie ului ki he‘ene kau ako ‘a kimoutolu foki?
43009028	Pea nau ngaohi ia, ‘o nau pehē, Ko koe pē ko e ako ‘a e siana na; ka ko kimautolu ko e kau ako ‘a Mōsese.
43009029	‘Oku mau ‘ilo kuo folofola ‘e he ‘Otua kia Mōsese: ka ko e siana na, ‘oku ‘ikai te mau ‘ilo pē ‘oku mei fē ia.
43009030	Pea tali ‘a e tangata, ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu, ‘Io, ko ia; tā ko e toki me‘a tofo ‘eni! ‘a e ‘ikai ‘ilo ‘e kimoutolu pē ‘oku mei fē ia; ‘osi, ko eni kuo ne faka‘ā hoku poko‘i mata ni!
43009031	‘Oku tau lāu‘ilo, ko e ‘Otua ‘oku ‘ikai te ne tali ha kakai ‘oku angahala: kae ‘ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku ‘a‘apa ki he ‘Otua, mo fai hono finangalo, ‘oku ne talia ha toko taha pehē.
43009032	Talu mei mu‘a ‘i mu‘a kuo te‘eki ke talanoa‘ia ‘o pehē, kuo faka‘ā ‘e ha taha ‘a e mata ‘o ha toko taha ne fanau‘i kui.
43009033	Ka ne ‘ikai ko e toko taha ia mei he ‘Otua, ne ‘ikai te ne lava ha momo‘i me‘a.
43009034	Pea nau tali kiate ia, Ko e koto tupu angahala koe, pea ko ho‘o hanga e ‘o ako mai kiate kimautolu? Pea nau kapusi ia ki tua‘ā.
43009035	Pea na‘e fanongo ‘e Sīsū kuo nau kapusi ia ki tua‘ā; pea ne kumi ki ai, ‘o ne pehē ange, ‘Oku ke tui ki he Fanautama ‘a Tangata?
43009036	Pea tali ‘e he siana, Pea ko hai ia, ‘Eiki, ka u tui ki ai?
43009037	Pea folofola ‘a Sīsū, ‘ē, kuo ke mamata kiate ia, pea ko ia ia ‘oku talanoa mo koe.
43009038	Pea pehē ‘e ia, ‘Eiki, ‘oku ou tui pē. Pea ne hū kiate ia.
43009039	Pea folofola ‘e Sīsū, Ko ‘eku ha‘u ‘aku ki māmani, pea iku ai ‘a e fakamaau ki ha tu‘utu‘uni, ‘o pehē, Ke ‘ilonga ‘a kinautolu ‘oku ‘ikai ‘ā ke nau ‘ā; pea ‘ilonga ‘a kinautolu ‘oku ‘ā tokua, pea nau hoko ‘o kui.
43009040	Pea fanongo ki he me‘a ko ia ‘e kinautolu ‘o e kau Fālesi na‘e ‘iate ia, pea nau pehē ki ai, Ta ‘apē ‘oku kui mo kimautolu foki, ‘o?
43009041	Pea folofola ‘a Sīsū kiate kinautolu, Ka ne mou kui, pehē ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘amou angahala: ka ko eni ‘oku mou pehē, ‘Oku mau ‘ā; tā ‘oku nofo ma‘u ho‘omou angahala.
43010001	Ko au ē, ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai hū ‘i he matapā ki he loto‘ā sipi, ka ‘oku ne kaka ‘i ha potu kehe, ko e toko taha ko ia ko e kaiha‘a mo fakamālohi,
43010002	ka ko ia ‘oku hū ‘i he matapā ko ha tauhi ia ‘o e fanga sipi.
43010003	‘Oku to‘o ‘e he le‘o matapā ki ha toko taha pehē; pea ‘oku tokanga ‘e he fanga sipi ki hono le‘o; pea ‘oku ne ui ‘ene fanga sipi ‘a‘ana ‘i honau hingoa takitaha, ‘o ne taki kinautolu ki tua‘ā,
43010004	pea ka ‘osi ‘ene tuku kitua‘ā ‘ene me‘a ‘a‘ana kotoa pē, ‘oku ne ‘alu mu‘omu‘a ia ‘iate kinautolu, pea ‘oku muimui ‘a e fanga sipi kiate ia, koe‘uhi ‘oku nau ‘ilo hono le‘o.
43010005	Ka ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito te nau muimui ki ha kehe, ka te nau hola meiate ia; koe‘uhi ‘oku ‘ikai te nau ‘ilo ‘a e le‘o ‘o e kehe.
43010006	Ko e fakatātā ko eni na‘e fai ‘e Sīsū kiate kinautolu: ka na‘e ‘ikai ‘ilo ‘e he fa‘ahinga ko ia pē ko e hā ‘ene lea ‘oku fai mai.
43010007	Ko ia na‘e toe folofola ‘a Sīsū, Ko au ē, ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Ko au ko e matapā ‘o e fanga sipi.
43010008	Ko kinautolu kotoa pē na‘e ha‘u mu‘omu‘a ‘iate au, ko e kau kaiha‘a kinautolu mo fakamālohi: ka na‘e ‘ikai tokanga kiate kinautolu ‘e he fanga sipi.
43010009	Ko au pē ko e matapā: ka kuo hū ha taha ‘iate au ‘e fakamo‘ui ia, pea te ne hū atu, pea te ne hū mai, ‘o ma‘u me‘akai.
43010010	Tala‘ehai ‘oku ha‘u ‘a e kaiha‘a ki ha me‘a, ka ke kaiha‘a pē, mo tāmate‘i, mo maumau: ko au kuo u ha‘u koe‘uhi ke nau ma‘u mo‘ui, pea ke nau ma‘u ‘o lahi ‘aupito.
43010011	Ko au ko e Tauhi Lelei, Ko e anga ‘o e tauhi lelei ke ‘atu ‘ene mo‘ui koe‘uhi ko e fanga sipi.
43010012	Ka ko ia ‘oku ngāue totongi pē, pea ‘oku ‘ikai ko ha tauhi sipi, ko e toko taha ‘oku ‘ikai ‘a‘ana totonu ‘a e fanga sipi, ka sio ia ko e ulofi ‘ena ‘oku ha‘u, pea ne li‘aki ‘a e fanga sipi, ‘o ne hola: pea ‘oku pō kinautolu ‘e he ulofi, ‘o fakamovetevete:
43010013	koe‘uhiā ko e toko taha ia ‘oku ngāue ki he totongi, pea ‘oku ‘ikai mamafa kiate ia ‘a e fanga sipi.
43010014	Ko au ko e Tauhi Lelei: pea ‘oku te ‘ilo ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘a‘ata, pea ‘oku ‘ilo kita ‘e he ngaahi me‘a ‘a‘ata,
43010015	‘o hangē ‘oku ‘ilo au ‘e he Tamai, pea mo ‘eku ‘ilo ‘a e Tamai ‘e au. Pea ‘oku ou ‘atu ‘eku mo‘ui koe‘uhi ko e fanga sipi.
43010016	Pea ‘oku ai mo ‘eku fanga sipi kehe, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘ikai kau ki he loto‘ā ko eni: kuo pau ke u taki ‘a e fa‘ahinga ko ia foki: pea te nau tokanga ki hoku le‘o; pea te nau hoko ko e tākanga pē taha, pea taha pē ‘a e tauhi.
43010017	Ko hono ‘uhinga ia ‘o e ‘ofa‘i au ‘e he Tamai, koe‘uhi ‘oku ou ‘atu ‘eku mo‘ui kau toe to‘o ia.
43010018	Tala‘ehai ko e fa‘ao ia ‘e ha taha meiate au, ka ko ‘eku ‘atu ia ‘e au. ‘Oku ou fa‘iteliha ki hano ‘atu; pea ‘oku ou fa‘iteliha ki hano toe to‘o. Ko ia ia ‘a e tu‘utu‘uni ne u ma‘u mei he‘eku Tamai.
43010019	Pea toe hoko ha mavahevahe ‘i ha‘a Siu ‘i he ngaahi lea ko ia.
43010020	Pea na‘e pehē ‘e honau tokolahi, ‘Oku ‘iate ia ha tēvolo, pea ‘oku ne faha: ko e hā ‘oku mou tokanga ai kiate ia?
43010021	Ka ka pehē ‘e ha ni‘ihi, Tala‘ehai ‘oku hoa mo ha ‘āvea ha alā lea pehē: ‘o mafai koa ‘e ha tēvolo ke faka‘ā ‘a e mata ‘o e kui?
43010022	Pea faifai pea hoko ‘i Selusalema ‘a e kātoanga, ko e fakamanatu ki he huufi fo‘ou ‘o e Temipale.
43010023	Ko e fa‘ahita‘u momoko ia, pea na‘e hā‘ele ‘a Sīsū ‘i he Temipale ‘i he falehala ‘o Solomone.
43010024	Ko ia na‘e kapui ia ‘e ha‘a Siu, ‘O nau pehē ki ai, Ko futu mo ho‘o fakamanganga homau loto! kapau ko e Mīsaia koe, pea tala fakapatonu mai.
43010025	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū kiate kinautolu, Kuo u tala atu, pea ‘oku ‘ikai te mou tui ki ai: ko e ngaahi ngāue ‘oku ou fai ‘i he huafa ‘o ‘eku Tamai, ko ia ia ‘oku fakahaa‘i au:
43010026	ka neongo ia, ka ‘oku ‘ikai te mou tui; koe‘uhi ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ‘i he fanga sipi ‘a‘ata.
43010027	Ko ‘ete fanga sipi ‘a‘ata ‘oku nau tokanga ki hoto le‘o, pea ‘oku ou ‘ilo kinautolu; pea ‘oku nau muimui kiate au, pea ‘oku ou ‘atu kiate kinautolu ‘a e mo‘ui ta‘engata;
43010028	pea ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito te nau ‘auha ‘o lauikuonga, pea ‘e ‘ikai hamusi kinautolu ‘e ha taha mei hoku nima.
43010029	Ko ‘eku Tamai, ‘a ia na‘a ne foaki kinautolu kiate au, ‘oku lahi ia ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē; pea tala‘ehai ‘e lava ‘e ha taha ke hamusi mei he nima ‘o e Tamai.
43010030	Ko au mo e Tamai ‘oku ma taha.
43010031	Pea to‘o maka leva ‘e ha‘a Siu, ‘o hapai ke pe‘ehi kiate ia.
43010032	Tali leva ‘e Sīsū kiate kinautolu, Kuo lahi ‘a e ngaahi ngāue lelei kuo u faka‘ali‘ali kiate kimoutolu mei he Tamai; ko e fē ia ‘i he ngaahi ngāue ko ia ‘oku mou fai ke tolongi ai au?
43010033	Pea tali kiate ia ‘e ha‘a Siu, ‘Oku ‘ikai ko ha ngāue lelei ‘oku mau tolongi ai koe, ka ko e lea fie-‘Otua: ‘osi, ko e tangata koe, ka ‘oku ke lau fola, tokua ko e ‘Otua koe.
43010034	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū kiate kinautolu, ‘Ikai kuo tohi ‘i ho‘omou Lao, ‘o pehē, Na‘a ku lau ko e ngaahi ‘otua kimoutolu?
43010035	Kapau na‘a ne lau ko e ngaahi ‘otua ‘a kinautolu na‘e hoko ki ai ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua, (pea tala‘ehai ‘e ala tāmate‘i ‘a e potu Tohitapu ko ia)
43010036	Pea ko ho‘omou lau koā ki he toko taha na‘e fakanofo ‘e he Tamai, mo fekau ki māmani, ‘o mou pehē, ‘Oku ke lea fie‘otua, koe‘uhiā ko ‘eku pehē, Ko e ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otua au!
43010037	Kapau ‘oku ‘ikai te u feia ‘a e ngaahi ngāue ‘a ‘eku Tamai, pea ‘oua te mou tui kiate au,
43010038	Ka ‘o kapau ‘oku ou fai ia; pea neongo ‘oku ‘ikai te mou tui kiate au, tui pē ā ki he ngaahi ngāue: koe‘uhi ke mou vakai ‘o ‘ilo, ‘oku ‘iate au ‘a e Tamai, mo au ‘oku ou ‘i he Tamai.
43010039	Pea nau toe feinga ke puke ia; ka ka mole atu pē ia mei honau nima.
43010040	‘O ne toe ‘alu ki Tu‘a-Soatani, ki he potu na‘e fai papitaiso ai ‘a Sione–‘a ia ‘i he kamata‘anga–pea ne nofo ‘i he potu ko ia.
43010041	Pea na‘e ha‘u ha tokolahi kiate ia, pea ko ‘enau lau na‘e pehē, Ko Sione na‘e ‘ikai te ne momo‘i fai ha mana ‘e taha: ka ko e ngaahi me‘a na‘e fakahā ‘e Sione ki he toko taha ni, tā ‘oku mo‘oni hono kotoa,
43010042	pea na‘e tui ha tokolahi kiate ia ‘i he potu ko ia.
43011001	Ka na‘e ai ha toko taha na‘e mahaki‘ia, ko Lasalosi ‘i Pētani, ‘a e vilisi ‘o Mele mo hono tokoua ko Mā‘ata.
43011002	(Pea ko e Mele ia na‘a ne tākai ‘a e ‘Eiki ‘aki ‘a e lolo, mo holoholo hono va‘e ‘aki hono lou‘ulu, ko e fefine ia kuo puke hono tuonga‘ane ko Lasalosi.)
43011003	Ko ia na‘e fekau atu ai kiate ia ‘e hono ongo tuofefine, he‘ena pehē, ‘eiki, ke ke mea‘i ko e siana ‘oku ke ‘ofa ai ‘oku puke.
43011004	Ka ‘i he fanongo ki ai ‘a Sīsū na‘a ne pehē, Ko e mahaki ko eni kuo ‘ikai hoko mai ke ne pekia ai, ka ko hono ‘uhinga ko e lāngilangi ‘o e ‘Otua, koe‘uhi ke fakalāngilangi‘i ai ‘a e ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otua.
43011005	Pea ko eni na‘e ‘ofa ‘a Sīsū kia Mā‘ata, mo hono tokoua, pea mo Lasalosi.
43011006	Ko ia ‘i he‘ene fanongo leva ‘oku ne puke, na‘a ne kei nofo pē ‘i he potu na‘a ne ‘i ai, ‘o ‘aho ua.
43011007	Kae hili ia, pea ne pehē ki he‘ene kau ako, Tau toe ō ki Siutea.
43011008	Pea pehē kiate ia ‘e he kau ako, Lāpai, na‘e toki feinga ‘e ha‘a Siu ke tolongi koe; pea ko ho‘o toe ‘alu koā ki ai?
43011009	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū, ‘Ikai ‘oku hongofulu mā ua ‘a e houa ‘i he ‘aho? Kapau ‘e hā‘ele ha taha lolotonga ‘oku ‘aho, ‘e ‘ikai te ne tūkia, koe‘uhi ‘oku ne mamata ki he maama ‘o māmani.
43011010	Ka ‘o kapau ‘e hā‘ele ha taha ‘i he po‘uli te ne tūkia, koe‘uhi ‘oku ‘ikai ‘iate ia ‘a e maama.
43011011	Na‘e pehē ‘ene me‘a: pea hili ia pea ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Ko si‘otau kaume‘a ko Lasalosi kuo mohe; ka ko ‘eku ‘alu ni ke u fafangu ia.
43011012	Ko ia na‘e lea kiate ia ‘e he kau ako, ‘o pehē, ‘Eiki, kapau kuo ne mohe te ne mo‘ui.
43011013	Ka na‘e kau ‘a e lea ‘a Sīsū ia ki he‘ene pekia: ka ka mahalo ‘e kinautolu ‘oku ne me‘a ki ha‘ane toka ‘o mohe.
43011014	Ko ia na‘e hanga ai ‘a Sīsū, ‘o ne lea fakapatonu kiate kinautolu, ‘o pehē,
43011015	Kuo pekia ‘a Lasalosi. Pea ‘oku ou fiefia ‘i he ‘ikai te u ‘i ai, koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu, koe‘uhiā ke mou tui; ka tau ō pē kiate ia.
43011016	Pea pehē ai ‘a Tōmasi ‘oku ui ko Titimasi ki hono kaunga ako, Tau ō foki, ke tau mate mo ia.
43011017	Pea ‘i he hoko ki ai ‘a Sīsū, na‘a ne ‘ilo tā kuo ‘aho fā mālō ‘ene ‘i he fonualoto.
43011018	Pea ko eni, na‘e vāofi ‘a Pētani mo Selusalema, fe‘unga nai mo e maile ‘e ua:
43011019	Pea ko e tokolahi ‘o ha‘a Siu kuo nau omi kia Mā‘ata mo Mele, ke fakafiemālie‘i kinaua koe‘uhi ko hona tuonga‘ane.
43011020	Ko ia ko Mā‘ata, ‘i he‘ene fanongo leva ‘oku ha‘u ‘a Sīsū, na‘a ne fakafetaulaki kiate ia: ka ka nofo ai pē ‘a Mele ‘i ‘api.
43011021	Pea lea ai ‘a Mā‘ata kia Sīsū, ‘Eiki, ka ne ke ‘i heni pehē ne ‘ikai pekia hoku tuonga‘ane.
43011022	Pea na‘a mo ia, ka ‘oku ou ‘ilo, neongo pē ko e hā ha‘o kole ‘e fai ki he ‘Otua, ‘e ‘atu pē, ‘e he ‘Otua.
43011023	Pea lea ai ‘e Sīsū ki ai, ‘e toetu‘u ho tuonga‘ane.
43011024	Pea pehē ‘e Mā‘ata kiate ia, ‘Oku ou ‘ilo te ne toetu‘u ‘i he Toetu‘u ‘i he ‘aho fakamui.
43011025	Pea me‘a ‘e Sīsū ki ai, Ko au pē ko e Toetu‘u, pea mo e Mo‘ui: ko ia ‘oku tui pīkitai kiate au, ne ongo kuo pekia, ka te ne mo‘ui pē:
43011026	pea ‘ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku mo‘ui mo tui pīkitai kiate au ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito te ne mate, ‘o ta‘engata. ‘Oku ke tui ki he me‘a ko ia, ‘o?
43011027	Pea pehē ‘e ia ki ai, ‘Io, ‘Eiki: kuo u tui ko e Mīsaia koe, ko e ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otua, ko e Toko Taha ka hoko mai ki māmani.
43011028	Pea hili ‘ene lea pehē, na‘a ne ‘alu ‘o ui ange ‘a Mele ko hono tokoua, ‘o ne tala fakafufū ki ai ‘o pehē, Kuo me‘a mai ‘a e Tangata‘eiki, pea ‘oku ne fiema‘u koe.
43011029	Pea ‘i he‘ene fanongo ki ai, na‘a ne tu‘u leva, ‘o kamata ‘alu kiate ia.
43011030	Pea kuo te‘eki hū ‘a Sīsū ki he vilisi, ka ‘oku ne kei ‘i he potu na‘e fakafetaulaki ai ‘a Mā‘ata kiate ia.
43011031	Ko ia ko ha‘a Siu na‘e ‘iate ia ‘i he fale, ‘o fakafiemālie kiate ia, ‘i he‘enau vakai ki he tu‘u vave ‘a Mele ‘o hū kitu‘a, na‘a nau muimui ki ai, he‘enau mahalo ko ‘ene mole ki he fonualoto ke tangi ai.
43011032	Pea ‘i he hoko leva ‘a Mele ki he potu na‘e ‘i ai ‘a Sīsū, ‘o ne mamata kiate ia, na‘a ne hinga atu ki hono va‘e, ‘o ne pehē kiate ia, ‘Eiki, ka ne ke ‘i heni, pehē ne ‘ikai pekia si‘oku tuonga‘ane.
43011033	Pea ‘i he me‘a ‘a Sīsū kiate ia ‘oku ne tangi, mo kinautolu na‘e ha‘u mo ia, ‘a ha‘a Siu, ‘oku nau tangi, na‘a ne ‘ita ‘i hono laumālie, mo ne fakatekelili,
43011034	pea ne pehē, Kuo mou telio ia ‘i fē? Pea na pehē ange, ‘Eiki, ke ke me‘a mai, ‘o me‘a ki ai.
43011035	Na‘e tutulu ‘a Sīsū,
43011036	pea pehē ai ‘e ha‘a Siu, Vakai ā: ta na‘e lahi ‘ene ‘ofa kiate ia!
43011037	Ka ka pehē ‘e honau ni‘ihi, ‘Ikai ne mei lava ‘e he siana ni na‘e faka‘ā ‘a e mata ‘o e kui, ke ngaohi mo e toko taha ko ia ke ‘oua te ne pekia?
43011038	Pea toe ‘ita ai ‘a Sīsū ‘i hono finangalo, ‘o ne ‘alu atu ki he fonualoto. Pea ko e ‘ana ia, pea tu‘u ki ai ha maka.
43011039	Folofola ‘a Sīsū, To‘o ‘a e maka. Pea lea kiate ia ‘a e tuofefine ‘o ia kuo fai, ‘a Mā‘ata, ‘o ne pehē, ‘Eiki, kuo namuhāhā; he ko hono ‘aho fā mālō ‘eni.
43011040	Pea me‘a ‘a Sīsū ki ai, ‘Ikai na‘a ku tala atu, kapau te ke tui, te ke mamata ki he lāngilangi ‘o e ‘Otua?
43011041	Pea nau to‘o ai ‘a e maka. Pea tāngaki hake ‘e Sīsū hono fofonga, ‘o ne pehē, ‘Alā Tamai, ‘oku ou fakafeta‘i atu koe‘uhi na‘a ke ongo‘i au.
43011042	‘Io, kuo u ‘ilo pē ‘e au ‘oku ke ongo‘i au ma‘u ai pē: ka ko ‘eku lea koe‘uhi ko e fu‘u kakai ‘oku tutu‘u ni, koe‘uhi ke nau tui ko koe kuo ke fekau mai au.
43011043	Pea hili ‘ene folofola pehē, pea ne kalanga le‘o lahi, Lasalosi, tu‘u mai kitu‘a.
43011044	Pea hū kitu‘a ‘a e pekia, kuo ha‘i hono ongo va‘e mo hono ongo nima ‘aki ‘a e ngaahi no‘o; pea ko hono fofonga na‘e takai ‘aki ha holoholo. Pea folofola ‘a Sīsū kiate kinautolu, Vete ia, pea tukuange ke ne ‘alu.
43011045	Ko ia ko e tokolahi ‘o ha‘a Siu, ‘io, ‘a kinautolu kuo ha‘u kia Mele, pea mamata ki he me‘a kuo fai ‘e Sīsū, na‘a nau tui pīkitai kiate ia.
43011046	Ka ko e ni‘ihi ‘o e fa‘ahinga ko ia na‘a nau ‘alu ange ki he kau Fālesi, ‘o nau tala kiate kinautolu ‘a e ngaahi me‘a kuo fai ‘e Sīsū.
43011047	Ko ia na‘e hanga ai ‘a e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki mo e kau Fālesi, ‘o nau fai ha fakataha, ‘o nau pehē, Ko e hā mu‘a ‘oku tau fai? he ko e tangata ni ko e me‘a ngei ‘ene fai mana.
43011048	Kapau te tau tuku ia ke fai pehē ai pē, ‘e tui pīkitai kiate ia ‘a e kakai kotoa pē, pea ‘e ha‘u ‘a e kau Loma, ‘o ‘ave hotau fonua mo hotau pule‘anga fakatou‘osi.
43011049	Ka ko honau toko taha, ko Kaiafasi, ‘a ia na‘e Taula‘eiki-Lahi ‘i he ta‘u ko ia, na‘a ne me‘a kiate kinautolu, ‘o pehē, Tā ko e kakai kimoutolu ‘oku ‘ikai te mou momo‘i ‘ilo ha me‘a;
43011050	pe te mou fakakaukau, ‘oku lelei mu‘a kiate kimoutolu ke mate ha fo‘i tangata ‘e toko taha koe‘uhi ko e fa‘ahinga tapu, pea ‘oua na‘a ‘auha ‘a e pule‘anga kotoa.
43011051	Ka na‘e ‘ikai meiate ia ‘a e lea ko ia: ka ko e me‘a ‘i he‘ene Taula‘eiki Lahi ‘i he ta‘u ko ia, ko ia na‘a ne palofisai ai, ‘oku ene ‘a Sīsū ke pekia koe‘uhi ko e pule‘anga;
43011052	‘o ‘ikai koe‘uhi ko e pule‘anga pē, ka koe‘uhi foki ke fakatahataha ‘a e fānau ‘a e ‘Otua kuo movetevete.
43011053	Ko ia, hili ‘a e ‘aho ko ia na‘a nau puleaki‘i hano tāmate‘i.
43011054	Ko ia na‘e ‘ikai ke kei fakafe‘iloaki ‘a Sīsū mo ha‘a Siu; ka ka ‘alu ia mei ai ki he tuku‘uta, ‘o afi ki he toafa, ki ha kolo na‘e hingoa ko ‘Ifalemi, ‘o ne nofo ai mo ‘ene kau ako.
43011055	Pea faifai pea panaki ‘a e Pāsova ‘a ha‘a Siu: pea ‘alu ha tokolahi ki Selusalema mei he tuku‘uta ‘i he te‘eki ke hoko ‘a e Pāsova, koe‘uhi ke nau fakama‘a.
43011056	Pea nau fekumi ai kia Sīsū, ‘o nau fetalanoa‘aki ‘i he‘enau tutu‘u ‘i he Temipale, ‘o pehē, Ko e hā ho‘omou poa? ‘Oku mo u pehē ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito te ne ha‘u ki he kātoanga?
43011057	Pea ko eni, kuo fai tu‘utu‘uni ‘e he hou‘eiki taula‘eiki mo e kau Fālesi, ka ai ha taha ‘oku ne ‘ilo pē ‘oku ne ‘i fē, ke ne fakahā; koe‘uhi ke nau puke ia.
43012001	PEA ‘i he toe ono ‘a e ‘aho pea fai ‘a e Pāsova, pea ha‘u ‘a Sīsū ki Pētani, ko e potu na‘e nofo ai ‘a Lasalosi, ‘a ia ne fokotu‘u ‘e Sīsū mei he pekia.
43012002	Pea nau fai ai ma‘ana, ha kātoanga ‘i he potu ko ia; pea na‘e tauhi tēpile ‘a Mā‘ata: ka ko Lasalosi ko e taha ia ‘iate kinautolu na‘e fetākoto‘i mo ia ‘i he kai.
43012003	Pea to‘o ai ‘e Mele ha pāuni lolo tākai, ko e na‘ati mo‘oni pea mahu‘inga lahi, ‘o ne tākai ‘aki ‘a e va‘e ‘o Sīsū, mo ne holoholo hono va‘e ‘aki hono lou‘ulu: pea na‘e fonu ‘a e fale ‘i he ngangatu ‘o e lolo.
43012004	Ka ko Siutasi ‘Isikāliote, ko e toko taha ‘o ‘ene kau ako, ‘a ia ‘oku ene ke lavaki‘i ia, na‘a ne pehē,
43012005	Ko e hā na‘e ‘ikai fakatau ai ‘a e lolo ni, ‘o ma‘u ai ha tēnali ‘e tolungeau, ‘o foaki ki he masiva?
43012006	Ka ko ‘ene lea ko ia, tala‘ehai ko e pehē na‘e mamafa ‘a e masiva kiate ia; ka koe‘uhi ko e kaiha‘a ia, pea ko e me‘a ‘i he ‘iate ia ‘enau puha pa‘anga na‘a ne fa‘a ‘ave ‘a e ngaahi me‘a na‘e lī ki ai.
43012007	Pea me‘a ai ‘a Sīsū, Tuku pē ‘a e fefine ke ne tauhi ia ki he ‘aho ‘o hoku tanu.
43012008	He ko e me‘a ki he masiva te mou feangai ai pē mo kinautolu; ka ‘e ‘ikai te mou feangai ai pē mo au.
43012009	Pea ‘ilo ‘e ha tokolahi ‘o ha‘a Siu ‘oku ne ‘i he potu ko ia, pea nau ‘alu ki ai; ‘o ‘ikai koe‘uhi ko Sīsū pē, ka koe‘uhi foki ke nau mamata kia Lasalosi, ‘a ia kuo ne fokotu‘u mei he pekia.
43012010	Ka ka puleaki‘i ‘e he hou‘eiki taula‘eiki ke tāmate‘i mo Lasalosi foki;
43012011	koe‘uhi ko e me‘a ‘iate ia na‘e mole ai ha tokolahi ‘o ha‘a Siu, ‘o tui pīkitai kia Sīsū.
43012012	Pongipongi hake, ko e fu‘u kakai kuo ha‘u ki he kātoanga, ‘i he‘enau fanongo ‘oku me‘a mai ‘a Sīsū ki Selusalema,
43012013	na‘a nau to‘o ‘a e ngaahi va‘a paame, ‘o nau hū ki tua‘ā ke fakafetaulaki kiate ia, ‘o nau kalakalanga, Hōsana! Hoto ‘ofa kiate ia ‘oku hoko mai ‘i he huafa ‘o e ‘Eiki: ‘Io, ki he Tu‘i ‘Isileli!
43012014	Pea kuo ma‘u ‘e Sīsū ha ‘asi mui, na‘a ne heka ki ai; ‘o hangē ā ko ia ne tohi, Si‘i Saione, ‘oua ‘e manavahē:
43012015	ko eni ho Tu‘i ‘oku me‘a mai kiate koe, ‘oku heka ki ha ki‘i ‘asi.
43012016	Ko e ngaahi me‘a ko ia na‘e ‘ikai mahino ki he‘ene kau ako ‘i he kamata‘anga: ka ‘i he hoko ‘a e fakalāngilangi‘i ‘o Sīsū, pea nau toki manatu, tā ne tohi ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia ma‘ana, pea kuo nau fai pehē kiate ia.
43012017	Pea na‘e fakahaa‘i ia foki ‘e he kakai na‘e ‘iate ia ‘i he‘ene ui mai ‘a Lasalosi mei he fonualoto, mo fokotu‘u ia mei he pekia.
43012018	Ko hono ‘uhinga foki ia na‘e fakafetaulaki kiate ia ‘a e fu‘u kakai, koe‘uhi kuo nau fanongo kuo ne fai ‘a e fu‘u mana ko ia.
43012019	Ko ia na‘e fepehē‘aki ‘a e kau Fālesi, ‘Oku mou tokanga koā ‘oku ‘ikai te tau mafohi ha me‘a? Vakai ange; kuo hiki fu‘u ‘a māmani, ‘o muimui kiate ia.
43012020	Pea na‘e ai ha tu‘unga me‘a Kalisi ‘i he kakai na‘e ‘alu hake ke fai ‘enau lotu ‘i he kātoanga:
43012021	pea ‘alu ‘a e kau siana, ko ia kia Filipe, ‘a ia na‘e mei Petesaita ‘i Kāleli, pea nau kole kiate ia, ‘o pehē, ‘Eiki, ‘oku mau fie fe‘iloaki mo Sīsū.
43012022	Pea ha‘u ‘a Filipe ‘o tala kia ‘Anitelū: ha‘u pē ‘a ‘Anitelū ia, mo Filipe, ‘o tala kia Sīsū.
43012023	Ka ka tali ‘e Sīsū kiate kinaua, ‘o pehē, Kuo hokosia ‘a e taimi ke fakalāngilangi‘i ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata.
43012024	Ko au ē, ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Kapau ‘e ‘ikai tō ki he kelekele ‘a e tenga‘i uite ‘o mate, ‘oku teka taha ai pē ia: ka ‘o kapau ‘e mate, te ne fua lahi.
43012025	Ko ia ‘oku ‘ofa ki he‘ene mo‘ui, ko ‘ene tuku ia ke mole; pea ko ia ‘oku ne fehi‘a ki he‘ene mo‘ui ‘i he maama ko eni, ko ‘ene tauhi ia ‘o a‘u ki he mo‘ui ta‘engata.
43012026	Kapau ‘e tauhi au ‘e ha taha, ke ne muimui kiate au; pea ko e potu ‘oku ‘i ai au, ‘e ‘i ai foki ‘eku sevāniti: kapau ‘e tauhi au ‘e ha taha, ‘e fakahīkihiki‘i ia ‘e he Tamai.
43012027	‘Ē, kuo takatu‘u ‘eni ‘eku mo‘ui; pea ko e hā ai ‘eku lea ‘e fai? ‘Alā Tamai, fakahaofi au mei he houa ko eni: ‘Ā, ka ko hono ‘uhinga e na‘a ku hoko mai ai ki he houa ni.
43012028	‘Alā Tamai, ke ke fakalāngilangi‘i ho‘ou huafa. Ko ia na‘e hoko ha le‘o mei he langi, ‘o pehē, Kuo u fakalāngilangi‘i ia, pea te u toe fakalāngilangi‘i foki.
43012029	Pea ko e kakai na‘e tu‘u ai ‘o fanongo, na‘a nau pehē kuo mana: pea pehē ‘e ha ni‘ihi, Ko e lea ‘a ha ‘āngelo kiate ia.
43012030	Ka ka tali ‘e Sīsū, ‘o ne pehē, Na‘e ‘ikai koe‘uhi ko au ‘a e hoko mai ‘a e le‘o ni, ka koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu.
43012031	‘Ē, kuo hoko ‘eni ‘a e fakamaau ‘o e maama ko eni: ‘ē, ‘e kapusi ki tu‘a ‘eni ‘a e ‘eiki ‘o e maama ko eni.
43012032	Pea ko au, kapau ‘e hiki au ki ‘olunga mei he kelekele, te u tohoaki ‘a e kakai kotoa pē kiate au.
43012033	Ka na‘a ne lea pehē ko ‘ene fakatātā atu ‘a e anga ‘o e mate‘anga te ne pekia ai.
43012034	Ko ia na‘e tali ki ai ‘e he kakai, Kuo mau fanongo mei he Lao, ‘oku nofo ‘a e Mīsaia ‘o ta‘engata: pea fēfē ai ho‘o lau ‘a‘au, tokua kuo pau ke hiki ki ‘olunga ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata? Ko hai tū ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata ko ia.
43012035	Pea folofola ai ‘a Sīsū kiate kinautolu, ‘Oku kei toe ha ki‘i taimi ‘o e ‘i homou lotolotonga ‘a e maama. Mou laka ho‘omou ma‘u ‘a e maama, ke ‘oua na‘a lapasi kimoutolu ‘e he po‘uli: pea ko ia ‘oku hā‘ele ‘i he po‘uli ‘oku ‘ikai te ne ‘ilo pē ko ‘ene mole ki fē.
43012036	‘I ho‘omou ma‘u ‘a e maama, mou tui pīkitai ki he maama, koe‘uhi ke mou hoko ko e fānau ‘a e maama. Na‘e pehē ‘ene folofola ‘a Sīsū, pea ne hiki mei ai, ‘o ne fufū meiate kinautolu.
43012037	Ka neongo kuo tuva pehē ‘a e ngaahi faka‘ilonga kuo ne fai ‘i honau ‘ao, ka na‘e ‘ikai te nau tui pīkitai kiate ia:
43012038	koe‘uhiā ke fakamo‘oni ki he folofola ‘a e palōfita ko ‘Aisea, ‘a ia na‘e pehē ‘ene lea, ‘Eiki, ko hai kuo ne tui ki he‘emau ongoongo? Pea kuo fakahā kia hai ‘a e nima ‘o e ‘Afiona?
43012039	Ko hono ‘uhinga ia na‘e ‘ikai te nau lava ke tui, koe‘uhi ko e toe lea ‘a ‘Aisea ‘o pehē,
43012040	Kuo ne fakakui honau mata, mo fakafefeka honau loto: koe‘uhi ke ‘oua te nau sio ‘aki honau mata, pe ‘ilo ‘aki honau loto, pea tafoki mai, ka u fakamo‘ui kinautolu.
43012041	Na‘e lea pehē ‘a ‘Aisea koe‘uhi na‘a ne mamata ki he lāngilangi ‘o‘ona, pea na‘e kau ‘ene lea kiate ia.
43012042	Ka neongo ia, ka na‘a mo e hou‘eiki na‘e tui pīkitai kiate ia ha tokolahi: ka na‘e ‘ikai te nau fai fakahā ia telia ‘a e kau Fālesi, na‘a hifo kinautolu mei he falelotu.
43012043	He na‘e lahi ‘enau manako ki he fakahīkihiki‘i ‘e he tangata ‘i he fakahīkihiki‘i ‘e he ‘Otua.
43012044	Ka ko Sīsū na‘a ne kalanga ‘o pehē, Ko ia ‘oku ne tui pīkitai kiate au, ‘oku ‘ikai ko au ‘oku ne tui ki ai, ka ko ia na‘a ne fekau mai au.
43012045	Pea ko ia ‘oku ne siofia au, ‘oku ne siofia ‘a ia na‘a ne fekau mai au.
43012046	Kuo u ha‘u au ki māmani ko e maama, koe‘uhi he ‘ilonga ha taha ‘oku tui pīkitai kiate au, pea ‘oua te ne kei nofo ai pē ‘i he po‘uli.
43012047	Pea ka ai ha taha ne fanongo ki he‘eku ngaahi lea, ka kuo ‘ikai lehilehi‘i, ‘oku ‘ikai te u fakamāu‘i ia ‘e au: he na‘e ‘ikai te u ha‘u ke fakamāu‘i ‘a māmani, ka ke fakamo‘ui ‘a māmani.
43012048	Ko ia ‘oku ne fakatale‘i au, ‘o ‘ikai tali ‘eku ngaahi lea, ‘oku ‘i ai ha toko taha ‘oku fakamāu‘i ia: ko e tokāteline kuo u lea‘aki, ko e me‘a ia te ne fakamaau ‘a e tangata ko ia ‘i he ‘aho fakamui.
43012049	Koe‘uhi na‘e ‘ikai meiate au ‘eku lea; ka ko e Tamai na‘a ne fekau mai au, na‘e fai mai ‘e ia hoku tu‘utu‘uni ki he me‘a te u tala mo e lea te u fai.
43012050	Pea ‘oku ou ‘ilo ko ‘ene tu‘utu‘uni ko e koto mo‘ui ta‘engata ia: ko ia ko e ngaahi lea ‘oku ou fai ‘e au, hangē tofu pē hono folofola‘aki mai ‘e he Tamai kiate au, ‘oku pehē ‘eku lea‘aki.
43013001	PEA ko eni, ‘i he te‘eki fai ‘a e kātoanga ‘o e Pāsova, ko e me‘a ‘i he‘ene mea‘i ‘e Sīsū kuo hokosia hono taimi ke hiki mei he maama ko eni ‘o ‘alu ki he Tamai, pea ko e me‘a ‘i he‘ene ‘ofa ki hono kakai ‘o‘ona ‘oku ‘i māmani; ko ia na‘a ne fai ‘ene ‘ofa taupotu kiate kinautolu.
43013002	Pea ‘i he fai ha kai; pea kuo ‘osi ‘ai ‘e he Tēvolo ki hono loto ke lavaki‘i ia ‘e Siutasi, ko e foha ‘o Saimone, ‘a ‘Isikāliote;
43013003	pea ‘i he ‘ilo ‘e Sīsū, kuo tuku kiate ia ‘e he‘ene Tamai ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē ke ne fa‘iteliha ai, pea kuo ne ha‘u mei he ‘Otua pea ‘oku ne ‘alu ki he ‘Otua;
43013004	ko ia na‘a ne tu‘u mei he kai, ‘o ne tuku hono ngaahi kofu tu‘a; ‘o ne to‘o ha tauveli, ‘o ne no‘o.
43013005	Pea ne toki lilingi ha vai ki he kumete, ‘o ne hanga ‘o fufulu ‘a e va‘e ‘o e kau ako, mo ne holoholo ‘aki ‘a e tauveli kuo ne no‘o ‘aki.
43013006	Pea ne ha‘u ai kia Saimone Pita: pea lea ia ki ai, ‘Eiki, ko ho‘o fufulu ‘e koe hoku va‘e koā?
43013007	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū ‘o pehē kiate ia, Ko e me‘a ‘oku ou fai ‘oku ‘ikai te ke ‘ilo ‘e koe ‘i he taimi ni; ka ‘e faifai pea mahino ‘amui.
43013008	Pea lea ‘a Pita ki ai, ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito te ke fufulu hoku va‘e ‘o ta‘engata. Pea tali ‘e Sīsū ki ai, Kapau ‘e ‘ikai te u fufulu koe, tā ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘o kau mo au.
43013009	Pea pehē ange ‘e Saimone Pita, ‘Eiki, ‘oua ‘e ngata ‘i hoku va‘e pē, kae fai ki hoku ongo nima ni mo hoku ‘ulu.
43013010	Pea me‘a ki ai ‘a Sīsū, Ko ia kuo pālutu, koe‘uma‘ā ‘ene toe fufulu ia ngata pē ‘i hono va‘e, ka kuo ma‘a hono kotoa: pea ‘oku ma‘a foki ‘a kimoutolu, ka ‘oku ‘ikai te mou pehē kotoa pē.
43013011	He na‘a ne mea‘i ‘a e toko taha ‘e lavaki‘i ia; ko ia na‘a ne pehē ai, ‘Oku ‘ikai te mou ma‘a kotoa pē.
43013012	Pea kuo ‘osi leva ‘ene fufulu honau va‘e, mo ‘ene ‘ai hono kofu ‘o toe tokoto, pea ne folofola kiate kinautolu, ‘Oku mahino kiate kimoutolu ‘a e me‘a kuo u fai kiate kimoutolu?
43013013	‘Oku mou ui au ko Lāpai, mo ‘Eiki; pea ‘oku totonu ho‘omou lea pehē; he ko au ia.
43013014	Pea kapau ā kuo u fufulu homou va‘e, ‘a au ko e ‘Eiki mo e Lāpai; pea ‘oku totonu ke fai ‘e kimoutolu foki, ‘o fefufulu‘aki homou va‘e ‘omoutolu.
43013015	He kuo u tuku hamou fa‘ifa‘itaki‘anga, koe‘uhi ke mou fai foki, ‘o hangē ko ‘eku fai kiate kimoutolu.
43013016	Ko au ē, ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘Oku ‘ikai ha tamaio‘eiki ‘e lahi ‘i he‘ene ‘eiki, pe ha talafekau ‘iate ia na‘a ne fekau‘i ia.
43013017	Kapau ‘oku mou ‘ilo ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia, pea ko e toki kakai monū‘ia kimoutolu, ‘o kapau te mou fai ia.
43013018	‘Oku ‘ikai kau ‘eku lea kiate kimoutolu kotoa pē: ‘oku ou ‘ilo pē ‘e au ‘a e anga ‘o kinautolu ne u fili: ka ko hono ‘uhinga, koe‘uhi ke fakamo‘oni ki he potu tohi, Ko ia ‘oku kai ‘eku mā kuo ne hiki hono muiva‘e kiate au.
43013019	Ko ‘eku kamata ‘eni ke fakahā ia kiate kimoutolu ‘i he te‘eki hoko, koe‘uhi ‘oka hoko ia ke mou tui ko au ia.
43013020	Ko au ē, ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Ko ia ‘oku ne tali ha toko taha pē te u fekau, ‘oku ne tali au; pea ko ia ‘oku ne tali au, ‘oku ne tali ‘a ia na‘a ne fekau mai au.
43013021	‘I he folofola pehē ‘e Sīsū, na‘e takatu‘u hono laumālie, pea ne fakapapau mai ‘o pehē, Ko au ē, ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Ko e toko taha ‘iate kimoutolu te ne lavaki‘i au.
43013022	Pea fesiofaki ai ‘a e kau ako kuo nau fiu‘a fili, pe ko ‘ene lau kia hai?
43013023	Na‘e ai ha toko taha ‘o ‘ene kau ako na‘e tokoto ‘i he ‘ao ‘o Sīsū, ko e toko taha na‘e ‘ofa ai ‘a Sīsū.
43013024	Ko ia na‘e kamo ‘a Saimone Pita ki he toko taha ko ia, ‘o ne pehē ki ai, Tala, pe ko hai ia ‘oku ne me‘a ki ai.
43013025	Pea hanga ‘a e toko taha ko ia ‘i he‘ene tokoto pehē, ‘o ne faaki atu ki he fatafata ‘o Sīsū, mo ne pehē ki ai, ‘Eiki, ko hai ia?
43013026	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū, Ko ia ia ‘a ia te u unu ‘eku konga mā ‘o ‘ange ma‘ana. Pea ne unu ai ‘ene konga mā, ‘o ne to‘o, ‘o ‘ange kia Siutasi ko e foha ‘o Saimone ‘Isikāliote.
43013027	Pea hili ‘ene ‘ange ‘a e konga mā, mo e hū leva ki he siana ko ia ‘a Sētane. Pea folofola ai ‘a Sīsū kiate ia, Fai vave ange ‘a e me‘a ‘oku ke fai,
43013028	pea na‘e ‘ikai mahino ki ha taha ‘iate kinautolu na‘e tākoto ‘i he kai pē ko ‘ene lea ki ai ke hā.
43013029	He na‘e mahalo ‘a e ni‘ihi, ko e me‘a ‘i he ‘ia Siutasi ‘enau puha pa‘anga, ko ia ko e lea ‘a Sīsū ki ai ‘oku pehē, Fakatau mu‘a ‘a e ngaahi me‘a kuo te‘eki ke tau ma‘u ki he kātoanga; pē ko e pehē ke ne ‘ange ha me‘a ki he masiva.
43013030	Pea ‘i he to‘o ‘a e konga mā ‘e he siana ko ia na‘a ne ‘alu atu leva kitu‘a: pea kuo po‘uli.
43013031	Pea kuo ne ‘alu atu ki tu‘a, pea folofola ‘a Sīsū, Ko eni kuo fakalāngilangi‘i ‘a e Fanautama ‘a Tangata, pea kuo fakalāngilangi‘i ‘a e ‘Otua ‘iate ia:
43013032	pea ‘e fakalāngilangi‘i ia ‘e he ‘Otua ‘i he ‘ene ‘Afio, pea ‘e vave ni ‘ene fakalāngilangi‘i ia.
43013033	Si‘i fānau, ‘oku kei toe si‘i ‘eku ‘iate kimoutolu. Te mou kumi au: kae hangē ko ‘eku lea ki ha‘a Siu, ‘o pehē, Ko e potu ‘oku ou ‘alu ki ai, ‘e ‘ikai te mou lava ke a‘u ki ai; ‘oku pehē foki ‘eku lea ni kiate kimoutolu.
43013034	Ko e tu‘utu‘uni fo‘ou ‘oku ou tuku kiate kimoutolu, Ke mou fe‘ofa‘aki: hangē ā ko ‘eku ‘ofa‘i kimoutolu, ke pehē foki ho‘omou fe‘ofa‘aki.
43013035	Ko e me‘a ko ē ‘e ‘ilo ai ‘e he kakai kotoa pē ko e kau ako kimoutolu ‘a‘aku, ‘o kapau ‘e ai ha‘amou fe‘ofa‘aki.
43013036	Pea lea ki ai ‘a Saimone Pita, ‘Eiki, ko ho‘o me‘a ki fē? Pea tali ‘e Sīsū, Ko e potu ‘oku ou ‘alu ki ai ‘e ‘ikai te ke lava ke muimui mai ki ai ‘i he taimi ni; ka te ke muimui ki ai ‘amui.
43013037	Pea lea ki ai ‘a Pita, ‘Eiki, ko e ‘ikai te u lava ke muimui atu ki ai ‘i he taimi ni, ko e hā? Na‘a mo ‘eku mo‘ui te u li‘aki ia ma‘au.
43013038	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū, Te ke li‘aki koā ho‘o mo‘ui koe‘uhi ko au, ‘o? Ko au ē, ko au ē, oku ou tala atu, ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito ‘u‘ua ‘a e moa, kae‘oua ke ke fakafisinga au, ‘o tu‘o tolu mālō.
43014001	‘OUA na‘a tuku ke puputu‘u homou loto: tui pīkitai ki he ‘Otua, tui pīkitai foki kiate au.
43014002	‘I he ‘api ‘o ‘eku Tamai ‘oku lahi ‘a e ngaahi nofo‘anga: ka ne ‘ikai, pehē kuo u tala kiate kimoutolu, he ko ‘eku ‘alu eni ke teuteu ha potu mo ‘omoutolu.
43014003	Pea neongo te u ‘alu ‘o teuteu ha potu mo‘omoutolu, ka ‘oku ou toe ha‘u pē, pea te u ma‘u kimoutolu kiate au; koe‘uhi ko e potu ‘oku ou ‘i ai, ke mou ‘i ai foki.
43014004	Pea ko e potu ‘oku ou ‘alu ki ai ‘oku mou ‘ilo hono hala.
43014005	Pea lea ki ai ‘a Tōmasi, ‘Eiki, ‘oku ‘ikai te mau ‘ilo pē ko ho‘o me‘a ki fē; pea mau ‘ilo fēfē ai ‘a e hala?
43014006	Pea folofola ‘a Sīsū ki ai, Ko au pē ko e Hala, pea mo e Mo‘oni mo e Mo‘ui: ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘u ha taha ki he Tamai ka ‘i he‘ene fou ‘iate au.
43014007	Ka ne mou a‘usia ‘a e ‘ilo‘i ‘o‘oku, pehē te mou lāu‘ilo‘i mo ‘eku Tamai; pea ‘oku mou kamata ‘eni ke ‘ilo ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio, pea kuo mou mātā ia.
43014008	Pea lea ‘a Filipe ki ai, ‘eiki, tuku ke mau sio ki he Tamai, pea kuo mau fiemālie leva.
43014009	Pea lea ‘a Sīsū kiate ia, Ko futu ‘eku ‘iate kimoutolu, pea kuo te‘eki koā ke ke ‘ilo au, Filipe? Ko ia kuo ne mātā au, kuo ne mātā ‘a e Tamai; pea fēfē ai ho‘o pehē, Tuku ke mau sio ki he Tamai?
43014010	‘Ikai ‘oku ke tui, ‘oku ou ‘i he Tamai, pea ko e Tamai ‘oku ‘iate au: ko e ngaahi lea ‘oku ou fai kiate kimoutolu, ‘oku ‘ikai te u lea‘aki meiate au. Ka ko e Tamai ‘oku ne fai ‘ene ngaahi ngāue, he‘ene nofo‘ia au.
43014011	Mou tui kiate au, ko au ‘oku ou ‘i he Tamai, mo e Tamai ‘iate au: pea ka ‘ikai, pea mou tui koe‘uhi ko ‘ene ngaahi ngāue.
43014012	Ko au ē, ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Ko ia ‘oku tui pīkitai kiate au, ko e ngaahi ngāue ‘oku ou fai ‘e fai ‘e he toko taha ko ia foki; ‘io, te ne fai ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku hulu atu ‘i he ngaahi me‘a ni; koe‘uhiā ko ‘eku ‘alu ki he Tamai.
43014013	Pea ‘ilonga ha me‘a te mou kole ‘i hoku hingoa, te u fai ia, koe‘uhi ke fakalāngilangi‘i ‘a e Tamai ‘i he ‘Alo.
43014014	Neongo pē ko e hā ha me‘a te mou kole meiate au ‘i hoku hingoa, te u fai ia.
43014015	Kapau ‘oku mou ‘ofa kiate au, te mou tauhi ‘eku ngaahi fekau ‘a‘aku.
43014016	Pea te u tala ki he Tamai, pea te ne foaki kiate kimoutolu ha Taukapo ‘e toko taha, koe‘uhi ke ne ‘iate kimoutolu ‘o ta‘engata; ‘io, ko e Laumālie ‘o e Mo‘oni;
43014017	‘a ia ‘oku ‘ikai ke fa‘a ma‘u ‘e māmani, koe‘uhi ‘oku ‘ikai te ne sio kiate ia, pe fai ke ‘ilo ia: ka ‘oku mou fai ke ‘ilo ia ‘e kimoutolu; he ‘oku ne nofo ma‘u mo kimoutolu, pea ‘oku ne ‘i. homou loto.
43014018	‘E ‘ikai te u ‘alu ‘o tuku kimoutolu ke tuēnoa: ‘oku ou ha‘u pē kiate kimoutolu.
43014019	‘Oku toe si‘i pea ‘ikai kei sio kiate au ‘a māmani; ka ka sio ai pē kiate au ‘e kimoutolu, koe‘uhi ‘oku ou mo‘ui pea te mou mo‘ui ai pē.
43014020	‘I he ‘aho ko ia te mou ‘ilo, ko au ‘oku ou ‘i he‘eku Tamai, pea mo kimoutolu ‘iate au, pea mo au ‘iate kimoutolu.
43014021	Ko ia ‘oku ma‘u ‘eku ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni, mo tauhi ki ai, ko ia ia ‘oku ‘ofa kiate au: pea ko ia ‘oku ‘ofa kiate au ‘e ‘ofeina ia ‘e he‘eku Tamai, pea te u ‘ofa mo au kia ia, pea te u fakahaa‘i kiate ia.
43014022	Pea lea ki ai ‘a Siutasi–ka na‘e ‘ikai ko ‘Isikaliote–‘Eiki, ko e hā kuo pehē ai, ho‘o teu fakahaa‘i koe kiate kimautolu, kae ‘ikai ki māmani?
43014023	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū ‘o ne pehē ki ai, Kapau ‘oku ‘ofa ha taha kiate au, te ne tauhi ‘eku lea: pea ‘e ‘ofa kiate ia ‘a ‘eku Tamai, pea te ma omi kiate ia, ‘o ma nofo‘anga taha mo ia.
43014024	Ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai ke ‘ofa kiate au, ‘oku ‘ikai te ne tauhi ‘eke ngaahi lea: pea ko e lea ‘oku mou fanongo ki ai ‘oku ‘ikai ‘a‘aku, ka ‘a e Tamai na‘a ne fekau mai au.
43014025	Ko e ngaahi me‘a ni kuo u tala atu ‘i he‘eku kei ‘iate kimoutolu.
43014026	Ka ko e Taukapo, ko e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni, ‘a ia ‘e fekau mai ‘e he Tamai ‘i hoku hingoa, ko e Toko Taha ko ia te ne ako kiate kimoutolu ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē, pea te ne fakamanatu kiate kimoutolu ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē kuo u lea‘aki kiate kimoutolu.
43014027	Ko ‘eku ‘alu ‘eni, ka u tuku ha fiemālie kiate kimoutolu; ko ha fiemālie ‘a‘aku ‘oku ou foaki atu kiate kimoutolu: ‘oku ‘ikai hangē ko e foaki ‘a māmani ‘a ‘eku foaki kiate kimoutolu. ‘Oua na‘a tuku ke puputu‘u homou loto, ‘uma‘ā ha‘ane manavahē.
43014028	Ne mou fanongo ki he‘eku pehē atu, Ko ‘eku ‘alu ni kau ha‘u kiate kimoutolu. Ka ne mou ‘ofa kiate au, pehē te mou fiefia ‘i he‘eku ‘alu ki he Tamai; koe‘uhi ‘oku lahi ‘a e Tamai ‘iate au.
43014029	Pea kuo u tala ni ia kiate kimoutolu ‘i he te‘eki ke hoko, koe‘uhi ‘oka hoko mai ke mou tui.
43014030	‘E; ‘ikai te u toe talanoa lahi mo kimoutolu: he ‘oku ha‘u ‘a e ‘eiki ‘o māmani, pea tala‘ehai ‘oku ‘i ai ha‘ane momo‘i me‘a ‘iate au;
43014031	ka koe‘uhi pē ke ‘ilo ‘e māmani ‘oku ou ‘ofa ki he Tamai, pea hangē ko hoku tu‘utu‘uni ‘e he Tamai, ‘oku pehē ‘eku fai. Mo u tu‘u, ke tau ‘alu ‘i heni.
43015001	Ko au ko e uaine mo‘onia, pea ko ‘eku Tamai ko e tauhi ngoue ia.
43015002	‘Ilonga ha va‘a ‘iate au ‘oku ‘ikai fua, ‘oku ne motuhi ia: pea ‘ilonga ha va‘a ‘oku fua, ‘oku ne ‘auhani ia, ke ‘āsili ‘ene fua.
43015003	Kuo mou tafe sino‘ivai ‘eni kimoutolu, ko e me‘a ‘i he lea kuo u fai kiate kimoutolu.
43015004	‘Ē, ‘ai ke mou nofo ma‘u ‘iate au, mo au ‘iate kimoutolu. Hangē ‘oku ‘ikai ke fa‘a fua ‘a e va‘a ‘iate ia pē, ‘o kapau ‘e ‘ikai nofo ma‘u ‘i he vaine; pehē foki, ‘e ‘ikai te mou lava ‘e kimoutolu, ‘o kapau ‘e ‘ikai te mou nofo ma‘u ‘iate au.
43015005	Ko au pē ko e vaine, ko kimoutolu ko e ngaahi va‘a: ko ia ‘oku nofo ma‘u ‘iate au, mo au ‘iate ‘ia, ‘oku fua lahi ‘a e toko taha ko ia: he ka māvae mo au, ‘oku ‘ikai te mou fa‘a fai ha me‘a.
43015006	Ka ai ha taha ne ‘ikai nofo ma‘u ‘iate au, ne li‘aki atu hangē ko e va‘a na, pea ne mae; pea ‘oku nau tānaki ‘a e ngaahi me‘a pehē, ‘o laku ki he afi, pea ‘oku vela.
43015007	Kapau te mou nofo ma‘u ‘iate au, pea kapau ‘e nofo ma‘u ‘eku ngaahi lea ‘iate kimoutolu, pea neongo pe ko e hā te mou loto ki ai, mou kole, pea ‘e fai kiate kimoutolu.
43015008	Ko e me‘a ko ia kuo fakalāngilangi‘i ai ‘a ‘eku Tamai, koe‘uhi ke iku ki ho‘omou fua lahi, mo ho‘omou mātu‘aki hoko ko e kau ako ‘a‘aku.
43015009	Hangē ko e ‘ofa‘i au ‘e he Tamai, kuo pehē ‘eku ‘ofa‘i kimoutolu: mo u nofo ma‘u ‘i he ‘ofa ko ia ‘a‘aku.
43015010	Kapau te mou tauhi ‘eku ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni, te mou nofo ma‘u ‘i he‘eku ‘ofa; ‘o hangē foki kuo u tauhi ‘e au ‘a e ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni ‘a e Tamai, pea u nofo ma‘u ‘i he ‘ofa ‘a‘ana.
43015011	Ko e ngaahi me‘a ni kuo u tala atu, koe‘uhi ke ‘iate kimoutolu ‘eku fiefia, pea ke kakato ‘a e fiefia ‘amoutolu.
43015012	Ko eni ia ‘a e tu‘utu‘uni ‘a‘aku, Ke mou fe‘ofa‘aki, ‘o hangē ko e ‘ofa ne u fai kiate kimoutolu.
43015013	Tala‘ehai ‘oku ai ha ‘ofa ‘a ha taha ‘e lahi ‘i he ‘ofa ko ē, ke ne li‘aki ‘ene mo‘ui koe‘uhi ko hono ngaahi kaume‘a.
43015014	Ko hoku ngaahi kaume‘a ‘a kimoutolu ‘o kapau ‘oku mou fai ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ou tu‘utu‘uni atu.
43015015	‘Oku ‘ikai te u kei lau kimoutolu ko e kau tamaio‘eiki; he tala‘ehai ‘oku ‘ilo ‘e he tamaio‘eiki ‘a e me‘a ‘oku fai ‘e he‘ene ‘eiki: ka kuo u ui kimoutolu ko hoku ngaahi kaume‘a; koe‘uhi ‘ilonga ha me‘a ne u fanongo mei he‘eku Tamai kuo u faka‘ilo kiate kimoutolu.
43015016	Na‘e ‘ikai ko kimoutolu na‘e fili au, ka ko au na‘a ku fili kimoutolu, pea na‘a ku fakanofo kimoutolu, ke mou ‘alu kimoutolu ‘o fua, pea ke nofo ma‘u homou fua; koe‘uhiā ke ‘ilonga ha me‘a te mou kole mei he Tamai ‘i hoku hingoa ke ne ‘atu ia.
43015017	Ko e ngaahi me‘a ko eni kuo u tu‘utu‘uni atu, koe‘uhi ke mou fe‘ofa‘aki.
43015018	Kapau ‘oku fehi‘a ‘a māmani kiate kimoutolu, manatu na‘e mu‘a noa pē ‘ene fehi‘a kiate au ‘iate kimoutolu.
43015019	Ka ne ‘o māmani ‘a kimoutolu, pehē ‘e ‘ofa ‘a māmani ki he me‘a ‘a‘ana: ka ko e me‘a ‘i he ‘ikai ‘o māmani ‘a kimoutolu kae, kehe, ko e fili kimoutolu ‘e au mei māmani, ko hono ‘uhinga ē ‘oku fehi‘a ai ‘a māmani kiate kimoutolu.
43015020	Manatu he lea na‘a ku fai kiate kimoutolu, ‘Oku ‘ikai ha tamaio‘eiki ‘e lahi ‘i he‘ene ‘eiki. Kapau kuo nau fakatanga‘i au, te nau fakatanga‘i ‘a kimoutolu foki; kapau kuo nau tauhi ‘a e lea ‘a‘aku, te nau tauhi ‘a e lea ‘amoutolu foki.
43015021	Ka ko e ngaahi me‘a ko ia kotoa te nau fai kiate kimoutolu koe‘uhi ko hoku hingoa, koe‘uhi ‘oku ‘ikai te nau ‘ilo ‘a ia na‘a ne fekau mai au.
43015022	Ka ne ‘ikai te u ha‘u ‘o lea kiate kinautolu, pehē ne ‘ikai ha‘anau angahala: ka ko eni ‘oku ‘ikai ha kofu ki he‘enau angahala.
43015023	Ko ia ‘oku ne fehi‘a kiate au, ‘oku ne fehi‘a ki he‘eku Tamai foki.
43015024	Ka ne ‘ikai te u fai ‘i honau lotolotonga ‘a e ngaahi ngāue ‘a ia ‘oku te‘eki ke fai ‘e ha taha, pehē ne ‘ikai ha‘anau angahala: ka ko eni kuo nau mamata pea kuo nau fehi‘a kiate au mo ‘eku Tamai fakatou‘osi.
43015025	Ka koe‘uhiā pē ke fakamo‘oni ki he lea kuo tohi ‘i he‘enau lao, Na‘a nau fehi‘a kiate au tu‘unga‘a pē.
43015026	‘Oka hoko mai ‘a e Taukapo, ‘a ia te u fekau atu ‘e au mei he Tamai, ‘io, ko e Laumālie ‘o e Mo‘oni, ‘a ia ‘oku ne ‘alu atu mei he Tamai, te ne fakamatala ‘e he toko taha ko ia kiate au;
43015027	pea ko e kau fai fakamatala foki ‘a kimoutolu, koe‘uhi kuo mou ‘iate au mei he kamata‘anga.
43016001	KO E ngaahi me‘a ni kuo u tala atu, koe‘uhi ke ‘oua te mou tūkia.
43016002	Te nau hifo kimoutolu mei he falelotu: ‘io, ‘oku ‘unu mai ha taimi, ‘a ia ‘e ‘ilonga ai ha taha te ne tāmate‘i kimoutolu, te ne lau kuo ne fai ha feilaulau ki he ‘Otua.
43016003	Pea te nau fai pehē, koe‘uhi kuo ‘ikai te nau ‘ilo ‘a e Tamai, ‘uma‘ā au,
43016004	‘ē, ma‘u ā! ka kuo u ki‘i lea pehē, koe‘uhi ‘oka hokosia hono taimi ke mou manatu na‘a ku tala atu ia ‘e au. Ka na‘e ‘ikai te u tala atu ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia mei he kamata‘anga, koe‘uhi na‘a ku ‘iate kimoutolu.
43016005	Ka ko eni ‘oku ou ‘alu atu kiate ia na‘a ne fekau mai au; pea tala‘ehai ‘oku fehu‘i mai ‘e hamou taha, Ko si‘o ‘alu ki fē?
43016006	Ka koe‘uhi kuo u tala ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko eni kiate kimoutolu, kuo fonu kotoa leva homou loto ‘i he mamahi.
43016007	Ka ko si‘i mo‘oni ‘eni ‘oku ou tala atu: Ko hono lelei kiate kimoutolu ‘a e hiki ‘a‘aku: pea kapau ‘e ‘ikai te u hiki, pea ‘e ‘ikai ha‘u ‘a e Taukapo kiate kimoutolu; ka ‘o kapau te u ‘alu, te u fekau ia kiate kimoutolu.
43016008	Pea ‘i he ha‘u ‘a e Toko Taha ko ia te ne lea o‘o ki māmani ‘i he angahala, mo e mā‘oni‘oni, mo e fakamaau:
43016009	‘i he angahala, koe‘uhiā ko e ‘ikai te nau tui pīkitai kiate au;
43016010	‘i he mā‘oni‘oni, koe‘uhi ko ‘eku ‘alu ki he Tamai, pea ‘ikai te mou kei sio kiate au.
43016011	Pea ‘i he fakamaau, koe‘uhi kuo fakamāu‘i ‘a e ‘eiki ‘o e maama ko eni.
43016012	‘Oku kei toe lahi ‘eku me‘a ke lea ki ai kiate kimoutolu, ka ‘oku ‘ikai te mou fa‘a kātaki ‘i he taimi ni.
43016013	Ka ‘oka hoko mai ‘a e Toko Taha ko ia, ‘a e Laumālie ‘o e Mo‘oni, te ne tataki kimoutolu ki he mo‘oni, hono kotoa; he tala‘ehai te ne lea ‘iate ia pē; ka ‘ilonga ha me‘a te ne fanongo ki ai, te ne lea‘aki: pea te ne fakahā kiate kimoutolu ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku tu‘unuku mai.
43016014	Ko au pē te ne fakalāngilangi‘i ‘e he toko taha ko ia: he te ne to‘o mei he me‘a ‘a‘ata, ‘o ne fakahaa‘ia kiate kimoutolu.
43016015	Ko e me‘a kotoa pē ‘oku ‘a e tamai ‘oku ‘a‘aku ia: ko hono ‘uhinga ia na‘a ku pehē ai, te ne to‘o mei he me‘a ‘a‘ata ‘o fakahā kiate kimoutolu.
43016016	Toe si‘i, pea ‘e ‘ikai te mou kei mātā au: pea toe si‘i atu, pea te mou sio kiate au.
43016017	Ko ia na‘e fepehē‘aki ai ha ni‘ihi ‘o ‘ene kau ako, Ko e hā ‘eni ‘oku ne lau mai, Toe si‘i pea ‘e ‘ikai te mou mātā au: pea toe si‘i atu, pea te mou sio kiate au: pea mo ‘ene lau, Ko ‘eku ‘alu ni ki he Tamai?
43016018	Pea nau pehē ai, Ko e hā tū ‘a e me‘a ni, ‘a ‘ene pehē, Toe si‘i? ‘oku ‘ikai te mau ‘ilo pē ko e hā ‘a e ‘uhinga ‘o ‘ene lea.
43016019	Pea mea‘i ‘e Sīsū ‘oku nau fie fehu‘i kiate ia, pea ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Ko eni koā ‘a e me‘a ‘oku mau fakakikihi ki ai, ‘a ‘eku pehē, Toe si‘i, pea ‘ikai te mou mātā au: pea toe si‘i atu, pea te mou sio kiate au, ‘o?
43016020	Ko eni, Ko au ē, ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Te mou tangi ‘e kimoutolu mo tangilāulau, ka ‘e fiefia ‘a māmani: te mou mamahi ka ‘e liliu ho‘omou mamahi ko e fiefia.
43016021	Ka langā ha fefine ‘oku ne ongo‘i mamahi, koe‘uhi kuo hokosia hono taimi: ka ka fā‘ele‘i leva ‘a e tama, ‘oku ‘ikai te ne kei manatu ki he‘ene faingata‘a‘ia, he‘ene fiefia ‘i he fanau‘i ‘o ha tangata ki māmani.
43016022	Pehē, ‘oku mou ongo‘i mamahi ‘e kimoutolu ‘i he taimi ni: ka te u toe sio kiate kimoutolu, pea ‘e fiefia homou loto, pea ko ho‘omou fiefia ‘e ‘ikai ‘ave ‘e ha taha.
43016023	Pea ‘i he ‘aho ko ia ‘e ‘ikai te mou fehu‘i ha me‘a kiate au. Ko au ē, ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Kapau te mou kole ha me‘a mei he Tamai, te ne ‘atu kiate kimoutolu ‘i hoku hingoa.
43016024	Te‘eki te mou kole ha me‘a ‘e taha ‘i hoku hingoa, ‘o a‘u mai ki he taimi ni. ‘Ē, mou kole, pea te mou ma‘u, koe‘uhi ke kakato ho‘omou fiefia.
43016025	Ko e ngaahi me‘a ni kuo u fai fakatātā ‘eku tala kiate kimoutolu: ‘oku ‘unu mai ha taimi, ‘a ia ‘e ‘ikai te u kei fai fakatātā ai ‘eku tala me‘a kiate kimoutolu, ka te u fakamatala ‘a e Tamai kiate kimoutolu, ‘o talatalatonu.
43016026	‘I he ‘aho ko ia te mou fai ho‘omou kole ‘i hoku hingoa: pea ‘oku ‘ikai te u pehē te u fakakolekolea ‘a e Tamai koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu:
43016027	he ko e Tamai ‘oku ne ‘ofa kiate kimoutolu fakaeia pē, koe‘uhiā kuo mou ‘ofa kiate au, pea kuo mou tui na‘a ku ‘alu atu mei he Tamai.
43016028	Na‘a ku ‘alu atu mei he Tamai, pea kuo u ha‘u ki māmani: ko eni ‘oku ou tuku ‘a māmani ‘o u ‘alu ki he Tamai.
43016029	Pea lea ‘ene kau ako, Ta ko eni ‘oku ke lea fakahangatonu mai, pea ‘oku ‘ikai te ke momo‘i lau fakatātā.
43016030	‘Oku mau ‘ilo ‘eni ‘oku ke mea‘i ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē, pea ‘oku ‘ikai te ke ‘oua ke fehu‘i ‘e ha taha kiate koe: ko e me‘a ko ia ‘oku mau tui ai na‘a ke ha‘u mei he ‘Otua.
43016031	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū kiate kinautolu, ‘Oku mou tui ‘eni koā?
43016032	‘Ē, ‘oku ‘unu mai ha taimi, ‘io, kuo hokosia, ‘a ia ‘e vetekina kimoutolu takitaha ki hono ‘api tonu, pea te mou tuku au ke toko taha: ka tala‘ehai ‘oku ou toko taha, he ko e Tamai ‘oku ne ‘iate au.
43016033	Ko e ngaahi me‘a ni kuo u tala kiate kimoutolu, Koe‘uhi ke mou ma‘u ‘iate au ha Fiemālie. ‘I māmani ‘oku mou ma‘u fakamamahi; ka mou lototo‘a pē; kuo u ikuna ‘a māmani ‘e au.
43017001	PEA kuo fai ‘e Sīsū ‘a e ngaahi lea ko ia, pea ne tāngaki hake ki he langi, ‘o ne folofola ‘o pehē, ‘ala Tamai, kuo hokosia ‘a e taimi; ke ke fakalāngilangi‘i ho ‘Alo, koe‘uhi ke fakalāngilangi‘i ‘e he ‘Alo ‘a e ‘Afiona:
43017002	hangē ā na‘a ke tuku kiate ia ‘a e pule ki he kakano kotoa pē, koe‘uhi ko e me‘a kātoa ne ke foaki kiate ia, ke ne foaki kiate kinautolu ‘a e mo‘ui ta‘engata.
43017003	Pea ko eni ia ‘a e mo‘ui ta‘engata, ke nau fai ke ‘ilo koe ko e ‘Otua mo‘onia pē taha, pea mo Sīsū ne ke fekau mai ko e Mīsaia.
43017004	Kuo u fakalāngilangi‘i koe ‘i māmani; he kuo u faka‘osi ‘a e ngāue na‘a ke tuku kiate au ke u fai.
43017005	Pea ko eni, ‘alā Tamai, ke ke fakalāngilangi‘i au ‘e koe, he fakataha mo e ‘Afiona, ‘aki ‘a e lāngilangi na‘a ku ma‘u ‘i he te‘eki ke tu‘u ‘a māmani ‘i he‘eku feangai mo koe.
43017006	Kuo u fakamahino ho huafa ki he kakai na‘a ke foaki kiate au mei māmani: na‘e ‘o‘ou ‘a kinautolu, pea ne ke foaki ‘a kinautolu kiate au: pea kuo nau tauhi ho‘o folofola.
43017007	Kuo nau ‘ilo ‘eni ‘oku meiate koe ‘a e ngaahi me‘a kotoa pē na‘a ke foaki mai.
43017008	He ko e ngaahi lea na‘a ke tuku mai kiate au, kuo u tuku kiate kinautolu; pea kuo nau tali ia, pea kuo nau ‘ilo mo‘oni na‘a ku ha‘u mei he ‘Afiona, pea kuo nau tui na‘e fekau mai au ‘e he ‘Afiona.
43017009	‘Oku ou fakakolekole ‘e au koe‘uhi ko kinautolu; ‘oku ‘ikai ko ‘eku fai koe‘uhi ko māmani, ka koe‘uhi pē ko kinautolu ne ke foaki mai; he ‘oku ‘o‘ou ‘a kinautolu:
43017010	(‘Io, ko ‘eku ngaahi me‘a kotoa pē ‘oku ‘a‘au, pea ko ho‘o ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ‘a‘aku) pea kuo fakalāngilangi‘i au ‘iate kinautolu.
43017011	Pea ‘oku ‘ikai te u kei ‘i māmani, ka ‘oku ‘i māmani ‘a e tu‘unga me‘a ni, pea ko ‘eku ‘alu ‘aku ki he ‘Afiona. ‘E Tamai Toputapu, ke ke tauhi ‘a kinautolu ni ‘i ho huafa, ‘a e huafa ne ke tuku kiate au, koe‘uhi ke nau taha, ‘o hangē ko kitaua.
43017012	Lolotonga ‘eku ‘iate kinautolu na‘a ku tauhi kinautolu ‘e au ‘i ho huafa, ‘a e huafa kuo ke tuku mai: ‘io, na‘a ku le‘ohi kinautolu, pea kuo ‘ikai mole hanau taha, ngata pē ‘i he hako ‘o mala, koe‘uhiā pē ke fakamo‘oni ki he Tohitapu.
43017013	Pea ko ‘eku ‘alu atu ‘eni kiate koe; pea ‘oku ou lea pehē ‘i māmani, koe‘uhi ke nau ma‘u ‘eku fiefia ‘iate kinautolu kuo kakato.
43017014	Ko au kuo u tuku kiate kinautolu ho‘o folofola; pea ko māmani na‘a ne fehi‘a kiate kinautolu, koe‘uhi ‘oku ‘ikai te nau ‘o māmani, ‘o hangē ko au, ‘oku ‘ikai te u ‘o māmani.
43017015	‘Oku ‘ikai te u pehē, ke ke to‘o kinautolu mei māmani, ka ke ke ta‘ofi kinautolu mei he Fili.
43017016	‘Oku ‘ikai te nau ‘o māmani, hangē ko au, ‘oku ‘ikai te u ‘o māman
43017017	Fakatapu‘i kinautolu ‘i he mo‘oni: ko e folofola ‘a‘au ko e mo‘oni ia.
43017018	Hangē na‘a ke fekau au ki māmani, ko au foki na‘a ku fekau kinautolu ki māmani.
43017019	Pea koe‘uhi ko kinautolu, ko ia ‘oku ou fakatāpui au ‘e au, koe‘uhi ke hoko ‘a kinautolu foki ko e koto fakatapu mo‘oni.
43017020	Ka ‘oku ‘ikai ko kinautolu ni pē ‘oku kau ki ai ‘eku kole, ka ‘oku kau foki kiate kinautolu ‘e tui pīkitai kiate au ko e me‘a ‘i he‘enau malanga.
43017021	Ko ‘eku kole ke nau taha pē ‘a kinautolu kotoa pē; hangē ā ‘oku ke ‘iate au, ‘alā Tamai, mo au ‘iate koe, ke pehē foki ‘enau ‘iate kitaua: koe‘uhiā ke tui ‘e māmani na‘e fekau mai au ‘e ho‘o ‘Afio.
43017022	Pea ko e lāngilangi kuo ke tuku mai kiate au, kuo u tuku ia kiate kinautolu, ke nau taha ‘o hangē ‘oku ta taha:
43017023	ko au ‘iate kinautolu, mo koe ‘iate au, koe‘uhi ke fakahaohaoa ‘a kinautolu ka nau taha; koe‘uhiā ke faifai pea ‘ilo ‘e māmani na‘e fekau mai au ‘e ho‘o ‘Afio, pea kuo ke ‘ofa kiate kinautolu, ‘o hangē ko ho‘o ‘ofa kiate au.
43017024	‘Alā Tamai, ko e me‘a kuo ke foaki mai, ko hoku loto ki ai, ko e potu ‘oku ou ‘i ai au, ke nau ‘i ai ‘a kinautolu foki mo au; ke nau siofia ‘a e lāngilangi ‘o‘oku, ‘a ia kuo ke foaki mai: he na‘a ke ‘ofa kiate au ‘i he te‘eki ke tanu pou ‘a māmani.
43017025	‘E Tamai Mā‘oni‘oni, ko māmani foki na‘e ‘ikai lava‘i ‘a e ‘ilo‘i ‘o ho‘o ‘Afio; ka ko au na‘a ku lava‘i ho ‘ilo‘i, pea ko e tu‘unga me‘a ni kuo nau lava ke ‘ilo ne fekau mai au ‘e ho‘o ‘afio.
43017026	Pea kuo u faka‘ilo kiate kinautolu ho huafa, ‘io, pea te u faka‘ilo pē: koe‘uhi ke ‘iate kinautolu ‘a e ‘ofa kuo ke ‘ofa ‘aki kiate au, pea ke u ‘iate kinautolu foki mo au.
43018001	PEA hili ‘ene folofola pehē ‘a Sīsū, Na‘a ne ‘alu atu mo ‘ene kau ako, ‘o ne laka ki he tu‘a vai-uinitā ko Kitilone; pea ko e potu ko ia na‘e tu‘u ai ha ngoue tapu, pea ne hū ki ai, ‘e ia mo ‘ene kau ako.
43018002	Ka ko Siutasi foki, ko hono lavaki, na‘a ne ‘ilo ki he potu: he na‘e fa‘a fakataha ki ai ‘a Sīsū mo ‘ene kau ako.
43018003	Pea kuo ma‘u leva ‘e Siutasi ‘a e vāhengatau, pea mo ha kau ‘ōfisa mei he hou‘eiki taula‘eiki mo e kau Fālesi, pea ne ha‘u ki he potu ko ia mo e ngaahi tūhulu mo e ngaahi maama mo e mahafu.
43018004	Pea ko Sīsū, neongo na‘a ne mea‘i ‘a e ngaahi me‘a kotoa pē ‘oku tu‘unuku mai kiate ia, ka na‘a ne hā‘ele atu pē, ‘o ne folofola kiate kinautolu, Ko hai ‘oku mou kumi ki ai?
43018005	Pea nau tali ki ai, Ko Sīsū mei Nāsaleti. Pea folofola ia kiate kinautolu, Ko au ‘eni. (Pea na‘e tu‘u mo kinautolu foki ‘a Siutasi ko hono lavaki.)
43018006	Pea ‘i he‘ene me‘a ko ia kiate kinautolu, ‘o pehē, Ko au ‘eni, na‘a nau holomui, ‘o tō ki he kelekele.
43018007	Pea ne toe fehu‘i ai kiate kinautolu, Ko hai ‘oku mou kumi ki ai? Pea nau pehē, Ko Sīsū mei Nāsaleti.
43018008	Pea tali ‘a Sīsū, Ne u tala kiate kimoutolu, Ko au ‘eni: ko ia kapau ko au ‘oku mou kumi ki ai, pea tukuange ‘a e tu‘unga me‘a ni ke nau ‘alu.
43018009	Ko e fai ia koe‘uhiā ke fakamo‘oni ki he folofola na‘e ne fai, ‘o pehē, Ko kinautolu kuo ke foaki mai, ne ‘ikai te u tuku hanau taha ke mole.
43018010	Pea ko Saimone–‘a Maka foki–‘a ia kuo ma‘u heletā, na‘a ne unuhi ia, ‘o ne taa‘i ‘a e tamaio‘eiki ‘a e Taula‘eiki Lahi, ‘o ne tu‘usi hono lau‘i telinga to‘omata‘u, Ko e hingoa ‘o e tamaio‘eiki ko Malikusi.
43018011	Pea me‘a ‘a Sīsū kia Pita, ‘ai ‘a e heletā ki hono ‘ai‘anga: ko e pehē koā ke ‘oua na‘a ku inu ‘a e ipu kuo tuku mai ‘e he Tamai!
43018012	Ko ia ko e vāhengatau mo e ‘eikitau mo e kau ‘ōfisa ‘a ha‘a Siu na‘a nau puke ‘a Sīsū, ‘o ha‘i ia:
43018013	‘o nau motu‘a taki ia kia ‘Ānasi, he ko e tamai ia ‘a e uaifi ‘o Kaiafasi, ‘a ia na‘e Taula‘eiki Lahi ‘i he ta‘u ko ia.
43018014	Pea ko Kaiafasi foki ia na‘a ne fale‘i ‘a ha‘a Siu, ‘o pehē, Ko hono lelei ke mate ha tangata ‘e taha koe‘uhi ko e fa‘ahinga tapu.
43018015	Pea na‘e muimui kia Sīsū ‘a Saimone Pita, pea pehē mo ha tama ako ‘e taha: pea ko e tama ako ko ia ko e fe‘iloaki ‘o e Taula‘eiki Lahi, pea hū fakataha ia mo Sīsū ki he loto‘ā ‘o e Taula‘eiki Lahi.
43018016	Ka ka tu‘u ‘a Pita ‘i tua‘ā, ‘i he matapā, Ko ia na‘e ‘alu atu ‘a e tama ako ‘e taha, ‘a ia ko e fe‘iloaki ‘o e Taula‘eiki Lahi, ‘o ne lea ki he fefine na‘e le‘o matapā, ‘o ne fakahū mai ‘a Pita.
43018017	Pea lea ai kia Pita ‘e he kaunanga na‘e le‘o matapā, Ko koe foki ko e taha ‘i he kau ako ‘a e tangata na, ‘o? Pea pehē ‘e ia, ‘Oku ‘ikai.
43018018	Pea na‘e tutu‘u ai ‘a e kau tamaio‘eiki mo e kau ‘ōfisa, kuo nau tafu ha afi malala; he na‘e momoko: pea nau mūmū ai: pea na‘e ‘iate kinautolu ‘a Pita foki, ‘oku ne tu‘u ‘o mūmū.
43018019	Pea fakafehu‘i ‘e he Taula‘eiki Lahi kia Sīsū, ki he‘ene kau ako, pea mo ‘ene tokāteline.
43018020	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū ki ai, Ko e toko taha au kuo u lea ‘asi, ‘o fai ki māmani; ko ‘eku ako na‘e fai ma‘u pē ‘i ha falelotu, kae‘uma‘ā ‘i he Temipale, ‘a e potu ‘oku fakataha ki ai ‘a ha‘a Siu kotoa; pea na‘e ‘ikai te u fai fūfūnaki ha momo‘i lea.
43018021	Ko e hā ‘oku ke fehu‘i ai kiate au? fehu‘i pē kiate kinautolu kuo fanongo kiate au, pe ko e hā ‘eku lea na‘e fai kiate kinautolu: ‘ē, ‘oku lāu‘ilo ‘e kinautolu ni ‘a e ngaahi me‘a kuo u lea‘aki.
43018022	Pea ‘i he‘ene me‘a pehē, pea ko e toko taha ‘i he kau ‘ōfisa na‘e tu‘u ai na‘a ne ‘ai ha pekalae ‘o Sīsū, ‘o ne pehē, ‘Oku pehē koā ho‘o tali ki he Taula‘eiki Lahi?
43018023	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū ki ai, Kapau kuo kovi ha‘aku lea, pe‘i fakahaa‘i ‘a e kovi: ka ‘o kapau kuo lelei, pea ko e hā kuo ke taa‘i ai au?
43018024	Pea fekau ai ‘e ‘Ānasi ke ‘ave ha‘isia ia kia Kaiafasi ko e Taula‘eiki Lahi.
43018025	Pea lolotonga ia mo e tu‘u ‘a Saimone Pita, ‘o mūmū. Pea nau pehē ai kiate ia, Ko koe foki ko e toko taha ‘i he‘ene kau ako, ‘o? Ka ka faka‘ikai ‘e ia, ‘o ne pehē, ‘Oku ‘ikai.
43018026	Pea lea ha toko taha ‘o e kau tamaio‘eiki ‘a e Taula‘eiki Lahi, ‘a ia ko e toko taha na‘e kāinga mo e tangata ne tu‘usi hono telinga ‘e Pita, ‘o ne pehē, ‘Ikai na‘a ku mātu‘aki sio kiate koe ‘i he ngoue tapu fakataha mo ia?
43018027	Pea toe faka‘ikai ai ‘e Pita: pea ‘u‘ua leva ‘a e moa.
43018028	Pea nau taki ai ‘a Sīsū mei he fale ‘o Kaiafasi ki he Palasi: pea na‘e kei hengihengi; pea na‘e ‘ikai te nau hū ‘e kinautolu ki he Palasi, koe‘uhi ke ‘oua te nau ta‘ema‘a ai, ka nau kai ‘a e Pāsova.
43018029	Ko ia na‘e ‘alu atu ai ‘a Pailato ki tu‘a kiate kinautolu, pea ne pehē, Ko e hā ‘a e talatalaaki ‘oku mou ha‘u mo kimoutolu ki he tangata ni?
43018030	Pea nau tali ‘o nau pehē kiate ia, Ka ne ‘ikai ko e siana fai kovi ia, tala‘ehai te mau tukuange kiate koe.
43018031	Pea me‘a ai ‘a Pailato kiate kinautolu, Pe‘i ‘ave ia ‘e kimoutolu, ‘o mou fakamaau ‘o fakatatau ki ho‘omou lao. Pea lea ai kiate ia ‘e ha‘a Siu, Ka ‘oku ‘ikai ngofua ‘emau tāmate‘i ha taha–
43018032	ko e fai pē ke fakamo‘oni ki he folofola ‘a Sīsū, ‘a ia ne ne fai, he‘ene fakatātā atu ‘a e mate‘anga te ne pekia ai.
43018033	Ko ia na‘e toe hū ai ‘a Pailato ki he Palasi, ‘o ne ui ange ‘a Sīsū, ‘o ne pehē ki ai, Ko koe ko e Tu‘i ‘o e kakai Siu, ‘ō?
43018034	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū, Ko ho‘o lea pehē ‘iate koe, pe ‘oku ‘i ai ha ni‘ihi kuo nau fakahā pehe‘i au kiate koe?
43018035	Pea tali ‘a Pailato, He ko e Siu au? Ko ho kakai ‘o‘ou mo e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki kuo nau tuku koe kiate au. Ko e hā kuo ke fai?
43018036	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū, Ko hoku pule‘anga ‘oku ‘ikai ‘o e maama ko eni: ka ne ‘o e maama ko eni ‘a hoku pule‘anga, pehē ‘e tau ha‘aku kau ‘ōfisa ke ta‘ofi hoku tukuange ki ha‘a Siu: ka ko eni, ko hoku pule‘anga ‘oku ‘ikai ‘o ‘eni.
43018037	Ko ia na‘e lea ai ‘a Pailato kiate ia, pea tā ko e tu‘i koe, ‘ō? Pea tali ‘e Sīsū, Ko ia pē ‘oku ke me‘a: ko e tu‘i au. Ko e me‘a ko ia na‘e fanau‘i ai au, pea ko e me‘a ko ia kuo u ha‘u ai ki māmani, koe‘uhi ke u fakahaa‘i ‘a e mo‘oni. Ko ia kotoa pē ‘oku ‘o e mo‘oni ‘oku ne tokanga ki hoku le‘o.
43018038	Pea me‘a ‘e Pailato kiate ia, Ko e hā tū ‘a e mo‘oni? Pea ‘i he‘ene lea pehē, na‘a ne toe ‘alu kitu‘a ki ha‘a Siu, ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Ko au ‘oku ‘ikai te u momo‘i ‘ilo ha hia ‘a e tangata ni.
43018039	Ka ko eni, ‘oku ‘i ai homou anga foki, ke u vete atu ha pōpula ‘e taha ‘i he Pāsova: pea ko homou loto koā ke u vete atu ‘a e Tu‘i Siu?
43018040	Pea nau toe kalanga ai kotoa pē, ‘o pehē, ‘Oua ‘e tuku mai ‘a e siana na, ka ko Palāpasa. Pea ko eni ko Palāpasa ko ha kaiha‘akau ia.
43019001	PEA toki puke ‘e Pailato ‘a Sīsū, ‘o ne kau‘imaea.
43019002	Pea fī ‘e he kau tau ha kalauni talatala, ‘o ‘ai takai ki hono fofonga, pea nau ‘ai kiate ia ha kofu kulokula, pea nau holo mai kiate ia,
43019003	‘o nau pehē, ‘Ēī, Tu‘i Siu! pea nau ‘oatu kiate ia–ha ngaahi pekalae.
43019004	Pea toe ‘alu kitu‘a ‘a Pailato, ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu; Vakai, ‘oku ou ‘omi ia kitu‘a kiate kimoutolu, koe‘uhi ke mou ‘ilo ‘oku ‘ikai te u ma‘u ha‘ane momo‘i hia.
43019005	Pea ha‘u ai ‘a Sīsū kitu‘a, kuo ‘ai kiate ia ‘a e kalauni talatala, mo e kofu kulokula. Pea me‘a ‘e Pailato kiate kinautolu; Vakai, ko ena ‘a e Tangata!
43019006	Pea ‘i he mamata leva kiate ia ‘e he hou‘eiki taula‘eiki mo e kau ‘ōfisa, na‘a nau fekālanga‘i, ‘o pehē, Kalusefai ia, kalusefai ia. Pea me‘a kiate kinautolu ‘e Pailato, Pe‘i mou ‘ave ia ‘o kalusefai ‘e kimoutolu: he ko au ‘oku ‘ikai te u ‘ilo ha‘ane hia.
43019007	Pea tali ki ai ‘e ha‘a Siu, Ka ‘oku ‘i ai ha lao ‘amautolu, pea ‘i he lao ko ia ‘oku totonu ke ne mate, koe‘uhi na‘a ne lau, ko e ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otua ia.
43019008	Pea ‘i he fanongo leva ‘a Pailato ki he folofola ko ia, na‘e fakautuutu ai ‘ene teteki;
43019009	pea ne toe hū ki he Palasi, ‘o ne pehē kia Sīsū, Mei fē tū koe? Ka ka ‘ikai fai ‘e Sīsū ha‘ane momo‘i tali ki ai.
43019010	Pea me‘a ai ‘a Pailato kiate ia, ‘Oku ‘ikai te ke lea kiate au koā? ‘Oku ‘ikai koā te ke ‘ilo ‘oku ou mafai ke tukuange koe, pea ‘oku ou mafai ke kalusefai koe.
43019011	Pea tali ‘e Sīsū ki ai, ‘E ‘ikai te ke momo‘i mafai ha me‘a kiate au, ‘oka ne ta‘e‘oua hono tuku kiate koe mei ‘olunga: ko ia ‘oku hulu atu ‘a e angahala ‘a‘ana na‘a ne tuku ange au kiate koe.
43019012	Pea ‘i he me‘a ko ia na‘e feinga ‘a Pailato ke tuku ange ia: ka ka toutou kalanga pē ‘e ha‘a Siu, ‘o pehē, Kapau te ke tuku ange ‘a e siana ni, tā ‘oku ‘ikai ko e takanga ko e ‘o Sisa: ‘ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku ne lau ko e tu‘i ia ‘oku ne lea pau‘u kia Sisa.
43019013	Pea ‘i he fanongo leva ‘a Pailato ki he ngaahi lea ko ia, na‘a ne taki ‘a Sīsū kitu‘a, pea ne nofo hifo ki he nofo‘anga fakamaau ‘i ha potu ‘oku ui ko Falikimaka, ka ‘i he lea faka-Hepelū ko Kāpata.
43019014	Pea ko e ‘aho Tokonaki ia, ko e Tokonaki he Pāsova: ko hono houa ko e ono nai, mo ne me‘a ai ki ha‘a Siu; Vakai, ko ena homou Tu‘i!
43019015	Pea fekālanga‘i leva ‘e he fa‘ahinga ko ia, Tafi‘i ia! tafi‘i ia! kalusefai ia. Pea pehē ‘e Pailato kiate kinautolu, Ka u kalusefai koā homou Tu‘i? Pea tali ‘a e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki, ‘Oku ‘ikai hamau tu‘i, ko Sisa pē.
43019016	Pea ne toki tukuange ia kiate kinautolu ke kalusefai.
43019017	Ko ia na‘a nau ma‘u ‘a Sīsū. Pea ‘alu atu ia ‘oku ne fua mo‘ona hono kolosi, ‘o ne a‘u ki he potu ‘oku ui koe potu ‘ulupoko, ko hono ui faka-Hepelū ko Kolokota.
43019018	Pea ko e potu ko ia na‘a nau kalusefai ai ia, pea ai mo ha toko ua, ko e taha mei hē, mo e taha mei hē, kae ‘i loto ‘a Sīsū.
43019019	Pea na‘e tohi foki ‘e Pailato ha tohi fakamatala, ‘o ne ‘ai ki he funga kolosi; pea na‘e tohi ai ‘o pehē, KO SĪSŪ MEI NĀSALETI KO E TU‘I SIU.
43019020	Pea na‘e lau ‘a e tohi fakamatala ko ia ‘e ha tokolahi ‘o ha‘a Siu, koe‘uhi na‘e ofi ‘a e feitu‘u kolo na‘e kalusefai ai ‘a Sīsū: kae‘uma‘ā na‘e tohi ia ‘i he lea faka-Hepelū mo e lea faka-Loma, mo e lea faka-Kalisi.
43019021	Ko ia na‘e lea ai kia Pailato ‘e he hou‘eiki taula‘eiki ‘o ha‘a Siu, ‘o pehē, ‘Oua te ke tohi, ko e Tu‘i Siu; ka ke tohi, Na‘a ne pehē, Ko e Tu‘i Siu au.
43019022	Ka ka tali ‘e Pailato, Ko ia kuo u tohi, kuo tohi.
43019023	Pea ko e kau sōtia, hili ‘enau kalusefai ‘a Sīsū, na‘a nau to‘o hono ngaahi kofu, ‘o nau vahefā, ‘o takitaha ‘a e sōtia ‘a e vahe; kae‘uma‘ā hono sote: ka ko e anga ‘o e sote na‘e ‘ikai hano hoko ‘anga, ka na‘e lalanga fua pē mei ‘olunga ‘o fai ki lalo.
43019024	Ko ia na‘a nau fepehē‘aki, ‘ē, ‘oua na‘a tau hae ia, ka tau talotalo ki ai, pe ‘o hai ia–koe‘uhiā ke fakamo‘oni ‘a e folofola na‘e pehē, Na‘a nau tufa kiate kinautolu hoku kofu. Pea nau talotalo ki he‘eku teu. Ko ia na‘e fai ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia ‘e he kau sōtia.
43019025	Pea na‘e tu‘u ‘i he tafa‘aki kolosi ‘o Sīsū ‘a ‘ene fa‘ē, mo e tokoua ‘o ‘ene fa‘ē, ko Mele foki ko e uaifi ‘o Kaliopasi, mo Mele mei Makitala.
43019026	Pea ‘i he vakai ‘e Sīsū ki he‘ene fa‘ē, mo e tu‘u ai ‘a e tama ako na‘a ne ‘ofa ai, na‘a ne folofola ki he‘ene fa‘ē, Fefine, ko ena ho‘o tama!
43019027	Hili ia na‘a ne folofola ki he tama ako, Ko ena ho‘o fa‘ē! Pea mei he taimi ko ia na‘e ‘ave ‘e he tama ako ‘a e fefine ko ia ki hono ‘api ‘o‘ona.
43019028	Pea hili ia, pea ‘i he mea‘i ‘e Sīsū, kuo ‘osi ‘eni ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē ke fakamo‘oni ‘a e Tohitapu, pea ne folofola mai, ‘Oku ou fie inua.
43019029	Pea na‘e tu‘u ai ha ipu kuo pito ‘i he vinika; ko ia na‘a nau humaki ‘i ha va‘a ‘īsope ha oma kuo fonu vinika, ‘o nau ‘ohake ki hono fofonga.
43019030	Pea ‘i he ma‘u leva ‘e Sīsū ‘a e vinika, na‘a ne folofola, KUO ‘OSI, pea ne punou hono fofonga, ‘o ne tukuange hono laumālie.
43019031	Pea ko e ‘aho Tokonaki ia; ko ia na‘e feinga ai ‘a ha‘a Siu ke ‘oua na‘a tautau ‘i he kolosi ‘a e ngaahi ‘anga‘anga ‘i he Sāpate:(he ko e ‘aho lahi ‘a e Sāpate ko ia)pea nau kole kia Pailato ke fesi‘i honau va‘e, ‘o ‘ave kinautolu.
43019032	Ko ia na‘e omi ‘a e kau sōtia, ‘o nau fesi‘i ‘a e kauva‘e ‘o e ‘uluaki, pea mo e siana ‘e taha na‘e kaungā kalusefai mo ia.
43019033	Ka ‘i he‘enau hoko kia Sīsū, ‘o nau vakai kuo pekia ia, na‘e ‘ikai te nau fesi‘i hono va‘e ‘o‘ona:
43019034	ka ko e toko taha ‘o e kau sōtia na‘a ne hoka‘i hono vakavaka ‘aki hono tao, pea na‘e tafe leva mei ai ha ta‘ata‘a mo ha vai.
43019035	Pea ko ia na‘a ne mamata ai kuo ne fakamo‘oni ki ai, pea ko ‘ene fakamo‘oni ko e mo‘oni ‘o e mo‘oni: pea ‘oku ‘ilo ‘e he toko taha ko ia ‘oku mo‘oni pē ‘ene lau, koe‘uhiā ke mou tui foki.
43019036	He na‘e hoko ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia koe‘uhi ke fakamo‘oni ‘a e potu tohi ‘oku pehē, ‘e ‘ikai maumau ha hui ‘e taha ‘o‘ona.
43019037	Pea ‘oku toe ‘i ai mo e potu tohi ‘e taha ‘oku ne pehē, Te nau mamata kiate ia kuo nau hoka‘i.
43019038	Pea hili ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia, ko Siosifa mei ‘Alematea, ‘a ia ko e ako ‘a Sīsū, na‘a ne kole kia Pailato ke ne ‘ave ‘a e sino ‘o Sīsū; ka na‘a ne fai fufū pē ko ‘ene manavahē ki ha‘a Siu: pea tuku ‘e Pailato ke ne fai. Ko ia na‘a ne ha‘u ‘o ‘ave hono sino.
43019039	Pea ha‘u mo Nikotimasi foki, (‘a ia na‘e ha‘u po‘uli kiate ia ‘i he kamata‘anga pea ne ha‘u mo ia ha koto mula mo e ‘alosi kuo fetuiaki, fe‘unga nai mo e pāuni ‘e teau.
43019040	Ko ia na‘a nau to‘o ‘a e sino ‘o Sīsū, ‘o nau takai ia ‘aki ha ngaahi tupenu, fakataha mo e ongo fa‘ahinga ahi ni; he ko e anga ia ‘o e teu pekia ‘a ha‘a Siu ki fa‘itoka.
43019041	Pea na‘e tu‘u ‘i he potu na‘e kalusefai ai ia ha ngoue tapu; pea na‘e ‘i he ngoue tapu ha fonualoto fo‘ou, ‘a ia kuo te‘eki telio ai ha taha.
43019042	Pea koe‘uhi ko e ‘aho Tokonaki ia ‘o ha‘a Siu, mo e ofi mai ‘a e fonualoto, ko ia na‘a nau telio ai ‘i he potu ko ia ‘a si‘i Sīsū.
43020001	KA ‘i he ‘uluaki ‘aho ‘o e uike, Na‘e ha‘u hengihengi ‘a Mele mei Makitala ki he fonualoto, ‘oku kei po‘uli, pea ‘i he‘ene vakai, tā kuo to‘o ‘a e maka mei he fonualoto.
43020002	Pea ne lele ai ‘o ‘alu kia Saimone Pita, pea ki he ako ‘e taha ‘a ia na‘e ‘ofa ai ‘a Sīsū, pea ne pehē kiate kinaua, Kuo nau ‘ave ‘a e ‘Eiki mei he fonualoto, pea ‘oku ‘ikai te mau ‘ilo pē kuo nau tuku ia ki fē.
43020003	Pea ‘alu atu ai kitu‘a ‘a Pita mo e ako ‘e taha, ‘o na kamata ō ki he fonualoto.
43020004	Pea kamata lele ‘a e ongo me‘a ko ia fakataha; pea vave ‘a e lele ‘a e ako ko ia ‘e taha ‘ia Pita, ‘o ne tomu‘a hoko ki he fonualoto.
43020005	Pea ne punou, ‘o ne vakai, tā ‘oku tuku ai ‘a e ngaahi tupenu; ka na‘e ‘ikai te ne hū ki ai ‘e ia.
43020006	Ka ka muimui atu ai pē ‘a Saimone Pita, pea faifai pea ne a‘u ‘o ne hū ki he fonualoto, ‘o ne mo‘uvakaia ‘a e ngaahi tupenu ‘oku tuku na;
43020007	mo e holoholo, ‘a ia na‘e ‘ai ki hono fofonga, kuo ‘ikai tuku fakataha mo e ngaahi tupenu, ka ‘oku fatufatu kehe, ‘o tuku ki ha potu ‘e taha.
43020008	Pea toki hū ki ai mo e ako ko ia ‘e taha, ‘a ia na‘e tomu‘a a‘u ki he fonualoto, pea ne sio ki ai ‘o tui.
43020009	He na‘a mo ‘eni, kuo te‘eki ke mahino kiate kinautolu ‘a e folofola, ‘o pehē, Kuo pau ke ne toe tu‘u mei he pekia.
43020010	Pea toe foki ‘a e ongo ako ki ‘api.
43020011	Ka ka tu‘u pē ‘a Mele ‘i he tu‘a fonualoto, ‘o tangi: pea ‘i he‘ene tangi, ‘iloange na‘a ne punou ke sio, ki he fonualoto.
43020012	Pea ne vakai ki ha ongo ‘āngelo kofu hinehina ‘oku na nofo ai, ko e taha mei ‘ulu, mo e taha mei va‘e, ‘i he potu na‘e toka ai ‘a e sino ‘o Sīsū.
43020013	Pea lea ‘e he ongo me‘a kiate ia, ‘o pehē, ‘e fefine, ko e hā ‘oku ke tangi ai? Pea ne pehē kiate kinaua, Kuo nau ‘ave si‘oku ‘eiki, pea ‘oku ‘ikai te u ‘ilo pē kuo nau tuku ia ‘i fē?
43020014	Pea ‘i he‘ene lea pehē na‘a ne tafoki ki mui, ‘o ne vakai kia Sīsū ‘oku tu‘u mai, ka na‘e ‘ikai te ne ‘ilo ko Sīsū ia.
43020015	Pea na‘e me‘a mai ‘a Sīsū kiate ia, ‘e fefine, ko e hā ‘oku ke tangi ai? ko hai ‘oku ke kumi ki ai? Pea mahalo ‘e ia ko e tauhi ngoue ia, ‘o ne pehē ki ai, ‘Eiki, kapau ko koe kuo ke ‘ave ia, tala mai ‘a e potu kuo ke tuku ia ki ai, pea te u ‘ave ia ‘e au.
43020016	Folofola ‘a Sīsū ki ai, Mele! Pea tafoki ange ‘a e fefine, ‘o ne pehē kiate ia ‘i he lea faka-Hepelū, Lāponai! (‘a ia ‘oku tatau mo e pehē, Si‘i Tangata‘eiki!)
43020017	Pea folofola ‘a Sīsū kiate ia, ‘Oua na‘a ala kiate au, he kuo te‘eki ke u ‘alu hake ki he Tamai: ka ke ‘alu ki si‘oku ngaahi tokoua, ‘o lea ki ai ‘o pehē, Ko ‘eku ‘alu hake ‘eni ki he‘eku Tamai pea ko ho‘omou Tamai, pea ki hoku ‘Otua pea ko homou ‘Otua.
43020018	Pea ‘alu ‘a Mele mei Makitala, ‘o ne tala ki he kau ako, ‘o pehē, Kuo u mamata ki he ‘Eiki: mo ne fakahā, Kuo ne folofola pehē mo pehē kiate au.
43020019	Pea ‘i he‘ene efiafi ‘i he ‘aho ko ia, ‘a e ‘uluaki ‘aho ‘o e uike, pea kuo tāpuni ‘a e ngaahi matapā ‘o e fale na‘e nofo ai ‘a e kau ako, ko ‘enau manavahē ki ha‘a Siu, na‘e ha‘u ‘a Sīsū, ‘o tu‘u ki honau lotolotonga, ‘o ne folofola kiate kinautolu, Si‘oto‘ofa atu!
43020020	Pea ‘i he‘ene lea pehē, na‘a ne faka‘ali‘ali kiate kinautolu hono ongo nima mo hono vakavaka. Pea na‘e fiefia ‘a e kau ako ‘i he‘enau mamata ki he ‘eiki.
43020021	Pea ne toe folofola ai kiate kinautolu, Si‘oto‘ofa atu: hangē ne fekau mai au ‘e he Tamai, pehē ‘oku ou tuku atu kimoutolu ‘e au.
43020022	Pea ‘i he‘ene lea pehē, na‘a ne hō kiate kinautolu, ‘o ne folofola, Mou ma‘u Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni ā.
43020023	Kapau te mou fakamolemole ‘a e hia ‘a e ni‘ihi, kuo fakamolemole; kapau te mou tuku ‘a e hia ‘a ha ni‘ihi, kuo tuku pē.
43020024	Ka ko Tōmasi, ko e toko taha ‘i he kau Hongofulumāua, ‘a ia ‘oku ui ko Titimasi, na‘e ‘ikai te ne nofo mo kinautolu ‘i he ha‘u ‘a Sīsū.
43020025	Ko ia na‘e lea kiate ia ‘e he kau ako ni‘ihi, ‘o pehē, Kuo mau mamata ki he ‘Eiki. Ka ka pehē ‘e ia kiate kinautolu, Ka ‘ikai te u sio ‘i hono ongo nima ki he mata fa‘o, ‘o u velo hoku tuhu ni ki he mata fa‘o, mo velo hoku nima ki hono vakavaka, ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito te u tui.
43020026	Pea hili ‘a e ‘aho ‘e valu, na‘e toe nofo ‘i loto fale ‘ene kau ako, pea ne ‘iate kinautolu ‘a Tōmasi. Ha‘u pē ‘a Sīsū, kuo tāpuni ‘a e ngaahi matapā, ‘o ne tu‘u ki honau lotolotonga, ‘o ne pehē, Si‘oto‘ofa atu!
43020027	Pea na‘a ne toki pehē kia Tōmasi, ‘ai mai ho tuhu na, ‘o vakai hoku ongo nima ni; pea ‘ai mai ho nima na, ‘o velo ki hoku vakavaka ni: pea ‘oua te ke hoko ko e ta‘etui, ka ko e tui.
43020028	Tali ‘a Tōmasi, ‘o ne pehē ki ai, Ko hoku ‘Eiki pē, mo hoku ‘Otua!
43020029	Pea folofola ki ai ‘a Sīsū, ‘o pehē, Kuo ke tui koā koe‘uhi kuo ke mamata kiate au? monū‘ia ā ka ko kinautolu ne ‘ikai mamata, ka nau tui pē.
43020030	Pea na‘e lahi foki mo e ngaahi ngāue mana ne feia ‘e Sīsū ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e kau ako, ‘a ia kuo ‘ikai tohi ‘i he tohi ni:
43020031	ka kuo tohi ‘eni koe‘uhi ke mou tui KO SĪSŪ KO E MĪSAIA IA, KO E ‘ALO ‘O E ‘OTUA: pea ‘i ho‘omou tui ke mou ma‘u mo‘ui ‘i hono HUAFA.
43021001	HILI ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia, na‘a ne toe fakahā ia ki he kau ako ‘i he Tahi ‘o Taipiliō: pea ko eni ‘a e anga ‘o ‘ene fai.
43021002	Na‘e ‘i ai fakataha ‘a Saimone Pita, mo Tōmasi ‘a ia ‘oku ui ko Titimasi, mo Nātaniela ‘a e tama mei Kena ‘i Kāleli, mo e ongo foha ‘o Sēpeti, pea mo ha toko ua kehe ‘o ‘ene kau ako.
43021003	Pea lea kiate kinautolu ‘a Saimone Pita, Te u ‘alu au ‘o toutai. Pea nau pehē kiate ia, Te tau ō foki mo koe. Pea nau ‘alu atu ‘o heka vaka; pea ko e pō ko ia na‘e ‘ikai te nau momo‘i ma‘u ha me‘a.
43021004	Pea ‘i he‘ene hengihengi hake, na‘e tu‘u ‘a Sīsū ‘i he matātahi: ka na‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito ‘ilo ‘e he kau ako ko Sīsū ia.
43021005	Pea lea ‘a Sīsū kiate kinautolu, Tamaiki, ‘oku ai ha‘amou kiki? Pea nau tali ki ai, ‘Oku ‘ikai.
43021006	Pea pehē ‘e ia kiate kinautolu, ‘a‘au ‘a e kupenga ki he mata‘u ‘o e vaka, pea te mou ola. Pea nau ‘a‘au ai, pea ‘ikai ai ke nau matoho ‘eni, koe‘uhi ko e lahi ‘o e ika.
43021007	Ko ia na‘e pehē kia Pita ‘e he ako ko ia na‘e ‘ofa ai ‘a Sīsū, Ko e ‘Eiki pē. Pea ko Saimone–‘a Maka foki–‘i he‘ene fanongo leva ko e ‘eiki ia, na‘a ne nono‘o hono kofu, (he na‘e vala pē ‘o ne hopo ki tahi.
43021008	Ka ka omi ‘a e kau ako kehe ‘i he ki‘i vaka; (he na‘e ‘ikai te nau loko mama‘o mo ‘uta, fe‘unga nai mo ha kiupite ‘e uangeau ‘o nau taulani mai ‘a e kupenga mo e ika.
43021009	Pea ‘i he‘enau hifo ai ki ‘uta, na‘a nau vakai ki ha afi malala ‘oku tu‘u ai, mo ha mata‘i ika kuo fakaheka ki ai, mo ha fo‘i mā.
43021010	Pea me‘a ‘e Sīsū kiate kinautolu, Mou ‘omi ha ni‘ihi mei ho‘omou ika kuo mou toki ma‘u ni.
43021011	Pea heka ki vaka ‘a Saimone Pita, ‘o ne toho ‘a e kupenga ki ‘uta, kuo fonu ‘i he ngaahi ika lalahi, ko hono lau ko e ika ‘e teau mo e ika ‘e nimangofulu mo e ika ‘e tolu: pea neongo hono lahi, ka na‘e ‘ikai mahae ‘a e kupenga.
43021012	Pea me‘a ‘a Sīsū kiate kinautolu, Mou omi ‘o fai ho‘omou pelekifasi. Pea na‘e ‘ikai ha taha ‘i he kau ako ‘e fakato‘oto‘a ke huhū ange kiate ia, ‘o pehē, Ko hai tū koe? He na‘a nau ‘ilo ko e ‘Eiki ia.
43021013	Pea me‘a mai ‘a Sīsū, ‘o ne to‘o ‘a e fo‘i mā, ‘o ‘ange kiate kinautolu, pea pehē foki mo e mata‘i ika.
43021014	Ko hano tu‘o tolu ‘eni ‘o ‘ene ha ‘a Sīsū ki he kau ako, hili ‘ene toetu‘u mei he pekia.
43021015	Pea kuo fai leva ‘enau pelekifasi, pea me‘a ‘e Sīsū kia Saimone Pita, Saimone, foha ‘o Sione, ‘oku ke ‘ofa kiate au ‘o lahi ‘i ha‘anautolu ni? Pea ne pehē ki ai, ‘Io, ‘Eiki; ‘oku ke mea‘i ‘oku ou ‘ofa mo‘oni kiate koe. Pea ne folofola ki ai, Fafanga si‘eku fanga lami.
43021016	Pea ne toe me‘a kiate ia, ko hono tu‘o ua, Saimone, foha ‘o Sione, ‘oku ke ‘ofa kiate au? Pea ne pehē kiate ia, ‘Io, ‘Eiki; ‘oku ke mea‘i ‘oku ou ‘ofa mo‘oni kiate koe. Pea ne folofola ki ai, Tauhi ‘eku fanga sipi.
43021017	Pea ne me‘a kiate ia, ko hono tu‘o tolu, Saimone, foha ‘o Sione, ‘oku ke ‘ofa mo‘oni kiate au? Pea mamahi ‘a Pita ‘i he tu‘o tolu ‘ene pehē mai, ‘Oku ke ‘ofa kiate au? Pea ne pehē ange, ‘Eiki, ‘oku ke ‘afio‘i ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē; ‘oku ke mea‘i ‘oku ou ‘ofa mo‘oni kiate koe. Pea folofola ‘a Sīsū kiate ia, Ke ke fafanga si‘eku fanga sipi.
43021018	Ko au ē, ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘I ho‘o talavou na‘a ke ‘ai ‘e koe ho no‘o, pea ke ‘eve‘eva ki ha potu pē te ke loto ki ai; ka ‘oka ke ka motu‘a, te ke mafao atu ho ongo nima, kae nono‘o koe ‘e ha taha kehe, pea te ne fua koe ki ha potu ‘oku ‘ikai te ke loto ki ai.
43021019	Na‘a ne lea pehē, ko ‘ene fakatatau atu ‘a e anga ‘o e mate‘anga te ne fakaongoongolelei ai ‘a e ‘Otua. Pea hili ‘ene lea ko ia, na‘a ne folofola kiate ia, Muimui mai kiate au. Ko Sīsū mo e Toko taha Na‘á ne ‘Ofa Taha ai He‘ene Kau Akó
43021020	Pea tafoki ange ‘a Pita, ‘o ne vakai ki he ako na‘e ofa ai ‘a Sīsū ‘oku ne muimui mai, (‘a e toko taha ko ia ne tokoto foki ‘i he kai, ‘o faaki ki hono fatafata, mo pehē kiate ia, ‘Eiki, ko hai ia ho lavaki?),
43021021	ko ia, ‘i he mamata ‘e Pita ki he toko taha ko ia, na‘a ne pehē kia Sīsū, ‘Eiki, ka ko e hā ‘a e tangata ni ia?
43021022	Pea folofola kiate ia ‘e Sīsū, Kapau ko hoku loto ke nofo pē ia kae‘oua ke u ha‘u, ka he ‘oku ke kau ai? fai pē ho‘o muimui ‘au kiate au.
43021023	Ko ia na‘e, mafola ki he kāinga ‘a e tala ko eni, tokua ‘e ‘ikai pekia ‘a e ako ko ia: kae tala‘ehai ko e folofola ‘a Sīsū kiate ia na‘e pehē, ‘e ‘ikai te ne mate; ka ko eni pē, Kapau ko hoku loto ke nofo pē ia kae‘oua ke u ha‘u, ka he ‘oku ke kau ai?
43021024	Ko eni ia ‘a e ako ‘oku ne fakamo‘oni ki he ngaahi me‘a ni, pea na‘a ne tohi ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia: pea ‘oku mau ‘ilo ‘oku mo‘oni ‘ene fakamo‘oni.
43021025	Pea ‘oku ‘i ai mo e ngaahi me‘a lahi ne fai ‘e Sīsū; ‘a ia ka ne tohi takitaha, ‘oku te pehē, na‘a mo māmani ‘e ‘ikai hao ai ‘a e ngaahi tohi ‘e fai.
44001001	‘E TIOFILUSI, ko e ‘uluaki tohi na‘a ku fai, ko e fakamatala ki he ngaahi me‘a kehekehe na‘e fua fai mo ako‘aki ‘e Sīsū,
44001002	‘o a‘u ki he ‘aho ko ia na‘a ne tuku ‘i he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni ‘ene ngaahi fekau ki he kau ‘Aposetolo kuo ne fili, pea ‘ave ai ia ki ‘olunga.
44001003	Ko kinautolu ia foki na‘a ne fakahā ia ki ai hili hono feia: pea lahi mo mahino ‘ene ngaahi fakamo‘oni kuo ne mo‘ui: he na‘a ne hā kiate kinautolu, ‘o ‘aho fāngofulu, mo ne lea ki he ngaahi me‘a na‘e kau ki he Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua.
44001004	Pea na‘a ne kai mo kinautolu, ‘o ne tu‘utu‘uni ai ke ‘oua te nau hiki mei Selusalema, kae talitali ki he tala‘ofa ‘a e Tamai, ‘A ia (na‘a ne me‘a mai) na‘a mou fanongo ki ai ‘iate au.
44001005	He na‘e papitaiso vai pē ‘e Sione; ka ‘e papitaiso kimoutolu ‘aki ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni hili ‘a e ngaahi ‘aho si‘i.
44001006	Ko ia, ‘i he‘enau fakataha mo ia, na‘a nau fehu‘i kiate ia, ‘o pehē, ‘Eiki, ko ho‘o toe fakaato ‘i he taimi ni ‘a e pule‘anga ma‘a ‘Isileli?
44001007	Pea ne folofola kiate kinautolu, ‘Oku ‘ikai ‘amoutolu ke ‘ilo ‘a e ngaahi taimi mo e ngaahi kuonga, ‘a ia kuo ta‘ofi ‘e he Tamai ki he‘ene fa‘iteliha ‘a‘ana.
44001008	Ka te mou ma‘u pē ha mālohi, ‘oka hifo ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni kiate kimoutolu: pea te mou hoko ko ‘eku kau fakamo‘oni, ‘o ‘ikai ‘i Selusalema pē, ka ‘i Siutea kātoa, mo Samēlia, ‘io, ‘o a‘u ki he ngata‘anga ‘o māmani.
44001009	Pea ‘i he‘ene folofola pehē, Lolotonga ‘enau siofia ia, na‘e ‘ave ia ki ‘olunga; pea na‘e kilala hake ia ‘e ha ‘ao, ‘o fakapuli meiate kinautolu.
44001010	Pea ‘i he‘enau mo‘u sio fakamama‘u ki he langi, lolotonga ‘ene hā‘ele, pea tā kuo tu‘u mai kiate kinautolu ha ongo tangata kofu hinehina.
44001011	Pea na‘a na pehē, ‘A e tu‘unga mātu‘a Kāleli, ko e hā ‘oku mou tutu‘u ai, ‘o sio pehē ki langi? Ko e Sīsū ko ia ‘a ia kuo ‘ohake meiate kimoutolu ki he langi, te ne toe ha‘u; pea ‘e hangē tofu pē hono anga pea mo ‘ene hā‘ele ki langi kuo mou mamata ki ai.
44001012	Pea nau toki foki ki Selusalema, mei he mo‘unga ‘oku ui ko ‘Ōlive, ‘a ia ‘oku ofi ki Selusalema ngofua ke ‘alu ki ai ‘i he Sāpate.
44001013	Pea kuo nau hū ki kolo, na‘a nau ‘alu hake ki he loki ‘i ‘olunga ‘a ia na‘a nau ma‘unganofo ki ai–‘a Pita mo Sione mo Sēmisi mo ‘Anitelū, ‘a Filipe mo Tōmasi, ‘a Pātolomiu mo Mātiu, ‘a Sēmisi ko e foha ‘o ‘Alefiusi, mo Saimone ‘o e kautaha Mamahi‘ifonua, pea mo Siutasi ko e foha ‘o Sēmisi.
44001014	Ko kinautolu ni kotoa pē na‘a nau faka‘utumauku ‘enau lotu ‘o loto taha; pea ai mo ha kau fefine, kae‘uma‘ā ‘a Mele ko e fa‘ē ‘a Sīsū, pea mo hono ngaahi tokoua.
44001015	Pea lolotonga ‘i he ngaahi ‘aho ko ia na‘e tu‘u hake ‘a Pita ‘i he ha‘oha‘onga ‘o e kāinga: (na‘e ‘i ai mo e ngaahi hingoa tokolahi, ko e kakai kuo fakataha ki he potu ko ia, fe‘unga nai mo e toko teau mo e toko uofulu): pea pehē ‘e ia,
44001016	‘E Kāinga, na‘e pau ke hoko ‘a e folofola, ‘a ia ne sinaki folofola‘aki ‘e he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni ‘i he fofonga ‘o Tēvita, ‘o kau kia Siutasi, ‘a e toko taha na‘a ne hoko ko e takihala ki he kakai na‘e puke ‘a Sīsū.
44001017	He ne ‘osi lau ia mo kitautolu, pea ne tō kiate ia ‘a e lakanga ni.
44001018	(Pea ko e siana ko ia na‘a ne ma‘u ha ‘api ‘aki ‘a e totongi ‘o ‘ene kākā; ‘o ne tō ‘o pāfua, pea mafahi hono fatu, pea fu‘u malingi kitu‘a hono to‘oto‘onga.
44001019	Pea na‘e faifai pea ‘ilo ki ai ‘a e kakai kotoa pē na‘e nofo ‘i Selusalema; ko ia na‘e hingoa ai ‘a e ‘api ko ia ‘i he‘enau lea ko ‘Akeletama, ‘a ia ‘oku tatau mo e ‘Api-‘o-fakapō.)
44001020	He kuo tohi ‘i he tohi Saame, Ke lala ‘ene loto‘ā, pea ke mole ‘a ia na‘e nofo ki ai, pea ke ma‘u ‘e ha taha kehe ‘ene lakanga le‘o.
44001021	Ko ia, ‘oku totonu ke fokotu‘u ha taha ‘i he kau tangata kuo kau mo kitautolu, lolotonga ‘a e felemofafo ‘a e ‘Eiki Ko Sīsū ‘iate kitautolu,
44001022	‘o fai mei he Papitaiso ‘a Sione ‘o a‘u ki he ‘aho ‘o hono ‘ohake meiate kitautolu–‘io, ke ai ha toko taha ‘i he kakai ni ke ne hoko ko e fakamo‘oni ‘o ‘ene toetu‘u, fakataha mo kimautolu.
44001023	Pea nau tu‘utu‘uni ha toko ua; ko Siosifa na‘e ui ko Pāsapa, ‘a ia na‘e fakahingoa foki ko Siusitasa, pea mo Mataiasi.
44001024	Pea nau hū ‘o pehē, ‘Eiki, ko koe ia ‘oku tokaima‘ananga ki ai ‘a e loto ‘o e kakai fuli pē; ke ke fakahā pe ko e fē ha taha ‘i he ongo me‘a ni kuo ke fili,
44001025	ke ma‘u ‘a e potungāue faka‘aposetolo ni ‘a ia ne laka mei ai ‘a Siutasi ke ‘alu ki hono potu ‘o‘ona.
44001026	Pea nau talotalo ma‘anaua; pea tonu kia Mataiasi: pea na‘e fakahoko ia ‘e he fakataha ki he kau hongofulu-mā-taha ‘aposetolo.
44002001	PEA ‘i he hokosia ‘a e ‘aho Penitekosi, ‘oku nau tefua ‘i ha potu ‘e taha.
44002002	Pea fakafokifā na‘e hoko mei he langi ha me‘a, ‘o hangē ko e mumuhu ‘o ha fu‘u tu‘oni matangi ‘oku tō mai, pea na‘e fā‘ofale ‘i he loki na‘a nau nofo ai.
44002003	Pea na‘e hā, kiate kinautolu ha ngaahi ‘elelo hangē ha afi, ‘o mavahevahe, ‘o nofo hifo kiate kinautolu takitaha.
44002004	Pea fā‘ofale ‘iate kinautolu kātokatoa ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni; pea nau hanga ‘o lea ‘i he ngaahi lea kehe, ‘o fakatatau ki he fakalea‘i kinautolu ‘e he Laumālie.
44002005	Pea ‘i he taimi ko ia na‘e nofo ‘i Selusalema ha kakai Siu, ko e mātu‘a lotu mo‘oni mei he ngaahi fa‘ahinga kotoa pē ‘i lalo langi.
44002006	Pea ‘i he hoko ‘a e longoa‘a ko ia, na‘e fakatahataha ki ai honau fu‘u tokolahi; pea na‘e hangē ha pepeli, he ko ‘enau ngaahi lea takitaha ‘oku nau ongo‘i hono lea‘aki mai ‘e kinautolu.
44002007	Pea nau fakatumutumu mo ofoofo, ‘o nau pehē, Vakai ange; ‘ikai ko e kau Kāleli kotoa pē kotoa pē ‘a kinautolu na ‘oku lea?
44002008	Pea ‘oku fakafēfē ai ‘etau fanongo ni ki he‘etau lea totonu na‘a tau takitaha tutupu ai?
44002009	Ko kitautolu Pātia mo e Mītia mo e ‘Īlami, mo e nofo ki Mesopotēmia, ki Siutea foki mo Kapatōsia, ki Ponitō mo ‘Ēsia,
44002010	ki Filisia foki mo Pamifilia, ki ‘Isipite mo e ngaahi feitu‘u ‘o ‘Āfilika ‘oku ofi ki Sailine, mo e nofo hili mai mei Loma, ‘a e Siu mo‘oni mo e ului ki ai, ‘a e Kēliti mo e ‘Ālepea,
44002011	‘oku tau ongo‘i ‘enau fai ‘a e ngaahi lea ‘atautolu, he‘enau lea‘aki ‘a e ngaahi me‘a lalahi ‘a e ‘Otua.
44002012	Pea nau fakatumutumu kotoa pē, mo tāla‘a, ‘o nau fepehē‘aki, Ko e hā nai ‘a e ‘uhinga ‘o e me‘a ni?
44002013	Ka ka kata manuki ‘a e ni‘ihi, ‘o nau pehē, ‘Ā, ‘oku nau ki‘iki‘ia ‘i he uaine melie.
44002014	Ka ka hanga ‘a Pita, ‘o ne tu‘u hake mo e toko hongofulu-mā-taha, ‘o ne ofa‘aki ‘ene lea ‘o malanga kiate kinautolu, ‘o pehē, ‘A e tu‘unga Mātu‘a Siu, mo e taka Selusalema kotoa pē, ke mahino mu‘a ‘a e me‘a ni kiate kimoutolu, pea ke mou fakafanongo mai ki he‘eku lea:
44002015	he ‘oku ‘ikai ke konā ‘a e kakai na, ‘o hangē ko ho‘omou mahalo, he ko hono tolu pē ‘eni ‘o e houa pongipongi.
44002016	Ka ko eni ia na‘e folofola‘aki ‘i he palōfita ko Sioeli.
44002017	‘Oku me‘a mai ‘a e ‘Otua, Pea ‘e hoko ‘o pehē ‘i he kuonga fakamui, te u lilingi ha me‘a mei hoku Laumālie ki he kakano kotoa pē; pea ‘e toki palofisai ‘e homou ngaahi foha mo homou ngaahi ‘ōfefine pea ko e kau talavou ‘omoutolu te nau mata vīsone, pea ko e mātu‘a ‘omoutolu te nau fa‘a misi:
44002018	‘io, na‘a mo ‘eku kau tamaio‘eiki mo ‘eku kau kaunanga, te u lilingi ha me‘a mei hoku Laumālie kiate kinautolu foki ‘i he kuonga ko ia, pea te nau palofisai,
44002019	pea te u ‘ai ha ngaahi me‘a fakaofo ‘i he langi ‘i ‘olunga, mo ha ngaahi faka‘ilonga ki māmani ‘i lalo, ko e toto, mo e afi, mo e ngaahi pou kohu:
44002020	‘e liliu ‘a e la‘ā ‘o po‘uli, mo e māhina ‘o toto, ‘i he tei hoko ‘a e ‘aho ‘o e ‘Eiki, ‘a e ‘aho lahi mo ‘ilonga:
44002021	pea ‘e hoko ai ‘o pehē, ko ia te ne tautapa ki he huafa ‘o e ‘Eiki ‘e fakamo‘ui.
44002022	‘a e tu‘unga Mātu‘a ‘Isileli, mou fanongo ki he‘eku fakamatala ni: Ko Sīsū mei Nāsaleti, ko e tangata ia na‘e fakamo‘oni ma‘ana mei he ‘Otua kiate kimoutolu, ‘aki ha ngaahi mana mo e ngaahi me‘a fakaofo mo e ngaahi faka‘ilonga, ‘a ia ne fai ‘iate ia ‘e he ‘Otua ‘i homou lotolotonga, ‘o hangē ko ia ‘oku mou lāu‘ilo ki ai.
44002023	Ko e toko taha ko ia ne tukuange, pea mou nima‘aki ha kau hīteni, ‘o tukifa‘oa mo fakapoongi; ka kuo loa hono ‘osi tālanga‘i ‘i he ‘Otua, mo hono mu‘aki ‘afio‘i.
44002024	Pea ne vete ‘e he ‘Otua hono kafai ‘e mate, ‘o toe fokotu‘u ia: kae fēfē, he na‘e ‘ikai lava ke mapuke ai ia.
44002025	He ‘oku pehē ‘e Tēvita ‘i he‘ene lau kiate ia, Ne u sio fakalaka ki he ‘amui, ‘Oku ma fe‘ao ma‘u pē mo e ‘Eiki, He ‘oku ne tu‘u mei hoku to‘omata‘u Ke ‘oua na‘a maue‘i au.
44002026	Ko ia na‘e neka ai ‘a hoto loto ni, Pea vīkiviki ‘a hoto ‘elelo ni, Kae‘uma‘ā ‘e ‘apitanga ‘amanaki pē ‘a hoto kakano ni.
44002027	He tala‘ehai te ke li‘aki hoto laumālie ‘i Hētesi, ‘Uma‘ā ha‘o tuku ho Toko Taha Toputapu Ke ‘ilo ‘a e ‘au‘auha.
44002028	Kuo ke faka‘ilo kiate au ha ngaahi hala ‘oku tau ki he mo‘ui; Te ke ‘ai ke u fonu nēkeneka, He feangai mo ho fofonga.
44002029	Kāinga Mātu‘a; fakamolemole ka u lea atu pē ‘i he Pēteliake ko Tēvita; kuo pekia ia pea telio foki, kae‘uma‘ā ‘oku ‘iate kitautolu hono fonualoto ‘o a‘u ki he ‘aho ni.
