44002030	Ka ko e me‘a ‘i he‘ene palōfita, mo ‘ene ‘ilo kuo fuakava mo lea tuki kiate ia ‘e he ‘Otua, ‘e ai ha toko taha ‘i he kakano ‘o hono mānava, te ne ‘afio‘i hono taloni:
44002031	ko ia ‘i he‘ene sio fakalaka atu na‘a ne lea ki he toetu‘u ‘a e Mīsaia; he na‘e ‘ikai li‘aki ia ‘i Hētesi, pe ‘ilo ‘e hono kakano ‘a e ‘au‘auha.
44002032	Ko e Sīsū ko eni na‘e toe fokotu‘u ia ‘e he ‘Otua: pea ko kimautolu kotoa pē ko e kau fakamo‘oni ki ai.
44002033	‘Āua: pea ‘i hono hākeaki‘i leva ‘e he māfimafi ‘o e ‘Otua, mo ne ma‘u foki mei he Tamai ‘a e tala‘ofa ko e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni, na‘a ne lilingi mai ‘a e me‘a ni ‘a ia‘oku mou sio mo fanongo ki ai.
44002034	He tala‘ehai ne ‘alu hake ‘a Tēvita ki he langi: kae‘uma‘ā ‘oku ne lau ‘e ia, Ne folofola ‘e he ‘Eiki ki hoku ‘Eiki, Nofo koe ‘i hoku to‘omata‘u.
44002035	Kae‘oua ke u ngaohi ho ngaahi fili ko ho tu‘unga va‘e.
44002036	Ko ia ke mātu‘aki ‘ilo ‘e ha‘a ‘Isileli kotoa pē, kuo fakanofo ‘e he ‘Otua ‘a e tangata ni ke ne ‘Eiki mo Mīsaia fakatou‘osi; ‘io, ‘a e Sīsū ko ia na‘a mou kalusefai‘i.
44002037	Pea ‘i he‘enau fanongo ki ai, na‘e hūkia honau loto, pea nau pehē kia Pita mo e kau ‘Aposetolo kotoa pē, kāinga, ko e hā ‘amautolu ai ‘e fai?
44002038	Pea pehē ‘e Pita kiate kinautolu, Mou fei mo fakatomala, pea takitaha papitaiso ‘i he huafa ‘o Sīsū ko e Mīsaia, ki he fakamolemole ‘o ho‘omou ngaahi angahala, pea te mou ma‘u ‘a e me‘a‘ofa ko e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni.
44002039	He ‘oku ma‘amoutolu ‘a e tala‘ofa, pea mo ho‘omou fānau foki, mo kinautolu mama‘o, ‘io, ‘a kinautolu kotoa pē ‘e ui ange ‘e he ‘Eiki ko hotau ‘Otua.
44002040	Pea na‘e lahi foki mo ‘ene ngaahi lea kehekehe na‘a ne fakamamafa ‘aki, mo ne toutou enginaki kinautolu, he‘ene pehē, Mou tuku kimoutolu ke fakamo‘ui mei he fa‘ahinga angakehe ko eni.
44002041	Pea na‘a nau tali ‘ene lea, ‘o nau papitaiso, pea na‘e fakaului mai ‘i he ‘aho pē ko ia ha ngaahi laumālie, fe‘unga nai mo e toko tolu afe.
44002042	Pea na‘a nau nofo faka‘utumauku ki he faiako ‘a e kau ‘Aposetolo, mo e fakakautaha, mo e pakipaki ‘o e mā, mo e ngaahi feingalotu.
44002043	Pea na‘e hoko ha ilifia ki he loto kotoa pē: na‘e lahi foki ‘a e ngaahi me‘a fakaofo mo e ngaahi faka‘ilonga na‘e hoko ‘i he kau ‘Aposetolo.
44002044	Pea ko kinautolu kotoa pē na‘e tui na‘a nau fa‘a nofo fakataha, pea na‘a nau mātu‘aki me‘a taha.
44002045	Pea nau fakatau atu honau ngaahi tofi‘a mo e nga‘oto‘ota; mo nau tufa ‘a e pa‘anga na‘e ma‘u ai ki he kakai kehekehe, ‘o fakatatau ki he‘enau masiva.
44002046	Pea ko e ‘aho kotoa pē na‘a nau faka‘utumauku ‘o loto taha he ‘alu ki he Temipale, mo nau pakipaki mā ‘i ‘api; pea na‘a nau kai honau ‘inasi ‘i he fiefia mo e loto hangamālie;
44002047	‘o nau tuku kolōlia ki he ‘Otua, pea tokangaekina kinautolu ‘e he kakai kotoa. Pea na‘e fakaului ‘e he ‘Eiki ki he‘enau fakataha ‘i he ‘aho kotoa pē ‘a kinautolu kuo kamata mo‘ui.
44003001	PEA na‘e ‘alu hake ‘a Pita mo Sione ki he Temipale, ki he feinga lotu hū ‘oku fai ‘i hono hiva ‘o e houa.
44003002	Pea tā na‘e fata ange ha motu‘a heke, ‘a ia kuo ne pehē mei hono fanau‘i; pea ko e ‘aho kotoa pē na‘a nau tuku ia ki he matapā ‘o e Temipale, ‘a ia ‘oku ui ko Masanisani, koe‘uhi ke ne fai ‘ene kole pa‘anga ki he kakai ‘oku hū ki he Temipale.
44003003	Pea ‘i he‘ene vakai kia Pita mo Sione ‘oku fai ke na hū ki he Temipale, na‘a ne kole ha‘ane pa‘anga.
44003004	Pea sio fakamama‘u ‘a Pita kiate ia, fakataha mo Sione, ‘o ne pehē,
44003005	Hanga mai kiate kimaua. Pea na‘a ne fakatokanga atu, he‘ene ‘amanaki te ne ma‘u ha me‘a meiate kinaua.
44003006	Pea pehē ‘e Pita, Ko e siliva mo e koula ‘oku ‘ikai te u ma‘u; ka ko e me‘a ‘oku ou ma‘u teu ‘atu ni ia: ‘I he huafa ‘O Sīsū Kalaisi mei Nāsaleti, tu‘u pea hā‘ele.
44003007	Pea hanga ia ‘o ne puke ‘a e tangata ‘i hono nima to‘omata‘u, ‘o fusi hake: pea mo‘ui leva hono va‘e mo e tunga‘i va‘e.
44003008	Pea ‘ai ‘e ia ‘ene fu‘u hopo, ‘o ne tu‘u ‘o ha‘ele, ‘o ne hū mo kinaua ki he Temipale, ‘oku ne ha‘ele, mo hopohopo, mo tuku Kolōlia ki he ‘Otua.
44003009	Pea na‘e mamata kiate ia ‘e he kakai kotoa, ‘oku ne ha‘ele mo tuku kolōlia ki he ‘Otua:
44003010	pea nau ‘ilo ko e siana ia na‘e nofo kole pa‘anga ‘i he matapā Masanisani ‘o e Temipale: pea nau fu‘u ofo mo fakatumutumu ‘i he me‘a kuo hoko kiate ia.
44003011	Pea ‘i he‘ene kei puke ‘a Pita mo Sione, na‘e felelei mai ‘a e kakai kotoa kiate kinautolu, ki he falehala ‘oku hingoa kia Solomone, ‘oku nau ofo lahi.
44003012	Pea ‘i he sio ki ai ‘a Pita, na‘a ne lea ange ki he kakai, ‘a e tu‘unga Mātu‘a ‘Isileli, ko e hā ‘oku mou ofongi ai ‘a e tangata ni? Pea ko e hā ‘oku mou sio fakamama‘u ai kiate kimaua, ‘o hangē ko kimaua kuo ngaohi ia ke ha‘ele ‘i ha‘ama mafai ‘amaua, pe lotu mo‘oni?
44003013	Ko e ‘Otua pē ‘o ‘Epalahame mo ‘Aisake mo Sēkope, ‘io, ko e ‘Otua ‘o ‘etau ngaahi kui, kuo ne fakalāngilangi‘i ‘ene sevāniti ko Sīsū–‘a e toko taha ko ia na‘a mou tuku ange, pea fakafisinga, mo tulikekina ‘i he ‘ao ‘o Pailato, lolotonga kuo tu‘utu‘uni ‘e ia ke vete ange:
44003014	kae fakafisinga ‘e kimoutolu ‘a e Tokotaha Mā‘oni‘oni mo Angatonu, ‘o mou kole ke me‘a‘ofa‘aki mai kiate kimoutolu ha tangata fakapō:
44003015	ka ko e Mo‘ui‘anga na‘a mou tāmate‘i; ‘a ia na‘e fokotu‘u ‘e he ‘Otua mei he pekia: pea ko kimautolu ko e fakamo‘oni ki ai.
44003016	Pea ko e me‘a ‘i he‘ema tui ki he huafa ‘o‘ona, ko ia kuo fakamo‘ui ai ‘e hono huafa ‘a e tangata ni, ‘a ia ‘oku mou siofia mo lāu‘ilo ki ai: ‘io, ko e tui ‘oku meiate ia kuo tuku ai ki he tangata ni ‘a e mo‘ui haohaoa ni ‘i he ‘ao ‘omoutolu kotoa pē.
44003017	Pea neongo ia, kāinga, ka ‘oku ou ‘ilo na‘a mou fai ia ‘i he ta‘e‘ilo, pehē foki mo ho‘omou kau pule.
44003018	Ka kuo fakaai ai ‘e he ‘Otua ‘a e ngaahi me‘a na‘a ne sinaki fakahā ‘i he fofonga ‘o ‘ene kau palōfita kotoa pē, ‘o pehē, ‘E feia ‘ene Mīsaia.
44003019	Ko ia mou fei mo fakatomala, pea tafoki, koe‘uhi ke tāmate‘i ho‘omou ngaahi angahala; kae toki hoko mei he fofonga ‘o e ‘Eiki ‘a e ngaahi kuonga fakamānava hake.
44003020	Mo ne fekau mai ‘a e Toko Taha na‘e sinaki tu‘utu‘uni mo‘omou Mīsaia, ‘a Sīsū:
44003021	‘a ia kuo pau ke ma‘u ‘e he langi, kae‘oua ke hoko ‘a e taimi ‘o e Fakafo‘ou mai ‘o e me‘a kotoa pē, ‘a e ngaahi taimi kuo folofola ki ai ‘a e ‘Eiki ‘i he fofonga ‘o ‘ene kau palōfita tapu, talu mei mu‘a.
44003022	‘Io, na‘e lea ‘a Mōsese, ‘o pehē, Ko e ‘Eiki ko homau ‘Otua, te ne fokotu‘u ma‘amoutolu mei homou kāinga ha palōfita ‘oku hangē ko au; te mou tokanga ki he toko taha ko ia ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē te ne folofola‘aki kiate kimoutolu.
44003023	Pea ‘e hoko ‘o pehē, ‘Ilonga ha laumālie ‘e ‘ikai te ne tokanga ki he palōfita ko ia, ‘e motuhi faka‘āufuli ia mei he kakai.
44003024	Pea ko e kau palōfita kotoa pē, fai meia Sāmiuela mo kinautolu na‘e hoko, ‘ilonga ‘a kinautolu na‘e lea na‘a nau fakamatala foki ki he ngaahi ‘aho ni.
44003025	Ko kimoutolu ko e fānau ‘oku ‘amoutolu ‘a e kau palōfita, mo e fuakava na‘e fai ‘e he ‘Otua mo ‘etau ngaahi kui, he‘ene folofola kia ‘Epalahame, Pea ko ho hako ‘e fakamonū‘ia mei ai ‘a e ngaahi fa‘ahinga ‘o māmani.
44003026	Pea ko e ‘Otua, ‘i he‘ene fokotu‘u leva ‘ene Sevāniti, na‘a ne fuofua fekau ia kiate kimoutolu, ke ne fakamonū‘ia kimoutolu ‘i he fakatafoki kimoutolu takitaha mei he‘ene faikovi.
44004001	PEA lolotonga ‘ena lea ki he kakai, na‘e tu‘u mai kiate kinaua ‘a e kau taula‘eiki, mo e ‘eikitau ‘o e Temipale, mo e kau Sātusi,
44004002	ko ‘enau mamahi ‘i he‘ena ako‘i ‘a e kakai, mo ‘ena malanga‘aki ‘ia Sīsū ‘a e toetu‘u mei he pekia.
44004003	Pea nau puke kinaua, ‘o tuku ki he pilīsone ki he ‘apongipongi, he kuo efiafi.
44004004	Ka na‘e tui ha tokolahi ‘iate kinautolu na‘e fanongo ki he malanga; pea na‘e hoko ‘o toko nima afe nai ‘a e lau ‘o e kau tangata.
44004005	Pea pongipongi hake na‘e fai ‘enau fakataha ‘i Selusalema ‘a honau kau pule, mo e kau mātu‘a, mo e kau sikalaipe.
44004006	Kae‘uma‘ā ‘a ‘Ānasi ko e Taula‘eiki Lahi, mo Kaiafasi, mo Sione, mo ‘Ālekisānita, mo kinautolu na‘e kau ki he ha‘a Taula‘eiki Lahi.
44004007	Pea nau fokotu‘u kinaua ‘i honau ha‘oha‘onga, ‘o nau fehu‘i, Ko e fa‘ahinga ivi fē, mo e fa‘ahinga hingoa fē, kuo mo fai‘aki ‘a e me‘a ni?
44004008	Na‘e toki fakafonu ‘a Pita ‘i he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni, ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu, ‘A Hou‘eiki ‘Isileli, mo e Ka u Mātu‘a.
44004009	Kapau ‘oku ‘ekea kimaua he ‘aho ni ‘i he ngāue lelei ne fai ki he tangata mahaki, pe kuo fakamo‘ui ‘a e siana ni ‘i he hā:
44004010	ke mahino mu‘a kiate kimoutolu kotoa pē, mo e kakai ‘Isileli fuli pē, ko e huafa pē ‘o Sīsū Kalaisi mei Nāsaleti, ‘a ia na‘a mou kalusefai, ‘a ia na‘e fokotu‘u ‘e he ‘Otua mei he pekia, ko e toko taha ko ia ‘oku tu‘u mei ai ‘a e siana ni ‘i homou ‘ao kuo mo‘ui.
44004011	Ko e toko taha ko ia, ko e maka na‘e ta‘etoka‘i ‘e kimoutolu tufunga ‘a ē kuo hoko ko e maka lahi ‘o e tuliki.
44004012	‘Io, pea ‘oku ‘ikai ke tu‘u ‘i ha taha kehe ‘a e fakamo‘ui; he tala‘ehai ‘oku ‘i ai mo ha hingoa kehe ‘i he lalo langi kuo fokotu‘u ‘i he lotolotonga ‘o e kakai, ‘a ia kuo tu‘utu‘uni ke tau mo‘ui ai. ;'
44004013	Pea ‘i he‘enau tokanga‘i ‘a e ta‘emālū‘ia ‘a Pita mo Sione, kae‘uma‘ā ‘enau ‘ilo ko e ongo me‘a ta‘ekolisi kinaua, pea ta‘ema‘u tu‘unga, na‘a nau ofo; pea nau vakai vakai, tā ko e ongo me‘a na‘e fa‘a ‘ia Sīsū.
44004014	Ko ena foki ‘a e tangata na‘e fakamo‘ui ‘oku ne tu‘u mo kinaua; pea ‘ikai leva ha‘anau momo‘i me‘a ke tali ‘aki.
44004015	Pea nau fekau ke na hū kitu‘a mei he Sanetalimi, ‘o nau felāuaki ‘o pehē,
44004016	Ko e hā ‘atautolu ai ‘e fai ki he ongo me‘a ni? He ko e hoko ‘iate kinaua ha mana mo‘oni, ko e me‘a ia ‘oku e‘a ki he nofo Selusalema kotoa pē, pea tala‘ehai te tau lava ke faka‘ikai‘i.
44004017	Ka koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a toe taha atu hono mafola ki he kakai, tau fakamana‘i kinaua, ke ‘oua ‘aupito te na momo‘i lau ki he hingoa ni ‘i ha‘ana talanoa ki ha taha.
44004018	Pea nau ui ange kinaua, ‘o nau fakahā ke ‘oua te na momo‘i pu‘aki ‘a e hingoa ‘o Sīsū, ‘uma‘ā ha ako‘aki.
44004019	Ka ka tali ‘e Pita mo Sione, ‘o pehē kiate kinautolu, Mou me‘a lelei pē ki ai, pe ko e fē ‘oku totonu ‘i he finangalo ‘o e ‘Otua, ‘a ‘ema talangofua kiate kimoutolu, pe ki He‘ene ‘Afio.
44004020	He ‘e ‘ikai te ma fa‘a tuku ‘ema lea ki he ngaahi me‘a na‘a ma sio ki ai mo fanongoa.
44004021	Pea nau toe taha ange ‘enau fakamana‘i kinaua, ‘o nau toki tuku ange, ko e ‘ikai te nau ‘ilo pe te nau tautea fēfē kinaua telia ‘a e kakai: he na‘e fakahīkihiki‘i kotoa pē ‘e kinautolu ‘a e ‘Otua ‘i he me‘a kuo hoko.
44004022	He na‘e fāngofulu tupu ‘a e ta‘u ‘o e tangata, ‘a ia kuo fai ki ai ‘a e mana fakamo‘ui.
44004023	Pea ‘i he tuku ange kinaua, na‘a na ō ki honau kakai, ‘o na ongoongoa ‘a e ngaahi lea kehekehe kuo fai ‘e he hou‘eiki taula‘eiki mo e kau mātu‘a kiate kinaua.
44004024	Pea ‘i he‘enau fanongo ki ai, pea nau ofa‘aki lototaha ‘enau lea ki he ‘Otua, ‘o nau pehē, ‘Ēī, ko koe ne ngaohi ‘a e langi, mo e fonua, mo e tahi, mo e ngaahi me‘a kehekehe ‘oku ‘i ai.
44004025	Ko koe ne folofola mai ‘i he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni, mo e fofonga ‘o ‘emau kui ko Tēvita, ko ho‘o sevāniti, ‘o pehē, Ko e hā ‘oku futefute ai ‘a Senitaile, Mo fakakaukau mūnoa ‘a e ngaahi matakali?
44004026	He tu‘u mai ‘a e ngaahi tu‘i ‘o māmani, Pea fakatahataha ‘a e hou‘eiki Ke puleaki‘i ‘a e ‘Eiki, Pea mo ‘ene Pani.
44004027	He ‘oku mo‘oni na‘e fakataha ‘i he kolo ni ‘a Hēlota mo Ponitō Pailato fakatou‘osi, kae‘uma‘ā ‘a Senitaile mo e ngaahi fa‘ahinga ‘Isileli, ke nau fai ha me‘a ki ho‘o Sevāniti Tapu ko Sīsū, ‘a ia na‘a ke pani;
44004028	ke lava ka ko e ngaahi me‘a na‘e mu‘aki tālanga‘i ‘e ho‘o Māfimafi mo ho‘o Poto, pea ‘i he me‘a ko eni,
44004029	‘Eiki, ke ke me‘a ki he‘enau ngaahi fakamana, pea tuku ki ho‘o kau tamaio‘eiki, ke ‘oua ‘aupito te mau mālū‘ia ‘i he‘emau malanga‘aki ho‘o folofola,
44004030	‘i ho‘o mafao mai ho nima ke faito‘o, pea ke hoko ‘a e ngaahi me‘a mana mo fakaofo ‘i he huafa ‘o ho‘o Sevāniti Tapu ko Sīsū.
44004031	Pea lolotonga ‘enau hū, na‘e ngalulululu ‘a e potu ‘oku nau fakataha ai; pea na‘e fakafonu ‘a kinautolu kātokatoa ‘i he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni: pea na‘a nau malanga‘aki ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua ‘o ta‘emālū‘ia.
44004032	Pea ko kinautolu kātokatoa kuo tui, na‘a nau uouongataha, mo lototaha; ‘io, na‘e ‘ikai ha taha te ne lau ‘ene me‘a pē ha taha ‘o e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ‘iate ia: ka na‘a nau mātu‘aki me‘a taha pē.
44004033	Pea na‘e tu‘u kaukaua ‘aupito ‘a e kau ‘Aposetolo, he‘enau fakamo‘oni ki he toetu‘u ‘a e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi: ‘io, pea na‘e nofo‘ia kinautolu kotoa pē ‘e ha kelesi lahi.
44004034	He tala‘ehai na‘e ai si‘anau toko taha ‘e masiva: he ‘ilonga kinautolu na‘e ma‘u ‘api mo e fale na‘a nau fakatau atu ia; pea na‘e toutou ‘omi ‘a e pa‘anga ‘o e ngaahi me‘a kuo fakatau,
44004035	‘o tuku atu ki he va‘e ‘o e kau ‘Aposetolo: pea ‘ilonga ha taha na‘e masiva na‘e ‘ange mei ai ha me‘a, ‘o fakatatau ki he‘ene masiva.
44004036	Pea na‘e ai ha motu‘a Līvaite na‘e tupu ‘i Saipalo, ko Siosifa ia, ka na‘e fakahingoa ko Pānepasa ‘e he kau ‘Aposetolo, (‘a ia ko hono hiki, Ko e foha ‘o Leaongo).
44004037	Na‘e fakatau ‘e ia ha ngoue‘anga na‘e ‘iate ia, ‘o ne ‘omi hono pa‘anga, ‘o tuku atu ki he va‘e ‘o e kau ‘Aposetolo.
44005001	KA na‘e ai ha tangata, tokua, na‘e hingoa ko ‘Ānanaia, na‘a ne fakatau ha ‘api, pea kau ai ‘a Sāfaila ko hono uaifi:
44005002	pea na‘a ne tuku ma‘ana ha me‘a mei he totongi, ‘o ‘ilo foki ki ai ‘e hono uaifi, ‘o ne ‘omi hano konga pē, ‘o tuku atu ki he va‘e ‘o e kau ‘Aposetolo.
44005003	Pea pehē ‘e Pita, ‘E ‘Ānanaia, ko e hā kuo ke tuku ai ke fā‘ofale ‘a Sētane ‘i ho loto, ke ke lohiaki‘i ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni, mo ke tuku ha me‘a mei he totongi ‘o e konga kelekele?
44005004	‘I he te‘eki ke fakatau, ‘ikai na‘e ‘o‘ou pē? Pea hili hono fakatau, ‘ikai na‘e ‘a‘au ke fa‘iteliha ki hono pa‘anga? Ko e hā na‘a ke tali ‘ai ai ‘i ho loto ‘a e me‘a ni? Tala‘ehai ko ho‘o lohiaki‘i ha tangata, ka ko e ‘Otua.
44005005	Pea ‘i he fanongo ‘e ‘Ānanaia ki he lea ko ia, na‘a ne mape‘e ki lalo ‘o hokotaki: pea na‘e tō ha fu‘u ilifia ki he kakai kotoa pē na‘e fanongo ki ai.
44005006	Pea tutu‘u ‘a e kau talavou ‘o teu ia, pea nau fata atu kitua‘ā, ‘o tanu.
44005007	Pea kuo mahili nai ha houa ‘e tolu, ‘iloange na‘e hū mai ‘a hono uaifi, ‘oku ‘ikai te ne ‘ilo ‘a e me‘a kuo hoko.
44005008	Pea tali ‘e Pita kiate ia, Fakahā mai pe na‘a mo fakatau ‘a e ‘api ‘aki ‘a e totongi ko ē pē? Pea pehē ‘e ia, ‘Io, ko ia pē.
44005009	Pea me‘a ‘e Pita ki he fefine, Ko e hā kuo mo fa‘ufa‘ufono ai ke hūhūmama ki he Laumālie ‘o e ‘Eiki? Ko ena ‘oku ‘i he matapā ‘a e va‘e ‘o e kakai na‘e tanu ho husepāniti, pea te nau fata atu koe.
44005010	Pea hinga atu leva ia ki he va‘e ‘o Pita, ‘o ne hokotaki: pea ‘i he hū mai ‘a e kau tama, tā kuo pekia ‘a e fefine; pea nau fata ia kitua‘ā, ‘o tanu mo hono husepāniti.
44005011	Pea tō ha fu‘u ilifia ki he siasi kātoa, mo e kakai kotoa pē na‘e fanongo ki he me‘a ko ia.
44005012	Pea na‘e fa‘a hoko ‘i he ngāue ‘a e kau ‘Aposetolo ‘a e ngaahi me‘a mana mo fakaofo ‘i he lotolotonga ‘o e kakai; pea na‘e fa‘a fakataha ‘a kinautolu kotoa pē ‘i he falehala ‘o Solomone:
44005013	ka ko e me‘a ki hono toe, tala‘ehai na‘e ai ha taha na‘e fakato‘oto‘a ke fafale mo kinautolu; kaekehe na‘a mo e kakai na‘a nau faka‘apa‘apa kiate kinautolu.
44005014	Pea fakautuutu ai ‘a e ului mai ki he ‘Eiki ‘a ha kakai na‘e tui, ko e fu‘u tokolahi ‘o e kau tangata mo e kau fefine foki.
44005015	Pea faifai ai pea nau ‘omi kitu‘a ‘a e kau mahaki, ‘o tuku fakaholo ‘i he hala ‘i he fanga ki‘i mohenga mo e fala, hei‘ilo ‘e lave ‘i hanau toko taha ‘a e ‘ata ‘o Pita ‘i ha‘ane me‘a ange.
44005016	Na‘e fa‘a ha‘u foki ‘a e kakai mei he ngaahi kolo vāofi mo Selusalema, ko e ‘omi ‘enau ngaahi mahaki, mo kinautolu na‘e ‘āvea ‘e he ngaahi fa‘ahikehe; he na‘e fa‘a fakamo‘ui ‘a e fa‘ahinga ko ia kotoa pē.
44005017	Pea tutu‘u hake ai ‘a e Taula‘eiki Lahi, mo kinautolu kotoa pē na‘e kau mo ia, (‘a ia ko e fa‘ahi Sātusi kātoa) kuo vevele ‘enau meheka.
44005018	Pea nau puke ‘a e kau ‘Aposetolo, ‘o lī ki he pilīsone fakakolo.
44005019	Ka na‘e fakaava po‘uli ‘a e ngaahi matapā ‘o e fale fakapōpula ‘e ha ‘āngelo ‘a e ‘Eiki; na‘a ne taki atu foki kinautolu kitu‘a, ‘o ne pehē,
44005020	Mou ‘alu ‘o tu‘u ‘i he Temipale, ‘o malanga‘aki ki he kakai ‘a e ngaahi folofola kotoa pē ‘o e mo‘ui ko ia.
44005021	Pea ‘i he‘enau fanongo ki ai, na‘a nau uhu ki he Temipale, ‘o faiako. Faifai pea a‘u ange ‘a e Taula‘eiki Lahi mo hono fa‘ahi, ‘o nau ui ange ‘a e Sanetalimi, pea ke kātoa mai ‘a e Fakataha fakamātu‘a ‘o ha‘a ‘Isileli; pea nau fekau atu ki he pilīsone ke taki mai kinautolu.
44005022	Ka ko e kau ‘ōfisa na‘e ‘alu ange na‘e ‘ikai te nau ‘ilo kinautolu ‘i he fale fakapōpula.
44005023	Pea nau foki mai ‘o fakahā, ‘o pehē, Ko e me‘a ki he pilīsone, na‘a mau ‘ilo ia kuo tāpuni, ‘o malu ‘aupito, pea ko e kau le‘o ‘oku nau tutu‘u pē ki he ngaahi matapā; ka ‘i he‘emau to‘o, na‘e ‘ikai te mau ‘ilo ha momo‘i toko taha ‘i loto fale.
44005024	Pea ‘i he‘enau fanongo ki he fakamatala ko ia, ‘a e ‘eikitau ‘o e Temipale mo e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki, na‘a nau toumoua ‘i he kau ‘Aposetolo pe ‘e iku ki he hā ‘a e me‘a ni.
44005025	Pea ‘alu ange ha toko taha, ‘o ne fakahā kiate kinautolu, Ko e kau tangata na‘a mou ‘ai pilīsone, ko eni ‘oku nau tutu‘u ‘i he Temipale, ‘o faiako ki he kakai.
44005026	Pea ‘alu atu ai ‘a e ‘eikitau mo e kau ‘ōfisa, ‘o ne taki mai kinautolu: ka na‘e ‘ikai ‘omi fakamālohi, he na‘a nau manavahē ki he kakai, na‘a tolongi kinautolu.
44005027	Pea nau taki mai kinautolu, ‘o fokotu‘u ‘i he lotolotonga ‘o e Sanetalimi: pea fakafehu‘i kiate kinautolu ‘e he Taula‘eiki Lahi,
44005028	‘o pehē, Na‘a mau mātu‘aki fekau kiate kimoutolu ke ‘oua te mou ako‘aki ‘a e hingoa ni, pea ko eni kuo mou fakafonu ‘a Selusalema ‘aki ho‘omou akonaki, pea ‘oku mou fai ke fakahinga mai kiate kimautolu ‘a e mate ‘a e tangata ko ia.
44005029	Pea tali ‘a Pita mo e kau ‘Aposetolo, ‘o nau pehē, ‘Oku totonu pē ke fai ki he pule ‘a e ‘Otua ‘i he pule ‘a e tangata.
44005030	Ko e ‘Otua ‘o ‘etau ngaahi kui na‘a ne fokotu‘u ‘a Sīsū, ‘a ia na‘a mou feia ‘i hono tautau he ‘akau.
44005031	Ko e toko taha ko ia,ne fakato‘omata‘u ‘e he ‘Otua hono hākeaki‘i ke ne ‘Eiki mo Fakamo‘ui, ke ‘ange mo‘o ‘Isileli ‘a e fakatomala mo e fakamolemole angahala.
44005032	Pea ko kimautolu ko e kau fakamo‘oni ‘o e ngaahi fakamatala ko ia; pehē foki ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni, ‘a ia kuo foaki ‘e he ‘Otua kiate kinautolu ‘oku talangofua kiate ia.
44005033	Pea ‘i he‘enau fanongo ki ai, na‘e hangē kuo kilisi ua honau loto, pea nau kamata alea‘i honau tāmate‘i.
44005034	Pea tu‘u hake ‘i he Sanetalimi ha matāpule Fālesi na‘e hingoa ko Kāmelieli, ko e faiako ‘i he Lao ia, pea ko e toko taha na‘e tokangaekina ‘e he kakai kotoa pē; pea ne fekau ke tuku si‘i ki tu‘a ‘a e kau tangata.
44005035	Pea toki lea ‘e ia kiate kinautolu, ‘A Matāpule ‘Isileli, Mou me‘eme‘a lelei ki he me‘a ‘oku mou pehē ke fai ki he kau tangata ni.
44005036	He na‘e ‘i ai ha toko taha na‘e tu‘u ‘i mu‘a, ko Teutasi, ‘o ne pōlepole ia ‘oku taha ‘ana; pea na‘e hinga ki ai ha kau tangata ‘e toko fāngeau nai: na‘e mate tāmate‘i ia, pea ‘ilonga ‘a kinautolu na‘e tuitala ki ai, na‘e movete ‘o ‘osi‘osingamālie.
44005037	Hili ‘a e siana ko ia, na‘e tu‘u hake ‘a Siutasi mei Kāleli ‘i he taimi ‘o e tohi kakai, pea tohoaki ‘e ia ha kakai ke angatu‘u: pea na‘e mole mo e tangata ko ia, pea fakamovete ‘a kinautolu na‘e tuitala ki ai.
44005038	Pea ‘i he me‘a ko eni ‘oku ou lēlea atu, Tu‘u ‘atā mo e kau tangata ni, pea tuku ai pē ā kinautolu: he kapau ‘oku mei he tangata ‘a e fakakaukau ko eni mo e ngāue ni, ‘e ngata:
44005039	ka ‘o kapau ‘oku mei he ‘Otua, ‘e ‘ikai te mou lava ke fakangata kinautolu: kae‘uma‘ā foki na‘a ‘iloange ‘oku mou tau‘i ‘a e ‘Otua.
44005040	Pea nau tui kiate ia: pea nau ui ange ‘a e kau ‘Aposetolo ‘o haha, ‘o nau fekau ke ‘oua te nau toe malanga‘aki ‘a e huafa ‘o Sīsū, ‘o nau toki tuku ange.
44005041	Pea ‘alu ai kinautolu mei he ha‘oha‘onga ‘o e Sanetalimi, ‘oku nau fiefia koe‘uhi kuo lau kinautolu ‘oku nau taau ke ngaohikovi‘i koe‘uhi ko e huafa.
44005042	Pea ko e ‘aho kotoa pē, ‘i he Temipale pea ‘i ‘api, na‘e ‘ikai tuku ‘enau ako mo malanga‘aki ‘a Sīsū, ko e Mīsaia ia.
44006001	KA ‘i he kuonga ko ia, ‘a ia na‘e fakatokolahi ai ki he kau ako, na‘e hoko ha lāunga ‘i he kau ‘Elinisito ki he kau Hepelū, koe‘uhi na‘e ta‘etokanga‘i ‘a e kau uitou ‘onautolu ‘i he tufa tokoni na‘e fai ‘i he ‘aho kotoa pē.
44006002	Pea fakataha ‘e he kau Hongofulumāua ‘a e kau ako kātoa, ‘o nau pehē, ‘Oku ‘ikai te mau loto ke tuku li‘aki ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua ka mau nofo ke fai ‘a e tufa ‘i he ngaahi tēpile.
44006003	Ko ia, kāinga, ke mou fili ha toko fitu meiate kimoutolu, ha kau tangata kuo fakaongo lelei mai, ‘o mātu‘aki fakalaumālie mo poto, pea te mau fakanofo kinautolu ki he ngāue ko ia.
44006004	Ka ko kimautolu, te mau faka‘utumauku ‘a e fai ‘o e hūfia, mo e tufa ‘o e folofola.
44006005	Pea na‘e hā lelei ‘a e lea ko ia ki he fakataha kotoa: pea nau fili ‘a Sitīveni, ko e tangata na‘e fonu ‘i he tui mo e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni, pea mo Filipe, mo Pōkolo, mo Naikano, mo Taimoni, mo Pāmina, pea mo Nīkola ko e motu‘a ‘Aniteoke ne tafoki ‘o lotu faka-Siu.
44006006	Pea nau fokotu‘u kinautolu ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e kau ‘Aposetolo; pea hili ‘enau lotu na‘a nau hilifaki nima kiate kinautolu.
44006007	Pea na‘e tupu ma‘u pē ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua; pea fakatokolahi ‘aupito ‘a e lau ‘o e kau ako ‘i Selusalema; kae‘uma‘ā ko e fu‘u tokolahi ‘o e kau taula‘eiki na‘a nau fakavaivai‘i kinautolu ‘o tui.
44006008	Pea ko Sitīveni, na‘a ne fai ‘i he lotolotonga ‘o e kakai ‘a e ngaahi ngāue fakaofo, mo e ngaahi faka‘ilonga na‘e mamafa, he‘ene fonu kelesi mo mafai ‘aupito.
44006009	Ka na‘e tu‘u hake ha ni‘ihi na‘e kau ki he falelotu na‘e ui ko e falelotu ‘o e kau Lipataine, mo e kau Sailine, mo e kau ‘Ālekisānitia, mo e ni‘ihi ‘i he kakai mei Silisia mo ‘Ēsia, ‘o nau fakakikihi mo Sitīveni.
44006010	Ka na‘e ‘ikai te nau lava ke tali ‘a e poto mo e fakalaumālie ‘o ‘ene lea.
44006011	Pea nau toki fale‘i ha kau tangata ke nau lau‘i ia, ‘o pehē, Na‘a mau fanongo ki he‘ene laukovi kia Mōsese pea mo e ‘Otua.
44006012	Pea na‘a nau o‘i ‘a e kakai, kae‘uma‘ā ‘a e kau mātu‘a, mo e kau sikalaipe; pea nau toki mo‘utāmakia ia, ‘o puke, ‘o taki ki he Sanetalimi.
44006013	Na‘a nau ‘omi foki ha kau fakamo‘oni loi, ‘a ia na‘a nau pehē, Ko e tangata ni ‘oku ‘ikai ke ava ‘ene tuki ‘a e Fale Tapu mo e Lao:
44006014	he kuo mau fanongo ki he‘ene pehē, tokua ko Sīsū, ko e siana mei Nāsaleti, te ne vete ‘a e potu ko ia, pea fakakehe ‘a e ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni na‘e tuku ‘e Mōsese kiate kitautolu.
44006015	Pea sio fakamama‘u kiate ia ‘a e kakai kotoa pē na‘e nofo ‘i he Sanetalimi, pea tā ko hono fofonga na‘e hangē ko e fofonga ‘o ha ‘āngelo.
44007001	PEA me‘a mai ‘a e Taula‘eiki Lahi, ‘Oku mo‘oni koā ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ni?
44007002	Pea pehē ‘e ia, kāinga Matāpule mo Hou‘eiki, mou me‘a mai: Ko e ‘Otua hā ‘i he Sikaina na‘a ne fakahā ia ki he‘etau kui ko ‘Epalahame, lolotonga ‘ene nofo ‘i Mesopotēmia, pea te‘eki ke ne nofo ‘i Kālana.
44007003	Pea ne folofola kiate ia, Hiki mei ho fonua, pea mei ho kāinga, pea ha‘u ki he fonua te u toki fakahā atu.
44007004	Toki ‘alu atu ia mei he fonua ‘o e kakai Kalitia, ‘o ne nofo ‘i Kālana; pea hili ‘a e pekia ‘a ‘ene ‘eiki, na‘e hiki ia mei ai ‘e he ‘Otua ki he fonua ko eni, ‘a ia kuo hiki ki ai ‘e kimoutolu foki, ‘o mou nofo ki ai ni.
44007005	Ka na‘e ‘ikai te ne foaki kiate ia ‘i ai ha konga kelekele ke fe‘unga mo hono topuva‘e, huanoa hano tofi‘a; ka na‘a ne tala‘ofa te ne mātu‘aki tuku ia mo‘ona, pea mo hano hako ‘amui, ‘osi ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘ane fānau.
44007006	Pea na‘e folofola ‘e he ‘Otua, tokua ‘e nofo muli hono hako ‘i he fonua ‘o ha kakai kehe, ‘a ia te nau fakapōpula‘i kinautolu, mo ngaohikovi‘i, ‘o fāngeau ta‘u.
44007007	Pea me‘a mai ‘a e ‘Otua, Te u fakamāu‘i ‘a e kakai ko ia te nau hopoate ki ai; pea hili ia te nau hiki atu mei ai, pea te nau fai ‘enau lotu kiate au ‘i he potu ko eni.
44007008	Pea na‘a ne tuku kiate ia ‘a e fuakava kamu; pea ‘i he‘ene pehē, na‘a ne ma‘u ha foha ko ‘Aisake, pea ne kamu ia ‘i hono ‘aho valu; pea ma‘u ‘e ‘Aisake ‘a Sēkope; pea ma‘u ‘e Sēkope ‘a e kau Hongofulu-mā-ua Pēteliake.
44007009	Pea meheka ‘a e kau Pēteliake kia Siosifa, ‘o nau fakatau ia ki ‘Isipite: ka na‘e ‘iate ia ‘a e ‘Otua,
44007010	‘o ne fakahaofi ia mei he‘ene faingata‘a‘ia kotoa pē, ‘o ne tuku ke ne hā faka‘ofo‘ofa mo ngali poto kia Felo ko e Tu‘i ‘Isipite; ‘a ia na‘a ne fakanofo ia ko e pule ‘o ‘Isipite, kae‘uma‘ā ‘a e ha‘a tu‘i kotoa.
44007011	Pea na‘e tō ha honge ki ‘Isipite kotoa mo Kēnani, pea na‘e lahi ‘a e faingata‘a: pea ko ‘etau ngaahi kui na‘e ‘ikai te nau ma‘u ‘a e me‘akai ‘a manu.
44007012	Ka ‘i he ma‘u talanoa ‘e Sēkope ‘oku mā‘ia ‘a ‘Isipite, na‘a ne fekau atu ki ai ‘etau ngaahi kui, ko e ‘uluaki ‘alu ia.
44007013	Pea ‘i hono tu‘o ua na‘e ‘ilo ‘a Siosifa ‘e hono ngaahi tokoua; pea e‘a kia Felo ‘a e tupu‘anga ‘o Siosifa.
44007014	Pea fekau ange ‘e Siosifa ke ‘omi ‘a Sēkope ko ‘ene ‘eiki, mo hono kāinga kotoa, ko e toko fitungofulu mo e toko nima.
44007015	Pea na‘e ‘alu hifo ‘a Sēkope ki ‘Isipite, pea na‘e pekia ai ‘e ia mo ‘etau ngaahi kui:
44007016	pea na‘e hiki kinautolu ki Sikemi, ‘o telio ‘i he fonualoto na‘e fakatau pa‘anga ‘e ‘Epalahame mei he fānau ‘a Hēmoa ‘i Sikemi.
44007017	Pea ‘i he faka‘a‘au ke ofi mai ‘a e taimi ‘o e tala‘ofa, ‘a ia ne fai ‘e he ‘Otua kia ‘Epalahame, pea tupu ‘a e kakai ‘i ‘Isipite, ‘o fu‘u tokolahi ‘aupito.
44007018	Ka na‘e faifai pea mālohi ‘i ‘Isipite ha tu‘i na‘e fa‘ahinga kehe, ‘a ia na‘e ‘ikai te ne ‘ilo kia Siosifa.
44007019	Pea fāsi‘a‘i ‘e ia hotau tutupu‘anga, mo ne ngaohikovi‘i ‘etau mātu‘a; ko ia ne nau laku kitu‘a ‘enau kau valevale ke ‘oua na‘a nau mo‘ui.
44007020	Ko e kuonga pē ia na‘e fanau‘i ai ‘a Mōsese; pea ko e toko taha pē ia ke toulekeleka‘ia ai ‘a e ‘Otua; pea na‘e tauhi ia ‘o māhina tolu ‘i he fale ‘o ‘ene tamai:
44007021	pea ‘i hono lī ia kitua‘ā, na‘e fakahake ia ‘e he ‘ōfefine ‘o Felo, ‘o ne tauhi ia ma‘ane tama ‘a‘ana.
44007022	Pea na‘e ako‘i ‘a Mōsese ‘i he fa‘ahinga poto kotoa ‘o e kakai ‘Isipite, pea kaukaua ‘ene ngaahi lea mo ‘ene ngaahi ngāue.
44007023	Pea ‘i he‘ene a‘u ki hono fāngofulu ta‘u, pea ake ‘i hono loto ke ‘a‘ahi ki hono kāinga ko ha‘a ‘Isileli.
44007024	Pea ‘i he‘ene sio ki ha toko taha ‘oku ngaohikovi‘i, na‘a ne langomaki‘i ia, ‘o ne fai ha sauni ma‘a e fakamālohia, ‘o ne taa‘i ‘a e tangata ‘Isipite:
44007025	pea na‘a ne mahalo ‘e ‘ilo leva ‘e hono kāinga ‘oku nima‘aki ia ‘e he ‘Otua ke ‘omi hanau fakamo‘ui: ka na‘e ‘ikai te nau ‘ilo.
44007026	Ko e ‘aho foki na‘a na feholoi, na‘a ne fakahā ia ki hanau tokoua na‘e kē, pea na‘a ne feinga ke fakalelei kinaua, he‘ene pehē, ‘Oku mo kāinga; ka ko e hā ‘oku mo fekainaki ai?
44007027	Ka ko e tangata na‘e tupu ai ‘a e kovi na‘a ne teke‘i ‘a Mōsese, ‘o ne pehē, Ko hai na‘e fakanofo koe ko homau pule mo e fakamaau?
44007028	Na‘a ko ho loto ke fakapoongi au, ‘o hangē ko ho‘o fakapoongi ‘a e ‘Isipite ‘aneafi, ‘ō?
44007029	Pea hola ‘a Mōsese ‘i he lea ko ia, pea ‘āunofo ia ‘i he fonua ko Mitiani, ‘o ne ma‘u ai ha ongo foha ‘e tokoua.
44007030	Pea ‘osi ai ha ta‘u ‘e fāngofulu; pea toki hā kiate ia ‘i he toafa ‘o e mo‘unga ko Sainai, ha ‘āngelo ‘oku ne ‘afio ‘i ha afi na‘e ulo ‘i ha vao talatala‘āmoa.
44007031	Pea ‘i he sio ki ai ‘a Mōsese, na‘a ne ofo ‘i he me‘a na‘e hā; pea ‘i he‘ene ‘unu‘unu atu ke fakasio ki ai, ‘iloange ko e le‘o ‘o e ‘Eiki ‘oku ne pehē mai,
44007032	Ko au ko e ‘Otua ‘o ho‘o ngaahi kui, ko e ‘Otua ‘o ‘Epalahame mo ‘Aisake mo Sēkope. Pea mo‘utetetetea ‘a Mōsese, ‘o ne manavahē ke fakasio.
44007033	Pea folofola ‘a e ‘Eiki kiate ia, To‘o ho sū mei ho va‘e; he ko e potu ‘oku ke tu‘u ai ko e kelekele tapu.
44007034	Kuo u mātu‘aki mamata ki he ngaohikovi‘i ‘o hoku kakai ‘oku ‘i ‘Isipite, pea kuo ongo mai ‘enau to‘e, pea ko ‘eku ‘alu hifo ‘eni ke fakahaofi kinautolu. Pea ko eni, ha‘u ā ‘o fai ‘eku fekau ki ‘Isipite.
44007035	‘a e Mōsese ko ia na‘a nau fakafeinga‘i, he‘enau pehē, Ko hai na‘e fakanofo koe ko homau pule mo e fakamaau? ko eni ia tangata ne fekau atu ‘e he ‘Otua mo‘onau pule mo e huhu‘i, ‘o ne fakafai ‘ene fekau ‘i he ‘āngelo na‘e hā kiate ia ‘i he talatala‘āmoa.
44007036	Ko eni ia na‘a ne taki kitua‘ā kinautolu, hili ‘ene fai ‘a e ngaahi me‘a fakaofo, mo e ngaahi mana, ‘i he fonua ko ‘Isipite, mo e Tahi Kulokula, kae‘uma‘ā ‘a e Toafa, ‘o fāngofulu ta‘u.
44007037	Ko eni ia ‘a e Mōsese na‘e me‘a ki ha‘a ‘Isileli, ‘o pehē, ‘E fokotu‘u ‘e he ‘Otua ma‘amoutolu mei homou kāinga ha palōfita ‘oku hangē ko au.
44007038	Ko eni ia na‘a ne ‘i he siasi ‘i he Toafa, ‘o ne feangai mo e ‘Āngelo, he‘ene folofola mai kiate ia ‘i he mo‘unga ko Sainai; ‘o ne feangai foki mo ‘etau ngaahi kui: ko ia ia taha na‘a ne ma‘u ‘a e ngaahi folofola mo‘ui tuputupu‘a ke ‘omi mo‘otautolu.
44007039	Ko ia ia na‘e ‘ikai fie talangofua ki ai ‘etau ngaahi kui; ka na‘a nau teke‘i ia, ‘o nau foki loto he‘enau sio ki ‘Isipite,
44007040	‘o nau pehē kia ‘Ēlone, Ngaohi mai hatau ngaahi ‘otua ke takihala kiate kitautolu; he ko e me‘a ki he siana ni ko Mōsese, ‘a ia na‘a ne ‘omeia kitautolu mei ‘Isipite, ‘oku ‘ikai te mau ‘ilo pe ko e hā kuo hoko kiate ia.
44007041	Pea nau ngaohi pulu ‘i he taimi ko ia, pea nau ‘ohake feilaulau ki he ‘aitoli, ‘o nau hākahaka ‘i he me‘a ne ngaohi ‘e he nima ‘onautolu.
44007042	Pea liliu ai ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘o ne tukuange kinautolu ke nau ‘otua ‘aki ‘a e hōsitē ‘o langi; ‘o hangē ā ko ia ‘oku tu‘u ‘i he Tohi Palōfita, ‘o pehē, ‘E ha‘a ‘Isileli, he na‘a mou tauhi mai ha ngaahi feilaulau, mo ha ngaahi me‘a‘ofa ‘i he ta‘u ‘e fāngofulu ko ia ‘i he toafa!
44007043	Kae‘uma‘a na‘a mou neke fano ‘a e Tāpanekale ‘o Moloke, mo e fetu‘u ‘o e ‘otua ko Lēfana, ko e ongo fakatātā na‘a mou ngaohi ke lotu ki ai–‘io, te u hiki kimoutolu kitu‘a Pāpilone.
44007044	Na‘e ma‘u ‘e he‘etau ngaahi kui ‘a e Tāpanekale tukunga fakamo‘oni lolotonga ‘enau ‘i he Toafa, ‘o hangē ko e tu‘utu‘uni ‘e ia na‘e folofola kia Mōsese, ‘o fekau ke ne ngaohi ia ke hangē ko e fakatātā kuo ne mamata ki ai.
44007045	Ko ia ia na‘e tukufakaholo ki he‘etau ngaahi kui na‘e ‘ia Siosiua, ‘o nau ‘omi ki heni lolotonga ‘enau ma‘u mai ‘a e fonua ‘o e ngaahi fa‘ahinga Senitaile, ‘a ia na‘e fakateka atu kinautolu ‘e he ‘Otua mei he ‘ao ‘o ‘etau ngaahi kui; ‘o nau fai‘aki ia ‘o a‘u ki he kuonga ‘o Tēvita:
44007046	‘a ia ‘i he‘ena mālie mo e ‘Otua, na‘a ne kole ke tuku ma‘ana ke kumi ha me‘i fakahekeheke mo‘o e ‘Otua ‘o Sēkope:
44007047	pea langa ‘e Solomone mo‘ona ha fale hau.
44007048	Ka neongo ia, ka tala‘ehai ‘oku ‘afio ‘a e ‘Eiki Taupotu ‘i ha me‘a ‘oku ngaohi ‘e he nima. Vakai ki he lea ‘a e palōfita,
44007049	‘Oku folofola mai ‘a e ‘Eiki, Ko e Langi ko hoku taloni pē, Pea mo Māmani ko hoku tu‘ungava‘e pē: Pea ko e hā ai ‘a e anga ‘o e fale te mou langa mai? Pea ko e fē ‘a e potu ke u ta‘utu ai?
44007050	‘Ikai na‘e ngaohi ‘e hoku nima ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia kotoa?
44007051	‘Ā, ‘a e fa‘ahinga kia kekeva, mo ta‘ekamu homou loto mo e telinga, ‘oku mou malele ma‘u ai pē ke teke‘i ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni: na‘e pehē ho‘omou ngaahi kui, pea pehē foki mo kimoutolu.
44007052	Ko e fē ha taha ‘o e kau palōfita na‘e ‘ikai fakatanga‘i ‘e ho‘omou ngaahi kui? ‘Io, na‘a nau tāmate‘i ‘a kinautolu na‘e sinaki tala ‘a e hā‘ele mai ‘a e Toko Taha Angatonu; ‘a ia kuo mou hoko kimui ni ko hono kau lavaki mo hono kau fakapoongi:
44007053	ko e fa‘ahinga na‘a mou ma‘u ‘a e Lao ‘i hono talafono‘aki ‘e ha kau ‘āngelo, ka na‘e ‘ikai te mou tauhi ki ai.
44007054	Pea ‘i he‘enau fanongo ki he me‘a ko ia, na‘e hangē kuo kilisi ‘o fahiua honau loto, ‘o nau ‘ūtaki kaunifo kiate ia.
44007055	Ka kuo fonu ia ‘i he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni; pea ‘i he‘ene sio fakamama‘u ki he langi na‘a ne ‘ilo ‘a e Sikaina ‘o e ‘Otua, pea mo Sīsū ‘oku ne tu‘u mei he to‘omata‘u ‘o e ‘Otua; pea ne pehē,
44007056	‘Oku ou sio ni ki he ngaahi langi kuo matangaki, pea ko e Fanautama ‘a Tangata ‘oku ne tu‘u mei he to‘omata‘u ‘o e ‘Otua.
44007057	Pea nau fu‘u kālou, ‘o nau tāpuni honau telinga, pea nau ‘oho taha kiate ia.
44007058	‘O nau kapusi kitua‘ā kolo, ‘o kamata tolomaka‘i; pea ko e kau tukuaki na‘a nau laku atu honau ngaahi kote ki he va‘e ‘o ha talavou na‘e hingoa ko Saula.
44007059	Pea nau fai ‘a e tolongi ‘o Sitīveni ‘oku ne tautapa ange ‘o pehē, ‘Eiki Sīsū, ke ke ma‘u atu hoku laumālie.
44007060	Pea ne tū‘ulutui, ‘o kalanga le‘o lahi, ‘Eiki, ‘oua na‘a lau ‘a e angahala ni kiate kinautolu. Pea ‘i he‘ene lea pehē na‘a ne mohe.
44008001	PEA ko Saula, ne ne fakava‘eva‘e hono fakapoongi. Pea ko e ‘aho ko ia na‘e hoko ai ha fu‘u fakatanga ki he siasi na‘e ‘i Selusalema; pea na‘e movetevete kotoa pē ki he ngaahi feitu‘u ‘o Siutea mo Samēlia: ko e kau ‘Aposetolo pē na‘e ‘ikai.
44008002	Pea na‘e fai ‘a e putu ‘o Sitīveni ‘e ha tu‘unga mātu‘a lotu mo‘oni, pea nau fai ‘iate ia ha fu‘u tangi fetuki.
44008003	Pea ko Saula, na‘a ne have‘i ‘a e siasi, he‘ene fehūfaki ‘i he ngaahi tu‘u fale, mo ne fetoho ‘a e tangata mo e fefine fakatou‘osi, ‘o fakahū ki he pilīsone.
44008004	Pea ko kinautolu na‘e vetekina na‘a nau ‘alu atu pē mo malanga‘aki ‘a e folofola.
44008005	Pea ‘alu hifo ‘a Filipe ki ha kolo ‘o Samēlia, ‘o ne malanga‘aki ‘a Kalaisi kiate kinautolu.
44008006	Pea na‘e tokanga taha ‘a e kakai ki he ngaahi fakamatala ‘a Filipe, ko ‘enau fanongo mo mamata ki he ngaahi mana na‘a ne fai.
44008007	He ko e tokolahi na‘e fa‘ahikehea ne nau ha‘u kitu‘a mo e fu‘u kaila; pea na‘e fakamo‘ui mo e tokolahi na‘e mamatea mo heke.
44008008	Pea na‘e hoko ki he kolo ko ia ha fu‘u fiefia.
44008009	Pea na‘e ai ha tangata, tokua, na‘e hingoa ko Saimone, na‘e nofo mu‘a ‘i he kolo, ‘o fai ‘ene ngāue maki; pea na‘e to‘oa ai ‘a e loto ‘o e kakai Samēlia, he‘ene pehē ko e toko taha ia ‘oku kehe.
44008010	Pea nau tokanga kotoa pē kiate ia ‘a e iiki mo e lalahi, ‘o nau pehē, Ko e toko taha ‘eni ko e fo‘i ivi ko ia ‘o e ‘Otua ‘oku ui ko e tu‘ukimu‘a.
44008011	Pea na‘a nau tokanga kiate ia, koe‘uhi kuo fuoloa ‘enau to‘oa ‘i he‘ene ngaahi ngāue maki.
44008012	Ka ‘i he‘enau tui kia Filipe, he‘ene malanga‘aki ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua, mo e Huafa ‘o Sīsū Kalaisi, na‘a nau papitaiso, ‘a e kau tangata mo e kau fefine foki.
44008013	Pea na‘a mo Saimone na‘e tui mo ia: pea hili hono papitaiso na‘a ne ma‘unganofo kia Filipe, pea ‘i he‘ene mamata ki he ngaahi mana, mo e ngaahi fu‘u ngāue fakaofo na‘e fai, na‘e to‘oa hono loto.
44008014	Pea ‘i he fanongo ‘a e kau ‘Aposetolo mei Selusalema, Tokua kuo tali ‘e Samēlia ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua, na‘a nau fekau atu kiate kinautolu ‘a Pita mo Sione.
44008015	Pea ‘i he‘ena a‘u hifo, na‘a na hūfia kinautolu ke nau ma‘u ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni:
44008016	he kuo te‘eki si‘i hifo ia ki hanau toko taha, ka na‘a nau ngata pē ‘i he papitaiso ki he huafa ‘o e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū.
44008017	Pea na toki hilifaki hona nima kiate kinautolu, pea nau ma‘u ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni.
44008018	Pea ‘i he vakai ‘e Saimone ‘oku foekina ‘a e Laumālie ‘i he hilifaki ‘o e nima ‘o e ongo ‘Aposetolo, na‘a ne humu‘i atu ha pa‘anga kiate kinaua,
44008019	‘o ne pehē, Tuku mai kiate au foki ‘a e mafai ko ia; koe‘uhi ke ‘ilonga ha taha te u hilifaki nima ki ai, pea ne ma‘u ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni.
44008020	Pea pehē ‘e Pita kiate ia, Ke ‘alu mo koe ho‘o pa‘anga ki mala; koe‘uhi ko ho‘o fakakaukau ke fakatau ‘a e me‘a‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua ‘aki ha pa‘anga.
44008021	‘Oku ‘ikai hao ‘inasi, ‘uma‘ā hao kaunga ‘i he me‘a ni: he ‘oku ‘ikai totonu ho loto ‘i ho‘o fakafeangai ki he ‘Otua.
44008022	Ko ia, ke ke fei mo liliu mei ho‘o angakovi ko eni, pea hū ki he ‘Eiki; hei‘ilo ‘e fakamolemole ‘a e fakakaukau ‘a ho loto:
44008023	he ‘oku ou vakai ‘oku ke kei mo‘ua ‘i he kona ‘o e ‘ahu, mo e ha‘i ‘o e angahala.
44008024	Pea tali ‘e Saimone ‘o ne pehē, Mo hūfia au ki he ‘Eiki, ke ‘oua na‘a hoko kiate au ha taha ‘o e ngaahi me‘a kuo mo me‘a ki ai.
44008025	Pea ko kinaua, hili ‘ena fakapapau mo malanga‘aki ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Eiki, na‘a na foki ki Selusalema; pea na‘e ai mo e ngaahi vilisi ni‘ihi ‘o e kau Samēlia na‘a na malanga‘aki ai ‘a e Kōsipeli.
44008026	Pea me‘a kia Filipe ha ‘āngelo ‘a e ‘Eiki, ‘o pehē, Tu‘u, ‘o ‘alu ki he potu tonga, ki he hala ‘oku ‘alu hifo mei Selusalema ki Kesa; ko e hala ia ‘oku ‘alu ‘i he lala.
44008027	Pea ne tu‘u ‘o ‘alu. Pea tā na‘e ai ha matāpule ‘Itiopea, ko e ‘iunoke, ko e minisitā ‘a Kanetake ko e kuini ‘o e kakai ‘Itiopea, pea ‘a‘ana ‘a e tauhi ‘o ‘ene koloa kotoa; kuo ‘alu hake ia ki Selusalema ke fai ‘ene lotu.
44008028	Pea fe‘unga mo ia ‘oku ne foki, pea ‘oku ne nofo ‘i he‘ene sāliote ‘o lau ‘a e tohi ‘a e palōfita ko ‘Aisea.
44008029	Pea folofola ‘a e Laumālie kia Filipe, ‘Unu‘unu atu, ‘o ō mo e sāliote ko ia.
44008030	Pea ‘i he lele atu ‘a Filipe, na‘a ne fanongo tā ‘oku ne lau ‘a e tohi ‘a e palōfita ko ‘Aisea, pea ne pehē, Mālō, ka ‘oku ke ‘ilo ‘a e ‘uhinga ‘o e me‘a ‘oku ke lau?
44008031	Pea me‘a mai ia, ‘O u ‘ilo fēfē, ta‘eha taha kē ne fakahinohino au? Pea ne kole kia Filipe ke ne heka mai ke na nonofo.
44008032	Pea ko e potu tohi na‘a ne lau ko eni, Na‘e taki ia ‘o hangē ko hā sipi kē tāmate‘i; pea hangē ko e longo ‘a ha lami ‘i hono ngaohi ‘e he tangata ‘oku ne kosi, na‘e pehē tofu pē ‘ene ta‘ematangaki hono fofonga.
44008033	‘I he‘ene mo‘ulaloa na‘e fakamālohia hono fakamaau; pea ‘e mafakamatala ‘e hai hono to‘utangata? he na‘e ‘ave fakamālohi ‘ene mo‘ui mei māmani.
44008034	Pea lea ange ‘a e ‘iunoke kia Filipe, ‘o ne pehē, Fakamolemole, ka ke tala mai, pe ko e lea ‘eni ‘a e palōfita kia hai? kiate ia pē, pe ki ha taha kehe?
44008035	Pea hanga ‘a Filipe ‘o lea, ‘o kamata mei he potu tohi ko ia ‘ene malanga‘aki ‘a Sīsū kiate ia.
44008036	Pea ‘i he‘ena fononga ‘i he hala, na‘a na a‘u ki ha vai: pea pehē ‘e he ‘iunoke, ‘Ē, ko e vai ‘eni; ‘oku ai ha me‘a ‘oku ta‘ofi ki haku papitaiso?
44008037	Pea tali ‘e Filipe, Kapau ‘oku ke tui ‘aki ‘a e kotoa ho loto, te ke lava. Pea ne tali ‘o pehē, ‘Oku ou tui ko Sīsū Kalaisi ko e ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otua.
44008038	Pea ne fekau ke tu‘u ‘a e sāliote: pea na ō hifo kinaua ki he vai, ‘a Filipe mo e ‘iunoke fakatou‘osi, pea ne papitaiso ia.
44008039	Pea ‘i he‘ena ō hake mei he vai, na‘e punakaki ‘a Filipe ‘e he Laumālie ‘o e ‘Eiki, pea na‘e ‘ikai ke toe sio kiate ia ‘e he ‘iunoke: he na‘a ne fai atu ‘ene fononga kuo fiefia hono loto.
44008040	Ka na‘e ‘ilo ‘a Filipe ki ‘Āsota: pea na‘a ne malanga‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli ‘i he ngaahi kolo ko ia kotoa, ‘o tukutuku holo ‘o a‘u ki Sesalia.
44009001	KA ko Saula na‘a ne kei hō‘aki ‘a e fakamanamana mo e lau fakapō ki he kau ako ‘a e ‘Eiki, ‘o ne ‘alu ki he Taula‘eiki Lahi,
44009002	‘o ne kole ke fai ha‘ane ngaahi tohi ki Tāmasikusi ki he ngaahi fale lotu, ke fakangofua ‘ene ha‘i mo taki mai ki Selusalema ‘a kinautolu te ne ‘ilo ai ‘oku ‘i he ‘alunga ko ē, ‘a tangata mo fafine.
44009003	Pea ‘i he‘ene fai ‘ene fononga, ‘o fakaofiofi ki Tāmasikusi, fakafokifā na‘e malama takatakai kiate ia ha maama mei he langi:
44009004	pea tō ia ki he kelekele, ‘o ne fanongo ki ha le‘o ‘oku pehē mai, ‘E Saula, ‘e Saula, ko e hā ‘oku ke fakatanga‘i ai au.
44009005	Pea pehē ‘e ia, ‘Ēī, ko hai koe?
44009006	Pea me‘a mai ‘e ia, Ko au ko Sīsū, ‘a ia ‘oku ke fakatanga‘i: ka ke tu‘u ā, ‘o hū ki kolo; pea ‘e fakahā ai kiate koe ha‘o me‘a ke fai.
44009007	Pea tutu‘u ‘a e kau tangata na‘e fononga mo ia ‘oku nau mo‘ulongoa: he na‘a nau fanongo pē ki he le‘o, ka na‘e ‘ikai te nau sio ki ha taha.
44009008	Pea kuo tu‘u hake ‘a Saula, ‘o ne fakaava hono mata, tā ‘oku ‘ikai te ne ‘ilo ha me‘a: pea na‘a nau taki nima‘i ia ‘o hūfaki ki Tāmasikusi.
44009009	Pea na‘a ne nofo ai ‘o ‘aho tolu, ‘o kui pē; pea na‘e ‘ikai te ne kai pe inu.
44009010	Pea na‘e nofo ‘i Tāmasikusi ha ako na‘e hingoa ko ‘Ānanaia: pea na‘e folofola ‘a e ‘Eiki kiate ia ‘i ha vīsone, ‘E ‘Ānanaia.
44009011	Pea pehē ‘e ia, ‘Eī, ko au ‘eni. Pea folofola ‘a e ‘Eiki kiate ia, Tu‘u, ‘o ‘alu ki he hala ‘oku hingoa ko Totonu, ‘o ‘eke ‘i he fale ‘o Siutasi ki ha motu‘a Tāsusi ‘oku hingoa ko Saula. He ko eni, ‘oku ne lolotonga fai ‘ene hū.
44009012	Pea kuo ne mamata ki ha tangata ‘oku hingoa ko ‘Ānanaia, ‘oku ne hū mai ‘o hilifaki hono nima kiate ia, koe‘uhi ke ne toe ‘ā.
44009013	Pea tali ‘e ‘Ānanaia, ‘Eiki, kuo u fanongo mei he tokolahi ki he tangata ni, ‘ene fu‘u ngaohikovi‘i ho kakai tapu ‘i Selusalema:
44009014	pea ‘i heni kuo ne ma‘u tu‘utu‘uni mei he hou‘eiki taula‘eiki, ke ha‘i ‘a e kakai kotoa pē ‘oku tāpafua‘i ho huafa.
44009015	Pea folofola ‘a e ‘Eiki kiate ia, ‘Alu pē; he ko e ipu mātu‘aki fili ‘eni ‘a‘aku, ke hapai hoku hingoa ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e Senitaile, mo e ngaahi tu‘i, mo ha‘a ‘Isileli foki.
44009016	He ko au te u fakahā kiate ia ‘a e ngaahi fu‘u mamahi ‘e tō kiate ia koe‘uhi ko hoku hingoa.
44009017	Pea ‘alu ange ‘a ‘Ānanaia, ‘o hū ki he fale; ‘o ne hilifaki hono nima kiate ia, ‘o ne pehē, ‘Alā Saula, ko e ‘Eiki, ‘io, ‘a Sīsū na‘e hā kiate koe ‘i he hala ‘i ho‘o fononga mai, kuo ne fekau mai au koe‘uhi ke ke toe ‘ā, mo ke fonu ‘i he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni.
44009018	Pea na‘e ngangana leva mei hono ongo mata ha ngaahi me‘a hangē ni ‘uno‘i ika; pea na‘a ne ‘ā, ‘o ne tu‘u hake ‘o papitaiso.
44009019	Pea hili ‘ene fai ‘ene kai na‘a ne mālohi.
44009020	Pea ne hanga leva ‘o malanga‘aki ‘a Sīsū ‘i he ngaahi falelotu, ‘o pehē, Ko e ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otua ia.
44009021	Pea nau fakatumutumu kotoa pē ‘a kinautolu na‘e fanongo ki ai, ‘o nau pehē; ‘Ikai ko eni ia na‘e laiki ‘a e kakai ‘i Selusalema na‘e tāpafua‘i ‘a e hingoa ni, pea ne ha‘u ki heni foki ke fai pehē, ‘o taki ha‘isia ‘a e kakai ki he hou‘eiki taula‘eiki?
44009022	Ka ka ‘āsili fakautuutu ai ‘a e mālohi ‘a Saula, ‘o ne fakapuputu‘u ‘a e kakai Siu na‘e nofo ‘i Tāmasikusi, ko e maau ‘ene fakamo‘oni ko e Mīsaia pē ia.
44009023	Pea kuo hili fuoloa, pea na‘e puleaki ‘a e kakai Siu ke fakapoongi:
44009024	ka ka ‘ilo pē ‘e Saula ‘enau fakakaukau. Pea na‘a nau le‘ohi ‘a e ngaahi matanikolo ‘i he ‘aho mo e pō, koe‘uhi ke fakapoongi ia:
44009025	ka ka ‘ave po‘uli ia ‘e he‘ene kau ako, ‘o nau ‘ohifo ‘i he ‘ā, ‘o tukutuku ki lalo ‘i ha kato.
44009026	Pea ‘i he‘ene hoko ki Selusalema, na‘a ne ala‘aki ke fakahoko ia ki he kau ako: pea nau teteki kotoa pē kiate ia, ko e ‘ikai te nau tui ko ha ako ia.
44009027	Ka ka puke ‘e Pānepasa hono nima, ‘o ne taki ki he kau ‘Aposetolo, ‘o ne fakamatala kiate kinautolu ‘a ‘ene mamata ki he ‘Eiki ‘i he hala, mo ‘ene folofola kiate ia, mo ‘ene malanga mālohi ‘aki ‘a e huafa ‘o Sīsū ‘i Tāmasikusi.
44009028	Pea na‘a ne nofo mo kinautolu ‘o fetoutoumoliliu‘aki ‘i Selusalema, mo ne malanga mālohi ‘aki ‘a e huafa ‘o e ‘Eiki.
44009029	Kae‘uma‘ā na‘a ne akonaki ki he kau ‘Elinisito, ‘o fakakikihi mo kinautolu; pea ‘ahi‘ahi ‘e kinautolu ke fakapoongi ia.
44009030	Pea ‘i he ‘ilo ki ai ‘e he kāinga, na‘a nau holataki ia ki Sesalia, ‘o tuku mei ai ki Tāsusi.
44009031	Pea na‘e mālōlō ‘a e Siasi ‘i Siutea kotoa, mo Kāleli, mo Samēlia, pea hangē ha fale na‘e langa hake ai pē; pea na‘e fou ‘i he ‘apasia ki he ‘Eiki; pea ko e me‘a ‘i he tokoni ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni na‘e hoko ‘o fu‘u tokolahi.
44009032	Pea ko eni, lolotonga ‘a e fai ‘e Pita ‘ene ‘a‘ahi ki he kakai lotu kotoa pē, na‘a ne hoko hifo kiate kinautolu na‘e nofo ‘i Lita.
44009033	Pea ne ‘ilo ai ha tangata na‘e hingoa ko ‘Eneasi, ‘a ia kuo valu ta‘u ‘ene toka, he ko e mamatea.
44009034	Pea pehē ‘e Pita ki ai, ‘E ‘Eneasi, ‘oku faito‘o koe ‘e Sīsū Kalaisi: tu‘u, ‘o ngaohi ho mohenga ‘e koe.
44009035	Pea ne tu‘u leva; pea na‘e mamata kiate ia ‘a e kakai kotoa pē na‘e nofo ‘i Lita, mo e Feitu‘u ko Sāloni: pea ko kinautolu na‘a nau tafoki ki he ‘Eiki.
44009036	Pea na‘e nofo ‘i Siopa ha fefine ako na‘e hingoa ko Tāpaita, ‘a ia ‘oku ui ‘i he lea ‘e taha ko Toakase: ko e fefine ia na‘e mohu ‘i he ngaahi ngāue lelei, mo e fai ‘ofa ki he tu‘utāmaki, ‘a ia na‘a ne toutou fai.
44009037	Pea ‘i he taimi ko ia na‘a ne tu‘ia ‘i ha mahaki, ‘o ne pekia: pea hili ‘enau tatafi ia, na‘a nau tuku ‘i ha loki ‘i ‘olunga.
44009038	Pea ko e me‘a ‘i he vāofi ‘a Lita mo Siopa, mo e fanongo ‘e he kau ako ‘oku ‘i ai ‘a Pita, ko ia na‘a nau fekau atu kiate ia ha ongo tangata, ke na kole ‘o pehē, ‘Oua te ke louloua‘a ke a‘u mai kiate kimautolu.
44009039	Pea tu‘u ‘a Pita, ‘o ō mo kinautolu. Pea ‘i he‘ene lava mai na‘a nau ‘ohake ia ki he loki ‘i ‘olunga: pea tutu‘u mai ‘a e kau uitou ‘oku nau tangi, mo faka‘ali‘ali honau ngaahi kofu loto mo e ngaahi kofu tu‘a, ‘a ia ne ngaohi ‘e si‘i Toakase ‘i he‘ene kei ‘iate kinautolu.
44009040	Pea kapusi kinautolu kotoa ‘e Pita, ‘o ne tū‘ulutui ‘o lotu, ‘o ne toki tafoki ‘o lea ki he ‘anga‘anga ‘o pehē, Tāpaita, tu‘u hake. Pea ‘ā ai ‘a e fefine: pea ‘i he‘ene vakai kia Pita na‘a ne nofo hake.
44009041	Pea ne mafao hono nima ki he fefine, ‘o fokotu‘u ia; pea ne ui ‘a e kakai lotu mo e kau uitou, ‘o ne fakahā ia kiate kinautolu kuo mo‘ui.
44009042	Pea na‘e faifai pea ‘ilo ki ai ‘a Siopa kātoa, pea tui ha tokolahi ki he ‘Eiki.
44009043	Pea hoko ai na‘a ne nofo fuoloa ‘i Siopa ‘i he fale ‘o ha motu‘a ko Saimone ko e tufunga kili‘imanu.
44010001	PEA na‘e ai ha matāpule, tokua, ‘i Sesalia na‘e hingoa ko Koliniusi; ko e senituliō ia ‘i he vāhenga tau na‘e hingoa ki ‘Ītali.
44010002	Ko e toko taha lotu mo‘oni pea ‘apasia ki he ‘Otua, ‘e ia mo hono fale kotoa, ‘o lahi ‘ene fai ‘ofa ki he kakai ‘Isileli na‘e tu‘utāmaki; pea ko e toko taha na‘e lotu ki he ‘Otua ma‘u ai pē.
44010003	Pea fe‘unga nai mo hono hiva ‘o e houa, ‘aho, na‘e mamata pau ‘e ia ‘i hā vīsone ki hā ‘āngelo ‘a e ‘Eiki, ‘oku ne hū ange ‘o me‘a mai, ‘E Koliniusi.
44010004	Ka ka sio fakamama‘u ia, ‘o ne mo‘utāfu‘ua, ‘o ne toki pehē, ‘Ēī, ko e hā? Pea me‘a mai ‘e ia, Kuo tau hake ho‘o ngaahi hū, mo ho‘o ngaahi fai ‘ofa, ‘o hoko ko e me‘a ke manatu ki ai ‘e he ‘Otua.
44010005	Pea ko eni, fekau leva ha kau tangata ki Siopa ke ‘omi ha motu‘a ko Saimone, ‘a ia ‘oku hingoa foki ko Pita:
44010006	‘oku ‘āunofo ia ki ha motu‘a ko Saimone ko e tufunga kili‘imanu, ‘a ia ‘oku tu‘u hono fale ‘i matātahi.
44010007	Pea kuo sītu‘a ‘a e ‘āngelo na‘e lea kiate ia, pea ne ui ange ha toko ua ‘o ‘ene kau tamaio‘eiki, pea mo ha toko taha ‘o e kau tau na‘e ma‘unganofo kiate ia, ko e siana sōtia lotu mo‘oni:
44010008	pea hili ‘ene fakamatala kātokatoa kiate kinautolu, na‘a ne fekau atu kinautolu ki Siopa.
44010009	Pea pongipongi hake, lolotonga ‘a e fononga mai ‘a e tu‘unga me‘a ko ia, ‘o fakaofiofi ki he kolo, mo e ‘alu hake ‘a Pita ki he tu‘afale ke fai ‘ene lotu, fe‘unga nai mo hono ono ‘o e houa.
44010010	Pea kuo hālofia ia, pea ne loto ke tokoni: pea lolotonga ‘enau teuteu ne ‘āvea hono loto.
44010011	Pea na‘a ne vakai ‘oku matangaki ‘a e langi, pea ‘oku ‘alu hifo ha ‘angame‘a ‘o hangē ha fu‘u lā, pea tuku hifo ki māmani ‘aki ha hiku‘i maea ‘e fā:
44010012	pea na‘e ‘i ai ‘a e ngaahi fa‘ahinga manu kehekehe ‘o e kelekele, ‘a e ve‘efā mo e totolo, pea mo e manupuna ‘o e ‘atā.
44010013	Pea na‘e ongo mai ha le‘o kiate ia na‘e pehē, Tu‘u, Pita, ‘o tāmate‘i ‘o kai.
44010014	Ka ka tali ‘e Pita, ‘Ēī, ‘e ‘ikai ha me‘a pehē; he ‘oku te‘eki si‘i te u kai ha ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ta‘etaau mo ta‘ema‘a.
44010015	Pea toe hoko mai ‘a e le‘o ko hono tu‘o ua, ‘o pehē, Ko e ngaahi me‘a kuo fakama‘a ‘e he ‘Otua, ‘oua te ke pehē ‘e koe ‘oku ta‘etaau.
44010016	Na‘e fai pehē ‘o tu‘o tolu, pea toki ‘ohake ‘a e ‘angame‘a ki he langi.
44010017	Pea lolotonga na‘e toumoua ‘a Pita, pe ko e hā nai ‘a e vīsone kuo ne mamata ki ai, ‘iloange, ko e kau talafekau ‘a Koliniusi, ‘a ia kuo nau fehu‘i holo ki he ‘api ‘o Saimone, ‘oku nau tutu‘u mai ki he matapā hū‘anga.
44010018	Pea kuo nau ui ange ha taha, ‘o nau toutou fehu‘i, ‘Oku ‘apitanga hena ‘a Saimone, ‘a ia ‘oku hingoa foki ko Pita?
44010019	Pea lolotonga ‘a e fakakaukau ‘a Pita ki hono ‘uhinga ‘o e vīsone, mo e folofola ‘a e Laumālie kiate ia, Ko eni, ‘oku kumi koe ‘e ha tu‘unga tangata:
44010020	ka neongo ia, ka ke tu‘u pē ‘o ‘alu hifo, ‘o ō mo kinautolu, ‘o ‘oua ‘e momo‘i tāla‘a; he ko ‘eku fekau kinautolu ‘e au.
44010021	Pea ‘alu hifo ‘a Pita ki he kau tangata, ‘o ne pehē, Eni, ko au ia ‘oku mou kumi ki ai: ko e hā e me‘a ‘oku mou omi ai?
44010022	Pea nau tali, Ko e senituliō ko Koliniusi, ko e matāpule faitotonu pea ‘apasia ki he ‘Otua, pea ‘oku fakaongolelei foki ‘e he kakai Siu kātokatoa, na‘e fale‘i ia ‘e ha ‘āngelo tapu ke ‘omi koe ki hono fale, ke ne ma‘u fakamatala meiate koe.
44010023	Pea ne ui ai kinautolu ke nau hū ange ‘o ‘apitanga ai. Pea pongipongi hake na‘a ne tu‘u, ‘o ‘alu atu mo kinautolu, pea na‘e ō mo ia ha ni‘ihi ‘i he kāinga mei Siopa.
44010024	Pea nau a‘u ki Sesalia ‘i he ‘aho ‘e taha. Pea na‘e nofo talitali ‘a Koliniusi kiate kinautolu, kuo ne fakataha hono kāinga, pea mo hono ngaahi kaume‘a.
44010025	Pea ‘i he ‘iloange ‘oku hū mai ‘a Pita, na‘e fakafetaulaki kiate ia ‘a Koliniusi, ‘o ne hinga atu ki hono va‘e, ‘o hū.
44010026	Ka ka langa‘i hake ia ‘e Pita, ‘o ne pehē, Tu‘u pē, he ko e tangata foki mo au.
44010027	Pea ne hū atu pē mo talanoa mo ia; pea tā ‘oku ‘i ai ‘a e tokolahi kuo fakataha.
44010028	Pea ne pehē kiate kinautolu, ‘Oku mou lāu‘ilo, ko e me‘a ia ‘oku tāpuhā ki he tangata Siu, ke fafale ki ha toko taha ‘i ha fa‘ahinga kehe, pe ‘uhi ki ai: pehē foki mo au, ka ne ta‘e‘oua ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘ene hīnoi‘i au ke ‘oua na‘a ku lau ha tangata ‘e taha ‘oku ne ta‘etaau pe ta‘ema‘a.
44010029	Ko hono ‘uhinga foki ia na‘a ku ha‘u leva ‘i ho‘omou fekau, ‘o ‘ikai te u fakapepe‘e: ko ia, ko ‘eku fehu‘i pe ko e hā ‘a e me‘a na‘a mou fiema‘u ai au?
44010030	Pea me‘a ‘a Koliniusi, Ko hono fā ‘o e ‘aho kuo hili ange, ne u fai ‘i hoku fale ‘a e feinga lotu ‘o hono hiva ‘o e houa, pea u fai atu ke a‘u ki he feitu‘ula‘ā ‘oku tau ‘i ai ni: mo e ‘iloange ‘oku tu‘u ha matāpule ‘i hoku ‘ao ‘oku kofu ngingila.
44010031	Pea ne pehē mai, ‘E Koliniusi, kuo ongo hake ho‘o hū, pea ko ho‘o ngaahi fai ‘ofa kuo tauhi ‘a e manatu ki ai ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e ‘Otua.
44010032	Ko ia, ke ke fekau leva ki Siopa, ‘o tala ke ha‘u ‘a Saimone, ‘a ia ‘oku hingoa foki ko Pita; ‘oku ne ‘āunofo ‘i he fale ‘o Saimone ko e tufunga kili‘imanu ‘i matātahi.
44010033	Ko ia, na‘e ‘alu atu leva ‘eku fekau kiate koe; pea mālō mo koe ho‘o lava mai. Pea ko eni kuo mau tefua mai ‘i he ‘afio ‘a e ‘Otua, ke ma‘u ‘a e ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni kuo ha‘u mo koe mei he ‘Eiki.
44010034	Pea ofa‘aki ‘e Pita ‘ene lea ‘o ne pehē, Tā ko ‘ene toki mahino mai ē kiate au, ‘oku ‘ikai ke filifilimānako ‘a e ‘Otua:
44010035	ka neongo pe ko e fe‘ia ‘a e kakai, ka ‘ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku ‘apasia kiate ia, pea ngāue fai ki he totonu, ‘oku ngofua ke ne a‘u mai kiate ia.
44010036	Tā ko e akonaki ia na‘a ne tuku atu ki ha‘a ‘Isileli, he‘ene fakahā ‘ia Sīsū Kalaisi ‘a e ongoongolelei ‘o e melino; ko e ‘Eiki mo‘oni ia ‘o e kakai kotoa pē.
44010037	‘Oku mou ‘ilo ‘a e ongoongo na‘e pavake ‘i Siutea kātoa, ‘a ia na‘e kamata mei Kāleli, hili ‘a e papitaiso na‘e malanga‘aki ‘e Sione;
44010038	‘a e ongoongo ‘o Sīsū–‘a ia mei Nāsaleti–‘a hono pani ia ‘e he ‘Otua ‘aki ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni, mo e mafai ‘o e mana: pea ‘alu atu ia mo ngāue ‘aonga, mo ne faito‘o ‘a kinautolu ‘oku fakapōpula‘i ‘e he tēvolo; he na‘e kau ma‘u pē mo ia ‘a e ‘Otua.
44010039	Pea ko kimautolu ko e kau fakamo‘oni ‘o e ngaahi me‘a na‘a ne fai ‘i he fonua ‘o e kakai Siu, kae‘uma‘ā ‘i Selusalema; ‘a ia foki na‘a nau fakapoongi, he‘enau tautau ia he ‘akau:
44010040	ko e toko taha ko ia na‘e fokotu‘u ‘e he ‘Otua ‘i hono ‘aho tolu, ‘o ne tuku ke mātu‘aki hā;
44010041	‘o ‘ikai ki he kakai kotoa pē, ka ki ha kau fakamo‘oni na‘e sinaki fili ‘e he ‘Otua, ‘a ia ko kimautolu, ko e tu‘unga me‘a na‘a mau kai mo inu fakataha mo ia hili ‘ene toetu‘u mei he pekia.
44010042	Pea na‘a ne fekau ke mau fanongonongo ia ki he kakai ‘Isileli, mo fakapapau ko eni ia ‘a e toko taha kuo polo‘i ‘e he ‘Otua, ko e fakamaau ‘o e kau mo‘ui mo e kau pekia.
44010043	‘Oku fakamatala ‘a e kau palōfita kotoa pē ki he toko taha ko ia, ‘o pehē, ‘Ilonga ha taha ‘oku tui pīkitai kiate ia, ‘oku ne ma‘u ‘a e fakamolemole angahala koe‘uhi ko hono Huafa.
44010044	Lolotonga ‘a e kei lea‘aki ‘e Pita ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia, na‘e hifo ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni kiate kinautolu kotoa pē na‘e fanongo ki he fakamatala.
44010045	Pea ko kinautolu ‘o e fa‘ahinga kamu na‘e tui, ‘a ia kuo nau omi mo Pita, na‘a nau fakatumutumu, koe‘uhi ko e hua‘i ki he Senitaile foki ‘a e me‘a‘ofa ko e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni.
44010046	He na‘a nau fanongo kiate kinautolu ‘oku nau lea‘aki ‘a e ngaahi lea kehekehe, mo fakahīkihiki ‘a e ‘Otua. Toki lea ange ‘a Pita,
44010047	Ko hai ‘e kākunga ke ta‘ofi ‘a e vai, ke ‘oua na‘a papitaiso ‘a kinautolu na, ka kuo nau ma‘u ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni ‘o tatau tofu pē mo kitautolu?
44010048	Pea ne fekau ke papitaiso kinautolu ‘i he huafa ‘o e ‘Eiki. Pea nau kole kiate ia ke nofo si‘i hifo mo kinautolu.
44011001	PEA na‘e ongo ki he kau ‘Aposetolo, mo e kāinga kehekehe ‘i Siutea, tā kuo tali ‘e he Senitaile foki ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua.
44011002	Pea ‘i he ‘alu hake ‘a Pita ki Selusalema, pea ko e fa‘ahinga kamu na‘a nau fakaanga kiate ia,
44011003	‘o nau pehē, Na‘a ke ‘uhi ki ha kau tangata ‘oku ‘ikai kamu, pea ke keinanga mo kinautolu.
44011004	Pea hanga ‘a Pita ‘o fakamatala hokohoko kiate kinautolu, ‘o pehē:
44011005	Na‘a ku ‘i he kolo ko Siopa, ‘o fai ‘eku lotu; pea ‘āvea hoku loto, ‘o u sio ki ha vīsone, ‘Oku ‘alu hifo ha ‘angame‘a, ‘o hangē hā fu‘u lā, ‘a ia ‘oku tuku hifo mei he langi ‘aki ha hiku‘i maea ‘e fā; pea ne a‘u mai kiate au:
44011006	pea ‘i he‘eku sio fakamama‘u ki ai, na‘a ku tokanga‘i ‘o ‘ilo ai ha fanga manu ve‘e fā ‘o e kelekele, kae‘uma‘ā ‘a e manu kaivao, mo e manu totolo, pea mo e fanga manupuna ‘o e ‘atā.
44011007	Pea ongo mai foki ha le‘o ‘oku ne pehē mai, Tu‘u, Pita; ‘o tāmate‘i ‘o kai.
44011008	Pea u pehē, ‘Ēī, ‘e ‘ikai ha me‘a pehē: he kuo te‘eki si‘i ‘ai ki hoku ngutu ni ha me‘a ‘oku ta‘etaau pe ta‘ema‘a.
44011009	Pea hoko mai ‘a e le‘o mei he langi ko hono tu‘o ua, ‘o tali, Ko e ngaahi mea kuo fakama‘a ‘e he ‘Otua, ‘oua te ke pehē ‘e koe ‘oku ta‘etaau.
44011010	Na‘e fai pehē ‘o tu‘o tolu, pea toe fusi hake kotoa pē ki langi.
44011011	Pea vakai, na‘e tutu‘u mai leva ha tu‘unga tangata ‘e toko tolu ki he ‘api na‘a mau ‘i ai, kuo fekau mai mei Sesalia kiate au.
44011012	Pea folofola mai ‘a e Laumālie ke u ō mo kinautolu, ‘o ‘oua ‘e momo‘i tāla‘a. Pea na‘e ō mo au foki ha kāinga ‘e toko ono ‘a e tu‘unga me‘a ni pea mau hū ki he fale ‘o e matāpule:
44011013	pea fakamatala ia kiate kimautolu ‘a ‘ene sio ki he ‘āngelo ‘i hono fale, ‘oku ne tu‘u ‘o me‘a mai, Fekau ange ki Siopa ke ‘omi ‘a Saimone, ‘a ia ‘oku hingoa foki ko Pita;
44011014	pea ‘e fai ‘e ia ‘a e ngaahi fakamatala kiate koe, ‘a ia te ke mo‘ui ai, ‘e koe mo ho fale kotoa.
44011015	Pea ‘i he‘eku kamata lea, ne hifo ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni kiate kinautolu, ‘o hangē tofu pē ‘ene fai kiate kitautolu ‘i he kamata‘anga.
44011016	Pea u manatu ki he folofola ‘a e ‘Eiki, ‘a ‘ene pehē, Na‘e papitaiso vai pē ‘e Sione; ka ‘e papitaiso kimoutolu ‘aki ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni.
44011017	Pea kapau na‘e me‘a‘ofa tatau ‘aki ‘e he ‘Otua kiate kinautolu mo kitautolu ‘i he tui leva ki he ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, ko e taha au koā na‘e kākunga ke ta‘ofi ‘a e ‘Otua?
44011018	Pea ‘i he‘enau fanongo ki he ngaahi me‘a ko ia, na‘a nau tuku ‘enau lau; ‘o nau fakamālō‘ia ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘o nau pehē, Tā kuo tuku ‘e he ‘Otua ki he Senitaile foki ‘a e fakatomala, koe‘uhi ke nau mo‘ui.
44011019	Pea ko eni, ko kinautolu na‘e vetekina ‘i he kovi na‘e hoko ‘ia Sitīveni, na‘e a‘u ‘enau ‘alu ki Finisia, mo Saipalo, mo ‘Aniteoke; ka na‘e ‘ikai te nau malanga‘aki ‘a e folofola ki ha ni‘ihi kehe, ngata pē ‘i he kakai Siu.
44011020	Ka na‘e ai honau ni‘ihi ko e kau tangata mei Saipalo mo Sailine, pea ko kinautolu ‘i he‘enau hoko ki ‘Aniteoke na‘a nau lea ki he kakai Kalisi foki, he‘enau malanga‘aki ‘a e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū.
44011021	Pea na‘e kau mo kinautolu ‘a e māfimafi ‘o e ‘Eiki; pea na‘e tui ha fu‘u tokolahi, ‘o tafoki ki he ‘Eiki.
44011022	Pea na‘e pāpātelinga ki he siasi ‘i Selusalema ‘a e talanoa kiate kinautolu, pea na‘a nau tuku atu ‘a Pānepasa ke a‘u ki ‘Aniteoke.
44011023	Pea ‘i he‘ene lava mai ia, mo vakai ‘a e ‘ofa, tā ‘oku mei he ‘Otua ia, na‘a ne fiefia, pea na‘a ne tokoni kinautolu kotoa pē ke nau nofo ki he ‘Eiki mo e loto pau.
44011024	He ko e tangata lelei ia, pea fonu ‘i he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni mo e tui: pea na‘e ului ki he ‘Eiki ha kakai tokolahi.
44011025	Pea ne ‘alu mei ai ki Tāsusi ke kumi ‘a Saula:
44011026	pea ‘i he‘ene ‘ilo ia na‘a ne ‘omi ki ‘Aniteoke. Pea ko ia na‘a na toe nofo fakataha ‘i he siasi ‘o ta‘u kātoa, ‘o na akonekina ha kakai tokolahi: pea hoko ai foki na‘e fuofua ui ‘i ‘Aniteoke ‘a e kau ako ko e kau Kalisitiane.
44011027	‘I he taimi ko ia na‘e ‘alu hifo ha kau palōfita mei Selusalema ki ‘Aniteoke.
44011028	Pea tu‘u honau toko taha na‘e hingoa ko ‘Akapusi, ‘i he hā‘elea ia ‘e he Laumālie, ‘o ne lea fakatātā ki ha fu‘u honge ‘oku ene ke tō ki māmani kātoa: ‘a e honge ko ia na‘e hoko ‘i he kuonga ‘o Kaloti.
44011029	Pea tu‘utu‘uni ‘a e kau ako ke tānaki tokoni, ‘o takitaha ‘omi ha me‘a te ne lava, ke ‘ave ki he kāinga na‘e nofo ‘i Siutea.
44011030	Pea nau fai ia ‘o ‘ave ki he kau faifekau ‘ia Pānepasa mo Saula.
44012001	PEA lolotonga ia ne ala ‘e he Tu‘i ko Hēlota ki ha ni‘ihi ‘i he siasi ke ngaohikovi‘i:
44012002	pea na‘a ne tāmate‘i heletā ‘a Sēmisi ko e ta‘okete ‘o Sione.
44012003	Pea ‘i he‘ene vakai ‘oku lelei‘ia ai ‘a e kakai Siu, na‘a ne mōia atu ‘o puke mo Pita, pea ko e ngaahi ‘aho ia ‘o e tapu lēvani.
44012004	Pea kuo ne ma‘u ia, na‘a ne ‘ai pilīsone, ‘o ne tuku hono le‘ohi ki ha hoa ‘e fā, ‘o taki toko fā ‘a e sōtia ki he hoa; ‘o ne tu‘utu‘uni ke ‘oua ke hili ‘a e Pāsova pea ne toki taki atu ia, ‘o fokotu‘u ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e kakai.
44012005	Ko ia, na‘e le‘ohi pē ‘a si‘i Pita ‘i he pilīsone; ka na‘e ai ha hūfia na‘e fai tōtōaki ki he ‘Otua ‘e he siasi koe‘uhi ko ia.
44012006	Pea ‘i he hoko ki he pō kae taki atu pongipongi ia ‘e Hēlota, na‘e mohe ‘a Pita ‘i he vaha‘a ‘o ha ongo sōtia, kuo kii‘i ‘aki ha seini ‘e ua, pea tutu‘u ‘a e ongo le‘o ‘i he tu‘a matapā ‘o tauhi ‘a e pilīsone.
44012007	Mo e ‘iloange na‘e tu‘u mai ha ‘āngelo ‘a e ‘Eiki, pea malama mai ha maama ‘i he loki; pea na‘a ne taa‘i ‘a e vakavaka ‘o Pita, ‘o ne langa‘i hake, ‘o ne pehē, Tu‘u ke vave. Pea na‘e ngangana mei hono ongo nima ‘a e ongo seini na‘e ha‘i ‘aki ia.
44012008	Pea me‘a ‘a e ‘āngelo kiate ia, ‘Ai ho no‘o, pea fakama‘u ho teka. Pea ne fai. Pea pehē mai ‘e ia, Kahoa ho pulupulu, ‘o muimui mai.
44012009	Pea ne hū atu ‘o muimui ki ai; pea na‘e ‘ikai te ne ‘ilo ko e mo‘oni ‘a e me‘a ‘oku fai ‘e he ‘āngelo, ka ne mahalo ko e vīsone ‘oku ne mamata ki ai.
44012010	Pea kuo na tuku ki mui ‘a e ‘uluaki le‘o mo hono ua, pea na a‘u ki he matapā ukamea, ‘a ia ko e hū‘anga mei kolo; pea mato‘o ia kiate kinaua ‘iate ia pē: pea kuo na hū kitu‘a na‘a na laka atu, ‘o ‘osi mai ha hala ‘e taha; pea toki mole ‘a e ‘āngelo meiate ia.
44012011	Pea ‘i he matala ‘a e loto ‘o Pita, na‘a ne pehē, Tā ‘oku toki e‘a ni kiate au, kuo fekau mo‘oni ‘e he ‘Eiki ‘ene ‘āngelo, pea kuo ne hamusi au mei he nima ‘o Hēlota, mo e fu‘u ‘amanaki ‘a e kakai Siu.
44012012	Pea ‘i he o‘o kiate ia ‘a e me‘a, na‘a ne ‘alu ki he fale ‘o Mele ko e fa‘ē ‘a Sione (ko hono hingoa ‘e taha ko Ma‘ake), ‘a ia na‘e lolotonga ‘i ai ha tokolahi kuo fakataha ke hūfia.
44012013	Pea ‘i he‘ene tukituki ki he matapā ‘o e fale hū‘anga, na‘e ha‘u ha kaunanga na‘e hingoa ko Lota ke fehu‘i.
44012014	Pea ‘i he‘ene ‘ilo ko e le‘o ‘o Pita, na‘e pehē ‘ene fiefia na‘e ‘ikai te ne to‘o ‘a e matapā, ka ka lele ia ki loto fale, ‘o fakahā ‘oku tu‘u ‘a Pita ‘i he matapā.
44012015	Pea nau pehē kiate ia, ‘Oku ke sesele. Ka ka taukave pē ‘a e ta‘ahine, ko ia pē. Pea nau pehē, Tā ko hono ‘āngelo ia.
44012016	Ka ka hanganaki pē ‘a Pita ‘ene tukituki: pea ‘i he‘enau to‘o ‘a e matapā, ‘o ‘ilo ia, na‘a nau fakatumutumu.
44012017	Pea ta‘alo atu ‘e ia ke nau fakalongo pē, ‘o ne fakamatala kiate kinautolu ‘a hono fakahaofi ia ‘e he ‘Eiki mei he pilīsone. Na‘a ne pehē foki, Mou tala ‘a e me‘a kia Sēmisi mo e kāinga. Pea ne hū atu ‘o ‘alu ki ha potu kehe.
44012018	Pea ‘i he‘ene ‘aho hake, ko e me‘a ngei ‘a e puputu‘u ‘a e kau tau, ‘Oiauē! kuo hā ‘a Pita?
44012019	Pea kuo kumi ‘a Hēlota kiate ia, ‘o ‘ikai ‘ilo, na‘a ne ‘eke ‘a e kau le‘o, ‘o fekau ke taki atu ‘o tāmate‘i. Pea ne ‘alu hifo mei Siutea ki Sesalia, ‘o nofo si‘i ai.
44012020	Pea ko e taimi ko ia na‘e fai ai hono tuputāmaki ki he kakai ‘o Taia mo Saitoni: ka na‘a nau kautaha ‘o ha‘u kiate ia, pea nau fakaloto‘i ‘a Palasito ko e tauhi ‘o e fale mohe ‘o e Tu‘i mo‘onau fotufotuaki, ‘o nau kole ke fakalelei; koe‘uhi na‘e kai ‘utungaki honau fonua mei he fonua ‘o e Tu‘i.
44012021	Pea ‘i he hokosia ‘a e ‘aho na‘e kotofa, na‘e ‘ai ‘e Hēlota ha kofu fakatu‘i, ‘o ne nofo ‘i he taloni, ‘o ne fai ha fu‘u malanga kiate kinautolu ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e kakai.
44012022	Pea kalanga ‘a e kakai, Ko e folofola ‘a ha ‘Otua, ‘o ‘ikai ko ha tangata.
44012023	Pea te‘ia leva ia ‘e ha ‘āngelo ‘a e ‘Eiki, ko e ‘inanga ‘o e ‘ikai te ne tuku ‘a e kolōlia ki he ‘Otua: pea na‘e keina ia ‘e he ponu, ‘o ne hala.
44012024	Ka ko e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua na‘e tuputupu ma‘u pē, ‘o fakatokolahi.
44012025	Pea ko Pānepasa mo Saula na‘a na foki mei Selusalema ‘i he ‘osi ‘ena fekau, ‘o na ‘ave ‘a Sione, ‘a ia na‘e fakahingoa ko Ma‘ake.
44013001	PEA na‘e nofo ‘i ‘Aniteoke, ‘i he siasi na‘e tu‘u ai, ha tu‘unga palōfita mo ha tu‘unga akonaki; ‘a ia ko Pānepasa, pea mo Simione na‘e hingoa ko Naika, mo Lūsio mei Sailine; ko Māneno foki, ‘a ia na‘e huhu taha mo Hēlota ko e tu‘i, pea mo Saula.
44013002	Pea lolotonga ‘enau fai ‘enau lotu ki he ‘Eiki, mo nau ‘aukai, na‘e folofola mai ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni, ‘o pehē, vahe‘i mai mu‘a ma‘aku ‘a Pānepasa mo Saula ki he ngāue kuo u tu‘utu‘uni ma‘anaua.
44013003	Pea nau ‘aukai, mo hūfia, mo hilifaki nima kiate kinaua, ‘o nau toki tukuange ke na ō.
44013004	Pea ko eni, ‘i he fekau ange kinaua ‘e he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni, na‘a na a‘u hifo ki Selusia; pea na folau mei ai ki Saipalo.
44013005	Pea na hifo ‘i Salamisi, ‘o na malanga‘aki ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua ‘i he ngaahi fale lotu ‘o e kakai Siu: pea na‘e ō mo kinaua ‘a Sione mōna tokoni.
44013006	Pea kuo ‘osi ‘a e motu ‘i he‘enau ‘alu, na‘a nau a‘u ki Pefosi, ‘o nau ‘ilo ai ha matāpule Siu, ko e maki mo e palōfita loi, ko hono hingoa ko Pāsīsū:
44013007	‘a ia ‘oku na nonofo mo Sesio Paula ko e kōvana, ‘a ia ko e ‘eiki loto matala. Pea fekau ‘e he ‘eiki ko ia ke ‘omi ‘a Pānepasa mo Saula, ‘o ne holi ke fanongo ki he folofola ‘a e ‘Otua:
44013008	ka ka ‘ahi‘ahi lolomi kinaua ‘e he maki ko ‘Ēlima (he ko hono hingoa ia ‘i he lea ‘e taha), ‘o ne feinga ke ta‘ofi ‘a e Kōvana mei he lotu.
44013009	Pea ko Saula, ‘a ia ko hono hingoa foki ‘a Paula, ne fakafonu ia ‘i he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni, pea ne sio fakamama‘u ki he tangata,
44013010	‘o ne pehē, ‘A e siana fonu ngutungutu ‘i he kākā mo e fakaheke, hako ‘o e Tēvolo, ko e fakafili ki he me‘a kotoa pē ‘oku totonu, ‘e ‘ikai tuku koā ho‘o le‘ei ‘a e ngaahi hala ‘o e ‘Eiki, ‘a ia ‘oku totonu?
44013011	Pea ko eni vakai, kuo ala ni ‘a e māfimafi ‘o e ‘Eiki kiate koe; pea te ke kui, ‘o ‘ikai te ke sio ki he maama, ‘o ‘osi hono taimi. Pea na‘e tō leva kiate ia ha nenefu mo ha fakapo‘uli; pea ne tautaufā holo ki ha taha ke takinima ia.
44013012	Pea ‘i he vakai ‘e he kōvana ki he me‘a kuo fai, na‘a ne lotu, he‘ene to‘oa ‘i he anga ‘o e ako‘aki ‘o e ‘Eiki.
44013013	Pea kuo tuku atu mei Pafosi ‘a e folau ‘a Paula, na‘a nau hoko ki Peaka ‘i Pamifilia: pea na‘e li‘aki kinaua ‘e Sione, ‘o ne foki ki Selusalema.
44013014	Ka ka fou atu pē kinaua mei Peaka, ‘o na hoko ki ‘Aniteoke, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘i Pisitia; pea ‘i he ‘aho Sāpate na‘a na hū ki he falelotu ‘o nofo hifo.
44013015	Pea hili ‘a e lau ‘o e Tohi Lao mo e Tohi Palōfita, na‘e fekau mai ‘a e kau pule ‘o e falelotu ke fakahā kiate kinaua, Si‘i ongo matāpule, kapau ‘oku ai ha‘amo tokoni ke fai ki he kakai, pea mo lea mai.
44013016	Pea tu‘u ‘a Paula, ‘o ne ta‘alo, ‘o ne pehē, ‘A e tu‘unga mātu‘a ‘Isileli, mo e taka ‘apasia mai ki he ‘Otua, mou me‘a mai.
44013017	Ko e ‘Otua ‘o e kakai ‘Isileli ni na‘a ne fili ma‘ana ‘etau ngaahi kui, ‘o ne pusiaki ‘a e kakai lolotonga ‘enau ‘āunofo ‘i he fonua ko ‘Isipite, ‘o ne taki atu kinautolu mei ai kuo hiki tā hono nima.
44013018	Pea fuoloa ‘ene fafa kinautolu ‘i he toafa, ko e fāngofulu ta‘u nai.
44013019	Pea hili ‘ene faka‘auha ha kakai ‘e fitu ‘i he fonua ko Kēnani, na‘a ne vahe ‘a e fonua mo‘onau tofi‘a: ko e fe‘unga ia mo e fāngeau mā nimangofulu ta‘u.
44013020	Pea hili ia na‘a ne tuku honau kau Fakamaau, ‘o a‘u kia Sāmiuela ko e palōfita.
44013021	Pea hili ia na‘a nau kole ha tu‘i; pea tuku ‘e he ‘Otua mo‘onautolu ‘a Saula ko e foha ‘o Kisi, ko e matāpule ‘i he matakali ‘o Penisimani, ‘o fāngofulu ta‘u.
44013022	Pea kuo ne liua ia, pea ne fokotu‘u ‘a Tēvita ke tu‘i kiate kinautolu; ‘a ia na‘a ne folofola ai foki, ‘o fakapapau, Kuo u toki ‘ilo ‘a Tēvita ko e foha ‘o Sese, ko e tangata ia ‘oku ‘ao mo hoku loto, ko e taha ia te ne fai ‘eku ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni kotoa pē.
44013023	Ko e hako ‘o e toko taha ko ia kuo omi mei ai ‘e he ‘Otua mo‘o ‘Isileli, ‘o hangē ko ‘ene tala‘ofa, ha toko taha ke fai fakamo‘ui, ‘a ia ko Sīsū.
44013024	Ka na‘e tomu‘a malanga‘aki ‘e Sione ki he kakai ‘Isileli kotoa pē ‘a e papitaiso fakatomala, ko e fakamelomelo ‘o ‘ene hā‘ele mai.
44013025	Pea lolotonga ‘a e fai tulikaki ‘e Sione ‘ene fakapuepue, na‘a ne fa‘a pehē, Ko e hā au ‘i ho‘omou lau? ‘Ā, ‘oku ‘ikai ko ia au: ka ko eni, ‘oku hoko mo au ha Toko Taha ‘oku ‘ikai te u taau ke vete hono topuva‘e.
44013026	Kāinga Mātu‘a, ‘a e Hako totonu ‘o ‘Epalahame, mo kimoutolu ‘a e taka ‘apasia mai ki he ‘Otua, ko kitautolu ia kuo fekau mai ki ai ‘a e tala ‘o e mo‘ui‘anga ko ia.
44013027	He ko e kakai ‘oku nofo ‘i Selusalema, mo honau kau pule, ko e me‘a ‘i he ‘ufikaua kiate kinautolu ‘a e toko taha ko ia, mo e ngaahi lea ‘a e kau Palōfita, ‘a ia ‘oku lau ‘i he ngaahi Sāpate hokohoko, kuo nau fakamo‘oni ki he ngaahi palofisai ko ia ‘i he‘enau fakamāumatea ia.
44013028	Pea neongo na‘e ‘ikai te nau ‘ilo ha momo‘i me‘a ‘e taha ‘oku totonu ke ne mate ai, ka nau kole pē kia Pailato ke tāmate‘i ia.
44013029	Pea kuo nau lava leva ‘a e ngaahi me‘a kotoa pē ne tohi ma‘ana, na‘a nau ‘ohifo ia mei he ‘akau, ‘o telio ‘i ha fonualoto.
44013030	Ka ka fokotu‘u ia ‘e he ‘Otua mei he pekia:
44013031	pea ne hā ‘i he ngaahi ‘aho lahi ki he kakai ne ‘alu hake mo ia mei Kāleli ki Selusalema, ‘a e fa‘ahinga ‘oku nofo ‘i onopooni, ko ‘ene kau fakamo‘oni ki he kakai ‘Isileli,
44013032	pea ko kimaua, ‘oku ma ongoongoa atu ‘a e tala lelei, ‘o pehē, Ko e tala ‘ofa na‘e fai ki he‘etau ngaahi kui,
44013033	kuo fakamo‘oni ia ‘e he ‘Otua ki he‘etau fānau ‘i he‘ene toe fokotu‘u ‘a Sīsū; ‘o hangē foki kuo tohi ‘i hono ua ‘o e Saame: Ko hoku ‘Alo koe, Ko au kuo u fakatupu koe he ‘aho ni.
44013034	Pea ko e me‘a ki he‘ene fokotu‘u ia mei he pekia ke ‘oua na‘a toe kākunga ke foki ki he ‘au‘auha, kuo ne folofola ‘o pehē, Te u tuku kiate kimoutolu ‘a e ngaahi tala‘ofa ne fai kia Tēvita, ‘a ia ‘oku toputapu pea pau.
44013035	Ko ia ‘oku ne pehē ai foki ‘i he Saame ‘e taha, Tala‘ehai te ke tuku ho‘o Toko Taha Toputapu ke ‘ilo ‘a e ‘au‘auha.
44013036	He ko Tēvita, hili ‘ene ngāue ki hano to‘utangata ‘o fakatatau ki he finangalo ‘o e ‘Otua, ne mohe, ‘o ne ului ki he‘ene ngaahi kui, ‘o ne ‘ilo ‘a e ‘au‘auha:
44013037	ka ko e toko taha ko ia na‘e fokotu‘u ‘e he ‘Otua na‘e ‘ikai te ne ‘ilo ‘a e ‘au‘auha.
44013038	Ko ia, ke mahino kiate kimoutolu, kāinga mātu‘a, ko e me‘a ‘i he Toko Taha ko ia ‘oku malanga‘aki ai kiate kimoutolu ‘a e fakamolemole angahala:
44013039	pea ko e ngaahi angahala na‘e ‘ikai lava homou fakatonuhia mei ai ‘i he fai‘aki ‘a e Lao ‘a Mōsese, ka ‘i he Toko Taha ko eni, ‘ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku tui ‘oku ne ma‘u ‘a e fakatonuhia mei he ngaahi me‘a ko ia kotoa pē.
44013040	Ko ia, mou tokanga, na‘a hoko atu ‘a e me‘a ne folofola‘aki ‘i he Tohi Palōfita:
44013041	‘a e kau fakata‘eta‘etoka‘i, mou sio mo ofo mo matafi atu: he ko ‘eku fai ‘eni ha ngāue ‘i homou kuonga, ha ngāue kehe, ‘a ia ‘e ‘ikai te mou tui ki ai, neongo hono ‘a‘au ‘e ha taha, ‘o fakalāutelau.
44013042	Pea ‘i he‘ena hū atu, na‘a nau kole ke toe malanga‘aki ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia kiate kinautolu ‘i he Sāpate kaha‘u.
44013043	Pea ‘i he tutuku ‘a e lotu, ko e tokolahi ‘o e kakai Siu, mo e kakai kuo ului ki he‘enau lotu, na‘a nau muimui kia Paula mo Pānepasa: pea ko kinaua na‘a na fai ‘ena lau kiate kinautolu, ‘o o‘i kinautolu ke nau nofo ma‘u ‘i he ‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua.
44013044	Pea ‘i he Sāpate na‘e hoko, na‘e fakataha ‘a e kolo, ‘o meimei ko hono kotoa, ke fanongo ki he folofola ‘a e ‘Eiki.
44013045	Pea ‘i he mamata ‘a e kau Siu ki he ngaahi fu‘u tokolahi, na‘e vevele ‘enau meheka, pea na‘a nau faka‘ikai‘i ‘a e ngaahi fakamatala ‘a Paula, ‘o nau lea kovi.
44013046	Pea lea mālohi ai ‘a Paula mo Pānepasa, ‘o na pehē, Na‘e pau ke motu‘a tala ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua kiate kimoutolu: ka ‘i he ‘iloange kuo mou fakatale‘i ia, pea mou fakamo‘oni ai ‘e kimoutolu ki ho‘omou ta‘etaau mo e mo‘ui ta‘engata, vakai, ko ‘ema hiki ‘eni ki he Senitaile.
44013047	He ne pehē homau tu‘utu‘uni ‘e he ‘Eiki, Kuo u fokotu‘u koe ko e maama ‘o e Senitaile, ke ke hoko ko e Mo‘ui‘anga ‘o a‘u ki he ngata‘anga ‘o māmani.
44013048	Pea ‘i he fanongo ki ai ‘a e Senitaile na‘a nau fiefia, mo nau fakahīkihiki ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Eiki: pea ‘ilonga ‘a kinautolu na‘e tu‘utu‘uni ki he mo‘ui ta‘engata na‘a nau tui.
44013049	Pea na‘e ‘ave ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Eiki ki he fonua kotoa.
44013050	Ka ka o‘i ‘e he kau Siu ‘a e kau fefine ‘eiki kuo tafoki ki he‘enau lotu, pea mo e hou‘eiki ‘o e kolo, pea nau fakalanga ha fakatanga kia Paula mo Pānepasa, ‘o nau kapusi kinaua mei honau feitu‘u.
44013051	Pea na tūtuu‘i ‘a e efu mei hona va‘e ko e faka‘ilonga kiate kinautolu, ‘o na ō ki ‘Aikoniume.
44013052	Pea ko e me‘a ki he kau ako, na‘e fakafonu kinautolu ‘aki ‘a e fiefia mo e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni.
44014001	PEA lolotonga ‘ena ‘i ‘Aikoniume, na‘a na hū fakataha ki he falelotu ‘o e Kakai Siu: pea na‘e pehē ‘ena malanga, ko ia na‘e tui ai ha fu‘u tokolahi ‘o e kakai Siu mo e kakai Kalisi fakatou‘osi.
44014002	Ka ko e kau Siu na‘e ‘ikai tui, na‘a nau o‘i mo fakakovi‘i ‘a e loto ‘o e kau Senitaile ke tu‘u ki he kāinga lotu.
44014003	Pea ko ia na‘e fuoloa ‘ena nofo ai, ‘o na malanga mālohi ko ‘ena falala ki he ‘Eiki; ‘a ia na‘a ne poupou ‘a e tala ‘o ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa, he‘ene tuku ke hoko ‘i he‘ena ngāue ‘a e ngaahi me‘a mana mo fakaofo.
44014004	Pea na‘e mavahe ua ‘a e kakai ‘o e kolo, pea kau ha ni‘ihi mo ha‘a Siu, ka ko e ni‘ihi mo e ongo ‘aposetolo.
44014005	Pea ‘i he fai ke ‘ohofi kinaua ‘e he kau Senitaile, kae‘uma‘ā ‘e ha‘a Siu mo honau kau pule, koe‘uhi ke ngaohikovi‘i mo tolongi kinaua,
44014006	na‘a na sinaki ‘ilo ki ai, ‘o na feholaki ki he ngaahi kolo ‘o Lākonia, ‘a Līsita mo Teape mo e feitu‘u ko ia:
44014007	pea nau nofo ‘o malanga‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli ‘i he potu ko ia.
44014008	Pea na‘e ai ha tangata ‘i Līsita tokua, na‘e ve‘e mate, kuo heke ta‘utu mei hono fanau‘i, ‘o ‘ikai si‘i te ne momo‘i ha‘ele.
44014009	Pea na‘e fa‘a fanongo malanga ‘e he toko taha ko ia ‘ia Paula; pea ‘i he sio fakamama‘u ‘a Paula kiate ia, mo ne vakai ‘oku ne tui ‘e lava hono fakamo‘ui,
44014010	na‘a ne ‘ai ‘ene fu‘u lea, ‘o ne pehē, Tu‘u ‘aki ho va‘e, ‘o kēvekeva tonu. Pea hopo hake ia ‘o ha‘ele.
44014011	Pea ‘i he mamata ‘a e kakai ki he me‘a kuo fai ‘e Paula, na‘a nau hiki tuē, ‘o nau kalanga faka-Lākonia mai, Kuo hifo fakatangata mai ha ongo ‘otua!
44014012	Pea nau ui ‘a Pānepasa ko Siupita, pea ko Paula ko Meakuli, he ko ia ia na‘e takimu‘a ‘i he lea.
44014013	Pea ko e taula ‘o Siupita, ko e ‘otua na‘e ‘afio ‘i he matanikolo, na‘a ne ‘omi, ‘e ia mo e kakai, ha fanga pulu mo e ngaahi tuinga kakala ki he ngaahi matapā ‘o e fale hū‘anga, ko ‘enau fai ke feilaulau kiate kinaua.
44014014	Pea ‘i he ongo mai ‘a e me‘a ki he ongo ‘aposetolo ko Pānepasa mo Paula, na‘a na hae hifo hona kofu, ‘o na ‘oho atu mei he fale ki he kakai, ‘o na kalanga,
44014015	‘o pehē, ‘A matāpule, ko e hā ‘oku mou fai pehē ai? He ‘oku ma alāanga mo kimoutolu, ko e ongo tangata pē; ‘o ma tala atu ‘a e fekau lelei, ke mou tafoki mei he ngaahi ‘otua noa ni ki he ‘Otua Mo‘ui, ‘a ia na‘a ne ngaohi ‘a e langi mo e fonua mo e tahi, mo e ngaahi me‘a kehekehe ‘oku ‘i ai.
44014016	Mo‘oni ‘i he ngaahi kuonga mu‘a na‘a ne tuku ai pē ‘a e kakai kehekehe ke nau fou ‘i he ngaahi founga ‘onautolu.
44014017	Ka na‘a mo ia, ka tala‘ehai na‘a ne nofo ta‘eha faka‘ilonga; he na‘a ne ngāue ‘aonga, ‘o ne ‘atu kiate kimoutolu mei langi ‘a e ngaahi ‘uha, mo e ngaahi ta‘u mahu, ‘o ne ‘ai ke fonu ngutungutu homou loto ‘i he me‘a tokoni mo e fakafiefia.
44014018	Pea na‘a mo ‘ena lea pehē, na‘e ‘ikai ke meimei lava ‘ena ta‘ofi ‘a e kakai mei he fai feilaulau kiate kinaua.
44014019	Ka na‘e hoko hifo ha tu‘unga Siu mei ‘Aniteoke mo ‘Aikoniume, ‘o nau fakahinga ‘a e kakai kiate kinautolu; pea nau tolongi ‘a Paula, ‘o nau toho kitua‘ā kolo ko ‘enau mahalo kuo ne pekia.
44014020	Pea lolotonga ‘a e tu‘u takai kiate ia ‘e he kau ako, na‘a ne tu‘u hake ‘o hū ki he kolo: pea pongipongi hake na‘a na ō atu mei ai mo Pānepasa ki Teape.
44014021	Pea hili ‘ena malanga‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli ‘i he kolo ko ia, mo fakaului ha tokolahi ki he kau ako, na‘a na foki ki Līsita mo ‘Aikoniume mo ‘Aniteoke,
44014022	‘o na poupou ‘a e loto ‘o e kau ako, ‘o na tokoni kinautolu ke nau nofo ma‘u ‘i he lotu, ‘o na pehē foki, Ko ‘etau hū ki he Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua, kuo pau ke tau fou ‘i he ngaahi mamahi lahi.
44014023	Pea ‘i he siasi kotoa pē na‘a na fili ‘i he hikinima ha kau faifekau ma‘anautolu; pea na fai ha hūfia faka‘aukai, ‘o na toki tuku kinautolu ki he ‘Eiki kuo nau tui ki ai.
44014024	Pea na ‘asi atu ‘i Pisitia, ‘o na hoko ki Pamifilia:
44014025	pea hili ‘ena malanga‘aki ‘a e folofola ‘i Peaka, na‘a na hifo ki ‘Atalaia:
44014026	pea na folau mei ai ki ‘Aniteoke, ‘a ia ko e potu ne fua tukuange ai kinaua ki he ‘ofa ‘a e ‘Eiki, ke na fai ‘a e ngāue kuo na ‘osi ni.
44014027	Pea ‘i he‘ena lava ki ai na‘a na fakataha ‘a e siasi, ‘o na fakamatala ki he ngaahi fu‘u me‘a kuo fai ‘e he ‘Otua ‘i he‘ene kau mo kinaua, pea mo ‘ene fakaava ki he Senitaile ha matapā ki he lotu.
44014028	Pea na nofo ai mo e kau ako, ‘o fuofuoloa.
44015001	PEA na‘e ai ha tu‘unga me‘a na‘e ‘alu hifo mei Siutea, ‘o nau kamata ako ki he kāinga, ‘o pehē, Kapau ‘e ‘ikai te mou kamu, ‘o hangē ko e tu‘utu‘uni ‘a Mōsese, ‘e ‘ikai te mou lava ke mo‘ui.
44015002	Pea ‘i he hoko ai ha fu‘u fetu‘usi mo fe‘eke ‘a Paula mo Pānepasa pea mo kinautolu, na‘a nau tu‘utu‘uni ke ō hake ki Selusalema ‘a Paula mo Pānepasa, pea mo ha tu‘unga me‘a meiate kinautolu, ‘o ‘ave ‘a e me‘a ni ki he kau ‘Aposetolo mo e kau faifekau.
44015003	Pea kuo moimoi‘i ‘a kinaua ‘e he siasi, na‘a na ‘asi atu ‘i Finisia mo Samēlia, ‘o nau ‘āuliliki ‘a e liliu ‘a Senitaile, pea mātu‘aki fiefia ai ‘a e kāinga kotoa.
44015004	Pea ‘i he‘ena hoko atu ki Selusalema, na‘e tali lelei kinaua ‘e he siasi, mo e kau ‘Aposetolo, mo e kau faifekau; pea fakamatala foki ‘e kinaua ‘a e ngaahi fu‘u me‘a kuo fai ‘e he ‘Eiki ‘i he‘ene kau mo kinaua.
44015005	Ka na‘e tu‘u mai ha ni‘ihi ‘iate kinautolu na‘e kau ki he fa‘ahi Fālesi, ko e tu‘unga me‘a kuo lotu, pea nau pehē, ‘Oku totonu ke kamu ‘a e fa‘ahinga ko ia, pea ke tu‘utu‘uni foki ke nau tauhi ‘a e Lao ‘a Mōsese.
44015006	Na‘e fakataha foki ‘a e kau ‘Aposetolo mo e kau faifekau ke vakai ‘a e me‘a ni.
44015007	Pea kuo fuoloa ‘enau fakakikihi, pea tu‘u ‘a Pita, ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu, ‘a e kāinga mātu‘a, ‘oku mou lāu‘ilo, ko e me‘a talu mei mu‘a ‘a e fili ‘e he ‘Eiki ‘i homou lotolotonga, ko ‘o‘oku ni ngutu ‘e fanongo mei ai ‘a e Senitaile ki he tala ‘o e Kōsipeli, ‘o nau lotu.
44015008	Pea ko e ‘Otua ‘oku tokaima‘ananga ki ai ‘a e loto, na‘a ne fakamo‘oni ma‘anautolu, he‘ene foaki ki ai ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni ‘oni, ‘o hangē ko ‘ene fai kiate kitautolu.
44015009	Pea na‘e ‘ikai te ne momo‘i faikehekehe kiate kitautolu mo kinautolu, he‘ene fakama‘a honau loto ‘aki ‘enau tui.
44015010	Pea ko e hā ai ‘oku mou ala‘aki ki he ‘Otua ‘i he taimi ni, ‘o mou pehē ke ‘ai ha ‘ioke ki he u‘a ‘o e kau ako, ‘a e ha‘amonga ko ia na‘e ‘ikai fa‘a tu‘uaki ‘e he‘etau ngaahi kui, pe ko kitautolu?
44015011	‘Osi, ‘oku tau tui te tau mo‘ui ‘i he kelesi ‘a e ‘Eiki ko Kalaisi, ‘o hangē tofu pē ko kinautolu.
44015012	Pea toki sīlongo ai ‘a e fakataha kotoa, ‘o nau fakafanongo kia Pānepasa mo Paula, he‘ena fakamatala ‘a e ngaahi me‘a mana mo fakaofo ne fai ‘e he ‘Otua ‘iate kinaua ‘i he lotolotonga ‘o e Senitaile.
44015013	Pea kuo longo leva kinaua, pea tali ‘e Sēmisi ‘o ne pehē, ‘A e kāinga Mātu‘a, mou tokanga mai kiate au.
44015014	Kuo fakamatala ‘e Saimone ‘a e ‘uluaki ‘a‘ahi mai ‘a e ‘Otua ke to‘o mei he Senitaile ha kakai ke kau ki hono huafa.
44015015	Pea ‘oku hoa mo ia ‘a e ngaahi tala ‘a e kau Palōfita; vakai ‘a e potu ko eni.
44015016	Hili ia te u foki mai, pea te u toe langa ‘a e tēniti ‘o Tēvita kuo holo; pea te u toe ngaohi hono ngaahi potu kuo maumau, pea te u fokotu‘u ia ke totonu:
44015017	koe‘uhi ke toki fekumi ki he ‘Eiki ‘a hono toe ‘o e kakai, pea mo e Senitaile kotoa pē; he kuo ui‘aki ‘a kinautolu hoku hingoa, ‘io, ‘a kinautolu.
44015018	Ko e folofola ē ‘a e ‘Eiki, ‘a ia ‘oku ne fai ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ni, ko e ngaahi me‘a ‘iloa talu mei mu‘a.
44015019	Ko ia, ko hoku loto, ke ‘oua na‘a tau fakakina‘i ‘a kinautolu ‘i he Senitaile ‘oku tafoki mai ki he ‘Otua:
44015020	ka tau tohi kiate kinautolu ke nau faka‘ehi‘ehi mei he ngaahi me‘a kuo ‘uli‘i ‘e he ‘aitoli, pea mei he fe‘auaki, mo e manu kuo sisina, pea mei he toto.
44015021	Koe‘uhi, talu ‘e ngaahi to‘utangata ‘o ono‘aho mo e ma‘u ‘e Mōsese ha ni‘ihi ‘i he kolo kotoa pē ke malanga‘aki ia, ko e me‘a ‘i he lau ‘ene tohi ‘i he ngaahi falelotu ‘i he Sāpate hokohoko.
44015022	Pea na‘e toki hā lelei ki he kau ‘Aposetolo mo e kau faifekau, pea kau ai ‘a e siasi kātoa, ke fili hanau ongo tangata, ‘o fekau atu ke ō mo Paula mo Pānepasa ki ‘Aniteoke; ko Siutasi na‘e ui Pāsapa, pea mo Sailosi, ko e ongo matāpule na‘e takimu‘a ‘i he ha‘oha‘onga ‘o e Kāinga.
44015023	Pea nau fai ha tohi ‘o ‘atu ‘iate kinautolu, ‘o pehē: “KO KIMAUTOLU ko e kau ‘Aposetolo, mo e kāinga ‘oku faifekau, ‘oku mau ‘ofa atu ki ke kāinga ‘i ‘Aniteoke, mo Sīlia, mo Silisia, kuo hū mai mei he Senitaile."
44015024	“Ko e me‘a ‘i he‘emau fanongo ‘oku ai ha ni‘ihi kuo ‘alu atu meiate kimautolu, ‘o fakahoha‘asia kimoutolu ‘aki ha ngaahi lau, mo uesia homou laumālie, ka na‘e ‘ikai ko ‘emau fekau ‘enau ‘alu:
44015025	ko ia na‘e hā lelei kiate kimautolu ‘i he‘emau loto taha, ke fili ha ongo tangata ‘o fekau atu kiate kimoutolu, fakataha mo si‘omau ‘ofa‘anga ko Pānepasa mo Paula.
44015026	‘a ia ko e ongo me‘a kuo li‘aki ‘ena mo‘ui koe‘uhi ko e huafa ‘o hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi.
44015027	Ko ia, kuo mau fekau atu ‘a Siutasi ma Sailosi, ‘a ia te na tala ngutu foki ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ni."
44015028	“He kuo hā lelei ki he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni mo kimautolu, ke ‘oua na‘a toe ‘ai mo ha kavenga kiate kimoutolu, ngata pē ‘i he ngaahi me‘a ko eni, ‘a ia kuo pau;
44015029	ke mou faka‘ehi‘ehi mei he ngaahi me‘a kuo ‘oatu ki he ‘aitoli, pea mo e toto, mo e manu kuo sisina, pea mo e fe‘auaki. Pea kapau te mou tauhi kimoutolu mei he ngaahi me‘a ko ia, te mou lelei." “‘Ofa atu."
44015030	Pea kuo tukuange kinautolu, pea nau hoko hifo ki ‘Aniteoke: pea nau fakataha ‘a e kakai, ‘o ‘ange ‘a e tohi:
44015031	pea hili hono lau na‘a nau fiefia ‘i he tokoni kuo fai.
44015032	Pea ko Siutasi mo Sailosi ko e ongo palōfita foki kinaua, pea na‘e lahi ‘ena lea he‘ena tokoni ‘a e kāinga mo poupou honau loto.
44015033	Pea kuo fuofuoloa ‘ena nofo ai, pea na‘e toki tuku fiemālie atu kinaua ‘e he kāinga, ke na ō kiate kinautolu ne fekau mei ai kinaua.
44015034	Neongo ia, na‘e kei fiemālie pē ‘a Sailosi ke nofo atu ai.
44015035	Ka ka nofo atu pē ‘a Paula mo Pānepasa ‘i ‘Aniteoke, ‘o na faiako ai mo malanga‘aki ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua, fakataha mo ha ni‘ihi kehe.
44015036	Pea na‘e faifai pea pehē ‘e Paula kia Pānepasa, Ta foki mu‘a, ‘o ‘a‘ahi ki he kāinga ‘i he ngaahi kolo kehekehe na‘a ta malanga‘aki ai ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Eiki, ‘o vakai pe ‘oku nau fēfē.
44015037	Pea na‘e loto ‘a Pānepasa ke ‘ave ‘a Sione foki, ‘a ia ko hono hingoa ‘e taha ko Ma‘ake.
44015038	Ka ko e fakakaukau ‘a Paula kiate ia na‘e li‘aki kinaua ‘i Pamifilia, ‘o ‘ikai ‘alu mo kinaua ki he ngāue, ‘oku ikai totonu ke ‘ave ha toko taha pehē.
44015039	Pea hoko ai ha kē; ko ia na‘a na māvae: pea ‘ave ‘e Pānepasa ‘a Ma‘ake, ‘o ne folau ki Saipalo.
44015040	Ka ko Paula na‘a ne fili ‘a Sailosi, ‘o ne fononga: ka na‘e tomu‘a tukuange ia ‘e he kāinga ki he ‘ofa ‘a e ‘Eiki.
44015041	Pea ne ‘asi atu ‘i Sīlia mo Silisia, ‘o ne poupou ‘a e ngaahi siasi.
