44016001	PEA na‘a ne hoko hifo ki Teape mo Līsita. Pea tā na‘e ‘i ai ha tama ako ‘i he potu ko ia na‘e hingoa ko Tīmote, ko e tama ‘a ha fefine Siu na‘e lotu; ka ko ‘ene tamai ko e Kalisi:
44016002	pea ko e tama ia na‘e fakaongolelei ‘e he kāinga na‘e ‘i Līsita mo ‘Aikoniume.
44016003	Ko e toko taha ko ia, na‘e loto ‘a Paula ke fononga mo ia; pea ne hanga ‘o kamu ia telia ‘a e kau Siu na‘e nofo ‘i he ngaahi potu ko ia: he na‘a nau ‘ilo kotoa pē ko ‘ene tamai ko e Kalisi.
44016004	Pea ‘i he‘enau ‘a‘ahi ki he ngaahi kolo, na‘a nau tuku kiate kinautolu ‘a e ngaahi fekau na‘e tu‘utu‘uni ‘e he kau ‘Aposetolo mo e kau faifekau ‘i Selusalema ke nau fai.
44016005	Pea ko ia, na‘e faka‘a‘au ‘o kaukaua ‘a e ngaahi siasi ‘i he lotu, pea fakautuutu ‘enau tokolahi ‘i he ‘aho kotoa pē.
44016006	Ka ka ‘asi atu pē kinautolu ‘i Filisia mo e fonua ko Kalētia; he na‘e ta‘ofi ‘e he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni ‘enau malanga‘aki ‘a e folofola ‘i ‘Ēsia:
44016007	pea ‘i he‘enau fa‘aki ki Misia na‘a nau ‘ahi‘ahi ke ‘alu ki Pitinia, ka na‘e ‘ikai tuku kinautolu ke hū ki ai ‘e he Laumālie ‘o Sīsū:
44016008	pea na‘a nau lakai ‘a Misia, ‘o hoko hifo ki Taloasi.
44016009	Pea na‘e hā ai ha vīsone kia Paula ‘i he pō; tokua na‘e tu‘u mai ha tangata Masitōnia, ‘o kole kiate ia, ‘o pehē, Laka mai ki Masitōnia, ‘o tokoni‘i kimautolu.
44016010	Pea ‘i he‘ene mamata ki he vīsone, na‘a mau feinga leva ke ‘alu atu ki Masitōnia; he na‘a mau fakakaukau ‘o mau pehē, kuo ui kimautolu ‘e he ‘Otua ke malanga‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli kiate kinautolu.
44016011	Pea kuo mau tuku folau mei Taloasi, na‘a mau lele ki Samotesia, he na‘e angimui ‘a e matangi; pea ‘i he ‘apongipongi ki Neapoli.
44016012	Pea mau ‘alu mei ai ki Filipai, ‘a ia ko e kolo taupotu mai ‘o e feitu‘u Masitōnia, pea ko e kolonia ia.
44016013	Pea na‘a mau nofo ‘i he kolo ko ia ‘i he ngaahi ‘aho ni‘ihi; pea ‘i he ‘aho Sāpate na‘a mau ‘alu ki he matanikolo kitua‘ā, ‘o fou atu ‘i he ve‘e vaitafe, ko ‘emau mahalo ‘oku fai ai ha lotu; pea mau nofo hifo ‘o talanoa mo e kau fefine kuo fakataha ki ai.
44016014	Pea ko e toko taha na‘e hingoa ko Litia, ko e fefine na‘e fai fakatau tupenu kula mei he kolo ko Taiataila, pea kuo tafoki ki he lotu ‘a e ‘Otua, lolotonga ‘ene fanongo ‘e ia, na‘e tāngaki ‘e he ‘Eiki hono loto ke tokanga ki he ngaahi me‘a na‘e lea‘aki ‘e Paula.
44016015	Pea hili hano papitaiso, ‘a ia mo hono fale, na‘a ne kole mai ‘o pehē, Kapau leva kuo mou lau au ko e toko taha ‘oku tui ki he ‘Eiki, pea mou hū ki hoku fale, ‘o nofo ai. Pea ne puketu‘u kimautolu.
44016016	Pea ko eni, lolotonga ‘emau ‘alu atu ki he lotu, mo e fakafetaulaki mai ha kaunanga ‘a ia na‘e ulusino ai ha fa‘ahikehe tongafisi, pea na‘e lahi ‘a e koloa na‘e ma‘u ‘e he kakai na‘e ‘onautolu ia ‘i he‘ene kikite.
44016017	Pea fa‘a toupili ‘a e fefine ko ia kia Paula mo kimautolu, mo ne kalanga ‘o pehē, Ko e kau siana ni ko e kau tamaio‘eiki ‘a e ‘Otua Taupotu, pea ko e fa‘ahinga ‘oku fakahā kiate kimoutolu ‘a e hala ki he fakamo‘ui.
44016018	Pea na‘a ne fai pehē ‘o ‘aho lahi. Pea mamahi ai ‘a Paula, ‘o ne tafoki ‘o lea ki he fa‘ahikehe, Ko ‘eku tala atu ‘i he huafa ‘o Sīsū Kalaisi ke ke hū mai mei he fefine. Pea ne hū atu ‘i he taimi ko ia.
44016019	Pea ko e kakai na‘e ‘onautolu ‘a e fefine, ‘i he‘enau vakai kuo ‘alu mo e fa‘ahikehe ‘enau ‘amanaki ma‘u koloa, na‘a nau puke ‘a Paula mo Sailosi, ‘o toho ki he mala‘e fakatau,
44016020	ko e ‘ave ki he hou‘eiki; pea nau taki kinaua ki he ongo ‘eikitau, ‘o nau pehē, Ko e ongo siana ni ‘oku na veuveuki lahi ‘etau kolo, ka ko e ongo Siu.
44016021	Pea ‘oku na enginaki ‘aki ‘a e ngaahi anga ‘oku ‘ikai ngofua kiate kitautolu ke fanongo ki ai, ‘uma‘ā ke fai, he ko e kau Loma.
44016022	Pea na‘e kau ‘a e kakai ‘i hona taute: pea hae takai hona kofu ‘e he hou‘eiki tau, ‘o fekau ke haha.
44016023	Pea hili ‘enau haha kinaua ‘o lahi, na‘a nau lī kinaua ki he pilīsone, ‘o nau fekau ki he sela ke tauhi kinaua ke ma‘u:
44016024	pea ko e tangata ko ia, ‘i he‘ene ma‘u ha tu‘utu‘uni pehē, na‘a ne lī kinaua ki he loki lotoloto, ‘o ne fakama‘u hona va‘e ki he ‘akau kii‘i.
44016025	Ka ‘i he tu‘uapō na‘e hiva fakamālō ki he ‘Otua ‘a Paula mo Sailosi, ko e fai ‘ena lotu, pea na‘e fakafanongo kiate kinaua ‘e he kau pōpula.
44016026	Pea fakafokifā, na‘e hoko ha mofuike na‘e pehē hono lahi he na‘e lulululu ‘a e tu‘unga ‘o e pilīsone: pea matangaki leva ‘a e ngaahi matapā kotoa pē, pea vete ‘a e kii‘i ‘o e kakai kotoa pē.
44016027	Pea ‘i he ‘ā leva ‘a e sela, ‘o ne vakai kuo matangaki ‘a e ngaahi matapā ‘o e pilīsone, na‘a ne unuhi ‘ene heletā, ‘o ne fai ke tāmate‘i ia, ko ‘ene mahalo kuo feholaki ‘a e kau pōpula.
44016028	Ka ka kalanga le‘olahi ‘a Paula, ‘o ne pehē, ‘Oua te ke fai ha kovi kiate koe: he ‘oku mau kei kātokatoa.
44016029	Pea tala ‘e ia ke ‘omi ha ngaahi maama, ‘o ne ‘oho fakalōloa mai, ‘o ne hinga tetetete atu ‘i he ‘ao ‘o Paula mo Sailosi.
44016030	Pea ne ‘omi kinaua kitu‘a, ‘o ne pehē, Hou‘eiki, ko e hā ‘eku me‘a ke fai ke u mo‘ui?
44016031	Pea na pehē, Tui falala ni ki he ‘Eiki ko Sīsū, pea te ke mo‘ui, ‘a koe mo ho fale.
44016032	Pea na lea kiate ia ‘i he folofola ‘a e ‘Eiki, pea ai mo e kakai kotoa ‘o hono ‘api.
44016033	Pea ne ‘ave kinaua ‘i he feitu‘upō ko ia, ‘o tafitafi hona ngaahi lavea; pea ne papitaiso leva, ‘a ia mo kinautolu kotoa pē na‘e ‘iate ia.
44016034	Na‘a ne ‘ohake foki kinaua ki hono fale, ‘o ne teu ha‘ana me‘a tokoni; pea ne nēkeneka koe‘uhi kuo nau hoko ‘o lotu ki he ‘Otua, ‘o fakafāmili kātoa.
44016035	Pea kuo ‘aho leva, pea fekau mai ‘e he ongo ‘eikitau ‘a e kau ‘ōfisa ke pehē, Vete ange ‘a e ongo siana na.
44016036	Pea ‘omi ‘e he sela ‘a e tala ko ia kia Paula, Tokua kuo fekau mai ‘a e ongo ‘eikitau ke vete ange kimoua: ko ia mo hū atu leva, pea mo ō ā.
44016037	Ka ka tali ‘e Paula kiate kinautolu, Kuo nau haha kimaua ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e kakai, te‘eki fakamaau, ka ko e ongo Loma kimaua, pea kuo na lī ki he pilīsone; pea ‘oku na pehē ‘eni koā ke fakamanimo homa tukuange, ‘ō? ‘E ‘ikai ‘aupito; kaekehe, tuku ke na omi ‘e kinaua ‘o taki atu kimaua.
44016038	Pea ‘ave ‘e he kau ‘ōfisa ‘a e lea ko ia ki he ongo ‘eikitau: pea na‘a na manavahē ‘i he‘ena fanongo ko e ongo Loma ‘a kinaua.
44016039	Pea na omi, ‘o fakakolekole kiate kinaua, pea na taki atu kinaua, ‘o tala ke na ‘ofa ‘o hiki mei he kolo.
44016040	Pea na ‘alu atu mei he pilīsone, ‘o hū ki he fale ‘o Litia: pea kuo nau fe‘iloaki mo e kāinga, ‘o fai ha tokoni ki ai, pea na toki ō.
44017001	PEA nau fou atu ‘i ‘Amifipoli mo ‘Apolonia, ‘o nau hoko ki Tesalonaika, ‘a ia na‘e tu‘u ai ha falelotu ‘o e kakai Siu:
44017002	pea hū ki ai ‘a Paula, ‘o hangē ko ene fa‘a fai, ‘o kau mo kinautolu; pea ko e Sāpate ‘e tolu na‘a ne fai fakakikihi mo kinautolu mei he Tohitapu,
44017003	‘o ne faka‘uhinga mo fokotu‘u, ‘o pehē, Na‘e pau ke feia ‘a e Mīsaia, pea ke toetu‘u mei he pekia; mo ‘eni foki, Ko eni ‘a e Mīsaia ko ia, ‘a Sīsū ‘oku ou malanga‘aki kiate kimoutolu.
44017004	Pea na‘e ai honau ni‘ihi na‘e tui, pea na‘e fakahoko kinautolu kia Paula mo Sailosi; pehē foki mo e fu‘u tokolahi ‘o e kau Kalisi kuo lotu faka-Siu, mo e tokotokolahi ‘o e kau fefine tu‘ukimu‘a.
44017005	Pea meheka ai ‘a e kau Siu, ‘o nau ‘ave ha kau siana pau‘u na‘e tutu‘u noa pē ‘i he mala‘e fakatau, ‘o nau tānaki ha fu‘u kakai, mo veuveuki ‘a e kolo, pea nau ‘ohofia ‘a e ‘api ‘o Sēsoni, ‘o nau kumi ‘a kinaua ke nau taki atu ki he Fakataha-‘a-kakai.
44017006	Pea ‘i he ‘ikai te nau ‘ilo kinaua, na‘a nau toho ‘a Sēsoni mo e ni‘ihi ‘o e kāinga ki he kau pule kolo, ‘o nau kalanga, Ko e kau siana ko ia, ‘a ia kuo nau fakaangatu‘u ‘a māmani, kuo nau ha‘u ki heni foki.
44017007	Pea kuo fakaafe kinautolu ‘e Sēsoni: pea ko e kau siana ko ia ‘oku nau paetaku kotoa pē ki he ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni ‘a Sisa, he‘enau pehē, ‘oku tu‘i ha taha kehe, ko Sīsū tokua.
44017008	Pea nau fakahoha‘a ‘a e kakai mo e kau pule kolo ‘i he‘enau tala ha ngaahi me‘a pehē.
44017009	Ko ia, na‘a nau ‘eke ha pa‘anga talifaki meia Sēsoni mo e kāinga, ‘o nau toki tukuange kinautolu.
44017010	Pea hanga leva ‘e he kāinga, ‘o nau ‘atu po‘uli ‘a Paula mo Sailosi ki Pēlea: pea ‘i he‘enau hoko ki ai, pea ō ai pē kinaua ki he falelotu ‘o e kakai Siu.
44017011	Pea na‘e anga faka‘ei‘eiki ange ‘a e kakai ni ‘iate kinautolu ‘i Tesalonaika, he na‘a nau tali loto lelei ‘aupito ‘a e folofola, ‘o nau kumi ‘i he Tohitapu ‘i he ‘aho kotoa pē ‘a e mo‘oni ‘o e ngaahi me‘a ko ia.
44017012	Ko ia, na‘e tokolahi honau kakai na‘e tui, pea tokotokolahi mo e hou‘eiki fafine ‘o e kakai Kalisi, pea mo e kau tangata.
44017013	Ka ‘i he ‘ilo ‘a e kau Siu mei Tesalonaika kuo malanga‘aki ‘i Pēlea foki ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua ‘e Paula, na‘a nau omi, ‘o nau o‘i mo fakahoha‘asi ‘a e kakai ‘i he potu ko ia.
44017014	Pea na‘e toki hanga ‘e he kāinga, ‘o tuku atu leva ‘a Paula ke ‘alu atu ki tahi: ka ka nofo ai pē ‘a Sailosi mo Tīmote fakatou‘osi.
44017015	Pea ko kinautolu na‘e ‘ave ‘a Paula na‘a nau a‘utaki ia ki ‘Atenisi: pea kuo nau ma‘u ‘ene fekau kia Sailosi mo Tīmote ke fai hona tūkuingata ke vave mai, pea nau toki ō.
44017016	Pea lolotonga na‘e talitali ‘e Paula kiate kinaua ‘i ‘Atenisi, na‘e ‘ita hono laumālie ‘o‘ona ‘i he‘ene vakai kuo tamapua‘ia ‘a e kolo.
44017017	Ko ia, na‘a ne talanoa fakakikihi ‘i he fale lotu mo e kau Siu, mo e kakai kuo tafoki mai, pea ‘i he mala‘e fakatau na‘a ne fai ‘i he ‘aho kotoa pē kiate kinautolu te nau fe‘iloaki.
44017018	Pea na‘e ai ha ni‘ihi ‘o e fa‘ahinga ‘Epikulio, mo e fa‘ahinga Sitoiko, ko e kau filōsefa, na‘a nau fepaki mo ia. Pea pehē ‘e ha ni‘ihi, Ko e hā nai ‘a e ‘uhinga ‘o e lau ‘a e siana pālau ni? Pea ko e ni‘ihi na‘a nau pehē, ‘Oku ne matamata ko e toko taha fokotu‘u ‘otua fo‘ou: ko hono ‘uhinga, ko ‘ene malanga‘aki ‘a Sīsū mo e Toetu‘u.
44017019	Pea nau puke ia, ‘o taki ki ‘Aleopeiko, ‘o nau pehē, ‘E ngofua koā ke mau ‘ilo pe ko e hā ‘a e tokāteline fo‘ou ni, ‘a ‘eni ‘oku ke lea‘aki?
44017020	He ‘oku ke ‘omi ki homau telinga ha ngaahi me‘a ‘oku matamata kehe: ko ia ‘oku mau fie‘ilo pe ko e hā ‘a e ‘uhinga ‘o e ngaahi me‘a ko ia.
44017021	(He ko e kau ‘Ātenisi kotoa pē, mo e muli na‘e ‘āunofo ai, na‘e ‘ikai te nau fai ha me‘a kehe, ka ko e nofo pē ke lau me‘a fo‘ofo‘ou, pe ke fanongo me‘a pehē.)
44017022	Pea kuo tu‘u ‘a Paula ‘i he loto ‘Aleopeiko, pea ne pehē, ‘A matāpule ‘Ātenisi, ‘oku hā kiate au ‘i he me‘a kehekehe ‘oku ou sio ki ai, tā ko e kakai kimoutolu ‘oku matamata hulu atu ‘i he tauhi fa‘ahikehe.
44017023	He lolotonga ‘eku ‘alu fano, ‘o u tokanga‘i ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku mou lotu ki ai, ne u ‘ilo foki ha ‘ōlita ‘a ia na‘e tohi ai ‘a e lea ni, MO‘O HA ‘OTUA TE‘EKI ‘ILOA. Pea ko e Me‘a ‘oku mou lotu ta‘e‘ilo ki ai, ko eni ia ‘oku ou fakahā ni kiate kimoutolu.
44017024	Ko e ‘Otua na‘a ne ngaohi ‘a e ‘univeesi, mo e me‘a kehekehe ‘oku ‘i ai, ko e toko taha ia ko e ‘Eiki ‘o e langi mo māmani; ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai te ne ‘afio ‘i ha ngaahi temipale kuo ngaohi ‘e he nima.
44017025	‘Uma‘ā hano tauhi ‘e he nima ‘o e tangata, ko e pehē ‘oku ne masiva ‘i ha me‘a–‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio koā, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘a‘ana ‘a e foaki mai kiate kitautolu fuli pē ‘a e mo‘ui, mo e mānava, mo e me‘a kotoa pē!
44017026	Na‘a ne o‘i foki ‘a e ngaahi fa‘ahinga kakai ‘a ia ‘oku nau tupunga taha kotoa pē, ke nau nofo‘ia ‘a e funga kotoa ‘o māmani; he ne ne fakafuofua ‘a e ngaahi kuonga na‘e tu‘utu‘uni ki he‘enau nofo, mo honau ngaahi kau‘ā;
44017027	koe‘uhi ke nau kumi ki he ‘Otua, hei‘ilo te nau fāfā ia ‘o ‘ilo‘i, ka tala‘ehai ‘oku ne mama‘o mei hatau toko taha.
44017028	He ‘oku ‘iate ia ‘etau mo‘ui, mo ‘etau ngāue, mo ‘etau ‘i ai; ‘o hangē foki ko e lau ‘a e ni‘ihi ‘o e kau maau ‘oku ‘iate kimoutolu ‘o pehē, He ko Hono hako foki ‘a kitautolu.
44017029	Pea kapau leva ko e hako ‘o e ‘Otua ‘a kitautolu, tala‘ehai ‘oku totonu ‘etau lau ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘oku tatau mo ha konga koula, pe siliva, pe maka, ha me‘a kuo tongitongi, ko e ngāue mo e fakakaukau ‘a ha tangata.
44017030	Pea neongo ‘ene fakata‘eta‘e‘afio‘i ‘e he ‘Otua ‘a e ngaahi kuonga ‘o e tu‘uvale, ka ‘i onopooni ‘oku ne fekau ki he kakai kotoa pē ‘i he potu kotoa pē ke nau fakatomala:
44017031	koe‘uhi kuo ne kotofa ha ‘aho, ‘a ia ‘oku ne teu fakamaau ai ‘a māmani, ‘o ‘au‘autotonu, ‘o fakafai ‘i he tangata kuo ne polo‘i; ‘o ne tuku mo‘o e kakai kotoa pē ha tu‘unga ki he‘enau tui ‘i he‘ene fokotu‘u ‘a e toko taha ko ia mei he pekia.
44017032	Pea ‘i he‘enau fanongo ki he lau toetu‘u ‘a e pekia, na‘e luma ha ni‘ihi: kae pehē ‘e ha ni‘ihi, ‘Oua ke mau toe fanongo kiate koe ‘i he me‘a ko ia ‘i ha taimi ange.
44017033	Na‘e pehē ‘a e ‘alu atu ‘a Paula mei honau ha‘oha‘onga.
44017034	Ka na‘e ai ha kau matāpule na‘e piki kiate ia, ‘o nau lotu: ko honau taha ko Taionisio, ‘a ia na‘a ne kau ki he ha‘a ‘Aleopeiko, pea mo ha fefine na‘e hingoa ko Temaleti, mo e ni‘ihi kehe.
44018001	HILI ia na‘a ne hiki mei ‘Ātenisi, ‘o ne hoko ki Kolinitō.
44018002	Pea ne ‘ilo ai ha motu‘a Siu na‘e hingoa ko ‘Akuila na‘e tupu ‘i Ponitō; kuo ne toki ha‘u mei ‘Ītali mo Pīsila ko hono uaifi, koe‘uhi kuo tu‘utu‘uni ‘e Kaloti ke hiki ‘a e Siu kotoa pē mei Loma.
44018003	Pea ne ‘uhi kiate kinaua; pea ko e me‘a ‘i he‘enau faiva taha, ko ia na‘a ne nofo kiate kinaua ‘o ngāue: he ko hona faiva ko e tufunga tēniti.
44018004	Pea na‘a ne fai ‘ene talanoa lotu ‘i he falelotu ‘i he Sāpate kotoa pē, ‘o ne fakatui‘i ha kau Siu mo ha kau Kalisi.
44018005	Ka ‘i he hoko mai mei Masitōnia ‘a Sailosi mo Tīmote fakatou‘osi, na‘e kamata mo‘ua ‘a e loto ‘o Paula ki he‘ene malanga, ‘o ne fakamo‘oni ke ‘asi ki he kakai Siu, Ko e Mīsaia ‘a Sīsū.
44018006	Pea ‘i he‘enau tali tu‘u ki ai mo lau kovi, na‘a ne tuu‘i hono kofu, ‘o ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Ko homou toto ‘e ‘eke ki he tumu‘aki ‘omoutolu pē; kuo u ‘ata‘atā au: hili ‘eni te u ‘alu ki he Senitaile.
44018007	Pea ne hiki mei ai, ‘o ne hū ki he ‘api ‘o ha motu‘a na‘e hingoa ko Siusitasi, ko e toko taha kuo tafoki ‘o lotu ki he ‘Otua, pea ko hono ‘api na‘e vāofi mo e falelotu.
44018008	Pea ko Kalisipo, ko e pule ‘o e falelotu, na‘e lotu ia ki he ‘Eiki mo hono fāmili kātoa; pea na‘e hokohoko tu‘u ‘a e tafoki mai mo e papitaiso ‘a e ni‘ihi Kolinitō ‘i he‘enau fanongo malanga.
44018009	Pea na‘e folofola mai ‘a e ‘Eiki kia Paula ‘i ha vīsone ‘i he pō, ‘o pehē, ‘Oua ‘e manavahē, ka ke lea pē, ‘o ‘oua ‘e momo‘i fakalongo:
44018010	he vakai ko au ‘eni ‘oku ou kau mo koe, pea ‘e ‘ikai ala ha taha kiate koe ke fai hao ngaohikovi‘i: he vakai ‘oku ‘a‘aku ha fu‘u kakai ‘i he kolo ko eni.
44018011	Pea ne nofo ai ko e ta‘u kātoa mo e māhina ‘e ono, ‘o ne fai ‘i honau lotolotonga ‘ene ako‘aki ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua.
44018012	Pea lolotonga na‘e kōvana ‘a Kalio ‘i ‘Akeia, na‘e kautaha ‘a e kakai Siu, ‘o nau tu‘u ke lolomi ‘a Paula, ‘o nau taki ia ki he fakamāu‘anga,
44018013	‘o nau pehē, Ko e siana ni ‘oku ne fakaloto‘i ‘a e kakai, ke fai ‘enau lotu ki he ‘otua ‘o makehe mo e Lao.
44018014	Pea ‘i he fai ‘e Paula ‘o ofa‘aki ‘ene lea, na‘e me‘a ‘a Kalio ki he kakai Siu, ‘a e kau Siu, ka ne ‘i ai ha maumau lao, pe ha kākā kovi, pehē na‘a ku mei kātaki, ‘o tali ho‘omou me‘a:
44018015	ka ‘o kapau ko e koto lau pē ki ha akonaki, mo ha ngaahi hingoa, mo e lao fakaekimoutolu, pe‘i mou tokanga ki ai ‘e kimoutolu; kuo pau hoku loto ‘e ‘ikai te u fakamaau ha ngaahi alā me‘a pehē.
44018016	Pea ne kapusi kinautolu mei he fakamāu‘anga.
44018017	Pea hanga ai ‘a e kakai kotoa pē, ‘o nau puke ‘a Sositene, ko e pule ‘o e falelotu, ‘o nau haha ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e fakamāu‘anga. Ka na‘e ‘ikai momo‘i tokanga ‘a Kalio ki he ngaahi me‘a ko ia.
44018018	Pea na‘e kei nofo atu ‘a Paula ‘o fuofuoloa, pea ne toki fai ‘ene tatau ki he kāinga, ‘o ne kamata folau atu ki Sīlia, ‘o ne ‘alu mo ia ‘a Pīsila mo ‘Akuila: he kuo ne fafai hono ‘ulu ‘i Senikelea: he na‘e ai ‘ene tukumo‘ui.
44018019	Pea nau hoko ki ‘Efesō, pea ne tuku hifo kinaua ‘i ai: ka ka ‘alu ‘e ia ki he fale lotu, ‘o fai ‘ene talanoa lotu mo e kakai Siu.
44018020	Pea ‘i he‘enau tala ke ne ‘ofa ‘o nofonofo hifo mu‘a, na‘e ‘ikai te ne tali:
44018021	ka ne fai ‘ene tatau, mo ne pehē, Te u foki mai kiate kimoutolu, ‘o kapau ko e finangalo ‘o e ‘Otua. Pea ne toki tuku folau atu mei ‘Efesō.
44018022	Pea ‘i he‘ene hoko ki Sesalia, na‘a ne ‘alu hake ‘o fetapa ki he siasi, pea ne toki ‘alu hifo ki ‘Aniteoke.
44018023	Pea kuo fuofuoloa ‘ene nofo ai, na‘a ne ‘alu atu ‘o ‘a‘ahi hokohoko ki he fonua ‘o Kalētia mo Filisia, ‘o ne poupou ‘a e kau ako kotoa pē.
44018024	Pea na‘e hoko ki ‘Efesō ha motu‘a Siu na‘e hingoa ko ‘Āpolosi, ko e toko taha na‘e tupu ‘i ‘Ālekisānitia, ko e tangata tufunga lea, ‘o ne mafai ‘aupito ‘i he Tohitapu.
44018025	Ko e tangata ia kuo akonekina ki he ‘alunga ‘o e lotu ‘a e ‘Eiki, pea ko e toko taha loto māfana; ko ia na‘a ne lea‘aki mo ako-totonu-‘aki ‘a e ngaahi me‘a na‘e kau kia Sīsū, neongo ko e papitaiso pē ‘a Sione na‘a ne ‘ilo ki ai.
44018026	Na‘a ne kamata foki ke malanga mālohi ‘i he fale lotu: pea ‘i he fanongo ‘a Pīsila mo ‘Akuila ki ai, na‘a na fakaafe ia, ‘o na fakamatala kiate ia ‘a e ‘alunga ‘o e lotu ‘a e ‘Otua ke mahu‘ingamālie.
44018027	Pea ‘i he‘ene tokanga ke ‘a‘ahi ki ‘Akeia, na‘e tohi ‘a e kāinga ki he kau ako, ‘o enginaki ke nau tali lelei ia: pea ‘i he‘ene hoko ki ai, na‘a ne ‘aonga lahi ki he kakai kuo lotu, ko e me‘a ‘i he kelesi na‘e ‘iate ia:
44018028	he na‘a ne tōtōivi ‘a e fai fakakikihi mo e kau Siu ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e kakai, kae‘oua ke nau longo, ‘o ne fakamahino mei he Tohitapu ko e Mīsaia ‘a Sīsū.
44019001	PEA lolotonga ‘ene ‘i Kolinitō ‘a ‘Āpolosi, na‘e ‘osi ‘e Paula ‘ene foli ‘a e ngaahi feitu‘u ‘o tuku‘uta, ‘o ne hoko ki ‘Efesō. Pea ne ‘ilo ai ha tu‘unga me‘a ako.
44019002	Pea pehē ‘e ia kiate kinautolu, Na‘a mou ma‘u ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni ‘i ho‘omou tui? Pea nau tali kiate ia, ‘Ikai; kae‘uma‘ā na‘e ‘ikai te mau fanongo kuo hoko mai ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni, mou papitaiso ki he hā?
44019003	Pea nau pehē, Ki he me‘a na‘e papitaiso ki ai ‘e Sione.
44019004	Pea pehē ‘e Paula, Ko e papitaiso na‘e fai ‘e Sione ko e papitaiso fakatomala; ‘o ne pehē ki he kakai ke nau tui kiate ia ‘oku hoko mo ia, ko hono ‘uhinga, kia Sīsū.
44019005	Pea ‘i he‘enau fanongo ki ai, na‘a nau papitaiso ki he Huafa ‘o e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū.
44019006	Pea ‘i he hilifaki ‘e Paula hono nima kiate kinautolu, na‘e hoko hifo kiate kinautolu ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni; pea nau kamata lea‘aki ‘a e ngaahi lea kehekehe mo palofisai.
44019007	Pea ko e lau kātoa ‘o e kau tangata na‘e fe‘unga nai mo e toko hongofulu mā toko ua.
44019008	Pea ne hū ki he falelotu, pea ko e māhina ‘e tolu ‘ene malanga mālohi ‘aki ‘a e ngaahi me‘a na‘e lau ki he Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua; ‘o ne fakakikihi ai, mo fakatui‘i kinautolu.
44019009	Pea ‘i he faka‘a‘au ‘o fefeka honau ni‘ihi, mo e ‘ikai te nau tuitala, mo nau lau‘ikovi ‘a e lotu ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e kakai, na‘a ne hiki meiate kinautolu, ‘o ne vahe‘i ‘a e kau ako, ‘o ne talanoa lotu ‘i he ‘aho kotoa pē ‘i he fale ako ‘o Tīlano.
44019010	Pea na‘e fai pehē ‘o ta‘u ua; ko ia, na‘e fanongo ki he folofola ‘a e ‘Eiki ‘a e nofo ‘Ēsia kotoa, ‘a e Siu mo e Kalisi fakatou‘osi.
44019011	Na‘e fai foki ‘e he ‘Otua ‘ia Paula ha fa‘ahinga mana na‘e taha ‘ana:
44019012	he na‘e ‘ave pē ki he kau mahaki ha ngaahi holoholo, mo ha ngaahi vala, kuo lave ki hono sino, pea na‘e mahu‘i meiate kinautolu ‘a e ngaahi alanga mahaki, pea ‘alu kitu‘a foki ‘a e ngaahi fa‘ahikehe.
44019013	Pea na‘e ai ha ni‘ihi foki ‘o e kau Siu na‘e ‘alu fano pē ‘o faito‘o ‘āvea, na‘a nau ‘ahi‘ahi lea‘aki ki he kakai kuo fa‘ahikehea ‘a e huafa ‘o e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū, ‘o pehē, Ko ‘eku kouna atu ‘ia Sīsū ‘oku fakahā ‘e Paula.
44019014	Na‘e fai pehē ha ni‘ihi ‘i he fāmili ‘o Siva, ko e Siu na‘e Taula‘eiki Lahi, ‘a hono foha ‘e toko fitu.
44019015	Pea tali ‘e he fa‘ahikehe ki honau tokoua, Kuo u ‘ilo mo‘oni ‘a Sīsū, pea ‘oku ou ‘ilo ‘a Paula, ka ko e hā fua kimoua?
44019016	Pea hopo kiate kinaua ‘a e tangata na‘e ulusino ai ‘a e fa‘ahikehe, ‘o ne lava‘i kinaua fakatou‘osi, pea na‘e pehē ‘ene ngaohi kinaua, ko ia ne na feholaki mei he fale ko ia kuo na telefua mo makafokafo.
44019017	Pea na‘e faifai pea ‘iloa ‘a e me‘a ni ki he nofo ‘Efesō kotoa pē, ‘a e Siu mo e Kalisi fakatou‘osi; pea na‘e tō ha ilifia kiate kinautolu kotoa pē, pea na‘e fakahīkihiki‘i ‘a e huafa ‘o e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū.
44019018	Ko e tokolahi foki ‘o e kakai kuo lotu na‘a nau omi, ‘o vete mo fakamatala ‘enau ngaahi ngāue.
44019019	Pea ko e ni‘ihi ‘i he fa‘ahinga na‘e ngāue fie mana na‘a nau ha‘u mo kinautolu ‘enau ngaahi tohi, ‘o tutu ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e kakai: pea nau fatu ‘a e mahu‘inga ‘o e ngaahi tohi, pea tā ko e konga siliva ‘e nima mano.
44019020	Na‘e pehē ‘ene tupu fakamālohi ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Eiki, pea ne faka‘a‘au ‘o kaukaua.
44019021	Pea kuo ‘osi ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia, pea tu‘utu‘uni ‘e Paula ‘i hono laumālie ke fai ha ‘a‘ahi ki Masitōnia mo ‘Akeia, pea ke toki ‘alu ki Selusalema; ‘o ne pehē, Hili ‘eku lava ki he potu ko ia, pea kuo pau ke u mātā ‘a Loma foki.
44019022	Pea ne fekau atu ki Masitōnia ha toko ua ‘o ‘ene kau tokoni, ko Tīmote mo ‘Elasito; ka ne toe ta‘ofi si‘i hifo ia ki he ngāue ‘i ‘Ēsia.
44019023	Pea lolotonga ia na‘e hoko ha maveuveu lahi koe‘uhi ko e lotu.
44019024	He na‘e ai ha motu‘a na‘e hingoa ko Temetelio, ko e tufunga tuki siliva, ‘a ia na‘a ne ngaohi ‘a e fanga ki‘i fale siliva ko e fakatātā ‘o e temipale ‘o Taiana, pea ko e me‘a lahi ‘a e koloa na‘e ma‘u ‘e he kau tufunga ‘iate ia.
44019025	Pea ne fakataha kinautolu, pea mo e kakai na‘e ngāue ki he ngaahi alā me‘a pehē, pea ne pehē, Kau Matāpule, ‘oku mou lāu‘ilo ko e faiva ni ‘oku tau tu‘umālie ai.
44019026	Pea ‘oku mou sio mo fanongo, ko e siana ko Paula kuo ne fakaloto‘i mo taki kehe ha fu‘u kakai, ‘o ‘ikai ‘i ‘Efesō pē, ka meimei ko hono kotoa ‘o ‘Ēsia, he‘ene pehē ‘oku ‘ikai ko e ngaahi ‘Otua ē ‘a ia kuo ngaohi ‘e he nima ‘o e tangata.
44019027	Pea ko hono kovi, ‘oku longolongo ta‘etokanga‘i ai ‘etau lakanga ni; pea ‘ikai ko ia pē, ka ‘oku hangē ka faifai pea lau ‘a e temipale ‘o e fu‘u ‘otua fefine ko Taiana ko e me‘a va‘inga, pea ke hifo mei hono tu‘unga lāngilangi ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio, ‘a ia ‘oku lotu ki ai ‘a ‘Ēsia kātoa, ‘io, mo māmani.
44019028	Pea ‘i he‘enau fanongo ki ai, na‘a nau mātu‘aki lili, ‘o nau kalanga ‘o pehē, Lāngilangi ā ka ko Taiana, ko e ‘Otua ‘otautolu ‘Efesō!
44019029	Pea na‘e maveuveu fu‘u ‘a e kolo: na‘a nau ‘oho taha foki ki he fale faiva, kuo nau puke ‘a Keio mo ‘Alisitako, ko e ongo me‘a Masitōnia, ‘a ia na‘e kaungā fononga mo Paula.
44019030	Ka ‘i he tokanga ‘a Paula ke hū ki he fakataha, na‘e ta‘ofi ia ‘e he kau ako.
44019031	Pea ko e ni‘ihi foki ‘o e hou‘eiki ‘Ēsia, ‘a ia na‘a nau ‘ofa kiate ia, na‘a nau fekau ange ‘o kole ke ‘oua te ne hū ki he fale faiva, ‘o li‘aki ‘ene mo‘ui.
44019032	Pea kalanga‘aki ‘e he ni‘ihi ‘a ē, pea ko e ni‘ihi ko ē: he na‘e hangē ha pepeli ‘a e fakataha; pea ko honau tokolahi na‘e ‘ikai te nau ‘ilo pe ko e hā ‘a e me‘a kuo nau fakataha ai.
44019033	Pea ko e ni‘ihi ‘o e kakai na‘a nau fusi hake ‘a ‘Ālekisānita; na‘e teke hake ia foki ‘e he kakai Siu, pea ta‘alo atu ‘a ‘Ālekisānita ko ‘ene fie fai ha fakamatala ki he fakataha.
44019034	Ka ‘i he‘enau vakai ko e Siu ia, na‘e hangē ha le‘o pē taha ‘enau kalanga kotoa pē, ‘o ‘osi nai ha houa ‘e ua, Lāngilangi ā ka ko Taiana ko e ‘Otua ‘otautolu ‘Efesō!
44019035	Pea kuo lolomi ‘a e kakai ‘e he sēkelitali ‘o e kolo, na‘a ne pehē, ‘A Matāpule ‘Efesō, seuke, ko hai ha taha ‘i māmani ‘oku ‘ikai ke ‘ilo ‘oku ‘i he kolo ‘otautolu ‘Efesō ‘a e tauhi ‘o e temipale ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio ko Taiana, mo e tamapua ne tō hifo meia Siupita?
44019036	Ko e me‘a ko ia ‘e ‘ikai ala faka‘ikai‘i: ko ia, na‘e mei taau ke mou fakama‘uma‘u mu‘a, ‘o ‘oua ‘e ‘ohonoa ke fai ha me‘a.
44019037	He vakai, kuo mou taki mai ‘a e ongo matāpule ni, ‘a ia kuo ‘ikai te na maumau ‘a e tapu ‘o e temipale, pe tālalakulaku ki hotau ‘otua.
44019038	Pea ko e me‘a kia Temetelio, mo e kau tufunga ‘oku kau mo ia, kapau leva kuo ‘i ai ha me‘a ‘oku nau kovi‘ia ai ki ha taha, ko e ngaahi ‘aho ‘eni ‘o e fai fakamaau, pea ‘oku ‘i ai ha hou‘eiki kōvana: tuku ke nau fakatou hopo.
44019039	Pea ka ko ho‘omou tangi ki ha me‘a ange, ‘e fakatonutonu ia ‘i he fakataha kuo tu‘utu‘uni ‘i he lao.
44019040	Kae‘uma‘ā ‘oku hangē ka ‘ekea kitautolu koe‘uhi ko e angatu‘u kuo fai he ‘aho ni, he tala‘ehai ‘oku ‘i ai ha‘atau fakamatala ke ‘atu ke ‘uhinga ai ‘a e fakataha kehe ni.
44019041	Pea hili ‘ene lea pehē, na‘a ne tukuange ‘a e fakataha.
44020001	PEA hili ‘a e mālōlō ‘o e maveuveu, na‘e ui ange ‘e Paula ‘a e kau ako, ‘o ne fai ha tokoni, mo fekita kiate kinautolu, pea ne toki mahu‘i ke ‘alu ki Masitōnia.
44020002	Pea hili ‘ene ‘a‘ahi ki he ngaahi feitu‘u ko ia, mo ne fai ha tokoni lahi kiate kinautolu, pea ne toki hoko ki Kalisi, ‘o ne tolu māhina ai.
44020003	Pea ‘i he puleaki‘i ia ‘e he kakai Siu ‘i he‘ene fai ke tuku folau atu ki Sīlia, na‘a ne fakakaukau ke foki hake ‘i Masitōnia.
44020004	Pea na‘e fe‘ao mo ia ‘i he fononga ‘a Sōpeta ko e tangata Pēlea, ko e foha ‘o Pulo, pea mei he kakai Tesalonaika ‘a ‘Alisitako mo Sekunio; mo Keio ko e tangata Teape, mo Tīmote; kae ‘uma‘ā ‘a e ongo me‘a mei ‘Ēsia ko Tikiko mo Talofima.
44020005	Pea na‘e mu‘omu‘a ‘a e tu‘unga me‘a ni, ‘o tatali kiate kimautolu mei Taloasi.
44020006	Ka ko kimautolu na‘a mau toki folau mei Filipai, hili ‘a e ngaahi ‘aho ‘o e tapu lēvani, pea mau hoko kiate kinautolu ki Taloasi ‘i hono ‘aho nima; pea mau nofo ai ‘o ‘aho fitu.
44020007	Pea ‘i he ‘uluaki ‘aho ‘o e uike na‘a mau fakataha ke pakipaki mā; pea na‘e talanoa lotu ‘a Paula kiate kinautolu, he na‘a ne ‘amanaki ‘alu ‘apongipongi; ‘o ne fano atu ‘ene fakamatala ki he tu‘uapō.
44020008	Pea na‘e lahi ‘a e maama ‘i he loki ‘i ‘olunga, ‘a ia kuo mau fakataha ai.
44020009	Pea na‘e ai ha talavou na‘e hingoa ko ‘Ūtiko, na‘e hekeheka ‘i he kātupa; pea na‘a ne tule hifo ‘o mohe ma‘u ‘i he fai fuoloa fau ‘a Paula; pea ne mate ‘ene mohe, ‘o ne patū hifo mei hono tolu ‘o e fata, pea na‘e hiki hake kuo pekia.
44020010	Pea ‘alu hifo ‘a Paula, ‘o fo‘ohifo kiate ia, ‘o fā‘ofua ki ai, ‘o ne toki pehē, ‘Oua te mou puputu‘u; he ‘oku ‘iate ia ‘ene mo‘ui.
44020011	Pea ne ‘alu hake ‘o fai ‘a e pakipaki ‘o e mā, mo ne kamata; na‘a ne talanoa foki ‘o fuoloa, ‘o a‘u ki he ma‘a ‘a e ‘aho, Na‘e pehē ‘a e anga ‘o ‘ene ‘alu.
44020012	Pea nau taki mai ‘a e tama kuo mo‘ui, pea hono tangenge ‘enau fiemālie!
44020013	Pea na‘a mau mu‘omu‘a kimautolu ki vaka, ‘o mau tuku folau atu ki ‘Āsosi ke mau fakaheka ‘a Paula ‘i he potu ko ia: he na‘e pehē ‘ene tu‘utu‘uni, ko ‘ene fie hala ‘uta pē ia.
44020014	Pea kuo ne fetaulaki tu‘u mo kimautolu ki ‘Āsosi, na‘a mau fakaheka ia, ‘o hoko ki Mitilene.
44020015	Pea mau folau mei ai ‘i he ‘aho ‘e taha, pea mau hoko ‘o fe‘unga mo Kaio; pea ‘i he ‘aho ‘e taha na‘a mau afe ki Samo; pea ‘i he ‘aho na‘a na feholoi na‘a mau hoko ki Mileto.
44020016	He kuo tu‘utu‘uni ‘e Paula ke laka ‘i ‘Efesō, koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a mole hono taimi ‘i ‘Ēsia: he na‘a ne fakavave, hei‘ilo te ne lava ke ne ‘Aho Penitekosi ki Selusalema.
44020017	Pea ne fekau mei Mileto ki ‘Efesō ke ha‘u kiate ia ‘a e kau faifekau ‘o e siasi.
44020018	Pea kuo nau hoko mai, pea pehē ‘e ia kiate kinautolu, Ko kimoutolu ē, kuo mou lāu‘ilo ‘eku anga tu‘u ma‘u ‘iate kimoutolu, talu mei he ‘uluaki ‘aho ‘o ‘eku hoko ki ‘Ēsia;
44020019	‘a ‘eku ngāue fakatamaio‘eiki ki he ‘Eiki, ‘a ia na‘a ku fai mo e fakavaivai mo‘oni, mo e tangi lo‘imata; kae‘uma‘ā ‘a e ngaahi ‘ahi‘ahi na‘e hoko kiate au ‘i he puleaki‘i ‘e he kakai Siu.
44020020	‘Oku mou ‘ilo foki na‘e ‘ikai te u taetae ha me‘a, ka u fakahā pē mo ako‘aki kiate kimoutolu ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e kakai, pea ‘i he fale takitaha;
44020021	‘o u talatalatonu ki he Siu mo e Kalisi fakatou‘osi ‘a e fakatomala ‘o tafoki ki he ‘Otua, mo e tui pīkitai ki hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū.
44020022	Pea vakai ko ‘eku ‘alu ‘eni ki Selusalema kuo no‘otekina au ‘i hoku laumālie, pea ‘oku ‘ikai te u ‘ilo pe ko e hā ha me‘a ‘e fepaki ai mo au:
44020023	ngata pē ‘i he tala fakapatonu mai ‘e he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni ‘i he kolo takitaha, ‘o pehē tokua, ‘oku nofo‘aki tali kiate au ha ‘ū ha‘i, mo ha koto fakamamahi.
44020024	Ka tala‘ehai ‘oku ou lau ‘eku mo‘ui ko e me‘a mahu‘inga, pe tatau kiate au mo e lava ‘o ‘eku fakapuepue, mo e lakanga na‘a ku ma‘u mei he ‘Eiki ko Sīsū, ke talatalatonu ‘a e Kōsipeli ‘o e kelesi ‘a e ‘Otua.
44020025	Pea ko eni ‘oku ou ‘ilo ni ‘e ‘ikai hamou taha ‘e toe vakai ki hoku mata ni, ‘a kimoutolu kuo u ‘alu holo ai ‘o malanga‘aki ‘a e Pule‘anga.
44020026	Ko ia ‘oku ou fakapapau atu ‘i he ‘aho ko eni, kuo u ‘ata‘atā mei homou toto.
44020027	He na‘e ‘ikai te u taetae ‘a e finangalo ‘o e ‘Otua ka na‘a ku fakahā atu hono kotoa.
44020028	Ko ia, mou lamasi kimoutolu, mo e fanga sipi kotoa, ‘a ia kuo fakanofo kimoutolu ‘e he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni ‘i honau lolotonga ko honau kau le‘o, koe‘uhi ke mou tauhi ‘a e Siasi ‘o e ‘Otua, ‘a ia na‘a ne fakatau ‘aki hono ta‘ata‘a ‘o‘ona.
44020029	He ‘oku ou ‘ilo, ‘oka hili ‘eku hokosi, ‘e hū atu ha fanga ulofi anga mālohi, ‘a ia ‘e ‘ikai te nau mamae ki he fanga sipi.
44020030	‘Io, na‘a mo kimoutolu ‘e tupu mei ai ha kau tangata ‘oku lea‘aki ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ‘alu kehe, ke tohoaki ‘aki ‘a e kau ako ke muimui kiate kinautolu.
44020031	Ko ia, mou le‘o, ‘o mou manatu, ko e ta‘u ‘e tolu, ‘i he pō mo e ‘aho, na‘e ‘ikai tuku ‘eku na‘ina‘i kimoutolu tāutaha, ‘o fai mo e tangi.
44020032	Pea ko eni ‘oku ou tuku kimoutolu ki he ‘Otua, mo e folofola ‘a ‘ene kelesi, kiate ia te ne mafai ke lava homou langa hake, pea ke ‘atu ‘a e tofi‘a ‘i he lotolotonga ‘o e kakai kotoa pē kuo fakahaohaoa.
44020033	Na‘e ‘ikai te u mānumanu ki ha konga siliva ‘a ha taha, pe ha koula, pe ha kofu.
44020034	‘Io, ‘oku mou ‘ilo ‘e kimoutolu na‘e ngāue ‘a e ongo nima ni ki he tauhi ‘o‘oku mo e kakai na‘e ‘iate au.
44020035	‘I he me‘a kotoa pē na‘e enginaki ‘e he‘eku ngāue kiate kimoutolu ‘oku totonu ke fakaongosia pehē, koe‘uhi ke tokoni ‘a e vaivai; pea ke fakamanatu foki ki he folofola ‘a e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū, ‘a si‘ene me‘a mai, ‘Oku te monū‘ia lahi ‘i he fai ha foaki atu, ‘i he‘ete ma‘u ha foaki mai.
44020036	Pea ‘i he‘ene lea pehē, na‘a ne tū‘ulutui mo kinautolu kotoa ‘o hū.
44020037	Pea nau fu‘u tangi kotoa pē, ‘o nau tāupe ‘i he u‘a ‘o Paula, ‘o nau toutou ‘uma lolomi kiate ia:
44020038	pea lahi taha ‘enau mamahi koe‘uhi ko e lea kuo ne toki fai, tokua ‘e ‘ikai te nau toe siofia si‘i fofonga ‘o‘ona. Pea nau moimoi‘i ia ki vaka.
44021001	PEA kuo mau matanga meiate kinautolu, ‘o tuku folau atu, na‘a mau lele ‘o a‘u ki Kō, he na‘e angimui ‘a e matangi; pea ko e ‘aho na‘a na feholoi na‘a mau hoko ki Lota, pea mau fai mei ai ki Patala:
44021002	pea ‘i he‘emau ‘ilo ai ha vaka na‘e teu ke folau ki Finisia, ‘o faka‘atā ‘i he vaha, pea mau heka ai ‘o folau.
44021003	Pea kuo kite ‘a Saipalo, na‘a mau tuku ia ki to‘ohema, ‘o mau tau mu‘a ki Sīlia, ‘o mau hoko ki Taia: he ko e potu ia na‘e tu‘utu‘uni ke hifo ai ‘a e uta ‘a e vaka ni.
44021004	Ka ko kimautolu na‘a mau kumi ‘a e kau ako, ‘o mau nofo hifo ai ‘o ‘aho fitu: pea ko e kau ako ko ia na‘a nau toutou tala kia Paula ‘i he‘enau Laumālie‘ia, ke ‘oua te ne ‘alu ange ki Selusalema.
44021005	Pea ‘i he faifai pea kakato ‘a e ngaahi ‘aho ko ia, na‘a mau ‘alu atu mei he fale, ‘o kamata fononga; pea moimoi‘i kimautolu ‘e he kau ako kātoa mo honau ngaahi uaifi mo e fānau ki he tua‘ā kolo: pea mau tū‘ulutui ‘i he matātahi ‘o hū.
44021006	Pea kuo mau fetatau‘aki, pea heka kimautolu ki vaka; ka ka foki kinautolu ki ‘api.
44021007	Pea mau hoko hifo mei Taia ki Tolimeasi, pea toki ngata ai ‘emau folau; pea mau ‘alu ‘o fe‘iloaki mo e kāinga, ‘o mau nofo mo kinautolu ‘i he ‘aho ‘e taha.
44021008	Pea pongipongi hake, pea mau ‘alu atu ‘o hoko ki Sesalia: ‘o mau hū ki he fale ‘o Filipe ko e ‘Evangeliō, ‘a ia na‘a ne kau ki he Toko Fitu; ‘o mau nonofo mo ia.
44021009	Pea ko e toko taha ko ia na‘e ‘i ai hono ‘ōfefine ‘e toko fā, ko e kau ta‘ahine na‘e fa‘a palofisai.
44021010	Pea ‘i he‘emau nofo ai ‘o ‘aho lahi, na‘e hoko hifo mei Siutea ha palōfita na‘e hingoa ko ‘Akapusi.
44021011	Pea ne ha‘u kiate kimautolu, ‘o ne to‘o ‘a e no‘o ‘o Paula, ‘o ne ha‘i ‘aki hono va‘e mo hono nima ‘o‘ona, ‘o ne pehē, Ko eni ia ‘a e folofola ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni ‘oni, Ko e tangata ‘oku ‘o‘ona ‘a e no‘o ni, ‘e pehē ni hono ha‘i ‘i Selusalema ‘e he kakai Siu, pea te nau tukuange ki he Senitaile.
44021012	Pea ‘i he‘emau fanongo ki he me‘a ko ia, na‘a mau kole, ‘e kimautolu mo e kakai ‘o e potu, ke ‘oua te ne ‘alu hake ki Selusalema.
44021013	Toki tali ‘a Paula, ‘o ne pehē, Ko e hā ia ‘oku mou fai, ho‘omou tangi mo e fakavaivai‘i hoku loto? he kuo ‘osi ‘eku teu, ‘o ‘ikai ki he ha‘isia pē, ka ki he mate tāmate‘i foki ‘i Selusalema, koe‘uhi ko e huafa ‘o e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū.
44021014	Pea ‘i he ‘ikai lava hono fakaloto‘i, na‘a mau tuku, ‘o mau pehē, Ke fai pē ‘a e finangalo ‘o e ‘Eiki.
44021015	Pea hili ‘a e ngaahi ‘aho ko ia na‘a mau fakamā‘opo‘opo ‘emau ngaahi me‘a, ‘o mau ‘alu hake ki Selusalema.
44021016	Pea na‘e fononga mo kimautolu ha ni‘ihi ‘o e kau ako mei Sesalia, ‘a ia na‘a nau ‘omi kimautolu kia Manasoni, ‘a ia te mau ‘āunofo ki ai; ko e motu‘a Saipalo ia, ko e toko taha ‘i he ‘uluaki kau ako.
44021017	Pea kuo mau hoko ki Selusalema, na‘e tali fiefia kimautolu ‘e he kāinga.
44021018	Pea ‘i he ‘aho na‘a na hoko, na‘e hū ‘a Paula mo kimautolu kia Sēmisi; pea ‘oku nofo ai foki ‘a e kau faifekau kotoa pē.
44021019	Pea kuo ne fetapa kiate kinautolu, na‘a ne ‘a‘au fakalāutelau ‘a e ngaahi me‘a kuo fai ‘e he ‘Eiki ki he Senitaile ‘i he‘ene ngāue.
44021020	Pea ‘i he hili ‘enau fanongo ki ai, na‘a nau tuku kolōlia ki he ‘Otua. Na‘a nau pehē foki kiate ia, ‘Alā, ‘oku ke vakai koā hono nifi ‘a e ngaahi mano ‘o e kakai Siu kuo lotu; pea ‘oku nau mamahi‘i kotoa pē tokua ‘a e Lao:
44021021	pea kuo talafono‘aki koe kiate kinautolu, ‘o pehē tokua ‘oku ke enginaki ‘a e kau Siu kotoa pē ‘oku nofo Senitaile ke nau hiki mei he lao ‘a Mōsese, ‘o ke pehē ke ‘oua te nau kamu ‘enau fānau, pe fou ‘i he ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni.
44021022	Pea fēfē ai? kuo pau ke fakataha mai ha fu‘u kakai, he te nau fanongo kuo ke ha‘u.
44021023	Ko ia, ke ke fai ‘a e me‘a ni ‘oku mau tala atu: ‘Oku ‘i ai ha kau tangata heni ‘e toko fā ‘oku ‘i ai ‘enau tuku mo‘ui.
44021024	‘Alu koe mo kinautolu, ‘o mou fakatapu fakataha, pea ke totongi ‘e koe ma‘anautolu, koe‘uhi ke lava ‘a ‘enau tele ‘ulu; pea ‘e toki ‘ilo kotoa pē, tā ko e launoa ‘a e ngaahi me‘a na‘e talafono‘aki ai koe; kaekehe ‘oku ke fou founga, pea ‘oku ke tauhi ‘e koe ‘a e Lao.
44021025	Ka ko e me‘a ki he Senitaile kuo lotu, kuo mau tohi ‘o tu‘utu‘uni ke nau ngata pē ‘i he faka‘ehi‘ehi mei he me‘a kuo ‘oatu ki he ‘aitoli, pea mei he toto, mo e manu kuo sisina, mo e fe‘auaki.
44021026	Pea na‘e toki ‘ave ‘e Paula ‘a e kau tangata, pea ‘i he ‘aho na‘a na hoko, hili ‘ene fakakau ia ki he‘enau tapu, na‘a ne hū ki he Temipale ke fakaongo ‘a e faka‘osi ‘o e taimi ‘o e tapu, kae fai ‘a e feilaulau koe‘uhi ko kinautolu takitaha.
44021027	Pea ‘i he mei ‘osi ‘a e ‘aho ‘e fitu, na‘e fakatokanga‘i ia ‘i he Temipale ‘e he kau Siu mei ‘Ēsia; pea na‘a nau ue‘i ‘a e kakai kotoa, ‘o nau ala fakamālohi kiate ia, ‘o nau kalanga,
44021028	‘A Matāpule ‘Isileli, mou tokoni mai! Ko e siana ni ko e tangata ‘oku ne talakaa‘i ‘a e kakai tapu, mo e Lao, mo e potu ni, ‘i he‘ene ako ki he kakai ‘i he potu kotoa pē: ‘io, pea kuo ne fakahū foki ha kau Kalisi ki he Temipale, pea kuo ne maumau ‘a e tapu ‘o e Potu Tapu ni.
44021029	(Ko hono ‘uhinga, he kuo nau mamata mu‘a kia Talofima ko e tangata ‘Efesō, ‘oku na ō mo ia ‘i he kolo, pea nau mahalo kuo fakahū ia ‘e Paula ki he Temipale.)
44021030	Na‘e ngāue ai foki ‘a e kolo kotoa, pea felelele‘i mai ‘a e kakai: ‘o nau puke ‘a Paula, ‘o toho ia kitu‘a ‘i he Temipale: pea na‘e tāpuni leva ‘a e ngaahi matapā.
44021031	Na‘a nau feinga foki ke tāmate‘i ia, kae lolotonga ia na‘e ‘ohake hono tala ki he ‘eiki ‘o e vāhenga tau, ‘o pehē tokua, kuo maveuveu ‘a Selusalema kātoa.
44021032	Pea ne ‘alu leva mo ia ha kau tau mo ha tu‘unga senituliō, ‘o ne lele hifo kiate kinautolu: pea ‘i he‘enau sio ki he ‘eikitau mo e kau tau, na‘a nau tuku ‘enau haha ‘a Paula.
44021033	Pea ‘i he a‘u mai leva ‘a e ‘eikitau, na‘a ne puke ia, ‘o ne fekau ke ha‘i ‘aki ha seini ‘e ua; ‘o ne kamata ‘eke pe ko hai ia, pea ko e hā ‘a e me‘a kuo ne fai.
44021034	Pea kalanga‘aki ‘e he ni‘ihi ‘i he kakai ‘a ē, pea ko e ni‘ihi ko ē: pea ‘i he ‘ikai te ne lava ke ‘ilo pau ko e me‘a ‘i he longoa‘a, na‘a ne fekau ke taki ia ki he taua.
44021035	Pea ‘i he‘ene hoko ki he ngaahi tu‘unga, ‘iloange na‘e hīkisia ia ‘e he kau tau ko e me‘a ‘i he fai mālohi ‘a e kakai.
44021036	He na‘e tulimui ‘a e fu‘u fakataha, ‘o nau kalanga, Tafi‘i ‘a e siana na!
44021037	Pea ‘i he‘enau fai ke hūfaki ia ki he taua, na‘e pehē ‘e Paula ki he ‘eikitau, ‘E ngofua ‘eku lea si‘i atu? Pea pehē ‘e ia, ‘Oku ke ‘ilo koā ‘a e lea faka-Kalisi?
44021038	Tā ‘oku ‘ikai ko e motu‘a ‘Isipite koe, ‘a ia na‘a ne fakatupu angatu‘u ‘i he ngaahi ‘aho kuo hili, mo ne taki atu ki he toafa ‘a e kau Tāmate fufū ‘e toko fā afe.
44021039	Pea pehē ‘e Paula, ‘Ā, ko e tangata Siu au mei Tāsusi ‘i Silisia, pea tala‘ehai ko e kolo ta‘e‘iloa ia ‘oku ou kau ki ai: ko ia ‘oku ou kole ke ke tuku ke u lea ki he kakai.
44022001	PEA ‘i he‘ene fakangofua ia, na‘e ta‘alo ‘e Paula ki he kakai, ‘oku ne tu‘u mei he tu‘unga taupotu ki ‘olunga. Pea kuo nau fakanonga hifo, na‘a ne lea kiate kinautolu ‘i he lea faka-Hepelū ‘o pehē:
44022002	Kāinga Matāpule mo Hou‘eiki, mou me‘a lelei mai ki he‘eku fakamatala ‘oku fai atu ni. (Pea ‘i he‘enau fanongo ‘oku ne lea kiate kinautolu ‘i he lea faka-Hepelū, na‘e ‘āsili ai ‘enau fakalongo. Pea ne fai atu.)
44022003	Ko au ko e motu‘a Siu. Na‘e fanau‘i au ‘i Tāsusi ‘i Silisia, ka u tupu hake ‘i he kolo ni, ‘o u ta‘utu ‘i he va‘e ‘o Kāmelieli, ‘o u ako ke mamafa ki he ngaahi mingimingi‘i me‘a ‘o e lao ‘a ‘etau ngaahi kui, kae‘uma‘ā na‘a ku mamahi‘i ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘o hangē ko kimoutolu kotoa pē he ‘aho ni.
44022004	Pea u fakatanga‘i ‘a e ‘alunga ko ē, ‘o ‘ikai te u nā ‘i he tāmate, pea u ha‘i ‘o fakahū pilīsone ‘a tangata mo fafine fakatou‘osi.
44022005	Pea ko ‘eku me‘a ko ia ‘e fakamo‘oni ki ai ‘a e Taula‘eiki Lahi, mo e Fakataha Fakamātu‘a kotoa: ‘a ia na‘a ku ma‘u tohi mei ai foki ki he kāinga ‘i Tāmasikusi, ‘o u ‘alu mo au, ko ‘eku fai ke ha‘i ‘a e kakai foki na‘e nofo ‘i he potu ko ia, ‘o taki mai ki Selusalema ke tautea.
44022006	Pea lolotonga ‘eku fononga, ‘o fakaofiofi ki Tāmasikusi; kuo ho‘atā nai; fakafokifā na‘e malama takatakai kiate au ha fu‘u maama mei he langi.
44022007	Pea u tō ki lalo, pea u fanongo ki ha le‘o ‘oku pehē mai, ‘E Saula, ‘e Saula, ko e hā ‘oku ke fakatanga‘i ai au? Pea u tali, ‘Ēī, ko hai koe?
44022008	Pea folofola mai ‘e ia, Ko au ko Sīsū mei Nāsaleti, ‘a ia ‘oku ke fakatanga‘i.
44022009	Pea ko kinautolu na‘e ‘iate au na‘a nau tokanga‘i ‘a e maama, ka na‘e ‘ikai te nau ongo‘i ‘a e le‘o ‘o ia na‘e me‘a mai.
44022010	Pea u pehē, ‘Eiki, ko e hā te u fai? Pea folofola ‘a e ‘Eiki kiate au, tu‘u pē ‘o ‘alu ki Tāmasikusi; pea ‘e fakahā ai kiate koe ‘a e ngaahi me‘a kuo tu‘utu‘uni ke ke fai.
44022011	Pea ‘i he ‘ikai te u fa‘a fakasiosio, ko e me‘a ‘i he fu‘u ngingila ‘o e maama ko ia, na‘e takinima‘i au ‘e he kakai na‘a mau ō, pea u hoko ki Tāmasikusi.
44022012	Pea ko ‘Ananaia, ko e motu‘a lotu na‘e mātu‘aki tauhi ‘a e Lao, pea fakaongolelei ‘e he kakai Siu kotoa pē na‘e nofo ai.
44022013	Na‘e ha‘u ia kiate au, pea ne tu‘u mai ‘o ne pehē, ‘Alā Saula, ‘ā hake. Pea u sio hake ‘i he taimi ko ia, ‘o ‘ilo ia.
44022014	Pea ne pehē, Ko e ‘Otua ‘o ‘etau ngaahi kui na‘a ne sinaki tu‘utu‘uni ke ke ‘ilo hono finangalo, pea ke mamata ki he Toko Taha Angatonu, pea ke fanongo ki ha le‘o mei hono fofonga,
44022015	koe‘uhi ke ke hoko ko ‘ene fakamo‘oni ki he kakai kotoa pē ‘i he ngaahi me‘a kuo ke mamata mo fanongo ki ai.
44022016	Pea ko e toe tatali ke hā? Tu‘u pē ke papitaiso koe, ‘o fufulu koe mei ho‘o ngaahi angahala, ‘o takua hono huafa.
44022017	Pea ‘i he faifai pea u foki ki Selusalema, lolotonga ‘eku lotu ‘i he Temipale, ‘iloange na‘e ‘āvea au.
44022018	Pea u mamata kiate ia ‘oku ne me‘a mai, Fakato‘oto‘o, pea ‘alu vave mei Selusalema: koe‘uhi ‘e ‘ikai te nau tali ha‘o fakamatala kiate au.
44022019	Ka u pehē ‘e au, ‘Eiki, ka ko kinautolu ia ‘oku lāu‘ilo, ko au ia na‘a ku fa‘a ‘ai pilīsone, mo haha ‘i he ngaahi falelotu kehekehe, ‘a e kakai ‘oku lotu kiate koe:
44022020	pea ‘i he fai ‘a e lilingi ‘o e toto ‘o ho‘o mā‘ata ko Sitīveni, na‘a ku ‘i ai mo au, ‘o u tu‘u ofi ai ‘o fakava‘eva‘e, mo tauhi ‘a e kofu ‘o e kakai na‘e fakapoongi ia.
44022021	Pea ne folofola mai kiate au, ‘Alu pē: he ko au te u tuku atu koe ke ‘alu ki he mama‘o, ke fai ‘eku fekau ki he Senitaile.
44022022	Pea na‘a nau fakafanongo kiate ia ‘o a‘u ki he lea ko ia, pea nau toki ‘ioho, Tafi‘i mei māmani ‘a e siana kehe na: he na‘e hala hono tuku ke mo‘ui.
44022023	Pea ‘i he‘enau kaikaila, mo tupe‘i honau kofu, mo fakapuna efu ki ‘olunga,
44022024	na‘e fekau ‘e he ‘eikitau ke hūfaki ia ki he taua, ‘o ne pehē ke ‘eke taa‘i ia; koe‘uhi ke ne ‘ilo pe ko e hā hono ‘uhinga ‘o ‘enau ‘ioho pehē ki ai.
44022025	Pea kuo nau ha‘i punou ia ke fai hono kau‘imaea, na‘e pehē ‘e Paula ki he senituliō na‘e tu‘u ai, ‘Oku ngofua koā ke mou kau‘imaea ha tangata Loma, kae‘uma‘ā ha toko taha kuo te‘eki fakamaau?
44022026	Pea ‘i he fanongo ki ai ‘a e senituliō, na‘a ne ‘alu ‘o tala ki he ‘eikitau, ‘o pehē, Ko e hā ‘a e me‘a ‘oku ke pehē ke fai? He ko e siana ni ko e Loma.
44022027	Pea ha‘u ‘a e ‘eikitau, ‘o lea kiate ia, Tala mai, ko e Loma koe?
44022028	Pea pehē ‘e ia, Ko ē. Pea tali ‘a e ‘eikitau, Na‘a mo au ne u totongi lahi ke u kau ki he kolo ko ia. Pea pehē ‘e Paula, Ka ko au na‘a ku tupu pehē foki.
44022029	Pea tuaiekemo ‘a e hiki meiate ia ‘a e kakai na‘e fai ke ‘eke ia: ‘io, pea ko e ‘eikitau foki na‘a ne manavahē ‘i he‘ene ‘ilo ko e Loma ia, pea kuo ne ha‘i fakamo‘omo‘oni ia.
44023001	PEA ‘i he ‘aho ‘e taha, ko e me‘a ‘i he‘ene fie ‘ilo pe ko e hā nai ‘a e me‘a ‘oku talatalaaki‘i ai ia ‘e he kakai Siu, ko ia na‘a ne vete ange ia, ‘o ne fekau ke fakataha ‘a e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki, mo e Sanetalimi kātoa, pea ne ‘ohifo ‘a Paula ‘o fokotu‘u ‘i honau ‘ao.
44023002	Pea sio fakamama‘u ‘a Paula ki he Sanetalimi, ‘o ne toki pehē, ‘A Kāinga Matāpule, ko au ‘eni ‘oku ‘ata‘atā ‘aupito hoku konisēnisi; he kuo u fai ‘eku ngāue fakafonua ki he ‘Otua, ‘o a‘u ki he ‘aho ni.
44023003	Pea fekau ‘e he Taula‘eiki Lahi ko ‘Ānanaia kiate kinautolu na‘e tu‘u ofi ai, ke nau taa‘i hono ngutu.
44023004	Pea pehē leva ‘e Paula kiate ia, ‘a e ‘a vali hina, ‘e taa‘i koe ‘e he ‘Otua: ko ho‘o nofo na ke fakamaau au ‘o fakatatau ki he Lao, ka ke fekau ke taa‘i au, ‘a ia ‘oku tapu ‘i he Lao!
44023005	Pea ko kinautolu na‘e tu‘u ofi mai na‘a nau pehē, ‘Oku pehē koā ho‘o ngaohi ‘a e Taula‘eiki Lahi ‘a e ‘Otua? Pea tali ‘e Paula, ‘Ā, na‘e ‘ikai te u ‘ilo, kāinga, ko e Taula‘eiki Lahi ia; he kuo tohi, ‘E ‘ikai te ke lea kovi ki he pule ‘o ho kakai.
44023006	Pea ‘i he ‘ilo ‘e Paula, ko e potu ‘e taha ko e kau Sātusi, pea ko e potu ‘e taha ko e kau Fālesi, na‘a ne hanga ‘o kalanga ‘i he lotolotonga ‘o e Sanetalimi, ‘o pehē, Kāinga Matāpule, ko au ko e Fālesi, ko e hako‘i Fālesi: ko e me‘a ‘oku tau ‘amanakia, ‘io, ‘a e toetu‘u ‘a e pekia, ko ia ‘oku ‘ekea ai au.
44023007	Pea ‘i he‘ene lea pehē, na‘e hoko ai ‘o fetu‘usi ‘a e kau Fālesi mo e kau Sātusi: pea mavahe ua ‘a e fakataha.
44023008	He ‘oku lau ‘a e ha‘a Sātusi, tokua ‘oku ‘ikai ha toetu‘u, pe ha ‘āngelo, pe ha laumālie: ka ‘oku tui ‘a e ha‘a Fālesi ‘oku ‘i ai fakatou‘osi.
44023009	Pea na‘e hoko ha fu‘u vālau: pea tutu‘u hake ha ni‘ihi ‘o e kau sikalaipe na‘e kau ki he fa‘ahi Fālesi, ‘o nau taukave ‘o pehē, ‘Oku ‘ikai te mau ‘ilo ha kovi ‘i he tangata ni: pea na‘a kuo lea kiate ia ha laumālie pe ha ‘āngelo.
44023010	Pea ‘i he fākalalahi ‘a e fetu‘usi na‘e manavahē ‘a e ‘eikitau na‘a haeua ‘a Paula ‘e kinautolu, pea na‘a ne fekau ‘a e tau ke ‘alu hifo, ‘o ‘ave fakamālohi mei honau lotolotonga, pea ke nau taki foki ki he taua.
44023011	Pea ‘i he pō ko ia na‘e tu‘u mai ‘a e ‘Eiki, ‘o ne folofola kiate ia, ‘o pehē, ‘Oua te ke lotosi‘i: he hangē ko ho‘o talatalatonu ‘i Selusalema ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku kau kiate au, pehē foki kuo pau te ke fakamatala ‘i Loma.
44023012	Pea kuo ‘aho hake, na‘e fai ha puleaki ‘e ha kakai Siu, ‘o nau tuki faka‘aungafa kinautolu, ‘e ‘ikai te nau kai pe inu kae‘oua ke nau tāmate‘i ‘a Paula.
44023013	Pea na‘e hulu atu ‘i he toko fāngofulu ‘a e kakai na‘a nau fai ‘a e fuakava ko ia.
44023014	Pea na‘e ‘alu ‘a e fa‘ahinga ko ia ki he hou‘eiki taula‘eiki, mo e kau mātu‘a, ‘o nau pehē, Kuo mau mātu‘aki tuki faka‘aungafa kimautolu, ‘e ‘ikai te mau mama ha me‘a kae‘oua ke mau tāmate‘i ‘a Paula.
44023015	Pea ko eni, ke ‘amoutolu mo e Sanetalimi ‘a e fakahā ki he ‘eikitau, ke ne ‘ohifo ia kiate kimoutolu, ‘o hangē ko ha‘amou fie ‘eke ke mahu‘ingamālie ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku kau kiate ia: pea ko kimautolu, ‘i he te‘eki ke ne ofi mai, te mau ‘i ai ke fakapoongi ia.
44023016	Ka ka fanongo ‘a e ‘ilamutu ‘o Paula ki he malumu, ‘o ne ‘alu ange ‘o hū ki he taua, ‘o tala kia Paula.
44023017	Pea ui ange ‘e Paula ha taha ‘o e kau senituliō, ‘o ne pehē, Ke ke ‘ave ‘a e talavou ni ki he ‘eikitau: he ‘oku ‘i ai ha‘ane me‘a ke fakahā ki ai.
44023018	Ko ia na‘a ne ‘ave ia, ‘o taki ki he ‘eikitau, ‘o ne pehē, Ko e pōpula ko Paula na‘a ne ui ange au, ‘o kole ke u ‘omi ‘a e tama ni kiate koe; he ‘oku ‘i ai ha‘ane lea ke fai atu.
44023019	Pea puke hono nima ‘e he ‘eikitau, ‘o ‘ave fakaekinaua, ‘o ne fehu‘i, Ko e hā ‘a e me‘a ‘oku ke fie fakahā mai, ē?
44023020	Pea ne pehē, Kuo fa‘ufa‘ufono ‘a e kau Siu ke tala kiate koe, ke ke ‘ofa ‘o ‘ohifo ‘a Paula ‘apongipongi ki he Sanetalimi, ‘o hangē ‘oku nau fie ‘eke ke mahu‘ingamālie ‘a e me‘a ‘oku kau kiate ia.
44023021	Ko ia, ‘oua te ke tui kiate kinautolu: he ‘oku toka malumu kiate ia hanau kau tangata ‘e toko fāngofulu tupu, ko e fa‘ahinga kuo tuki faka‘aungafa kinautolu, ‘e ‘ikai te nau kai pe inu kae‘oua ke nau fakapoongi ia: pea kuo nau ‘osi teuteu, ‘o talitali pē ki ha‘o tali ‘enau kole.
44023022	Pea tukuange ‘e he ‘eikitau ‘a e tama, ‘o ne fekau ki ai, ‘Oua te ke tala ki ha taha kuo ke faka‘ilo ‘a e me‘a ni kiate au.
44023023	Pea ne ui ange ha toko ua ‘o e kau senituliō, ‘o ne pehē, Teuteu mai ki hono tolu ‘o e houa po‘uli ha kau sōtia ‘e toko uangeau ke ‘alu ki Sesalia, mo ha kau heka hoosi ‘e toko fitungofulu, mo ha kau to‘o tao pē ‘e toko uangeau.
44023024	Pea ‘omai foki ha fanga manu, koe‘uhi ke nau fakaheka ai ‘a Paula, ‘o a‘utaki lelei kia Filike ko e kōvana.
44023025	Na‘a ne fai foki ha tohi, ‘a ia na‘e fou pehē:
44023026	“Ko au Kaloti Līsia kia Filike ko e ‘Eiki Kōvana, ‘ofa atu."
44023027	“Ko e matāpule ko eni ne puke ‘e he kau Siu, pea na‘e toe si‘i pea fakapoongi ia ‘e kinautolu: ka u ha‘u mo ‘eku tau, ‘o fakahaofi, he kuo u ‘ilo ko e Loma ia."
44023028	“Pea ‘i he‘eku fie‘ilo foki ‘a e ‘uhinga ‘o ‘enau fakahopo ia, ko ia na‘a ku ‘ohifo ia ki he Sanetalimi ‘onautolu:
44023029	pea u ‘ilo, tā kuo fakahopo ia ‘i ha koto me‘a pē ‘oku kau ki he‘enau lao, ka ‘oku ‘ikai ha me‘a ‘i he talatalaaki ‘oku taau ke ne mate ai, pe nofo pilīsone."
44023030	“Pea ‘i he faka‘ilo mai kiate au kuo puleaki‘i ha me‘a ke fai ki he matāpule ni, na‘a ku tuku leva ia kiate koe, pea u fekau foki ki he kau tukuaki ke nau fai ‘enau lea kiate koe." “‘ofa atu."
44023031	Ko ia ko e kau tau na‘a nau ‘ave ‘a Paula, ‘o hangē ko honau tu‘utu‘uni, ‘o nau taki po‘uli ia ki ‘Anitepeta.
44023032	Pea ‘i he ‘aho ‘e taha na‘a nau tuku ‘a e kau heka hoosi ke ‘alu mo ia, ka nau foki kinautolu ki he taua:
44023033	pea ko e fa‘ahinga ko ia na‘a nau hoko ki Sesalia, ‘o nau ‘ave ‘a e tohi ki he kōvana, ‘o nau tuku foki ‘a Paula ki ai.
44023034	Pea kuo ne lau ia, na‘a ne fehu‘i pe ko e fē hono vahefonua. Pea ‘i he‘ene ‘ilo ko e toko taha mei Silisia.
44023035	Na‘a ne pehē, Te u fakamāu‘i ho‘o me‘a ‘oka toki hoko mai ho kau tukuaki. Pea ne fekau ke tauhi ia ‘i he palasi ‘o Hēlota.
44024001	PEA hili ‘a e ‘aho ‘e nima na‘e ‘alu hifo ‘a ‘Ananaia ko e Taula‘eiki Lahi; pea ‘alu mo ia ha kau mātu‘a ni‘ihi, mo ha‘ane malanga, ko e motu‘a ko Tētulo; pea nau faka‘ilo ‘a Paula ki he kōvana.
44024002	Pea kuo ui mai ia, pea kamata ‘a Tētulo hono talatalaaki‘i, ‘o pehē, ‘Ē, Filike, Hono nifi ‘a e melino ‘oku mau tofanga ai ni, ko e me‘a ‘i he Feitu‘u na! pea hono nifi ‘a e fiemālie ‘oku ma‘u ‘e he kakai ni ‘i he tauhi poto ‘a e Angi na!
44024003	‘Ē, ‘oku mau ongona ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē mo e potu kotoa pē; pea ‘oku mau mātu‘aki fakafeta‘i.
44024004	Ka koe‘uhi na‘a ku fakapiko kiate koe ‘i ha‘aku fuoloa, ko ia ‘oku ou kole ke ke fai ho tau ko e angalelei, ‘o me‘a si‘i mai kiate kimautolu.
44024005	Ko eni, kuo mau ‘ilo ‘a e matāpule ni, ko e tangata ‘oku pau‘u pipihi, ko e toko taha ‘oku fakatupu maveuveu ‘i he kakai Siu ‘i māmani kātoa, ko e takimu‘a foki ‘i he fa‘ahi Nāsaleti.
44024006	Pea ne ‘ahi‘ahi foki ke maumau ‘a e tapu ‘o e Temipale: pea mau hanga ‘o puke, pea mau mei fakamāu‘i ia ‘o fakatatau ki he‘emau lao.
44024007	Ka na‘e ha‘u ‘a e pule ‘o e vāhenga tau ko Līsia kiate kimautolu, ‘o ne hamusi fakamālohi atu ia mei homau nima, ‘o ne fekau ke omi kiate koe hono kau talatalaaki,
44024008	he ‘oku faingofua kiate koe ke ‘eke kiate ia ‘i he ngaahi me‘a ko ia, pea te ke toki mea‘i hono mo‘oni ‘o e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku mau talatalaaki‘i ai ia.
44024009	Pea na‘e poupou ki ai ‘a e kau Siu foki, ‘o nau taukave ‘oku mo‘oni ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia.
44024010	Na‘e fai foki ‘e Paula ‘ene tali (he kuo kamo kiate ia ‘a e kōvana ke ne lea), ‘o pehē, ‘Oku te fakamālie‘ia he‘ete tu‘u ke fai ‘ete fakamatala ki he ngaahi me‘a ‘oku kau kia kita, ko ‘ete ‘ilo kuo lahi ta‘u ho‘o nofo ko e fakamaau ‘o e kakai ni.
44024011	He ‘oku faingofua ai kiate koe ke ‘eke ‘o ‘ilo, ‘oku ‘ikai ke lahi ‘i he hongofulu mā ua ‘a e ‘aho kuo mole talu ‘eku ‘alu hake ki Selusalema ke fai ‘eku lotu.
44024012	Pea na‘e ‘ikai te nau ‘ilo au ‘oku ou fakakikihi mo ha taha ‘i he Temipale, pe ‘oku ou tātānaki ha kakai ‘i ha falelotu, pe ‘i ha feitu‘u kolo:
44024013	pea tala‘ehai te nau lava ke fakamo‘oni ‘i ho ‘ao ki he ngaahi me‘a kuo nau toki talalalaaki‘i ai au.
44024014	Ka ko e me‘a ni te u fakamo‘oni atu, ‘oku ou fou ‘i he ‘alunga ko ē, ‘a ia kuo nau ui ko e fa‘ahi ‘e taha, ka ko e anga pē ia ‘o ‘eku tauhi ‘a e ‘Otua ‘o homau fa‘ahinga; ‘o u tui pē ki he ngaahi me‘a kotoa pē kuo tohi ‘i he Lao mo e Tohi palōfita.
44024015	Pea u falala pē ki he ‘Otua ‘e faifai pea hoko ha toetu‘u ‘a e angatonu mo e angahala fakatou‘osi–pea ko e me‘a ia ‘oku tui ki ai ‘e kinautolu ni foki.
44024016	Pea ko hono ‘uhinga ia ‘oku ou nofo‘aki ngāue ai ‘e au foki, ke tauhi ma‘u hoku konisēnisi ke ta‘emelengatamaki ki he ‘Otua mo e tangata.
44024017	Pea kuo hili ‘a e ngaahi ta‘u lahi, na‘a ku ha‘u ko e ‘omi ha ngaahi me‘a tokoni, mo ha ngaahi me‘a ‘ofa, ki hoku kakai.
44024018	Pea lolotonga ‘eku fai ia, mo e ‘ilo au ‘i he Temipale kuo u fai ‘a e fakatapu; pea tala‘ehai na‘e ‘i ai mo au ha fu‘u kakai, ‘uma‘ā ha longoa‘a, ngata pē ‘i he tu‘unga Siu ko ia mei ‘Ēsia, ‘a ia na‘a nau ‘ilo au
44024019	–‘a ia na‘e totonu ke nau ‘i ho ‘ao ni ke fai ‘a e talatalaaki, ‘o kapau ‘oku ‘i ai ha‘anau me‘a kiate au.
44024020	Pea ka ‘ikai; pea ke lea pē ‘e kinautolu ni ki ha kovi na‘a nau ‘ilo ‘iate au, lolotonga ‘eku tu‘u ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e Sanetalimi.
44024021	Ko e fo‘i lea ni pē ‘apē, ‘a ia na‘a ku kalanga‘aki ‘i he‘eku tu‘u ‘i honau lotolotonga, ‘o pehē, Ko e me‘a ki he toetu‘u ‘a e pekia, ko ia ia ‘oku ‘ekea ai au ‘e kimoutolu he ‘aho ni.
44024022	Pea na‘e toloi ‘e Filike ‘enau me‘a, he na‘a ne ‘ilo kānokano ‘a e ngaahi me‘a na‘e kau ki he ‘alunga ko ē; ‘o ne pehē, ‘Oua ke hoko hifo ‘a Līsia ko e ‘eikitau, pea u toki fakamaau lelei ho‘omou ngaahi me‘a.
44024023	Pea ne fekau ‘a e senituliō ke tauhi ia: ke ‘oua foki ‘e fakapōpula‘i fau, pe ta‘ofi ‘a e tokoni kiate ia ‘e hano kāinga.
44024024	Pea hili ‘a e ‘aho ni‘ihi, kuo hoko mai ‘a Filike mo hono uaifi ko Telūsila, ‘a ia ko e ta‘ahine Siu, na‘a ne fekau ke ‘omi ‘a Paula, ‘o ne fanongo ki he‘ene fakamatala ki he lotu kia Kalaisi Sīsū.
44024025	Pea lolotonga ‘ene malanga‘aki ‘a e faitotonu, mo e fakama‘uma‘u kita, mo e fakamaau ‘oku tu‘unuku mai, na‘e tetetete ‘a Filike, ‘o ne tali ‘o pehē, ‘Alu ‘eni; pea ka ai ha faingamālie te u tala ke ke ha‘u.
44024026	Na‘a ne ‘amanaki foki ‘e ‘omi ‘e Paula ha‘ane pa‘anga: ko hono ‘uhinga ia foki na‘a ne toutou ‘omi ai ia, ‘o talanoa mo ia.
44024027	Pea kuo kakato ha ta‘u ‘e ua, pea tuku ‘e Filike hono tu‘unga kia Posio Fesitō: na‘e loto foki ‘a Filike ke fakava‘anganaki hano ‘ofeina ‘e he kakai Siu, ko ia na‘a ne tuku pē ‘a Paula kuo kii‘i.
44025001	PEA kuo hoko leva ‘a Fesitō ki hono vahefonua, pea hili ‘a e ‘aho ‘e tolu na‘a ne ‘alu hake mei Sesalia ki Selusalema.
44025002	Pea na‘e faka‘ilo foki ‘a Paula kiate ia ‘e he hou‘eiki taula‘eiki mo e kau tu‘ukimu‘a ‘o e kakai Siu.
44025003	Pea nau fai ‘enau kole kiate ia, ‘o tangi ke ne lango kiate kinautolu, pea ke ne fekau ke ‘omi ia ki Selusalema; ka ko ‘enau teu ha malumu ke fakapoongi ia ‘i he hala.
44025004	Ka ka tali ‘e Fesitō, ‘e tauhi pē ‘a Paula ‘i Sesalia, ka ‘e vave pē ‘ene ‘alu hifo ‘a‘ana ki ai.
44025005	Na‘a ne me‘a foki, Pea ‘ilonga hamou ni‘ihi ma‘u tu‘unga, tuku ke nau ‘alu hifo mo au, ‘o talatalaaki‘i ‘a e matāpule, ‘o kapau ‘oku ‘i ai ha‘ane me‘a ta‘etaau.
44025006	Pea kuo ne nofo mo kinautolu ‘i he ngaahi ‘aho si‘i, ‘e valu nai pe hongofulu, na‘a ne toki ‘alu hifo ki Sesalia; pea ‘i he ‘aho ‘apongipongi na‘a ne nofo ki he fakamāu‘anga, ‘o ne fekau ke taki mai ‘a Paula.
44025007	Pea ‘i he‘ene hoko mai, na‘e kāpui ia ‘e he kau Siu kuo ‘alu hifo mei Selusalema: pea lahi ‘a e ngaahi me‘a mamafa na‘a nau talatalaaki ‘aki ia, ‘a ia na‘e ‘ikai te nau lava ke fakamo‘oni ki ai.
44025008	He na‘e fakamatala ‘e Paula ‘o pehē, Kuo ‘ikai te u fai hala ‘i ha me‘a ki he Lao ‘a e kakai Siu, pe ki he Temipale, pe kia Sisa.
44025009	Ka na‘e loto ‘a Fesitō ke fakava‘anganaki hano ‘ofeina ‘e he kakai Siu, ko ia na‘a ne tali kia Paula, ‘o ne me‘a mai, ‘Oku ke loto ke ‘alu ki Selusalema ke fakamaau ai koe ‘i he ngaahi me‘a ni, ka ‘i hoku ‘ao pē?
44025010	Pea pehē ‘e Paula, Ko e fakamāu‘anga ‘o Sisa ‘oku te tu‘u ai kita, pea ko e potu ia ‘oku totonu ke te fakamaau ai: ko e me‘a ki he kakai Siu, kuo ‘ikai te u fai ha kovi ki ai; ka koe‘uma‘ā ‘ete lau ki ai, ka ‘oku ke mātu‘aki mea‘i.
44025011	Pea kapau kuo u maumau lao, pe fai ha hiamatea, ‘oku ‘ikai te u fakafisinga ‘a e mate: ka ‘o kapau ko e launoa ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku talatalaaki‘i ai au ‘e kinautolu ni, tala‘ehai ‘oku ngofua ki ha taha ke me‘a‘ofa‘aki au kiate kinautolu. Te u unga au kia Sisa.
44025012	Pea alea leva ‘a Fesitō mo e fakataha tokoni, ‘o ne toki tali, Kuo ke unga koā kia Sisa? lelei; te ke ‘alu kia Sisa.
44025013	Pea kuo mole atu ha ngaahi ‘aho ni‘ihi, pea toki me‘a hifo ki Sesalia ‘a e tu‘i ko ‘Ākilipa pea mo Pelenaise, ko e fai ‘ena ‘a‘ahi kia Fesitō.
44025014	Pea kuo fuofuoloa ‘ena nofo ai, pea fakaongo ‘e Fesitō ki he Tu‘i ‘a e ngaahi me‘a na‘e kau kia Paula, ‘o pehē, ‘Oku ‘i ai ha matāpule, ‘a ia na‘e tuku ‘i he pilīsone ‘e Filike ‘i he‘ene hiki.
44025015	Pea ‘i he‘eku hoko ki Selusalema, na‘e faka‘ilo ‘a e toko taha ko ia ‘e he hou‘eiki taula‘eiki mo e kau mātu‘a ‘o e kakai Siu, ‘o nau kole hono fakamo‘ua.
44025016	Ka na‘a ku fakahā kiate kinautolu, ‘Oku ‘ikai ko e anga ‘o e kakai Loma ke tukuange ha tangata ke tautea, neongo pe ko hai, kae‘oua mu‘a ke tu‘u fehangahangai ‘a ia ‘oku fakahopo pea mo hono kau tukuaki, pea ke ‘oua foki ke ai hano ava ke fakamatala ki he me‘a kuo lau kiate ia.
44025017	Ko ia, ‘i he‘enau fakataha mai ki heni, na‘e ‘ikai te u fakatotoka, ka ‘i he ‘aho na‘e hoko na‘a ku nofo ki he fakamāu‘anga, ‘o u fekau ke taki mai ‘a e matāpule.
44025018	Ka ‘i he hanga ‘o tu‘u ‘a e kau tukuaki, na‘e ‘ikai te nau ‘omi ha me‘a ki ai ‘o hangē ko ‘eku mahalo, ‘o pehē ko ha kovi:
44025019	ka ko e me‘a kuo ha‘u mo kinautolu kiate ia, ko e koto me‘a pē ‘oku kau ki he‘enau tō‘onga fakalotu fakaekinautolu, ‘o kau ki ha toko taha, ko Sīsū tokua, ‘a ia kuo pekia, kae taukave pē ‘e Paula kuo ne mo‘ui.
44025020	Pea te ape kita pe ‘e fēfee‘i ai hano ‘eke ‘o e ngaahi me‘a ko ia; pea u pehē ange, pe ‘oku ne loto ke ‘alu ki Selusalema, ‘o fakamaau ai ‘i he ngaahi me‘a ko ia.
44025021	Ka ‘i he‘ene unga ‘e Paula, ‘o pehē ke ta‘ofi ia ki he fakamaau ‘a ‘Akosito, ko ia na‘a ku fekau ke tauhi ai pē ia kae‘oua ke toki tuku atu ia kia Sisa.
44025022	Pea me‘a ‘a ‘Ākilipa kia Fesitō, ‘Ā, na‘a ku mei loto ke fanongo ‘e au foki ki he tangata ko ia. Pea pehē ‘e ia, ‘Apongipongi te ke fanongo ki ai.
44025023	Pea ‘i he ‘aho ‘apongipongi na‘e me‘a mai ‘a ‘Ākilipa mo Pelenaise, ‘o fakalaukau ‘aupito, ‘o hū ki he fale-tali-‘eiki: na‘e ‘i ai foki ‘a e ngaahi ‘eikitau, mo ha kau tangata ‘ilonga ‘o e kolo; pea ‘i he fekau ‘a Fesitō na‘e taki mai ‘a Paula.
44025024	Pea me‘a ‘a Fesitō, ‘E Kingi ‘Ākilipa, mo kimoutolu Matāpule ‘oku tau haha‘o ni, ko e toko taha ko eni ‘oku mou me‘a ki ai, ko ia ia kuo fakafiu ai kiate au ‘e he kakai Siu kātokatoa ‘i Selusalema mo ‘eni foki, ko ‘enau kalanga ‘oku ‘ikai totonu ke ne mo‘ui.
44025025	Ka ko au, na‘e ‘ikai te u tokanga‘i ha‘ane me‘a oku taau mo e mate; kae‘uma‘ā na‘e unga ‘e ia, ‘a e tangata ni, kia ‘Akosito: ko ia na‘a ku tu‘utu‘uni ke tuku atu ia ki ai.
44025026	Ka ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘ane me‘a ‘oku ou ma‘u pau ke tohi ki hoku ‘eiki: ko ia, kuo u ‘omi ia kiate kimoutolu, kae‘uma‘ā kiate koe, ‘e Kingi ‘Ākilipa, hei‘ilo, ‘oka ‘osi ho‘omou ‘eke, pea ai ha‘aku me‘a ke tohi.
44025027	He ‘oku hā matamata kehe kiate au, ke tuku atu ha pōpula, ‘o ‘ikai ‘alu mo ia ha ki‘i fakamatala ki he ngaahi me‘a ‘oku lau kiate ia.
44026001	PEA me‘a ‘a ‘Ākilipa kia Paula, ‘Oku ngofua ke ke lea ke taukapo‘i koe. Pea hanga leva ‘a Paula, ‘o mafao atu hono nima, ‘o kamata ‘ene fakamatala:
44026002	‘E Kingi ‘Ākilipa, ‘oku ou lau ko hoku monū ‘ete tu‘u ‘i ho ‘ao he ‘aho ni ke fai ‘ete fakamatala ki he ngaahi me‘a kehekehe ‘oku fakahopo ai au ‘e he kakai Siu:
44026003	koe‘uhi ko e pōtopoto‘i koe ‘i he ngaahi tō‘onga kotoa pē ‘a e kakai Siu, mo e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ‘ū ki ai honau loto: ko ia ‘oku ou kole ke ke kātaki, ‘o me‘a lelei mai kiate au.
44026004	Ko e anga ‘o ‘eku mo‘ui talu ‘eku talavou, ‘io, ‘a ‘eku anga mei he kamata‘anga ‘i he lotolotonga ‘o hoku kakai ‘o‘oku, pea ‘i Selusalema foki, ‘oku lāu‘ilo kī ai ‘a e kakai Siu kotoa pē.
44026005	He kuo nau ‘ilo au mei mu‘a, pea ka ne nau loto ki ai ‘e faingofua ‘enau fakamo‘oni, na‘a ku kau ki he fa‘ahi ‘oku tu‘ukimu‘a ‘i he fakamamafa ki he ngaahi mingimingi‘i me‘a ‘o ‘etau lotu, ‘io, na‘a ku nofo ko e Fālesi.
44026006	Pea na‘a mo ‘eni, ko e me‘a kuo fakahopo ai au ko ‘eku ‘amanaki ki he tala‘ofa na‘e fai ‘e he ‘Otua ki he‘etau ngaahi kui:
44026007	‘a e tala‘ofa ko ia ‘oku fakaukuloa ai ‘e hotau ‘ū matakali-hongofulu-mā-ua ‘a e fai ‘o ‘enau lotu ‘i he pō mo e ‘aho, ko ‘enau ‘amanaki hokosi: ‘e Tu‘i, ko e ‘amanaki ko ia kuo fakahopoa ai au ni ‘e ha kakai Siu foki.
44026008	‘O fēfē nai ho‘omou lau ‘a e fokotu‘u ‘e he ‘Otua ‘a e pekia ko e me‘a ‘e ‘ikai ala tui ki ai?
44026009	Ko ia na‘e hā kiate au, ‘oku totonu ke u ngāue lahi ke ta‘ofi ‘a e huafa ‘o Sīsū mei Nāsaleti.
44026010	‘A ia na‘a ku fai foki ‘i Selusalema: pea ko e tokolahi ‘o e fa‘ahinga tapu na‘a ku ‘ai pilīsone ‘e au, he na‘e fakangofua mai ‘e he hou‘eiki taula‘eiki; pea ‘i he fai honau tāmate‘i, na‘a ku hikinima ki ai.
44026011	Pea tu‘o lahi ‘eku tautea kinautolu ‘i he‘eku fakatotofu ‘a e ngaahi falelotu, ko ‘eku fakamamahi‘i kinautolu ke nau talakaa‘i ‘a e ‘Eiki; pea na‘e pehē fau ‘eku kālili kiate kinautolu, ko ia na‘a ku fakafe‘ātungia ‘o a‘u ki he ngaahi kolo muli foki.
44026012	Pea lolotonga ‘eku fai ‘a e me‘a ko ia, ‘o u fononga ai ki Tāmasikusi, ‘o u ‘alu mo au ‘a e tu‘utu‘uni mo e fakangofua ‘e he hou‘eiki taula‘eiki–
44026013	‘e Tu‘i, lolotonga ‘eku ‘alu, ho‘atā, na‘a ku sio ki ha maama na‘e ngingila ange ‘i he la‘ā, ‘oku malama mai mei he langi, ‘o ne hulu‘ia au mo kinautolu na‘a mau fononga.
44026014	Pea ‘i he‘emau tō kotoa pē ki he kelekele, na‘a ku fanongo ki ha le‘o ‘oku pehē mai ‘i he lea faka-Hepelū, ‘E Saula, ‘e Saula, ko e hā ‘oku ke fakatanga‘i ai au? ‘Oku faingata‘a ho‘o ‘akahi ‘a e me‘a māsila.
44026015	Pea u pehē ‘e au, ‘Ēī, ko hai koe? Pea me‘a mai ‘a e ‘Eiki, Ko au Sīsū, ‘a ia ‘oku ke fakatanga‘i.
44026016	Ka ke tu‘u, tu‘u ki ‘olunga: he ko eni ‘a e me‘a kuo u hā ai kiate koe, ke fakanofo koe ko e faifekau mo e fakamo‘oni ‘o e ngaahi me‘a kuo ke mamata ki ai, pea mo e ngaahi me‘a te u hā ai kiate koe ‘amui;
44026017	pea u fakahaofi koe mei he kakai ‘Isileli, pea mo e Senitaile, ‘a ia ‘oku ou fekau atu koe ki ai,
44026018	ke faka‘ā honau mata, ke nau tafoki mei he po‘uli ki he maama, pea mei he pule‘ia ‘e Sētane ki he ‘Otua, ke nau ma‘u ‘a e fakamolemole angahala, pea mo ha tofi‘a ‘i he lotolotonga ‘o e kakai kuo fakahaohaoa ‘i he‘enau tui pīkitai kiate au.
44026019	Ko ia, ‘e Kingi ‘Ākilipa, na‘e ‘ikai te u talangata‘a ki he me‘a na‘e hā mai mei he langi.
44026020	Ka na‘a ku kamata tala ke nau fakatomala pea tafoki ki he ‘Otua, he‘enau fai ‘a e ngaahi ngāue ‘oku hoa mo e fakatomala; pea u fua fai ‘i Tāmasikusi, pea hili ia ‘i Selusalema, mo e fonua kotoa ‘o Siutea, pea ki he Senitaile.
44026021	Ko hono ‘uhinga ia na‘e puke ai au ‘e he kakai Siu ‘i he temipale, ‘o nau ‘ahi‘ahi ke tāmate‘i.
44026022	Ko ia, ko e me‘a ‘i he‘eku ta‘imālie tokoni mei he ‘Otua, kuo u kei tu‘u ai ‘o a‘u ki he ‘aho ni, ‘o u fai ‘eku fakamo‘oni ki he iiki mo e lalahi: ka tala‘ehai ‘oku ou fakahā ha me‘a kehe, ka ko ia pē na‘e lau ‘e he kau Palōfita mo Mōsese fakatou‘osi, ‘e faifai pea hoko:
44026023	‘o pehē, ‘E ala feia ‘a e Mīsaia, pea ko e ‘uluaki ia ‘i he toetu‘u ‘o e pekia, pea te ne ongoongoa ‘a e maama ki he Siu mo e Senitaile fakatou‘osi.
44026024	Pea ‘i he‘ene fakamatala pehē, na‘e ‘ioho ‘a Fesitō, ‘E Paula, kuo ke faha: ko e ‘ātunga ē ‘o ho‘o fa‘a lau tohi ‘oku ke faka‘a‘au ke faha.
44026025	Ka ka pehē ‘e Paula, ‘E Fesitō, tapu mo e feitu‘u na, ‘oku ‘ikai te u faha; ka ko e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ou pu‘aki ko e ngaahi tala ‘a e mo ‘oni mo e fakapotopoto.
44026026	He ‘oku mea‘i ‘e he Tu‘i ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ni: pea ‘oku ou ‘āsili faingofua‘ia ke lea kiate ia, koe‘uhi ‘oku ou pehē, ‘oku ‘ikai hano momo‘i me‘a ‘e taha ‘e ‘ufikaua kiate ia; he tala‘ehai ko ha me‘a ia na‘e fai ‘i ha tuliki.
44026027	‘E Kingi ‘Ākilipa, ‘oku ke tui ki he kau Palōfita? ‘oku ou ‘ilo ‘oku ke tui ki ai.
44026028	Pea me‘a ‘a ‘Ākilipa kia Paula, Tā ‘oku ke lau ‘apē ‘e faingofua ho‘o liliu au ke Kalisitiane.
44026029	Ka ka tali ‘e Paula, pe faingofua pe faingata‘a, tauange mo e ‘Otua ke ke hoko–‘o ‘ikai ko koe pē, ka ko kinautolu kotoa pē kuo fanongo kiate au he ‘aho ni–ke mou hoko ke tatau mo au–tuku kehe pē ‘a e ongo seini ni!
44026030	Pea tu‘u ‘a e Tu‘i mo e Kōvana, ‘a Pelenaise foki mo e ha‘oha‘onga.
44026031	Pea kuo nau tutuku, na‘a nau fealēlea‘aki ‘o pehē, Kuo ‘ikai fai ‘e he siana ni ha me‘a ‘oku hoa mo e mate pe ko e nofo pōpula.
44026032	Pea me‘a ‘Ākilipa kia Fesitō, Ne mei tukuange ‘a e siana ni, ‘o ka ne ta‘e‘oua ‘ene unga kia Sisa.
44027001	PEA ‘i he tu‘utu‘uni leva ke mau folau ki ‘Ītali, na‘e tuku ‘a Paula mo ha tu‘unga pōpula kehe ki ha Senituliō na‘e hingoa ko Suliasi, ‘a ia na‘e kau ki he vāhenga tau ko ‘Akosito.
44027002	Pea mau heka ki ha vaka ‘Ātalamaito, ‘a ia na‘e teu folau ki he ngaahi feitu‘u ‘o ‘Ēsia, ‘o mau tuku folau atu; pea na‘e ō mo kimautolu ‘a ‘Ālisitako, ko e Masitōnia mei Tesalonaika.
44027003	Pea ko e ‘aho ‘e taha na‘a mau tau ki Saitoni. Pea na‘e angalelei ‘a Suliasi kia Paula, ‘o ne tuku ke ne ‘alu ki hono kau fe‘iloaki ke ma‘u ‘enau ‘ofa.
44027004	Pea kuo mau tuku folau mei ai, pea mau ‘alu ‘i he ū ‘o Saipalo, he na‘e tokai ‘a e matangi.
44027005	Pea mau folau atu foki ‘i he Tahi ‘o Silisia mo Pamifilia, ‘o mau hoko ki Maila ‘i Līsia.
44027006	Pea ‘ilo ai ‘e he senituliō ha vaka ‘Ālekisānitia ko ‘ene folau ki ‘Ītali; ‘o ne fakaheka kimautolu ki ai.
44027007	Pea ko e me‘a ‘i he‘ene ‘aho lahi mo ‘emau ngaholo si‘i pē, ‘o ‘ikai meimei ma‘u ‘a Naitusi ko e kovi ‘a e matangi, ko ia na‘a mau folau ‘i he ū ‘o Kēliti ‘o a‘u ki Salemone.
44027008	Pea mau toki fakateletele, ka na‘e faingata‘a; ‘o mau hoko ki ha potu na‘e ui ko Taulanga Lelei, ‘a ia ‘oku tu‘u ofi ai ‘a e kolo ko Lāsea.
44027009	Pea kuo mole ha taimi lahi, pea matamata tu‘utāmaki ‘eni ‘emau folau, he kuo mahili ‘eni ‘a e ‘aukai, ko ia na‘e tokoni ‘a Paula kiate kinautolu,
44027010	‘o ne pehē, Kau Matāpule, ‘oku ou vakai ‘oku hangehangē ka fakatu‘utāmaki ‘a e folau ni; pea lahi ‘a e maumau, ‘o ‘ikai ‘o e uta mo e vaka pē, ka ‘o ‘etau mo‘ui foki.
44027011	Ka ko e senituliō, na‘e mamafa ange kiate ia ‘a e lea ‘a e toutai, mo ia na‘e pule ki he vaka, ‘i he lea ‘a Paula.
44027012	Kae‘uma‘ā ko e taulanga ia na‘e ‘ikai lelei ke hūfanga ai ‘i he fa‘ahita‘u afā: ko ia, na‘e loto ‘a e tokolahi ke tuku folau mei ai, hei‘ilo te nau lava ke ma‘u ‘a Finisi ke hūfanga ai; ko e taulanga ia ‘o Kēliti ‘oku ū ki he matangi tonga-hihifo mo e tokelau-hihifo.
44027013	Pea ‘i he‘ene angiangi mei he Tonga, na‘a nau lau kuo lava ‘enau fakakaukau; ‘o nau fusi taula, ‘o nau fakateletele ‘i Kēliti, ‘o ofi ‘aupito ki ‘uta.
44027014	Ka kuo te‘eki ke nau loko tō atu, mo e hifo mai mei ‘uta ha matangi hangē ha ‘ahiohio, ‘oku hingoa ko e ‘Eulakulone.
44027015	Pea ‘i he mo‘ua ai ‘a e vaka, ‘o ‘ikai lava ke fakatauala, na‘a mau tuku, ‘o mau ‘au‘auhia.
44027016	Pea mau lele ki he ū ‘o ha ki‘i motu na‘e ui ko Kalauta, pea na‘e ‘ikai te mau meimei lava ke ma‘u ‘a e vaka fokotu‘u.
44027017	Pea kuo fusi leva ia, na‘a mau hanga ‘o ngaohi ‘a e vaka, ‘o tālī. Na‘a mau manavahē foki na‘a mau tūkia ‘i Sītela, ko ia na‘a mau hu‘i ‘a e alangavaka ‘olunga, pea mau toki lepelepaheke.
44027018	Pea ‘i he‘emau mātu‘aki matangia ‘i he ‘aho ‘e taha,
44027019	na‘a mau tolo ‘a e uta; pea ‘i hono tolu ‘o e ‘aho na‘a mau hanga ‘e kimautolu ‘o laku ‘a e nāunau ‘o e vaka.
44027020	Pea ‘i he‘ene ‘aho lahi ‘o ‘ikai hā ‘a e la‘ā pe ko e ngaahi fetu‘u, mo e kei falala mālohi ‘a e matangi, na‘e mole ‘aupito ‘emau ‘amanaki ki he mo‘ui.
44027021	Kae‘uma‘ā na‘e lahi ‘a e ta‘ekai: kae toki tu‘u ‘a Paula ‘i honau lotolotonga, ‘o ne pehē, Kau Matāpule, na‘a mou mei tuitala kiate au, ‘o ‘oua ‘e tuku folau mei Kēliti, ‘o fenāpasi mo e tu‘utāmaki ni mo e maumau.
44027022	Ka na‘a mo eni ‘oku ou tokoni atu ke mou fakato‘oto‘a: koe‘uhi ‘e ‘ikai mate hamou toko taha, ka ko e vaka pē.
44027023	He na‘e tu‘u ofi mai ‘anepō ha ‘āngelo ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘oku ‘o‘ona au,
44027024	pea ko ia ‘oku ou lotu ki ai, ‘o ne pehē mai, ‘E Paula, ‘oua te ke manavahē; kuo pau te ke tu‘u ‘i he ‘ao ‘o Sisa: pea ko eni, kuo me‘a‘ofa‘aki ‘e he ‘Otua kiate koe ‘a e kakai kotoa pē ‘oku mou folau mo koe.
44027025	Ko ia, ‘a matāpule, mou lototo‘a: he ‘oku ou tui ki he ‘Otua ‘e hoko pē ‘o hangē ko ‘ene folofola mai.
44027026	Ka kuo pau tokua, te tau tūkia ‘i ha motu.
44027027	Pea ‘i hono pō hongofulu mā fā, lolotonga ‘emau pāea holo ‘i he tahi ko ‘Ātalia, ‘iloange, ‘i he tu‘uapō, na‘e mahalo ‘a e kau vaka kuo nau ofi ki ha fonua.
44027028	Pea nau tukutuku, ko e uangokumi: pea nau fai atu si‘i ‘o toe tukutuku, ko e tekumi mā nima.
44027029	Pea mau manavahē na‘a ‘iloange te mau tūkia ‘i ha potu ‘oku hangatāmaki, ko ia na‘a nau lī ha taula ‘e fā mei he taumuli, ‘o nau faka‘amu ke ‘aho.
44027030	Pea ‘ahi‘ahi ‘a e kau vaka ke feholaki mei he vaka, pea nau tukutuku hifo ‘a e vaka fokotu‘u ki he tahi, ‘o lau tokua ko ‘enau ‘alofaki taula ke lī mei he taumu‘a.
44027031	Kae lea ‘e Paula ki he senituliō mo e kau sōtia, Kapau ‘e ‘ikai nofo ‘i vaka ‘a e kau siana ni, ‘e ‘ikai lava hamou fakahaofi.
44027032	Pea hanga leva ‘a e kau sōtia, ‘o tu‘usi ‘a e ngaahi maea ‘o e vaka fokotu‘u, ‘o tuku ia ke tō ‘o mole.
44027033	Pea hanga ai ‘a Paula ‘o enginaki kinautolu kotoa pē, ‘o a‘u ki he‘ene meimei ‘aho hake, ke nau fai ha tokoni; ‘o ne pehē, Ko e ‘aho e ‘e hongofulu mā fa mo ho‘omou taukotofa ‘o nofo ta‘ekai, ‘o ‘ikai te mou ma‘u ha me‘a.
44027034	Ko ia, ‘oku ou enginaki atu ke mou fai ha kai: pea ‘āsili, he ko e me‘a ia ‘e tokoni ki homou fakahaofi. Tala atu, ‘e ‘ikai mole hamou tu‘oni lou‘ulu ‘e taha.
44027035	Pea ‘i he‘ene lea pehē, na‘a ne ala ki ha mā, ‘o ne fai ha fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otua ‘i honau ‘ao; pea ne pakipaki ia ‘o kamata kai.
44027036	Pea nau loto lahi ai kotoa, ‘o nau hanga ai ‘e kinautolu ‘o tokoni.
44027037	Pea ko homau lau kātokatoa ‘o e kakai ‘i he vaka, ko e toko uangeau mo e toko fitungofulu mo e toko ono.
44027038	Pea kuo nau mākona, na‘a nau fakama‘ama‘a ‘a e vaka, ‘o tolo ‘a e uite ki tahi.
44027039	Pea ‘i he‘ene ‘aho hake, na‘e ‘ikai te nau ‘ilo pe ko e fonua fē: ka na‘a nau vakai ha kōmaki na‘e ‘one‘one hono pā‘angangalu, pea na‘a nau loto ke fakahake ‘a e vaka ‘i he potu ko ia, ‘o kapau ‘e lava.
44027040	Pea nau motuhi ‘a e ngaahi taula ‘o tuku pē ‘i tahi, pea vete fakataha mo ia ‘a e ha‘i ‘o e ongo fohe‘uli, ‘o nau fai lā ‘i he taumu‘a, ‘o nau faka‘uli ki he ‘one‘one.
44027041	Kae ‘iloange, na‘a nau toloto ‘i ha potu na‘e fetaulaki ai ‘a e tahi ‘e ua, pea nau faka‘oho ai ‘a e vaka; pea pikisia ‘a e taumu‘a ‘o toka ma‘u, ka ka vāea ‘a e taumuli ‘i he mālohi ‘o e peau.
44027042	Pea loto leva ‘a e kau sōtia ke tāmate‘i ‘a e kau pōpula, na‘a kakau ha taha ki ‘uta ‘o hola.
44027043	Ka ko e senituliō, ko e me‘a ‘i he‘ene fie fakahaofi ‘a Paula, na‘a ne ta‘ofi ‘enau fakakaukau ko ia; ‘o ne fekau, ke ‘ilonga ‘a kinautolu ‘oku fa‘a kakau ke nau hopo ki tahi ‘o mu‘omu‘a ki ‘uta:
44027044	pea ko e me‘a ki hono toe, ke kakau ha ni‘ihi ‘i he ngaahi fono, pea ko e ni‘ihi ‘i ha me‘a pē mei he vaka. Pea ‘i he fai pehē, na‘a mau hao kotoa pē ki ‘uta.
44028001	PEA kuo mau hao mai leva, pea mau ‘ilo tā ko e hingoa ‘o e motu ko Mēlita.
44028002	Pea ko e me‘a kehe ‘a e angalelei ‘a e kau pāpeliane: he na‘a nau tafu afi, ‘o ‘ave kimautolu kotoa pē ki ai, koe‘uhi ko e ‘uha na‘e tō, mo e momoko.
44028003	Pea kuo okooko ‘e Paula ha ‘ū popohango, ‘o ne ‘ai ki he afi, na‘e totolo mai mei he māfana ha ngata fekai, ‘o u‘u ‘i hono nima.
44028004	Pea ‘i he mamata ‘a e kau pāpeliane ki he manu ‘oku tāupe ‘i hono nima, na‘a nau fepehē‘aki, ‘Āua, ko e siana ni ko e tangata fakapō, pea neongo kuo ne hao mei he tahi, ka na‘e ‘ikai tuku ia ‘e Nunu‘a ke mo‘ui.
44028005	Ka ka tupe‘i ‘e ia ‘a e manu ki he afi, ‘o ‘ikai te ne ongo‘i ha kovi.
44028006	Ka ko kinautolu, na‘a nau ‘amanaki ‘e toe si‘i pea ne fepulopulasi, pe tō fakafokifā ‘o pekia: ka kuo fuoloa ‘enau tatali, pea nau vakai ‘oku ‘ikai ha me‘a ‘e hoko kiate ia, pea na‘e liliu honau loto, ‘o nau pehē ko e ‘otua ia.
44028007	Pea na‘e tu‘u ‘i he feitu‘u ko ia ‘a e potu fonua ‘o e pule ‘o e motu, ko hono hingoa ko Popilio; ‘a ia na‘a ne tali kimautolu, ‘o ne tauhi lelei ‘i hono ‘api ‘i he ‘aho ‘e tolu.
44028008	Pea tā ‘oku toka ‘a e tamai ‘a Popilio, kuo puke ‘i he mofi mo e tu‘utu‘utoto. Pea ‘alu ‘a Paula kiate ia, ‘o ne hūfia, ‘o ne hilifaki hono nima ki ai ‘o fakamo‘ui.
44028009	Pea hili ia, pea ha‘u ‘a e kakai kehe ‘o e motu na‘e mahaki, pea na‘e fakamo‘ui kinautolu:
44028010	‘a ia na‘e lahi ‘enau tokanga‘i kimautolu; pea ‘i he‘emau folau, na‘a nau fakaheka ha ngaahi me‘a ma‘amau tokonaki.
44028011	Pea kuo hili ha māhina ‘e tolu, pea mau folau ‘i ha vaka, ‘a ia ne hūfanga ‘i he motu ‘i he fa‘ahita‘u afā; ko e vaka ‘Ālekisānitia, pea ko hono hingoa, Ko e ongo ‘Otua Māhanga.
44028012	Pea mau tau ki Sulakusa, ‘o mau ‘aho tolu ai.
44028013	Pea mau fākahua mei ai ‘i he potu ko ia, ‘o mau hoko ki Lesio: pea hili ‘a e ‘aho ‘e taha na‘e tonga ‘a e matangi, pea mau a‘u ki Piuteolai ‘i hono ‘aho ua:
44028014	pea mau ‘ilo ai ha ni‘ihi ‘i he kāinga, pea na‘a nau kole ke mau nofo mo kinautolu ‘o ‘aho fitu: pea hili ia na‘a mau ‘alu ki Loma.
44028015	Pea kuo ma‘u talanoa ‘e he kāinga ‘o e potu ko ia kiate kimautolu, ‘o nau fononga mei ai ‘o a‘u ki ‘Apiai Folo mo Faletolu ke fakafetaulaki kiate kimautolu: pea ‘i he fe‘iloaki ‘a Paula mo kinautolu, na‘a ne fai ‘ene fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otua, mo ne ma‘u ai ha to‘a.
44028016	Pea ‘i he‘emau hū ki Loma, na‘e fakangofua kia Paula ke nofo ‘i hano fale ‘o‘ona, fakataha mo ha sōtia ke le‘ohi ia.
44028017	Pea hili ‘a e ‘aho ‘e tolu, na‘a ne fekau ke fakataha mai ‘a e kau tu‘ukimu‘a ‘o e kakai Siu: pea ‘i he‘enau kātoa mai, na‘a ne lea kiate kinautolu ‘o pehē, Kāinga Matāpule, ko au ‘eni na‘e ‘ave pōpula mei Selusalema, ‘o tuku ki he kakai Loma, kae tala‘ehai na‘a ku fai ha kovi ki hotau fa‘ahinga, pe ki he‘etau ngaahi anga tukufakaholo.
44028018	Pea ko e fa‘ahinga ko ia, hili ‘enau fakamaau au, na‘a nau pehē ke tukuange, koe‘uhi na‘e ‘ikai ha‘aku hiamatea.
44028019	Ka ‘i he lea ‘a e kakai Siu ke ta‘ofi, na‘e pau ke u unga kia Sisa; ka na‘e ‘ikai ko e pehē ‘oku ‘i ai ha‘aku me‘a ke talatalaaki‘i ai hoku kakai.
44028020	Pea ko hono ‘uhinga ia na‘a ku ui mai ai kimoutolu, ke tau fe‘iloaki, pea koe‘uhi ke u lēlea atu; pea ‘āsili, he ko e me‘a ‘oku ‘amanakia ‘e ‘Isileli, ko ia ia ‘oku ou kahoa‘aki ai ‘a e seini ni.
44028021	Pea nau tali kiate ia, Ko e me‘a kiate kimautolu, kuo ‘ikai te mau ma‘u tohi mei Siutea kiate koe; pea kuo ‘ikai ha taha ‘i he kāinga ‘e ha‘u mo hao ongoongokovi, pe ai ha‘ane talanoa ‘e kau kovi kiate koe.
44028022	Ka ‘oku mau pehē, na‘e mei taau ke mau fanongo tonu ‘iate koe pe ko e hā ho‘o ngaahi ‘ulungālau; he ko e me‘a ki he fa‘ahi ko ia, ko e me‘a pē ‘oku mau ‘ilo ki ai, hono lau‘i ‘i he potu kotoa pē.
44028023	Pea nau kotofa ha ‘aho kiate ia, pea nau omi ‘o tokolahi ange ki hono ‘apitanga; pea ne fakamatala mo talatonu kiate kinautolu ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua, ‘o ne ‘ahi‘ahi fakatui‘i ki he ngaahi me‘a ‘oku kau kia Sīsū, ‘o tefito ‘ene lea ki he Lao ‘a Mōsese mo e Tohi Palōfita fakatou‘osi; ‘o ne fai mei he hengihengi ki he po‘uli.
44028024	Pea na‘e tui ha ni‘ihi ki he‘ene fakamatala, ka ko e ni‘ihi na‘e ‘ikai.
44028025	Pea ‘i he‘enau loto kehekehe ko ia, na‘a nau tutuku: ka ‘i he te‘eki ke nau ‘alu, na‘e fai ‘e Paula ‘ene fo‘i lea ko eni, He hala ā ‘a e folofola ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni ki ho‘omou ngaahi kui ‘i he palōfita ko ‘Aisea,
44028026	‘o pehē, ‘Alu ki he kakai ko ia, mo ke pehē, Te mou mātu‘aki fanongo, Kae ‘ikai ongo‘i; Pea te mou mātu‘aki sio, Kae ‘ikai ‘ilo‘i.
44028027	He kuo fangapesi ‘a e loto ‘o e kakai ni, Pea ongongata‘a honau telinga, Pea ko honau mata kuo nau tāpuni; Na‘a ‘iloange te nau sio ‘aki honau mata, Pea fanongo ‘aki honau telinga, Pea ‘ilo ‘aki honau loto, ‘O nau tafoki, Ka u fakamo‘ui ‘a kinautolu.
44028028	Ko ia, ko e me‘a pē ko eni ke mou ‘ilo ki ai, kuo fekau ma‘a e Senitaile foki ‘a e me‘a ni, ‘a e fakamo‘ui‘anga ni ‘a e ‘Otua: ‘io, pea ko kinautolu te nau tokanga ki ai foki.
44028029	Pea hili ‘ene lea‘aki ‘a e ngaahi lea ni, na‘e mahu‘i atu ‘a e kau Siu, ‘o lahi ‘enau fakakikihi fakaekinautolu pē.
44028030	Pea na‘a ne nofo ‘i ha fale na‘a ne totongi ki ai ‘e ia, ko e ta‘u ‘e ua kātoa; pea na‘e ‘ilonga ‘a kinautolu ‘e ‘alu ange na‘a nau fe‘iloaki mo ia.
44028031	Pea ne malanga‘aki ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua, ‘o ne ako‘aki ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku kau ki he ‘Eiki ko Sisu Kalaisi, ‘o ne mātu‘aki fai mālohi, ‘o ‘ikai ta‘ofia.
45001001	TŪ ko au Paula, ko e tamaio‘eiki ‘a Sīsū Kalaisi, na‘e ui ke ‘aposetolo, na‘e vahe‘i ke nofo ki he Kōsipeli ‘a e ‘Otua–
45001002	‘a e ongoongolelei ko ia na‘a ne tala‘ofa ki ai ‘i mu‘a ‘i he‘ene kau palōfita ‘i he Tohitapu,
45001003	ko e ongoongo ‘o hono ‘Alo, ‘o ia na‘a ne tupu mei he hako ‘o Tēvita ‘i hono anga kakano,
45001004	‘o ia na‘e mātu‘aki fakae‘a ko e ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otua ‘i hono laumālie tāpuhā, he‘ene toetu‘u mei he pekia,
45001005	‘io, ‘o Sīsū Kalaisi ko hotau ‘Eiki; ‘a ia na‘e fou mei ai ‘emau ma‘u kelesi, kae‘uma‘ā ‘a e lakanga ‘aposetolo ni, koe‘uhi ke ai ha fakavaivai ki he lotu ‘i he Senitaile kotoa pē, koe‘uhiā ko hono huafa;
45001006	‘a e fa‘ahinga ‘oku mou ‘i ai foki, ko e kau ui ‘e Sīsū Kalaisi.
45001007	Ko ‘eku tohi kiate kimoutolu kotoa pē ‘i Loma ‘a ia ‘oku ‘ofeina ‘e he ‘Otua, kuo fakaului ki he fa‘ahinga tapu. ‘Ofa ke mou ma‘u kelesi mo e fiemālie mei he ‘Otua ko ‘etau Tamai, mo e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi.
45001008	Ko e ‘uluaki me‘a, ‘oku ou fakafeta‘i ki hoku ‘Otua ‘ia Sīsū Kalaisi, koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu fuli pē, koe‘uhi ko e ongoongoa ‘a ho‘omou lotu ‘i māmani kātoa.
45001009	Seuke, ko e ‘Otua ē, ‘a ia ‘oku ou tauhi ki ai ‘aki hoku laumālie ‘i he ngāue ki he Kōsipeli ‘o hono ‘Alo, ko ‘eku fakamo‘oni ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio ki he ta‘emotu ‘eku takua kimoutolu ‘i he‘eku lotu kotoa pē;
45001010	‘o u hū, hei‘ilo ‘e faifai pea u ta‘imālie ‘alu atu ‘i he finangalo ‘o e ‘Otua.
45001011	He ‘oku ou holi ke fe‘iloaki mo kimoutolu; koe‘uhi ke u ‘atu ha‘amou me‘i kelesi fakalaumālie, hei‘ilo ‘e poupou ai kimoutolu–
45001012	‘ā, ko ‘eku pehē pē, ke ai ha‘atau fetokoni‘aki ‘i he‘eku ‘iate kimoutolu, ‘a au ‘aki ‘a e lotu ‘amoutolu, pea ko kimoutolu ‘aki e lotu ‘a‘aku.
45001013	Pea ‘oku ‘ikai te u loto ke mou ta‘e‘ilo, kāinga, kuo tu‘o lahi ‘eku fakakaukau ke u ‘alu atu, ka kuo ta‘ofi au ‘o a‘u ki he taimi ni; ko ‘eku feinga ke ai haku fua ‘iate kimoutolu foki, ‘o hangē foki ko e Senitaile kehe.
45001014	Ko e tangata mo‘ua au ki he Kalisi mo e Pāpeliane fakatou‘osi, ki he ‘atamai mo e ta‘e‘atamai.
45001015	Pea ‘i he‘ene pehē, ko e anga leva ‘o hoku loto ‘o‘oku ke malanga‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli kiate kimoutolu foki ‘a e kakai ‘o Loma.
45001016	He tala‘ehai ‘oku ou maa‘i ‘a e Kōsipeli: he ko e ivi ia ‘o e ‘Otua ‘oku ngāue ki he fakamo‘ui ‘iate ia fuli pē ‘oku tui; ‘o mu‘a ki he Siu, ka ki he Kalisi foki.
45001017	He ‘oku fakae‘a ‘i ai ha mā‘oni‘oni mei he ‘Otua, ‘oku kamata mei he tui, pea iku ki he tui; ‘o hangē ko e Folofola, Ko e mā‘oni‘oni te ne mo‘ui mei he tui.
45001018	He ‘oku fakae‘a mei Langi ha houhau ‘o e ‘Otua ki he ngaahi faka‘otuamate mo e ngaahi angahala ‘a e kakai, ‘a e kakai ‘oku ma‘u ‘a e mo‘oni, kae lolomi ‘aki ‘a e fai angahala.
45001019	Koe‘uhiā ko e ngaahi me‘a ‘a e ‘Otua ‘oku lāu‘ilo ki ai, ‘i honau loto; he na‘e ai ‘e he ‘Otua ke e‘a kiate kinautolu.
45001020	‘Io, na‘a mo e ngaahi me‘a ‘o‘ona ‘oku ta‘ehāmai, ka talu e ngaohi ‘o māmani mo e hā ia, ‘i hono ‘utangi‘i mei he ngaahi me‘a kuo ne ngaohi, ‘io, ‘a hono māfimafi mo hono ‘Otua, ‘o fakatou lau ‘ītāniti; ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai ai hanau hao‘anga.
45001021	Koe‘uhi neongo na‘a nau ‘ilo ki he ‘Otua, ka na‘e ‘ikai te nau fakahīkihiki‘i ia, pe fakafeta‘ia, ‘o ngali ko e ‘Otua: kaekehe na‘e taka launoa ‘enau ngaahi fakakaukau; pea po‘uli tu‘u honau loto ta‘e‘ilo.
45001022	Lolotonga ‘enau taukave ‘oku nau poto, na‘a nau hoko ‘o vale.
45001023	Pea nau fetongi ‘a e lāngilangi ‘o e ‘Otua ta‘e‘auha ‘aki ‘a e fakatātā ‘i he tatau ‘o ha tangata ‘oku ‘auha, mo e ngaahi fa‘ahinga manupuna, mo e manu ve‘efā, mo e manu totolo.
45001024	Ka hono ō ia na‘e tuku atu ai kinautolu ‘e he ‘Otua ke nau fou ‘i he ngaahi holi ‘o honau loto, ‘o a‘usia ‘a e anga ‘uli; ko ia na‘e fakalielia‘i honau sino ‘i he‘enau feangai,
45001025	he fa‘ahinga ko ia na‘a nau tuku ‘a e mo‘oni ‘a e ‘Otua, ka nau fai‘aki ‘a e koto loi; ‘o nau lotu mo tauhi ki he me‘a kuo ngaohi, ‘o laka ‘iate ia na‘a ne ngaohi, ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘oku ‘o‘ona ‘a e fakamālō ‘o lauikuonga. ‘Ēmeni.
45001026	Ko ia na‘e tuku atu ai kinautolu ‘e he ‘Otua ki he ngaahi feinga ‘a ia ko e koto fakalielia. He ko honau kakai fefine na‘a nau tuku ‘a e fai fakaenatula, ka nau hiki ki he anga ‘oku makehe mo natula.
45001027	Pea pehē foki mo e kakai tangata, na‘a nau li‘aki ‘a e fai ki he fefine, ‘a ia ‘oku fakaenatula, ka nau mātu‘aki ‘afu ‘i he feholi‘aki, ko e fai ‘e he tangata mo e tangata ‘a e me‘a ta‘etaau: pea ko ‘enau ma‘u ē ‘i he sino ‘onautolu ‘a e totongi na‘e hoa mo ‘enau hē; ‘a ia na‘e totonu ke pehē.
45001028	‘Io, ‘o hangē ā ‘enau li‘aki ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘i he ‘ikai te nau loto ke puke ma‘u ‘enau ‘ilo kiate ia, pehē na‘e tuku atu kinautolu ‘e he ‘Otua ki he loto li‘ekina, ke fai me‘a ta‘etaau–
45001029	ko e kakai kuo fonu ngutungutu ‘i he angahala kotoa pē, he anga fīta‘a, he mānumanu, he lotokovi; ko e kakai ‘oku pito ‘i he meheka, he fakapō, he fakakē, he fakahekeheke, he mahalo kovi; ko e kakai fakakovi.
45001030	Ko e kakai fasitu‘u–‘a kinautolu ‘oku fehi‘anekina ‘e he ‘Otua –ko e kakai pau‘u, ko e kakai anga fakata‘etoka‘i, ko e kakai fielahi, ko e kakai fakakaukau kovi fo‘ou, ko e kakai talangata‘a ki he mātu‘a.
45001031	Ko e ta‘eloto, ko e ta‘efai ki he‘enau fuakava, ko e ta‘e‘ofa ho‘ota, ko e ta‘efakamolemole.
45001032	Ko e kakai ‘oku peheni honau anga, neongo kuo nau ‘ilo kānokano ‘a e tu‘utu‘uni ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘a e pehē kuo tonu ki he mate ‘a kinautolu ‘oku fai me‘a pehē, ka ‘oku ‘ikai te nau ngata ‘i he fai ‘o e ngaahi me‘a ko ia ka ‘oku hōhō‘ia foki honau loto ‘i he kakai ‘oku fai pehē.
