45002001	KO ia ai, ‘oku ‘ikai hao hao‘anga ‘o‘ou, ‘a e tangata fua pē ‘oku fakaanga; he ko ho‘o anga‘i ‘a e fa‘ahinga ko ē ‘i he me‘a ko ia, ‘oku ke anga‘i foki koe; he ‘oku ke fai ‘a e ngaahi me‘a pē ko ia ‘e koe ‘oku fakaanga.
45002002	Ka ‘oku tau ‘ilo ko e fakamaau ‘a e ‘Otua ki he fa‘ahinga fai me‘a pehē, ‘oku totonu.
45002003	Pea ko eni koā ho‘o fakakaukau, ‘a koe, siana, ‘oku ke anga‘i ‘a e kakai fai me‘a pehē; ‘osi, ‘oku ke fai pehē mo koe? ko ho‘o pehē, te ke ‘ata‘atā koe mei he fakamonū ‘a e ‘Otua?
45002004	Ka na‘a ko ho‘o ta‘etoka‘i ‘a e koloa na ko ‘ene anga‘ofa, kae‘uma‘ā ‘ene fakatofutofu mo anga mokomoko; ‘o ‘ikai te ke ‘ilo, ko e anga‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua ‘oku ne fai ha taki ki he fakatomala?
45002005	Ka ke fai‘aki ho loto fefeka mo ta‘efakatomala na, ‘o ke fokotu‘u houhau ma‘au, ‘oka hoko mai ‘a e ‘aho fai houhau mo fakae‘a ‘a e fakamaau ‘au‘autotonu ‘a e ‘Otua:
45002006	‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio te ne ‘atu ki he tangata takitaha, ‘o fakatatau ki he‘ene ngāue.
45002007	‘Ilonga kinautolu kuo kītaki ‘a e fai lelei, ‘o fou ai ‘enau ngāue ki he lāngilangi‘ia mo e fakamālō mo e ta‘efa‘a‘auha, te ne ‘atu ki ai ‘a e mo‘ui ta‘engata:
45002008	ka ko kinautolu ‘oku mo‘ui ma‘anautolu, pea ‘oku ‘ikai te nau muitala ki he mo‘oni, ka nau muitala pē ki he ta‘etotonu, ‘e tō kiate kinautolu ‘a e tuputāmaki mo e houhau,
45002009	‘a e fakamamahi mo e holitu‘u; ‘io, ‘e tō ki he mo‘ui ‘a e tangata takitaha ‘oku fai ‘a e kovi; ‘o mu‘a ki he Siu, ka ki he Kalisi foki:
45002010	ka ‘e tō ‘a e lāngilangi‘ia mo e fakamālō mo e tu‘umālie mo‘onautolu takitaha ‘oku ngāue lelei; ‘o mu‘a ki he Siu, ka ki he Kalisi foki.
45002011	He ‘oku ‘ikai ha filifilimānako ‘i he ‘Otua.
45002012	He ‘ilonga kinautolu na‘e fai angahala ta‘e te nau ma‘u ha lao, pea ‘e ‘ikai kau ha lao ‘i honau faka‘auha; ka ‘ilonga kinautolu na‘e fai angahala kuo nau ma‘u ha lao, pea ‘e fakamaau kinautolu ‘aki ‘a e lao.
45002013	He tala‘ehai ko e kau fanongo lao ia ‘oku tonuhia ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e ‘Otua, ka ko e kau fai ki he lao ko kinautolu pē ‘e fakatonuhia.
45002014	(He ko e Senitaile, ‘a e kakai ‘oku ‘ikai te nau ma‘u lao, ‘oka ai ha‘anau fai fakaenatula pē ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ‘i he Lao, neongo ‘oku ‘ikai te nau ma‘u lao ka ko e lao pē ‘a kinautolu ma‘anautolu:
45002015	he ko e fa‘ahinga ia ‘oku hā ‘i he‘enau anga kuo tohi ‘i honau loto ‘a e ngāue fakalao; ai mo e fakamo‘oni foki ‘e honau konisēnisi, mo ‘enau fevakai‘aki ‘a ‘enau tō‘onga, ‘o nau fakahalaia, ‘io, mo fakatonuhia foki.)
45002016	‘Io, ‘ilonga ‘a e kakai ‘oku fai ki he lao, ‘e toki fakatonuhia kinautolu ‘i he ‘aho ‘e fakamaau ai ‘e he ‘Otua ‘a e ngaahi me‘a fufū ‘a e kakai, ‘o hangē ko e Kōsipeli ‘oku ou malanga‘aki, ‘o fai ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū.
45002017	Ka ‘o kapau ko e toko taha koe ‘oku lau ko e Siu, mo ke fuataki ha lao, mo ke vīkiviki ‘i he ‘Otua,
45002018	‘o ke ‘ilo hono finangalo totonu, mo ke sivi ‘o ‘ilo ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku lelei lahi, ko ho akonekina ai pē mei he Lao;
45002019	pea ‘oku ke falala ko e toko taha koe ke takihala ki he kakai kui, ke fakamaama ki he kakai ‘oku nofo he po‘uli,
45002020	ke hīnoi‘i ‘a e kakai ‘oku ta‘eloto, ke ako ‘a e kakai kei tamaiki, koe‘uhi tokua, kuo ke ma‘u ‘i he Lao ‘a e poto mo e mo‘oni kuo ‘ai sino–
45002021	Pea ka kuo pehē, pea ko e tangata koe ‘oku ke akonekina ‘a e kakai kehe, kae ‘ikai fai ha ako kiate koe, ‘ō? Ko e toko taha koe ‘oku ke fanongonongo ke ‘oua na‘a kaiha‘a, ka ke kaiha‘a ‘e koe?
45002022	Ka e toko taha koe ‘oku ke pehē ke ‘oua na‘a tono fefine, ka ke tono fefine ‘e koe? Ko e toko taha koe ‘oku ke fakalili‘a ki he ‘aitoli, ka ke kaiha‘a pē mei he fale ‘aitoli, ‘ō?
45002023	‘Ā, ‘a koe ‘oku ke pōlepole ‘i ha lao, ‘oku ke fakaongokovi ‘a e ‘Otua ‘aki ho‘o maumau‘i ‘a e Lao:
45002024	he ‘oku lau‘ikovi ‘a e huafa ‘o e ‘Otua ‘i he Senitaile ko e me‘a ‘iate kimoutolu: ‘o hangē ko e folofola.
45002025	‘Io, ‘oku mo‘oni pē ko e me‘a ‘aonga kiate koe ‘a e kamu, ‘o kapau te ke fai ki he Lao. Ka ‘o kapau ko e maumau lao koe, kuo hoko ho‘o kamu ko e ta‘ekamu.
45002026	‘Āua, pea neongo ko si‘i ta‘ekamu, ka ‘o kapau te ne tauhi ‘a e ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni ‘a e Lao, ‘ikai ‘e lau ‘ene ta‘ekamu ko e kamu?
45002027	‘Io, ko ia ‘oku ne ‘osiki ‘a e Lao, neongo ‘oku ne ta‘ekamu ko si‘ene fakaenatula pē, ka te ne fakahalaia koe, ‘a koe ‘oku ke maumau lao neongo ho‘o ma‘u tohi mo e kamu.
45002028	He tala‘ehai ko e Siu mo‘oni ia ‘oku Siu ‘i tu‘a pē; pea tala‘ehai ko e kamu mo‘oni ia ‘oku ha pē ‘i tu‘a, ‘i he kakano:
45002029	kaekehe, ko e Siu mo‘oni ia ‘oku Siu ‘i loto, pea ko e kamu mo‘oni ‘a e kamu ‘o e loto, ‘a ia ‘oku tu‘unga ‘i ha laumālie ‘o ‘ikai ‘i ha tohi; ‘a ia ko hono fakamālō ‘oku ‘ikai mei he tangata ka mei he ‘Otua.
45003001	PEA ka ‘oku pehē, pea ‘oku hulu atu ‘a e Siu ‘i he hā? ‘io, ko e hā hano ‘aonga ‘o e kamu?
45003002	‘Oku lahi ‘ene hulu atu ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē. Ko hono me‘a lahi ko e tu‘anaki kinautolu, ‘o tuku ki ai ‘a e ngaahi fo‘i folofola ‘a e ‘Otua–
45003003	‘O hā tokua? Ko ia ai pē ‘a e ta‘etui ‘a e ni‘ihi, ka ko e motu ‘enau tui ko e me‘a ia koā ke motuhi ai ‘a e fai ‘a e ‘Otua ki he‘ene lea, ‘ō?
45003004	Molekemama‘o! Tau tuku mu‘a ‘oku mo‘oni pē ‘a e ‘Otua, kae loi ‘a e kakai kotoa pē: ‘o hangē ko ia kuo tohi, Koe‘uhi ke hā tonuhia ho‘o ngaahi folofola, Pea ke ke ikuna ‘oka anga‘ia.
45003005	Ka ‘o kapau ko ‘etau fai hala ko e me‘a ia kuo e‘a ai ‘a e faitotonu ‘a e ‘Otua, pea ta fēfē ai? Te ta lau ‘oku hala ‘a e ‘Otua he‘ene fai houhau ai, ‘ō? (Ko si‘eku lau fakaetangata pē.)
45003006	Molekemama‘o! he ka ne pehē, pea lava fēfē ‘e he ‘Otua ke fakamaau ‘a māmani?
45003007	‘Io, kapau kuo e‘a ‘a e mo‘oni ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘o fakautuutu ai hono ongoongolelei, ko e me‘a tokua ‘i he‘ete loi, pea ko e hā ‘oku kei anga‘i ai kita foki, ‘o pehē kuo u fai angahala?
45003008	Pea ko e hā ai ‘oku ‘ikai te tau fai kovi mu‘a, kae tupu ‘a e lelei? ‘o hangē ko homau lau‘ikovi ‘oku fai, mo e taukave ‘e he ni‘ihi, tokua ‘oku pehē ‘emau lea. Tonuhekina pē ‘a e tuku ke tautea ha me‘a pehē.
45003009	Pea kuo ta fēfē ē? Kuo ta fokotu‘u hata pā, ‘ō? ‘Oku ‘ikai ‘aupito. ‘Āua, na‘a mau fakamo‘oni ‘anenai, ‘oku mo‘ua kotoa pē ‘i he angahala ‘a e Siu mo e Kalisi fakatou‘osi.
45003010	Pea ‘oku hoa mo ia ‘a e me‘a kuo tohi, ‘Oku ‘ikai ‘aupito ha faitotonu; ‘Oku ‘ikai ‘aupito ha taha.
45003011	‘Oku ‘ikai ha fai fakapotopoto, ‘Oku ‘ikai ha taha ‘oku kumi ki he ‘Otua.
45003012	Kuo nau afe kotoa pē; Kuo nau hoko ko e koto ‘auha kotoa pē: ‘Oku ‘ikai ha taha ‘oku angalelei, ‘Oku ‘ikai ‘aupito ha taha.
45003013	Ko e fonualoto matangaki honau kia; Ko e ngāue ‘a honau ‘elelo ko e fakahekeheke; Kuo fufū ‘i honau loungutu ‘a e me‘a kona ‘o e ngata.
45003014	Ko e koto kapekape ‘a honau ngutu, mo e koto fakamahu.
45003015	‘Oku nau ve‘evave ke lilingi toto.
45003016	‘Oku ‘i honau ngaahi hala ‘a e maumau mo e fakamamahi.
45003017	Pea ko e hala ‘o e melino kuo ‘ikai te nau ‘ilo ki ai.
45003018	Pea ‘oku ‘ikai hā ki honau mata ‘a e ngeia ‘o e ‘Otua.
45003019	Pea ko eni, ‘oku tau lāu‘ilo, ‘ilonga ha fakamatala ‘a e Lao, ko e fai pē ki he kakai ‘oku kau ki he Lao; ko e fai ke tāpuni ai ‘a e ngutu kotoa pē, pea ke hoko ‘o halaia ki he ‘Otua ‘a māmani kātoa.
45003020	Koe‘uhiā ko e me‘a ki he ngaahi ngāue fakalao, ‘e tu‘u mola ai ‘a e kakano kotoa pē ‘i hono ‘ao, ‘o ‘ikai hanau fakatonuhia mei ai: he ko e me‘a ‘oku fou mei he Lao, ko e faka‘ilo angahala pē.
45003021	Ka ‘i onopooni kuo fakae‘a ha fakatonuhia mei he ‘Otua, ‘a ia ‘oku ta‘ekau ai ‘a e lao, ka ‘oku ‘i ai ha lau ki ai ‘i he Lao mo e Tohi palōfita.
45003022	‘Io, ko e fakatonuhia mei he ‘Otua ‘oku fou mai ‘i he tui kia Sīsū Kalaisi ki he kakai kotoa pē ‘oku tui.
45003023	He ‘oku ‘ikai ha fai kehekehe; he kuo fai angahala kotoa pē pea ‘oku ‘ikai te nau a‘usia ‘a e hōifua ‘a e ‘Otua;
45003024	ka nau ma‘u foaki pē ‘a e fakatonuhia ‘i he‘ene ‘ofa pē ‘a‘ana, ko e me‘a ‘i he totongi huhu‘i ‘a ia kuo ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū.
45003025	‘a e Toko Taha ko ia na‘e faka‘ali‘ali ‘e he ‘Otua ko e me‘a fakatupu hōifua; ko e hōifua tu‘unga ‘i hono ta‘ata‘a, pea founga ‘i he tui; ko e faka‘ali‘ali ‘e he ‘Otua ma‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio, ke hā ai ‘ene faitotonu, koe‘uhiā na‘e laka ‘i he ngaahi angahala langaimu‘a, ko e me‘a ‘i he fai fakatofutofu ‘a e ‘Otua;
45003026	‘io, koe‘uhi ke hā ai ‘ene faitotonu ‘i he kuonga ko eni, ke fakatou hā ‘oku ne faitotonu mo ne fai fakatonuhia kiate ia ‘oku ‘i he tui kia Sīsū.
45003027	Pea ko e fē ‘eni ‘a e pōlepole na? Kuo tāpuni ‘a e matapā ki ai. Ko e hā ‘a e anga ‘o e lao ‘oku pehe‘i ai? Ko ha lao ngāue koā? ‘Ikai, ka ko ha lao tui.
45003028	He ‘oku mau pehē, ‘oku fakatonuhia ha tangata ‘aki ‘a e tui, ‘ata‘atā mei he ngaahi ngāue fakalao.
45003029	‘Io, ko e ‘Otua ko e ‘Otua ‘o e Siu pē koā? ‘Ikai ko e ‘Otua ‘o e Senitaile foki? ‘Io, ko e ‘Otua ia ‘o e Senitaile foki.
45003030	‘O kapau ā ‘oku taha tofu pē ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘a ia te ne fakatonuhia si‘i kamu mei he tui, pea mo si‘i ta‘ekamu ko e me‘a ‘i he‘ene tui.
45004001	PEA ko ‘emau fakaka‘anga ai koā ‘a e Lao, he fai‘aki ‘a e tui? Molekemama‘o! kaekehe, ‘oku mau poupou ‘a e Lao. Pea kapau ko ia, pea ko e hā ‘etau lea ‘ia ‘Epalahame, ko hotau ‘ulumotu‘a fakasino? Ko e hā ha me‘a kuo lava ‘e ia?
45004002	Seuke, kapau na‘e fakatonuhia ‘a ‘Epalahame mei he‘ene ngāue, tā ‘oku ‘i ai ha‘ane me‘a ke pōlepole ai. Ka tala‘ehai ‘oku ‘i ai ha‘ane me‘a pehē ke fai ki he ‘Otua:
45004003	he ko e hā ‘a e lau ‘a e Tohitapu? ‘a ‘eni, pea na‘e tui ‘a ‘Epalahame ki he ‘Otua, pea na‘e lau ia ma‘ane mā‘oni‘oni.
45004004	Pea ko eni, kapau ko ha toko taha ‘oku ngāue, ‘oku ‘ikai lau ‘a e totongi ‘oku ne ma‘u ko e me‘a ‘ofa, ka ko e mo‘ua.
45004005	Ka ka ‘ilonga ha taha ‘oku ‘ikai ngāue, ka ‘oku ne tui falala kiate ia ‘oku ne fakatonuhia ‘a e faka‘otuamate, ‘oku lau ‘a e tui ‘a‘ana ma‘ane mā‘oni‘oni.
45004006	Hangē foki ko e fakamālie ‘e Tēvita ‘a e tangata ‘oku lau mā‘oni‘oni ki ai ‘e he ‘Otua, ‘o ta‘ekau ha‘ane ngāue, he‘ene pehē.
45004007	Monū‘ia ā ka ko e kakai kuo fakamolemole ‘enau ngaahi talangata‘a, Pea ‘u‘ufi ‘enau ngaahi angahala.
45004008	Monū‘ia ā ka ko e tangata ‘a ia ‘e ‘ikai si‘i lau ki ai ‘e he ‘Eiki ha hia.
45004009	Pea ko eni, ‘oku lau ‘a e fakamālie ni ki he kamu pē, pe ki he ta‘ekamu foki? he ‘oku tau pehē, ko ‘Epalahame ia na‘e lau ‘ene tui ma‘ane mā‘oni‘oni.
45004010	Pea na‘e fakafēfē hono lau kiate ia? He‘ene kamu, pe he‘ene ta‘ekamu? Na‘e ‘ikai ‘i he‘ene kamu, ka ‘i he‘ene ta‘ekamu.
45004011	Pea na‘a ne ma‘u ‘a e faka‘ilonga ko ia ko e kamu mo‘o sila ‘o e mā‘oni‘oni mei he tui, ‘a ia na‘a ne ma‘u lolotonga ‘ene ta‘ekamu: koe‘uhi ke ne hoko ko e tamai ‘anautolu kotoa pē ‘oku tui ta‘ekamu, ke lau mā‘oni‘oni kiate kinautolu.
45004012	Pea ko e tamai foki ‘a e ta‘ekamu, ‘a kinautolu ‘oku ‘ikai te nau ngata ‘i he tupu ko e kamu, ka ‘oku nau topuva‘e taha foki mo e tui ‘a ‘etau Tamai ko ‘Epalahame, ‘a e tui na‘a ne ma‘u lolotonga ‘ene ta‘ekamu.
45004013	He tala‘ehai na‘e fou fakalao mai ‘a e tala‘ofa kia ‘Epalahame pe ko hono hako, ‘a e pehē ko e ‘ea ia ‘e ‘o‘ona ‘a māmani: ka na‘e fou mai ‘i he mā‘oni‘oni mei he tui.
45004014	He kapau ‘oku ‘ea ‘a e kakai ‘oku tu‘unga ki he Lao, tā ‘oku ma‘ama‘a ‘a e tui, pea ka‘anga ‘a e tala‘ofa:
45004015	he ko e me‘a ‘oku fakatupu ‘e he Lao ko e houhau: ka ka ‘ikai leva ha lao, pea ‘ikai ai foki ha talangata‘a.
45004016	Ko hono ‘uhinga ‘eni ‘o ‘ene tu‘unga ki he tui, koe‘uhi ke fou mai ko e me‘a‘ofa; koe‘uhi ke pau ‘a e tala‘ofa ki he hako kotoa, ‘o ‘ikai ki he hako pē ‘oku tu‘unga ki he Lao, ka ki he hako foki ‘oku tu‘unga ki he tui faka-‘Epalahame; ‘a ‘Epalahame ‘a ia ko e Tamai ‘atautolu kotoa ‘i he ‘ao ‘a e ‘Otua na‘a ne tui ki ai;
45004017	(‘o hangē ko ia kuo tohi, Kuo u tu‘utu‘uni koā ko e tupu‘anga ‘o ha fuifui pule‘anga ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘oku ne fakamo‘ui hake ‘a e pekia, mo ne lau ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ‘ikai, ‘o hangē ‘oku nau ‘i ai.
45004018	‘A ‘Epalahame na‘a ne tui, ‘o piki ki he‘ene ‘amanaki, neongo kuo ‘ikai ‘a e ‘amanakinga; koe‘uhi ke ne hoko ko e tupu‘anga ‘o ha fuifui pule‘anga; ‘o hangē ko e me‘a kuo folofola‘aki mai, ‘E pehē ho hako.
45004019	Pea ‘i he ‘ikai vaivai ‘ene tui, na‘a ne tokanga‘i leva hono sino ‘o‘ona, ‘ene mate, he ‘oku ne ofi ke teau ta‘u; kae‘uma‘ā ‘a e mate ‘a e manava ‘o Sela.
45004020	Ka na‘e ‘ikai te ne tāla‘a ki he tala‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua ‘i ha‘ane ta‘etui; ka na‘e hoko ‘o kaukaua ‘ene tui, mo ne fakahīkihiki‘i ‘a e ‘Otua.
45004021	Mo mātu‘aki falala, ko e me‘a kuo ne tala‘ofa ki ai ‘oku ne malava foki ke fai.
45004022	Ko hono ‘uhinga ia foki na‘e lau ia ma‘ane mā‘oni‘oni.
45004023	Ka tala‘ehai na‘e tu‘u ‘i he Tohi ‘o pehē, “Na‘e lau ma‘ana,”koe‘uhi ko ia pē.
45004024	Ka koe‘uhi ko kitaua foki: ‘io, ‘e lau ma‘ataua, ‘a kitaua ‘oku ta tui kiate ia na‘a ne fokotu‘u ‘a hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū mei he pekia–
45004025	‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio na‘e tukuange ke pekia koe‘uhi ko ‘etau ngaahi faihala, pea fokotu‘u koe‘uhi ko hotau fakatonuhia.
45005001	KO ia, tau tuku ke fakatonuhia‘i kitautolu ‘i he tui, ka tau ma‘u melino ai mo e ‘Otua ‘i hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi;
45005002	‘a ia foki kuo fou mei ai hotau tataki ‘i he tui ki he kelesi ko eni ‘oku tau matu‘u ai: pea ke tau vīkiviki ‘i he ‘amanaki kau ‘i he lāngilangi ‘o e ‘Otua.
45005003	Pea ‘ikai‘ia ko ia pē, ka ke tau vīkiviki foki ‘i he‘etau ngaahi mamahi; he‘etau ‘ilo ‘oku tupu mei he mamahi ‘a e kātaki,
45005004	pea mei he kātaki, ‘a e lava ‘o e ‘ahi‘ahi; pea mei he lava ‘o e ‘ahi‘ahi ‘a e fakatu‘amelie.
45005005	Pea tala‘ehai ko e me‘a fakamā ‘a e fakatu‘a ko ia; koe‘uhi kuo taumalingi ‘a e ‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua ‘i hotau loto ‘i he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni, ‘a ia ne foekina kiate kitautolu.
45005006	‘Ē, kapau ā ne pekia ‘a Kalaisi ma‘a e faka‘otuamate, ‘i he hoko ‘a e kuonga totonu, neongo na‘e kei vaivai kitautolu–
45005007	Seuke, neongo ko ha faitotonu, hei‘ilo pe ‘e ai ha taha te ne fie mate ma‘ana: ‘io, kapau ko ha tangata lelei, tokaange nai ha taha te ne fakato‘oto‘a nai ‘o mate ma‘ana.
45005008	Ka ko e ‘Otua ‘oku ne fakahā ‘a e mo‘oni ‘o ‘ene ‘ofa ‘a‘ana kiate kitautolu ‘i he pekia ‘a Kalaisi ma‘atautolu, lolotonga ‘oku tau kei angahala.–
45005009	Pea kapau ko ia, pea ka kuo tau ma‘u ‘eni ‘a e fakatonuhia ‘i hono ta‘ata‘a, pea huanoa hotau fakamo‘ui ka fai ‘iate ia mei he houhau.
45005010	He kapau na‘e fakalelei ‘a e ‘Otua kiate kitautolu ‘i he pekia ‘a hono ‘Alo, lolotonga ‘ene fili ‘aki kitautolu, pea huanoa hotau fakamo‘ui ka fai ‘i he mo‘ui ‘a‘ana, ka kuo ne hōifua mai.
45005011	Pea ‘ikai‘ia ko ia, ka ‘oku vīkiviki foki ‘i he ‘Otua ‘a kitautolu ‘eni, ko e me‘a ‘i hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, ‘a e toko taha ko ia kuo fou mei ai ‘eni ‘etau ma‘u fakalelei.
45005012	Ko ia, ko e hoko ‘a e fakamo‘ui na‘e tatau mo e hoko ‘a e angahala ki māmani, ‘i he tangata pē taha; mo e hoko ‘a e mate ‘i he angahala; mo ‘ene a‘usia pehē ‘a e kakai kotoa pē ‘e he mate, koe‘uhi ne angahala kotoa pē.–
45005013	He na‘e ‘i māmani ‘a e angahala ‘i mu‘a, ‘o a‘u atu ki he Lao; ka tala‘ehai ‘oku lau angahala ‘i he ‘ikai ha lao.
45005014	Ka neongo ia, ka na‘e Hau pē ‘a Mate meia ‘Ātama ‘o a‘u kia Mōsese; ‘o ne pule foki kiate kinautolu kuo te‘eki fai ha angahala, ‘o fa‘ahinga mo e talangata‘a ‘a ‘Ātama ‘a ia ko e taipe ‘o e ‘Ātama ka hoko mai.
45005015	Ka ‘oku ‘ikai ke fai tatau ‘aupito ‘a e ‘omi kelesi mo e faihala. He kapau na‘e mate ‘a e tokolahi ‘i he fai hala ‘a e toko taha, huanoa ‘ene a‘usia ‘a e tokolahi, ‘o fu‘u hulu atu, ‘e he ‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua, mo ‘ene me‘a‘ofa, ko e me‘a ‘i he ‘ofa ‘a e tangata ‘e toko taha ko Sīsū Kalaisi.
45005016	Pea na‘e ‘ikai tatau ‘a e me‘a na‘e foaki pea mo e me‘a na‘e hoko ‘i he toko taha na‘e angahala. He ko e fakamaau ia na‘e langa‘i ‘e he toko taha, pea iku ki he fakahalaia: ka ko e ‘omi kelesi na‘e langa‘i ‘e he ngaahi faihala lahi, pea iku ki he fakatonuhia.
45005017	He kapau na‘e Hau ‘a Mate ‘i he faihala ‘a e toko taha, pea founga ‘ene Hau ‘i he toko taha ko ia; huanoa ‘enau Hau ‘i he mo‘ui, ‘e kinautolu ‘oku ma‘u hono lahi faufau ‘o e kelesi, mo e me‘a‘ofa ko e fakatonuhia, ko e fou ‘enau Hau ‘i he toko taha ko Sīsū Kalaisi.
45005018	‘Āua; ko ia, hangē na‘e fou mai ha me‘a mei ha fai faihala, ‘a ia na‘e a‘u ki he kakai kotoa pē mo‘o fakahalaia: pehē foki, na‘e fou mai ha me‘a mei ha fo‘i Fai totonu ‘a ia na‘e a‘u ki he kakai kotoa pē mo‘o fakatonuhia ke nau mo‘ui.
45005019	He hangē na‘e fakahalaia‘i ‘a e tokolahi, ko e me‘a ‘i he talangata‘a ‘a e tangata ‘e toko taha: pehē foki, ‘e fakatonuhia‘i ‘a e tokolahi, ko e me‘a ‘i he talangofua ‘a e toko taha.
45005020	Pea ko eni, na‘e hū ange ‘a e Lao, koe‘uhi ke lahi ‘a e faihala: ka ko ‘ene lahi leva ‘a e angahala, pea hulu atu noa pē ‘a e kelesi.
45005021	Koe‘uhi ke hangē na‘e Hau ‘a Angahala ‘i he mate, pehē foki ke Hau ‘a Kelesi mei he fakatonuhia, ‘o iku ki he mo‘ui ta‘engata, ‘ia Sīsū Kalaisi ko hotau ‘Eiki.
45006001	PEA fēfē ai? Te tau pehē koā, Tau nofo‘aki fai angahala, koe‘uhi ke hulu atu ‘a e kelesi?
45006002	Molekemama‘o! Ko kitaua na‘a ta mate ki he angahala, ‘e fēfē ‘eta kei mo‘ui‘aki ia?
45006003	‘Io, na‘a ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo, ‘ilonga kitautolu na‘e papitaiso, ‘o fakahoko ai kia Sīsū Kalaisi, na‘e papitaiso ‘o fakahoko ai ki he‘ene pekia.
45006004	Pea ko e me‘a ‘i hotau papitaiso ki he‘ene pekia, pea tā na‘a tau kaungā telio mo ia; koe‘uhi, hangē na‘e fokotu‘u ‘a Kalaisi mei he pekia ‘e he ‘Afio ‘a e Tamai, pehē ke fai‘aki ‘e kitautolu foki ha mo‘ui ‘oku fo‘ou hono anga.
45006005	He kapau kuo tau tupu taha mo ia ‘i he tatau ‘o ‘ene pekia, pea te tau pehē foki ‘i he tatau ‘o ‘ene toetu‘u.
45006006	He ‘oku tau ‘ilo ‘a e me‘a ni, na‘e kaungā kalusefai mo ia ‘a e motu‘a tangata ‘otautolu, koe‘uhi ke ka‘anga ‘a e sino angahala‘ia; ke ‘oua na‘a tau toe nofo pōpula kia Angahala.
45006007	He ko ia kuo mate, kuo ‘ata‘atā ia meia Angahala.
45006008	Pea ko eni, kapau na‘a tau pekia fakataha mo Kalaisi, ‘oku tau tui te tau kaungā mo‘ui foki mo ia:
45006009	he‘etau ‘ilo kuo fokotu‘u leva ‘a Kalaisi mei he pekia, pea ‘ikai kei ‘a‘ana ke pekia; ‘oku ‘ikai kei fakaehaua ia ‘e Mate.
45006010	He ko e mate na‘a ne fai, ko e mate ki he angahala, ‘o tu‘o taha tofu pē: ka ko e mo‘ui ‘oku ne fai, ko e mo‘ui ki he ‘Otua.
45006011	Pehē foki, mou lau kimoutolu ko e koto mate ki he angahala, ka ko e koto mo‘ui ki he ‘Otua, ‘i ho‘omou tu‘u ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū.
45006012	Ko ia, ‘oua na‘a tuku ke Hau ‘a Angahala ‘i homou sino mate ngofua, ke mou tuitala ki he ngaahi holi ‘o‘ona.
45006013	Kae‘uma‘ā ke ‘oua te mou ‘atu homou ngaahi kupu ma‘a Angahala, ko e mahafu ‘o e faikovi; ka mou ‘atu kimoutolu ki he ‘Otua, hangē ko e kakai kuo mo‘ui mei he mate, pea ‘atu homou ngaahi kupu ma‘a e ‘Otua, ko e mahafu ‘o e fai lelei.
45006014	He tala‘ehai ‘e fakaehaua kinautolu ‘e Angahala: he ‘oku ‘ikai te mou nofo kia Lao ka kia Kelesi.
45006015	Pea fēfē ai? ‘Oku ngofua ke tau fai angahala koā, koe‘uhi ‘oku ‘ikai te tau nofo kia Lao ka kia Kelesi, ‘ō?
45006016	Molekemama‘o! ‘Ikai ‘oku mou ‘ilo, ka mou ka ‘atu kimoutolu ki ha taha ko e kau tamaio‘eiki ke talangofua kiate ia, pea ko e kau tamaio‘eiki leva kimoutolu kiate ia ‘oku mou talangofua ki ai; pe ko e kau tamaio‘eiki ‘a Angahala ‘o iku ki he mate, pe ko e kau tamaio‘eiki ‘a Fai talangofua, ‘o iku ki he mā‘oni‘oni?
45006017	Pea ko eni, fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otua, neongo na‘a mou nofo mu‘a ko e kau tamaio‘eiki ‘a Angahala, ka na‘a mou talangofua fie talangofua ki he fa‘ahinga akonaki na‘e tuku kimoutolu ki ai.
45006018	Pea ‘i he fakatau‘atāina kimoutolu meia angahala, na‘e fakapōpula kimoutolu kia mā‘oni‘oni.
45006019	(Ko si‘eku lea fakaetangata pē ia, ko e me‘a ‘i he vaivai ‘o homou kakano). Ko konā ‘uhinga; hangē na‘a mou ‘atu homou ngaahi kupu kia Anga‘uli mo Malakilao, ko e kau tamaio‘eiki ke ngāue ki he malaki lao; pehē, ke mou ‘atu ‘eni homou ngaahi kupu kia Mā‘oni‘oni, ko e kau tamaio‘eiki ke ngāue ki he fakahaohaoa.
45006020	Seuke, lolotonga na‘a mou nofo ko e kau tamaio‘eiki ‘a Angahala, na‘a mou tau‘atāina meia Mā‘oni‘oni.
45006021	Pea ko e hā tū ha fua na‘a mou ma‘u ‘i he taimi ko ia mei he ngaahi me‘a ko ia ‘oku mou mā ai ni? He ko e iku‘anga ‘o e ngaahi me‘a ko ia ko e mate.
45006022	Ka ‘i he tu‘u ko eni, ‘i he fakatau‘atāina kimoutolu meia Angahala, kae fakapōpula kimoutolu ki he ‘Otua, ‘oku ‘i ai hamou fua, ko e fua ‘oku taki he haohaoa, pea ko e iku‘anga ko e mo‘ui ta‘engata.
45006023	He ko e tokonaki ‘a Angahala ko e mate; ka ko e me‘a‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua ko e mo‘ui ta‘engata, tu‘u ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū ko hotau ‘Eiki.
45007001	HE ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo, kāinga–seuke, ‘oku ou lea ki ha kakai ‘oku maheni mo e lao–‘oku ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo koā, ‘oku pule ‘a e lao ki he tangata lolotonga ‘ene mo‘ui pē?
45007002	He ko eni, ko e fefine alafia ‘oku ne ha‘isia mei he lao ki hono husepāniti ‘oku mo‘ui; ka ‘o kapau kuo pekia ‘a e husepāniti, kuo ne ‘ata‘atā ai mei he lao ‘o e husepāniti.
45007003	Pea ko ia, lolotonga ‘oku mo‘ui hono husepāniti, ‘e lau ia ko e fe‘auaki, ‘o kapau te ne nonofo mo ha tangata kehe: ka ‘o kapau kuo pekia hono husepāniti, ‘oku ne tau‘atāina mei he lao ko ia; ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai ko e fe‘auaki ia, he‘ene nonofo mo ha tangata kehe.
45007004	Ko ia, si‘oku kāinga, na‘e ‘ai ke mate kimoutolu foki kia Lao ‘i he sino ‘o Kalaisi; koe‘uhi ke mou nonofo mo ha taha kehe, ‘io, mo e Toko Taha ko ia na‘e fokotu‘u mei he pekia; koe‘uhi ke tau fakatupu fua ma‘a e ‘Otua.
45007005	He lolotonga na‘a tau ‘i hotau anga kakano, ko e ngaahi o‘i ke angahala, ‘a ia na‘e langa‘i ‘e he Lao, na‘e ngāngāue ia ‘i hotau ngaahi kupu, ke fakatupu fua kia Mate.
45007006	Ka ‘i he tu‘u ko eni, kuo faka‘ata‘atā kitautolu meia Lao, he‘etau mate ki he me‘a ‘a ia na‘e ma‘u puke ai kitautolu; ko ia, ‘oku tau ngāue ‘eni ‘i ha anga fo‘ou ko ha laumālie, ‘o ‘ikai ‘i he anga motu‘a, ko ha tohi.
45007007	Pea fēfē ai? te ta pehē, ko e Lao ko e koto angahala? Molekemama‘o! Ka neongo ia, ka na‘e ‘ikai te u lave‘i ‘a e angahala, ka ne ta‘e‘oua pē ‘a e Lao. ‘O pehē; ne ‘ikai te u ongona ‘a e mānumanu, ka ne ta‘e‘oua ‘a e pehē mai ‘e he Lao, ‘Oua na‘a ke mānumanu.
45007008	Ka ka tu‘unganaki ‘aki ia ‘e Angahala, ‘o ne ngāue‘aki ‘a e fekau ke fakatupu ‘iate au ‘a e fa‘ahinga mānumanu kehekehe. He ka mama‘o ‘a e lao, ‘oku mate pē ‘a Angahala.
45007009	Pea na‘e ai ha taimi na‘a te mo‘ui pē kita, ‘o mama‘o ‘a e lao: ka ‘i he a‘u mai ‘a e fekau, ne ake mo‘ui ‘a Angahala, ka te mate kita.
45007010	Pea u ‘ilo ‘a e fekau na‘e tu‘utu‘uni ko e mo‘ui‘anga, tā ko e mate‘anga ia.
45007011	Ko hono ‘uhinga, ko Angahala na‘a ne tu‘unganaki ‘aki ia, ‘o ne ngāue‘aki ‘a e fekau ke kākaa‘i au, mo ne fai‘aki ia hoku tāmate‘i.
45007012	Ko ia, ko e me‘a ki he Lao, ‘oku mā‘oni‘oni pē ia, pea mā‘oni‘oni mo totonu mo lelei ‘a e fekau na.
45007013	‘Io! Pea tā ko e me‘a lelei na na‘e hoko kiate au ko e mate, ‘ō? Molekemama‘o! Ka ko angahala ia na‘e pehē; koe‘uhi pē ke hā ai ko e angahala, ‘i he‘ene fakatupu mate kiate au ‘aki ‘a e me‘a lelei na; ‘io, koe‘uhi ke hoko ‘a e Angahala ko e toki tama fai kovi ‘i he ngāue ‘a e fekau.
45007014	He ‘oku tau lāu‘ilo ‘oku fakalaumālie ‘a e Lao; ka ko kita ko e kakano ‘atā, pea kuo fakatau kia Angahala.
45007015	He tala‘ehai ‘oku ou ‘ilo ‘a e me‘a ‘oku ou ngāue ki ai: he ‘oku ‘ikai ko e me‘a ‘oku ou fie fai ‘a ia ‘oku ou fai; ka ko e me‘a ‘oku ou fehi‘a ki ai, ko ia ‘oku ou fai.
45007016	Pea kapau ko e me‘a ‘oku ‘ikai te u fie fai ‘a ia ‘oku ou fai, tā ‘oku ou fakamo‘oni ai ki he Lao ‘oku lelei ia.
45007017	Pea ‘i he tu‘u ko ia, tala‘ehai ‘oku kei ko kita ia ‘oku ngāue ki he me‘a ko ia, ka ko angahala ‘oku fale ‘iate au.
45007018	Seuke, kuo u ‘ilo, ko e me‘a kiate au, ‘a ia ko e pehē ki hoku kakano, ‘oku ‘ikai ke fale ai ha lelei ‘e taha: he ‘oku tolotui mai ‘a e fie fai lelei, ka ko hono fai, ‘oku ‘ikai.
45007019	‘Io, ko e lelei ‘oku ou fie fai ‘oku ‘ikai te u fai; kaekehe, ko e kovi, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘ikai te u fie fai, ko ia ia ‘oku ou feia.
45007020	Pea kapau ko e me‘a ‘oku ‘ikai te u fie fai, ko ia ia ‘oku ou fai, tala‘ehai ‘oku kei ko kita ia ‘oku ngāue ki he me‘a ko ia, ka ko Angahala ‘oku fale ‘iate au.
45007021	Pea ko ia, ‘oku ou ongona, lolotonga ‘oku te tokanga kita ki he Lao ke te fai lelei, tā ‘oku tolotui mai kia kita ‘a e fai kovi.
45007022	Seuke, ‘oku te kaungamālie‘ia mo e lao ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘a hoto tangata-‘i-loto.
45007023	Ka ‘oku hā kiate au ha lao kehe ‘oku nofo ‘i hoku ngaahi kupu, ‘o fai tau mo e lao ‘o hoku loto, mo taki pōpula au ki he lao angahala‘ia ‘oku nofo ‘i hoku ngaahi kupu.
45007024	‘Oiauē! si‘i toki mala‘ia kita! ko hai tū te ne hamusi au mei he sino ‘oku mei ai ‘a e mate ni?
45007025	Fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otua, ‘a ia kuo ne fai ‘ia Sīsū Kalaisi ko hotau ‘Eiki! Pea tā ko au, fakaekita, ‘oku te ngāue ki he lao ‘a e ‘Otua ‘i hoku loto, ka ko e lao ‘a angahala ‘i hoku kakano.
45008001	KO ia, ‘i he tu‘u ko eni, ‘oku ‘ikai ha momo‘i fakahalaia ‘o e kakai ‘oku ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū.
45008002	He ko e lao ‘a e Laumālie ko e Mo‘ui‘anga, kuo ne fakatau‘atāina koe mei he lao ‘a angahala mo mate, ‘i ho‘o tu‘u ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū.
45008003	He ko e me‘a na‘e ‘ikai lava ‘e he Lao, ko ‘ene vaivai koe‘uhi ko e kakano, ne lava ‘e he ‘Otua; he‘ene fekau mai hono ‘Alo ‘o‘ona ‘i he tatau ‘o e kakano angahala‘ia, pea mo‘o feilaulau he angahala, ‘o ne hifo ai ‘a angahala mei he‘ene pule ‘i he kakano:
45008004	koe‘uhi ke fakakakato ‘a e me‘a ‘oku ‘eke ‘e he Lao ‘iate kitautolu, ‘a kitautolu ‘oku ‘ikai ke tau angimui ki he kakano, ka ki he Laumālie.
45008005	He ko kinautolu ‘oku nau anga fakakakano, ‘oku nau toka ki he ngaahi me‘a ‘a e kakano; ka ko kinautolu ‘oku anga fakalaumālie, ‘oku nau toka he ngaahi me‘a ‘a e Laumālie.
45008006	Pea ko e feinga ‘a e kakano ko e koto mate ia: ka ko e feinga ‘a e laumālie ko e koto mo‘ui mo melino.
45008007	Koe‘uhi ko e feinga ‘a e kakano ko e koto fakafili ki he ‘Otua: he ‘oku ‘ikai te ne fakavaivai ia ki he lao ‘a e ‘Otua; seuke, ‘oku ‘ikai ‘aupito te ne lava.
45008008	Pea ko kinautolu ‘oku tu‘u ‘i he kakano ‘oku ‘ikai te nau lava ke fakahōifua ‘a e ‘Otua.
45008009	Ka ko kimoutolu, ‘oku ‘ikai te mou tu‘u ‘i he kakano, ka ‘i he Laumālie; ‘o kapau ā ‘oku fale ‘iate kimoutolu ‘a e Laumālie ‘o e ‘Otua. Ka ‘o kapau ‘oku ai ha taha ‘oku ‘ikai te ne ma‘u ‘a e Laumālie ‘o Kalaisi, ‘oku ‘ikai ‘o‘ona ‘a e toko taha ko ia.
45008010	Pea ko eni, kapau ‘oku ‘iate kimoutolu ‘a Kalaisi, tā kuo mate ‘a e sino koe‘uhi ko e angahala; ka ko e koto mo‘ui ‘a e laumālie koe‘uhi ko e mā‘oni‘oni.
45008011	‘Io, kapau ‘oku fale ‘iate kimoutolu ‘a e Laumālie ‘o ia na‘a ne fokotu‘u ‘a Sīsū mei he pekia, pea tā ko ia na‘a ne fokotu‘u ‘a Kalaisi mei he pekia, te ne ‘ai ke mo‘ui ‘a e koto mate na ko homou sino, koe‘uhi ko hono Laumālie ‘oku nofo‘ia kimoutolu.
45008012	Pea kapau ko ia, kāinga, tā ko e kakai mo‘ua kitaua; ka tala‘ehai ko e mo‘ua kia Kakano, ke ta mo‘ui fai ki he kakano.
45008013	He kapau te mou mo‘ui fai ki he kakano, ko hono ālonga pē ‘o ha‘amou mate: ka ‘o kapau te mou fai‘aki ‘a e Laumālie, ‘o ‘ai ke mate ‘a e feinga kovi ‘a e sino, te mou mo‘ui.
45008014	He ‘ilonga kinautolu ‘oku tākiekina ‘e he Laumālie ‘o e ‘Otua, ko kinautolu ia ‘a e ngaahi foha ‘o e ‘Otua.
45008015	He tala‘ehai na‘a mou ma‘u ha Laumālie anga pōpula, ke mou foki ai ki he manavahē: ka na‘a mou ma‘u ‘a e Laumālie anga-faka-tama-ohi; pea ‘i he‘etau ‘iate ia ‘oku tau kalanga, ‘Apā Tamai.
45008016	Ko e Laumālie, ‘oku ne kaungā fakamo‘oni ‘e ia mo hotau laumālie, ‘o pehē, ko e fānau ‘a e ‘Otua ‘a kitautolu.
45008017	Pea kapau ko e fānau, tā ko e ngaahi ‘ea foki, ko e ngaahi ‘ea ‘o e ‘Otua, pea kaungā ‘ea mo Kalaisi; ‘o kapau ā ‘oku tau kaungā mamahi mo ia, ka tau kaungā hākeaki‘i foki mo ia.
45008018	Seuke, ‘oku te pehē, ko e ngaahi mamahi ‘o e taimi ni ‘oku ‘ikai kākunga ke tatau mo e lāngilangi ‘oku ene ke fakae‘a mai, ‘o ‘ai kiate kitautolu.
45008019	‘Io, ko e ‘amanaki tu‘u ‘a Natula ‘oku ne nofo‘aki tali ki he fakae‘a ‘o e ngaahi foha ‘o e ‘Otua.
45008020	He na‘e fakamo‘ulaloa ‘a Natula ki he muna: ka tala‘ehai ko hono loto, ka koe‘uhi pē ko ia na‘a ne fai ‘a e fakamo‘ulaloa.
45008021	Ka na‘e tuku ke ne ‘amanaki pē, ‘o pehē, na‘a mo ia, ‘a Natula, ‘e faifai pea faka‘ata‘atā mei he‘ene pōpula ki he ‘auha, kae fakahoko ia ki he tau‘atāina fakalangi ‘a e fānau ‘a e ‘Otua.
45008022	Seuke, ‘oku tau lāu‘ilo pē, ‘oku fai ‘o a‘u ki he taimi ni ‘a e fetō‘eaki mo langā ‘a Natula kātoa.
45008023	Pea tala‘ehai ko ia pē, ka na‘a mo kitaua, neongo ‘oku ta ma‘u ‘a e fua tapu ‘o e Laumālie, ka ‘oku ta to‘e loto kitaua foki, he talitali ki he fakakakato ‘o e ohi, ‘a ia ko e huhu‘i ‘o hotau sino.
45008024	He na‘e fakamo‘ui ‘amanaki pē kitautolu: ka ‘oka kuo hā ‘ete ‘amanaki, ‘oku ‘ikai kei ko e ‘amanaki ia: he ka ko ha me‘a ‘oku sio ki ai ha taha, pea fēfē ai ha‘ane kei ‘amanaki ki ai?
45008025	Ka ‘o kapau ko ha me‘a ‘oku ‘ikai te tau sio ki ai, ‘a ia ‘oku tau ‘amanekina, tā ‘oku tau talitali ki ai ‘aki ‘a e kātaki.
45008026	Pehē foki, ko e Laumālie ‘oku ne tokoni‘i ‘eta vaivai: ‘o pehē, ‘oku ‘ikai te ta ‘ilo pe ko e hā te ta lotua ke hoa mo ‘eta faingata‘a: ka ko e Laumālie ‘oku ne hufekina ‘e ia ‘a kitaua, ‘aki ‘a e ngaahi to‘e ‘oku ‘ikai fa‘a fakamatala.
45008027	Ka ko ia ‘oku ne hakule ‘o e loto, ‘oku ne mea‘i ‘a e me‘a ‘oku feinga ki ai ‘a e Laumālie; koe‘uhi ‘oku fai ‘i he funga ‘o e finangalo ‘o e ‘Otua ‘ene hufekina ‘a e kakai lotu.
45008028	Kae‘uma‘ā ‘oku tau ‘ilo, ‘ilonga ‘a e kakai ‘oku ‘ofa ki he ‘Otua, ‘oku fengāue‘aki ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē ma‘anau lelei; he ko e kakai kinautolu kuo ului ‘o fakatatau ki he‘ene tu‘utu‘uni.
45008029	He ko kinautolu na‘a ne toka mea‘i, na‘a ne toka tu‘utu‘uni foki ke nau hokosi ‘a e ‘īmisi ‘o hono ‘Alo; koe‘uhi ke ne ta‘okete ki he tehina tokolahi.
45008030	Pea ko kinautolu na‘a ne toka tu‘utu‘uni, na‘a ne ui foki kinautolu; pea ko kinautolu na‘a ne ui, na‘a ne fakatonuhia‘i foki kinautolu; pea ko kinautolu na‘a ne fakatonuhia‘i na‘a ne fakalāngilangi‘i foki kinautolu.
45008031	Pea ko e hā ai ha‘ata lea ‘e fai ki he ngaahi me‘a ni? ‘Ā, kapau ‘oku kau ‘a e ‘Otua ma‘atautolu, pea ko hai tū ‘e ta‘ofi mai?
45008032	Seuke, kapau na‘e ‘ikai mamae ‘e he ‘Ene ‘Afio ki hono ‘Alo mo‘oni, ka ka tukuange ia ke pekia koe‘uhi ko kitautolu fuli pē, pea fēfē ai ha‘ane mamae ke foaki mai mo ia ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē.
45008033	Ko hai te ne talatalaaki ‘i ‘a e kakai kuo fili ‘e he ‘Otua? ‘a e ‘Otua koā, ‘a ia ‘oku ne fakatonuhia‘i kitautolu?
45008034	Ko hai ‘a e fakahalaia? ‘A Kalaisi koā, ‘a ia na‘a ne pekia ma‘atautolu, kae‘uma‘ā ‘ene toetu‘u; ‘a ia ‘oku ne ‘i he nima to‘omata‘u ‘o e ‘Otua, ‘a ia foki ‘oku ne hufekina kitautolu?
45008035	Ko hai tū ha taha te ne motuhi kitautolu mei he ‘ofa ‘a Kalaisi? ‘A mamahi? ‘A faingata‘a? ‘A fakatanga? ‘A honge? ‘A taka pē? ‘A tu‘utāmaki? ‘A heletā?
45008036	(‘o hangē ko e lau ‘a e Tohitapu, ‘Oku ‘osi atu ‘a e ‘aho mo e fai homau tāmate‘i koe‘uhi ko koe: Ne lau kimautolu ko e fanga sipi pē ke tāmate‘i).
45008037	‘Ikai; ka ‘i he ngaahi me‘a ni kotoa pē ‘oku tau ikuna noa pē ‘iate ia ne ne ‘ofa‘i kitautolu.
45008038	Seuke, ‘oku te tui, ‘e ‘ikai lava ‘e he mate, pe ko e mo‘ui, pe ko ha kau ‘āngelo, pe ko ha kau pule, pe ko ha ngaahi me‘a ‘oku lolotonga ni, pe ko ha ngaahi me‘a ka hoko mai,
45008039	pe ko ha ngaahi mālohi, pe ko ha mā‘olunga, pe ko ha loloto, pe ko ha me‘a ‘e taha ‘i Natula, ‘e ‘ikai te ne lava ke motuhi kitautolu mei he ‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū ko hotau ‘Eiki.
45009001	KO ‘eku lea mo‘oni ē, ‘a au ko e toko taha ‘oku tu‘u ‘ia Kalaisi: ‘oku ‘ikai ko ‘eku loi; pea ‘oku fakamo‘oni kiate au ‘e hoku konisēnisi, he‘ene Laumālie-Mā‘oni‘oni‘ia–
45009002	‘a ‘eni, ‘Oku ‘iate au ha mamahi lahi, pea ‘oku mahuhu ma‘u pē hoku loto.
45009003	Seuke, na‘a ku mei loto ke u mala‘ia ‘a au, ‘o mama‘o mo Kalaisi, ko e fetongi ‘o hoku ngaahi tokoua, ko si‘oku ngaahi kāinga fakakakano.
45009004	He ko e ha‘a ‘Isileli kinautolu; ‘oku ‘onautolu tonu ‘a e Ohi, mo e Sikaina, mo e ngaahi Fuakava; pea ko kinautolu na‘e ‘omi ki ai ‘a e Lao, mo e ngaahi Feingalotu, mo e ngaahi Palōmesi.
45009005	Pea ‘oku ‘onautolu ‘a e Mātu‘a, kae‘uma‘ā ‘oku meiate kinautolu ‘a Kalaisi, ‘a hono anga kakano, ‘a ia ko e ‘Otua ‘oku pule ki he me‘a kotoa pē, pea ‘o‘ona ‘a ‘e fakamālō ‘o ta‘engata, ‘Ēmeni.
45009006	Ka ‘oku ‘ikai ke fou pehē ‘a e me‘a, ko e pehē kuo ka‘anga ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua. He tala‘ehai ‘oku ‘Isileli kotoa pē ‘a kinautolu kuo tupu meia ‘Isileli.
45009007	‘Io, neongo ko e hako ‘o ‘Epalahame, ka ‘oku ‘ikai lau ai kotoa pē ko ‘ene fānau: he ‘oku pehē ‘e he Tohi, ‘E ngata ‘ia ‘Aisake ‘a e lau ko ho hako.
45009008	‘A ia ‘oku tatau mo e pehē, ‘Oku ‘ikai ko e fānau ‘oku fou fakakakano mai, ‘a ia ko e fānau ‘a e ‘Otua, ka ko e fānau ‘oku fou fakapalōmesi, ko eni ia ‘oku lau ko e hako.
45009009	He ko e palōmesi ia ‘a e lea ko eni, Ko e taimi ni te u ha‘u ai, pea ‘e ma‘u ‘e Sela ha tama.
45009010	Pea ‘ikai ko ia pē; ka ‘oku hā foki ‘i he feitama ‘a Lepeka ki ha toko taha, ko ‘etau kui ko ‘Aisake.
45009011	He neongo kuo te‘eki fā‘ele‘i kinaua, pea te‘eki ke na fai ha me‘a lelei pe kovi; ka koe‘uhi ke tu‘u ma‘u ‘a e tu‘utu‘uni fili ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘o ‘oua ‘e tu‘u ‘i he ngāue, ka ‘iate ia ‘oku fai ‘a e ui,
45009012	ko ia na‘e fakahā ki he fefine, Ko ta‘okete te ne tauhi ‘a tehina.
45009013	Pea ‘oku hoa mo ia ‘a e tohi, Na‘a ku ‘ofa kia Sēkope; ka ko ‘Īsoa na‘a ku fehi‘a ki ai.
45009014	Pea ta fēfē ai? Te ta pehē koā, Tā ‘oku ‘i ai ha‘ane fai ta‘etotonu ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘ō?
45009015	Molekemama‘o! He na‘a mo Mōsese ‘oku ne folofola kiate ia, ‘o pehē, ‘Ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku ou ‘alo‘ofa ki ai, te u fai ‘alo‘ofa ki ai, ‘io, ‘ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku ou manava‘ofa ki ai te u fai manava‘ofa ki ai.
45009016	‘Āua; pea tā ‘oku ‘ikai tu‘unga ki he‘ete loto ki ai, pe ki he‘ete lele ki ai, ka ki he fai ‘alo‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua.
45009017	‘Io, ko eni ‘a e lau ‘a e Tohitapu kia Felo, Ko e me‘a pē ia na‘a ku fokotu‘u ai koe, koe‘uhi ke u ‘ai ke hā ‘eku māfimafi ‘iate koe, pea koe‘uhi ke ongoongoa ai hoku hingoa ‘i māmani kātoa.
45009018	‘Āua; pea tā ‘oku ne ‘alo‘ofa kiate ia ‘oku ne finangalo ke ‘alo‘ofa ki ai, pea ‘oku ne fakafefeka ‘a ia ‘oku ne finangalo ke fakafefeka.
45009019	Pea tā te ke pehē mai, Pea ko ‘ene toe lāunga ai ko e hā? he ‘e ta‘ofi ‘e hai ‘ene tu‘utu‘uni?
45009020	‘Isa! ko hai koe, tangata, ‘oku tali fakaanga ki he ‘Otua? ‘E lea koā ‘e he me‘a ngaohi kiate ia na‘a ne ngaohi, ‘o pehē, Ko e hā kuo ke ngaohi ai au ke pehē?
45009021	‘Io! ‘ikai ‘oku fa‘iteliha ‘a e tufunga ipu ki he ‘umea, ke ngaohi mei he takaonga pē taha ha ipu ‘e taha ke kinokinoifie, mo e ipu ‘e taha ke palakū?
45009022	Kae fēfē ai ‘o kapau na‘e peheni ‘a e me‘a, neongo na‘e finangalo ‘e he ‘Otua ke fakae‘a ‘ene houhau, pea ke ‘ai ke mahino ‘a e me‘a te ne lava, ka ka anga mokomoko ia ‘o fuoloa, mo ne kātaki ‘a e ngaahi ipu ‘angahouhau ‘a ia kuo ‘osi sāuni ki he mala‘ia;
45009023	koe‘uhi ke ne ‘ai ke mahino ‘a e koloa ‘o hono lāngilangi, he hā ‘i he ngaahi ipu ‘anga‘alo‘ofa, ‘a ia na‘a ne tomu‘a teuteu ke lāngilangi‘ia–
45009024	‘a ē na‘a ne fakaului ai ‘a kitautolu foki, ‘o ‘ikai mei he Siu pē, ka mei he Senitaile foki.
45009025	‘O hangē foki ko ‘ene folofola ‘i he Tohi ‘a Hosea; Te u lau ko hoku kakai ‘a ia na‘e ‘ikai ko hoku kakai, pea ‘ofeina ‘a ia na‘e ‘ikai ‘ofeina.
45009026	Pea ‘e hoko ‘o pehē, ko e potu ‘a ia na‘e pehē ai kiate kinautolu, ‘Oku ‘ikai ko hoku kakai kimoutolu, ko e potu pē ia ‘e lau ai kinautolu, ko e ngaahi foha ‘o e ‘Otua Mo‘ui.
45009027	Pea ko e me‘a ki ha‘a ‘Isileli, ‘oku kalanga ‘e ‘Aisea ‘o pehē, Neongo ‘e tatau ‘a e lau ‘o e hako ‘o ‘Isileli pea mo e ‘one‘one ‘o e matātahi, ko e toenga pē ‘e fakamo‘ui:
45009028	he ‘oku ‘i ai ha tu‘utu‘uni ‘e fai ‘e he ‘Otua ‘i māmani, ‘o ne faka‘osi mo fakato‘oto‘o.
45009029	Pea ‘oku hoa mo ia ‘a e lea ‘a ‘Aisea ‘oku tu‘u mu‘a atu, Ka ne ta‘e‘oua ‘a e fakatoe ‘e he ‘Eiki Sāpaoti ha‘atau fo‘i tenga, pehē kuo tau hoko ‘o hangē ko Sōtoma, pea kuo fakatatau ‘a kitautolu mo Komola.
45009030	Pea ko e hā ai ‘etau lea ‘e fai? ‘A ‘eni, Ko Senitaile ta‘etuli ki he mā‘oni‘oni, kuo nau ma‘u ‘a e mā‘oni‘oni ‘oku mei he tui:
45009031	ka ko ‘Isileli tuli ki ha lao ‘oku mei ai ha mā‘oni‘oni, na‘a mo e lao ko ia ne ‘ikai te nau a‘usia.
45009032	Koe‘uhi ko e hā? Koe‘uhiā, ko e me‘a ‘i he ‘ikai te nau kamata mei he tui, ka nau fou fakangāue pē, ko ia na‘a nau tūkia ‘i he maka tūkia‘anga.
45009033	‘O hangē ko ia kuo tohi, Ko eni ‘oku ou ‘ai ‘i Saione ha maka tūkia‘anga, mo ha makatu‘u fakatupu fifisi: pea ko ia ‘oku tui kiate ia ‘e ‘ikai fakamaa‘i.
45010001	KĀINGA, ko e feinga ‘a hoku loto, pea ko ‘eku kole ki he ‘Otua ‘i he fa‘ahinga ko ia, ke nau mo‘ui.
45010002	He ‘oku ou fakamo‘oni pē, ‘oku ‘i ai ha‘anau mamahi‘i ‘a e ‘Otua, ka ‘oku ‘ikai fou ‘i he ‘ilo totonu.
45010003	He ko e me‘a ‘i he ‘ikai te nau ‘ilo ki he mā‘oni‘oni ‘oku mei he ‘Otua, ka nau feinga pē ke tu‘u ‘a e mā‘oni‘oni fakaekinautolu, ko ia na‘e ‘ikai ai te nau fakavaivai ki he mā‘oni‘oni ‘oku mei he ‘Otua.
45010004	He ko Kalaisi ko e fakangata ia ‘o e lao, kae mā‘oni‘oni ‘a e tangata kotoa pē ‘oku tui.
45010005	He ‘oku tohi ‘e Mōsese, Ko e me‘a ki he mā‘oni‘oni ‘oku mei he Lao, ko e tangata kuo fai ia te ne mo‘ui ai.
45010006	Ka ko eni ‘a e lau ‘a e mā‘oni‘oni ‘oku mei he tui, ‘Oua te ke pehē ‘i ho loto, Ko hai tū ‘e ‘alu hake ki he langi? ‘A ia ko e pehē ke ‘ohifo ‘a Kalaisi:
45010007	pe, Ko hai tū te ne ‘alu hifo ki lolofonua? ‘A ia ko e pehē ke ‘ohake ‘a Kalaisi mei he pekia.
45010008	Ka ko e hā ‘ene tala? ‘A ‘eni, ‘Oku ofi pē kiate koe ‘a e folofola, ‘oku ‘i ho ngutu, pea ‘i ho loto; ‘a ia ko e pehē ko e folofola tui ‘oku mau fanongonongo.
45010009	Koe‘uhi, kapau te ke fakahā ‘aki ho ngutu, ko e ‘Eiki ‘a Sīsū, pea ke tui ‘aki ho loto kuo fokotu‘u ia ‘e he ‘Otua mei he pekia, ‘e fakamo‘ui koe.
45010010	He ‘oku fai ‘a e tui ‘aki ‘a e loto ke ma‘u ‘a e fakatonuhia, ka ‘oku fai ‘a e fakahā ‘aki ‘a e ngutu ke ma‘u ‘a e fakamo‘ui.
45010011	He ‘oku pehē ‘e he Tohi, ‘ilonga pē ‘a ia ‘e tui kiate ia, ‘e ‘ikai fakamaa‘i ia.
45010012	He ‘oku ‘ikai ha fai kehekehe ki he Siu mo e Kalisi: he ‘oku taha ai pē ‘a e ‘Eiki ‘o e kakai kotoa pē, pea mohu me‘a ma‘a e kakai kotoa pē ‘oku tautapa kiate ia.
45010013	He ‘ilonga ‘a ia ‘e tautapa ki he huafa ‘o e ‘Eiki ‘e fakamo‘ui.
45010014	Ka te nau lava fēfē ke tautapa ki ha toko taha ‘oku te‘eki ke nau tui ki ai? Pea te nau lava fēfē ke tui ki ha toko taha kuo te‘eki ke nau fanongo ki ai? pea fēfē ha‘anau fanongo ‘oka ‘ikai ha taha ke malanga?
45010015	Pea malanga fēfē ha ni‘ihi ‘o kapau ‘e ‘ikai fekau atu kinautolu? ‘o hangē ko ia kuo tohi, Hono ‘ikai faka‘ofo‘ofa si‘i va‘e ‘o e kakai ‘oku ongoongo mai ha ngaahi me‘a lelei!
45010016	Kae tala‘ehai na‘e tuitala kotoa pē ki he ongoongolelei ko ia. He ‘oku pehē ‘e ‘Aisea, ‘Eiki, ko hai kuo ne tui ki he ongoongo kuo ne fanongo ai meiate kimautolu?
45010017	Tā ‘oku tupu ‘a e tui mei he fanongo, pea ‘oku fai ‘a e fanongo ko e ‘i ai ha folofola ‘a Kalaisi.
45010018	‘Oua koā. Na‘a kuo ‘ikai te nau fanongoa, ‘Isa, kuo ongo atu honau le‘o ki he fonua kotoa: Mo ‘enau ngaahi lea ki he ngata‘anga ‘o māmani.
45010019	‘Oua koā. Na‘a kuo ‘ikai lave‘i ‘e ‘Isileli ‘a e me‘a ko ia. ‘Ā, ‘oku lea leva ‘a Mōsese ki ai, ‘o pehē, Te u fakafua‘a‘i kimoutolu ‘aki ha ‘ata‘i kakai; Te u fakatupu ho‘omou ‘ita ‘aki ha kakai ta‘e‘atamai.
45010020	Pea ‘oku mātu‘aki lea ‘asi ‘a ‘Aisea, he‘ene pehē, Kuo ‘iloa au ‘e kinautolu na‘e ‘ikai kumi mai; Kuo u e‘a ki ha kakai na‘e ‘ikai ‘eke mai.
45010021	Ka ‘i he‘ene lau ki ha‘a ‘Isileli ‘oku ne pehē, ‘Oku ‘osi atu e ‘aho mo e ta‘alo hoku nima ni Ki ha kakai talangata‘a mo fakafisi mai.
45011001	PEA ‘oua leva. Kuo li‘aki koā ‘e he ‘Otua hono kakai? Molekemama‘o! He ko au foki ko e tangata ‘Isileli, ko e toko taha ‘i he hako ‘o ‘Epalahame, ko ha ha‘a Penisimani.
45011002	Kuo ‘ikai li‘aki ‘e he ‘Otua hono kakai, ‘a e kakai na‘a ne toka mea‘i. Tā ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo ‘apē ki he lau ‘a e Tohitapu ‘i he vahe ‘oku kau kia ‘Ilaisiā? ‘A ‘ene hū ki he ‘Otua he‘ene talatalaaki‘i ‘a ha‘a ‘Isileli, ‘o pehē,
45011003	‘Eiki, kuo nau tāmate‘i ho‘o kau palōfita; kuo nau holoki ho ngaahi ‘ōlita; pea ko au toko taha pē ‘oku toe; pea ‘oku nau kumi kiate au ke tāmate‘i.
45011004	Ka na‘e fēfē ‘a e folofola na‘e fai kiate ia? Kuo u fakatoe ma‘aku ha kau tangata ‘e toko fitu afe, ‘a ia kuo te‘eki ha‘anau momo‘i tū‘ulutui kia Peali.
45011005	Pea ko ia, ‘oku pehē foki ‘i he taimi ko eni, ‘oku ‘i ai ha toenga kuo fakatoe, ko e me‘a ‘i he fili ‘oku fai ‘ofa pē.
45011006	Pea kapau ‘oku fai ‘ofa pē, pea tā ‘oku ‘ikai kei tefito ki he ngāue: he ka ne pehē, tā ko e ‘ofa ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai kei ko e ‘ofa.
45011007	Pea kuo tā fēfē ‘eni? ‘Ē, ko e me‘a na‘e kumi ki ai ‘e ha‘a ‘Isileli kuo ‘ikai te nau hokosi ia; ka kuo hokosi ‘e si‘i ha‘a Fili, ka ko hono toe kuo fakafefeka.
45011008	‘O tatau tofu pē mo ia kuo tohi, Kuo tuku kiate kinautolu ‘e he ‘Otua ha laumālie fakaongonoa, ha ngaahi mata ‘e ‘ikai te nau sio ‘aki, mo e ngaahi telinga ‘e ‘ikai te nau fanongo ‘aki: pea ‘oku kei pehē ‘o a‘u ki he ‘aho ni.
45011009	‘Oku me‘a foki ‘e Tēvita, ‘o pehē, Tuku ke hoko ‘enau keinanga ko e hele puna; Ko e kupenga, mo e tauhele, mo e nunu‘a:
45011010	Tuku ke fakapo‘uli honau mata, Ke ‘oua te nau mamata, Pea ‘ai ke ngaope ma‘u pē honau tu‘a.
45011011	Kae ‘oua koā. Na‘e tu‘utu‘uni ‘enau tūkia koe‘uhi ke nau tō ‘aupito? Molekemama‘o! Ka ko e me‘a ‘i he‘enau hinga kuo hoko ai ‘a e fakamo‘ui ki he Senitaile, koe‘uhi ke fua‘a ‘a e fa‘ahinga ko ē.
45011012	Pea ko eni, kapau ko ‘enau hinga ko e fakakoloa ‘o māmani, pea ko honau fakamasiva ko e fakakoloa ‘o e Senitaile, huanoa ha me‘a ‘e ma‘u mei honau fakakakato.
45011013	Ka ko ‘eku lea ma‘amoutolu ‘a e Senitaile. Pea ko ia, ‘i he‘eku nofo ko e ‘aposetolo ‘o e Senitaile, ‘oku ou fakahīkihiki‘i hoku lakanga.
45011014	Hei‘ilo te u fakatupu ha fua‘a ‘i na‘i‘oku sino na, ‘o u fakamo‘ui ai hanau ni‘ihi.
45011015	He kapau na‘e hoa mo honau li‘aki ‘a e fakalelei ‘o māmani, pea ko e hā tū ha me‘a ‘e hoa mo honau toe ma‘u mai? Ko ha mo‘ui tofu pē mei he mate.
45011016	He kapau na‘e tapu ki he ‘Eiki ‘a e polopolo ‘o e takaonga mā, ‘oku tapu mo e takaonga: pea kapau ‘oku tapu ki he ‘Eiki ‘a e tefito, ‘oku tapu mo e ngaahi va‘a.
45011017	Pea neongo na‘e tu‘usi ha va‘a ni‘ihi, pea ‘omi koe ko e ‘ōlive vao, ‘o hunuki ki he ngaahi va‘a; pea ke ‘inasi fakataha mo kinautolu ‘i he tefito, ‘a ia ‘oku mei ai ‘a e mā‘ui‘ui ‘o e ‘ōlive–
45011018	‘io, neongo ia kae ‘oua te ke luki he ngaahi va‘a na: pea neongo ho‘o luki, tala‘ehai ko koe ‘oku ke tu‘u ‘aki ‘a e tefito, ka ko e tefito ‘oku ne tu‘u ‘aki koe.
45011019	Pea te ke pehē nai, Ka na‘e tu‘usi ‘a e ngaahi va‘a, koe‘uhi ke hunuki kita.
45011020	Ka na‘e fai: na‘e tu‘usi kinautolu ko ‘enau ta‘etui, pea ‘oku ke tu‘u koe ko ho‘o tui, ‘Ē, ‘oua te ke anga hiki, ka ke manavasi‘i.
45011021	He kapau na‘e ‘ikai ma‘ema‘ekina ‘e he ‘Otua ‘a e ngaahi va‘a totonu, pea tala‘ehai te ne mamae kiate koe.
45011022	Uē! vakai ā ‘a e angalelei mo e fai māsila ‘a e ‘Otua; ko e fai māsila ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio kiate kinautolu na‘e hinga, ka ko e fai ‘ofa kiate koe, ‘o kapau te ke nofo ma‘u ‘i he‘ene fai ‘ofa: he kapau ‘e ‘ikai, ‘e tā mo koe foki.
45011023	‘Io, pea ko e fa‘ahinga ‘e taha foki, kapau ‘e ‘ikai te nau nofo ma‘u ‘i he‘enau ta‘etui, ‘e hunuki kinautolu: he ‘oku mafai ‘e he ‘Otua hanau toe hunuki.
45011024	Seuke, kapau na‘e tu‘usi koe mei ha ‘ōlive ‘a ia ko hono anga ko e tupu vao pē, pea ‘omi ‘o hunuki ki ha ‘ōlive tō, ‘a ia na‘e ‘ikai ko ho anga ke tu‘u ai, huanoa hano lava ke hunuki ‘a e fa‘ahinga ko ē ki honau sino‘i ‘ōlive ‘onautolu, he ko honau anga totonu.
45011025	He ‘oku ou loto, kāinga, ke ‘oua na‘a puli ‘a e misiteli ko eni meiate kimoutolu, koe‘uhi ke ‘oua te mou ‘afungi. Ko eni kuo tō ki ha‘a ‘Isileli, (kae ‘ikai ki honau kotoa) ‘a e fakafefeka; pea ‘e pehē pē kae‘oua ke hū mai hono kotoa ‘o Senitaile.
45011026	Pea ka pehē, pea ‘e toki fakamo‘ui ‘a ‘Isileli kotoa: ‘o hangē ko e me‘a kuo tohi, ‘E ha‘u mei Saione ‘a e Huhu‘i, pea te ne ‘ave ‘a e faka‘otuamate mei ha‘a Sēkope.
45011027	Pea ko e fai ia ‘eku fuakava mo kinautolu, ‘a ‘eku ‘ave ‘enau hia.
45011028	‘Oku mo‘oni ‘i he sio faka-Kōsipeli, ‘oku ne fili ‘aki kinautolu koe‘uhiā ko kimoutolu; ka ‘i he sio faka-e-tu‘utu‘uni-fili, tā ‘oku nau ‘ofeina koe‘uhi ko ‘enau ngaahi kui.
45011029	He ko e ngaahi me‘a‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua, mo ‘ene tu‘utu‘uni lakanga, ‘oku ‘ikai liliu.
45011030	He hangē na‘a mou talangata‘a mu‘a ki he ‘Otua, ka kuo mou ma‘u meesi ‘eni ‘i he talangata‘a ‘anautolu.
45011031	Pehē foki, kuo talangata‘a ‘eni ‘a e fa‘ahinga ko ē, koe‘uhiā, ko e me‘a ‘i ho‘omou ma‘u meesi, pea faifai pea nau ma‘u meesi mo kinautolu.
45011032	He kuo loki ‘e he ‘Otua ‘a e kakai kotoa pē ki he talangata‘a, koe‘uhiā ke ne fai meesi ki he kakai kotoa.
45011033	‘Oiauē! ‘Ene kilukilua ‘a e koloa mo e poto mo e ‘ilome‘a ‘a e ‘Otua! hono ‘ikai ta‘emahakulea ‘ene ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni, mo ta‘emafakatotoloa hono ngaahi founga!
45011034	He hono ai ha taha kuo ne lave‘i ‘a e finangalo ‘o e ‘Eiki, pe ha taha kuo fale‘i ia,
45011035	pe ha taha na‘a ne ‘ange mu‘a ha me‘a ki ai, ka ne toe totongi?
45011036	Seuke, ‘oku tefito ki he ‘Ene ‘Afio, pea fou ‘i He‘ene ‘Afio, pea iku ki he ‘Ene ‘Afio, ‘a e me‘a fuli pē. Ke ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘a e kolōlia ‘o lauikuonga! ‘Ēmeni.
45012001	KO ia, ‘oku ou enginaki atu, kāinga, ‘i he funga ‘o e ngaahi fai manava‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua, ke mou ‘atu ‘a e ngaahi sino ‘omoutolu ko e feilaulau, ke mo‘ui, ke tapu ki he ‘Otua, ke fakahōifua kiate ia–ko e fakaloto ē ‘o ho‘omou fai e lotu.
45012002	Pea ke ‘oua na‘a mou tuku ke fakaangatatau kimoutolu ki he maama ko eni; kae tuku ke fai ai pē homou liliu, he fakafo‘ou ‘o homou ‘atamai, ke mou sivi ‘o ‘ilo pe ko e hā ‘a e finangalo ‘o e ‘Otua, ‘a e me‘a ‘oku lelei, ‘a e me‘a te ne hōifua ai, ‘a e me‘a ‘oku haohaoa.
45012003	He ko ‘eku lea ‘eni kiate kimoutolu tāutaha, ‘o u fai ‘i he funga ‘o e kelesi kuo tuku mai, ke ‘oua na‘a hulu atu ‘ene fakakaukau kiate ia ‘i he me‘a ‘oku totonu: ka ke hu‘u hono loto ki he fakakaukau ‘oku ngali poto; ko hono fuofua ko e mafai fakalotu kuo vahe ‘e he ‘Otua ma‘a e tangata takitaha.
45012004	He hangē tofu pē ‘oku tau ma‘u ha kupu lahi ‘i ha fo‘i sino, ka ‘oku ‘ikai ke faiva taha ‘a e kupu kotoa pē:
45012005	pehē, ko kitautolu tokolahi, ko e fo‘i sino ‘ia Kalaisi, ka ‘i he lau fakafo‘ime‘a, ko e ngaahi kupu ‘oku fekau‘aki.
45012006	Pea ko eni, ‘i he‘etau ma‘u ‘a e ngaahi mafai fakalaumālie, ‘a ia ‘oku faikehekehe ‘o fakatatau ki he kelesi ‘oku foaki mai, ko ia, kapau ko e malanga-palofisai ia, pea tau fai ke hoa mo ‘etau tui;
45012007	kapau ko e lakanga tauhi, tau nofo pē ‘i he‘etau lakanga tauhi; ko ia ‘oku ne fai ako, ke ne nofo pē ‘i he‘ene fai ako;
45012008	pea ko ia ‘oku fai enginaki, ke ne nofo pē ki he‘ene enginaki; ko ia ‘oku ne fai ‘a e foaki, ke ne fai ‘ata‘atā; ko ia ‘oku takimu‘a ke ne nima mo e va‘e; ko ia ‘oku ne fai manava‘ofa, ke ne vēkeveke fai.
45012009	Ke ta‘eloi ho‘omou ‘ofa. Fehi‘a‘ia ki he kovi; pīkitai ki he lelei.
45012010	‘I ho‘omou ‘ofa ki he kāinga lotu, fai ‘o hangē ko ha kāinga mo‘oni; ‘i he faka‘apa‘apa mou tāimu‘a kimoutolu;
45012011	‘i he mamahi‘i ‘o e Ngāue, ‘oua te mou fakapikopiko; ‘i homou laumālie, mou loto māfana; ‘i he fai ki he ‘Eiki, mou tauhi fakatamaio‘eiki ki ai;
45012012	‘i he fai ‘o ho‘omou ‘amanaki, mou fiefia; ‘i he fai homou fakamamahi, mou kātaki pē; ‘i he hūfia, mou faka‘utumauku hono fai,
45012013	‘i he fa‘a masiva ‘a e kau lotu, mou kau ai: nofo ki he fakaafe ‘āunofo.
45012014	Tāpuaki‘i ‘a kinautolu ‘oku fakatanga‘i kimoutolu; ‘io, mou tāpuaki‘i pē, ‘o ‘oua ‘e tutuku‘i.
45012015	Fiefia mo kinautolu ‘oku fiefia; tangi mo kinautolu ‘oku tangi.
45012016	Ke fakatangata tatau ho‘omou fetokanga‘aki. ‘Oua na‘a hu‘u ho‘omou tokanga ki he ngaahi me‘a mā‘olunga, kae tuku kimoutolu ke ‘auhia mo mā‘ulalo. ‘Oua te mou hoko ko e kau poto fakaekimoutolu.
45012017	Neongo pe ko hai, ‘oua te mou totongi ‘ene kovi ‘aki ‘a e kovi. Mou tomu‘a fakakaukau‘i ho‘omou ngaahi me‘a ke hā lelei ki he kakai fuli pē.
45012018	Mou nofo melino pē mo e kakai kotoa pē, ‘o kapau ‘e ala lava: kehe pē ke ‘ata‘atā meiate kimoutolu.
45012019	Si‘oku ‘ofa‘anga, ‘oua te mou sauni ho‘omou ngaahi me‘a, kae tuku ia ki he Houhau: he kuo tohi, ‘Oku ‘a‘aku ‘a e sauni; ko au te u ‘atu hono tuha–ko e folofola ē ‘a e ‘Eiki.
45012020	Ka ko koe, kapau ‘oku fiekaia ho fili ke ke fafanga ia; kapau ‘oku ne fie inua, ‘ange hano inu: he ko ho‘o fai pehē te ke fokotu‘u ai ‘a e ngaahi malala‘i afi ki hono ‘ulu.
45012021	‘Ē, ‘oua na‘a tuku ke ikuna koe ‘e he kovi, ka ke ikuna ‘a e kovi ‘aki ‘a e lelei.
45013001	KE anganofo ‘a e tangata kotoa pē ki he ngaahi pule ‘oku mā‘olunga: he ‘oku ‘ikai ha pule, ka ‘oku mei he ‘Otua pē; pea ko e ngaahi pule ‘oku ‘i ai ni, ko e fokotu‘u ‘e he ‘Otua.
45013002	Ko ia, ‘ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku angatu‘u ki he pule, ko ‘ene tu‘u ia ki he tu‘utu‘uni ‘a e ‘Otua: pea ko e me‘a ‘e ma‘u ai ‘e he kau angatu‘u, ko hanau tautea.
45013003	He tala‘ehai ‘oku nofo ‘a e kau pule mo‘o fakailifia ‘o ngāue lelei, ka ko ngāue kovi pē. Pea kapau ko ho loto ke ‘oua na‘a ai ha‘o manavahē ki he pule, pe‘i fai lelei, pea te ke toki ma‘u ha fakamālō mei ai:
45013004	he ko e sevāniti ia ‘a e ‘Otua ma‘ao lelei. Ka ‘o kapau te ke fai kovi, ke ke manavahē mu‘a; he tala‘ehai ko e va‘inga ‘ene to‘o ‘a e heletā; he ko e sevāniti ia ‘a e ‘Otua ke fai ‘ene houhau kia faikovi.
45013005	Ko ia, kuo pau ke mou anganofo, ‘o ‘ikai telia ‘a e houhau pē, kae telia ‘a konisēnisi foki.
45013006	Seuke, ko hono ‘uhinga foki ia ‘oku mou tukuhau ai: he ko e kau fai ‘o e ngāue tapu ‘a e ‘Otua ‘a kinautolu, pea ‘oku nau nofo pē ki he me‘a ko ia.
45013007	Ko ia, mou fai kiate kinautolu kotoa pē ‘a e me‘a ‘oku totonu: ‘a e tukuhau kiate ia ‘oku ‘a‘ana ‘a e tukuhau; ‘a e tute kiate ia ‘oku ‘a‘ana ‘a e tute; ‘a e manavahē kiate ia ‘oku ‘a‘ana ‘a e manavahē‘ia; ‘a e faka‘apa‘apa kiate ia ‘oku ‘a‘ana ‘a e faka‘apa‘apa‘ia.
45013008	‘Oua na‘a ai hamou mo‘ua ki ha ni‘ihi, ngata pē ‘i he mo‘ua ke ‘ofa ki ai: he ko ia ‘oku ne ‘ofa ki he taha, kuo ne ‘osiki ‘a e Lao.
45013009	He ko e ngaahi lea, ‘Oua te ke tono fefine, ‘Oua te ke fakapō, ‘Oua te ke kaiha‘a, ‘Oua te ke mānumanu, mo e hā fua ha fekau ‘oku toe, ‘oku fālute ‘e he folofola ni, Te ke ‘ofa ki ho kaungā‘api ‘o hangē ko ho‘o ‘ofa kiate koe.
45013010	Tala‘ehai ‘oku fai ‘e ‘ofa ha kovi ki hono kaungā‘api; ‘āua, tā ko e ‘ofa ko e koto ‘osiki ia ‘o e Lao.
45013011	Ke ‘āsili ho‘omou fai ko ho‘omou ‘ilo ki he laka ‘a e kuonga: ko e taimi ‘eni ke mou ‘ā leva mei he mohe; he ‘oku ofi ‘eni hotau fakamo‘ui ‘i he taimi na‘a tau fua tui ai.
45013012	Kuo faka‘a‘au atu ‘a e pō, pea kuo ofi ‘a e ‘aho: ko ia, ke tau hu‘ihu‘i ‘a e ngaahi ngāue ‘o e po‘uli, ka tau ‘ai ‘a e mahafu ‘o e maama.
45013013	Tau fai ‘a e laka ‘o e ‘aho, ‘o anga māopo: ‘o ‘oua ‘e fai ‘aki ‘a e fa‘a kātoanga kai mo e fa‘a konā, pe ko e fai fe‘auaki mo e pau‘u fakalielia, pe ko e fetu‘usi mo e meheka.
45013014	Ka mou ‘ai mu‘a ‘a e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi; pea ‘oua na‘a tokonaki ki he kakano ke kanoni ‘ene ngaahi holi.
45014001	PEA ko eni, ka ai ha taha ‘oku tui vaivai, mou fakakaukau mai pē; tapu ‘a e anga‘i ‘o ‘ene ngaahi fakakaukau.
45014002	‘Oku mālohi ‘a e tui ‘a ha taha ke kai ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē: ka ko si‘i vaivai ‘oku kai hamu pē.
45014003	Ko ia ‘oku ne kai noa pē, ke ‘oua te ne fakasīkaka‘i ‘a si‘i kai faka‘ehi‘ehi; pea ko si‘i kai faka‘ehi‘ehi, ke ‘oua te ne anga‘i ‘a ia ‘oku kai noa pē: he kuo fakakau mai pē ‘e he ‘Otua.
45014004	Ko hai tū koe ke ke anga‘i ‘a e tamaio‘eiki ‘a ha taha kehe? ‘Oku ‘i he‘ene ‘eiki ‘a‘ana ha‘ane tu‘u pe hinga. ‘Ā, te ne tu‘u pē; he ‘oku mafai ‘e he‘ene ‘Eiki ke poupou ia.
45014005	Ko Me‘a, ‘oku mamafa kiate ia ha ‘aho ‘e taha ‘i he ‘aho ‘e taha: ka ko Me‘a, ‘oku tatau kiate ia ‘a e ‘aho kotoa pē, ‘Ē, ke takitaha ‘ai ke pau ‘ene fakakaukau ‘a‘ana.
45014006	Ko ia ‘oku ne tokanga‘i ‘a e ‘aho, ‘oku ne tokanga ki ai koe‘uhi ko e ‘Eiki; pea ko ia ‘oku ne kai noa pē, ‘oku ne kai koe‘uhi ko e ‘Eiki, he ‘oku ne fai ai ‘a e fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otua: pea ko ia ‘oku ne kai faka‘ehi‘ehi, ‘oku ne kai pehē koe‘uhi ko e ‘Eiki, ‘o ne fai pē ‘ene fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otua.
45014007	He tala‘ehai ‘oku ‘i ai hatau toko taha ‘oku mo‘ui ma‘ana; pea tala‘ehai ‘oku ‘i ai hatau toko taha ‘oku pekia ma‘ana pē.
45014008	He kapau ‘oku tau mo‘ui, ‘oku tau mo‘ui ma‘a e ‘Eiki; pea kapau ‘oku tau pekia, ‘oku tau pekia ma‘a e ‘Eiki: ko ia, pe ‘oku tau mo‘ui, pe ‘oku tau pekia, ko e me‘a ‘a e ‘Eiki pē ‘a kitautolu.
45014009	Seuke, ko e me‘a ko ia na‘e pekia ki ai ‘a Kalaisi, mo toe mo‘ui, koe‘uhiā ke ne ‘Eiki ki he pekia mo e mo‘ui fakatou‘osi.
45014010	Pea ko koe na, ko e hā ‘oku ke anga‘i ai ho tokoua na? ‘Io, mo koe na, ko e hā ‘oku ke ta‘etoka‘i ai ho tokoua na? he te tau hopo kotoa pē ‘i he fakamāu‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua.
45014011	He kuo tohi, Kuo folofola ‘a e ‘Eiki, Tangi ‘eku mo‘ui! ko e tui kotoa pē ‘e tū‘ulutui kiate au, pea ko e ‘elelo kotoa pē te ne fai ‘ene vete ki he ‘Otua.
45014012	‘Āua, pea tā te tau takitaha fai ha fakamatala ki he ‘Otua ma‘ata.
45014013	Pea kapau ko ia, pea ‘oua na‘a tau toe fefakaanga‘aki; ka ko eni pē e me‘a ke mou fifili ki ai mu‘a, ke ‘oua te mou ‘ai ha tūkia‘anga, pe ha tauhele, ke mo‘ua ai ho tokoua.
45014014	‘Oku ou ongona mo mātu‘aki tui, he‘ete tu‘u ‘i he ‘Eiki ko Sīsū, ‘oku ‘ikai ha me‘a ‘e taha ‘oku tapu ‘iate ia pē. Ka ko eni pē, ‘ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku lau ‘oku tapu ha me‘a, pea ‘oku tapu leva ia ki he toko taha ko ia.
45014015	Seuke, kapau ko ha me‘akai pē ia ‘oku mamahi ai ho tokoua na, tā ‘oka ‘ikai te ke kei fou ‘i he ‘ofa. ‘Oua te ke maumau ‘aki ho‘o kai, si‘i toko taha ko ia ne pekia ki ai ‘a Kalaisi.
45014016	Ko ia, ‘oua na‘a tuku ke lau‘ikovia ‘a ho‘omou lelei na:
45014017	he ko e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua ‘oku ‘ikai ko ha kai mo ha inu, ka ko e mā‘oni‘oni mo e melino mo e fiefia, ‘i he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni.
45014018	He ko ia ‘oku ne fai‘aki ia ‘ene tauhi kia Kalaisi, ‘oku hōifua ai ‘a e ‘Otua, pea ma‘a‘ia ai ‘a e kakai.
45014019	‘Āua, pea kapau ko ia, pea tau nofo ki he ngaahi me‘a ‘oku kau ke fakamelino, mo e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku kau ki he‘etau fefai‘aki hotau langa hake.
45014020	‘Oua pē te ke holoki ‘a e ngāue ‘a e ‘Otua koe‘uhi pē ko ha me‘akai. ‘Oku ngofua ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē, ka ‘oku kovi pē ki he tangata ‘oku ne kai mo tūkia.
45014021	Ko hono lelei ke ‘oua na‘a ke kai kakano, pe inu uaine, pe ko e hā fua ha me‘a ‘oku tūkia ai ho tokoua.
45014022	Pea ko e me‘a kiate koe mo e tui kuo ke a‘usia, fai‘aki ia fakaekoe pē, ‘i ho‘omo feangai mo e ‘Otua. Ha monū‘ia ā ka ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai ke tāla‘a hono loto ‘i he fai ‘o e me‘a kuo ne tuku ‘oku totonu.
45014023	Ka ko ia ‘oku ne kei tāla‘a ‘i ha me‘a, kapau te ne hanga ‘o kai ia, kuo halaia leva, koe‘uhi na‘e ‘ikai tefito ki he tui ‘ene fai: ‘Io, ‘ilonga ha me‘a ‘oku ‘ikai fai mei he tui ko e angahala ia.
45015001	PEA ko eni, ko kitaua ‘oku ta makalohi, ko hota fatongia ke fua ‘a e ngaahi vaivai‘anga ‘o e kakai ‘oku ‘ikai ke mālohi, ‘o ‘oua ‘e fai ‘a ia pē ‘oku ‘ao mo kitaua.
45015002	‘Ē, ta takitaha fai ‘a e me‘a ‘e ‘ao mo hota kaungā‘api, ‘a e me‘a ‘e ‘aonga ki hono langa hake.
45015003	He ko Kalaisi foki na‘e ‘ikai te ne fai ‘a e me‘a na‘e ‘ao mo ia; ka ko ‘ene nofo na‘e hangē ko ia na‘e tohi, Ko e ngaahi manuki ‘a e kakai ‘oku manuki‘i koe, na‘e tō kiate au.
45015004	He ‘ilonga ha me‘a na‘e tohi mu‘a na‘e tohi mo‘otau akonekina; koe‘uhi ko e me‘a ‘i he fakakātaki mo e poupou ‘oku fai ‘e he folofola ke tau ma‘u ai ‘a e ‘amanaki lelei.
45015005	Pea ko eni, ko e ‘Otua ‘oku ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘a e fakakātaki mo e poupou, ‘ofa ke ne ‘atu ke hu‘ufataha homou loto ‘i ho‘omou feangai, ‘o fai ‘i he funga ‘o e anga ‘o Kalaisi Sīsū:
45015006	koe‘uhi ke loto taha mo ngutu taha ho‘omou fakamālō‘ia ‘a e ‘Otua, ko e Tamai ‘a hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi.
45015007	Ko ia mou fefakakau‘aki kimoutolu, ‘o hangē foki kuo fakakau mai kimoutolu ‘e Kalaisi, koe‘uhi ke ongoongolelei ai ‘a e ‘Otua.
45015008	He ‘oku ou pehē, kuo hoko ‘a Kalaisi ko e sevāniti ‘o ha‘a Kamu, koe‘uhi ko e mo‘oni ‘a e ‘Otua, ke ma‘uma‘uluta ai ‘a e ngaahi palōmesi na‘e fai ki he‘enau ngaahi kui:
45015009	ka ke fakamālō‘ia ‘a e ‘Otua ‘e Senitaile, koe‘uhi ko ‘ene meesi; ‘o hangē ko ia kuo tohi, ‘o pehē, Ko ia ai, te u fakahīkihiki‘i koe ‘i he Senitaile, pea u hiva‘aki ho huafa.
45015010	Pea ko e potu ‘e taha ‘oku pehē, Mou fiefia, ‘a e Senitaile, fakataha mo ho‘ona kakai.
45015011	Pea ko e potu folofola ‘e taha ‘oku pehē, Mou tuku kolōlia ki he ‘Eiki, ‘a Senitaile kotoa pē, ‘Io, ke fakahīkihiki‘i ia ‘e he ngaahi kakai fuli pē.
45015012	Pea ‘i he potu folofola ‘e taha ‘oku pehē ‘e ‘Aisea, ‘E ‘i ai ‘a e huli ‘o Sese; ‘io, ko e toko taha kuo tu‘u ke pule‘i ‘a Senitaile: pea ‘e ‘amanaki ‘a Senitaile ‘iate ia.
45015013	Pea ko eni, ko e ‘Otua ‘oku ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘a e faka‘amanaki, ‘ofa ke ne fakafonu kimoutolu ‘aki ha fu‘u fiefia mo melino ‘i ho‘omou tui; koe‘uhi ke mou tupulekina ‘i he ‘amanaki lelei, ‘i he ngāue ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni.
45015014	Pea ko eni, si‘oku kāinga, ‘oku ou mātu‘aki tui ‘e au foki, ho e koto fai lelei kimoutolu foki, ko e koto pōtopoto‘i kimoutolu, mo mou lava foki ke fevaloki‘aki ‘a kimoutolu.
45015015	Ka neongo ia ka ‘oku māmālohi pē ‘eku tohi atu ‘i he potu ni‘ihi, ko si‘eku fakamanatu kimoutolu; pea na‘a ku fai foki koe‘uhi ko e kelesi ne tuku mai he ‘Otua.
45015016	Ke u hoko ko e faifekau ‘a Kalaisi Sīsū ki he Senitaile; ‘o u ngāue ‘i he Kōsipeli ‘a e ‘Otua ‘o hangē ko ha taula‘eiki, koe‘uhi ke hoko ‘a e ‘oatu ‘o e Senitaile ko e feilaulau te ne hōifua ai, hono fakamā‘oni‘oni‘i ‘e he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni.
45015017	Ko ia, ‘oku ou lava ke pōlepole ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū ‘i he ngaahi me‘a ‘oku kau ki he ‘Otua.
45015018	Seuke, tala‘ehai te u kākunga ke lea ki ha me‘a ‘a ia na‘e ‘ikai ngāue‘aki au ‘e Kalaisi ‘i hono lava, ‘i he‘ene fakatalangofua ‘a e Senitaile:
45015019	ka teu lea pē ki he me‘a kuo ne fai‘aki au ki ai, ‘i he lea mo e ngāue, ‘o tu‘u ‘i he ivi ‘o e ngaahi mana, mo e ngaahi me‘a fakaofo, pea ‘i he ivi ‘o e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni; ko ia, kuo ‘osiki ‘a e Kōsipeli ‘o Kalaisi mei Selusalema mo e feitu‘u ko ia, ‘o a‘u ki ‘Ililikumi.
45015020	Ka na‘e pehē ‘eku fai; na‘a ku tokanga ke ‘oua na‘a ku malanga‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli ‘i he ngaahi potu kuo hu‘ekina ai ‘a e huafa ‘o Kalaisi, telia na‘a ku langa ‘i ha tu‘unga kuo ‘ai ‘e ha taha kehe.
45015021	Ka na‘a ku tokanga ke fai ‘o hangē ko e me‘a ‘i he folofola, Ko kinautolu na‘e ‘ikai te nau ma‘u ha ongoongo kiate ia Te nau sio; Ko kinautolu kuo te‘eki ke nau fanongo kiate ia Te nau ‘ilo.
45015022	Ko ia ai, foki, na‘e fa‘a ta‘ofi ai ‘eku ‘alu atu kiate kimoutolu.
45015023	Ka ‘i he taimi ni ‘oku ‘ikai kei toe haku feitu‘u ‘i he ngaahi potu ko eni; pea kuo lahi ta‘u mo ‘eku holi ke ‘a‘ahi kiate kimoutolu ‘i he fai ‘o ha‘aku fononga ki Sēpeni:
45015024	he ‘oku ou ‘amanaki ke fe‘iloaki mo kimoutolu ‘i he‘eku ‘asi atu, pea ke ai haku moimoi‘i meiate kimoutolu ki he potu ko ia, ‘oka hili ‘eku ma‘u si‘a fiemālie meiate kimoutolu.
45015025	Ka ko ‘eku ‘alu ‘eni ki Selusalema, ko ‘eku ‘ave tokoni ki he kakai lotu.
45015026	He kuo hā lelei ki Masitōnia mo ‘Akeia ke fai ha tānaki tokoni ma‘a e kau lotu ‘i Selusalema ‘oku masiva.
45015027	‘Io, kuo hā lelei kiate kinautolu; kae‘uma‘ā ‘oku nau mo‘ua ki he fa‘ahinga ko ia. He kapau kuo ‘inasi ‘a Senitaile ‘i he me‘a fakalaumālie ‘o e fa‘ahinga ko ia, pea ‘oku nau mo‘ua ai ke fai ha fatongia kiate kinautolu ‘i he me‘a fakasino.
45015028	Pea ko ia, ka ‘osi ‘eku fai ia, mo ‘eku sila‘i ‘a e fua ni kiate kinautolu, pea te u foki ‘o ‘alu atu ‘iate kimoutolu ki Sēpeni.
45015029	Pea ‘oku ou ongona, ka u ka ‘alu atu, te u ‘alu atu kuo ‘iate au hono kātoa ‘o e tāpuaki faka-Kalaisi.
45015030	Pea ko eni, ‘oku ou kole atu, kāinga, ‘i hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, pea ‘i he ‘ofa ‘oku mei he Laumālie, ke mou kau mo au ‘i ho‘omou ngaahi lotu, ‘i he fefa‘uhi mo e ‘Otua ‘i hoku hūfia.
45015031	Koe‘uhi ke u hao meiate kinautolu ‘i Siutea ‘oku talangata‘a; pea ke tali lelei ‘e he kau lotu ‘a ‘eku ngāue ni ‘oku ‘ave ki Selusalema.
45015032	Koe‘uhi ke u hoko fiefia atu kiate kimoutolu, ‘oka finangalo ki ai ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘o tau fefakafiemālie‘aki.
45015033	Pea ko e ‘Otua ‘oku ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘a e fakamelino, ‘ofa ke ne ‘iate kimoutolu fuli pē! ‘Ēmeni.
45016001	‘OKU OU fakaongolelei atu ‘a Fīpē, ko si‘otau tokoua lotu, pea ko e fefine akonaki foki ‘i he siasi ‘i Senikelea:
45016002	ke mou tali lelei ia ‘i he ‘Eiki, ‘a ia ‘oku taau mo e kau lotu ke fai; pea ka ai ha me‘a te ne fiema‘u ai ha‘amou tokoni, pea mou poupou ai ia: he ko e toko taha ia kuo ne taukapo‘i ‘a e me‘a ‘a e tokolahi, pea mo au foki.
45016003	Tala hoku ‘ofa kia Pīsila mo ‘Akuila, ko si‘i ongo kaungā ngaue ‘o‘oku ‘i he ngāue ‘a Kalaisi Sīsū:
45016004	ko e ongo me‘a ia na‘a na fakalalango ho‘onaua u‘a ke fakahaofi ‘eku mo‘ui. Tala‘ehai ko au pē ‘oku fakafeta‘i kiate kinaua, ka ‘oku pehē mo e ngaahi siasi kotoa ‘o Senitaile.
45016005	Tala hoku ‘ofa foki ki he siasi ‘oku ‘i hona fale.
45016006	Tala hoku ‘ofa ki si‘oku ‘ofa‘anga ko ‘Epaineto, ‘a ia ko e polopolo ‘o ‘Ēsia kia Kalaisi. Tala hoku ‘ofa kia Mele; ko e fefine ia na‘e lahi ‘ene fakaongosia ma‘amoutolu.
45016007	Tala hoku ‘ofa kia ‘Anitalonaika mo Siunia, ko si‘i ongo kāinga ‘o‘oku, mo si‘i ongo kaunga-nofo-pilīsone mo au; ko e ongo me‘a ia ‘oku tokangaekina ‘i he ha‘oha‘onga ‘o e kau ‘Aposetolo, pea na‘a na tomu‘a Kalisitiane ‘iate au.
45016008	Tala hoku ‘ofa kia ‘Amipeleasi, ko si‘oku ‘ofa‘anga ‘i he lotu.
45016009	Tala hoku ofa kia ‘Uapane, ko e kaungā ngaue ‘otaua ‘i he ngāue ‘a Kalaisi; pea ki si‘oku ‘ofa‘anga ko Sītaki.
45016010	Tala hoku ‘ofa ki si‘i ‘Āpeli, ko e tangata kuo ‘osi-‘a-sivi ‘i he ngāue ‘a e ‘Eiki. Tala hoku ‘ofa kiate kinautolu ‘oku ‘i he ‘api ‘o ‘Alisitopulo.
45016011	Tala hoku ‘ofa ki si‘oku kāinga ko Hēlotioni. Tala hoku ‘ofa kiate kinautolu ‘oku ‘i he ‘api ‘o Nāsiso, ‘a kinautolu kuo lotu.
45016012	Tala hoku ‘ofa kia Talaifina mo Talaifosa, ‘a ia ‘oku na fakafitefita‘a ‘i he ngāue ‘a e ‘Eiki. Tala hoku ‘ofa kia Pēsisi, ko si‘i fefine ‘ofeina; ko e toko taha ia kuo lahi ‘ene fakafitefita‘a ‘i he ngāue ‘a e ‘Eiki.
45016013	Tala hoku ‘ofa kia Lūfusi, ko e tangata taungafili ‘i he lotu; pea ki he‘ene fa‘ē, ‘a ia ko si‘eku fa‘ē foki.
45016014	Tala hoku ‘ofa kia ‘Asinikalaito, mo Felekoni, mo Heamesi, mo Patalopa, mo Heamasi, mo e kāinga ‘oku nofo mo kinautolu.
45016015	Tala hoku ‘ofa kia Filoloko mo Siulia, kia Nīlio foki mo hono tuofefine mo ‘Olimipa, pea ki he kāinga lotu kotoa pē ‘oku nofo mo kinautolu.
45016016	Mou fefekita‘aki ‘aki ha ‘uma tapu. ‘Oku ‘ofa atu ‘a e ngaahi siasi kotoa pē ‘o Kalaisi.
45016017	Ka ‘oku te enginaki atu, kāinga, ke mou vakai ‘a kinautolu ‘oku fakatupu ‘a e ngaahi fakavahavaha‘a mo e ngaahi tūkia‘anga ‘a ia ‘oku fehālaaki mo e tokāteline na‘a mou ako ai; pea mou faka‘ehi‘ehi meiate kinautolu.
45016018	He ko e fa‘ahinga ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai te nau ngāue ki hotau ‘Eiki ko Kalaisi, ka ki ho‘onautolu kete pē; pea ko e me‘a he‘enau lea momole‘olunga, mo ‘enau ngutu melie, ‘oku nau kākaa‘i ‘a e loto ‘o e kakai ‘oku fo‘ou ki he kovi.
45016019	Seuke, ko e me‘a ki ho‘omou talangofua, kuo pavake hono ongoongo ki he kakai kotoa pē: ko ia ‘oku te fiefia ‘iate kimoutolu: ka ‘oku te loto ke mou poto ki he fai lelei, kae vale ki he fai kovi.
45016020	Pea ko e ‘Otua, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘a e fakamelino, ‘e vave ‘ene laiki ‘a Sētane ‘i homou lalo va‘e. Ko e kelesi ‘a hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū, ‘ofa ke ‘iate kimoutolu ia!
45016021	‘Oku ‘ofa atu ‘a Tīmote, ko si‘oku kaungā ngāue, kae‘uma‘ā si‘oku kāinga ko Lūsio, mo Sēsoni, mo Sosipeta.
45016022	‘Oku ou ‘ofa atu ‘i he ‘Eiki ‘e au Teasio na‘a ku tohi ‘a e ‘ipiseli ni.
45016023	‘Oku ‘ofa atu ‘a Keio, ‘a ia ‘oku ne tauhi kiate au, pea ki he siasi kātoa. ‘Oku ‘ofa atu ‘a ‘Elasito ko e sētuata fakakolo; pea mo si‘i kāinga ko Kuato.
45016024	Ko e kelesi ‘a hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi ke ‘iate kimoutolu kotoa. ‘Ēmeni.
45016025	Pea ko ‘Ene ‘Afio, ‘a ia ‘oku ne mafai ke poupou kimoutolu ‘i ho‘omou fou ‘i he ‘alunga ‘o ‘eku Kōsipeli, mo e me‘a kuo fanongonongo ‘e Sīsū Kalaisi; ‘io, ‘i he ‘alunga ‘o ha tala mei he Ta‘ehāmai, ko e tala ‘o ha misiteli ne fufū mei he ngaahi kuonga ‘o ‘ītāniti ka kuo fakae‘a ‘i onopooni.
45016026	Pea fakahā ‘i he ngaahi tohi palofisai; ‘o fakatatau ki he tu‘utu‘uni ‘a e ‘Otua ‘o ‘ītāniti, koe‘uhi ke ai ha tuitala ki he lotu ‘i he fa‘ahinga fuli pē
45016027	–‘io, ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘oku hā ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū, ko e ‘Otua ‘oku ‘a‘ana toko taha ‘a e poto–‘ē, ke ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘a e Kolōlia ‘o lauikuonga! ‘Ēmeni.
46001001	TŪ KO KIMAUA–‘a Paula ko e ‘Aposetolo ‘a Sīsū Kalaisi, na‘e ui ki he lakanga ko ia ‘i he tu‘utu‘uni ‘a e ‘Otua, pea mo si‘i kāinga ko Sositene–
46001002	Ko ‘ema tohi ki he siasi ‘a e ‘Otua–‘a e kakai na‘e fakatapu ma‘ana ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū–‘a e siasi ‘i Kolinito, ‘a e kakai ne fakaului ki he fa‘ahinga tapu; pea ‘ilonga ha potu ‘oku ‘omoutolu mo kimaua, ‘oku kau ‘ema tohi kiate kinautolu ‘i he potu ko ia, ‘a ia ‘oku nau lotu ki he huafa ‘o hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi.
46001003	‘Ofa ke mou ma‘u kelesi mo e fiemālie mei he ‘Otua ko ‘etau Tamai; mo e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi.
46001004	‘Oku ou fakafeta‘i ma‘u ai pē ki hoku ‘Otua ‘iate kimoutolu, ko e me‘a ‘i he kelesi ‘a e ‘Otua kuo foaki atu ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū;
46001005	koe‘uhi ‘oku alaisia alaikolonga homou fakakoloa ‘iate ia, ‘o mou ma‘u kotoa ‘a e ngaahi faiva lea mo e ngaahi faiva poto foki;
46001006	‘o taau mo ‘ene fu‘u o‘o ‘a e fakamatala ‘o Kalaisi ‘iate kimoutolu.
46001007	Ko ia, ‘oku ‘ikai te mou tōmui ‘i ha ni‘ihi ‘i ha kelesi ‘e taha; ‘o mou nofo ‘amanaki ki he fakapū mai ‘o hotau ‘Eiki ko Kalaisi:
46001008	‘a ia foki te ne poupou kimoutolu, ‘o a‘u ki he ngata‘anga, ke ta‘elau‘i kimoutolu ‘i he ‘aho ‘o hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi.
46001009	Ko e ‘Otua ko e toko taha ia ‘oku fai ki he‘ene lea, pea ko ia ia na‘e fou mei ai homou tala ko e kau tangata mo Hono ‘Alo ko Sīsū Kalaisi ko hotau ‘Eiki.
46001010	Ka ‘oku te kole atu, kāinga, ‘i he huafa ‘o hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, ke mou lea taha pē kotoa pē, pea ke ‘oua te mou fakafa‘afa‘ahi: kaekehe, ke mou ma‘opo‘opo, ‘o loto taha mo fakakaukau taha.
46001011	He kuo u ma‘u talanoa kiate kimoutolu, si‘oku kāinga, mei he fāmili ‘o Koloi, tokua ‘oku ‘i ai ha ngaahi fetu‘usi ‘iate kimoutolu.
46001012	‘O pehē, tokaange hamou taha ‘oku ne pehē, ‘Oku ‘o Paula au; pea ko e taha, ‘Oku ‘o ‘Āpolosi au; pea ko e taha, ‘Oku ‘o Kīfasi au; pea ko e taha, ‘Oku ‘o Kalaisi pē au.
46001013	Kuo vahevahe koā ‘a Kalaisi? He na‘e kalusefai ‘a Paula koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu, ‘ō? pe na‘e papitaiso kimoutolu ki he hingoa ‘o Paula?
46001014	Mālō mo e ‘Otua na‘e ‘ikai te u papitaiso hamou toko taha, ngata pē ‘ia Kalisipo mo Keio.
46001015	Tā ko e fai pē ke ‘oua na‘a lau ‘e ha taha, na‘a mou papitaiso ki he hingoa ‘o‘oku.
46001016	‘Io, na‘a ku papitaiso foki mo e fale ‘o Setivena: hei‘ilo pe na‘e ai mo ha taha na‘a ku papitaiso.)
46001017	He na‘e ‘ikai fekau au ‘e Kalaisi ke fai papitaiso, ka ke malanga‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli: ‘o ‘ikai ke fai ia ‘i he poto ‘o e tokāteline, na‘a hoko ‘o ma‘ama‘a ai ‘a e Kolosi ‘o Kalaisi.
46001018	He ko e tokāteline ‘o e Kolosi ko e me‘a ngali vale ia ki he kakai ‘oku fakatau ki mala; ka ki he kakai ‘oku fakatau ki he mo‘ui, hangē ko kitaua, ko e ivi ia ‘o e ‘Otua.
46001019	He kuo tohi, Te u faka‘auha ‘a e poto ‘o e kau poto, Pea te u fakaikunoa ‘a e ‘ilo ‘a e kau ‘ilo‘ilo.
46001020	He koma‘ā ia ‘a e tama poto faka-e-maama ko eni? koma‘ā ia hono tama Lāpai? Koma‘ā ia hono tama filōsefa? ‘Ikai kuo fakaikulaunoa ‘e he ‘Otua ‘a e poto ‘o māmani.
46001021	He ‘i he ‘iloange, ‘i he fai‘aki ‘a e poto ‘o e ‘Otua, na‘e ‘ikai lave‘i ‘a e ‘Otua ‘e māmani ‘aki ‘enau poto, na‘e toki finangalo ‘a e ‘Otua ke fai‘aki ‘a e me‘a ngali vale ko ia ‘i he‘emau malanga ke fakamo‘ui ‘a e kakai ‘oku tui.
46001022	Tala ‘e he Siu ke ‘omi ha ngaahi mana, tangi ‘e he Kalisi ki ha me‘a ‘oku ngali poto;
46001023	ka ka malanga‘aki ‘e kimautolu ha Kalaisi kuo kalusefai, ‘a ia ko e tūkia‘anga leva ki he Siu, pea ko e koto vale ki he Senitaile;
46001024	ka ki he kakai ko ia, ‘a e kakai kuo ne fili, pe ‘oku nau Siu pe Kalisi, ko e Kalaisi ko ia ko e ‘Ivi ‘o e ‘Otua, mo e Poto ‘o e ‘Otua.
46001025	He ko e me‘a ‘a e ‘Otua ‘oku ngali vale, ‘oku poto ia ‘i he kakai; pea ko e me‘a ‘a e ‘Otua ‘oku ngali vaivai, ‘oku mālohi ia ‘i he kakai.
46001026	He vakai ‘a e ui ‘omoutolu, kāinga. Tala‘ehai ko hamou tokolahi koni poto fakakakano; tala‘ehai ko e tokolahi koni mālohi; tala‘ehai ko e tokolahi koni hou‘eiki.
46001027	Kehe, kuo fili ‘e he ‘Otua ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘o māmani ‘oku vale ke fakamaa‘i ‘a e kau poto; pea kuo fili ‘e he ‘Otua ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘o māmani ‘oku vaivai ke fakamaa‘i ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku mālohi;
46001028	pea ko e ngaahi me‘a fākatu‘a ‘o māmani, mo e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ta‘etoka‘i, ‘io, ko e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ‘ikai ko ha me‘a, kuo fili ia ‘e he ‘Otua ke fakanoa‘i ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku lau ko e me‘a:
46001029	koe‘uhiā ke tuku ‘ene pōlepole ‘e he kakano kotoa pē ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e ‘Otua.
46001030	He ‘oku mei He‘ene ‘Afio ho‘omou tu‘u ni pea ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū: ‘a ia kuo fokotu‘u mei he ‘Otua, ko hotau poto‘anga, ko hotau fakatonuhia mo fakamā‘oni‘oni‘anga, pea mo hotau huhu‘i.
46001031	Koe‘uhiā ke hoko ‘o hangē ko e tohi, Ko ia ‘oku vīkiviki, ke ne vīkiviki ‘i he ‘Eiki.
46002001	PEHĒ, kāinga, ‘i he‘eku ‘alu atu ‘a‘aku ke malanga‘aki ‘a e ngāue ‘a e ‘Otua, na‘e ‘ikai tu‘unga ‘eku ‘alu ko e pehē ‘oku ‘i ai ha‘aku tokāteline, pe poto, ‘oku fisifisimu‘a.
46002002	He na‘e ‘ikai te u tu‘utu‘uni mo ha me‘a ke u ‘ilo ki ai ‘i homou lotolotonga, ko Sīsū Kalaisi pē, pea na‘a mo ia ko hono kalusefai pē.
46002003	Pehē foki ‘i he‘eku feangai ‘a‘aku mo kimoutolu, na‘a ku vaivai mo manavasi‘i, pea lahi ‘eku tailiili.
46002004	Pea ko ‘eku akonaki, kae‘uma‘ā ‘eku malanga, na‘e ‘ikai fai‘aki ‘a e ngaahi lea fakaoleole ‘o e poto; ka na‘e fai‘aki ‘a e fakamo‘oni ‘e he Laumālie mo e Māfimafi;
46002005	koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a tu‘u ho‘omou lotu ‘i he poto ‘o e tangata, ka ‘i he māfimafi ‘o e ‘Otua.
46002006	Ka ‘oku ‘i ai ha poto ‘oku mau lea ki ai ‘i he fai kiate kinautolu ‘oku matu‘otu‘a. Ka ko ha poto ia ‘oku ‘ikai fakaemaama ko eni, ‘uma‘ā ha‘ane fakaehou‘eiki ‘o e maama ko eni, ‘a kinautolu ‘oku fakatau ke noa.
46002007	Ka ko e me‘a ‘oku mau lea fakamisiteli ki ai, ko e poto ‘o e ‘Otua, ‘a ia ne fakafufū, ‘a ia foki na‘e sinaki teuteu ‘e he ‘Otua ‘i he te‘eki ha kuonga mo‘otau fakalāngilangi‘i:
46002008	ka ko e me‘a kuo te‘eki ke lave‘i ‘e ha taha ‘o e hou‘eiki fakaemaama ko eni: he ka ne nau lave‘i ia, tala‘ehai ne nau kalusefai ‘a e ‘Eiki ‘oku ‘a‘ana ‘a e lāngilangi.
46002009	Ka na‘e mo‘oni pē ‘a e lau ‘a e Tohi, Ko e ngaahi me‘a kuo ‘ikai mātā ‘e ha mata, pe fanongoa ‘e ha telinga, pe ake ki he loto ‘o ha tangata; ‘io, ‘a e ngaahi fu‘u me‘a kuo teuteu ‘e he ‘Otua ma‘a e kakai ‘oku ‘ofa kiate ia–
46002010	ka ko e ngaahi me‘a ko ia, kuo faka‘ilo ‘e he ‘Otua kiate kimautolu ‘i hono Laumālie: he ko e Laumālie ‘oku ne hakule ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē, ‘io, ‘a e ngaahi loloto ‘o e ‘Otua.
46002011	He ko e fe‘ia ha tangata ‘oku ne ‘ilo ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘a ha tangata? ngata pē ‘i he laumālie ‘o e tangata, ‘a e laumālie ‘oku ‘i he toko taha ko ia. Pehē foki, kuo ‘ikai lave‘i ‘e ha taha ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘a e ‘Otua, ngata pē ‘i he Laumālie ‘o e ‘Otua.
46002012	Pea tala‘ehai ko e laumālie ‘oku ‘o māmani kuo mau ma‘u, ka ko e Laumālie ‘oku ha‘u mei he ‘Otua; koe‘uhi ke mau ‘ilo ‘a e ngaahi me‘a kuo me‘a‘ofa ‘aki mai ‘e he ‘Otua.
46002013	‘A ia ‘oku mau fakamatala foki ki ai; kae ‘ikai ‘i he ngaahi lea ‘oku ako mai ‘e he poto ‘o e tangata, ka ko ia ‘oku ako mai ‘e he Laumālie; ‘o mau faka‘uhinga ‘a e me‘a fakalaumālie ki he kau fakalaumālie.
46002014	Ka ko e tangata ‘oku anga fakakakano ‘oku ‘ikai te ne tali ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘o e Laumālie ‘o e ‘Otua: seuke, ko e koto vale ia kiate ia; pea ‘oku ‘ikai te ne ala tali, koe‘uhi ‘oku fakalaumālie hono ‘ilo‘i.
46002015	Ka ko ia ‘oku anga fakalaumālie ‘oku alaisia alaikolonga ‘ene fakaanga; ka tala‘ehai ‘oku fakaanga ki he toko taha ko ia ‘e ha taha kehe.
46002016	He hono ai ha taha kuo ne a‘usia ‘a e finangalo ‘o e ‘Eiki, koe‘uhi ke ne fale‘i ia?: pea ‘oku ‘iate kimautolu ‘a e finangalo ‘o Kalaisi.
46003001	PEHĒ foki, kāinga, na‘e ‘ikai te u lava ke lea kiate kimoutolu, ‘o hangē ki ha kau fakalaumālie; kae hangē pē ki ha kakai na‘e kakano ‘atā; ‘io, ‘o hangē ha kau valevale ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū.
46003002	Ko e hu‘akau ia na‘a ku fafanga ‘aki kimoutolu, na‘e ‘ikai ko e me‘akai mālohi: he kuo te‘eki ke mou makalohi. ‘Io, na‘a mo ‘eni kuo te‘eki ke mou maka lohi: he ‘oku mou kei fakakakano.
46003003	Seuke, he kapau leva ‘oku ‘iate kimoutolu ‘a e meheka mo e fetu‘usi, ‘ikai ‘oku mou fakakakano, pea laka fakaetangata pē?
46003004	He ka lau ‘e hamou taha, ‘Oku ‘o Paula au; kae pehē ‘e ha taha kehe, ‘Oku ‘o ‘Āpolosi au; ‘ikai ko ho‘omou fakaetangata pē?
46003005	Pea ko e hā ai ‘a ‘Āpolosi? Pea ko e hā ai ‘a Paula? Ko e ongo sevāniti pē, ‘a ia na‘e fou ai ho‘omou lotu; pea na‘a mo ia, ko ‘ena ‘ange pē kiate kimoutolu takitaha, ‘o fakatatau ki he me‘a kuo ‘omi ‘e he ‘Eiki.
46003006	Na‘e ‘a‘aku ‘a e tō, na‘e ‘a ‘Āpolosi ‘a e fakaviviku; kae ‘a e ‘Otua ai pē ‘a e fakatupu.
46003007	Ko ia, tala‘ehai ko ha me‘a ia ‘a ia ‘oku fai ‘a e tō, pe ko ia ‘oku fai ‘a e fakaviviku; ka ko ia pē ‘oku fakatupu, ‘a ia ko e ‘Otua.
46003008	Pea ko eni, ko e tō mo e fakaviviku ‘oku na fa‘ahinga, ka ‘e ma‘u takitaha ‘ene totongi ‘a‘ana, ‘o fakatatau ki he‘ene kikivi ‘a‘ana.
46003009	He ko e ongo kaungā ngaue kimaua mo e ‘Otua: ko kimoutolu ko e ngoue‘anga ‘a e ‘Otua, ko e fale ‘o e ‘Otua ‘oku langa.
46003010	Ko au, ‘i he‘eku fai‘aki ‘a e kelesi ‘a e ‘Otua na‘a ne ‘omi, ne u ‘ai ‘a e makatu‘unga, ‘o taau mo ha tufunga poto, ka ko e langa hake ‘oku fai ‘e ha taha kehe. Ka ke takitaha tokanga ki he anga ‘o ‘ene langa.
46003011	He ko e me‘a ki he maka tu‘unga, tala‘ehai ‘e lava ‘e ha taha ke ‘ai mo ha tu‘unga kehe, ka ko ia pē ne toka ‘ai, ‘a ia ko Sīsū Kalaisi.
46003012	Pea ka fai ‘e ha taha ‘ene langa ‘i he tu‘unga ko ia, ‘o ne langa koula, siliva, maka mahu‘inga, ‘akau, musie, pe veve;
46003013	‘e faifai pea e‘a ‘a e ngāue ‘a e tangata takitaha: he ‘e sivi ia ‘e he ‘Aho Lahi, koe‘uhi ko ‘ene hoko mai mo e afi; pea ‘e sivi ‘e he afi ko ia ‘a e ngāue ‘a e tangata takitaha, pe kuo fēfē.
46003014	Kapau ‘e tu‘u ‘a e ngafa ‘a ha taha ‘i he langa fale, te ne ma‘u totongi.
46003015	Kapau ‘e vela ‘o ‘auha ‘ene ngafa me‘a, ‘e mole ‘ene totongi, ka te ne hao ‘e ia; kae hangē ha hao mei he loto afi.
46003016	‘Oku ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo koā ko e temipale ‘o e ‘Otua ‘a kimoutolu, pea ‘oku fale ‘iate kimoutolu ‘e he Laumālie ‘o e ‘Otua?
46003017	Ka maumau ‘e ha taha ‘a e temipale ‘o e ‘Otua, ‘e maumau ‘e he ‘Otua ‘a e toko taha ko ia; he ko e temipale ‘o e ‘Otua ‘oku toputapu; pehē foki mo kimoutolu.
46003018	Ke ‘oua na‘a kākaa‘i ha taha ‘e ia. Ka ai ha taha ‘oku ne ‘afungi ko e poto ia ‘iate kimoutolu faka-e-maama ko eni, ke ne hoko mu‘a ko e vale, ka ne toki poto.
46003019	He ko e poto ‘o e maama ko eni, ko e koto vale ia ‘i he vakai ‘a e ‘Otua. He kuo tohi, ‘Oku ne pō ‘a e kau poto ‘i he fai olopoto ‘anautolu.
46003020	Pea ko e potu tohi ‘e taha ‘oku pehē, Ko e me‘a ‘a e ‘Eiki ki he ngaahi fifili ‘a e kau poto, Ko e koto launoa ia.
46003021	Ko ia, ke ‘oua na‘a vīkiviki ‘e ha taha ‘i ha tangata, he ko ho‘omou me‘a ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē–
46003022	‘a Paula, ‘a ‘Āpolosi, ‘a Kīfasi; ‘a e māmani, ‘a e mo‘ui, ‘a e mate; ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku lolotonga ni, ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ka hoko mai; ‘io, ko e me‘a kotoa pē ‘oku ‘amoutolu:
46003023	ka ko kimoutolu ko e me‘a ‘a Kalaisi, pea ko Kalaisi ko e me‘a ‘a e ‘OTUA.
46004001	KO eni ‘a e lau ke fai ‘e he kakai kiate kimautolu, Ko e kau Tokoni pē ‘o Kalaisi, pea ko e kau Sētuata ‘o e ngaahi misiteli ‘o e ‘Otua.
46004002	‘Oku fai ‘i heni foki ‘a e sivi ‘o e kau sētuata; koe‘uhi ke hā ‘a e faitotonu ‘a ha taha.
46004003	Ka ko kita, ‘oku ma‘ama‘a ‘aupito kiate au hoku sivi ‘e kimoutolu, pe ko e fakamaau ‘o eni: ‘io, na‘a mo kita, ‘oku ‘ikai te te sivi kita.
46004004	He neongo ‘oku ‘ikai te te ‘ilo ha me‘a kiate kita; ka ‘oku ‘ikai te te falala ki ai kuo u tonuhia; ka ko ia ‘oku ‘a‘ana hoku sivi ko e ‘Eiki.
46004005	Ko ia, ‘oua te mou fakapapau ha me‘a, ‘i he te‘eki hoko hono kuonga. ‘Oua ke hoko mai ‘a e ‘Eiki, ‘a ia te ne huluhulu ‘a e ngaahi me‘a na‘e fufū ‘i he po‘uli, pea te ne ‘ai ke e‘a ‘a e ngaahi fakakaukau ‘o e ngaahi loto: pea ‘e toki ma‘u takitaha mei he ‘Otua hono fakamālō totonu.
46004006	Pea ko e ngaahi me‘a ko eni, kāinga, kuo u hiki ‘o ‘ai kiate au pea mo ‘Āpolosi, telia kimoutolu; ko e ‘uhi ke me‘a ako ‘aki kimaua kiate kimoutolu, ‘o mou lava‘i ‘a e fo‘i akonaki ko eni, Ke ‘oua na‘a hulu atu ‘i he me‘a kuo tohi; ka mou tuku ho‘omou ‘afungi, mo ho‘omou kauhaki‘i ha taha ke fakasīkaka‘i ha taha kehe.
46004007	Pea ko ho‘o makehe atu na, ko e ngāue ‘a hai? he ‘oku ‘i ai ha‘o me‘a na‘e ‘ikai foaki? Pea kapau leva ko ho‘o ma‘u foaki, ko e hā ‘oku ke pōlepole ai, ‘o hangē ko e toko taha kuo ne ma‘u ‘iate ia pē?
46004008	Tā kuo mou mākona leva! tā kuo mou koloa‘ia leva! tā kuo mou hoko ‘o tu‘i, ‘o laka ‘iate kimaua! Seuke, taumaiā kuo mo‘oni ho‘omou tu‘i na, hei‘ilo te ma kaungā tu‘i foki fakataha mo kimoutolu!
46004009	He ‘oku matamata kiate au kuo fakatakataka ‘aki ‘e he ‘Otua ‘a kimautolu ‘Aposetolo, ke hā ko e kakai taupotu ki lalo–‘o hangē tofu pē ko ha kau fakamāumatea, ko e me‘a ke māta‘i ‘e he ‘univeesi, ‘e he kau ‘āngelo mo e kakai.
46004010	Ko kimautolu ko e vale tokua, koe‘uhi ko Kalaisi, ka ko e pōtopoto‘i faka-Kalaisi ‘a kimoutolu; ko kimautolu ko e vaivai, ka ko kimoutolu ko e kau mālohi; ongoongo kimoutolu, kae ta‘etoka‘i kimautolu.
46004011	Na‘a mo e houa ni, pea ‘oku ‘ikai ko e toki me‘a, ‘oku mau masiva me‘akai, masiva me‘a inu, masiva kofu; ‘oku tautekovia kimautolu, ‘oku mau hēhē tu‘u pē, ‘oku mau ongosia he tauala mo‘omau tauhi;
46004012	ka ngaohia kimautolu ‘oku mau tali ‘aki ha tāpuaki; ka fakatanga‘i, ‘oku mau ‘ūkuma pē; ka lau‘ikovia ‘oku mau tali fakaoleole:
46004013	ko ‘emau nofo ‘o a‘u ki he taimi ni, ‘oku hangē tofu pē ko e tu‘unga ‘oto‘ota ‘o māmani kimautolu, ko e ‘ananga ‘o e ‘uli kotoa.
46004014	‘Oku ‘ikai te u tohi pehē ko ha‘aku fakamaa‘i kimoutolu; ka ko si‘eku na‘ina‘i ki he fānau ‘oku ou ‘ofa ki ai.
46004015	He neongo e toko mano ho‘omou kau faiako ‘i he mo‘ui faka-Kalaisi, ka tala‘ehai ‘oku tokolahi ho‘omou ngaahi tamai: pea ko au ia na‘a ku fakatupu kimoutolu ‘i he mo‘ui faka-Sīsū-Kalaisi ‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli.
46004016	Ko ia ‘oku ou kole atu, ke mou hoko ko e kau fa‘ifa‘itaki kiate au.
46004017	Ko hono ‘uhinga ia kuo u tuku atu ‘a Tīmote, ‘a ia ko hoku foha ‘oku ou ‘ofa ai, pea ko e tōnunga ‘i he ngāue ‘a e ‘Eiki; pea te ne fakamanatu kiate kimoutolu ‘eku tō‘onga ‘i he mo‘ui faka-Kalaisi, ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ou enginaki ‘aki ‘i he ngaahi siasi ‘i he ngaahi potu kehekehe.
46004018	Tokua na‘e ‘i ai homou ni‘ihi na‘e mofuta hake ko e ‘ikai te u ‘alu atu ‘e au.
46004019	Ka te u ‘alu atu pē ‘o vave, ‘o kapau ‘e finangalo ki ai ‘a e ‘Eiki; pea te u toki ‘eke ‘o ‘ilo, ‘o ‘ikai ki he me‘a ‘oku lau ‘e he kau mofuta na, ka ki he ivi ‘oku nau fai‘aki.
46004020	He ko e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua ‘oku ‘ikai ke tu‘u ‘i he lau ka ‘i he ivi.
46004021	Ko e hā homou loto? ka u ‘alu atu mo e me‘a kinisi? pe te u ‘alu atu mo e ‘ofa, pea laolao foki ‘a e Laumālie.
46005001	TĀ ‘oku kātaki pē ‘a e fe‘auaki ‘iate kimoutolu, kae‘uma‘ā ko e fe‘auaki ‘oku taha ‘ana, na‘a mo e hīteni ‘e ‘ikai te nau kātaki ha me‘a pehē, ‘a ia ko e mali ‘e ha tangata mo ha fefine ‘oku nonofo mo ‘ene tamai.
46005002	Ka mou fai ai pē ho‘omou ‘afungi na; ka na‘a mou mei fakamamahi mu‘a, kae iku ki he kapusi meiate kimoutolu ‘a e tangata kuo ne fai ha ngāue pehē.
46005003	Ka ko e me‘a kiate au, seuke, neongo ‘oku mama‘o hoku sino, ka ‘oku ‘ikai mama‘o hoku loto: pea kuo u fakamaau ‘a e me‘a, ‘o hangē kuo u ‘i hena. Pea ko ‘eku tu‘utu‘uni ‘eni ki he siana kuo ne fai ha fu‘u me‘a pango pehē–
46005004	‘I HE HUAFA ‘O HOTAU ‘EIKI KO SĪSŪ. Ke mou fai ho‘omou fakataha, pea ‘e ‘iate kimoutolu hoku loto, kuo ma‘u ‘a e ivi ‘o hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi;
46005005	pea ‘e tukuange ‘a e toko taha pehē kia Sētane; koe‘uhi ke faka‘auha hono anga kakano, hei‘ilo ‘e haofaki hono anga Laumālie ‘i he ‘aho ‘o e ‘Eiki.
46005006	‘Oku ‘ikai sia‘a ‘a e me‘a ‘oku mou pōlepole ai. ‘Ikai ‘oku mou ‘ilo, ka lave ha me‘i lēvani ki he takaonga mā, tā ‘oku lēvani hono kotoa?
46005007	‘Ē, mou tafi kitu‘a ‘a e lēvani mu‘a, ka mou hoko ko e takaonga ngaohi fo‘ou; ‘o taau mo homou tu‘unga, ko e ngaahi fo‘i mā ta‘elēvani; pea ‘āsili he kuo feia foki hotau Pāsova, ko Kalaisi:
46005008	ko ia ke tau fai ‘a e kātoanga; kae‘oua na‘a tau fai‘aki ‘a e lēvani mu‘a, ‘uma‘ā ‘a e lēvani ko e loto kovi mo e ngāue pango; ka tau fai‘aki ‘a e me‘a ta‘elēvani, ko e ma‘a mo e mo‘oni.
