46005009	Ne u tohi atu ‘i he‘eku ‘ipiseli, ke ‘oua te mou fe‘iloaki mo e kakai ‘oku fe‘auaki.
46005010	Ka na‘e ‘ikai ko e ta‘ofi ‘aupito mei he fe‘iloaki mo e kakai fakamaama ‘oku fe‘auaki, pe ‘oku mānumanu mo fai fakamālohi, pe ‘oku lotu ki he ‘aitoli: he ka ne ko ‘eku tu‘utu‘uni ia, tā ko e hiki mei māmani ‘e fai.
46005011	Ka ko eni pē ‘a e me‘a na‘a ku tohi atu: ka ai ha toko taha ‘i he kau lotu ‘oku fe‘auaki, pe mānumanu, pe lotu ki he ‘aitoli, pe kapekape, pe fa‘a konā, pe fai fakamālohi, ke ‘oua te mou fe‘iloaki mo ha toko taha pehē, ‘io, pea ‘oua na‘a keinanga mo ia.
46005012	He ko ‘eku me‘a ke fakamaau ‘a e kakai ‘o tua‘ā? ‘ikai ko e kakai ‘o loto‘ā pē ‘oku ‘amoutolu hono fakamāu‘i? ka ko e kakai ‘o tua‘ā ‘oku ‘i he ‘Otua ia.
46005013	Kehe pē ke mou kapusi ‘a e tangata fai kovi meiate kimoutolu.
46006001	UOI! ‘oku ‘i ai koā hamou toko taha ‘oku pehē fau ‘ene fiematamu‘a, ke ‘ave ‘ene me‘a mo ha taha ‘o fakamonū ki he fa‘ahinga ta‘efaitotonu, ‘o ‘ikai fakamaau ki he kakai lotu?
46006002	Tā ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo ‘apē ‘e fakamaau ‘a māmani ‘e he kakai lotu? ‘Io, pea kapau ‘e fakamaau ‘a māmani ‘i homou ‘ao, ‘oku mou ta‘etaau koā ke fai ha fanga ki‘i fakamaau pehē?
46006003	‘Ikai ‘oku mou ‘ilo ‘e ‘ataua ‘a e fakamaau ‘o ha kau ‘āngelo? Huanoa ha ngaahi me‘a fakamaama?
46006004	Pea ka ‘oku pehē, pea kapau ‘oku ‘i ai ha‘amou me‘a fakamaama ke fakamaau, pea ko hai fua ha ni‘ihi ‘i he siasi ‘oku ta‘etoka‘i, ‘ē, fakanofo kinautolu ki ai.
46006005	‘Oku ou lea pehē ko homou fakamaa‘i. He ‘oku pehē koā ho‘omou masiva kakai poto? ‘Oku ‘ikai koā ha taha te ne lava ke fakamaau ‘a e me‘a ‘a si‘ono tokoua lotu?
46006006	Ka ko eni ‘oku tala hopo ‘a e tangata lotu ki hono tokoua lotu, kae‘uma‘ā ko e pehē ke fakamaau ki ha ni‘ihi ‘oku ‘ikai lotu.
46006007	Seuke, ko e ‘i ai ha momo‘i lau fakamaau ‘iate kimoutolu, ko e mātu‘aki holomui ‘ata ‘atā ia. Ko e hā ‘oku ‘ikai ai te mou fie kātaki mu‘a ‘a e ngāue ta‘etotonu kuo fai mai? Ko e hā ‘oku ‘ikai te mou fie kātaki ai mu‘a homou fakamālohia?
46006008	Ka ko eni ko kimoutolu ia ‘oku ngāue ta‘etotonu, mo fai fakamālohi, pea ko e fai ia foki ki homou ngaahi tokoua.
46006009	Tā ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo ‘apē, ka ‘ilonga ha ni‘ihi ‘oku ngāue ta‘etotonu, ‘e ‘ikai hanau tofi‘a ‘i he Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua? ‘Oua na‘a tuku ke kākaa‘i kimoutolu: ‘oku ‘ikai ha fe‘auaki, pe ha lotu ki he ‘aitoli, pe ha tono ‘unoho, pe ha mo‘ui fakapelepele, pe ha fai faka-Sōtoma,
46006010	pe ha kaiha‘a, pe ha mānumanu, pe ha fa‘a konā, pe ha kapekape, pe ha fai fakamālohi, te ne ma‘u tofi‘a ‘i he Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua.
46006011	Pea na‘e pehē ‘a homou ni‘ihi: ka na‘a mou fufulu kimoutolu, ka na‘e fakaului kimoutolu ki he fa‘ahinga tapu, ka na‘e ngaohi kimoutolu ko e kau angatonu ‘i he huafa ‘o e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, pea ‘aki ‘a e Laumālie ‘o hotau ‘Otua.
46006012	Ko e me‘a kotoa pē ‘oku ngofua kia kita, ka ‘oku ‘ikai ‘aonga kotoa pē: pea ‘oku ‘a‘ata ke fa‘iteliha ki he me‘a kotoa pē, ka ‘e ‘ikai te te tuku ke fa‘iteliha ha me‘a ‘e taha kiate kita.
46006013	Ko e ngaahi me‘akai ‘oku ma‘a e fatu, pea ko e fatu ‘oku ma‘a e ngaahi me‘akai; pea ‘e fakata‘e‘aonga ‘e he ‘Otua ‘a ē mo ē. Ka ko e sino ‘oku ‘ikai ma‘a e fe‘auaki, ka ‘oku ma‘a e ‘Eiki; pea ko e ‘Eiki ‘oku ma‘a e sino.
46006014	Pea na‘e fakatoetu‘u ‘e he ‘Otua ‘a e ‘Eiki, pea te ne fakatoetu‘u foki ‘a kitaua ‘i he māfimafi ‘a‘ana.
46006015	‘Ikai ‘oku mou ‘ilo, ko homou ngaahi sino, ko e ngaahi kupu ia ‘o Kalaisi? Pea ka ko ia, pea u hae koā ‘a e ngaahi kupu ‘o Kalaisi, ‘o u ‘ai ko ha ngaahi kupu ‘o ha fe‘auaki? Molekemama‘o!
46006016	‘Io, ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo koā, ko ia ‘oku pīkitai ki ha fe‘auaki ‘oku ne fo‘i sino pē mo ia? he ‘oku ne folofola mai, ‘E hoko ‘a e toko ua ko e kakano pē ‘e taha.
46006017	Pea ko ia ‘oku ne pīkitai ki he ‘Eiki ‘oku ne fo‘i laumālie pē mo ia.
46006018	‘Ē, hola pē mei he fai fe‘auaki. Ko e fa‘ahinga angahala kehekehe ‘oku fai ‘e ha tangata, ‘oku ‘i tu‘a sino ia; ka ko ia ‘oku ne fe‘auaki ‘oku ‘asi tonu ‘ene angahala ‘i hono sino ‘o‘ona.
46006019	‘Io, ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo koā ko homou sino takitaha ko e temipale ‘o e ‘afio ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni ‘iate kimoutolu, ‘a ia kuo hoko kiate kimoutolu mei he ‘Otua? pea ‘oku ‘ikai ‘amoutolu ‘a kimoutolu?
46006020	He na‘e fakatau kimoutolu ‘aki ha totongi. ‘Ē, mou fakaongoongolelei ‘a e ‘Otua ‘i ho‘omou me‘a fakasino.
46007001	KA koe‘uhi ko e ngaahi me‘a na‘a mou tohi ki ai– ‘Oku lelei ki ha tangata ke ‘oua ‘e ala ki ha fefine.
46007002	Ka ko e me‘a ‘i he lahi ‘o e fe‘auaki, ke takitaha ma‘u hano uaifi ‘o‘ona, pea ma‘u takitaha foki ‘e he fefine hono husepāniti totonu.
46007003	Ke fai ange ‘e he husepāniti ki hono uaifi ‘a e tō‘onga totonu; pea pehē foki ‘a e uaifi ki hono husepāniti.
46007004	‘Oku ‘ikai ‘a e uaifi ke fa‘iteliha ki hono sino ‘o‘ona, ka ko hono husepāniti pē: pehē foki, ‘oku ‘ikai ‘a e husepāniti ke fa‘iteliha ki hono sino ‘o‘ona, ka ko hono uaifi.
46007005	‘Oua te mo māvae; ngata pē nai ‘i ha‘amo loto taha ke fai, ‘o fuoloa si‘i pē, koe‘uhi ke mou ‘ata‘atā ke fai ha lotu: pea mo toe fakataha, telia na‘a ‘ahi‘ahi kimoutolu ‘e Sētane ‘i ho‘omou ta‘efa‘a kātaki.
46007006	Ka ko ‘eku lea pehē ko ‘eku fakangofua pē, ‘oku ‘ikai ko ‘eku fekau ke fai.
46007007	‘Oku te ‘amusia ange pē ke tatau ‘a e kakai kotoa pē pea mo au: ka ‘oku takitaha ma‘ana ‘ene kelesi kuo ne ma‘u mei he ‘Eiki; ko e toko taha ‘a ē, ko e toko taha ko ē.
46007008	Pea ko ‘eku lea ē ki he kau ta‘emali mo e kau fefine uitou: ‘Oku lelei kiate kinautolu ke nau nofo pē ‘o hangē ko au.
46007009	Ka ‘o kapau ‘oku ‘ikai te nau makātaki, tuku ke nau mali, he ‘oku lelei hake ‘a e mali ‘i he‘ene ‘i ai ‘a e afi.
46007010	Ka ki he kakai kuo mali ‘oku ou tu‘utu‘uni–ka tala‘ehai ko au pē, ka ko e tu‘utu‘uni ‘a e ‘Eiki–ke ‘oua na‘a māvae ‘a e fefine mo hono husepāniti:
46007011	(ka ‘o kapau kuo fai ‘a e māvae, ke ne nofo ta‘emali, pe ke ne fakalelei mo hono husepāniti) pea ke ‘oua na‘a tukuange ‘e he husepāniti hono uaifi.
46007012	Ka ko e me‘a ki hono toe ‘o e kakai, ‘oku ‘ikai ha folofola ‘a e ‘Eiki ki ai: ka ‘oku ou pehē ‘e au, ka ai ha tangata lotu ne mali mo ha fefine ta‘elotu, pea ‘oku loto lelei pē ‘a e fefine ke fai hona ‘api, ‘e ‘ikai te ne tuku ange ‘a e fefine.
46007013	Pea ko e fefine ne mali mo ha tangata ta‘elotu, pea ‘oku loto lelei pē ‘a e tangata ke fai hona ‘api, ‘e ‘ikai te ne tukuange hono husepāniti.
46007014	He kuo fakakau ki he fa‘ahinga tapu ‘a e tangata ta‘elotu koe‘uhi ko hono uaifi; pea kuo fakakau ki he fa‘ahinga tapu ‘a e uaifi ta‘elotu koe‘uhi ko e lotu hono husepāniti: he ka ne ta‘e‘oua ia, pehē ‘e ta‘etapu ho‘omou fānau; ka ko eni ‘oku nau ‘i he fa‘ahinga tapu.
46007015	Ka ‘o kapau ‘oku lau māvae ‘e ia ‘oku ta‘elotu, tuku ke māvae. ‘Oka pehē ha me‘a, ‘oku ‘ikai ke ha‘isia ha tangata lotu, pe ha fefine lotu: ka kuo ui kitaua ‘e he ‘Eiki ki he nofo vālelei.
46007016	(He ‘oku ke ‘ilo fēfē, ‘e fefine, te ke lava ‘a e fakamo‘ui ‘o ho husepāniti? pea ‘oku ke ‘ilo fēfē, ‘e tangata, te ke lava ‘a e fakamo‘ui ‘o ho uaifí ?)
46007017	Ka neongo ia, ka ‘ilonga pē ‘a e tufakanga ‘o e tangata takitaha mei he ‘Eiki, ‘ilonga pē ‘a e ‘alunga na‘a ne ‘i ai ‘i hono fakaului ‘e he ‘Otua, ke ne fai‘aki pē ia. Pea ko ‘eku tu‘utu‘uni ia ‘i he siasi kotoa pē.
46007018	Ka kuo fakaului ha taha kuo kamu, ke ‘oua na‘a ne ‘ufi‘ufi; ka kuo fakaului ha taha kuo ta‘ekamu, ke ‘oua te ne kamu.
46007019	Tala‘ehai ko ha me‘a ‘a e kamu, pea tala‘ehai ko ha me‘a ‘a e ta‘ekamu, ka ko e tauhi pē ‘o e ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni ‘a e ‘Otua.
46007020	‘Ilonga ‘a e ‘alunga ‘o e tangata takitaha na‘e fakaului mei ai, ke ne nofo pē ‘i he ‘alunga ko ia.
46007021	Kapau na‘e fakaului koe ‘oku ke pōpula, ‘oua na‘a ke hoha‘a ai: kehe, neongo te ke lava ke ke tau‘atāina, ‘ē, ngāue‘aki pē mu‘a ho‘o pōpula na.
46007022	He ko ia kuo ului ki he ‘Eiki, neongo ko e pōpula, ka ko e tau‘atāina ia ‘a e ‘Eiki: pehē foki, ko e tau‘atāina kuo ului ko e pōpula ia ‘a Kalaisi.
46007023	Na‘e ai ha totongi na‘e fakatau ‘aki kimoutolu; ‘oua te mou hoko ko e pōpula ‘a e kakai.
46007024	Kāinga lotu, ‘ilonga ‘a e ‘alunga na‘e ului mei ai ha taha, ke ne fai ai pē ‘ene fakafeangai ki he ‘Otua ‘i he ‘alunga pē ko ia.
46007025	Pea ki he kau finemui, ‘oku ‘ikai te u ma‘u ha tu‘utu‘uni ‘a e ‘Eiki, ka ‘oku ou ‘atu ‘eku fakakaukau, he ko e taha au tokua kuo ‘ofa ‘a e ‘Eiki ‘o tuku ko e toko taha ke falala‘anga.
46007026	Ko ia, ‘oku ou pehē ‘e au, ko hono lelei, ko e me‘a ‘i he faingata‘a ‘oku lolotonga ni–ko hono lelei ke nofo ai pē ha taha ‘i he me‘a ‘oku ne ‘i ai.
46007027	Ka ‘oku ke alafianga ki ha fefine, ‘oua te ke kumi ha vete. Ka ‘oku ke ‘ata‘atā mei ha fefine, ‘oua te ke kumi ha uaifi.
46007028	Ka neongo ia, ka ‘o kapau te ke mali, tala‘ehai ko ho‘o angahala: pea kapau ‘e mali ha finemui, tala‘ehai kuo ne angahala ai. Ka ko e fa‘ahinga ko ia ‘e ai ha fakamamahi ‘e tō ki he‘enau mo‘ui; pea ko si‘eku ma‘ema‘ekina kimoutolu.
46007029	Ka ko ‘eku tala atu ‘eni, kāinga, Kuo fakanounou ‘a e kuonga, koe‘uhi ‘i he taimi ‘oku toe, ke ‘ilonga ‘a e ma‘u uaifi, ke nau hangē ‘oku ‘ikai te nau ma‘u;
46007030	pea ko kinautolu ‘oku tangi, ke nau hangē ‘oku ‘ikai te nau tangi; pea ko kinautolu ‘oku fiefia, ke nau hangē ‘oku ‘ikai te nau fiefia; pea ko kinautolu ‘oku fakatau mai ha me‘a, ke nau hangē ‘oku ‘ikai ko ‘enau me‘a;
46007031	pea ko kinautolu ‘oku ngāue‘aki ‘a māmani, ke hangē ‘oku ‘ikai ko ‘enau me‘a ke ‘osiki: he kuo kamata liliu ‘a e anga ‘o e maama ko eni.
46007032	Pea ko si‘eku feinga ke ‘oua te mou loto mo‘ua. ‘Oku mo‘ua ‘a e loto ‘o e tangata ta‘ema‘u uaifi ‘i he ngaahi me‘a ‘a e ‘Eiki, he‘ene feinga ke hōhō‘ia ‘a e finangalo ‘o e ‘Eiki:
46007033	ka ko e tangata fakauaifi ‘oku mo‘ua hono loto ‘i he me‘a ‘o māmani, he‘ene feinga ke hōhō‘ia hono uaifi; pea fetohoaki ai hono loto.
46007034	Pea ko e fefine ta‘emali, pe ko e finemui, ‘oku mo‘ua hono loto ‘i he ngaahi me‘a ‘a e ‘Eiki, koe‘uhi ke mā‘oni‘oni hono sino mo hono laumālie fakatou‘osi: ka ko e fefine kuo mali ‘oku mo‘ua hono loto ‘i he me‘a ‘o māmani, he‘ene feinga ke hōhō‘ia hono husepāniti.
46007035	Ka ‘oku ou lea pehē ko e tala mo‘ou; ‘oku ‘ikai ko ha‘aku lafo ha tauhele kiate kimoutolu, ka koe‘uhi ke lava ‘a e me‘a ‘oku taau mo e fakafe‘ao lelei ki he ‘Eiki ta‘eha fehākaaki.
46007036	Ka ‘oka hā ki ha motu‘a ‘oku ta‘engali ‘ene tu‘utu‘uni ki he‘ene ki‘i fefine, koe‘uhi nai kuo tauhili mo ‘ene finemui, pea ka ko ha me‘a ‘oku fepauaki; pea ke fai ‘e he motu‘a ‘a e me‘a ‘oku ne tokanga ki ai, ‘o ne tuku ke mali ‘a e ongo me‘a: tala‘ehai ko ‘ene angahala.
46007037	Ka ko e motu‘a ‘oku ‘ikai ke tālakitu‘a hono loto, pea ‘oku ‘ikai ha faingata‘a, ka ‘oku ne ‘ata‘atā ke fai ‘a e me‘a ‘oku ne tokanga ki ai; pea ka kuo ne tu‘utu‘uni ‘i hono loto ‘o‘ona, ‘o pehē, te ne ta‘ofi ‘ene ki‘i fefine: ‘e lelei ‘ene fai pehē.
46007038	Ko ia, ‘ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku ne fakamali ‘ene ki‘i fefine, ‘oku ne fai lelei; pea ko ia ‘oku ne ta‘ofi mei he mali, ‘e lelei foki ‘ene ngāue, ‘io, ko e lelei lahi ia.
46007039	‘Oku ha‘isia ‘a e finemotu‘a lolotonga ‘oku mo‘ui hono husepāniti: ka ‘o kapau kuo mohe ‘a e husepāniti, ‘oku ne ‘ata‘atā ke mali mo ha toko taha ‘oku ne loto ki ai; kaekehe ko e toko taha kuo lotu.
46007040	Ka ko hono monū‘ia lahi ē, ‘o kapau te ne nofo ai pē. Ko ha‘aku ia fakakaukau: pea ‘oku te pehē ‘oku ‘iate kita foki ‘a e Laumālie ‘o e ‘Otua.
46008001	PEA ko e me‘a ki he ngaahi me‘a ne ‘oatu ki he ‘aitoli, ‘oku mahino tokua ‘oku ‘iate kitautolu kotoa pē ha ‘ilo ki ai-(ko e ‘ilo ko e me‘a fakafuofuolahi ia, ka ko e ‘ofa ko e me‘a langa hake.
46008002	Ka mahalo ‘e ha toko taha kuo ne ‘osi ‘ilo ki ha me‘a, tā ‘oku te‘eki ke a‘u ‘ene ‘ilo ki hono anga totonu:
46008003	ka ‘oka ‘ofa ‘e ha taha ki he ‘Otua, ko e toko taha ia kuo ‘iloa ‘e he ‘Otua).
46008004	Pea ko eni, ko e me‘a ki he‘ete kai ‘a e me‘a ne ‘atu ki he ‘aitoli, ‘oku mahino tokua ‘oku ‘ikai ha ‘aitoli ‘i he ‘univeesi; pea ‘oku ‘ikai mo ha ‘Otua, ka ‘oku taha tofu pē.
46008005	‘Io, pea ka ne ‘i ai mo‘oni, ‘i langi pe ‘i māmani, ha ngaahi me‘a ‘oku lau ko e ngaahi ‘otua–‘a ē ‘oku ‘i ai ha ngaahi ‘otua tokolahi, mo ha ngaahi ‘eiki tokolahi–
46008006	ka kiate kitautolu ‘oku taha pē ‘a e ‘Otua, ko e Tamai, ‘a ia ‘oku mei ai ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē, pea ko kitautolu ma‘ana; pea ‘oku taha pē ‘a e ‘Eiki, ko Sīsū Kalaisi, ‘a ia ‘oku fou mai ‘iate ia ‘a e me‘a kotoa, pea ‘oku fou ‘iate ia ‘a kitautolu.
46008007	Ka ‘oku ‘ikai ‘i he kakai kotoa pē ‘a e ‘ilo pehē: ka ‘oku ‘i ai ‘a e ni‘ihi, ko e me‘a ‘i he kei tolonga mai ‘enau maheni mo e ‘aitoli, ko ia ‘oku nau ongo‘i ‘i he‘enau kai ia, ko e me‘a ne ‘atu ki he ‘aitoli, pea ‘uli ai honau konisēnisi ko si‘ene vaivai.
46008008	Pea tala‘ehai ko e me‘akai te ne fakaongo kitaua ki he ‘Otua: kapau ‘oku ‘ikai te ta kai, ‘oku ‘ikai te ta tōmui ai, pea kapau ‘oku ta kai, ‘oku ‘ikai te ta hulu atu.
46008009	Ka mou tokanga, na‘a ‘iloange ‘e hoko ho‘omou tau‘atāina na, ko e tūkia‘anga kiate kinautolu ‘oku vaivai.
46008010	He ka mamata ‘e ha toko taha kiate koe, ‘a koe ko e ‘ilo, ‘oku ke keinanga ‘i ha fale-‘aitoli, ‘ikai ‘e langa hake ai ‘a si‘ono konisēnisi, ka ko e vaivai, ke kai ‘a e me‘a kuo ‘oatu ki he ‘aitoli?
46008011	‘Oiauē! ‘oku maumau ‘a si‘i vaivai he fai‘aki ho‘o poto na, si‘i tokoua na‘e pekia ki ai ‘a Kalaisi.
46008012	Ka ko ho‘omou fai angahala pehē ki homou ngaahi tokoua lotu, mo ho‘omou ‘ai ke lavea honau ngaahi konisēnisi ‘oku vaivai, ko ho‘omou fai angahala ia kia Kalaisi.
46008013	‘Āua, pea kapau ko e me‘akai pē ia ‘a ia ‘oku fakahingaki si‘oku tokoua, ‘ā, ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito te u toe kai kakano ‘o lauikuonga, ke ‘oua na‘a ku fakahingaki si‘oku tokoua.
46009001	‘IKAI ‘oku ou tau‘atāina? ‘Ikai ko e ‘aposetolo au? ‘Ikai kuo u mamata kia Sīsū Kalaisi, ko hotau ‘Eiki? ‘Ikai ko ‘eku ngāue ‘a kimoutolu ‘i he ‘Eiki, ‘ō?
46009002	Ka ne ‘i ai ha ni‘ihi ‘oku ‘ikai te u ‘aposetolo ki ai, kaekehe ko e ‘aposetolo au kiate kimoutolu: seuke, ko e sila kimoutolu ‘o hoku lakanga ‘aposetolo ‘i he ‘Eiki.
46009003	Ko eni ia ‘eku tali kiate kinautolu ‘oku ‘eke au.
46009004	‘Oku pehē koā? ‘Oku ‘ikai ‘amaua tokua ke ‘eke ha me‘akai, pe ha me‘a inu?
46009005	‘Oku ‘ikai ‘amaua koā ke ō holo mo ha fefine lotu kuo ma mali, ‘o hangē foki ko hono toe ‘o e kau ‘Aposetolo, mo e ngaahi tokoua ‘o e ‘Eiki, kae‘uma‘ā ‘a Kīfasi?
46009006	Tā ko au pē ‘apē, mo Pānepasa, ‘oku tapu ke tuku ‘ema ngāue fakamaama, ‘ō?
46009007	Ko hai ha sōtia ‘oku ‘alu ki he tau mo ne totongi ‘e ia ki hono tauhi? ‘anefē ia? Ko hai ‘oku tō ha ngoue vaine, ‘o ‘ikai te ne tokoni ‘aki hono fua? Ko hai ‘oku tauhi ha fanga manu, ‘o ‘ikai te ne ma‘u tokoni mei he hu‘a huhu ‘o e fanga manu ko ia?
46009008	Ko ‘eku lau pehē koā ko e fakaetangata pē? ‘ikai ‘oku fakahā pehē ‘e he Lao foki?
46009009	He kuo tohi ‘i he Lao ‘a Mōsese, ‘E ‘ikai te ke ha‘iha‘i ‘a e ngutu ‘o ha pulu ‘i he‘ene ‘au‘au ‘a e koane. Ko ‘ene toka‘i koā ‘e he ‘Otua ‘a e fanga pulu?
46009010	‘Ikai ko ‘ene folofola ‘ata‘atā koe‘uhiā ko kimoutolu? Seuke, na‘e tohi ia koe‘uhi ko kimautolu: he ‘oku totonu ke fai ‘amanaki ‘e ia ‘oku faka‘uli ‘a e palau, pea ke fai ‘amanaki mo ia ‘oku ‘au‘au, ko e ‘amanaki ‘e ai hano ‘inasi.
46009011	Kapau kuo mau tō ma‘amoutolu ‘a e ngaahi me‘a fakalaumālie, ko e me‘a mahu‘inga koā, ‘o kapau te mau utu ho‘omou ngaahi me‘a fakasino?
46009012	Kapau ‘oku ‘i ai ha ni‘ihi kehe ‘oku nau kau ‘i he pule pehē kiate kimoutolu, mu‘a hake kimautolu, ‘ikai ko ia? Ka na‘e ‘ikai te mau ngāue‘aki ‘a e pule ko ia: kaekehe, ‘oku mau ‘ūkuma ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē, koe‘uhi ke ‘oua te mau fakapipī ki he Kōsipeli ‘o Kalaisi.
46009013	‘Oku ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo koā, ko kinautolu ‘oku ngāue ‘i he me‘a ‘o e Temipale ‘oku nau kai mei he Temipale? pea ko kinautolu ‘oku tauhi ki he ‘ōlita ‘oku nau ‘inasi taha mo e ‘ōlita?
46009014	Pehē foki, na‘e fekau ‘e he ‘Eiki kiate kinautolu ‘oku malanga‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli, ke nau ma‘u honau tauhi mei he Kōsipeli.
46009015	Ka ko au, kuo te‘eki te u ala ki ha taha ‘o e ngaahi me‘a ni: pea tala‘ehai ko ‘eku tohi ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ni koe‘uhi ke fai pehē kiate au. Seuke! ‘e lelei mu‘a kiate au ke u mate ‘i he–‘ā! ‘e ‘ikai ha toko taha te ne fakange‘esi hoku pōlepole‘anga.
46009016	He neongo ‘eku malanga‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli, tala‘ehai ‘oku ou ma‘u ai ha pōlepole‘anga: he ko ha fatongia ia kuo hilifaki mai; ‘io, hoto ‘oiauē, ‘o kapau ‘e ‘ikai te u malanga‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli!
46009017	He kapau ‘oku ou fai ia ko ‘eku fa‘iteliha, ‘e ai ha‘aku totongi: ka ‘o kapau ‘oku ‘ikai ko ‘eku fa‘iteliha, tā ko ha lakanga ia kuo hilifaki kiate au.
46009018	Pea ka ko ia, pea ko e hā ‘a e totongi ‘oku ou fai ki ai, he‘eku malanga‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli, ‘o u tuku ke nau ma‘u ia ta‘etotongi, ‘o ‘oua na‘a ku fai ki hono ngātanga ‘o ‘eku fa‘iteliha ‘i he Ngāue?
46009019	Seuke, neongo ‘oku ou tau‘atāina mei he kakai kotoa pē, ka na‘a ku ‘ai fakapōpula au ki he kakai kotoa pē, koe‘uhiā ke tokolahi taha ‘a e kakai te u ma‘u.
46009020	‘Io, ‘i he‘eku fai ki he kau Siu na‘a ku hangē ko ha Siu, koe‘uhi ke u ma‘u ai ha ni‘ihi Siu: pea ‘i he fai ki he fa‘ahinga ‘oku mo‘ulaloa ki he Lao, na‘a ku hangē ha mo‘ulaloa ki he Lao–tala‘ehai ko ha‘aku ongo‘i kuo u mo‘ulaloa ki he Lao, ka koe‘uhi pē ke u ma‘u ai ‘a kinautolu ‘oku mo‘ulaloa ki he Lao;
46009021	‘i he fai ki he fa‘ahinga ‘i tu‘a Lao, na‘a ku hangē ha toko taha ‘i tu‘a Lao–tala‘ehai ko ha‘aku ongo‘i kuo u ‘i he tu‘a lao ‘a e ‘Otua, kehe na‘a ku ‘i he loto lao ‘a Kalaisi, ka koe‘uhi pē ke u ma‘u ai ‘a e fa‘ahinga ‘i tu‘a Lao.
46009022	Na‘a ku hoko ko e vaivai ki he kau vaivai, hei‘ilo te u ma‘u ai ‘a e kau vaivai: kuo u hoko ko e me‘a kehekehe ki he kakai kehekehe, kehe ke u fakamo‘ui hanau ni‘ihi.
46009023	Pea ‘ilonga ha me‘a ‘oku ou fai, ‘oku ou fai koe‘uhi ko e Kōsipeli, koe‘uhi ke u ‘inasi ai fakataha mo e kakai kehe.
46009024	‘Ikai ‘oku mou ‘ilo, ko e kakai ‘oku lele ‘i he fakapuepue ‘oku nau lele kotoa pē, ka ko e toko taha pē ‘oku ma‘u ‘a e koloa? Ke hangē ko ia ho‘omou lele, koe‘uhi ke mou ma‘uma‘u lelei.
46009025	Ka ‘ilonga ha taha ‘oku kau ‘i he fakapuepue, ‘oku ne fakama‘uma‘u ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē. Pea ko e fai ‘e kinautolu foki ke ma‘u ha pale ‘e mae, ka ko kitaua ha pale ‘e ‘ikai mae.
46009026	‘Ē, ko e anga ‘eni ‘o ‘eku lele ‘a‘aku, ‘oku ‘ikai ke hamumu; ko e anga ‘eni ‘o ‘eku fuhu, ‘oku ‘ikai te u tuki matangi.
46009027	Kaekehe, ‘oku te toke‘ia hoto sino, mo taki pōpula‘i: na‘a ‘iloange, hili ‘eku fai ‘a e angi ki he kakai kehe, pea u hoko au ko e li‘ekina.
46010001	HE ‘oku ou loto, kāinga, ke ‘oua na ‘a puli ‘a e me‘a ni; ko ‘etau ngaahi kui na‘a nau ‘i he malu ‘o e ‘Ao kotoa pē, ‘o nau ‘asi kotoa pē ‘i he Tahi;
46010002	pea nau papitaiso kotoa pē kia Mōsese ‘i he ‘ao mo e tahi;
46010003	pea nau kai kotoa pē mei ha me‘akai mana pē taha;
46010004	pea nau inu kotoa pē mei ha me‘a inu mana pē taha: he na‘a nau inu ai pē mei he Maka mana na‘e tulimui kiate kinautolu: ka ko e Maka ko ia ko Kalaisi pē.
46010005	Ka neongo ia, ka tala‘ehai na‘e hōifua ‘a e ‘Otua ki hanau tokolahi; he na‘e tulaki holo kinautolu ‘i he toafa.
46010006	Pea ko eni, na‘e fai ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia, ko e taipe kiate kitautolu; ke ‘oua na‘a tau hoko ko e koto holi ki he kovi, ‘o hangē ā ko kinautolu na.
46010007	Kae‘uma‘ā ke ‘oua te mou hoko ko e kau tauhi ‘aitoli, ‘o hangē ko e ni‘ihi ‘i he kakai na; ‘a ē ‘oku tu‘u ‘i he Tohi, Na‘e nofo ‘a e kakai ke kai mo inu, pea nau tu‘u hake ke fakavā.
46010008	Pea ke ‘oua na‘a tau fe‘auaki, ‘o hangē ko e fe‘auaki ‘a e ni‘ihi ‘o e kakai na, pea tō ai hanau toko ua mano ma tolu afe ‘i he ‘aho pē ‘e taha.
46010009	Pea ‘oua te tau ha‘aki ‘ahi‘ahi‘i ‘a e ‘Eiki, ‘o hangē ko e ‘ahi‘ahi‘i ‘e he ni‘ihi ‘o e kakai na, pea nau mole ‘i he ngāue ‘a e fanga ngata.
46010010	Pea ‘oua te mou lāunga ‘o hangē ā ko e lāunga ‘a e ni‘ihi ‘o e kakai na, ‘o nau mole ‘i he ngāue ‘a Faka‘auha.
46010011	Pea ko eni, na‘e hoko kiate kinautolu ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia ko e fakataipe: pea na‘e tohi mo‘ota na‘ina‘i, ‘a kitaua kuo ta fenāpasi mo e aofangatuku ‘o e ngaahi kuonga.
46010012	Ko ia, ‘ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku ne pehē kuo ne tu‘u, ke vakavakai na‘a ne hinga.
46010013	Kuo te‘eki ke mo‘ua kimoutolu ‘e ha fa‘ahinga ‘ahi‘ahi ‘oku ta‘ehoa mo e tangata: pea ko e ‘Otua ko e toko taha ‘oku fai ki he‘ene lea, pea ‘e ‘ikai te ne fakangofua ke ‘ahi‘ahi‘i kimoutolu ‘o makehe atu ‘i ho‘omou mafai; kaekehe, te ne ngaohi fakataha mo e ‘ahi‘ahi hono hao‘anga foki mei ai, koe‘uhi ke lava hono kātaki‘i.
46010014	Ko ia, si‘oku ‘ofa‘anga, mou hola mei he tauhi ‘aitoli.
46010015	Seuke, ko ‘eku lea ki ha kakai ‘oku fakapotopoto, ke ‘amoutolu ke ‘utangi ‘a e me‘a ‘oku ou tala.
46010016	Ko e ipu fakafeta‘i, ‘a ia ‘oku tau fakatapu ‘aki ha fakafeta‘i, ‘ikai ko e me‘a ia ‘oku tau kautaha ai ‘i he ta‘ata‘a ‘o Kalaisi? Ko e mā ‘oku tau pakipaki, ‘ikai ko e me‘a ia ‘oku tau kautaha ai ‘i he sino ‘o Kalaisi?
46010017	He neongo pe ‘oku tau tokofiha, ka ko e mā pē taha kitautolu, ‘a ia ko e sino taha: he ‘oku tau ‘inasi kotoa pē mei he mā pē ko ia ‘e taha.
46010018	Vakai ‘a ha‘a ‘Isileli fakaetangata: ‘ilonga kinautolu ‘oku kai feilaulau, ‘ikai ‘oku nau kautaha ai mo e ‘ōlita?
46010019	Ka ko e hā ‘a e me‘a ‘oku hu‘u ki ai ‘eku lau? ko ‘eku pehē ko ha mo‘oni ia ‘a e feilaulau ‘oku ‘atu ki ha ‘aitoli? pe ko ha mo‘oni ia ‘a e ‘aitoli, ‘ō?
46010020	Ka ko ‘eku lea pē, ‘ē, ko e ngaahi feilaulau ‘oku ‘atu ‘e he hīteni, ‘oku nau ‘atu ki he ngaahi fa‘ahikehe, ‘o ‘ikai ki he ‘Otua: pea ‘oku ‘ikai te u loto ke mou kautaha mo Fa‘ahikehe.
46010021	Tala‘ehai te mou lava ke inu ‘a e Ipu ‘a e ‘Eiki, mo e ipu foki ‘a Fa‘ahikehe: tala‘ehai te mou lava ke ‘inasi ‘i he Tēpile ‘a e ‘Eiki mo e tēpile foki ‘a Fa‘ahikehe.
46010022	He ko e pehē ke ta fakatupu fua‘a ki he ‘Eiki? he ‘oku ta mālohi ‘iate ia?
46010023	Ko e me‘a kotoa pē ‘oku ngofua, ka ‘oku ‘ikai ‘aonga ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē: ko e me‘a kotoa pē ‘oku ngofua, ka ‘oku ‘ikai ke fai ‘e he me‘a kotoa pē ha langa hake.
46010024	Ke ‘oua na‘a kumi ‘e ha taha ‘ene lelei ‘a‘ana, ka ko e lelei ‘a e taha.
46010025	‘Ilonga ha me‘a ‘oku fakatau ‘i he fale fahi manu, mou kai pē, ‘o ‘oua ‘e fai ha ‘eke ma‘a konisēnisi;
46010026	he ‘Oku ‘a e ‘Eiki ‘a māmani, Mo e me‘a ‘oku ‘i ai.
46010027	Kapau ‘e tala kātoanga atu ‘e ha taha ‘o e kau ta‘elotu, pea ‘oku mou tokanga ke ‘alu ki ai, ‘ilonga ha me‘a ‘oku tuku ‘i homou ‘ao, mou kai pē, ‘o ‘oua ‘e ‘eke ma‘a konisēnisi.
46010028	Ka ‘oka ‘iloange ‘e pehē atu ‘e ha taha, Ko e me‘a na‘e ‘atu ki he temipale, pea ‘oua leva te mou kai, koe‘uhi ko e toko taha ne ne fakahā, pea koe‘uhi ko konisēnisi.
46010029	Ka ‘oku ‘ikai te u pehē, koe‘uhi ko e konisēnisi ‘o‘ou, ka ko e konisēnisi ‘o e taha kehe ko ia: he ko e pehē koā ke fakamo‘ua ‘ete tau‘atāina ‘e ha konisēnisi kehe, ko e hā?
46010030	Kapau ‘oku te kai mo e fakafeta‘i, pea fēfē ai hoto lau‘ikovi‘i ‘i he me‘a ‘oku te fakafeta‘i ai?
46010031	Ko ia, pe ko ho‘omou kai, pe ko ho‘omou inu, pe ko ho‘omou fai ha me‘a, mou fai kotoa pē ke ongoongolelei ai ‘a e ‘Otua.
46010032	Ke ta‘emelengatamaki ho‘omou tō‘onga ki he Siu mo e Kalisi fakatou‘osi.
46010033	Pea ki he siasi foki ‘a e ‘Otua: ‘o hangē foki ‘oku ou fai fakaoleole ‘e au ki he kakai kehekehe ‘i he‘ete me‘a kotoa pē, ‘o ‘ikai te u kumi ‘a e lelei ‘a‘ata, ka ko e lelei ‘a e tokolahi; hei‘ilo ‘e lava ai honau fakamo‘ui.
46011001	MOU hoko ko e kau fa‘ifa‘itaki kiate au, ‘o hangē foki ko ‘eku fa‘ifa‘itaki ‘aku kia Kalaisi.
46011002	Pea ko eni ‘oku ou fakamālō atu ‘i ho‘omou manatu kiate au ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē, mo ho‘omou pukepuke ‘a e ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni ‘o fakatatau ki he‘eku tuku atu.
46011003	Ka ‘oku ou loto ke mou ‘ilo, ko e ‘ulu ‘o e tangata kotoa pē ko Kalaisi; pea ko e ‘ulu ‘o e fefine ko e tangata; pea ko e ‘ulu ‘o Kalaisi ko e ‘Otua.
46011004	‘Ilonga ha tangata ‘oku fai ha hū, pe ha malanga palofisai, ka ‘oku tatā hono ‘ulu, ‘oku ne fakatōkilalo‘i ai hono ‘ulu.
46011005	Ka ‘ilonga ha fefine ‘oku fai ha lotu, pe ha malanga palofisai, ta‘e‘ufi‘ufi hono ‘ulu, ‘oku ne fakatōkilalo‘i ai hono ‘ulu: he ‘oku ne tatau tofu pē mo ha toko taha kuo fakatekefua.
46011006	‘Io, kapau ‘oku ‘ikai ‘ai tatā ha fefine, pea tuku ke ne kosi foki: pea kapau ko e me‘a fakamā ki ha fefine ke kosi, pe fakatekefua, pea tuku ke ne tatā.
46011007	Ka ‘oku ‘ikai totonu ke ‘ufi‘ufi ‘e he tangata hono ‘ulu, he ko e ‘īmisi ia mo e lāngilangi ‘o e ‘Otua; ka ko e fefine ko e lāngilangi ia ‘o e tangata.
46011008	He tala‘ehai ko e tupu‘anga ‘o e tangata ko e fefine; kaekehe, ko e tupu‘anga ‘o e fefine ko e tangata.
46011009	Kae‘uma‘ā foki, na‘e ‘ikai ngaohi ‘a e tangata koe‘uhi ko e fefine, ka ko e fefine koe‘uhi ko e tangata.
46011010	Ko hono ‘uhinga ia ‘oku totonu ke ‘ai ai ‘e he fefine ki hono ‘ulu ‘a e faka‘ilonga pule‘ia, telia ‘a e kau ‘āngelo.
46011011	Ka neongo ia, ka tala‘ehai ‘oku fakapalataha ‘a e fefine ‘i he lotu, ta‘ekau ai ‘a e tangata, pe fakapalataha ‘a e tangata, ta‘ekau ai ‘a e fefine.
46011012	He hangē ā ko e tangata ko e tupu‘anga ‘o e fefine, pehē foki ‘oku fou ‘i he fefine ‘a e tangata: ka ko e tupu‘anga ‘o e me‘a kotoa pē ko e ‘Otua.
46011013	Mou ‘utangi ia ‘i he me‘a ‘oku hā ‘iate kimoutolu: ‘oku taau koā ke fai ‘e he fefine ha hū ki he ‘Otua ta‘etatā?
46011014	‘Ikai ‘oku hīnoi‘i kimoutolu ‘e Natula, ka ‘ulu loloa ha tangata ko e me‘a ta‘engali kiate ia?
46011015	Ka ‘oka ‘ulu loloa ha fefine, ko hono lāngilangi ia: he ko e lou‘ulu kuo tuku mōno pulonga.
46011016	Ka ‘oka ai ha toko taha ‘oku matamata fie fakakikihi ‘i he me‘a; ‘ē, ‘oku ‘ikai te tau fai ha anga pehē, ‘e kitautolu pē ko e ngaahi siasi ‘a e ‘Otua.
46011017	Ka ko ‘eku tu‘utu‘uni ko ia, ‘oku ‘ikai ke ‘alu atu mo e fakamālō; koe‘uhi ko ho‘omou fa‘a fakataha ‘oku ‘ikai iku ki ha laka ki mu‘a, ka ki he holomui.
46011018	He ko e me‘a ‘e taha, ‘oku mofisi mai tokua, ka fai ha‘amou fakataha ‘oku hoko ‘iate kimoutolu ‘a e ngaahi mavahevahe: pea ‘oku ou tui ki ha me‘a ni‘ihi.
46011019	Seuke, kuo pau ke ‘iate kimoutolu mo ha fakafa‘afa‘ahinga; koe‘uhi ke e‘a ai ‘iate kimoutolu ‘a kinautolu ‘oku lelei mo‘oni.
46011020	Pea ko eni, ko ho‘omou fakataha ki he potu ko ē, tala‘ehai ko e kai ia ‘o e ‘Ohomohe ‘o e ‘Eiki.
46011021	He ‘i he fai ‘o e kai, ‘oku takitaha ala leva ki he me‘a na‘e ha‘u mo ia; pea ko Me‘a ē ‘oku fiekaia, ka ko Me‘a ē ‘oku konā.
46011022	‘Uoi, tā ‘oku ‘ikai ‘apē hamou ngaahi fale ke fai ai ho‘omou kai mo e inu, ‘ō? pe na‘a ko ho‘omou ta‘etoka‘i ‘a e Fakataha ‘a e ‘Otua, mo ho‘omou fie fakamaa‘i ‘a masiva? Ko e hā ‘eku lea atu ‘e fai? te u fakamālō atu? ‘Oku ‘ikai te u fakamāloo‘i kimoutolu ‘i he me‘a ni.
46011023	He na‘a ku ma‘u ‘e au mei he ‘Eiki ‘a ia ā ne u tuku atu, ‘o pehē, Ko e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū, ‘i he pō ko ia na‘e fai ai hono lavaki‘i, na‘a ne to‘o ha mā:
46011024	pea hili ‘ene fakafeta‘ia, na‘a ne pakipaki, ‘o ne me‘a, Ko ho‘oku ‘eni sino, ‘a ia ‘oku ma‘amoutolu: mou fai pehē mōku fakamanatu.
46011025	Pehē foki ‘ene to‘o ‘a e ipu, hili ‘a e ‘ohomohe, ‘o ne me‘a, Ko e ipu ni, ko e fuakava fo‘ou ia ‘oku fai‘aki hoku toto: ‘ilonga ha‘amou inu ia, fai pehē mōku fakamanatu.
46011026	Seuke, ‘ilonga ha‘amou kai ‘a e mā ni mo inu ‘i he ipu, ‘oku mou fakahā ‘a e pekia ‘a e ‘Eiki kae‘oua ke ne hoko mai.
46011027	Ko ia, ‘ilonga ‘a ia te ne fai ta‘engali ‘ene kai ‘a e mā, pe ko ‘ene inu ‘i he ipu ‘a e ‘Eiki, kuo ne angahala ki he sino mo e ta‘ata‘a ‘o e ‘Eiki.
46011028	Ka ke sivi mu‘a ‘a e tangata ‘e ia, pea ke ne toki kai ‘i he mā mo inu ‘i he ipu.
46011029	He ko ia ‘oku ne kai mo inu ai, ‘oku ne kai mo inu hano fakamo‘ua, ‘o kapau ‘oku ‘ikai te ne fifili ‘o ‘ilo ‘a e sino.
46011030	Ko hono ō ia ‘oku ‘i ai hamou tokolahi ‘oku vaivai mo mahamahaki, ‘io, pea kuo mohe ‘a e ni‘ihi.
46011031	He ka ne tau fifili ‘o ‘ilo ‘a kitautolu, pehē ‘e ‘ikai fakamo‘ua ‘a kitautolu.
46011032	Ka ‘i hotau fakamo‘ua, ko e ‘Eiki ia ‘oku ne fai hotau kinisi, koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a fai hotau fakamala‘ia fakataha mo māmani.
46011033	Ko ia, si‘oku kāinga, ka mou ka fakataha ke kai, mou fakafenē‘aki mu‘a.
46011034	Kapau ‘oku fiekaia ha taha, tuku ke ne kai ‘i ‘api; ke ‘oua te mou fakataha ke kai mo‘ua. Ko hono toe ‘o e ngaahi me‘a te u toki tu‘utu‘uni ‘oka u ka ‘alu atu.
46012001	PEA ko e me‘a ki he ngaahi mafai fakalaumālie, ‘oku ‘ikai te u loto ke mou mūnoa, kāinga.
46012002	‘Oku mou ‘ilo, lolotonga ho‘omou hīteni, na‘e taki hē kimoutolu ki he ngaahi ‘aitoli ta‘elea, ha me‘a pē ‘e taki kimoutolu ki ai–
46012003	Ko ia ‘oku ou fakahā atu; ‘oku ‘ikai ha taha ‘oku fakalea ‘e he Laumālie ‘o e ‘Otua te ne pehē, Ko e mala‘ia ‘a Sīsū: pea ‘oku ‘ikai ha taha te ne fa‘a hua‘aki ‘o pehē, Ko Sīsū ko e ‘Eiki, ka ‘i he‘ene Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni‘ia.
46012004	Pea ko eni, ‘oku tufa kehekehe ‘a e ngaahi kelesi, ka ‘oku taha ai pē ‘a e Laumālie:
46012005	pea ‘oku tufa kehekehe ‘a e ngaahi lakanga, ka ‘oku taha ai pē ‘a e ‘Eiki:
46012006	pea ‘oku tufa kehekehe ‘a e ngaahi ngāue, ka ‘oku taha ai pē ‘a e ‘Otua ‘a ia ‘oku ne fai ‘a e ngāue kotoa pē ‘i he kakai kotoa pē.
46012007	Ka ‘oku tuku ‘a e fakahā‘anga ‘o e Laumālie ki he tangata takitaha, pea ke ‘aonga.
46012008	He ‘oku tuku ki ha taha ‘a e mafai ke lea‘aki ‘a e poto, ‘o fou mai ‘i he Laumālie; pea ki ha taha ‘a e mafai ke lea‘aki ‘a e ‘ilo loloto, ka ‘i he Laumālie pē ko ia;
46012009	‘oku tuku ki ha taha kehe ‘a e tui, ka ko e ‘iate ia ‘a e Laumālie pē ko ia; pea ki ha taha ‘a e ngaahi mafai faito‘o, kae taha ai pē ‘a e Laumālie ‘oku fai‘aki;
46012010	pea ‘oku tuku ki ha taha ‘a e ngaahi ngāue mana; ki ha taha ‘a e malanga palofisai; ki ha taha ‘a e vavanga‘i ‘o e ngaahi laumālie; ki ha taha kehe ‘a e fai‘aki ‘a e ngaahi fa‘ahinga lea: pea ki ha taha ‘a e hiki ‘o e ngaahi lea.
46012011	Ka ko e me‘a kotoa pē ko ia, ko e ngāue ‘a e Laumālie pē taha ko ia, he‘ene tufa kehekehe ki he kakai takitaha, ‘o fakatatau ki hono finangalo.
46012012	He hangē tofu pē ‘oku taha ‘a e sino, kae lahi hono ngaahi kupu; pea ko e ngaahi kupu kehekehe ‘o e sino, neongo ‘oku lahi, ka ko e sino pē taha; ‘oku pehē foki ‘a Kalaisi.
46012013	Kae‘uma‘ā, ‘i he fai‘aki ha Laumālie pē taha, na‘e papitaiso kitautolu kotoa pē ki ha sino pē taha–pe ‘oku tau Siu pe Kalisi, pōpula pe tau‘atāina–pea na‘e fakainu‘aki ‘a kitautolu kotoa pē ha Laumālie pē taha.
46012014	Kae‘uma‘ā ‘ē, tala‘ehai ko e kupu ‘e taha ‘a e sino, ka ‘oku lahi.
46012015	Ka ne pehē ‘e he va‘e, Sā, ‘oku ‘ikai te te kau kita ki he sino, koe‘uhi ‘oku ‘ikai ko ha nima kita; pea ‘oku ‘ikai ai koā kau ia ki he sino, ‘ō?
46012016	Pea ka ne pehē ‘e he telinga, Sā, ‘oku ‘ikai te te kau kita ki he sino, koe‘uhi ‘oku ‘ikai ko e mata kita; pea ‘oku ‘ikai ai koā kau ia ki he sino, ‘ō?
46012017	Ka ne mata ‘a e sino kotoa, pea fēfē ai ‘a e fanongo? Ka ne fanongo hono kotoa, pea fēfē ai ‘a e nanamu?
46012018	Ka ‘i hono anga ko eni, kuo fa‘u ‘e he ‘Otua ‘a e ngaahi kupu ‘i he sino, ‘o takitaha ma‘ana; ‘o fakatatau ki he me‘a na‘e hā ki hono finangalo.
46012019	Ka ‘oka ne ala taha ‘a e ngaahi kupu kotoa pē, pea sino fēfē?
46012020	Ka ‘i hono anga ko eni, ‘oku lahi ‘a e ngaahi kupu, kae taha pē ‘a e sino.
46012021	Tala‘ehai ‘oku lava ‘e he mata ke lea ki he nima, ‘o pehē, ‘Oku ‘ikai te ke ‘aonga kiate au: pehē foki ‘e he ‘ulu ki he va‘e, ‘Oku ‘ikai te mo ‘aonga kiate au.
46012022	Kaekehe, ko e ngaahi kupu ‘o e sino ‘oku matamata vaivai, ‘oku lahi hake noa pē honau ‘aonga:
46012023	pea ko e ngaahi kupu ‘o e sino ‘oku tau lau ‘oku feifei‘avale, ‘oku lahi hake ‘a e teunga ‘oku tau ‘ai ki ai: pea ko hotau ngaahi feitu‘u ‘oku palakū, ‘oku ‘i ai hano matamatalelei‘anga ‘oku hulu atu;
46012024	ka ‘oku ‘ikai ‘aonga ha me‘a pehē ki hotau ngaahi feitu‘u ‘oku matamatalelei. Ka ko eni, na‘e ngaohi ‘e he ‘Otua ‘a e sino ke hōhoamālie, he‘ene ‘ai ke hulu atu ‘a e teunga ‘o ha feitu‘u ‘oku masivesiva:
46012025	koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a ai ha mavahevahe ‘i he sino; ka ke tatau ‘a e fetokanga‘aki ‘a e ngaahi kupu.
46012026	Pea ko ia, ka mamahi ha kupu ‘e taha, pea ‘oku kaungā mamahi mo ia ‘a e kupu kotoa pē; pea ka fakasanisani ha kupu ‘e taha, pea ‘oku kaungā fiefia mo ia ‘a e ngaahi kupu kotoa.
46012027	Pea ko kimoutolu ko e sino ‘o Kalaisi, pea ko e ngaahi kupu ‘oku takitaha hono feitu‘u.
46012028	Pea kuo fokotu‘u ‘e he ‘Otua ha ni‘ihi ‘i he siasi ke ‘aposetolo–ko e ‘uluaki ia–ko hono ua ‘a e kau malanga palofisai, ko hono tolu ko e kau faiako: hoko ai ‘a e ngaahi mafai mana, hoko ai ‘a e ngaahi mafai faito‘o, ‘a e ngaahi tokoni tu‘utāmaki, ‘a e ngaahi tu‘unga pule, ‘a e mafai ‘o e ngaahi fa‘ahinga lea.
46012029	‘Oku ‘aposetolo kotoa pē koā, ‘ō? ‘Oku malanga palofisai kotoa pē? ‘Oku faiako kotoa pē? ‘oku mafai mana kotoa pē?
46012030	‘oku ma‘u kotoa pē ‘a e ngaahi mafai faito‘o? ‘oku lea‘aki kotoa pē ‘a e ngaahi lea kehekehe? ‘oku hiki lea kotoa pē, ‘ō?
46012031	Ka mou kakapa ki he ngaahi kelesi ‘oku mā‘olunga.
46013001	‘IO; ka u fakahā atu foki ha hala ‘oku fungani hake. Neongo te u lava ke lea‘aki ‘a e ngaahi lea ‘a e kakai, ‘io, mo e ngaahi lea ‘a e kau ‘āngelo, ka ‘oku ‘ikai ‘iate au ‘a e ‘ofa, ko e me‘a pē kuo u hoko ki ai, ko ha ukamea ongo au, pe ko ha simipale tatangi.
46013002	Pea neongo te u lava ‘a e malanga palofisai; neongo te u a‘usia ‘a e ngaahi misiteli kotoa pē, mo e fa‘ahinga ‘ilo loloto kotoa pē; ‘io, pea neongo te u ‘osiki ‘a e tui, ‘o u lava ai ke hiki mo‘unga, ka ‘oku ‘ikai ‘iate au ‘a e ‘ofa, ko e me‘a noa pē au.
46013003	Pea neongo te u tufotufa ‘eku koloa kotoa; pea neongo te u li‘aki hoku sino ke lava ‘eku pōlepole; ka ‘oku ‘ikai ‘iate au ‘a e ‘ofa, ‘oku ‘ikai hano ‘aonga kiate au.
46013004	Ko ‘Ofa ‘oku ne anga mokomoko, mo angalelei. Ko ‘Ofa ‘oku ‘ikai, te ne meheka, ‘oku ‘ikai te ne fai pē ke ongoongoa, ‘oku ‘ikai te ne fakafuofuolahi,
46013005	‘oku ‘ikai te ne fai ta‘etaau, ‘oku ‘ikai te ne kumi ‘ene lelei ‘a‘ana, ‘oku ‘ikai te ne faka‘ita, ‘oku ‘ikai te ne lau ‘a e kovi,
46013006	‘oku ‘ikai te ne fiefia ‘i he ta‘etotonu, ka ‘oku ne kaungā fiefia mo e Mo‘oni.
46013007	‘Oku ne ‘ūkuma ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē, ‘oku ne tui ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē, ‘oku ne ‘amanaki ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē, ‘oku ne kātaki ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē.
46013008	Ko ‘Ofa ‘oku ‘ikai ke ka‘anga ia ‘i ha taimi. Ka neongo ko e malanga palofisai, ka ‘e hoko ‘o ta‘e‘aonga; neongo ko e fai‘aki ‘a e ngaahi lea, ka ‘e faifai ‘o tuku ia; neongo ko e ‘ilo loloto, ka ‘e hoko ‘o ta‘e‘aonga.
46013009	He ‘oku fakakonga ‘etau ‘ilo, pea fakakonga ‘etau palofisai:
46013010	ka ‘oka hoko mai ‘a e haohaoa, ‘e toki ta‘e‘aonga ai ‘a e fakakonga.
46013011	Lolotonga na‘a ku tamasi‘i na‘a ku lea fakatamasi‘i, na‘a ku feinga fakatamasi‘i, na‘a ku fakakaukau fakatamasi‘i: kae tālunga ‘eku hoko ko e tangata, kuo u tuku ‘a e tō‘onga fakatamasi‘i.
46013012	He ko ‘etau sio ‘i he taimi ni, ko e ma‘ali ha misiteli ‘i ha sio‘ata; ka ko e taimi ko ē, ko ‘etau sio ko e femātaaki. Ko e taimi ni ‘oku ou ‘ilo fakakonga pē, ka ‘i he taimi ko ē te u ‘ilo faka‘āufuli, ‘o hangē foki ne ‘ilo faka‘āufuli au.
46013013	‘Āua! ka ‘oku tolonga pē ‘a Tui, ‘a ‘Amanaki, ‘a ‘Ofa; ‘a e tolu ni pē: pea ko honau tu‘ukimu‘a ko ‘OFA.
46014001	MOU tuli ki he ‘ofa, kae kakapa ki he ngaahi mafai fakalaumālie, pea lahi pē ke mou malanga palofisai.
46014002	He ko ia ‘oku ne lea ‘i ha lea kehe, ‘oku ‘ikai ko ‘ene lea ki he kakai, ka ki he ‘Otua; he ‘oku ‘ikai ‘uhinga ki ha taha, ka ‘oku ne lea‘aki ‘a e ngaahi misiteli mei hono laumālie.
46014003	Ka ko ia ‘oku ne malanga palofisai ‘oku lea ia ki he kakai, ke langa hake mo enginaki mo fakafiemālie.
46014004	Ko ia ‘oku ne lea ‘i ha lea kehe, ‘oku ne fai hono langa hake ‘o‘ona pē; ka ko ia ‘oku ne malanga palofisai, ‘oku ne langa hake ‘a e siasi.
46014005	‘Oku ou ‘amusia ange ‘e au, ‘oku mou mafai kotoa pē ke lea‘aki ‘a e ngaahi lea kehe, kae lahi pē ke mou malanga palofisai: ‘ē, ‘oku lahi ‘a ia ‘oku malanga palofisai ‘iate ia ‘oku lea ‘i he ngaahi lea kehe, ‘o kapau ‘e ‘ikai te ne hiki ‘a e lea kae ma‘u tokoni ‘e he siasi.
46014006	Pea ko eni, kāinga, kapau te u ‘alu atu, ‘o lea ‘i he ngaahi lea kehe, ko e hā haku ‘aonga kiate kimoutolu, ‘o kapau ‘e ‘ikai fou ‘eku lea ki he fakahā ‘o ha me‘a mei he ta‘ehāmai, pe ki he faka‘ilo ‘o ha me‘a loloto, pe ki ha malanga palofisai, pe ki ha akonaki?
46014007	Ko e ngaahi me‘a ta‘e-ha-mo‘ui ‘a ia ‘oku ongo, pe ‘oku ‘alu ‘i he fa‘ahinga fangufangu, pe ko e ha‘ape; ka ‘o kapau ‘e ‘ikai tohelehele hono le‘o, ‘e ‘ilo fēfē ‘a e fasi ‘oku ifi pē ta?
46014008	Kae‘uma‘ā kapau ‘oku ‘ikai mahino ‘a e lea ‘a e talupite, ko hai te ne teu ke fakahoko tau?
46014009	Pehē foki mo kimoutolu ‘i he fai‘aki homou ‘elelo, kapau ‘oku ‘ikai te mou fai ha lea ‘oku ‘ilongofua, ‘e ‘ilo fēfē ‘a e me‘a ‘oku lau? ka ko ho‘omou lea ki he ‘atā pē.
46014010	‘Oku fiha nai ‘a e fa‘ahinga lea ‘i māmani, pea tala‘ehai ‘oku ai ha taha ‘e ta‘e‘uhinga:
46014011	ka ‘o kapau ‘oku ‘ikai te u ‘ilo ki he ‘uhinga ‘o e lea, te u hā kiate ia ‘oku lea ko e pāpeliane, pea ko ia ‘oku lea te ne hā ko ha pāpeliane kiate au.
46014012	Pehē foki kimoutolu, he ko eni ‘oku mou kakapa ki he ngaahi faiva fakalaumālie, ko ia mou feinga ke mou hulu atu ai koe‘uhiā ke langa hake ai ‘a e siasi.
46014013	Ko ia, ke ‘ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku mafai ke lea kehe, ke ne fai ‘ene hū ke hiki.
46014014	He kapau te u hū ‘i ha lea kehe, ko hoku laumālie pē ‘oku hū, ka ‘oku ‘ikai ha fua mei hoku ‘atamai.
46014015	Pea fēfē ai? ‘Ē, te te hū ‘aki hoto laumālie, pea te te hū ‘aki hoto ‘atamai foki te te hiva‘aki hoto laumālie, pea te te hiva‘aki hoto ‘atamai foki.
46014016	He ko eni, kapau kuo fai ha fakafeta‘i, ‘aki ho laumālie pē, pea fēfē ai ‘a si‘i nofo fanongo, ha‘ane pehē ‘Ēmeni ki ho‘o fakamālō na? He ‘oku ‘ikai te ne ‘ilo ‘a e me‘a ‘oku ke lau.
46014017	Seuke, ‘oku mālō pē ho‘o fakafeta‘i ‘au, ka ko Me‘a ē ‘oku ‘ikai hano tokoni mei ai.
46014018	Fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otua ‘oku lahi hake ‘iate kimoutolu kotoa pē ‘a ‘eku mafai ‘a‘aku ke lea ‘i he lea kehe.
46014019	Ka ‘o kapau ko e lea ‘i ha fakataha, te u fili mu‘a ke fai ha kupu‘i lea ‘e nima pē ‘aki hoku ‘atamai, ‘a ia ‘e ongo foki ki ha ni‘ihi, ‘i ha‘ate fai ha kupu‘i lea ‘e mano ‘i ha lea kehe.
46014020	Si‘i kāinga, ‘oua te mou hoko ko e kau tamaiki iiki ‘i he fakakaukau: ‘ē, ‘i he kovi ke mou hangē ha kau valevale, ka ‘i he fakakaukau ke mou fakamotu‘atangata.
46014021	Kuo tohi ‘i he Lao, ‘Oku folofola mai ‘a e ‘Eiki, ‘Io, te u fakafai ‘eku lea ki he kakai ni ‘i ha ni‘ihi ‘oku lea kehe, pea mo e ngaahi loungutu ‘o ha ngaahi fa‘ahinga kehe: ka na‘a mo ia ‘e ‘ikai te nau tokanga kiate au.
46014022	‘Āua, kuo fokotu‘u ‘a e fai‘aki ‘a e ngaahi lea kehekehe ko e mana ke ongo ‘o ‘ikai ki he kakai lotu, ka ki he ta‘elotu: ka ko e malanga palofisai ke ongo, ‘o ‘ikai ki he kakai ta‘elotu, ka ki he lotu.
46014023	Ko ia, ka kuo fakataha ‘a e siasi kātoa ki ha potu, pea nau lea kotoa pē ‘i he ngaahi lea kehe; pea hū mai ha kau fanongo pe, ha kau ta‘elotu, ‘ikai te nau pehē ‘oku mou sesele?
46014024	Ka ‘o kapau ‘e malanga palofisai kotoa pē, pea hū mai ha toko taha ta‘elotu, pe ha taha ‘i he kau fanongo, te ne touia ‘i he fai ‘anautolu takitaha, ‘e ‘eke‘i ia ‘e he fai ‘anautolu takitaha.
46014025	Ko e ngaahi me‘a fufū ‘o hono loto ‘e fu‘u e‘a, pea te ne toki fo‘ohifo ‘o hū ki he ‘Otua, mo fakahā atu, Tā ‘oku ‘iate kimoutolu mo‘oni ‘a e ‘Otua.
46014026	Pea fēfē ai, kāinga? Ka ai ha‘amou fakataha, pea takitaha ha‘ane hiva, ha‘ane akonaki, ha‘ane me‘a mei he ta‘ehāmai, ha‘ane lea kehe, ha‘ane hiki lea–‘ē, ke fai kotoa pē ke ai ha langa hake.
46014027	Kapau ko e pehē ke fai ha lea ‘i ha lea kehe, ke ngata pē ‘i ha toko ua pe tolu, pea fai fakalakanga, pea ke hiki lea ‘e ha toko taha.
46014028	Pea kapau ‘oku ‘ikai ha hiki lea, pea ke ne longo pē ‘i he fakataha; ka ne lea kiate ia pē mo e ‘Otua.
46014029	Pea ko e me‘a ki he kau malanga palofisai, tuku ke lea ha toko ua pe toko tolu, kae nofo ‘o sivi ‘e hono toe.
46014030	Pea kapau ‘e fakahā ha me‘a mei he ta‘ehāmai ki ha taha ‘oku nofo, pea ke tuku ā ‘e he ‘uluaki.
46014031	(He te mou lava ‘i he faifai taha ke malanga kotoa pē, ‘a ia ‘e ma‘u ai kotoa pē ha akonaki, pea ma‘u ai kotoa pē ha enginaki.
46014032	Pea ko e ngaahi laumālie ‘o e kau palōfita ‘oku ala pule‘i ‘e he kau palōfita:
46014033	he ko e ‘Otua ‘oku ‘ikai ko e fakatupu maveuveu, ka ko e fakatupu melino.) Ko e anga ia ‘oku fai‘aki ‘i he ngaahi siasi ‘o e kau Lotu.
46014034	Ko e me‘a ki he kau fefine, ke nau longo pē ‘i he ngaahi fakataha; he ‘oku ‘ikai ngofua kiate kinautolu ke lea: kae tuku ke nau tali angi, ‘o hangē foki ko e lau ‘a e Lao.
46014035	Pea kapau ‘oku ai ha me‘a ‘oku nau fie ‘ilo ki ai, ke nau toki fehu‘i ‘i ‘api ki honau husepāniti ‘onautolu: he ko e me‘a ta‘engali mo ha fefine ke lea ‘i ha fakataha.
46014036	‘Io, ko kimoutolu koā na‘e fou mei ai ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua, pe ko kimoutolu pē kuo ne a‘u ki ai, ‘ō?
46014037	Ka ai ha taha ‘oku ne pehē ko e palōfita ia, pe ko ha Laumālie‘ia, tuku ke ne fakamo‘oni ‘a e ngaahi me‘a kuo u tohi atu, ‘o pehē, ko e tu‘utu‘uni ia ‘a e ‘Eiki.
46014038	Pea ka ai ha taha ‘oku ne ta‘e‘ilo ko ia, tā ‘oku ta‘e‘iloa ‘a ia.
46014039	Ko ia, si‘oku kāinga, mou kakapa ki he malanga-palofisai, kae‘oua foki ‘e ta‘ofi ‘a e lea ‘i he lea kehe.
46014040	Pea ko e me‘a kotoa pē ke fai ke taau mo maau.
46015001	PEA ko eni, kāinga, ‘oku ou fakapapau atu ‘a e Kōsipeli na‘a ku malanga‘aki kiate kimoutolu, ‘a ia na‘a mou tali foki, ‘io, pea ‘oku mou tu‘u ai foki;
46015002	kae‘uma‘ā ‘oku mou fakatau ai ki he mo‘ui, ‘o kapau te mou puke ma‘u ‘a e Kōsipeli ‘i hono anga na‘a ku fakahā atu ai–ko hono me‘a pē na‘a ko e kula noa pē ho‘omou tui.
46015003	He ko e taha ‘o e ngaahi me‘a na‘a ku fuofua tuku atu, ‘a ia foki na‘a ku ma‘u ‘e au, ‘a ‘eni, Na‘e pekia ‘a Kalaisi koe‘uhi ko ‘etau ngaahi angahala, ‘o fakatatau ki he Tohitapu;
46015004	pea na‘e telio ia; pea na‘e fokotu‘u ia ‘i hono ‘aho tolu, ‘o fakatatau ki he Tohitapu;
46015005	pea na‘a ne hā kia Kīfasi, pea hili ia ki he kau Hongofulumāua,
46015006	hili ia na‘a ne hā ki he kāinga lotu ‘e toko nimangeau tupu, fakataha, ‘a ia ‘oku kei tolonga ni honau tokolahi, ka kuo mohe ha ni‘ihi:
46015007	hili ia na‘a ne hā kia Sēmisi; hili ia ki he kau ‘Aposetolo kotoa pē.
46015008	Pea kimui ‘aupito, ‘o hangē tofu pē ko e fanau‘i ta‘ehoko kita, na‘a ne hā kiate au foki.
46015009	He ko au ia ‘a e si‘i taha ‘i he kau ‘Aposetolo; he ‘oku ‘ikai te u taau ke ui ko e ‘aposetolo, koe‘uhiā na‘a ku fakatanga‘i ‘a e siasi ‘o e ‘Otua.
46015010	Ka ko e kelesi ‘a e ‘Otua kuo u hoko ai ki he me‘a kuo u hoko ki ai ni: pea ko ‘ene kelesi ko ia na‘e ngāue mai, na‘e ‘ikai ta‘e‘aonga ia; kaekehe, na‘e hulu atu ‘eku fakafitefita‘a ‘iate kinautolu na kotoa: ka tala‘ehai ko au na‘e fai, ka ko e kelesi ‘a e ‘Otua ‘a ia na‘a ma kau.
46015011	Pea ‘oku tatau ai pē, pe ko au, pe ko kinautolu, ka ‘oku pehē ‘a e anga ‘o ‘emau malanga, pea na‘e pehē ‘a e anga ‘o ho‘omou tui.
46015012	Pea ko eni, kapau ‘oku malanga‘aki ‘a Kalaisi, ‘o pehē, Kuo fokotu‘u ia mei he pekia, pea fēfē ai ‘a e lau ‘a homou ni‘ihi, tokua ‘oku ‘ikai ke toetu‘u ‘a e pekia?
46015013	He kapau ‘oku ‘ikai ha toetu‘u ‘o e pekia, pea tā kuo ‘ikai fokotu‘u ‘a Kalaisi:
46015014	pea kapau kuo ‘ikai fokotu‘u ‘a Kalaisi, pea tā ko e laufanō ‘emau malanga, ko e laufanō foki ho‘omou tui.
46015015	Kae‘uma‘ā ‘oku mau hā ko e kau lohiaki‘i ‘o e ‘Otua; koe‘uhi ko ‘emau fakahaa‘i ‘a e ‘Otua, tokua kuo ne fokotu‘u ‘a Kalaisi; ‘a ia na‘e ‘ikai te ne fokotu‘u, ‘o kapau ā ‘oku ‘ikai fokotu‘u ‘a e pekia.
46015016	He kapau ‘oku ‘ikai ke fokotu‘u ‘a e pekia, pea tā kuo ‘ikai fokotu‘u ‘a Kalaisi.
46015017	Pea kapau kuo ‘ikai fokotu‘u ‘a Kalaisi, tā koe kula noa pē ho‘omou tui, pea ‘oku mou kei ‘i ho‘omou angahala.
46015018	Pea tā ko kinautolu na‘e mohe ‘ia Kalaisi na‘a nau ‘auha.
46015019	Kapau kuo tau ‘osi ‘a e mo‘ui ko eni mo ‘etau fakatu‘a kia Kalaisi, pea ko hono ngata ia, tā ko e tu‘utāmaki taha kitautolu ‘i he kakai kotoa pē.
46015020	Ka ko eni, KUO fokotu‘u ‘a Kalaisi mei he pekia, ko e polopolo ‘o e fa‘ahinga kuo mohe.
46015021	He ko e me‘a ‘i he fou mai ‘i ha tangata ‘a e mate, pea fou mai ‘i ha tangata foki ‘a e toetu‘u ‘o e pekia.
46015022	‘Io, hangē tofu pē ‘oku mate kotoa pē ‘ia ‘Ātama, pehē foki ‘e fakamo‘ui hake kotoa pē ‘ia Kalaisi.
46015023	[Ka ‘e takitaha ‘i hono vāhenga; ko e polopolo ko Kalaisi; hoko ai ‘a kinautolu ‘oku ‘o Kalaisi, ‘oka fai ‘ene hā‘ele mai.
46015024	Toki hoko ‘a e ngata‘anga, ‘oka tukuange ‘e ia ‘a e pule‘anga ki he ‘Otua, ‘io, ki he Tamai: ‘oka kuo ne fakaka‘anga ‘a e pule kotoa pē mo e tu‘unga kotoa pē mo e mālohi.
46015025	He kuo pau pē ke ne Hau, kae‘oua ke ne tuku ‘a e fili kotoa pē ki hono lalo va‘e.
46015026	Tā kuo fakaka‘anga mo e fili fakamui, ‘a Mate:
46015027	he ‘oku lau, Na‘a ne tuku ke ‘i he lalo va‘e ‘o‘ona ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē. Ka ‘oka ne ka folofola mai, ‘o pehē, Kuo tuku ki lalo ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē; ‘oku mahino ‘oku ‘ikai ke kau ai ‘a ia na‘a ne fai ‘a e tuku ki lalo ‘o e me‘a kotoa pē kiate ia.
46015028	Ka ‘oka lava ‘a e tuku ki lalo ‘o e me‘a kotoa pē kiate ia, pea ‘e toki tuku ki lalo ‘a e ‘Alo ‘e ia kiate ia na‘a ne fai ‘a e tuku ki lalo ‘o e me‘a kotoa pē kiate ia; koe‘uhiā ke tāfataha ‘a e ‘Otua ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē.]
46015029	He ka ‘ikai, pea ko e hā ‘anautolu ai ‘e fai, ‘a e fa‘ahinga ‘oku papitaiso ma‘a e pekia? Kapau ‘oku ‘ikai ‘aupito ha fokotu‘u ‘o e pekia, pea koe‘uma‘ā honau papitaiso ma‘anautolu?
46015030	Pea koe‘uma‘ā ‘emau nofo ‘i lelenga ‘oku fai ‘i he houa kotoa pē?
46015031	Ko kita ‘oku te mate hokohoko ‘aho pē; ‘ā, ko ‘eku mo‘oni pē! hangē ‘oku mo‘oni ‘eku pōlepole ‘iate kimoutolu, kāinga, ‘a ia ‘oku ou lava ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū ko hotau ‘Eiki.
46015032	Kapau na‘e fakaetangata pē ‘eku tau mo e manu fekai ‘i ‘Efesō, ko e hā hono ‘aonga kiate au? kapau ‘oku ‘ikai fokotu‘u ‘a e pekia, “‘Ē, tau kai mo inu ē, He ‘oku ‘apongipongi ‘etau mate."
46015033	‘Oua na‘a tuku ke kākaa‘i kimoutolu. “Oku maumau‘i ‘a e ngaahi ‘ulungāanga lelei ‘e he fa‘a talanoa kovi."
46015034	Tuku ho‘omou konā, ka mou ‘ā hake ki he anga totonu; pea ‘oua te mou fai angahala. He ‘oku ‘i ai ‘a e ni‘ihi ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘anau momo‘i ‘ilo ki he ‘Otua. ‘Oku ou lea pehē ko homou fakamaa‘i.
46015035	Ka ‘e ai nai ha taha te ne pehē, Ko e hā ‘a e anga ‘o e fokotu‘u ‘o e pekia? Ko e hā ‘a e anga ‘o e sino te nau ha‘u mo kinautolu?
46015036	‘a e siana ta‘eloto! na‘a mo e me‘a ‘oku ke tō ‘e koe ‘oku ‘ikai fakamo‘ui hake ia ‘o kapau ‘oku ‘ikai mate.
46015037	Pea ko e me‘a ‘oku ke tō, tala‘ehai ‘oku ke tō ‘a e sino‘i me‘a te ne hoko ki ai; ka ko ha momo‘i tenga pē, ha uite nai, pe ha ‘akau kehe:
46015038	ka ‘oku ‘atu ki ai ‘e he ‘Otua ha sino, ‘o fakatatau ki he‘ene tu‘utu‘uni; pea ki he fa‘ahinga tenga takitaha hono sino ‘o‘ona.
46015039	Tala‘ehai ‘oku anga taha ‘a e kakano kotoa pē; kaekehe, ‘oku taha ‘a e kakano ‘o e tangata, kae taha kehe ‘a e kakano ‘o e manu, pea taha kehe ‘a e kakano ‘o e manupuna, pea taha kehe ‘a e kakano ‘o e ika.
46015040	‘Oku ‘i ai foki ‘a e fa‘ahinga sino fakalangi, mo e fa‘ahinga sino fakaemāmani: ka ‘oku taha ‘a e teunga ‘o e fa‘ahinga fakalangi, pea taha kehe ‘a e teunga ‘o e fa‘ahinga fakaemāmani.
46015041	‘Oku taha ‘a e teunga ‘o e la‘ā, pea taha ‘a e teunga ‘o e māhina, pea taha kehe ‘a e teunga ‘o e ngaahi fetu‘u; ‘io, ‘oku fai kehekehe ‘a e teunga ‘o e fetu‘u ko ē mo e fetu‘u ko ē.
46015042	‘Oku pehē mo e Toetu‘u ‘o e Pekia, ‘Oku tō ko e koto ‘auha, ‘e fokotu‘u ko e koto ta‘efa‘a‘auha:
46015043	‘oku tō ko e koto palakū, ‘e fokotu‘u ko e koto teunga‘ia: ‘oku tō ko e koto vaivai, ‘e fokotu‘u ko e koto mālohi;
46015044	‘oku tō ko e sino fakakakano, ‘e fokotu‘u ko e sino fakalaumālie, kapau ‘oku ai ha sino fakakakano, tā ‘oku ‘i ai mo ha sino fakalaumālie.
46015045	‘O hangē foki ko e me‘a kuo tohi, Na‘e hoko ‘a e ‘uluaki tangata, ‘a ‘Ātama, ko e kakano mo‘ui; na‘e hoko ‘a e ‘Ātama kimui, ko e laumālie fakamo‘ui.
46015046	Ka tala‘ehai ‘oku fuofua hoko ‘a e fakalaumālie; kaekehe, ko e fakakakano, pea toki hoko ‘a e fakalaumālie.
46015047	Ko e ‘uluaki Tangata ko e tupu fakaemāmani, ko ha me‘a-efu pē: ko hono ua ‘o e Tangata ko e tupu fakalangi.
46015048	‘Ilonga pe e anga ‘o e Me‘a-efu na, pea ma‘u ia ‘e he fa‘ahinga Me‘a-efu: pea ‘ilonga pē e anga ‘o e Tupu fakalangi na, pea ma‘u ia ‘e he fa‘ahinga Tupufakalangi.
46015049	Pea hangē kuo tau ma‘u ‘a e ‘īmisi ‘o e Me‘a-efu, pehē foki te tau ma‘u ‘a e ‘īmisi ‘o e Tupufakalangi.
46015050	Pea ko eni pē e me‘a ‘oku ou tala atu, kāinga; ‘oku ‘ikai lava ‘e he kakano mo e toto ke hokosi noa pē ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua: ‘uma‘ā ha hokosi ‘e ‘Auha ‘a Ta‘efa‘a‘auha.
46015051	‘Ē! kau tala atu ha misiteli; ‘e ‘ikai te tau mohe kotoa pē, ka te tau liliu kotoa pē, ‘i ha fo‘i mōmeniti,
46015052	‘i ha fo‘i kemo pē, ‘i he ifi fakamui ‘o e talupite: ‘io, ‘e ifi ‘a e talupite, pea ‘e fokotu‘u ‘a e pekia, ‘o ta‘efa‘a‘auha, pea ko kitautolu ‘e liliu.
46015053	He kuo pau ke ‘ai ‘e he me‘a ‘auha ni ‘a e ta‘efa‘a‘auha, pea ke ‘ai ‘e he me‘a mate ni ‘a e ta‘efa‘amate.
46015054	Pea ka ‘ai leva ‘e he me‘a ‘auha ni ‘a e ta‘efa‘a‘auha, mo ‘ai ‘e he me‘a mate ni ‘a e ta‘efa‘amate, pea ‘e toki hokosia ‘a e folofola ko ia na‘e tohi, Kuo fōngia ‘a Mate ‘o liliu ko e ikuna.
46015055	‘E Mate, kofa‘ā ho‘o ikuna na? ‘E Mate, kofa‘ā ho‘o huhu na?
46015056	Ko e huhu ‘a e mate ko e angahala, pea ko e mālohinga ‘o e angahala ko e lao.
46015057	Kae fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otua, he‘ene tuku mai ke tau ikuna ‘i hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi!
46015058	Ko ia, si‘oku kāinga ‘ofa‘anga, ke mou tu‘u ma‘u, ta‘engaue, ‘o mou tupulekina ma‘u ai pē ‘i he ngāue ‘a e ‘Eiki: ‘i ho‘omou ‘ilo ni, ko e me‘a ki he ‘Eiki, ko ho‘omou fakaongosia ‘oku ‘ikai ko e laufanō ia.
46016001	PEA ko e me‘a ki he tānaki tokoni ma‘a e kāinga lotu hangē ko ia na‘a ku tu‘utu‘uni ki he ngaahi siasi ‘i Kalētia, ke pehē pē ho‘omou fai ‘e kimoutolu.
46016002	‘I he ‘uluaki ‘aho ‘o e uike kotoa pē, ke takitaha ta‘ofi ‘i ‘api, ‘o tauhi, ha me‘a kuo hulu atu ‘i he‘ene koloa: koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a ai ha fu‘u tānaki ‘e fai ‘i he‘eku ‘alu atu.
46016003	Pea ‘oka u ka hoko atu, ‘ilonga ha ni‘ihi te mou fili ki ai, te u fekau atu kinautolu mo e ngaahi tohi, ke ‘ave ho‘omou ‘ofa ki Selusalema.
46016004	Pea kapau ‘e taau mo e ‘alu ‘a‘aku, pea te nau ‘alu mo au.
46016005	Pea ko eni, te u ‘alu atu kiate kimoutolu hili ‘eku foli ‘a Masitōnia; he ‘oku ou teu ke foli ‘a Masitōnia.
46016006	Pea hei‘ilo te u nofonofo atu, ‘io, ‘o fa‘ahita‘u momoko nai mo kimoutolu; kae ‘amoutolu hoku moimoi‘i ‘i haku fononga ‘e toki fai.
46016007	He ‘oku ‘ikai te u loto ke fai ni ha ‘ahitu‘u kiate kimoutolu; he ‘oku ou ‘unaloto ke nofonofo hifo mo kimoutolu, ‘o kapau ‘e toki finangalo ki ai ‘a e ‘Eiki.
46016008	Ka te u nofo pē ‘i ‘Efesō, ‘o a‘u ki he Penitekosi;
46016009	he kuo fakaava kiate au ha matapā lahi mo ‘aonga, pea ‘oku tokolahi ‘a e ta‘ofi.
46016010	Pea ko eni, kapau ‘e hoko atu ‘a Tīmote, pea mou tokanga ke ‘oua na‘a ai ha me‘a te ne fai manavasi‘i ai ‘ene feangai mo kimoutolu: he ko e ngāue ‘a e ‘Eiki ia ‘oku ne fai, ‘o tatau pē mo au.
46016011	Ko ia, ke ‘oua na‘a ai ha taha te ne ta‘etoka‘i ia; ka mou moimoi‘i lelei pē ke ne hoko mai kiate au: he ‘oku ou talitali kiate ia, ha‘ane ha‘u mo e kāinga.
46016012	Pea ko e me‘a ki si‘i tokoua ko ‘Āpolosi, ne u kole lahi kiate ia ke ‘alu atu kiate kimoutolu ‘i he ‘alu ‘a e kāinga: ka na‘e ‘ikai te ne momo‘i loto ke ‘alu ‘i he taimi ni; ka te ne ‘alu pē ‘oka ai ha faingamālie.
46016013	Mou ‘ā ‘o le‘o; mou tu‘u ‘aki ‘a e tui; mou fai ‘o ngali tangata; mou fakama‘u hifo.
46016014	‘Ilonga ha‘amou me‘a ‘e fai, fai pē ‘i he ‘ofa.
46016015	Pea ko si‘eku enginaki atu, kāinga. ‘Oku mou ‘ilo ‘a e fāmili ‘o Setivena, ko e fua tapu ia ‘o ‘Akeia, pea na‘a nau tuku kinautolu ‘e kinautolu ke fai ‘a e tauhi ‘o e kakai lotu.
46016016	Ko ia, ‘oku ou enginaki atu, ke mou tuku foki ‘a kimoutolu ki he me‘a ko ia, mo fakaongo ki he fa‘ahinga ko ia; ‘io, pea kiate ia kotoa pē ‘oku kaungā ngāue mo ia mo fakafitefita‘a.
46016017	Pea ‘oku ou fakafeta‘i ‘i he ha‘u ‘a Setivena mo Fotunato mo ‘Akeiko: he ko ‘enau ‘i heni kuo lelu ai ‘eku mamahi ‘i he ‘ikai te tau fe‘ilongaki:
46016018	he kuo nau fakafiemālie hoku loto mo ho‘omoutolu foki. Ko ia ke mou ‘ilo ‘a e fa‘ahinga pehē.
46016019	‘Oku ‘ofa atu ‘a e ngaahi siasi ‘Ēsia. ‘Oku ‘ofa lahi kiate kimoutolu ‘i he ‘Eiki ‘e ‘Akuila mo Pīsila, mo e siasi ‘oku ‘i hona ‘api.
46016020	‘Oku ‘ofa atu ‘a e kāinga lotu kotoa pē. Mou fefekita‘aki ‘aki ha ‘uma tapu.
46016021	Ko e fetapa ‘eni ‘oku fai‘aki ‘a e nima ‘o‘oku, Paula.
46016022	Ka ai ha taha ‘oku ‘ikai te ne ‘ofa ki he ‘Eiki, ke ne hoko koe mala‘ia! MALANATA!
46016023	Ko e kelesi ‘a e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū, ‘ofa ke ‘iate kimoutolu ia!
46016024	Si‘oku ‘ofa atu kiate kimoutolu kotoa pē ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū. ‘Ēmeni.
47001001	TŪ ko kimaua–‘a Paula ko e ‘Aposetolo ‘a Sīsū Kalaisi ‘i he tu‘utu‘uni ‘a e ‘Otua, mo si‘i kāinga ko Tīmote –ko ‘ema tohi ki he siasi ‘a e ‘Otua ‘oku ‘i Kolinitō, mo e kau lotu kotoa pē ‘oku ‘i ‘Akeia kātoa.
47001002	‘Ofa ke mou ma‘u kelesi mo e fiemālie, mei he ‘Otua, ko ‘etau Tamai mo e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi.
47001003	Ha taha ā ke fakamālō‘ia pe ko e ‘Otua mo Tamai ‘a hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi! ‘a ia ko e Tamai ‘a e fai manava‘ofa, mo e ‘Otua ‘oku ‘a‘ana ‘a e tokoni kotoa pē;
47001004	‘a ia ‘oku ne tokoni kimautolu ‘i he‘emau tu‘utāmaki kotoa pē, koe‘uhi ke mau lava ai ke tokoni‘i ‘a kinautolu ‘oku ‘i he tu‘utāmaki kehekehe, ‘aki ‘a e tokoni ‘oku tokoni ‘aki kimautolu ‘e he ‘Otua.
47001005	He hangē ‘oku mahua mai ‘a e ngaahi mamahi ‘a Kalaisi kiate kimautolu; pehē ko e me‘a ‘ia Kalaisi ‘oku mahua mo homau tokoni‘i.
47001006	Ka neongo ko ha tu‘utāmaki ‘oku tō mai, ka ko e fai pē koe‘uhi ko homou tokoni‘i, mo homou fakamo‘ui; pea ka ko ha tokoni ‘oku tō mai, ko e fai ai pē koe‘uhi ko homou tokoni‘i–‘a ē ko ‘ene ngāue ‘a ho‘omou ‘ūkuma ‘a e ngaahi mamahi ‘oku mou mo‘ua tatau ai mo kimautolu.
47001007	Pea ‘oku ‘ikai tālakitu‘a ‘emau ‘amanaki ‘iate kimoutolu; ko ‘emau ‘ilo, hangē ‘oku tau kaungā mamahi, pehē foki ‘oku tau kaungā tokoni‘i.
47001008	He ‘oku ‘ikai te mau loto ke mou ta‘e‘ilo, kāinga, ki he tu‘utāmaki na‘e hoko kiate kimautolu ‘i ‘Ēsia; he‘emau mātu‘aki mafasia ai, ‘o ‘ikai mei lava ke tali, ko ia na‘e mole ‘aupito ‘emau ‘amanaki ki he mo‘ui.
47001009	‘Io, na‘a mau ongona kuo tonu ‘a kimautolu ki he mate: koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a mau falala kiate kimautolu, ka ki he ‘Otua ‘a ia ‘oku ne fokotu‘u ‘a e pekia.
47001010	Pea ko ia ia na‘a ne hamusi kimautolu mei he fu‘u mate‘anga ko ia na‘e pehē fau, pea te ne hamusi: ‘io, ‘oku mau falala kiate ia te ne fai ai pē ‘ene hamusi.
47001011	Kehe ke mou kau ai foki, ‘o tu‘otu‘a ‘i he fai homau lotua: koe‘uhi ā ke hoko ‘i he hū ‘a e tokolahi ‘a homau ‘ofeina, kae fai ‘e ha tokolahi ‘a e fakafeta‘i koe‘uhi ko kimautolu.
47001012	He ko ‘emau pōlepole ‘a ‘eni, ko e fakapapau ‘e homau konisēnisi, ko ‘emau fakafeangai ki māmani, kae‘uma‘ā kiate kimoutolu, na‘e ‘i he mā‘oni‘oni faka‘otua, mo e loto hangataha, ‘o ‘ikai tu‘u ‘i he poto fakakakano, ka ‘i he kelesi ‘a e ‘Otua.
47001013	He tala‘ehai ‘oku mau tohi atu ha me‘a kehe, ka ko ena pē ‘oku mou lau, ‘io mo ongo‘i foki ko e mo‘oni; pea ‘oku te falala te mou ongo‘i kimautolu ‘o a‘u ki he ngata‘anga;
47001014	(‘o hangē foki ne fai ‘e homou ni‘ihi) ‘o pehē, ko homou pōlepole‘anga kimautolu, ‘o hangē ko homau pōlepole‘anga kimoutolu ‘i he ‘Aho ‘o hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū.
47001015	Pea ‘i he‘eku falala pehē, na‘a ku loto ke fuofua ‘alu kiate kimoutolu, koe‘uhi ke mou ma‘u tu‘o ua ha kelesi;
47001016	ka u fou atu ‘iate kimoutolu ki Masitōnia, ‘o u toe ha‘u mei Masitōnia kiate kimoutolu, kae ‘amoutolu hoku moimoi‘i ki Siutea.
47001017	Pea ‘i he‘eku loto pehē, na‘a ku va‘inga‘aki koā? pe ko ‘eku ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni ‘oku fokotu‘u fakaemāmani koā, koe‘uhi ke fai ‘a e ‘Io, ‘Io, mo e ‘Ikai ‘Ikai, ‘ō?
47001018	Ka ko e ‘Otua ‘oku mo‘oni! ‘oku ‘ikai ko e ‘Io pea ‘Ikai ‘a ‘emau ngaahi akonaki ‘oku fai atu.
47001019	He ko e ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otua–‘a Kalaisi Sīsū, ‘a ia na‘e malanga‘aki ‘i homou ha‘oha‘onga ‘e kimautolu, ‘e au mo Silivenusi mo Tīmote,–tala‘ehai ne hoko ia ko e ‘Io pea ‘Ikai; kaekehe kuo ne hoko ko e ‘Io ‘iate ia.
47001020	He neongo pe ‘oku fiha ‘a e ngaahi tala‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua, ka ‘oku tu‘u kotoa pē ‘iate ia hono ‘Io; ko ia ‘oku fou ‘iate ia foki hono ‘Ēmeni; ke ai ha ongoongolelei ‘e hoko ki he ‘Otua ‘iate kimautolu.
47001021	Pea ko eni, ko ia ‘oku ne vilitaki ai pē ‘a kimautolu mo kimoutolu ke tau taha mo ‘ene Pani, pea ne pani foki kitautolu, ko e ‘Otua ia:
47001022	‘a ia foki na‘a ne sila‘i kitautolu, pea ne ‘omi, ‘a e me‘a faka‘amanaki, ko e Laumālie ‘i hotau loto.
47002001	KA ko ‘eku lea ‘eni–ko e ‘Otua ē ke hopo mo hoku loto!–ko hono ‘uhinga ‘o e ‘ikai te u ‘alu atu ki Kolinito, ko ‘eku mamae pē kiate kimoutolu.
47002002	(Ka ‘oku ‘ikai ko ‘eku pehē ‘oku ‘amautolu ke pule ki ho‘omou tui: kaekehe ko e kau tokoni pē kimautolu ki he langa‘i ‘o ho‘omou fiefia. Seuke, ko e me‘a ki he tui ‘oku mou tu‘u.)
47002003	Pea koe‘uhi foki ko au na‘a ku tu‘utu‘uni ai ‘o pehē, ‘E ‘ikai te u toe ‘alu atu ke mamahi. He kapau ‘oku ou fakamamahi‘i kimoutolu, pea ko hai tū ha taha ke fakafiefia‘i au? ‘Ikai ko ia pē kuo mamahi meiate au?
47002004	Pea u tohi ‘a e me‘a ko ia, koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a ku ‘alu atu ‘o kai mamahi meiate kinautolu, ‘a kinautolu na‘a ku mei fiefia ai: ko ‘eku falala ko e anga ‘eni ‘amoutolu fuli pē, ka ai ha‘aku fiefia, ko e fiefia ia ‘amoutolu kotoa.
47002005	He na‘e fai ‘eku tohi kiate kimoutolu mei hoku loto ne fu‘u mafasia mo feinga, pea fu‘u pani lo‘imata ‘eku ngaahi lea; pea na‘e ‘ikai fai ko homou fakamamahi‘i, ka koe‘uhi ke mou ‘ilo ‘eku ‘ofa, ‘ene hulu atu kiate kimoutolu.
47002006	Pea kapau kuo fai fakamamahi ‘e ha taha, ‘oku ‘ikai ko au kuo ne fakamamahi‘i ka ko kimoutolu kotoa–kehe ‘oku mou ongo‘i; he ‘oku ‘ikai te u fie ha‘aki ‘ai ke ne mafasia.
47002007	He kuo lahi pē ki ha toko taha pehē ‘a e tautea na‘e fai ‘e homou tokolahi. Ko ia na‘a mou mei angai mu‘a, ‘o fai hono fakamolemole mo hono fakafiemālie, na‘a ‘iloange ‘e fōngia ‘aupito ha toko taha pehē, ‘oka hulu atu ‘ene mamahi.
47002008	Ko ia, ‘oku ou enginaki atu ke mou fakapapau ho‘omou ‘ofa kiate ia.
47002009	He ko hono ‘uhinga ia foki na‘a ku fai ai ‘eku tohi, ke u ‘ilo ‘a e mo‘onia ‘omoutolu, pe te mou talangofua ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē.
47002010	Ka ko ia ‘oku mou fakamolemole ni ha me‘a ki ai, ‘oku ou fakamolemole mo au: kae‘uma‘ā ko e fakamolemole ‘a‘aku, ‘o kapau kuo u fakamolemole ha me‘a, kuo u fai ko e fakafofonga ‘o Kalaisi, pea koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu:
47002011	telia na‘a kākaa‘i kitautolu ‘e Sētane, he tala‘ehai ‘oku ‘ufikaua ‘iate kitautolu ‘a e ngaahi fāliunga ‘a e toko taha ko ia.
47002012	Pea ko eni, ‘i he‘eku hoko atu ki Taloasi ke malanga‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli ‘o Kalaisi, pea neongo na‘e fakaava kiate au ha matapā ‘i he ngāue ‘a e ‘Eiki;
47002013	ka na‘e ‘ikai manofo ‘a hoku laumālie, ko e ‘ikai te u ‘ilo ai ‘a si‘oku tokoua ko Taitusi: ka na‘a ku fai ‘eku tatau kiate kinautolu, ‘o u ‘alu atu mei ai ki Masitōnia.
47002014	Pea ko eni, fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otua, he‘ene sipikaki kimautolu ma‘u ai pē, ko e me‘a ‘ia Kalaisi, mo ne fakataufa atu ‘iate kimautolu ‘i he potu kotoa pē ‘a e nanamu ko e ‘ilo kiate ia.
47002015	He ko e ngangatu kimautolu ‘o Kalaisi ki he ‘Otua ‘iate kinautolu ‘oku fakatau ki he mo‘ui, mo kinautolu ‘oku fakatau ki mala:
47002016	ki he fa‘ahinga ko ē ko e nanamu ‘o ha mate, pea iku ki ha mate; ka ki he fa‘ahinga ko ē, ko e nanamu ‘o ha mo‘ui pea iku ki ha mo‘ui. Pea ko hai tū ‘oku fe‘unga mo ha fu‘u me‘a pehē?
47002017	He tala‘ehai ko ‘emau anga ke hangē ko e tokolahi ke hu‘i ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua: kaekehe, ko e anga ‘o ‘emau lea ‘ia Kalaisi, ko e lea ‘a ha taha ‘oku loto hanga taha, ko e lea ‘a ha taha ‘oku ha‘u tonu mei he ‘Otua, ko e mātu‘aki lea ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e ‘Otua.
47003001	TĀ ko ‘emau toe kamata ē ke sani kimautolu, ‘ō? tā na‘e mei totonu ‘apē ke mau fai ‘o hangē ko e ni‘ihi, ‘o ma‘u tohi fakaongo ‘i he‘emau ‘alu atu, pea ma‘u foki meiate kimoutolu ‘i he‘emau ō mai, ‘ō?
47003002	‘Ā, ko kimoutolu ko ‘emau tohi kuo tongi ‘i homau loto, ‘o lau mo toe lau ‘e he kakai kotoa pē:
47003003	‘o mou mātu‘aki e‘a ko e tohi na‘e fai ‘e Kalaisi, ‘o ‘ave ‘e kimautolu; ‘a ia ‘oku ‘ikai fai‘aki ‘a e vaitohi, kae ‘aki ‘a e Laumālie ‘o e ‘Otua Mo‘ui, ‘o ‘ikai tongi ‘i ha ngaahi tohi‘anga maka, ka ‘i ha ngaahi tohi‘anga mo‘ui, ko e ngaahi loto.
47003004	Pea ko eni, ko e me‘a ‘ia Kalaisi, ‘oku ‘i ai ha‘amau falala pehē ‘i he‘emau feangai mo e ‘Otua.
47003005	‘Oku ‘ikai ko ‘eku pehē, ‘oku mau fe‘unga ‘e kimautolu ke fakakaukau ha me‘a fakaekimautolu pē; ka ko homau fe‘unga‘anga ‘oku mei he ‘Otua;
47003006	‘a ia foki na‘a ne ngaohi kimautolu ke fe‘unga mo homau lakanga, ko e kau talafekau ‘o e Fuakava Fo‘ou, ‘o ‘ikai ‘o ha tohi, ka ‘o ha laumālie. He ‘oku nofo ‘a e tohi ke tāmate, ka ‘oku nofo ‘a e laumālie ke fakamo‘ui.
47003007	Pea ko eni, ko e tala mate na, ‘a ia na‘e tohi mata‘itohi mo tongi tongi ‘i ha ngaahi maka, ka na‘e pehē fau ‘a e lāngilangi ‘o ‘ene hoko mai, ko ia na‘e ‘ikai lava ‘e ha‘a ‘Isileli ke sio fakamama‘u ki he fofonga ‘o Mōsese, koe‘uhi ko e lāngilangi ‘o hono fōtunga, ‘a ia na‘e mole ngofua.
47003008	Pea kapau ko ia, huanoa ‘a e hoko lāngilangi mai ‘a e tala laumālie.
47003009	‘Io, kapau ko e me‘a lāngilangi ‘a e tala fakamo‘ua, kae huanoa ‘ene hulu atu ‘a e tala fakatonuhia ‘i he lau lāngilangi.
47003010	Pea neongo ko ha me‘a lāngilangi ‘ia, seuke, ‘oku ‘ikai hano lāngilangi ‘i he feitu‘u ko eni, koe‘uhi ko ‘ene fungani hake ‘a e lāngilangi ‘e taha.
47003011	‘Io, kapau na‘e fou lāngilangi mai ‘a e me‘a mole, huanoa ‘ene lāngilangi‘ia ‘a e me‘a tolonga.
47003012	Ko ia, ‘i he‘emau ma‘u ha ‘amanaki pehē, ‘oku mau ‘ai ke mahino ‘aupito ‘emau lea.
47003013	Pea ‘oku ‘ikai te mau fai ‘o hangē ko Mōsese, ‘a ia na‘a ne fa‘a ‘ai ha pulonga ki hono fofonga, koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a sio atu ‘a ha‘a ‘Isileli, ‘o ma‘u ‘ene ngata ‘a e me‘a mole na.
47003014	Kaekehe, na‘e hoko ‘o kanongata‘a honau ‘atamai: seuke, ‘oku kei tu‘u pē ‘a e pulonga pē ko ia, ‘o a‘u mai ki he ‘aho ni, ‘oka fai ‘a e lau ‘o e Fuakava Motu‘a; ‘o ‘ikai tatala ‘a e pulonga ‘o ‘ilo kuo ka‘anga ia ‘ia Kalaisi.
47003015	‘Io, ka fai ha lau ‘o Mōsese ‘oku ma‘u pulonga honau loto, ‘o a‘u ki he ‘aho ni:
47003016	ka ‘oka tafoki ia ke hanga ki he ‘Eiki, pea to‘o ‘a e pulonga.
47003017	Ka ko e ‘Eiki ko eni ko e Laumālie: pea ‘ilonga ha potu ‘oku ‘i ai ‘a e Laumālie ‘o e ‘Eiki ‘oku ‘i ai ‘a e tau‘atāina.
47003018	Ka ko kitautolu kotoa pē, lolotonga ‘etau lau ta‘epūlou, ‘o sio ki he lāngilangi ‘o e ‘Eiki hangē ha ma‘ali mai ‘i ha sio‘ata, ‘oku tau liliu ai ki hono ‘īmisi ko ia, ‘o fai mei ha lāngilangi ki ha lāngilangi, ‘o hangē ai pē ko e ngāue ‘a e ‘Eiki ko Laumālie.
47004001	PEA ko e me‘a ‘i he‘emau ma‘u ‘a e lakanga ko ē (‘a ia ko e ‘ofa tu‘unga‘a pē na‘e fai); ko ia, ‘oku ‘ikai te mau fo‘i.
47004002	Ka mau li‘aki ‘a e fai fufū ‘o e ngaahi me‘a fakamā, ‘o ‘ikai te mau laka fakaoloolo, ‘uma‘ā ha‘amau hu‘i ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua: ka ko ‘emau ‘ai ke e‘a ‘a e mo‘oni, ko e me‘a ia ‘oku mau fakaongo ‘aki kimautolu ki he konisēnisi kehekehe ‘o e kakai ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e ‘Otua.
47004003	Pea kapau ‘oku mo‘oni ‘oku pulonga ‘emau kōsipeli, ‘oku pulonga pē ‘i he kakai ‘oku fakatau ki mala–‘a kinautolu kuo mo‘oni ai ‘a e me‘a.
47004004	Kuo fakakui ‘e he ‘otua ‘o e tu‘u ko eni ‘a e ‘atamai ‘o e kau ta‘etui, koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a hulu‘ia ‘e he ulo mei he Kōsipeli ‘o e lāngilangi ‘o Kalaisi, ‘a ia ko e ‘īmisi ‘o e ‘Otua.
47004005	(He tala‘ehai ‘oku mau malangaekina kimautolu; ka ‘oku mau malanga‘aki ‘a Kalaisi Sīsū ko e ‘Eiki, pea ko kimautolu ko ho‘omou kau tamaio‘eiki koe‘uhi ko Sīsū.)
47004006	He ko e ‘Otua ia na‘a ne folofola, ‘E ulo mai ha maama mei he po‘uli; pea ko ia ia kuo ne ulo ‘i homau loto, koe‘uhi ke ai ha ulo atu ‘o e ‘ilo ki he lāngilangi ‘o e ‘Otua, ‘i he fofonga ‘o Sīsū Kalaisi.
47004007	Ka ko e anga ‘o ‘emau ma‘u ‘a e koloa ko ia, ‘oku fa‘o hina kelekele, koe‘uhi ke ‘a e ‘Otua ai pē ‘a e makehe atu ‘o e mafai, ‘o ‘ikai ko e me‘a meiate kimautolu.
47004008	Ko homau anga ē, ko e fetekeekina kimautolu mei he potu kotoa pē, kae ‘ikai ‘efitu‘ua; ko e fakapalalaua tu‘u kae ‘ikai hē ‘aupito;
47004009	ko e tulia kae ‘ikai li‘ekina ki he fili; ko e te‘ia kae ‘ikai fakamate.
47004010	‘Oku mau ‘alu fano ai pē mo kimautolu ‘i he sino ni ‘a e tau‘aki ‘a Sīsū, koe‘uhi ke hā foki ‘i homau sino ‘a e mo‘ui ‘a Sīsū.
47004011	Seuke, neongo ko e mo‘ui kimautolu, ka ‘oku tukuange ai pē kimautolu ke mate, koe‘uhi ko Sīsū; koe‘uhi ke hā ‘a e mo‘ui foki ‘a Sīsū ‘i he kakano mate ni ‘omautolu.
47004012	Ko ia, ko e mate ia ‘oku ngāue ‘iate kimautolu, ka ko e mo‘ui ‘iate kimoutolu.
47004013	Ka ko e me‘a ‘i he‘emau ma‘u ha laumālie tui, tatau mo ia ‘oku lau ki ai ‘a e Tohitapu, Na‘a ku tui, ko ia na‘a ku lea; pehē ‘oku mau tui foki, ko ia foki ‘oku mau lea:
47004014	he‘emau ‘ilo, ko ia na‘a ne fokotu‘u ‘a Sīsū, te ne fokotu‘u kimautolu foki mo Sīsū, pea ‘atu kimautolu fakataha mo kimoutolu.
47004015	He ko e me‘a ko ia kotoa ‘oku ma‘amoutolu, koe‘uhi ke opeope ‘a e kelesi, ko e me‘a ‘i he tokolahi ‘oku ma‘u ia, pea fakautuutu ai ‘i he‘ene ngāue ‘a e fakafeta‘i, kae ongoongolelei ai ‘a e ‘Otua.
47004016	Ko ia ai, ‘oku ‘ikai te mau fo‘i, ka neongo ‘oku ‘au‘auha homau nge‘esi tangata ni, ka ‘oku fai ai pē ‘a e fakafo‘ou ‘o homau tangata ‘i loto, ‘o hokohoko ‘aho pē.
47004017	He ko homau mamahi ma‘ama‘a ni mo mole, ‘oku ne fakatupu ma‘amautolu ha lāngilangi mamafa mo ta‘engata, ko e me‘a fungani ‘i he fungani ange fau;
47004018	lolotonga ‘oku ‘ikai te mau tokanga‘i ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku hā ni, ka ko e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ‘ikai hā: he ko e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku hā ‘oku fakataimi pē, ka ko e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ‘ikai hā ‘oku faka‘ītāniti.
47005001	‘IO, neongo ‘e veteki homau nofo‘anga fakaemāmani, ‘a ia ko e tēniti pē, ka ‘oku mau ‘ilo kuo ‘i ai ‘i he langi hamau fale langa ‘e he ‘Otua, ko e nofo‘anga na‘e ‘ikai ngaohi nima, ko e me‘a ta‘engata.
47005002	Seuke, lolotonga ‘emau ‘i he tēniti ni ‘oku mau māpuhoi, he‘emau holi ke ‘ai mei tu‘a homau fale tonu mei he langi:
47005003	he ka ‘iloa kitaua, kuo pau tokua kuo ta ‘ai ia, ‘o ‘ikai te ta telefua.
47005004	‘Io, ko kimautolu ‘oku ‘i he tēniti ni, ‘oku mau māpuhoi ‘i he‘emau mafasia; ko e me‘a ‘i he ‘ikai te mau loto ke to‘o ia, ka ke ‘omi ‘a e taha ‘o ‘ai mei tu‘a, koe‘uhi ke fōngia hifo ‘a e me‘a mate ni ‘i he mo‘ui.
47005005	Pea ko eni, ko ia na‘a ne fai homau teu ki he me‘a ko ia ko e ‘Otua, mo ne tuku mai hono me‘a faka‘amanaki ko e Laumālie.
47005006	Ko ia, ‘i he mālohi ai pē ‘emau ‘amanaki, kae‘uma‘ā ‘i he‘emau ‘ilo, ko e lolotonga ‘emau nofo ‘i homau ‘api ki tu‘a ni, ‘a e sino, ‘oku mau mama‘o mo homau ‘api ki ‘ao ki he ‘Eiki;
47005007	he ko ‘emau fononga ‘oku fai ‘aki ‘a e tui, ‘o ‘ikai ‘aki ‘a e mamata–ka ‘oku mālohi pē ‘emau ‘amanaki;
47005008	‘io, ‘oku lelei mu‘a kiate kimautolu ke mama‘o mo homau ‘api ki tu‘a ni, ‘a e sino, ka mau ‘i homau ‘api ki ‘ao, ‘o feangai mo e ‘Eiki.
47005009	Ko ia ai, foki ‘oku mau kakapa ki he me‘a ko eni, pe te mau ‘i he ‘api ko eni, pe te mau mama‘o, kehe pē ke ne hōifua ‘iate kimautolu.
47005010	He kuo pau ke tau mātu‘aki e‘a kotoa pē ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e fakamāu‘anga ‘o Kalaisi; koe‘uhi ke takitaha ma‘u hono totongi ‘o e ngaahi me‘a na‘a ne fai ‘i he sino, ‘o fakatatau ki he me‘a na‘a ne fai, ‘ene lelei pe kovi.
47005011	Ko ia, neongo ‘emau ongona ‘a e ‘apasia ki he ‘Eiki, ‘oku mau fakatui‘i ‘a e kakai kiate kimautolu; ka kuo loa ‘emau e‘a ki he ‘Otua; ‘io, ‘oku te falala kuo mau e‘a ki he konisēnisi ‘omoutolu foki.
47005012	‘Oku ‘ikai ko ‘emau toe sani atu kimautolu ‘eni, ka ko ‘emau ‘atu ha tu‘unga ki ho‘omou vikia kimautolu, koe‘uhi ke mou tali ‘aki kiate kinautolu ‘oku pōlepole ‘i he me‘a ‘oku hā ‘i tu‘a, kae ‘ikai ‘i he me‘a ‘o e loto.
47005013	He kapau ‘oku mau sesele, ka ko e fai ma‘a e ‘Otua: pea kapau ‘oku mau fakapotopoto, ka ko e fai ma‘amoutolu.
47005014	‘Io, ‘oku loki kimautolu ‘e he ‘ofa ‘a Kalaisi; he na‘e pehē ‘emau fakakaukau: na‘e mate ha toko taha ko e fetongi ‘o e kakai kotoa pē: pea tā na‘e mate ai kotoa pē:
47005015	pea ko ‘ene mate ‘o fetongi ‘a e kakai kotoa pē na‘e fai koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a toe mo‘ui ma‘anautolu ‘a e kakai ‘oku mo‘ui, ka ma‘a e toko taha ko ia, ‘a ia na‘a ne pekia mo toetu‘u ko honau fetongi.
47005016	Ko ia, talu e me‘a ko ia mo e ‘ikai te mau ‘ilo ha taha ‘o fakaetangata pē; ‘io, neongo kuo mau lave‘i ‘a Kalaisi ‘o fakaetangata, ka ‘oku ‘ikai te mau kei lave‘i pehē.
47005017	Ko ia foki, kapau ‘oku ‘ia Kalaisi ha taha, ko e mātu‘aki fakatupu fo‘ou ia: kuo mole ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘o ono‘aho, uē kuo nau hoko ‘o fo‘ou.
47005018	Pea ko e ngaahi me‘a kotoa ko ia ‘oku tupu mei he ‘Otua, ‘a ia na‘a ne fai ‘ia Kalaisi ‘a e fakalelei ‘o hono finangalo mo kitautolu, mo ne ‘omi kiate kimautolu ‘a e tala ‘o e fakalelei ko ia:
47005019	‘o pehē tokua, na‘e fai ai pē ‘e he ‘Otua ‘ia Kalaisi ‘ene fakalelei ‘a māmani mo hono finangalo, ‘o ‘oua te ne lau kiate kinautolu ‘enau ngaahi angahala; pea ne hilifaki kiate kimautolu ‘a e lea ‘o e fakalelei.
47005020	Ko ia, ko e kau fakafofonga kimautolu ‘o Kalaisi; tokua ko e ‘Otua ia ‘oku enginaki ‘iate kimautolu: ko ‘emau kole ‘eni ‘oku fai ko e fetongi ‘o Kalaisi: tuku ke fai homou fakalelei mo e ‘Otua.
47005021	Na‘a ne ngaohi ko e koto angahala ‘a e Toko Taha ko ia na‘e ‘ikai te ne ongona ha angahala, koe‘uhi ā ko kitautolu; koe‘uhi ke tau hoko ai ‘iate ia ko e koto mā‘oni‘oni faka‘otua.
47006001	Kae‘uma‘ā ‘i he‘emau kaungā ngāue mo ia ‘oku mau enginaki foki ke ‘oua na‘a iku ho‘omou tali ‘a e kelesi ‘a e ‘Otua ko e laufanō.
47006002	He ‘oku ne folofola, Ko e taimi tali hū ne u ongo‘i ai ko ē, Ko e ‘aho fai fakamo‘ui ne u tokoni ai koe. Vakai mai, ko eni pē e taimi mātu‘aki tali hū; Vakai mai, ko eni pe ‘aho fai fakamo‘ui.
47006003	Kae‘uma‘ā ‘oku mau tokanga ke ‘oua na‘a ai ha tūkia‘anga ‘e tupu ‘i ha‘amau me‘a, na‘a lau‘i ‘a e lakanga.
47006004	Kaekehe ‘oku mau fai ‘a e me‘a ‘oku taau mo e kau sevāniti ‘a e ‘Otua ke fai, ‘oku mau ‘ai ke mau ongolelei ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē–‘i he fa‘a kātaki, ‘i he fa‘a fetekeekina, ‘i he fa‘a faingata‘a‘ia, ‘i he fa‘a ‘efitu‘ua;
47006005	‘i he fa‘a haha, ‘i he fa‘a nofo pilīsone, ‘i he fa‘a ‘ohofia; ‘i he fa‘a ngāue fakaongosia, ‘i he fa‘a ‘ā, ‘i he fa‘a ‘aukai;
47006006	he‘emau anga ma‘a, he‘emau poto ‘i he folofola, he‘emau anga mokomoko, he‘emau anga ‘ofa;
47006007	he‘emau Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni‘ia, he‘emau ‘ofa ta‘eloi, he‘emau tala ‘a e mo‘oni, he‘emau ma‘u ivi mei he ‘Otua;
47006008	ko ‘emau fai‘aki ‘a e mahafu ‘a e tonuhia ‘i to‘omata‘u mo to‘ohema, ko ‘emau ‘asi atu ‘i he toke‘ia mo e ta‘etoke‘ia, he lau‘ikovia mo e lau‘ileleia;
47006009	tokua ko e kau fai kākā mo e kau fai mo‘oni, tokua ko e kau ta‘e‘iloa mo e kau ‘iloa; tokua ‘oku mau tau‘aki, kae uē! ‘oku mau mo‘ui; tokua ko homau tautea ‘oku fai, ka ko eni,
47006010	‘oku ‘ikai te mau mate; tokua ko e kau toloto ‘i he mamahi, ka ‘oku mau fiefia ma‘u ai pē; tokua ko e kau masiva, ka ‘oku mau fakakoloa ha tokolahi; tokua ko e kau ta‘e-ma‘u-ha-me‘a; ‘osi, ‘oku mau mātu‘aki ma‘u ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē.
47006011	Si‘i kau Kolinitō, kuo fu‘u pu‘aki atu ‘e homau ngutu, kuo fano homau loto.
47006012	Ko ho‘omou ‘efi‘efi na ‘oku ‘ikai ‘iate kimautolu, ka ‘oku ‘i he manava ‘omoutolu pē.
47006013	‘Ē, ka u lea hangē ki ha fānau, mou tali ‘eku fai‘aki ha fai pehē, ‘o mou fano mo kimoutolu.
47006014	‘Oua te mou hanga ‘o hoa-‘a-kehe, he nonofo mo e kau ta‘elotu: he ‘e me‘a taha fēfē ‘a e faitotonu mo e malakilao? pe feohi fēfē ‘a e maama mo e po‘uli?
47006015	‘io, ‘o loto taha fēfē ‘a Kalaisi mo Peliali? Pe ‘inasi fakataha fēfē ‘a e lotu mo e ta‘elotu?
47006016	‘io, pea fa‘ahi fēfē ‘a e temipale ‘o e ‘Otua mo e ngaahi ‘aitoli? He ko kitautolu ko e temipale ‘o e ‘Otua Mo‘ui; ‘o hangē ko ‘ene folofola ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘o pehē, Te u fale ‘aki kinautolu, te u ‘eve‘eva ‘iate kinautolu, pea te u nofo ko honau ‘Otua, pea te nau nofo ko hoku kakai.
47006017	Ko ia, mou hiki mei honau lotolotonga, pea mavahe kimoutolu, pea ‘oua te mou ala ki he me‘a ta‘ema‘a; ko e folofola ē ‘a e ‘Eiki–
47006018	Pea te u ma‘u kimoutolu ‘e au, pea te u nofo atu ma‘amou tamai, pea te mou nofo mai mōku ngaahi foha mōku ngaahi ‘ōfefine–ko e folofola ē ‘a e ‘Eiki Fakaleveleva.
47006019	Ko ia, si‘oku ‘ofa‘anga, he‘etau ma‘u ha ngaahi palōmesi pehē fau, tau fakama‘a kitautolu mei he ‘uli kotoa pē ‘o e kakano mo e loto, ‘o tau fakakakato ‘etau mā‘oni‘oni ‘i he ‘apasia ki he ‘Otua.
47007001	Ē, tuku hamau feitu‘u ‘i homou loto: tala‘ehai na‘a mau ngāue ta‘etotonu ki ha taha, tala‘ehai na‘a mau maumau‘i ha taha, tala‘ehai na‘a mau fakahekeheke‘i ha taha.
47007002	‘Oku ‘ikai te u lea pehē ko e valoki: seuke, kuo ‘osi ‘eku fakahā ‘oku mou ‘i homau loto ke mate mo mo‘ui fakataha mo kimoutolu.
47007003	‘Oku lahi ‘ete falala kiate kimoutolu, ‘oku lahi ‘ete pōlepole ‘iate kimoutolu.
47007004	Kuo u fonu ngutungutu ‘i he fiemālie na‘e ‘omi; ‘oku hake fu‘u ‘a e fiefia, pea ngalo ai ‘emau ngaahi mamahi kehekehe.
47007005	He na‘a mo ‘emau ōmai ki Masitōnia ni, ka na‘e ‘ikai momo‘i manofo homau kakano, ka na‘e tautu‘u mai homau fakamamahi mei he potu kotoa pē: mei tu‘a ko e koto fepaki, mei loto ko e koto hoha‘a.
47007006	Ka ko e ‘Otua, ‘a ia ‘oku ne tokoni ai pē kiate kinautolu ‘oku mo‘ulaloa, na‘a ne tokoni‘i kimautolu ‘aki ‘a e lava mai ‘a Taitusi:
47007007	‘o ‘ikai ‘aki ‘ene lava mai pē, kae ‘aki ‘a e tokoni foki, ‘a ia ne tokoni ‘aki ia ‘e kimoutolu: he na‘e pehē ‘ene fakamatala kiate kimautolu ho‘omou holi mai, ho‘omou fakamamahi, ho‘omou mamahi‘i au; ko ia na‘e ‘āsili ai ‘eku fiefia.
47007008	He neongo na‘a ku fakamamahi‘i kimoutolu ‘aki ‘eku tohi, ‘oku ‘ikai te u tālakitu‘a ‘i he‘eku fai ia, ka ‘oku mo‘oni na‘a ku tālakitu‘a ai.
47007009	Neongo na‘e fuonounou, ka ‘oku ou vakai na‘e ‘i ai mo‘oni ho‘omou mamahi ‘i he tohi ko ia; ka ‘oku ou fiefia ‘eni, ‘o ‘ikai pē koe‘uhi ko ho‘omou mamahi, ka koe‘uhi na‘e iku ho‘omou mamahi ki ho‘omou fakatomala: he ko homou fakamamahi na‘e fai ‘i he funga ‘o e finangalo ‘o e ‘Otua, ke ‘oua na‘a ai hamou maumau‘i ‘e hoko ‘i he‘emau ngāue.
47007010	He ko e mamahi ‘oku faka‘otua hono fai, ‘oku ne langa‘i ha fakatomala ‘oku iku ki ha fakamo‘ui, ‘a ia ‘e ‘ikai tālakitu‘a ai ha taha: ka ko e mamahi ‘oku fakaemāmani ‘oku ne fakatupu mate.
47007011	He vakai ‘a e me‘a na, ‘a ho‘omou mamahi faka‘otua na‘e fai, hono nifi ‘a e feinga na‘e tupu ai ‘iate kimoutolu! kae‘uma‘ā ‘a e faka‘ata‘atā kimoutolu, ‘uma‘ā ‘a e faka‘ise‘isa‘ia, ‘uma‘ā ‘a e manavahē mai, ‘uma‘ā ‘a e holi mai, ‘uma‘ā ‘a e manavakāvakava, ‘uma‘ā ‘a e fai tautea! Kuo mou fai homou tūkuingata ke fakahā ‘oku mou ‘ata‘atā ‘i he me‘a.
47007012	‘Āua; he neongo na‘a ku tohi pehē atu, tala‘ehai na‘a ku fai koe‘uhi ko e siana na‘e fai ‘a e kovi, ‘uma‘ā ‘a e tangata na‘e fai ki ai ‘a e kovi; ka koe‘uhi ke e‘a kiate kimoutolu, pea ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e ‘Otua, ‘a e toka homou loto kiate kimautolu.
47007013	Ko hono ‘uhinga ia ‘e taha ‘o ‘emau fiemālie na‘e fai: ka na‘e fakalahi ki ai, ‘io, ko e me‘a na‘e fu‘u hulu atu ai ‘emau fiefia, ko e fiefia ‘a Taitusi, koe‘uhi kuo ma‘u nonga hono loto meiate kimoutolu kotoa pē.
47007014	He ka ai ha‘aku pōlepole ‘iate kimoutolu ne fai kiate ia, ne ‘ikai fakamaa‘i ai au; kaekehe hangē na‘e mo‘oni ‘emau ngaahi lea kehekehe na‘e fai kiate kimoutolu, pehē foki na‘e hā ‘oku mo‘oni mo ‘emau pōlepole na‘e fai ‘i he ‘ao ‘o Taitusi.
47007015	‘Io, ‘oku ‘āsili ngaue hono fatu kiate kimoutolu ‘i he‘ene fa‘a manatu hake ki he talangofua ‘amoutolu kotoa pē, ‘a ho‘omou tali ia ‘i he ‘apasia mo e tailiili.
47007016	‘Ā, ‘oku te fiefia; he ko e me‘a ‘i ho‘omou ngāue, ‘oku te to‘a ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē.
47008001	PEA ko eni, ‘oku mau ongoongo atu, kāinga, ‘a e kelesi kuo tuku mei he ‘Otua ki he ngaahi siasi ‘i Masitōnia;
47008002	‘o pehē, neongo na‘e ‘ahi‘ahi‘i kinautolu ‘aki ha fu‘u mamahi, ka na‘e opeope ‘enau fiefia: pea neongo e ‘ango‘ango ‘enau masiva, ka ka mahake mei ai ha fu‘u koloa foaki.
47008003	‘Io, ‘oku ou fakamo‘oni, kuo nau fai ki he ngātanga ‘o ‘enau mafai, ‘io, ‘o mahili atu;
47008004	pea ko e langa‘i ‘e kinautolu, he‘enau kole fakamātoato ke mau ofa ‘o tuku ke nau kau ‘i he tokoni‘i ‘o e fa‘ahinga tapu.
47008005	Kae‘uma‘ā e me‘a tēpū, ‘a ia na‘e ‘ikai te mau ‘amanekina, na‘a nau li‘aki kinautolu ki he ‘Eiki, pea kiate kimautolu foki, ‘i he hā ko e finangalo ia ‘o e ‘Otua.
47008006	Ko ia, na‘a mau kole kia Taitusi, ko e me‘a ‘i he ‘a‘ana ‘a e langa‘i ‘o e kelesi ni ‘iate kimoutolu, ko ia ke ne ‘alu atu foki ‘o fakahaohaoa ia.
47008007	Kehe pē, he hangē ‘oku mou hulu atu ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē–‘i he tui, mo e akonaki, mo e ‘ilo loloto, mo e feinga kehekehe, kae‘uma‘ā ‘i he ‘ofa kiate kimautolu –ke pehē foki ho‘omou hulu atu ‘i he kelesi ko eni.
47008008	‘Oku ‘ikai te u lea pehē ko e fekau; ka ko ‘eku fakahaa‘ia ‘a e feinga ‘a e kakai kehe, ke u sivi ai ‘a e mo‘oni ‘o e ‘ofa ‘amoutolu foki.
47008009	(Seuke, ‘oku mou ‘ilo ‘a e ‘ofa ‘a hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi he‘ene koloa‘ia, ka ne hoko ko e masiva koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu, koe‘uhi ko e me‘a ‘i he‘ene masiva ke mou hoko ko e koloa‘ia.)
47008010	‘Io, ‘i he me‘a ni ko ‘eku fakakaukau pē ‘oku ‘atu: he ko ia pē ‘oku taau mo ha ni‘ihi pehē; he na‘a mou kamata ‘i he ta‘u kuo hili, ‘o mu‘omu‘a ‘i he ngaahi siasi ko ē; ‘o ‘ikai ‘i hono kamata fai pē ‘o e me‘a, ka ‘i hono o‘i foki.
47008011	‘Ē, ke mou faka‘osi ‘eni hono fai foki: he ‘oku mo‘oni na‘a mou loto lelei leva ke o‘i, ka koe‘uhi ke ai hano faka‘osi ‘e hoa mo ia, pea taau mo ho‘omou mafai.
47008012	He kapau ko loto fiefai ‘oku ta‘utu mai, ko ‘ene hōifua ai ‘a e ‘Eiki ‘oku fakafuofua ‘aki ‘a e me‘a ‘oku ne ma‘u, ‘o ‘ikai ‘aki ‘a e me‘a ‘oku ‘ikai te ne ma‘u.
47008013	Pea tala‘ehai ko e fai ‘eni ke ma‘u fiemālie ai ha ni‘ihi, kae mafasia kimoutolu;
47008014	‘ikai, ka ko e fai‘aki ‘a e lao ‘o e fakafe‘unga: ‘o pehē, ‘i he taimi ko eni, ke lave atu ho‘omou me‘a hulu ki he‘enau me‘a ta‘ea‘u; kae toki lave mai foki ‘enau me‘a hulu ki ho‘omou me‘a ta‘ea‘u, koe‘uhi ke ai ha fakafe‘unga:
47008015	‘o hangē ko e folofola, Ko ia na‘a ne tufi ‘o lahi na‘e ‘ikai tomo atu, pea ko ia na‘e tufi ‘o si‘i, na‘e ‘ikai ta‘ekakato.
47008016	Pea fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otua, he‘ene fakatupu ‘i he loto ‘o Taitusi ha tokanga kiate kimoutolu ‘oku hangē ko ha‘aku.
47008017	He ko ‘ene ‘alu atu na, ‘oku mo‘oni ko ‘ene tali ‘eku kole, ka na‘e kimui ia, ka kuo loa ‘ene tokanga ‘e ia ke fai.
47008018	Pea ko eni kuo mau fekau ke ō mo ia ‘a si‘i kāinga ko ia, ‘a ia ‘oku ne ongoongolelei ‘i he Ngāue ‘i he ngaahi siasi kotoa pē;
47008019	pea ‘ikai‘ia ko ia, ka na‘e fili ia foki ‘e he ngaahi siasi ‘i he hiki nima, ke kau mo kimautolu ‘i he ‘ave ‘o e ‘ofa ni, ‘a ia kuo tuku kiate kimautolu hono tauhi; telia ‘a e ongoongolelei ‘o e ‘Eiki, pea koe‘uhi ke mau fie tali ‘a e ngāue ko ia–
47008020	ko ‘emau faka‘ehi‘ehi pehē, na‘a lau‘i kimautolu ‘e ha taha ‘i he fu‘u koloa ni kuo tuku kiate kimautolu hono tauhi.
47008021	He ko ‘emau anga ke tomu‘a fakakaukau‘i ‘emau ngaahi me‘a ke hā lelei, ‘o ‘ikai ki he ‘Otua pē, ka ki he tangata foki.
47008022	Pea kuo mau fekau ke ō mo kinaua ‘a si‘omau kāinga ‘e taha; ko e toko taha kuo tu‘o lahi ‘emau sivi, pea ‘i he ngaahi me‘a lahi, ‘o mau ‘ilo ko e taha ‘oku feinga mo‘oni: pea ‘i he taimi ni ‘oku ‘āsili lahi ‘ene feinga ko ‘ene falala ‘aupito kiate kimoutolu.
47008023	Ko ia, kapau ko e ‘eke kia Taitusi, ko e kaume‘a ia ‘o‘oku, kae‘uma‘ā ko e kaungā ngaue ‘o‘oku ‘i he fai kiate kimoutolu. Pea kapau ko e ‘eke ki si‘i ongo kāinga ni, ko e ongo fakafofonga kinaua ‘o e ngaahi siasi, pea ko e lāngilangi ‘o Kalaisi.
47008024	Ko ia, ko ho‘omou tuku ke hā kiate kinautolu ‘a e mo‘oni ‘o ho‘omou ‘ofa, mo e mo‘oni ‘o ‘emau pōlepole ‘iate kimoutolu, ko ho‘omou mātu‘aki fai ia ki he ngaahi siasi.
47009001	HE ko e me‘a ki he tokoni ki he fa‘ahinga tapu, seuke koe‘uma‘ā ‘eku tohi atu ai:
47009002	he ‘oku ou ‘ilo ho‘omou loto fiefai; ‘io, ko ia ia ‘oku ou fa‘a pōlepole ai ‘iate kimoutolu ki he kau Masitōnia, he‘eku pehē, Talu e ta‘u kuo hili mo e ‘osi teu ‘a ‘Akeia: pea ko ho‘omou fai velenga ko ia na‘e o‘i ai ‘a e tokolahi.
47009003	Ka neongo ia, ka kuo u tuku atu ‘a e kāinga na, na‘a hala ‘i he fo‘i me‘a ko eni ‘emau pōlepole ‘iate kimoutolu ne fai; ka koe‘uhi ke kakato ho‘omou teu, ‘o hangē ko ia kuo u fa‘a lau ki ai:
47009004	na‘a ‘iloange ‘e ō atu mo au ha kau Masitōnia, ‘o nau ‘ilo kimoutolu kuo te‘eki ke ‘osi, pea mau mā ai kimautolu ‘i he tu‘anaki ko eni (tuku kehe pē ‘a e mā ‘amoutolu).
47009005	Ko ia, na‘a ku pehē, ko hono mei lelei ke u kole ki he kāinga na ke mu‘omu‘a atu kiate kimoutolu, ‘o sinaki fakamā‘opo‘opo ho‘omou me‘a‘ofa na, ‘a ia kuo loa hono fakahaa‘i; koe‘uhi ke napangapangamālie ia, ‘o ngali ko ha me‘a‘ofa, ‘o ‘ikai ko ha ‘atu mamae.
47009006	Kae manatu, Ko ia ‘oku fakakaisi‘i ‘ene fakaheka ‘e fakakaisi‘i foki ‘ene utu mai: pea ko ia ‘oku fakakailahi ‘ene fakaheka ‘e fakakailahi foki ‘ene utu mai.
