47009007	Ke takitaha fai ki he me‘a kuo ne tu‘utu‘uni ‘i hono loto; pea ‘oua ‘e fai ‘i he mamahi, pe ko e pu‘ia; he ‘oku ‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua ki ha taha ‘oku vēkeveke foaki.
47009008	Pea ‘oku mafai noa pē ‘e he ‘Otua ke ‘atu ke mou fonu mahuohua ‘i he fa‘ahinga foaki kotoa pē; koe‘uhi ke fe‘unga ho‘omou koloa kehekehe ‘i he taimi kotoa pē mo e me‘a kotoa pē, pea toe ha‘amou me‘a ke fai‘aki ‘a e ngāue lelei kehekehe.
47009009	Hangē ko e folofola, Na‘e laku tavale ‘e ia, Ne ne tufa ki he masiva, ‘E tolonga ‘ene fai lelei ‘o ta‘engata.
47009010	Pea ko ia ‘oku ne tokonaki ‘a e pulopula ki he tō mo e me‘a ki he kai, te ne tokonaki mo fakalahi ho‘omou pulopula, pea fakatupulekina ‘a e fua ‘o ho‘omou fai lelei:
47009011	kae alaisia alaikolonga homou fakakoloa‘ia, koe‘uhi ke alaisia alaikolonga ho‘omou foaki, ‘a ia ko e me‘a fakatupu fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otua, ‘i he‘emau tufaki.
47009012	He ko e fai tokoni ni ma‘a hotau kakai, ‘oku ‘ikai ngata pē ‘ene ‘aonga ‘i he fakakakato ‘o e masiva ‘o e fa‘ahinga tapu; ka ‘oku ope atu foki ko e ngaahi fu‘u fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otua;
47009013	ko e fakamālō‘ia ‘a e ‘Otua ‘e he kakai, koe‘uhi ko e ngaahi me‘a kuo hā mo‘oni ‘i he tokoni ni–‘a ho‘omou fai ki ho‘omou tukupā ki he Kōsipeli ‘o Kalaisi, pea mo e ‘aufuatō ‘o ho‘omou fie kau kiate kinautolu pea mo e kāinga kotoa pē;
47009014	kae‘uma‘ā ‘i he‘enau lotua kimoutolu, te nau faka‘amu ke mou fe‘iloaki koe‘uhi ko e opeope ‘iate kimoutolu ‘a e kelesi ‘a e ‘Otua.
47009015	‘Ē, fakafeta‘i mu‘a ki he ‘Otua, he‘ene me‘a‘ofa ko ia ‘oku ta‘emalaua.
47010001	PEA ko eni, ko au Paula ‘oku ou kole atu ‘aki ‘a e fa‘a kātaki mo e fakaalaala ‘a Kalaisi: ‘a kita ‘oku te hā ‘i tu‘a ko e feifei‘avale ‘i he‘ete ‘iate kimoutolu, ka ‘i he‘ete toki mama‘o tokua, pea ngali to‘a ‘ete fai atu;
47010002	‘io, ko au ia ‘oku ou hū atu, ke ‘oua na‘a ai ha‘aku ngali to‘a foki ‘i he‘eku ‘i ai, he‘eku tu‘unganaki hoku lakanga; ‘a ia ‘oku ou pehē ke ‘ahi‘ahi ai ha me‘a ki ha ni‘ihi, ‘a kinautolu ‘oku nau pehē ‘oku mau fou fakaekakano pē.
47010003	Seuke! Neongo ‘oku mau fou ‘i he kakano, tala‘ehai ‘oku fakaekakano ‘emau fai tau.
47010004	He ko e mahafu ‘o e tau ‘oku mau fai, ‘oku ‘ikai ko e koto kakano, ka ko e mahafu kuo olo‘i ‘e he ‘Otua mo‘o holoki ‘o e ngaahi kolotau.
47010005	‘O mau holoki ‘aki ‘a e ngaahi fakakaukau, mo e mā‘olunga kotoa pē ‘oku fokotu‘u ke ta‘ofi ‘a e ‘ilo ki he ‘Otua; pea mau taki pōpula ‘a e feinga kotoa pē ‘a e loto ke fakavaivai kia Kalaisi:
47010006	‘o mau tali teu ke toki tautea ‘a e talangata‘a kotoa pē, ‘oka kakato ho‘omou fakavaivai.
47010007	‘Oku mou tokanga pē koā ki he me‘a ‘oku hā ‘i tu‘a? Ka ai ha taha ‘oku ne falala ko e toko taha ia ‘o Kalaisi, ‘ē, ke ne toe fakakaukau‘i ‘a e me‘a ‘e ia, ‘o ‘ilo ‘a e me‘a ni: neongo pe ko e hā ‘ene kaunga ‘a‘ana kia Kalaisi, ka ‘oku mau tatau ai foki.
47010008	Seuke, tala‘ehai ‘e lava haku fakamaa‘i, ‘o kapau ‘e toe taha atu ‘eku pōlepole ‘i he pule kuo tuku ‘e he ‘Eiki kiate kimautolu: (‘a ia na‘e tuku mai mo‘omou langa hake, ‘o ‘ikai mo‘omou holoki):
47010009	ka telia na‘a hangē ko ha‘ate fie fakamana‘i kimoutolu ‘aki ‘ete ngaahi ‘ipiseli.
47010010	He ‘oku lau tokua, Ko ‘ene ngaahi ‘ipiseli ‘oku mamafa mo kaukaua; ka ko e fotu mai ‘o hono sino ‘oku masivesiva, pea ko ene lea ‘oku pasī pē.
47010011	‘Ē, ke fakakaukau mu‘a ‘e he toko taha lau pehē, ‘o ne ‘ilo ‘a e me‘a ni, ko ‘emau ngaahi ‘ulungālau ‘i he‘emau ngaahi ‘ipiseli ‘oka mama‘o, ko ‘emau ngaahi ‘ulungāngāue ai pē ia ‘oka mau ka ‘i ai.
47010012	He ‘oku ‘ikai te mau fa‘a pehē, kuo mau a‘usia ha ni‘ihi ‘i he fa‘ahinga na ‘oku sani kinautolu, pe te mau fa‘a fakatatau kimautolu ki ai: ka ‘oku ‘ikai te nau ngali poto, he‘enau fua kinautolu ‘aki kinautolu, mo ‘enau fakatatau kinautolu mo kinautolu.
47010013	Ka ko kimautolu ‘e ‘ikai te mau pōlepole ta‘eha kau‘ā; ka ko hono kau‘ā ko e ngafa na‘e vahe mai ‘e he ‘Otua, ‘a ia na‘e pehē ke mātu‘aki a‘u kiate kimoutolu.
47010014	He tala‘ehai ko ‘emau toloaki ‘eni homau kau‘ā, ‘o hangē ‘oku ‘ikai te mau a‘u atu; he na‘e mātu‘aki a‘u kiate kimautolu ‘enau ongoongo ‘a e Kōsipeli ‘o Kalaisi.
47010015	Pea neongo ‘oku ‘ikai kau ‘eni ‘emau pōlepole ki he tu‘a kau‘ā, ‘o fai ‘i he fua ‘o e ongosia ‘a e kakai kehe; ka ‘oku ma‘u ‘emau ‘amanaki, ka mou ka tupulekina ‘i he lotu, pea ‘e toki fakalahi meiate kimoutolu, (ka ‘i homau ngafa pē ‘omautolu)
47010016	‘o mau totolo atu ki he ngaahi feitu‘u ki kō atu, ke malanga‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli; ‘o ‘ikai ‘i he ngafa ‘o ha taha kehe ke mau pōlepole ‘i he ngaahi me‘a ne ‘osi teu.
47010017	Ka ko ia ‘oku pōlepole, ke tu‘unga ‘ene pōlepole mei he ‘Eiki:
47010018	he tala‘ehai ko e mālō ia ‘a ia ‘oku ne sani ia ‘e ia, ka ko ia ‘oku sani ‘e he ‘Eiki.
47011001	TAUANGE mo kimoutolu ke mou kātaki si‘aku fai fakasesele! ka ko ‘eku lau ki ai: he ‘oku mou fa‘a kātaki ‘eku tō‘onga.
47011002	He ‘oku ou fua‘atekina kimoutolu, he‘eku fua‘a telia ‘a e ‘Otua: he na‘a ku moa‘uli‘i kimoutolu ke mali mo ha toko taha pē, ‘io, ke u ‘atu kimoutolu kia Kalaisi ko e ta‘ahine molumalu.
47011003	Pea ‘oku te manavahē tu‘u na‘a ‘iloange ‘e le‘ei ho‘omou tokanga, ‘o mou hiki mei ho‘omou toka taha mo nofo molumalu kia Kalaisi; ‘o hangē ne kākaa‘i ‘a ‘Ivi ‘e he Ngata ‘aki ‘ene olo.
47011004	‘Io, kapau ‘oku malanga‘aki ‘e he ha‘u fo‘ou na ha Sīsū ‘e taha, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘ikai ko e Sīsū na‘a mau malanga‘aki; pea kapau ‘oku mou ma‘u ai ha Laumālie ‘oku fa‘a hinga kehe mo ia na‘a mou ma‘u mu‘a, pe ha Kōsipeli ‘oku fai kehe mo ia na‘a mou tomu‘a tali; pea tā ‘oku tonuhia pē ho‘omou kātaki ‘ene tō‘onga.
47011005	He seuke, ‘oku te pehē ‘e kita ‘oku ‘ikai te te momo‘i tōmui ‘i he ha‘a ‘aposetolo makehe atu na.
47011006	He neongo nai ko e kapo kita ‘i he lea, ka tala‘ehai ‘oku ou pehē ‘i he ‘ilo me‘a loloto: kaekehe, ‘ilonga ha me‘a na‘a mau fai ki ai, na‘a mau ‘ai ke matala ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e kakai kotoa pē ke ‘aonga kiate kimoutolu.
47011007	Ka na‘a kuo u angahala ko ‘eku fakamā‘ulalo ke lava ai homou fakamā‘olunga, ‘ō? ‘A ‘eku malanga‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli ‘a e ‘Otua kiate kimoutolu ta‘etotongi.
47011008	Na‘a ku fakamasiva ‘a e ngaahi siasi kehe, ‘o u ma‘u ‘oho mei ai ki he‘eku ngāue kiate kimoutolu.
47011009	Pea ‘i he‘eku ‘iate kimoutolu, pea faifai pea u masiva, ka tala‘ehai na‘a ku tuku tāupe ‘i ha taha: he na‘e fakaai hoku masiva ‘e he kāinga ‘i he‘enau omi mei Masitōnia. Pea ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē na‘a ku ta‘ofi au, ke ‘oua na‘a ku hoko ko e kavenga kiate kimoutolu; ‘io, pea te u ta‘ofi ai pē.
47011010	Ko e mo‘oni ‘a Kalaisi ‘oku ou fai‘aki, ‘o u pehē ‘e ‘ikai ta‘ofi au mei he pōlepole ko ia ‘i he ngaahi feitu‘u ‘o ‘Akeia.
47011011	Ko e hā nai? Ko e ‘ikai te u ‘ofa kiate kimoutolu, ‘ō? ‘Ā, ‘oku mea‘i ia ‘e he ‘Otua.
47011012	Ka ko e me‘a ‘oku ou fai, te u fai ai pē foki; koe‘uhi ke u motuhi ‘aupito ‘a e tu‘unga ‘o e fa‘ahinga na ‘oku fie ma‘u ha tu‘unga ki he‘enau lau; pea ke nau hoko ‘o hangē ko kimautolu ‘i he me‘a ko ia ‘oku nau pōlepole ai.
47011013	He ko e fa‘ahinga ko ia, ko e kau ‘aposetolo loi, ko e kau ngāue fakahekeheke: ‘oku nau ‘ai ai pē ‘a e anga ‘o e kau ‘aposetolo ‘a Kalaisi.
47011014	Pea ko hai ‘e ofo ai? He na‘a mo Sētane ‘oku ne ‘ai ‘a e anga ‘o ha ‘āngelo mei he maama.
47011015	Pea tala‘ehai ko e me‘a fakaofo ‘a e ‘ai ‘e he‘ene kau sevāniti ‘a e anga tofu pē ‘o e kau sevāniti ‘a faitotonu: ka ko e iku‘anga ‘o e fa‘ahinga ko ia ‘e fakatatau ki he‘enau ngāue.
47011016	Ka u foki ki he‘eku lea: ‘ofa ke ‘oua na‘a lau au ‘e ha taha ko e sesele: pea kapau ‘e ‘ikai lava ia, pe‘i tali pē au ‘aki ‘a e tali ‘o e sesele, koe‘uhi ke u fai mo au ha‘aku ki‘i pōlepole.
47011017	Ko e me‘a ‘oku ou teu lau, tala‘ehai ‘oku ou lau ko ‘eku ma‘u ha fa‘ifa‘itaki‘anga mei he ‘Eiki; ka ‘oku hangē kuo u puke fakasesele he‘eku falala pehē ki he pōlepole.
47011018	Ko eni ‘oku ‘i ai ha tokolahi ‘oku pōlepole fakakakano, ko ia ka u pōlepole mo au.
47011019	He seuke! ‘Oku mou kātaki fiemālie ‘a e kau sesele: kae fēfē, he ko e kau poto kimoutolu.
47011020	Seuke, ‘oku mou kātaki pē neongo ‘ene fakapōpula‘i kimoutolu ‘e ha taha, neongo ‘ene kai ‘o ‘osi ho‘omou me‘a, neongo ‘ene tauhele‘i kimoutolu, neongo ‘ene fakahīkihiki ia, neongo ‘ene sipi‘i homou mata, ka ‘oku mou kātaki ia.
47011021	Tā ‘oku hoa ‘eku lea mo hoku lau‘i, ‘a e pehē na‘a mau vaivai. Ka ‘ilonga ha me‘a ‘oku tu‘unga ai ha taha ‘ene mālohi, ko e me‘a ko ia ‘oku ou mālohi ai au (ko ‘eku fakasesele ‘eni ‘oku lea).
47011022	Ko e Hepelū koā kinautolu? pehē mo au. Ko e ‘Isileli kinautolu? pehē mo au, Ko e hako ‘o ‘Epalahame kinautolu? pehē mo au.
47011023	Ko e kau sevāniti ‘a Kalaisi kinautolu? (ka u lea hangē ha kua) makehe atu pē au: he hulu atu ‘eku fakafitefita‘a, he hulu atu ‘eku nofo pilīsone, he ngei hoku taa‘i, he tu‘o lahi ‘eku tei mate–
47011024	Ne tu‘o nima mālō hoku kaui‘imaea‘i ‘e he kakai Siu, pea ka nau ka fai, na‘e toe ‘a e hapo ‘e taha pea kakato ‘a e fāngofulu‘i hapo;
47011025	kuo tu‘o tolu hoku loholoho‘i faka-Loma, tu‘o taha hoku tolomaka‘i, tu‘o tolu ‘eku vaka mamate, ko e ‘aho kotoa mo e pō mo ‘eku kakau ‘i he moana–he‘eku fononga tu‘o lahi;
47011026	he‘eku fa‘a meimei tu‘utāmaki ‘i he ngaahi vaitafe, he‘eku fa‘a meimei tu‘utāmaki ‘i he ngaahi kaiha‘akau, he‘eku fa‘a meimei tu‘utāmaki ko e ngāue ‘a hoku fa‘ahinga, he‘eku fa‘a meimei tu‘utāmaki mei he Senitaile, he‘eku fa‘a meimei tu‘utāmaki ‘i kolo, he‘eku fa‘a meimei tu‘utāmaki ‘i tua‘ā, he‘eku fa‘a meimei tu‘utāmaki ‘i tahi, he‘eku fa‘a meimei tu‘utāmaki mei he kau lotu loi;
47011027	he fitefita‘a mo e ongosia, he‘eku fa‘a ‘ā fuoloa, he‘eku fiekaia mo fie inua, he‘eku fa‘a ‘aukai, he‘eku mokosia mo masiva kofu.
47011028	Pea ke ‘oua na‘a ku lau kotoa, ka ‘oku ‘i ai ‘eku kavenga ‘oku hilifaki mai ‘i he ‘aho kotoa pē, ko e lotomo‘ua he tauhi ‘o e ngaahi siasi.
47011029	‘Anefē ha vaivai ha taha, ‘o ‘ikai te u vaivai ai? ‘Anefē ha humu ha taha, ‘o ‘ikai te u vevela ai?
47011030	‘Ē, ka kuo pau ke u pōlepole, pea tā te u pole pē he‘eku ngaahi vaivai ‘anga.
47011031	Ko e ‘Otua mo Tamai ‘a e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū, ‘a ‘ene ‘Afio ‘oku ‘o‘ona ‘a e fakamālō ‘o lauikuonga, ‘oku ne mea‘i ‘oku ‘ikai te u loi.
47011032	‘I he‘eku ‘i Tāmasikusi, na‘e le‘ohi ‘a e kolo ‘o e kau Tāmasikusi ‘e he kōvana ‘a e tu‘i ko ‘Aletasi, ko ‘ene fie puke au:
47011033	pea na‘e fakahū au ‘i ha tupa ‘i ha kato, ‘o tukutukuhifo kitua‘ā, pea u hao meiate kinautolu.
47012001	TĀ kuo pau ke u pōlepole: pea neongo ‘e ‘ikai te u hā lelei ai, ka u fai atu pē ki he ngaahi vīsone, mo e fa‘a fakahā me‘a mei he ta‘ehāmai ‘e he ‘Eiki.
47012002	‘Oku ‘i ai ha tangata Kalisitiane ‘oku ou ‘ilo ki ai, pea ko hono hongofulu mā fā ta‘u ‘eni talu e me‘a ‘oku ou lau ki ai: na‘e punakaki ‘a e toko taha ko ia ki he langi tu‘o tolu: (‘oku ‘ikai te u ‘ilo pe na‘a ne sino, pea ‘oku ‘ikai te u ‘ilo pe kuo ne hiki mei he sino: ko e ‘Otua pē ‘oku ne mea‘i).
47012003	‘Io, ‘oku ou ‘ilo ha tangata na‘e pehe‘i; (hei‘ilo pe na‘e ‘ave mo e sino, pe na‘e tuku ‘a e sino; ko e ‘Otua pē ‘oku mea‘i):
47012004	tokua na‘e punakaki ia ki Palataisi; pea ne ongo‘i ai ha ngaahi lea tāpuhā, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘ikai ngofua ki ha tangata ke lea‘aki.
47012005	‘E ai ha‘aku pole ‘i ha toko taha ‘e pehe‘i; ka ‘e ‘ikai ha‘aku pole ‘ia kita tonu, ka ‘i hoku ngaahi vaivai‘anga pē.
47012006	Seuke, ka ne u loto ke pōlepole, tala‘ehai te u hā ko e sesele; he ko e tala fai tu‘unga te u fai. Ka neongo hono makehe atu ‘o e fakahā me‘a mei he ta‘ehāmai kiate au, ka ‘oku te faka‘ehi‘ehi mei he pōlepole ai; na‘a hulu atu hoku tokanga‘i ‘e ha taha ‘i he me‘a ‘oku ne vakai ‘iate au mo fanongo ‘iate au.
47012007	Ko ia, telia na‘a ku anga hiki ai, na‘e tuku mai ha foto ke nofo ‘i hoku kakano, ko e ‘āngelo ‘a Sētane, ke ne tukimononofoa au, ke ‘oua na‘a ku anga hiki.
47012008	Na‘e tu‘o tolu ‘eku kole ki he ‘Eiki ‘i he toko taha ko ia, ke ne hiki meiate au:
47012009	pea kuo ne folofola mai, ‘Oku fu‘u lahi ‘eku kelesi ki ho‘o me‘a; he ‘oku toki hā hono ivi kotoa he tu‘u ‘i he vaivai. Pea ka ko ia, pea tā te u fili mu‘a ke fai ‘eku pole vaivai ni, koe‘uhi ke hifo mai ‘a e ivi ‘o Kalaisi, ‘o fokotu‘u hono Tāpanekale ‘iate au.
47012010	Ko hono ‘uhinga ia ‘oku ou hōhō‘ia ai ‘i hoku ngaahi vaivai‘anga, ‘i he fa‘a pā‘usia, ‘i he fa‘a faingata‘a‘ia, ‘i he fa‘a fakatanga‘i, ‘i he fa‘a ‘efitu‘ua, koe‘uhi ko Kalaisi; he ka u ka vaivai, ko ‘eku toki mālohi ē.
47012011	Tā kuo u hoko ‘o sesele: ka na‘a mou loki au ki ai. Seuke, na‘e mei totonu mu‘a ke sani au ‘e kimoutolu: he tala‘ehai na‘a ku momo‘i tōmui ‘i he ha‘a ‘aposetolo makehe atu na; neongo ko e me‘a noa au.
47012012	Kehe na‘e feia ‘i homou lotolotonga, ‘i he funga ‘o ha fu‘u kātaki, ‘a e ngaahi faka‘ilonga ‘aposetolo, ko e ngaahi me‘a faka‘ilonga mo fakaofo, mo e ngaahi mana mo‘oni.
47012013	He ko e hā tū ha me‘a ne mou tōmui ai ‘i he ngaahi siasi kehe? Ngata pē ‘apē ‘i he ‘ikai te u fakamafasia kimoutolu ‘e au. ‘Ē, fakamolemole ‘eku ngāue kovi ko ia.
47012014	Vakai, kuo ‘osi ‘eni ‘eku teu ke ‘alu atu ko hono tu‘o tolu; ka ‘e ‘ikai te u fakamafasia ai kimoutolu; he ‘oku ‘ikai te u fiema‘u ho‘omou me‘a, ka ko kimoutolu ‘atā pē. He tala‘ehai ko e ngāue ‘a e fānau ke fokotu‘u koloa ma‘a e mātu‘a, ka ko e mātu‘a ma‘a e fānau:
47012015	ka ko au ‘oku ou mātu‘aki loto ke mahomo atu ‘eku me‘a, ‘io, ke ‘osi atu mo au foki koe‘uhi ko homou laumālie, neongo ‘e faka‘au hifo hoku ‘ofa‘i ‘i he tupulekina ‘eku ‘ofa atu.
47012016	Pea ko eni, tau tuku ko ia: tā na‘e ‘ikai te u fakamafasia kimoutolu ‘e au; ka ko ‘eku ma‘u kimoutolu, tokua, ‘aki ‘eku olo, he ko e tama kākā.
47012017	‘Ē, hono ai ha taha kuo u fekau atu, ‘o u ma‘u me‘a ai meiate kimoutolu, ‘ō?
47012018	Ne u kole ‘a Taitusi ke ‘alu atu, pea u fekau ke ‘alu mo ia ‘a e kāinga ‘e taha; ne ma‘u me‘a ‘a Taitusi meiate kimoutolu, ‘ō? ‘Ikai ‘oku taha tofu pē ‘a e anga na‘a ma fai‘aki ‘ema fakafeangai atu? ‘ikai na‘a ma topuva‘e taha?
47012019	Kuo loa ho‘omou lau, ‘oku mau fakamatala pehē ke mou fakatonuhia kimoutolu. ‘Ā, ko e ‘ao ‘o e ‘Otua ‘oku mau fai ai ‘emau lea, pea ‘oku mau tu‘u ‘ia Kalaisi: ka ko eni, si‘omau ‘ofa‘anga, ko ‘emau ngaahi me‘a kotoa pē ‘oku mo‘omou langa hake.
47012020	He ‘oku te manavahē na‘a ‘iloange te u ‘ilo kimoutolu, ‘i he‘eku a‘u atu, ‘oku mou fai kehe mo e me‘a ‘oku ou tangi ki ai: pea mou ‘ilo ai au foki, ‘oku ‘ikai te u hangē ko e me‘a te mou tangi ki ai. Na‘a ‘iloange ‘e hā ‘iate kimoutolu ha fetu‘usi, ha meheka, ‘a e fe‘ite‘itani, ‘a e fakafelaulauhi, ‘a e fefasitu‘u‘aki, ‘a e fefakakovi‘aki, ‘a e ta‘emīngao, mo e fakamaveuveu.
47012021	‘Io, ‘oku te manavahē na‘a toe fakatōkilalo au ‘e hoku ‘Otua ‘i he‘eku a‘u atu, koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu; pea ‘e ‘a‘aku ke tēngihia ha ni‘ihi ‘iate kinautolu kuo nau taukave ‘enau angahala ko ia, ‘o ‘ikai te nau fakatomala ‘i he anga‘uli, mo e fe‘auaki, mo e pau‘u, ‘a ia na‘a nau fai.
47013001	KO ‘eku ‘alu atu ‘eni mōku tu‘o tolu “Ilonga ha me‘a, ‘e fakapapau ki ai ‘i ha fakamo‘oni ‘a ha toko ua, kae‘uma‘ā ha toko tolu."
47013002	Na‘a ku sinaki tala mu‘a, pea ‘oku ou sinaki tala ‘eni–hangē ko ‘eku lea ‘i he‘eku ‘a‘ahi atu ko hono tu‘o ua, pehē mo ‘eku lea ko eni ‘i he‘eku kei mama‘o–‘oku ou tala kiate kimoutolu ‘oku taukave ho‘omou angahala mu‘a, pea ki homou toe kātoa.
47013003	‘E ‘ikai te u fakama‘uma‘u ‘i he‘eku ‘alu atu ka fai ni: ko e me‘a ‘i ho‘omou tangi ki ha fakamo‘oni ‘o e lea ‘a Kalaisi ‘iate au. Tala‘ehai ko ha ngali vaivai ia ‘i he fai atu, kaekehe ‘oku ne ngāue mālohi ‘iate kimoutolu.
47013004	Seuke, ‘oku mo‘oni na‘e kalusefai ia ko ‘ene vaivai, ka ‘oku ne mo‘ui ko ‘ene mālohi mei he ‘Otua; pea ‘oku mo‘oni ‘oku mau vaivai fakataha mo ia, ka te mau mo‘ui fakataha mo ia ‘i he fai kiate kimoutolu, ko ‘emau mālohi mei he ‘Otua.
47013005	‘Ē, mou sivi mu‘a kimoutolu, pe ‘oku mou lotu mo‘oni; ‘eke fakamo‘oni meiate kimoutolu. ‘Io, na‘a ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ongona ‘a e ‘iate kimoutolu ‘a Sīsū Kalaisi; ka na‘a ko e kau ta‘e-ha-fakamo‘oni kimoutolu.
47013006	Ka ‘oku te pehē te mou ‘ilo ‘oku ‘ikai ko e kau ta‘e-ha-fakamo‘oni ‘a kimautolu.
47013007	Ka ‘oku mau hū ki he ‘Otua ke ‘oua ‘aupito te mou fai ha kovi; ‘o ‘ikai te mau lotu ke hā ‘emau mo‘oni, ka ke fai lelei ‘e kimoutolu, ka mau nofo ‘o hangē ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘amau fakamo‘oni.
47013008	He ‘oku ‘ikai te mau mālohi ke fai ha me‘a ki he totonu, ka ke kauhaki‘i ‘a e totonu.
47013009	Seuke, ko ‘emau toki fiefia ē, ‘i ha‘amau vaivai ka mou mālohi: pea ko e me‘a ko eni ‘oku mau lotua, ‘io, ‘a ho‘omou toe ma‘opo‘opo lelei.
47013010	Ko hono ‘uhinga ia ‘oku ou tohi pehē ai kei mama‘o; telia na‘a ku fai māsila ‘i he‘eku ‘iate kimoutolu, ‘i he‘eku ngāue‘aki ‘eku pule, ‘a ia na‘e tuku ‘e he ‘Eiki kiate au ke fai‘aki ha langa hake, ‘o ‘ikai ha holoki hifo.
47013011	Ko ‘eku lea faka‘osi ‘eni, kāinga: mou fiefia pē, mou fakamā‘opo‘opo kimoutolu, tali ‘eku fakafiemālie, mou loto taha, mou nonofo melino; pea ko e ‘Otua ‘o e ‘ofa mo e melino te ne toki kau mo kimoutolu.
47013012	Mou fefekita‘aki ‘aki ha ‘uma tapu. ‘Oku ‘ofa atu ‘a e kāinga lotu kotoa pē.
47013013	Ko e kelesi ‘a e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, mo e ‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua, mo e feohi ‘o e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni, ‘ofa ke ‘iate kimoutolu kotoa pē ia.
48001001	TŪ KO KIMAUTOLU–‘a Paula ko ha ‘aposetolo, (ka na‘e ‘ikai tupu ‘eku lakanga mei ha tu‘unga tangata, ‘uma‘ā hano ‘omi ‘e ha tangata, ka na‘e ‘omi ‘e Sīsū Kalaisi, pea mo e ‘Otua ko e Tamai, ‘a ia na‘a ne fokotu‘u ia mei he pekia);
48001002	pea mo e kāinga lotu kotoa pē ‘oku fononga mo au–ko ‘emau tohi ki he ngaahi siasi ‘o Kalētia.
48001003	‘Ofa ke mou ma‘u kelesi mo e fiemālie mei he ‘Otua ko e Tamai, mo hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi,
48001004	‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio na‘a ne foaki ia ‘e ia koe‘uhi ko ‘etau ngaahi angahala, ke ne fakahaofi kitautolu mei he nofo kovi ‘oku lolotonga ni: ‘o fakatatau ki he finangalo ‘o e ‘Otua ko ‘etau Tamai.
48001005	Ke ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘a e kolōlia ‘o lauikuonga pea ta‘engata! ‘Ēmeni.
48001006	‘Oku te ofo ‘i he vave pehē fau ho‘omou kamata tafoki meiate ia na‘a ne fakaului kimoutolu ‘aki ‘a e kelesi ‘a Kalaisi, ‘o mou hiki ki ha kōsipeli kehe.
48001007	‘A ia ‘oku ‘ikai ko ha kōsipeli; kehe ‘oku ai ha ni‘ihi ‘oku ue‘i kimoutolu, mo nau feinga ke liliu ‘a e Kōsipeli ‘o Kalaisi.
48001008	Ka neongo ko kimautolu, pe ko ha ‘āngelo mei Langi, ka ‘o kapau te ne malanga‘aki ha kōsipeli ‘oku makehe atu mo ia na‘a mau malanga‘aki atu, ke ne hoko ko e mala‘ia.
48001009	Hangē ko ‘emau lea mu‘a, ko ia ‘oku ou toe tala ni, kapau ‘e malanga‘aki atu ‘e ha taha ha kōsipeli ‘oku makehe atu mo ia na‘a mou ma‘u, ke ne hoko ko e mala‘ia.
48001010	He ko e fē ‘eni ‘oku ou fai ke loto mai? ‘a e kakai, pe ko e ‘Otua? Pe ko ‘eku feinga ‘eni ke mālie‘ia ‘a e kakai? Ka ne u kei fai ke mālie‘ia ‘a e kakai ‘iate au, pehē ‘oku ‘ikai te u nofo ni ko ha pōpula ‘a Kalaisi.
48001011	Pea ko eni, kāinga, ‘oku ou fakamahino atu, ko e kōsipeli ne malanga‘aki ‘e au, ‘oku ‘ikai ko ha me‘a fakaetangata ia.
48001012	He ko ‘ete ma‘u ia foki ‘e kita, tala‘ehai ko e ma‘u mei ha tangata, pe ‘i he‘ete ako, ka ko e fakahā mei he ta‘ehāmai ‘e Sīsū Kalaisi.
48001013	He na‘a mou fanongo ki he‘eku tō‘onga mu‘a ‘i he lotu faka-Siu; ‘a e makehe atu ‘o ‘eku fakatanga‘i ‘a e siasi ‘a e ‘Otua, mo ‘eku laiki ia:
48001014	mo ‘eku ‘amo atu ‘i he tokolahi ‘o hoku kakai na‘e to‘ume‘a mo au ‘i he lotu faka-Siu, ‘o u hulu atu ‘i he mamahi‘i ‘o e ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni na‘e tukufakaholo mei he‘eku ngaahi kui.
48001015	Ka ko e ‘Otua, ‘a ia na‘a ne polo‘i au mei he manava ‘o ‘eku fa‘ē, mo ne ui au ‘aki ‘ene kelesi.
48001016	‘I he ‘iloange na‘a ne finangalo ke faka‘ilo mei he ta‘ehāmai ‘a hono ‘Alo ‘i hoku loto, koe‘uhi ke u ongoongoa ai pē ia ‘i he lotolotonga ‘o e Senitaile; ko e me‘a na‘a ku fai leva na‘e ‘ikai te u huhū ki ha kakano mo toto,
48001017	‘uma‘ā ha‘aku ‘alu hake ki Selusalema kiate kinautolu na‘e tomu‘a ‘aposetolo ‘iate au, ka te ‘alu pē mei he potu ko ia ki ‘Ālepea, pea u toe foki mei ai ki Tāmasikusi.
48001018	Pea na‘e toki hili ‘a e ta‘u ‘e tolu, pea u ‘alu hake ki Selusalema ke ‘a‘ahi kia Kīfasi; pea u nofo mo ia ‘o ‘aho hongofulu mā nima.
48001019	Ka na‘e ‘ikai te ma fe‘iloaki mo ha taha kehe ‘o e kau ‘Aposetolo, ko Sēmisi pē ko e tokoua ‘o e ‘Eiki.
48001020	Pea ko e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ou tohi atu, ko e ‘Otua ē, ‘oku ‘ikai ko ‘eku loi.
48001021	Hili ia na‘a ku ‘alu ki he ngaahi feitu‘u ‘o Sīlia mo Silisia:
48001022	pea u nofo ai pē, ‘o ‘ikai ‘iloa hoku mata ni ‘e he ngaahi siasi ‘o Siutea na‘e Kalisitiane:
48001023	ka na‘e ngata pē ‘i he‘enau fa‘a ma‘u talanoa, Tokua, ko ia na‘a ne fakatanga mu‘a kiate kitautolu, ‘oku ne malanga‘aki ‘eni ‘a e lotu na‘a ne motu‘a laiki.
48001024	Pea nau fakahīkihiki‘i ‘a e ‘Otua he‘ene hā ‘iate au.
48002001	PEA ‘i he‘ene ‘osi ai pē ‘a e ta‘u ‘e hongofulu mā fā, pea u toe ‘alu hake ki Selusalema fakataha mo Pānepasa: pea u ‘alu mo au ‘a Taitusi foki.
48002002	Pea ko ‘eku ‘alu ko ia na‘e ‘i he funga ‘o ha fekau mei he Ta‘ehāmai. Pea na‘a ku fakapā kiate kinautolu ‘i he kōsipeli ‘oku ou malanga‘aki ni ki he Senitaile, kae fakaekimautolu pē mo e kau tu‘ukimu‘a, na‘a ‘iloange ‘e iku noa ‘a e lele ‘oku ou fai, pe ko ia kuo u fai.
48002003	Ka na‘a mo Taitusi, ‘a ia na‘e ‘alu mo au, neongo ko e Kalisi, ka na‘e ‘ikai kouna ke ne kamu:
48002004	ka koe‘uhi pē ko e kau lotu loi kuo moulu mai, ‘a e fa‘ahinga na‘a nau totolo mai ke mataki‘i ‘a e tau‘atāina ‘oku tau ma‘u ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū, ka nau fai ke fakapōpula‘i ‘aupito kitautolu:
48002005	‘a ia na‘e ‘ikai te mau momo‘i ‘unua ki ai ‘i ha houa ‘e taha, ke fai ‘a e fakavaivai na‘a nau tangi ki ai; koe‘uhi ke nofo ma‘u kiate kimoutolu ‘a e totonu ‘o e Kōsipeli.
48002006	Ka ko e me‘a kiate kinautolu ‘oku lau ko ha me‘a, (ko ia ai pē pe na‘a nau fēfē ‘i mu‘a, ko e hā ia kiate au? Tala‘ehai ‘oku filifilimānako ‘e he ‘Otua ki he tangata) seuke, na‘e ‘ikai ‘omi ha me‘a kiate au ‘e he kau tu‘ukimu‘a na.
48002007	Kaekehe, ‘i he‘enau vakai kuo tu‘anaki au, ‘o tuku mai ‘a e Kōsipeli ma‘a e ta‘ekamu, ‘o hangē ā kia Pita ma‘a e kamu;
48002008	(he ko ia na‘a ne tokoni ma‘a Pita ke ne lava ‘ene ngāue faka‘aposetolo ki he ha‘a Kamu, na‘a ne tokoni foki ma‘aku ke u lava ‘eku ngāue ki he Senitaile):
48002009	‘io, ko Sēmisi mo Kīfasi mo Sione, ‘a ia ‘oku lau ko e ngaahi pou, ‘i he‘enau vakai ‘a e kelesi kuo tuku mai kiate au, na‘a nau tuku mai kiate au mo Pānepasa ‘a e nima to‘omata‘u ‘o e kautaha, koe‘uhi ke ‘amaua ‘a e ngāue ki he Senitaile, kae ‘anautolu ‘a e fai ki he ha‘a Kamu.
48002010	Ngata pē, na‘a nau kole ke ma manatua ‘a e kau masiva; ‘a ia foki ko e me‘a pē na‘a ku mātu‘aki loto ke fai.
48002011	Pea ‘i he hoko mai ‘a Kīfasi ki ‘Aniteoke, na‘a ku tu‘u ke ta‘ofi tonu kiate ia; he na‘e mahino ‘ene hala.
48002012	Koe‘uhi ‘i he te‘eki ke hoko hifo ha ni‘ihi meia Sēmisi, na‘a ne keinanga fakataha mo e Senitaile: ka ‘i he‘enau hoko hifo leva, na‘a ne kamata faka‘ehi‘ehi ‘o nofo kehe, he‘ene manavahē telia ‘a ha‘a kamu.
48002013	Pea fai mālualoi mo ia ‘a hono toe ‘o e kau Siu: ko ia na‘a mo Pānepasa na‘e ‘auhia ‘i he mālualoi ‘anautolu.
48002014	Ka ‘i he‘eku vakai ‘oku ‘ikai ke hu‘ufa tonu ‘enau laka ki he mo‘oni ‘o e Kōsipeli, ko ia na‘a ku lea kia Kīfasi ‘i he ‘ao ‘onautolu kotoa, ‘o pehē, Kapau ‘oku ke mo‘ui faka-Senitaile, ‘o ‘ikai faka-Siu, ‘a koe ko e Siu, pea fakafēfē ai ho‘o tohoaki ‘a e Senitaile ke fai faka-Siu.
48002015	Neongo ko e tupu Siu kitaua, ‘o ‘ikai ko e ongo angahala mei he Senitaile,
48002016	ka ‘i he‘eta ‘ilo ‘oku ‘ikai fakatonuhia ha tangata mei he ngaahi ngāue faka-Lao, kae ngata pē ‘i he tui kia Sīsū Kalaisi, ko ia, ko kitaua foki na‘a ta tui kia Kalaisi Sīsū, koe‘uhi ke ta ma‘u fakatonuhia mei he tui kia Kalaisi, ‘o ‘ikai mei he ngaahi ngāue faka-Lao: koe‘uhi ko e me‘a ki he ngaahi ngāue faka-Lao, ‘e tu‘u mola ai ‘a e kakano kotoa pē, ‘o ‘ikai hanau fakatonuhia mei ai.
48002017	Pea kapau, lolotonga ‘eta nofo ke ma‘u tonuhia he tu‘u ‘ia Kalaisi, fakafokifā kuo hā ko e ongo angahala foki kitaua, pea tā kuo hoko ‘a Kalaisi ko e tokoni ‘o angahala, ‘ikai ko ia? Molekemama‘o ha me‘a pehē!
48002018	Seuke, kapau kuo te holoki ha ngaahi me‘a, ka te hanga ‘o toe langa hake ‘a e ngaahi me‘a pē ko ia, tā ‘oku ou fakamo‘oni ‘e au ko e fai hala au.
48002019	He ko kita, ko e me‘a ‘i he Lao na‘a te mate ki he Lao; koe‘uhi ke u mo‘ui ki he ‘Otua.
48002020	Kuo tutuki au ki he Kolosi mo Kalaisi: pea ko ‘eku mo‘ui ‘oku fai, ‘oku ‘ikai kei ko au, ka ko e mo‘ui ‘oku fai ‘e Kalaisi ‘iate au: ‘io, ko e mo‘ui ‘oku ou fai ‘eni ‘i he kakano ko e mo‘ui ‘i he tui, ko e tui ki he ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otua, ‘a ia na‘a ne ‘ofeina au, mo ne foaki ia ‘e ia ke pekia koe‘uhi ko au.
48002021	‘Oku ‘ikai te te fakata‘e‘aonga ‘e kita ‘a e kelesi ‘a e ‘Otua; he kapau ‘oku fou mei he Lao ‘a e mā‘oni‘oni, pea tā na‘e pekia ‘a Kalaisi ta‘ehano ‘uhinga.
48003001	‘A e kau Kalētia ta‘eloto, ko hai kuo ne fakamatavalea‘i kimoutolu? ‘A kimoutolu na‘e fehangahangai tonu mo homou mata ‘a Sīsū Kalaisi, hono faka‘ali‘ali ‘o hono kalusefai.
48003002	Ko e me‘a pē ‘eni ‘oku ou fie ‘ilo meiate kimoutolu, pe na‘a mou ma‘u ‘a e Laumālie mei he ngaahi ngāue faka-Lao, pe mei he malanga‘aki ‘o e tui?
48003003	‘Oku pehē fau ho‘omou ta‘eloto? hili ho‘omou kamata ‘i he Laumālie, ‘oku mou nofo ‘eni koā ke fakakakato mei he kakano?
48003004	Ne mou kātaki koā ‘a e ngaahi fu‘u mamahi ko ia ko e me‘a ke ta‘e‘aonga? ‘O kapau mo‘oni kuo ta‘e‘aonga.
48003005	Pea ko eni, ko ia ‘oku ne tuku kiate kimoutolu ‘a e Laumālie, mo ne fakatupu ‘iate kimoutolu ‘a e mafai mana, ‘oku tefito ‘ene fai ki he ngaahi ngāue faka-Lao, pe ki he malanga‘aki ‘o e tui?
48003006	‘Ā, ‘oku hangē pē ko e folofola, Na‘e tui ‘a ‘Epalahame ki he ‘Otua, pea na‘e lau ia ma‘ane mā‘oni‘oni.
48003007	Ko ia, ‘oku mou vakai mei ai, ‘Ilonga ‘a kinautolu ‘oku ‘i he tui, ko kinautolu ia ‘a e hako ‘o ‘Epalahame.
48003008	Pea ko e Tohitapu, ‘i he‘ene vakai mama‘o ‘i mu‘a ‘a e fakatonuhia ‘e he ‘Otua ‘a e Senitaile mei he tui pē, ko ia na‘a ne malanga‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli ‘i mu‘a kia ‘Epalahame, ‘o pehē, ‘E monū‘ia ‘iate koe ‘a e fa‘ahinga kotoa pē.
48003009	Ko ia, ko kinautolu ‘oku ‘i he tui, te nau monū‘ia fakataha mo si‘i tui ko ‘Epalahame.
48003010	Seuke, ‘ilonga kinautolu ‘oku tefito ki he ngaahi ngāue faka-Lao, te nau mo‘ulaloa ki ha mala: he kuo tohi, ‘oku mala‘ia ‘a e tangata kotoa pē ‘oku ‘ikai ke nofo‘aki fai ‘a e ngaahi me‘a kotoa pē kuo tohi ‘i he Tohi Lao.
48003011	Pea ko eni, ko e pehē ‘oku ‘ikai fakatonuhia ha toko taha ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e ‘Otua he‘ene tu‘unga ki he Lao, ‘oku mahino ia mei he folofola ni, Ko e mā‘oni‘oni te ne mo‘ui mei he tui.
48003012	Ka ko e Lao ‘oku ‘ikai tefito ki he tui: ka ‘oku pehē ‘e he Folofola, Ko ia kuo ne fai ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia te ne mo‘ui ai.
48003013	Ne huhu‘i kitautolu ‘e Kalaisi mei he mala‘ia faka-Lao, he‘ene hoko ko e koto mala‘ia koe‘uhi ko kitautolu; (he kuo tohi, ‘Ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku tautau ‘i ha ‘akau ko e mala‘ia ia):
48003014	koe‘uhi ke hoko ki he Senitaile ‘ia Sīsū Kalaisi ‘a e tāpuaki ‘a ‘Epalahame; ka tau ma‘u ‘i he‘etau tui ‘a e tala‘ofa, ko e Laumālie.
48003015	Kāinga, ka u lea fakaetangata: neongo ko e fuakava ‘a ha tangata, ka ‘o kapau kuo fakapapau ia, tala‘ehai ‘oku tāmate‘i ia ‘e ha taha, pe fakalahi.
48003016	Pea ko eni, na‘e fai ‘a e ngaahi tala‘ofa ma‘a ‘Epalahame mo hono hako. ‘Oku ‘ikai te ne pehē, Pea mo ho ngaahi hako, ‘o hangē ko ha‘ane lau ki ha tokolahi; ka hangē ko ‘ene lau ki ha toko taha pē, ‘o pehē, Pea mo ho hako: ‘a ia ko Kalaisi.
48003017	Pea ko ‘eni ia ‘a e me‘a ‘oku ou lau ki ai, ko e Fuakava ‘a ia kuo loa hono fakapapau ‘e he ‘Otua, ‘e ‘ikai lava ‘e he Lao ke vete ia, ‘o fakaka‘anga ‘a e Tala‘ofa: he na‘e ki mui ‘ene hoko ‘a‘ana, kuo hili ‘a e ta‘u ‘e fāngeau mā tolungofulu.
48003018	He kapau na‘e tefito ki he Lao ‘a e ma‘u ‘o e tofi‘a, tā ‘oku ‘ikai tefito ki he Tala‘ofa: ka na‘e tō ia kia ‘Epalahame ko e me‘a‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua, koe‘uhi ko e Tala‘ofa.
48003019	Pea kapau ko ia, pea ko e hā ai ‘a e Lao? ‘Ā, na‘e kanoni ‘aki ia koe‘uhi ko e ngaahi fai hala, kae‘oua ke hoko mai ‘a e hako ne fai ki ai ‘a e tala‘ofa; pea na‘e talafono ‘aki ‘e ha kau ‘āngelo, ‘o fakafai ‘i ha fakalaloa.
48003020	Pea ko eni, ko ha fakalaloa ‘oku ‘ikai ko ha me‘a ‘o ha fa‘ahi taha: ka ko e ‘Otua ‘oku taha tofu pē.
48003021	Pea kapau ko ia, pea ‘oku fepaki koā ‘a e Lao mo e ngaahi tala‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘ō? Molekemama‘o! seuke ka ne ‘omi ha lao ‘a ia te ne lava ke fakamo‘ui ‘a e mate, pehē ‘e tefito mo‘oni ‘a e fakatonuhia ki he Lao.
48003022	Kaekehe na‘e loki ‘e he folofola ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē ke mo‘ulaloa ki he angahala, koe‘uhi ke foaki ‘a e tala‘ofa ki he kakai tui, koe‘uhi pē ko e tui kia Sīsū Kalaisi.
48003023	Ka ‘i he te‘eki ke hoko mai ‘a e tui, na‘e tauhi pilīsone kitaua ‘i he pule ‘a Lao, ‘o loki ki he tui na‘e ene ke faka‘ilo mei he Ta‘ehāmai.
48003024	Pea tā ko e Lao ko hota fakale‘o ma‘a Kalaisi, kae fakatonuhia kitaua mei he tui.
48003025	Ka ‘i he hoko mai ko eni ‘a e tui, pea ‘oku ‘ikai te ta kei fāiekina ki ha fakale‘o.
48003026	Seuke, ko e ngaahi Foha ‘o e ‘Otua ‘a kimoutolu kotoa pē, ko e me‘a ‘i he tui ‘oku fai kia Kalaisi Sīsū.
48003027	‘Io, ‘ilonga kimoutolu na‘e papitaiso kia Kalaisi, na‘a mou kofu ‘aki ai ‘a Kalaisi.
48003028	‘Oku ‘ikai ai ha Siu pe ha Kalisi, ‘oku ‘ikai ai ha pōpula pe ha tau‘atāina, ‘oku ‘ikai ai ke tangata mo fefine: he ko kimoutolu kātokatoa ko e toko taha tofu pē ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū.
48003029	Pea kapau ko e konga ‘o Kalaisi ‘a kimoutolu, pea tā ko e hako ‘o ‘Epalahame ‘a kimoutolu, ko e ngaahi ‘ea ‘o fakatatau ki he Tala‘ofa.
48004001	PEA ko eni, ‘oku te pehē, Lolotonga ‘oku tamasi‘i ‘a e ‘ea, ‘oku ‘ikai si‘i te ne fai kehekehe mo ha pōpula, neongo ko e ‘eiki ia ‘oku ‘a‘ana ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē:
48004002	kaekehe ‘oku ne mo‘ulaloa ki ha ni‘ihi ‘oku tauhi ia, mo ha ni‘ihi ‘oku tauhi ‘ene koloa; kae‘oua ke hokosia ‘a e taimi ne kotofa ‘e he‘ene ‘eiki.
48004003	Pehē mo kitaua; lolotonga na‘a ta tamaiki, na‘a ta mo‘ulaloa ki he ngaahi ‘elemēniti ‘o e lotu, ‘a ia ‘oku fakamaama, ‘o ta pōpula pē.
48004004	Ka ‘i he hokosia leva ‘a e fakakakato ‘o e taimi, na‘e fekau atu ‘e he ‘Otua hono ‘Alo ‘o‘ona, ‘a ia ne tupu mei ha fefine, mo tupu ko e mo‘ulaloa ki he Lao;
48004005	koe‘uhi ā ke ne huhu‘i ‘a kinautolu ‘oku mo‘ulaloa ki he Lao, ka tau ma‘u ‘a e ohi.
48004006	Pea koe‘uhi ā ko e ngaahi foha ‘a kimoutolu, ko ia na‘e fekau atu ‘e he ‘Otua ki hotau loto ‘a e Laumālie ‘o hono ‘Alo, ‘oku ne kalanga, ‘Apā, Tamai.
48004007	Ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai te ke kei ko ha pōpula, ka ko ha foha: pea kapau ko ha foha, pea tā ko ha ‘ea, ko e me‘a ‘i he ‘Otua.
48004008	Ka ko eni, ko e taimi mu‘a, na‘a mou ngāue ki ha ni‘ihi na‘e ‘ikai ko e ngaahi ‘otua mo‘oni, ko e ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo ki he ‘Otua.
48004009	Ka ‘i onopooni, kuo hili ho‘omou ‘ilo ‘a e ‘Otua, kae‘uma‘ā homou ‘iloa ‘e he ‘Otua, pea ‘oku fakafēfē ho‘omou toe tafoki ki he ngaahi ‘elemēniti vaivai mo masiva ko ia, ‘a ia ‘oku mou tangi ni ke ngāue ki ai, ‘o toe fai mei he kamata‘anga?
48004010	‘Oku mou tauhi ha ngaahi ‘aho mo ha ngaahi māhina, mo ha ngaahi fa‘ahita‘u mo ha ngaahi ta‘u.
48004011	‘Ā, ‘oku ou manavahē kiate kimoutolu, na‘a kuo ta‘e‘aonga ‘eku fakaongosia ne fai ma‘amoutolu.
48004012	Kāinga, ‘oku ou kole atu ke mou hoko ‘o hangē ko au, he na‘a ku hoko foki ‘o hangē ko kimoutolu.
48004013	Tala‘ehai na‘a mou momo‘i fai ha kovi kiate au: ka ‘oku mou ‘ilo na‘a ku fuofua malanga‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli kiate kimoutolu koe‘uhi ko ha vaivai na‘e hoko ki hoku kakano.
48004014	Pea ko e me‘a na‘e tu‘u ‘i hoku kakano, ‘a ia na‘e ngali ko ha tūkia‘anga kiate kimoutolu, na‘e ‘ikai te mou fakata‘eta‘etokanga ai, ‘uma‘ā ha‘amou palakū‘ia ai; kaekehe na‘a mou tali au ‘o hangē ko ha ‘āngelo ‘a e ‘Otua, pe ko Sīsū Kalaisi.
48004015	Pea ko e fē ‘eni ho‘omou lau monū na‘e fai? He ‘oku ou fakamo‘oni atu, ka ne lava, pehē ne mou kape‘i homou mata ‘o ‘omi mo‘oku.
48004016	Pea tā kuo u hoko ko homou fili ‘apē, he‘eku lea ‘asi?
48004017	‘Ā, ko ‘enau mamahi‘i kimoutolu ‘oku ‘ikai lelei: kaekehe ko honau loto ke vahe‘i kimoutolu, ka mou toki mamahi‘i kinautolu.
48004018	Ka ko e me‘a lelei ke mamahi‘i ai pē kimoutolu ‘e ha ni‘ihi, ‘i ha me‘a ‘oku lelei, ‘o ‘ikai ngata pē ‘i he‘eta feangai mo au.
48004019	Si‘eku fānau valevale, ‘a kimoutolu ‘oku ou toe langā ‘eni ‘i homou fā‘ele‘i, kae‘oua ke kakato ‘a Kalaisi ‘iate kimoutolu,
48004020	‘ā, ‘oku te ‘amusia ange ‘e kita ‘oku ta feangai ‘eni, ka u liliu ‘a e anga ‘o ‘eku lea: he ‘oku ou puputu‘u koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu.
48004021	Tala mai, ‘a kimoutolu kuo mou loto ke mo‘ulaloa ki he Lao, ‘oku ‘ikai te mou tokanga‘i koā ‘a e Lao?
48004022	He kuo tohi ai, Tokua na‘e ma‘u ‘e ‘Epalahame ha ongo foha ‘e toko ua; ko e taha ko e tama ‘a e kaunanga, ko e taha ko e tama ‘a e fefine tau‘atāina.
48004023	Ka ko e tama ‘a e kaunanga na‘e tupu fakaekakano, ka ko e tama ‘a e fefine tau‘atāina na‘e fou fakapalōmesi mai.
48004024	Ko e fa‘ahinga me‘a pehē ‘oku fai fakatātā: he ko e ongo fefine ko ia, ko e ongo Fuakava; ko e taha ‘oku mei he mo‘unga ko Sainai, pea ‘oku fanau kakai ke pōpula: ko Heka‘ā ia.
48004025	Ka ko e Heka‘ā ko ia ko e mo‘unga ko Sainai ‘i ‘Ālepea: pea ‘oku hoa ia mo e Selusalema ‘o onopooni, he ‘oku nofo pōpula ia mo ‘ene fānau.
48004026	Ka ko e Selusalema mei ‘olunga ‘oku tau‘atāina ia: pea ko ia ia ‘a e fa‘ē ‘atautolu.
48004027	He kuo tohi, Fiefia, si‘i pa‘a ‘oku ‘ikai ke fanau, Hiki tuē mo kalanga, si‘i ta‘elangā! He ‘e tokolahi pē ha fānau ‘a si‘i li‘ekina, ‘O hulu atu ‘i he fefine ‘oku ‘i ai ‘a e tangata.
48004028	Pea ko eni, ko kimoutolu, kāinga, ko e fānau ‘a Palōmesi, ‘o hangē ko ‘Aisake.
48004029	Kae hangē tofu pē ko ia ‘i mu‘a, ‘a e fakatanga‘i ‘e ia na‘e tupu fakaekakano ‘a ia na‘e tupu fakalaumālie, ‘oku pehē pē foki mo ia ‘i onopooni.
48004030	Ka ko e hā ‘a e lau ‘a e Tohi? ‘A ‘eni, Kapusi ‘a e kaunanga mo ‘ene tama; he ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito kaungā ‘ea ‘a e tama ‘a kaunanga mo e tama ‘a tau‘atāina.
48004031	Ko ia, kāinga, ‘oku ‘ikai ko e fānau ‘a kaunanga ‘a kitaua, ka ko e fānau ‘a tau‘atāina.
48005001	KO E tau‘atāina koā na‘e fakatau‘atāina kitaua ki ai ‘e Kalaisi? Pe‘i mou tu‘u ma‘u ai, pea ‘oua te mou toe mo‘ua ‘i he ‘ioke fakapōpula.
48005002	Vakai mai: ko Paula au ‘oku ou tala atu, kapau te mou fai‘aki ‘a e kamu, ‘e ‘ikai momo‘i ‘aonga ‘a Kalaisi kiate kimoutolu.
48005003	‘Io, ‘oku ou toe fakapapau atu ki he tangata takitaha ‘oku tuku ‘eni ke nau fai hono kamu, ‘oku ne mo‘ua leva ke fai hono kotoa ‘o e Lao.
48005004	Kuo motuhi leva kimoutolu meia Kalaisi, ‘a e fa‘ahinga na ‘oku nofo ke tonuhia mei he Lao: ‘io, kuo fakahee‘i kimoutolu meia Kelesi.
48005005	He ko kimautolu, ko e me‘a ‘i he Laumālie, pea koe‘uhi ko ‘emau tui, ‘oku mau talitali ‘aki ‘a e ‘amanaki ki he fakatonuhia.
48005006	He ‘i he tu‘u ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū, ‘oku ‘ikai mamafa ha‘ate kamu pe ta‘ekamu, ka ko ha tui pē ‘oku ngāue fou ‘i he ofa.
48005007	‘Ā, ne mālō ho‘omou lele. Ko hai tū ne ta‘ofi kimoutolu mei he talangofua ki he totonu?
48005008	Ko homou fakaloto‘i ko ia, ‘oku ‘ikai fou meiate ia ‘oku fai homou fakaului.
48005009	Ka lave ha me‘i lēvani ki ha takaonga mā, tā kuo lēvani hono kotoa.
48005010	‘Oku ‘i ai ‘eku falala ‘a‘aku kiate kimoutolu ‘i he ‘Eiki, ‘e ‘ikai momo‘i fou kehe homou loto: ka ko ia ‘oku ne fakatupu maveuveu ‘iate kimoutolu te ne fua hono tautea, neongo pe ko hai ia.
48005011	Ka ko e me‘a kiate au, kāinga; ka ne mo‘oni ‘oku ou kei malanga‘aki ‘a e kamu, pea ko e hā ai hoku fakatanga‘i ‘oku fai? he ka ne u fai pehē, pehē kuo ‘osi ‘a e fehi‘anekina ‘o e Kolosi.
48005012	Ko hoku loto ki he kakai ‘oku fakaangatu‘u kimoutolu, Taumaiā ke nau fai atu ‘o tu‘usi ‘aupito!
48005013	Seuke, na‘e ui kimoutolu, kāinga, ke mou tau‘atāina; kae‘oua pē ‘e iku ho‘omou tau‘atāina ko ha ava ki he kakano; ka ko e me‘a ‘i ho‘omou ‘ofa ke mou nofo fetamaio‘eiki‘aki.
48005014	He ‘oku ‘osiki ‘a e Lao kotoa ‘i ha fo‘i lea; ‘a ‘eni, Te ke ‘ofa ki ho kaungā‘api ‘o hangē ko ho‘o ‘ofa kiate koe.
48005015	Ka ‘o kapau te mou fe‘u‘usi mo fekainaki, vakai na‘a ‘iloange te mou fetāmate‘aki kimoutolu.
48005016	Pea ko ‘eku lea ‘eni, Mou fou ‘i he Laumālie, pea ‘e ‘ikai ai te mou momo‘i fakaai ‘a e holi ‘a Kakano.
48005017	He ‘oku holitu‘u ‘a Kakano ‘o fakafepaki ki he Laumālie; pea pehē mo e Laumālie kia Kakano: he ‘oku na feta‘ofi‘aki ‘a e ongo me‘a ko ia, koe‘uhi ka ai ha me‘a ‘oku mou loto ke fai, pea ‘oua te mou fai ia.
48005018	Ka ‘o kapau ‘oku tākiekina kimoutolu ‘e he Laumālie, tā ‘oku ‘ikai te mou mo‘ulaloa ki he Lao.
48005019	Pea ko eni, ‘oku mātu‘aki e‘a ‘a e ngaahi ngāue ‘a Kakano, ‘o pehē, Ko e fe‘auaki, ko e anga‘uli, ko e pau‘u,
48005020	ko e tauhi ‘aitoli, ko e fai tuki, ko e fetāufehi‘a‘aki, ko e fetu‘usi, ko e meheka, ko e fe‘ite‘itani, ko e fakafelaulauhi, ko e fakavahavaha‘a, ko e fakafa‘afa‘ahi,
48005021	ko e femeheka‘aki, ko e fefakapōngaki, ko e fa‘a konā, ko e fa‘a kai, mo e ngaahi alā me‘a pehē: ‘a ia ‘oku ou sinaki tala atu, ‘o hangē ko ‘eku lea mu‘a, ko e kakai fai me‘a pehē, ‘e ‘ikai hanau tofi‘a ‘i he pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua.
48005022	Ka ko e fua ‘o e Laumālie, ko e ‘ofa, ko e fiefia, ko e melino, ko e anga mokomoko, ko e anga‘ofa, ko e anga tonu,
48005023	ko e anga falala, ko e anga kātaki, ko e anga fakama‘uma‘u: ‘oku ‘ikai ha lao ke ta‘ofi ‘a e ngaahi me‘a pehē
48005024	Pea ko kinautolu ‘oku ‘o Kalaisi Sīsū, na‘a nau tutuki ki he Kolosi ‘a e kakano mo hono ngaahi o‘i mo e holi.
48005025	Kapau ko e Laumālie ‘oku tau mo‘ui ai, tau laka foki ‘i he Laumālie.
48005026	‘Oua na‘a tau hiki ki he fie ongoongo, ‘o fepolepolei mo femeheka‘aki.
48006001	KĀINGA, neongo pē ‘e puke nima ha taha lolotonga ‘ene fai ha kovi; ka ko kimoutolu, ‘a e kau fakalaumālie, mou faito‘o ki ha taha pehē ‘o anga fakaalaala; pea ke vakai kiate koe na‘a ‘iloange ‘e ‘ahi‘ahi‘i mo koe foki.
48006002	Mou fetoutou fefua‘aki homou ngaahi mafasia‘anga: pea ‘i ho‘omou fai pehē, kuo mou ‘osiki ‘aupito ‘a e lao ‘a Kalaisi.
48006003	Seuke, kapau ‘oku ‘afungi ‘e ha taha ko ha me‘a ia; ‘osi, ‘oku ‘ikai ko ha momo‘i me‘a ia, ‘oku fakahala‘i ia ‘e hono loto.
48006004	Ka ke takitaha sivi ‘ene ngāue ‘a‘ana; pea te ne toki fakafuofua ‘aki ia pē hono pōlepole‘anga, ‘o ‘ikai ‘aki ha taha kehe:
48006005	koe‘uhi kuo pau ke takitaha fua ‘ene kavenga ‘a‘ana.
48006006	Pea ko eni, ko ia ‘oku akonekina ‘i he Folofola, ke ne tuku kiate ia ‘oku faiako ke ‘inasi ‘i he‘ene koloa kotoa.
48006007	‘Oua na‘a tuku ke fakahala‘i kimoutolu: tala‘ehai ‘oku ala pā‘usi‘i ‘a e ‘Otua; he ‘ilonga pē e me‘a ‘oku tō ‘e ha tangata, ko ia ia te ne utu foki.
48006008	He ko ia ‘oku ne tō ‘i hono kakano, te ne utu mei he kakano ‘a e ‘auha: ka ko ia ‘oku ne tō ‘i he laumālie, te ne utu mei he laumālie ‘a e mo‘ui ta‘engata.
48006009	Ka ‘oua na‘a ta fiu ‘i he failelei, he te ta utu ‘i hono fa‘ahita‘u, ‘o kapau ‘e ‘ikai te ta vaivai.
48006010	Pea kapau ko ia, pea lolotonga ‘oku ta faingamālie, ta ngāue ‘aonga ki he kakai kotoa pē: kae lahi pē kiate kinautolu ‘oku ‘i he fāmili ‘o e lotu.
48006011	Vakai ‘ete tohi mata lalahi ma‘amoutolu ‘aki hoku nima ‘o‘oku.
48006012	‘Ilonga ‘a kinautolu ‘oku tangi ke hā matamatalelei ‘i tu‘a sino, ko kinautolu ia ‘oku kouna kimoutolu ke mou kamu: ka ko hono ‘uhinga pē, ke ‘oua na‘a fakatanga‘i kinautolu, koe‘uhi ko e Kolosi ‘o Kalaisi.
48006013	He na‘a mo e fa‘ahinga kamu na, tala‘ehai ‘oku nau tauhi ‘a e Lao ‘e kinautolu: ka ‘oku nau tangi ke mou kamu, koe‘uhi ke nau tu‘unga ‘i homou kakano ha‘anau pōlepole.
48006014	Ka ko au, molekemama‘o ha‘aku pōlepole, ka ‘i he Kolosi ‘o hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, ‘a ia kuo kalusefai ai ‘a māmani kiate au, mo au ki māmani.
48006015	He tala‘ehai ko ha me‘a ‘a e kamu, pe ko ha me‘a ‘a e ta‘ekamu, ka ko e fakatupufo‘ou pē.
48006016	Pea ‘ilonga kinautolu te nau fai ‘enau laka ki he fua ko eni, ‘ofa ke hifo kiate kinautolu ‘a e fiemālie mo e meesi, pea pehē foki ki he ha‘a ‘Isileli faka-‘Otua!
48006017	Hili ‘eni, ke ‘oua na‘a fakangangau‘i au ‘e ha taha: he ko au ‘oku te ‘alu mo kita ‘a e ngaahi faka‘ilonga ‘o Sīsū, kuo tā ‘i hoku sino.
48006018	Ko e kelesi ‘a hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, ‘ofa, kāinga, ke ‘i homou laumālie ia! ‘Ēmeni.
49001001	TŪ KO AU PAULA, ko e ‘aposetolo ‘a Kalaisi Sīsū ‘i he tu‘utu‘uni ‘a e ‘Otua, ko ‘eku tohi ki he kāinga lotu ‘oku nofo ‘i ‘Efesō, ‘a ia ‘oku nau tui kia Kalaisi Sīsū.
49001002	‘Ofa ke mou ma‘u kelesi mo e fiemālie, mei he ‘Otua ko ‘etau Tamai mo e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi.
49001003	Ha taha ā ke fakamālō‘ia pe ko e ‘Otua mo Tamai ‘a hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, ‘a ia na‘a ne fai hotau tāpuekina ‘ia Kalaisi, ke tau anuanu ‘i he ngaahi tāpuaki kehekehe mei he Laumālie ‘i he ngaahi feitu‘u ‘o langi;
49001004	‘o fakatatau ki he‘ene fili na‘e fai ma‘ana ‘i he te‘eki ke tanupou ‘a māmani, ‘a e fili kitautolu ‘iate Ia, ke tau mā‘oni‘oni mo ta‘emele ‘i he‘ene ‘afio hifo, ‘o tu‘unga ‘i he ‘ofa,
49001005	‘o ne toka tu‘utu‘uni kitautolu ke ohi ‘ia Sīsū Kalaisi ki He‘ene ‘Afio, ‘o fakatatau ki he me‘a na‘e hā lelei ki hono finangalo,
49001006	ke fakamālō‘ia ‘a e lāngilangi‘ia ‘o ‘ene kelesi ‘a ia na‘a ne me‘a‘ofa ‘aki mai ‘i he Pele;
49001007	‘a ia, ‘i he‘etau ‘iate ia, ‘oku tau ma‘u ni ‘a e huhu‘i, ko e me‘a ‘i hono ta‘ata‘a, ko e fakamolemole ‘o ‘etau ngaahi angahala, ‘o fakatatau ki he mohu me‘a ‘o ‘ene kelesi.
49001008	‘A ia na‘a ne lilingi mai ke lahi ko e fa‘ahinga poto kehekehe mo e ‘ilo‘ilo,
49001009	he‘ene faka‘ilo kiate kitautolu ‘a e misiteli ‘o ‘ene tu‘utu‘uni, ‘o fakatatau ai pē ki he me‘a na‘e hā lelei kiate ia,
49001010	‘a ia na‘a ne tu‘utu‘uni ‘i hono finangalo ma‘a e ākenga ‘a e kuonga faka‘osi, ko e pehē ke fālute ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē ‘ia Kalaisi, ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ‘i langi, mo e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ‘i māmani;
49001011	‘io, ‘i He‘ene ‘Afio ‘a ia ne fai ‘iate ia foki homau fili mōno tofi‘a, ‘o toka tu‘utu‘uni kimautolu ki ai, ‘o fakatatau ki he finangalo ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio, ‘a ia ‘oku ne ngāue‘i ‘a e ngaahi me‘a kotoa pē ‘i he ‘alunga ‘o e fakakaukau ‘o hono finangalo;
49001012	koe‘uhi ke nofo kimautolu mo‘o fakamālō‘ia ‘ene lāngilangi‘ia, ‘a kimautolu ne falala tōmu‘a kia Kalaisi.
49001013	‘A ia na‘a mou falala foki ki ai, ‘i ho‘omou fanongo ki he tala ‘o e mo‘oni, ko e Kōsipeli ‘o homou fakamo‘ui; pea ‘i ho‘omou tui foki na‘e fai ‘iate ia homou sila‘i ‘aki ‘a e Laumālie na‘e tala‘ofa, ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni:
49001014	‘a ia ko e me‘a faka‘amanaki ‘o hotau tofi‘a; koe‘uhi ke lava ‘a e huhu‘i ‘o ‘ene koloa na‘e fakatau, kae fakamālō‘ia ‘ene lāngilangi‘ia.
49001015	Ko ia, ko au foki, ‘i he‘eku fanongo ki ho‘omou tui ki he ‘Eiki ko Sīsū, mo ho‘omou ‘ofa ki he kāinga lotu kotoa pē.
49001016	Ko ia, ‘oku ‘ikai tuku ai ‘eku fakafeta‘i koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu, mo ‘eku takua kimoutolu ‘i he‘eku ngaahi lotu;
49001017	ke ‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua ‘o hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, ko e Tamai ‘oku ‘a‘ana ‘a e lāngilangi, ke ne ‘ofa ‘o tuku kiate kimoutolu ha laumālie fakapoto, mo faka‘ilo me‘a mei he Ta‘ehāmai, ke ngāue ‘i he ‘ilo‘i lelei ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio;
49001018	kuo fakamaama kimoutolu, ‘a e mata ‘o homou loto, ke mou ‘ilo pe ko e hā ‘a e ‘amanaki ‘oku tupu mei he‘ene ui, pea ko e hā hono lahi faufau ‘o e lāngilangi‘ia ‘o hono tofi‘a, ‘a ia ‘oku ma‘u ‘e he kau mā‘oni‘oni,
49001019	pea mo hono lahi ‘i he lahi ange fau ‘o ‘ene māfimafi, ‘a ia ‘oku ngāue ma‘atautolu ‘oku tui; ‘a ia ‘oku hoa mo e ngāue tōtōivi ‘o ‘ene māfimafi,
49001020	‘a ia na‘a ne fai ‘ia Kalaisi, he‘ene fokotu‘u ia mei he pekia, mo ne fakanofo ia mei hono to‘omata‘u ‘i he ngaahi feitu‘u ‘o Langi,
49001021	‘o mā‘olunga ‘i he fa‘ahinga pule kotoa pē, mo e ma‘u tu‘unga, mo e ma‘u mālohi, mo e tu‘unga ‘eiki, ‘io, ‘i he hingoa kotoa pē ‘oku hingoa ‘aki ‘i he tu‘u ko eni, pea ‘ikai ngata ai, ka ‘i he tu‘u foki ka hoko mai;
49001022	pea na‘a ne tuku ke ‘i he lalo va‘e ‘o‘ona ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē; pea ne foaki ia ke ‘ulu ki he Siasi ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē;
49001023	‘a ia ko hono sino tofu pē ia, ko e nofo‘anga ‘o e kātokatoa ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio, ‘a ia ‘oku ne fakafonu ‘a e ngaahi me‘a kotoa pē ‘aki ‘enau ngaahi me‘a.
49002001	PEA ko kimoutolu, na‘a mou mate ‘i ho‘omou ngaahi talangata‘a mo e angahala;
49002002	‘a ia na‘a mou fou ai ‘i mu‘a ‘i he ‘alunga ‘o e nofo faka-e-maama-ko eni, ‘i he ‘alunga ‘o e ‘eiki ‘o e pule‘anga ‘o e ‘atā, ko e ‘eiki ‘o e fa‘ahinga laumālie ‘oku lolotonga ngāue ni ‘i he hako ‘o talangata‘a;
49002003	‘a ia na‘a ta kau ai ‘a kitaua foki ‘i mu‘a, pea na‘a ta mo‘ui‘aki kotoa pē ‘a e fai ki he ngaahi holi ‘o hotau kakano, he‘eta feia ‘a e ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni ‘a hota kakano mo ‘eta ngaahi fakakaukau, pea na‘a ta nofo ai pē ko e fānau ‘o e houhau ‘i he ‘ulungāanga, ‘o hangē foki ko e kakai kotoa pē.
49002004	Ka ko e ‘Otua, ‘a ia ‘oku ne mohu ‘alo‘ofa, ko e me‘a ‘i he ‘ofa lahi ‘a ia na‘a ne ‘ofeina ‘aki ‘a kitautolu,
49002005	neongo kuo tau mate ‘i he ngaahi talangata‘a, na‘a ne kaungā fakamo‘ui hake kitautolu mo Kalaisi, (ko e kelesi pē kuo mou mo‘ui mei ai),
49002006	pea ne kaungā fokotu‘u kitautolu mo ia, mo ne kaungā fakanofo mo ia ‘i he ngaahi feitu‘u ‘o langi ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū:
49002007	koe‘uhi ke ne fakahā atu ‘i he ngaahi kuonga ka hoko mai hono lahi ‘i he lahi ange fau ‘o ‘ene kelesi ‘aki ‘ene anga‘ofa kiate kitautolu ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū.
49002008	He ko e kelesi pē kuo mou mo‘ui mei ai, ko e me‘a ‘i ho‘omou tui; ‘io, na‘e ‘ikai meiate kimoutolu ia, ka ko e foaki mei he ‘Otua:
49002009	na‘e ‘ikai tupu mei ha ngaahi ngāue, koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a ai ha taha ‘e fa‘a pōlepole.
49002010	He ko ‘ene ngaohi ‘a kitautolu, kuo fakatupu ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū ke fai ‘a e ngaahi ngāue lelei, ‘a ia na‘e toka teuteu ‘e he ‘Otua ke tau fou ai.
49002011	Ko ia, mou manatu ki he taimi mu‘a, ‘a kimoutolu ‘oku Senitaile homou kakano, mou lau ko e Ta‘ekamu ‘e he fa‘ahinga ‘oku lau ko e Kamu (‘a e kamu ‘i he kakano pea fai ‘e he nima)–
49002012	‘io, manatu, ko e taimi ko ia na‘e ‘ikai hamou kaunga ‘ia Kalaisi, ka mou nofo ko e kau fakahee‘i mei he pule‘anga ‘o ‘Isileli, ko e muli ta‘ekau ‘i he ngaahi fuakava ki he Tala‘ofa, ko e kau ta‘e-ha-‘amanaki-lelei, mo e kau taka he ‘univeesi ta‘ema‘u ‘a e ‘Otua.
49002013	Ka ‘i onopooni, ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū, ko kimoutolu na‘e mama‘o mu‘a, ne fakaofi ‘aki ‘a e ta‘ata‘a ‘o Kalaisi.
49002014	He ko hotau melino‘anga ia, ‘a ia na‘a ne ngaohi ‘a e ua ke taha; ‘io, na‘a ne holoki ‘aki hono kakano ‘a e ‘āvahevahe,
49002015	‘a ia ko e fe‘ite‘itani, mo ne fakaka‘anga ‘a e lao fekau ‘a ia ko e koto tu‘utu‘uni pē, koe‘uhi ke ne ngaohi ‘a e ua ko ia ko ha tangata fo‘ou pē taha ‘iate ia, pea fakalelei ai;
49002016	pea ‘i he‘eta sino taha ke ne toe fakalelei mo e ‘Otua ‘a kitaua ‘osi pē, ko e me‘a ‘i he Kolosi, he‘ene tāmate‘i ‘a e fe‘ite‘itani ‘i he me‘a ko ia.
49002017	Pea ne ha‘u ‘o tala melino kiate kimoutolu na‘e mama‘o, mo tala melino ki he kakai na‘e ofi:
49002018	he vakai, ko e me‘a ‘iate ia ‘oku ta fakatou apaapangofua ke hoko atu ki he Tamai, he‘eta Laumālie taha.
49002019	Pea ko ia, ‘oku ‘ikai te mou kei ko e kau muli mo e ‘āunofo, ka ‘oku mou kolo taha mo e fa‘ahinga tapu, pea ‘oku mou ‘i he Fāmili ‘o e ‘Otua.
49002020	He kuo langa kimoutolu ki he makatu‘unga ko e kau ‘aposetolo mo e kau palōfita, ko Sīsū Kalaisi ia ko hono maka taufatungamotu‘a;
49002021	‘a ia ‘oku fai ai pē ‘i He‘ene ‘Afio ‘a e hokohoko lelei ‘o e fale kotoa, pea ‘oku faka‘a‘au hake ai pē ia ke hoko ko ha temipale tapu, tu‘u ‘i he ‘Eiki;
49002022	‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘oku fakahoko ai ‘a kimoutolu foki ki he fale, mo‘o ‘afio‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua ‘i he Laumālie.
49003001	PEA koe‘uhi ko e me‘a ko ia, ko au Paula, ko e nofo pilīsone ‘a Kalaisi Sīsū koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu Senitaile–
49003002	[He ‘oku te pehē na‘a mou fanongo ki he‘eku ma‘u lakanga, ko e sētuata ‘o e kelesi ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘a ia na‘e tuku kiate au ma‘amoutolu:
49003003	‘io, ‘a e faka‘ilo kiate au mei he Ta‘ehāmai ‘a e misiteli, ‘o hangē ko ia na‘a ku ki‘i lea ki ai ‘anenai;
49003004	pea ‘i ho‘omou lau ia te mou ‘ilo mei ai ‘a e lahi ‘o ‘eku poto ‘i he misiteli faka-Kalaisi.
49003005	‘A ia na‘e ‘ikai faka‘ilo ‘i he ngaahi kuonga kehe ki he hako ‘o e tangata, ‘o hangē ko hono fakahā ‘i onopooni ‘e he Laumālie ki he kau ‘Aposetolo tapu ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio, mo ‘ene kau palōfita;
49003006	‘a ia ko e pehē, ‘Oku kaungā ‘ea mo kimautolu ‘a e Senitaile, mo kaungā sino, mo kaungā kau ‘i he Tala‘ofa, ‘o tu‘unga ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū, pea founga ‘i he Kōsipeli:
49003007	‘a e Kōsipeli ko ia ‘a ia na‘a ku hoko ko hono faifekau, pea ko e mātu‘aki foaki pē mo ia, ko e kelesi mei he ‘Otua, ‘a ia na‘e tuku mai ‘i he ngāue ‘a ‘ene Māfimafi.
49003008	‘Io, ko au ia ne tuku ki ai ‘a e kelesi ni, ‘a au ko e si‘i ‘i he si‘i ange fau ‘i he kau lotu kotoa pē, ke ‘a‘aku ‘a e malanga‘aki ki he Senitaile ‘a e koloa ‘a Kalaisi ‘oku ta‘efa‘a hakulea:
49003009	kae‘uma‘ā ke te tūhulu kinautolu ki he ‘alunga ‘o e misiteli ko ia, ‘a ia ne fufū mei mu‘a ‘i mu‘a ‘i he finangalo ‘o e ‘Otua, (‘a ‘ene ‘Afio ne ne ngaohi ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē);
49003010	koe‘uhi ke e‘a ai ‘i onopooni mei he siasi ki he fa‘ahinga pule mo ma‘u tu‘unga ‘i he ngaahi feitu‘u ‘o langi, ‘a e poto faifio ‘a e ‘Otua.
49003011	‘A ia ko e tu‘utu‘uni talu mei mu‘a, pea fai ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū ko hotau ‘Eiki;
49003012	‘a ia ‘oku tu‘unga ai ‘etau ta‘emālū‘ia ni, mo ‘ene apaapangofua ke tau hoko atu, he‘etau fai falala, ko e tupu ‘i he‘etau tui ki He‘ene ‘Afio.
49003013	Ko ia ‘oku ou kole atu, ke ‘oua te mou fo‘i ‘i he ngaahi mamahi kuo hoko kiate au, koe‘uhi ko ‘eku taukave kimoutolu: he ko e me‘a pehē ‘oku hā ai homau mahu‘inga.]
49003014	‘Io, koe‘uhiā ko e me‘a ko ia, ko ia ‘oku ou peluki hoku tui ki he Tamai,
49003015	‘a ia ‘oku tauhingoa ki ai ‘a e ngaahi fāmili kotoa pē ‘i langi mo māmani,
49003016	ko ‘eku kole ke foaki kiate kimautolu, ‘o taau mo e mohu me‘a ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio, ke ne tuku ke fou mai ha ivi ‘i hono Laumālie ki homou tangata-‘i-loto ke mou mālohi ai;
49003017	kae fale ‘a Kalaisi ‘i homou loto, ko e me‘a ‘i ho‘omou tui;
49003018	pea ‘i ho‘omou aka leva ‘i he ‘ofa, mo pulusi ki he tu‘unga ko ia, ke mou faifai pea mou lava ‘aupito ke lave‘i, hangē ko e kau mā‘oni‘oni kotoa pē, hono māukupu, mo hono lōloa, mo hono mā‘olunga, mo hono loloto–
49003019	‘io, ke ‘ilo ‘a e ‘ofa ‘a Kalaisi, ‘a ia ‘oku hulu atu ‘i he ngata‘anga ‘o e ‘ilo; kae fakafonu kimoutolu ke a‘usia hono kātokatoa kotoa ‘o e ‘Otua.
49003020	Pea ko ‘Ene ‘Afio, ‘a ia ‘oku ne lava ke fai ma‘atautolu ‘o hulu atu noa pē ‘i he ngaahi me‘a ‘oku tau fa‘a kolea pe fakakaukau ki ai, koe‘uhi ko e ivi ‘oku ngāue ‘i hotau loto,
49003021	‘io, ke ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘a e kolōlia ‘i he Siasi, pea ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū, kae ‘osi ‘a e ngaahi to‘utangata ‘o e ngaahi kuonga ‘o ‘ītāniti! ‘Ēmeni.
49004001	KO IA ‘oku ou tokoni atu, ‘a kita ‘oku te nofo pilīsone ko ‘ete ‘i he ‘Eiki, ke mou laka ‘o taau mo e lakanga na‘e ui kimoutolu ki ai,
49004002	pea ō mo e fa‘a faka‘aki‘akimui mo e anga malū, pea ō mo e anga mokomoko ‘o mou fekātaki‘aki pē ‘i he ‘ofa,
49004003	mo feinga ke tauhi ‘aki ‘a e no‘o ko e melino, ‘a e taha kuo fakatupu ‘e he Laumālie.
49004004	‘Oku taha pē ‘a e Sino, pea taha ‘a e Laumālie, hangē foki ‘oku taha ‘a e ‘amanaki ‘oku tupu mei he ui na‘e ui‘aki kimoutolu.
49004005	‘Oku taha pē ‘a e ‘Eiki, taha ‘a e Tui, taha ‘a e Papitaiso;
49004006	taha ‘a e ‘Otua mo Tamai ‘a e kakai kotoa pē, ‘a ia ‘oku pule ki he kakai kotoa pē, pea ‘oku fou atu ‘i he kakai kotoa pē pea ‘oku nofo‘ia ‘a e kakai kotoa pē.
49004007	Ka na‘e foaki kelesi kiate kitautolu tāutaha, ‘o fakafuofua ki he lahi ‘o e me‘a‘ofa ‘a Kalaisi.
49004008	Ko ia ‘oku ne folofola ai, “Ne ne hā‘ele ki ‘olunga Ne ne taki pōpula ha koto pōpula, Pea ne foaki me‘a‘ofa ki he tangata."
49004009	Pea ko e lau ki he‘ene hā‘ele ki ‘olunga, ko e hā hano ‘uhinga ka ko eni pē, tā na‘a ne hā‘ele hifo foki ki Lolofonua.
49004010	Ko ia na‘a ne hā‘ele hifo, ko ia pē foki na‘a ne hā‘ele hake, ‘o ‘osi hifo ‘a e ngaahi langi; koe‘uhiā ke ne aoniu ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē.
49004011	Pea foaki pē ‘e ia ha ni‘ihi ‘oku ‘aposetolo, ha ni‘ihi ‘oku palōfita, ha ni‘ihi ‘oku ‘evangeliō, ha ni‘ihi ‘oku tauhi mo faiako:
49004012	koe‘uhi ke ‘osi sāuni ‘a e kakai lotu ma‘a e ngāue tokoni, mo‘o langa hake ‘a e sino ‘o Kalaisi:
49004013	kae‘oua ke tau a‘usia kotoa pē ‘a e tui taha mo e ‘ilo taha ki he ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otua, ke a‘usia ‘a e tangata haohaoa, ke a‘usia ‘a e fua, ko e lahi ‘o e kakato ‘a Kalaisi.
49004014	Koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a tau kei tamaiki, ‘o felīlī‘aki mo fe‘ave‘aki fano ‘e he matangi fakaakonaki kotoa pē ‘oku tupu ‘i he fiemu‘a ‘a e kakai, ‘i he kākā ‘oku ngāue ke maau ‘a e me‘a fakahē:
49004015	ka tau fai‘aki ‘a e totonu ‘i he ‘ofa, ‘o tau tupu hake ‘i he‘etau me‘a kotoa pē ke hokosi ‘a e toko taha ko ia, ‘a ia ko e ‘Ulu, ‘a Kalaisi:
49004016	‘a ia ‘oku hokohoko lelei mei ai, mo fema‘uma‘utaki mei ai, ‘a e sino kotoa, pea fai ai pē ‘ene tupu mei he ngaahi fakahoko‘anga kotoa pē ‘o e tokoni, ‘i he ngāue ‘a e fo‘i me‘a takitaha ‘o taau mo ‘ene mafai, mo‘o langa hake ‘o e sino ‘i he ‘ofa.
49004017	Ko ia, ko e me‘a ‘oku ou tala mo fakapapau atu ‘i he ‘Eiki, ‘a ‘eni, ke ‘oua te mou kei laka ‘o hangē ko e fai ‘a Senitaile; ‘a ia ‘oku nau fou ‘i he muna ‘a honau loto,
49004018	kuo fakapo‘uli honau ‘atamai, kuo nau motu mei he mo‘ui ‘a e ‘Otua, ko e me‘a ‘i he vale ‘oku nofo‘ia kinautolu, ko e me‘a ‘i he fakafefeka honau loto:
49004019	‘a ia ko e fa‘ahinga ‘oku ongonoa, pea nau li‘oa kinautolu ki he pau‘u, ke fai ‘a e anga‘uli kotoa pē ‘i he havala.
49004020	Ka tala‘ehai na‘e pehē ho‘omou ako Kalaisi:
49004021	he ‘oku te pehē ko ia ia na‘a mou fanongo ki ai, pea ‘i ho‘omou ‘iate ia na‘a mou ako ‘i he ‘alunga ‘o e mo‘oni ‘oku hā ‘ia Sīsū–
49004022	‘o pehē, ke mou liliu ho‘omou tō‘onga mu‘a, ‘o hu‘ihu‘i ‘a e motu‘a tangata, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘au‘auha ko e me‘a ‘i he ngaahi holi ‘a kākā:
49004023	pea ke mou tuku ke fai ai pē homou fakafo‘ou ‘e he Laumālie ‘o homou ‘atamai;
49004024	pea ke mou kofu ‘aki ‘a e tangata fo‘ou, ‘a ia na‘e ngaohi ke hoko ki he ‘Otua ‘i he angatonu mo e mā‘oni‘oni ‘a Mo‘oni.
49004025	Pea ko eni, kuo tuku ‘a e loi, ko ia mou takitaha lea mo‘oni ‘i he feangai mo hono kaungā‘api; he ko e ngaahi kupu kitautolu ‘oku fekau‘aki.
49004026	‘Ita pē, kae‘oua ‘e angahala ai: ‘oua ‘e tuku ke tō ‘a e la‘ā ‘oku mou kei mamahi;
49004027	kae‘uma‘ā, ‘oua na‘a tuku ha ava ki he Tēvolo.
49004028	Ke ‘oua na‘a kei kaiha‘a ‘e he kaiha‘a: ka ne fakafitefita‘a mu‘a, ‘o ngāue‘aki ‘a e ongo nima ko ia ki he me‘a ‘oku lelei, koe‘uhi ke ai ha‘ane me‘a ke foaki ki he masiva.
49004029	‘Ilonga ha lea ‘e ‘ikai sia‘a, pea tapu ‘ene hū atu mei homou ngutu: ka ‘oka ai ha me‘a ‘oku ngali ‘aonga ‘i he faingata‘a ‘oku fai, ke ‘alu atu ia, hei‘ilo ‘e ma‘u tokoni mei ai ‘e he kakai ‘oku fanongo.
49004030	Pea ‘oua ‘e ‘ai ke mamahi ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni ko ia ‘o e ‘Otua, ‘a ia na‘e sila ‘aki kimoutolu ki he ‘aho huhu‘i.
49004031	Ko e fakamahū kotoa pē mo e lili mo e ‘ita mo e fe‘ioho‘aki mo e lau‘ikovi, tuku ke hiki ia meiate kimoutolu, ‘io, mo e lotokovi kotoa.
49004032	Ka mou anga‘ofa mu‘a ‘i ho‘omou feangai, mo manava‘ofa, pea mou fefakamolemole‘aki, ‘o hangē foki ko e ‘Otua ne ne fakamolemole kimoutolu ‘ia Kalaisi. Ko ia, mou hoko mu‘a ko e kau fa‘ifa‘itaki ki he ‘Otua, ‘o taau mo e fānau kuo ‘ofeina:
49004033	pea fou ‘i he ‘ofa, ‘o hangē foki ko Kalaisi ne ne ‘ofa‘i kimoutolu, ‘o ne li‘oa ia koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu, ko e hifo mo e feilaulau ki he ‘Otua mo‘o ngangatu fakahōifua.
49005001	Ka ko e me‘a ki he fe‘auaki mo e anga ‘uli kotoa pē, ‘uma‘ā ‘a e mānumanu,
49005002	na‘a mo e lau ki ai ke mou faka‘ehi‘ehi mei ai, telia ‘a e taau ‘o e feangai ‘a e kakai lotu;
49005003	kae‘uma‘ā ‘a e anga mousa‘a, mo e lau fakasesele pe ko e fie ngutuhua, ko e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ‘ikai ngali; ka ‘oku tau mu‘a ha fakafeta‘i,
49005004	seuke, ‘oku mahino ia kiate kimoutolu, he ‘oku mou ‘ilo, ‘ilonga ha fe‘auaki, pe ha anga‘uli, pe ha mānumanu, (ko e toko taha tauhi ‘aitoli ia ‘oku ‘ikai hano tofi‘a ‘i he Pule‘anga ‘o Kalaisi mo e ‘Otua.
49005005	‘Oua na‘a tuku ke kākaa‘i kimoutolu ‘e ha taha ‘aki ha koto lau pē:
49005006	he ‘oku hoko mo‘oni ‘i he ngaahi me‘a pehē ‘a e houhau ‘a e ‘Otua ki he hako ‘o talangata‘a.
49005007	Ko ia ‘oua te mou kaume‘a mo kinautolu:
49005008	he neongo ko e koto po‘uli kimoutolu ‘i mu‘a, ka ‘i onopooni ko e koto maama kimoutolu ‘i he ‘Eiki: mou laka ‘o taau mo e fānau ‘a maama;
49005009	(he ko e fua ‘o e maama ‘oku fou ‘i he lelei kotoa pē mo e totonu mo e mo‘oni):
49005010	mo mou sivi ‘o ‘ilo, pe ko e hā ‘a e me‘a ‘e hōifua ai ‘a e ‘Eiki.
49005011	Pea ‘oua na‘a mou kau ‘i he ngaahi ngāue ta‘efua ‘o e fakapo‘uli; kaekehe, mou valoki ki ai mu‘a.
49005012	Seuke, ko ‘enau ngaahi me‘a ‘oku fai fufū, na‘a mo e lea ki ai ko e me‘a fakamā.
49005013	Ka ko e ngaahi me‘a ko ia kotoa pē, ‘oka valokia, ‘oku fakae‘a ‘e he maama ko ia; he ‘ilonga ha me‘a kuo fakae‘a ko e maama ia.
49005014	Ko ia ‘oku ne folofola mai– ‘Ā, ‘a koe ‘oku mohe, Pea tu‘u hake mei he kau mate; Pea ‘e ulo mai ‘a Kalaisi kiate koe.
49005015	Ko ia, mou tokanga ki ho‘omou laka fakatu‘utu‘uni, pe ‘oku fēfē hono anga, ‘o ‘oua te mou ngali ta‘epoto ai, kae ngali poto:
49005016	mo mou lamalama ke ngāue‘aki ‘a e faingamālie, koe‘uhi ‘oku kovi ‘a e ngaahi ‘aho.
49005017	Ko ia, ‘oua te mou hoko ko e kau ta‘eloto, ka ko e kakai ‘oku mahino ki ai ‘a e finangalo ‘o e ‘Eiki.
49005018	Pea ‘oua te mou konā ‘i he uaine, he ‘oku ‘i ai ha fakalusa ‘i he fai pehē; ka ke fakafonu kimoutolu ‘aki ‘a e Laumālie:
49005019	‘o mou fealēlea‘aki ‘aki ‘a e ngaahi saame, mo e himi, mo e hiva fakalaumālie, mo mou hiva mo tā ‘i homou loto ki he ‘Eiki;
49005020	mo mou fakafeta‘i ma‘u pē ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē ki he ‘Otua ko e Tamai ‘i he huafa ‘o hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi;
49005021	mo mou feanganofo‘aki ‘i he ‘apasia kia Kalaisi.
49005022	‘a e kau fefine, mou anganofo ki si‘omou ngaahi husepāniti, ‘o hangē ki he ‘Eiki.
49005023	He ko e husepāniti ko e ‘ulu ‘o e uaifi, ‘o hangē foki ko Kalaisi ko e ‘ulu ‘o e Siasi; ‘io, ko ia ia ko e fakamo‘ui ‘o e sino.
49005024	Ka neongo ia, kae hangē ‘oku anganofo ‘a e Siasi kia Kalaisi, ke pehē foki mo e kau fefine ki honau ngaahi husepāniti ‘i he me‘a kotoa.
49005025	‘a e kau tangata, mou ‘ofa ki homou ngaahi uaifi, ‘o hangē foki ko Kalaisi ne ne ‘ofa‘i ‘a e Siasi, ‘o ne li‘oa ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio koe‘uhi ko ia:
49005026	koe‘uhi ke ne fakamā‘oni‘oni‘i ia ‘aki ‘a e folofola, hili ‘ene fufulu ia ‘i he pālutu‘anga ko ia ko e vai;
49005027	koe‘uhi ke ne ‘omi ‘e ia ‘a e Siasi kiate ia ‘oku fetapatapaki, ‘o ‘oua na‘a ai hano ‘ila pe fe‘ufe‘u, pe ha me‘a pehē ‘e taha, kaekehe ke ne mā‘oni‘oni mo ta‘emele.
49005028	‘Oku totonu ke pehē foki ‘a e ‘ofa ‘a e ngaahi husepāniti ki si‘onau ngaahi uaifi, he ko si‘onau sino kinautolu. Ko ia ‘oku ne ‘ofa ki hono uaifi ‘oku ne ‘ofa kiate ia.
49005029	Seuke, ‘anefe‘ia ‘a e fehi‘a ‘a ha taha ki hono kakano ‘o‘ona? kaekehe ‘oku ne fafanga mo tauhi ia, ‘e hangē foki ko e fai ‘a Kalaisi ki he Siasi.
49005030	He ko e ngaahi kupu kitautolu ‘o hono sino.
49005031	“Ko ia ‘e tukuange ‘e he tangata ‘a e tamai mo e fa‘ē kae pīkitai ki hono uaifi; pea te na hoko ko e kakano pē taha."
49005032	Ko e misiteli taumama‘o ‘eni; ka ‘oku kau ‘eku lea ‘a‘aku kia Kalaisi mo e Siasi.
49005033	Ka ko kimoutolu foki fakafo‘itangata–‘ē, ke takitaha ‘ofa ki si‘ono uaifi ‘o hangē ko ‘ene ‘ofa kiate ia; pea ko e uaifi ke ne faka‘apa‘apa ki hono husepāniti.
49006001	‘A e fānau, mou talangofua ‘i he ‘Eiki ki ho‘omou mātu‘a: he ko hono totonu ia.
49006002	“Faka‘apa‘apa ki ho‘o tamai mo ho‘o fa‘ē,”(ko e ‘uluaki fekau ia ‘oku ‘i ai hano tala‘ofa),
49006003	“ka ke monū‘ia, pea ke nofo fuoloa ‘i māmani."
49006004	Pea ko kimoutolu ‘a e ngaahi tamai, ‘oua te mou faka‘ita‘i ho‘omou fānau; kae akonekina ‘aki ‘a e tautea mo e valoki ‘a e ‘Eiki.
49006005	‘a e kau tamaio‘eiki, mou talangofua ki ho‘omou ngaahi ‘eiki fakasino ‘i he ‘apasia mo e tailiili; ‘o mou lototō ‘o hangē ko e fai kia Kalaisi.
49006006	‘O ‘oua ‘e fakamamata pē, ‘o hangē ko ha fa‘ahinga ‘oku ngāue ke mālie‘ia ‘a e tangata pē; ka mou fai ko e kau tamaio‘eiki ‘a Kalaisi ‘oku feia ‘a e finangalo ‘o e ‘Otua:
49006007	‘o mou ngāue, fie ngāue, mo loto lelei, ko e fai ki he ‘Eiki ‘o ‘ikai ki he tangata:
49006008	ko ho‘omou ‘ilo, ‘ilonga ha lelei ‘e fai ‘e hamou toko taha, te ne ma‘u ‘e ia hono totongi mei he ‘Eiki, ko ia ai pē pe ko e pōpula, pe ko e tau‘atāina.
49006009	Pea ko kimoutolu ‘a e ngaahi ‘eiki, mou fai pehē foki kiate kinautolu, ‘o tuku ‘a e fa‘a fakamana; ko ho‘omou ‘ilo ‘oku ‘afio ‘i langi ‘a e ‘Eiki ‘onautolu mo kimoutolu fakatou‘osi: pea ko e filifilimānako ‘oku ‘ikai ‘i he Toko Taha ko ia.
49006010	Ngata mei heni, mou tuku ke fakakaukaua kimoutolu ‘i he ‘Eiki, ‘io, ‘i he ivi ‘o hono māfimafi.
49006011	‘Ai kiate kimoutolu ‘a e mahafu kotoa ‘a e ‘Otua, koe‘uhi ke mou lava ke tu‘u ki he ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni kākā ‘a e tēvolo.
49006012	He tala‘ehai ko ‘etau milimilisino ni ko e fai mo ha toto mo kakano; kaekehe, ko e fai mo e fa‘ahinga pule, mo fa‘ahinga ma‘u tu‘unga, mo e hou‘eiki fakaleveleva ‘o e fakapo‘uli ni, mo e ngaahi kongakau laumālie ‘a e kovi ‘i he ngaahi feitu‘u ‘o langi.
49006013	Ko ia, mou to‘o ‘a e mahafu kotoa ‘a e ‘Otua, koe‘uhi ke mou lava ke talitu‘u ‘i he ‘aho ‘o e fai mai ‘a e kovi; pea kuo lava kotoa pē kae tu‘u pē.
49006014	Ko ia, ke mou tu‘u, kuo nono‘o ‘aki homou kongaloto ‘a e fai mo‘oni, pea kuo ‘ai ‘a e kofu tau ko e mā‘oni‘oni,
49006015	pea kuo mou topuva‘e ‘aki ‘a e ‘osi teuteu mei he Kōsipeli fakamelino;
49006016	kae‘uma‘ā kuo mou to‘o ‘a e pā ko e tui, ‘a ia te mou lava ‘aki ke tāmate‘i ‘a e ngaahi ngahau vela kotoa pē ‘a e fili.
49006017	Pea mou ma‘u ‘a e tatā tau ko e fakamo‘ui, mo e heletā ‘a e Laumālie, ‘a ia ko e Folofola ‘a e ‘Otua:
49006018	pea ‘i he faingamālie kotoa pē mou fai ho‘omou lotu ‘i he Laumālie ‘aki ‘a e fa‘ahinga hū kehekehe mo e kole, ‘o mou lama ke ma‘u ‘a e me‘a ko ia ‘i he fu‘u faka‘utumauku ‘o e hūfia ‘o e kāinga lotu kotoa pē;
49006019	kae‘uma‘ā ‘a au, koe‘uhi, ka u ka tangaki hoku ngutu, pea ‘omi ha‘aku lea ke u fakahā mālohi ‘a e misiteli ‘o e Kōsipeli;
49006020	(‘a ia ‘oku ou nofo ai ni ko e fakafofonga ha‘isia) ‘io, koe‘uhi ke u lea mālohi ‘i he me‘a ko ia, ‘a ia ‘oku taau mo kita ke fai.
49006021	Ka koe‘uhi ke mou ‘ilo foki ‘e kimoutolu ‘a ‘ete ngaahi me‘a mo ‘eku nofo, ko ia ‘e fakahā atu kotoa pē ‘e Tikiko, ko si‘i kāinga ‘ofeina, mo e tokoni lototō ‘i he ngāue ‘a e ‘Eiki:
49006022	‘a ia kuo u fekau tonu atu ki he me‘a ko ia, ke mou ‘ilo ai ‘emau ngaahi me‘a, pea ke ne fakafiemālie homou loto.
49006023	‘Ofa ke ma‘u ‘e he kāinga lotu ‘a e melino pea mo e tui ō mo e ‘ofa, mei he ‘Otua ko e Tamai mo e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi.
49006024	Ke nofo ‘a e kelesi mo e kakai kotoa pē, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘ofa ta‘e‘auha ki hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi.
50001001	TŪ KO KIMAUA, ‘a Paula mo Tīmote, ko e ongo tamaio‘eiki ‘a Kalaisi Sīsū, ko ‘ema tohi ki he kāinga lotu kotoa pē ‘oku ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū, ‘oku nofo ‘i Filipai, kae‘uma‘ā ‘a e kau faifekau pule mo e kau akonaki.
50001002	‘Ofa ke mou ma‘u kelesi mo e fiemālie mei he ‘Otua ko ‘etau Tamai mo e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi.
50001003	Ka u ka fakamanatu kiate kimoutolu ‘oku ake ‘eku fakafeta‘i ki hoku ‘Otua,
50001004	pea fai fiefia ma‘u ai pē ‘i he‘eku hū kotoa pē ‘a e hūfia ‘omoutolu fuli pē;
50001005	koe‘uhi ā ko ho‘omou kautaha ke kauhaki‘i ‘a e Kōsipeli, talu mei he ‘uluaki ‘aho ‘o fai mai:
50001006	he ko e me‘a ni ‘oku ou mātu‘aki tui ki ai, ko ia na‘a ne kamata ‘i homou loto ha ngāue lelei, te ne fai ai pē hono fakahaohaoa, ‘o a‘u ki he ‘aho ‘o Sīsū Kalaisi.
50001007	Pea hala koā ‘eku ‘amanaki pehē ‘iate kimoutolu, he ‘oku ou tauhi ma‘u kimoutolu ‘i hoku loto; kae‘uma‘ā ‘i he‘eku nofo ha‘isia, pea ‘i he‘eku taukapo‘i mo poupou ‘a e Kōsipeli, ‘oku mou kau kotoa pē mo au ‘i he kelesi ‘oku ‘omi.
50001008	Seuke, ko e ‘Otua ē ko ‘eku fakamo‘oni ki he lahi ‘o ‘eku feinga‘i kimoutolu ‘i he manava ‘o Kalaisi Sīsū.
50001009	Pea ko ‘eku lotu ‘eni; ke toe tupulekina ‘o lahi hake ‘aupito ho‘omou ‘ofa, he‘ene ma‘u ‘a e ‘ilo kānokano mo e ongo‘i ‘o e totonu ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē;
50001010	koe‘uhi ke mou sivi ‘o ‘ilo ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku lelei lahi, ka mou nofo hangataha mo ta‘emele, ‘o a‘u ki he ‘Aho ‘o Kalaisi;
50001011	kuo mou fonu ngutungutu ‘i he fua ‘o e mā‘oni‘oni, ‘a ia ‘oku fou mai ‘ia Sīsū Kalaisi ke lāngilangi‘ia mo fakamālō‘ia ai ‘a e ‘Otua.
50001012	Pea ko eni, ke mou ‘ilo, kāinga, ko e ngaahi me‘a kuo hoko kiate au, tā kuo nau iku ki he fakangaholo ‘o e Kōsipeli.
50001013	Ko ia, kuo ‘iloa ai hoku ngaahi ha‘i ‘i he ‘apitanga tau kotoa, pea ki he kakai kotoa pē, ‘o hā ko e tupu ‘i he‘eku kau kia Kalaisi.
50001014	Kae‘uma‘ā ko e tokolahi ‘o e kāinga lotu, kuo langa hake ‘enau falala ki he ‘Eiki ‘e hoku ngaahi ha‘i, pea kuo fakautuutu ai ‘enau to‘a ‘i he lea‘aki ‘a e Folofola ‘a e ‘Otua ‘o ta‘emanavahē.
50001015	‘Oku mo‘oni ‘oku ‘i ai ha ni‘ihi ‘oku malanga‘aki ‘a Kalaisi ko e meheka foki, mo e fakafekāke‘i; ka ‘oku fai foki ‘e he ni‘ihi ko ‘enau lotolelei mai.
50001016	Ko e ha‘a ‘ofa, ‘oku nau fai ko ‘enau ‘ilo ko hoku nafa ko e taukapo‘i ‘o e Kōsipeli:
50001017	ka ko e ha‘a fakakikihi ‘oku nau ongoongoa ‘a Kalaisi, ka tala‘ehai ko ‘enau fai mo‘oni, ka ko ‘enau fakakaukau ke langa ai ha fakatanga ke kanoni hoku ngaahi ha‘i.
50001018	Pea neongo e me‘a ke fēfē? Ko ia ai pē hono anga: pe ko e kofu ‘o ha me‘a, pe ko ha fai mo‘oni, kehe pē ‘oku ongoongoa ai ‘a Kalaisi, pea ‘oku ou fiefia ai;
50001019	‘io, pea te u fiefia ai foki, he ‘oku ou ‘ilo ‘e iku ‘a e me‘a ko ia mōku fakamo‘ui, ko e me‘a ‘i ho‘omou hūfia mo e tokonaki ‘a e Laumālie ‘o Sīsū Kalaisi:
50001020	‘a ia ‘oku hoa mo ‘eku ‘amanaki tu‘u mo falala, ‘e ‘ikai fakamaa‘i au ‘e ha me‘a; kaekehe, hangē ko ia ‘i mu‘a, ‘e pehē foki ‘i onopooni, te u mālohi noa pē ‘i he fakahīkihiki‘i ‘o Kalaisi ‘aki hoku sino, pe ‘i he‘ene mo‘ui, pe ‘i he‘ene mate.
50001021	He ko e me‘a kia kita, ko ‘ete mo‘ui ko Kalaisi ‘atā, pea ko ‘ete pekia ko e ‘āsili hoto fakakoloa.
50001022	Ka ‘o kapau ko ‘eku mo‘ui atu ‘i he kakano, kapau ko e me‘a ia ‘oku tu‘u ai ‘eku ma‘u fua he ngāue, pea tā ‘oku ‘ikai te u ‘ilo pe ko e hā te u fili ki ai.
50001023	Ka ‘oku fetohoaki au ‘e he me‘a ko ia ‘e ua; ‘oku hu‘u hoku loto ke tuku folau atu, ‘o nonofo mo Kalaisi; he ‘oku lelei lahi hake noa pē ia:
50001024	ka ko e nofo pē ‘i he sino ‘oku mamafa ange kiate au koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu.
50001025	Pea ‘i he‘eku ongo‘i pehē, ‘oku ou ‘ilo te u nofo pē ‘o mo‘ui atu ma‘amoutolu kotoa pē; ke fakalaka ki mu‘a ho‘omou lotu,
50001026	pea fai mo e fiefia: kae tupulekina ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū homou vīkiviki‘anga na, ‘o tu‘unga ‘iate au, ko e me‘a ‘i he‘eku toe feangai mo kimoutolu.
50001027	Sino pē e me‘a, ho‘omou feangai fakaekimoutolu ‘o e Kolo, ke taau ia mo e Kōsipeli ‘o Kalaisi: koe‘uhi, pe te u ‘alu atu ‘o mamata, pe te u mama‘o pē ‘o fanongo ki ho‘omou ngaahi me‘a, kehe ke hā ‘oku mou tu‘u ma‘u, ‘o laumālie taha, ‘o mou loto uouangataha pē he fakafitefita‘a ma‘a e lotu fakakōsipeli;
50001028	pea ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ilifia ‘i ha me‘a ‘e taha ‘oku fai ‘e homou ngaahi fili: he ko e tō‘onga ko ia ko e faka‘ilonga mala‘ia kiate kinautolu, ka ko e faka‘ilonga ia ‘o homou fakamo‘ui: pea ko e faka‘ilonga foki mei he ‘Otua;
50001029	he ko e me‘a‘ofa kuo ne ‘atu kiate kimoutolu–‘a e ngāue ke fai ma‘a Kalaisi–‘oku ‘ikai ko e tui pē kiate ia pea ngata ai, ka ko e kātaki mamahi foki koe‘uhi ko ia:
50001030	he ‘oku mou fefa‘uhi mo e faingata‘a ai pē ko ia, ‘a ia na‘a mou sio mu‘a ai ‘iate au, pea ‘oku mou fanongo ni ‘oku ‘iate au.
50002001	KO IA, kapau ‘oku ‘i ai hamou akonaki ‘ia Kalaisi, kapau ‘oku ‘i ai ha‘amou fiemālie mei he ‘ofa, kapau ‘oku ‘i ai ha‘amou feohi ‘i he Laumālie, kapau ‘oku ngaue homou fatu ‘i he ‘ofa, pea ai ha‘amou fai meesi,
50002002	‘ē, mou fakakakato ‘eku fiefia, ‘i ho‘omou loto taha: ke taha ho‘omou ofa, pea mou uouangataha, pea hu‘ufataha ho‘omou feinga:
50002003	‘o ‘oua ‘e feinga ki ha me‘a ko e fakafekāke‘i, pe ko e fie ongoongoa; ka ‘i ho‘omou loto ta‘ehiki mou takitaha lau ‘oku lelei hake ‘a hono kāinga ‘iate ia:
50002004	pea ‘oua na‘a takitaha tokanga ki he‘ene me‘a ‘a‘ana pē, ka ki he me‘a ‘a e kakai kehe foki.
50002005	‘Io, ke ‘iate kimoutolu ‘a e loto pehē, ‘a ia na‘e ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū foki.
50002006	‘A ia, neongo ‘ene ‘afio ‘i he anga ‘o e ‘Otua, ka na‘e ‘ikai te ne lau ‘ene tatau mo e ‘Otua ko e me‘a ke ha‘aki puke ki ai:
50002007	kaekehe na‘a ne fakamasivesiva‘i ‘e ia ia, he‘ene to‘o ‘a e anga ‘o e tamaio‘eiki, mo ‘ene hoko ‘i he tatau ‘o e tangata:
50002008	pea ‘i he ‘iloange na‘e hā ‘iate ia ‘a e tō‘onga ‘a e tangata, na‘a ne fakamo‘ulaloa‘i ia, he‘ene hoko ko e fai talangofua ‘o a‘u ki he‘ene mate, ka ko e mate ‘i he kolosi.
50002009	Ko hono ō pē ia foki na‘e mātu‘aki hākeaki‘i ai ia ‘e he ‘Otua, mo ne foaki kiate ia ha hingoa ‘oku mā‘olunga ‘i he hingoa kotoa pē:
50002010	koe‘uhi ke ‘ilonga ha tui ‘i Langi mo Māmani mo Lolofonua pea peluki ‘i he huafa ‘o Sīsū;
50002011	pea ‘ilonga hā ‘elelo, pea fakamo‘oni KO E ‘EIKI ‘A SĪSŪ KALAISI–mo‘o fakalāngilangi‘i ‘a e ‘Otua ko e TAMAI.
50002012	Pea ko eni, si‘oku ‘ofa‘anga, kuo mou fai talangofua ai pē, ko ia ‘oua te mou ngāue ‘o hangē ko ha me‘a ia ke fai ‘i hoku ‘ao pē, ka ke fakautuutu ‘aupito ‘i he‘eku mama‘o ni ho‘omou ngāue ke lava‘i homou fakamo‘ui ‘omoutolu, ‘o fai ‘apasia pē mo tailiili:
50002013	he ko e ‘Otua ia ‘oku ngāue ‘iate kimoutolu ke fakatupu ‘a e fie fai mo e mafai fakatou‘osi, koe‘uhi pē ko ‘ene tokanga ‘ofa mai.
50002014	Mou fai ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē ‘o ta‘eha lāunga pe ha fakakikihi:
50002015	koe‘uhi ke mou haohaoa mo ‘ata‘atā mei he kovi, ko e fānau ‘a e ‘Otua ‘oku ta‘emele ‘i he lotolotonga ‘o e to‘utangata anga pikopiko mo heke; ‘a ia ‘oku mou ulo ‘i honau ha‘oha‘onga ko e ngaahi māma‘anga ‘i māmani,
50002016	ho‘omou takiloa atu ‘a e folofola ‘o e mo‘ui: koe‘uhi ke ai ha me‘a ke u pōlepole ai ‘i he ‘Aho ‘o Kalaisi, ko e ‘ikai iku noa ‘eku lele na‘e fai, pe iku noa ‘eku fakaongosia.
50002017	‘Io, pea neongo ‘e lilingi hoku toto ko e kava ‘o e feilaulau ko ho‘omou lotu, mo hono hapai, fiefia pē au, ‘o u fakamālie kimoutolu kotoa pē:
50002018	pea ke mou fiefia foki ‘i he me‘a ko ia, pea fakamālie kiate au.
50002019	Ka ‘oku ou ‘amanaki pē ‘i he ‘Eiki ko Sīsū, ‘e toe si‘i pea u fekau atu ‘a Tīmote, koe‘uhi ke u fiemālie ‘e au foki ‘i ha‘aku ‘ilo ki ho‘omou ngaahi me‘a.
50002020	He ‘oku ‘ikai te u ma‘u mo ha taha ‘oku loto tatau mo au; ha taha te ne lotomo‘ua mo‘oni ki ho‘omou ngaahi me‘a:
50002021	he ko kinautolu ni kotoa pē ‘oku nau kumi ‘enau me‘a ‘anautolu, ‘o ‘ikai ko e me‘a ‘a Sīsū Kalaisi.
50002022	Ka ‘oku mou ‘ilo ia ko e mo‘onia, he‘ene nofo kiate au, ‘o hangē ko e foha mo e tamai, ‘o ngāue mo au ki he Kōsipeli.
50002023	‘Io, ko e toko taha ko ia ‘oku ou ‘amanaki fekau atu, ‘oka u ka ‘ilo leva pe ‘e fēfē ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku kau kiate au.
50002024	Ka ‘oku te falala ki he ‘Eiki, ‘e toe si‘i pea u ‘alu atu mo au foki.
50002025	Ka kuo u fakakaukau ‘e lelei mu‘a ke fekau atu ‘a ‘Epafalotaito, ko e kaungā lotu, mo kaungā ngaue, mo kaungā tau ‘o‘oku, ka ko ho‘omou talafekau mo homou nima ‘i he tokoni ki he‘eku masiva.
50002026	He na‘a ne nofo holi pē kiate kimoutolu, mo hoha‘a lahi, koe‘uhi kuo mou fanongo ‘oku ne mahaki.
50002027	Pea ‘oku mo‘oni na‘a ne mahaki‘ia, ‘o tei pekia; ka na‘e ‘alo‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua kiate ia; ‘io, ‘o ‘ikai kiate ia pē, ka kiate au foki, na‘a kanoni mamahi ‘eku mamahi.
50002028	Ko ia na‘e ‘āsili to‘oto‘o ai ‘eku tuku atu ia, koe‘uhi ke mou mamata kiate ia ‘o toe fiefia, pea si‘isi‘i ai mo ‘eku hoha‘a.
50002029	Ko ia, mou tali lelei ia ‘i he ‘Eiki mo e fu‘u fiefia, pea mou mahu‘inga‘ia ‘i he kakai pehē:
50002030	he ko e me‘a ‘i he ngāue ‘a e ‘Eiki na‘a ne ofi ki he mate; he na‘a ne va‘inga‘aki ‘ene mo‘ui koe‘uhi ke ne fai ‘a e me‘a na‘e toe, pea haohaoa ho‘omou tokoni kiate au.
50003001	KO ‘eku lea faka‘osi ‘eni, si‘oku kāinga; mou fiefia ‘i he ‘Eiki. Ko ‘eku tohi fakafanafana pehē atu tala‘ehai ko e me‘a fakafiu kiate au, pea ko e tu‘u homou lā mo e poupou.
50003002	Vakavakai ‘a e fanga kulī na: vakavakai ‘a e kau ngāue ‘oku kovi: vakavakai ‘a e fa‘ahinga mutu.
50003003	He ko kitaua pē ‘a e kamu mo‘oni, ‘a kitaua ‘oku ta fai ‘eta ngāue ki he ‘Eiki ‘i he Laumālie ‘o e ‘Otua, pea fai ‘eta pōlepole ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū, pea ‘oku ‘ikai te ta falala ki he me‘a fakasino–neongo te te lava ‘e kita ke falala foki ki he me‘a fakasino.
50003004	Ka ai ha taha ‘oku ne pehē te ne lava ke falala ki he me‘a fakasino, huanoa au:
50003005	‘a au na‘a ku ‘aho valu leva pea kamu, na‘a ku tupu ko e ‘Isileli, ko ha ha‘a Penisimani, ko e Hepelū tupu mei he kau Hepelū; ka lau ki he Lao, ko e Fālesi au.
50003006	Ka lau ki hono mamahi‘i, na‘a ku fakatanga‘i ‘a e siasi ko eni, ka lau ki he mā‘oni‘oni fakalao, ne u haohaoa.
50003007	Ka ko e alā me‘a pehē, ‘a ia ko hoku fakakoloa ‘i mu‘a, kuo loa ‘eku lau ia ko e koto fakamasiva koe‘uhi ko Kalaisi.
50003008	Seuke, ‘oku ou kei lau ni foki ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia kotoa ko e koto fakamasiva, koe‘uhi ko ‘ene fungani ‘a e ‘ilo‘i ‘o Kalaisi Sīsū ko hoku ‘Eiki; ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio na‘a ku tuku ai ke mole kotoa, ‘io, ‘o u lau ko e kinoha‘a pē, koe‘uhi ke fakakoloa ‘aki au ‘a Kalaisi;
50003009	pea ke ‘ilo au ‘oku ou ‘iate ia, pea ‘oku ‘ikai te u ‘i ai mo au ‘eku mā‘oni‘oni ‘a‘aku, ‘a ia ‘oku mei he Lao, ka ko ia ‘oku founga ‘i he tui kia Kalaisi, ‘io, ko e mā‘oni‘oni ‘oku mei he ‘Otua, pea tefito ki he tui:
50003010	ka u ‘ilo ni ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio, mo e ‘aonga ‘o ‘ene toetu‘u, mo e kau ‘i he‘ene ngaahi mamahi, he fakatatau au ki he‘ene pekia;
50003011	hei‘ilo te u lava ke kau ‘i he toetu‘u ko ē mei he kau pekia.
50003012	Tala‘ehai ko ‘eku pehē kuo u ma‘u ni, pe kuo ‘osi hoku fakahaohaoa; ka ‘oku ou tuli atu pē, hei‘ilo te u ala ki he me‘a ko ia na‘e ala ai ‘a Kalaisi kiate au.
50003013	Kāinga, ‘oku ‘ikai te u lau au kuo u ma‘u: ka ko e me‘a pē taha ‘oku ou fai; ‘oku ou fakangalongalo‘i ‘a e ngaahi me‘a kuo tuku ki mui, ka u kakapa atu ki he ngaahi me‘a mei mu‘a:
50003014	‘o u tuli atu pē ki he ngata‘anga, ke ma‘u ‘a e pale ‘o hoto ui mei ‘olunga na‘e fai ‘e he ‘Otua ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū.
50003015	Ko ia, ‘ilonga kitaua ‘oku haohaoa ke pehē hota loto; pea ka ai ha me‘a ‘oku hā kehe ki homou loto, ‘e faifai pea faka‘ilo mo ia ‘e he ‘Otua kiate kimoutolu.
50003016	Ka neongo pe ko e hā ha me‘a kuo ta a‘u ki ai, kehe ke fou atu ai pē ‘i he hala pē ko ia.
50003017	Kāinga, mou kau ‘i he fa‘ifa‘itaki kiate au; pea mou vakai kiate kinautolu ‘oku tatau ‘enau laka mo e fa‘ifa‘itaki‘anga ‘oku mou ma‘u ‘iate kimaua.
50003018	He ko e me‘a ki he laka ‘a e ni‘ihi, ‘a kinautolu na‘a ku fa‘a tala kiate kimoutolu, pea ‘oku ou toe tala ‘eni mo tangi, ko e ngaahi fili kinautolu ‘o e Kolosi ‘o Kalaisi:
50003019	ko e fa‘ahinga ko honau iku‘anga ko e mala‘ia; ko e fa‘ahinga ‘oku ‘otua ki honau kete, pea ‘oku nau pōlepole ‘i he me‘a ‘oku fakamā; ‘a e fa‘ahinga ‘oku hu‘u ‘enau tokanga ki he ngaahi me‘a ‘o māmani.
50003020	He ko ho‘otautolu kolo ‘oku tu‘u ‘i langi, ‘a ia ko e potu ‘oku tau nofo‘aki tali ‘a e ha‘u mei ai ha Fakamo‘ui, ko e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi.
50003021	‘A ia te ne liliu ‘a e sino ‘o ‘etau mo‘ulaloa ni ke alāanga mo e sino ‘o ‘ene lāngilangi‘ia; ko e ngāue ‘a hono ivi ko ia, ‘a ia ‘oku ne mafai ai foki ke fakamo‘ulaloa kiate ia ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē.
50004001	KO IA, si‘oku kāinga, ‘a ia ‘oku ou ‘ofa mo holi ki ai, ko si‘oku fiefia‘anga mo kalauni; ke pehē ho‘omou tu‘u ma‘u ‘i he ‘Eiki, si‘oku ‘ofa‘anga.
50004002	‘Oku ou enginaki ‘a ‘Iuotia, pea ‘oku ou enginaki ‘a Siniteke, ke na loto taha ‘i he ‘Eiki.
50004003	‘Io, ‘oku ou kole kiate koe foki, ko si‘i kaungā toho palau mo‘oni ‘o‘oku, ke ke tokoni ki he ongo fafine ko ia: he na‘a na kaungā fitefita‘a mo au ‘i he Kōsipeli, ‘o hangē foki ko Kelemeni, mo hono toe ‘o hoku kaungā ngāue, ‘a ia ‘oku tu‘u honau ngaahi hingoa ‘i he Tohi ‘o e Mo‘ui.
50004004	Mou fiefia ‘i he ‘Eiki ma‘u ai pē: ‘io, ka u toe ‘ai atu, Mou fiefia.
50004005	Ko ho‘omou anga na, ‘a e ta‘e te mou ha‘aki ‘eke ho‘omou ngaahi me‘a, tuku ke hā ia ki he kakai fuli pē. ‘Oku tu‘unuku mai ‘a e ‘Eiki.
50004006	Neongo pe ko e hā ‘a e me‘a, ‘oua te mou lotomo‘ua ai; ka ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē tuku ke hā ki he ‘Otua ho‘omou ngaahi kole, ‘i he lotu mo e hūfia, pea fai mo e fakafeta‘i.
50004007	Pea ko e nonga ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘a ia ‘oku mama‘o ‘i he tatae ‘o e ‘atamai kotoa pē, te ne malu‘i homou loto mo ho‘omou ngaahi fakakaukau ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū.
50004008	Ko ‘eku lea faka‘osi, kāinga. ‘Ilonga ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku mo‘oni, ‘ilonga ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku taau, ‘ilonga ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku totonu, ‘ilonga ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ma‘a, ‘ilonga ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku faka‘ofo‘ofa, ‘ilonga ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ongoongolelei, ‘io, ka ai ha ‘ulungāanga lelei, pea ka ai ha me‘a ‘oku fakamālō‘ia, ko e ngaahi me‘a ia ke mou tokanga ki ai.
50004009	‘Io, ko e ngaahi me‘a na‘a mou ako, mo ma‘u, mo fanongoa, mo mamata, ‘iate au, ko e ngaahi me‘a ko ia ke mou fai; pea ‘e toki ‘iate kimoutolu ‘a e ‘Otua ‘oku ‘a‘ana ‘a e nonga.
50004010	Pea ko eni, na‘a ku fiefia ‘aupito ‘i he ‘Eiki, koe‘uhi ko e faifai pea toe muka ho‘omou tokanga ki hoku fakatu‘umālie; ‘a ia foki na‘a mou tokanga ai pē ki ai, ka na‘e ‘ikai hamou faingamālie.
50004011	‘Oku ‘ikai te u lea pehē koe‘uhi pē ko ‘eku masiva; he ko e me‘a kia kita kuo u ako ke u fiemālie ai pē ‘i he me‘a ‘oku ou ‘i ai.
50004012	‘Io, ‘oku ou lava ‘a e nofo mo‘ulaloa, pea ‘oku ou lava foki ‘a e mohu me‘a. Ne ako‘i au, ‘i he‘eku me‘a taau taha mo hono kotoa, ka u pōtopoto‘i ‘i he nofo mākona mo e nofo fiekaia, mo e nofo mohu me‘a mo e nofo masiva.
50004013	‘Oku ou mafeia ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē ‘iate ia ‘oku ne fakakaukaua au.
50004014	Ka neongo ia, ka na‘e mālō pē ho‘omou fai, ho‘omou kau mo au ‘i he‘eku mamahi ni.
50004015	Kae‘uma‘ā ‘oku mou ‘ilo foki, kau Filipai, ‘i he fua ake ‘a e Kōsipeli, he taimi na‘a ku ‘alu ai mei Masitōnia, na‘e ‘ikai mo ha siasi ‘e ‘omi ha me‘a kiate au, ke ‘ai ki he tohi ‘o e ‘omi mo e ‘atu, ngata pē ‘iate kimoutolu.
50004016	He na‘a mo ‘eku ‘i Tesalonaika, na‘e tu‘o taha, ‘io, ‘o tu‘o ua, ho‘omou ‘omi tokoni ki he‘eku masiva.
50004017	Tala‘ehai ko ‘eku mamafa ki he me‘a‘ofa, ka ko e me‘a ‘oku ou mamafa ki ai, ke ai ha fua ‘e hulu atu ke tohi ma‘amoutolu.
50004018	Ka ‘oku fe‘unga ‘eni mo ‘eku me‘a kotoa pē, pea hulu atu; ‘io, ‘oku ou fonu ngutungutu he‘eku ma‘u meia ‘Epafalotaito ‘a e me‘a na‘a mou tuku mai, ko e ngangatu fakahōifua ia ko e feilaulau ‘e tali ‘e he ‘Otua, pea tokotokangamālie ai hono finangalo.
50004019	Pea ko hoku ‘Otua te ne fakaai ho‘omou masiva kotoa pē, ‘o fakatatau ki he koloa ‘oku ne ma‘u ‘i langi ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū.
50004020	Pea ko e ‘Otua ko ‘etau Tamai, ke ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘a e kolōlia, ‘o lauikuonga pea ta‘engata, ‘Ēmeni.
50004021	Mou tala hoku ‘ofa ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū ki he kakai lotu tāutaha. ‘Oku ‘ofa atu ‘a e kāinga ‘oku nonofo mo au.
50004022	‘Oku ‘ofa atu ‘a e kakai lotu kotoa pē, pea lahi taha ‘a kinautolu ‘oku mei he Loto‘ā ‘o Sisa.
50004023	Ko e Kelesi ‘a e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, ‘ofa ke ‘i homou laumālie ia.
51001001	TŪ ko kimaua–‘a Paula ko e ‘aposetolo ‘a Kalaisi Sīsū ‘i he tu‘utu‘uni ‘a e ‘Otua, mo si‘i kāinga ko Tīmote–ko ‘ema tohi ki he kakai lotu ‘i Kolose, ko e kau tui ‘oku kāinga ‘ia Kalaisi.
51001002	‘Ofa ke mou ma‘u kelesi mo e fiemālie mei he ‘Otua ko ‘etau Tamai.
51001003	Ko e fakafeta‘i pē kuo ma fai ki he ‘Otua, ko e Tamai ‘a hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, mo e hūfia ma‘u pē kimoutolu,
51001004	talu ‘ema fanongo ki ho‘omou tui kia Kalaisi Sīsū, pea mo ho‘omou ‘ofa tauhi ma‘u ki he kau lotu kotoa pē;
51001005	‘a ia ‘oku tupu mei ho‘omou ‘amanaki ki he me‘a kuo tuku tauhi ma‘amoutolu ‘i Hēvani: ‘a ia ne mou fanongo mu‘a ki ai ‘i he malanga‘aki ‘o e akonaki mei he Kōsipeli:
51001006	‘a e Kōsipeli na‘e a‘u atu, pea ‘oku nofo mo kimoutolu, ‘o hangē foki ‘ene ‘i māmani kātoa, ‘o ne fakatupu fua mo mafola, ‘o hangē foki ‘ene fai ‘iate kimoutolu, talu e ‘aho ne mou fanongo ki hono tala ‘o e kelesi ‘a e ‘Otua, mo ongona, ‘i hono anga totonu:
51001007	‘a ē ne mou ako ‘ia ‘Epafasi, ko si‘oma kaungā tamaio‘eiki ‘ofeina ‘omaua, pea ko e faifekau ‘a Kalaisi kei lototō kiate kimaua;
51001008	pea ko ia foki na‘a ne fakahā mai ho‘omou ‘ofa ‘i he Laumālie.
51001009	Ko ia, ko kimaua foki, talu e ‘aho na‘a ma fanongo ki ai, ‘oku ‘ikai tuku ‘ema hūfia kimoutolu, mo ‘ema kōlenga ke mou pōtopoto‘i ‘i he ‘ilo ki hono finangalo, ko e me‘a ‘i he poto kehekehe mo e ‘ilo kehekehe ‘oku mei he Laumālie;
51001010	koe‘uhi ke taau ho‘omou laka pea mo e ‘Eiki, ‘o hu‘u ki he me‘a kotoa pē te ne hōifua ai; ‘o mou fakatupu fua, ko e ngaahi ngāue lelei kehekehe; mo mou tupulekina ko e me‘a ‘i he ‘ilo ki he ‘Otua;
51001011	kuo fakamālohi kimoutolu ‘aki ‘a e mafai kotoa pē, ‘o taau mo e māfimafi ‘o ‘ene ‘Afio lāngilangi‘ia, ke mou lava ai ke kātaki fiefia ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē mo e kakai kotoa pē;
51001012	mo mou fakafeta‘i ki he Tamai, ‘a ia na‘a ne ngaohi kimoutolu ke mou taau ke ‘inasi ‘i he tofi‘a ko ia ‘o e kau mā‘oni‘oni ‘a ia ‘oku ‘i he maama–
51001013	‘a ‘ene ‘Afio na‘a ne hamusi kitautolu mei he pule ‘a Po‘uli, mo ne hiki kitautolu ki he pule‘anga ‘o hono ‘Alo ‘Ofa‘anga:
