51001014	pea ‘i he‘etau tu‘u ‘iate ia kuo tau ma‘u ‘a e huhu‘i, ko e fakamolemole ‘etau ngaahi angahala;
51001015	‘a ia ko e ‘Īmisi ia ‘o e ‘Otua ko e Ta‘ehāmai, ko e ‘Uluaki ia na‘e fakatupu, ko e Kimu‘a ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē kuo ngaohi:
51001016	koe‘uhi na‘e tefito kiate ia ‘a e ngaohi ‘o e me‘a kotoa pē, ‘a e me‘a ‘i he langi mo e me‘a ‘i māmani, ‘a e me‘a hā mai mo e me‘a ta‘ehā mai, neongo ko ha fa‘ahinga ma‘u taloni, pe ko ha fa‘ahinga hou‘eiki, pe ko ha fa‘ahinga pule, pe ko ha fa‘ahinga ma‘u tu‘unga;
51001017	‘io, kuo ngaohi ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē ‘iate ia pea ma‘ana, pea ko e mu‘a ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio kae kimui ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē, pea ‘oku fema‘uma‘utaki ‘iate ia ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē:
51001018	pea ko ‘Ene ‘Afio ko e ‘Ulu ‘o e Sino ko ia ko e Siasi; he ko e Kamata ia, ko e ‘Uluaki na‘e fakatupu mei he kau Pekia; koe‘uhi ke ne hoko ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē ko e Tu‘ukimu‘a.
51001019	He na‘e finangalo ‘a Kātokatoa ke fale ‘i He‘ene ‘Afio;
51001020	pea ko e me‘a ‘iate ia ke toe fakalelei ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē ki He‘ene ‘Afio; ‘io, hili ‘ene fai ‘a e fakamelino ‘aki ‘a e ta‘ata‘a ‘i he Kolosi ‘o‘ona, pea ke fakalelei ‘iate ia ‘a e ngaahi me‘a kotoa pē, pe ‘oku ‘i Māmani pe ‘oku ‘i Langi.
51001021	Pea ko kimoutolu foki na‘e fakahee‘i mu‘a, pea mou nofo ko e ngaahi fili ‘i loto, ‘o hā ‘i ho‘omou ngaahi ngāue na‘e kovi; ka ‘i he taimi ni kuo ne fakalelei kimoutolu ‘aki ‘a e pekia ‘a hono sino kakano,
51001022	koe‘uhi ke ne ‘atu kimoutolu ‘oku mou mā‘oni‘oni mo ta‘emele mo ta‘elau‘i ‘i he‘ene ‘afio hifo.
51001023	Kehe ‘o kapau te mou nofo ma‘u ‘i he lotu, kuo pulusi ki he tu‘unga, mo ma‘uma‘uluta, pea ta‘emahiki mei he ‘amanaki fakakōsipeli; ‘a e Kōsipeli ko ia ‘a ia na‘a mou fanongo ki ai, ‘a ia ne malanga‘aki ki he me‘a mo‘ui kotoa pē ‘i he lalo langi, ‘a ia na‘a ku hoko, ‘a au Paula, ko hono faifekau.
51001024	Ko e me‘a ‘oku ou fai ‘i he taimi ni, ko e fiefia ‘i he‘eku ngaahi mamahi koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu, ‘o u fai ‘i hoku kakano ni ‘a e fakakakato ‘o e ngaahi mamahi ‘a Kalaisi ‘oku toe ke fai koe‘uhi ko hono sino ko e siasi:
51001025	‘a ia na‘a ku hoko au ko e faifekau ki ai, ke fai ‘a e lakanga na‘e tuku kiate au ma‘amoutolu, ‘a ia ko e sētuata ‘a e ‘Otua, ke ‘osiki ‘a e Folofola ‘a e ‘Otua–
51001026	‘a e misiteli ko ia ne fufū ‘i he ngaahi kuonga mo e ngaahi to‘utangata kuo hili, ka kuo fakae‘a ‘eni ki hono kakai tapu:
51001027	‘a ia na‘e finangalo ‘a e ‘Otua ke faka‘ilo kiate kinautolu hono lahi faufau ‘o e lāngilangi‘ia ‘o e misiteli ko ia ‘i he lotolotonga ‘o e Senitaile; ‘a ia ko eni, ko e ‘iate kimoutolu ‘a Kalaisi, ko e faka‘amanaki ki he lāngilangi‘ia.
51001028	‘A ia ‘oku mau ongoongoa, he‘emau valoki ‘a e tangata kotoa pē, mo akonekina ‘a e tangata kotoa pē, ‘aki ‘a e fa‘ahinga poto kotoa pē; koe‘uhi ke mau ‘atu ‘a e tangata kotoa pē kuo haohaoa ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū.
51001029	Pea ‘oku te fai ke ongosia foki kita, ‘i he fefa‘uhi ke lava ‘a e me‘a ko ia; ‘o taau mo e ivi ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘oku ngāue ‘i hoku loto, ‘o fu‘u mālohi.
51002001	HE ‘oku ou loto ke mou mea‘i ‘a e fu‘u lahi ‘o e fefa‘uhi ‘oku ou fai koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu, mo e kāinga ‘i Leotisia, ‘io, ‘a kimoutolu kotoa pē kuo te‘eki ke mamata ki hoku mata fakasino;
51002002	‘a ‘eku feinga ke fiemālie homou loto, he fetu‘utu‘utaki kimoutolu, ko e me‘a ‘i ho‘omou fe‘ofo‘ofani, pea koe‘uhi ke mou ‘osiki ‘a e fu‘u koloa ko ia, ko e ‘ilo fakapapau mo e ‘ilo kānokano, ‘io, ‘a e ‘ilo faka‘āufuli ki he misiteli faka‘otua, ‘a ia ko Kalaisi:
51002003	‘a ia ‘oku fa‘oaki ai hono kātokatoa ‘o e koloa poto mo e koloa ‘ilo, ‘o fufū pē.
51002004	‘Oku ou lea pehē, koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a fakahala‘i kimoutolu ‘e ha taha, ‘i ha‘ane lea fakaoleole.
51002005	He neongo ‘oku ou mama‘o mo‘oni fakasino, ka ‘oku ou ‘iate kimoutolu ‘i loto, ‘o u fiefia pē, mo tokanga‘i ‘a e maau ‘o ho‘omou nofo, mo e aka taumama‘o ‘o ho‘omou tui kia Kalaisi.
51002006	Ko ia, ko e me‘a ‘i ho‘omou ma‘u ‘a Kalaisi Sīsū ko e ‘Eiki, pea mou fou ‘iate ia pē;
51002007	ko e kakai kuo aka ‘iate ia, pea ‘oku langa hake ‘iate ia, pea ‘oku faka‘a‘au ke kaukaua ‘i he lotu, ‘i hono anga na‘e akonekina ai kimoutolu, ‘o mou tupulekina ai, pea ō mo ia ‘a e fa‘a fakafeta‘i.
51002008	Mou vakai na‘a faifai pea ai ha taha te ne fai‘aki ‘ene poto fie filōsefa, ‘a ia ko e koto muna mo e kākā, ‘o ne holataki kimoutolu ‘i he ‘alunga ‘o e ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni fakaeono‘aho ‘a e kakai, ‘io, ‘i he ‘alunga ‘o e ngaahi ‘elemēniti ‘o e lotu ‘a ia ‘oku fakamaama, ‘o ‘ikai ‘i he ‘alunga faka-Kalaisi.
51002009	Koe‘uhi ‘oku fale ‘i He‘ene ‘Afio hono kātokatoa ‘o e ‘Otua, ‘o nofo sino;
51002010	pea kuo mou ‘osi fonu ‘i ho‘omou tu‘u ‘iate ia, ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘a ia ko e ‘ulu ‘o e fa‘ahinga pule mo ma‘u tu‘unga kotoa pē.
51002011	Pea na‘e kamu foki ‘a kimoutolu ‘iate ia, ko ha kamu ta‘efai ‘e ha nima, ko e hu‘ihu‘i ‘o e sino kakano‘ia, ko e kamu ‘oku ‘a Kalaisi:
51002012	‘a ia na‘e fai ‘i homou kaungā telio mo ia ‘i he papitaiso, pea ‘i he me‘a ko ia na‘e kaungā fokotu‘u kimoutolu mo ia, ko e me‘a ‘i ho‘omou tui ki he ngāue ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘a ‘ene fokotu‘u ia mei he pekia.
51002013	Ko kimoutolu foki, lolotonga na‘a mou mate ‘i ho‘omou ngaahi faihala, pea ‘i ho‘omou ta‘ekamu, ‘a ē ko ho‘omou kei kakano‘ia, na‘a ne kaungā fokotu‘u hake kimoutolu mo ia, hili ‘ene fakamolemole ‘etau ngaahi faihala kotoa pē.
51002014	‘Io, hili ‘ene tāmate‘i ‘a e tohi ne fakamo‘ua kitautolu ‘aki hono ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni, ‘a e tohi ko ia na‘e tu‘u ko hotau fili: ‘io, kuo ne ‘ave ‘a e tohi mo ‘ene pūnufu‘u mai, he na‘a ne tukifa‘o ia ki hono Kolosi;
51002015	mo ne hu‘ihu‘i meiate ia ‘a e kau pule mo e kau ma‘u tu‘unga, ‘o ne mātu‘aki faka‘ali‘ali kinautolu, he‘ene sipikaki kinautolu ‘i He‘ene ‘Afio.
51002016	Ko ia, ke ‘oua na‘a ai ha taha te ne anga‘i kimoutolu ‘i ha kai pe ha inu, pe ‘i ha me‘a hangē ko ha kātoanga, pe ha fakamāhina fo‘ou, pe ha Sāpate;
51002017	he ko e ngaahi me‘a ko ia ko ha ‘ata pē ‘o ha ngaahi me‘a ka hoko, ka ko e sino ‘o e ngaahi me‘a ko ia ‘oku tefito kia Kalaisi.
51002018	Pea ke ‘oua na‘a fakahala‘i kimoutolu ‘e ha taha ke mole homou pale, he‘ene loto ke fou ‘i he “fakavaivai”tokua, mo e lotu ki ha kau ‘āngelo, he‘ene ‘eke noa pē ki he ngaahi me‘a tokua “kuo ne sio ki ai,”kuo fakafuofuolahi ia ko e me‘a ‘i hono “‘atamai”tokua, (‘a e ‘atamai ‘o hono kakano);
51002019	ka ko e taha ‘oku ‘ikai kuku ki he ‘Ulu, ‘a ia ‘oku ma‘u tokoni mei ai, pea ‘oku fema‘uma‘utaki mei ai, ‘a e sino kotoa, ko e me‘a ‘i he ngaahi hokotanga hui mo e ngaahi uoua, ‘o ne tupu ai, ko e tupu faka‘otua.
51002020	‘Ē, kapau leva na‘a mou kaungā pekia mo Kalaisi, ‘o ‘ata‘atā ai mei he ngaahi ‘elemēniti ‘o e lotu ‘a ia ‘oku fakamaama, ko e hā ‘oku mou fai ‘o hangē ‘oku mou kei mo‘ui fakamaama, ‘e kātaki ke tu‘utu‘unia kimoutolu ‘i he falengā tu‘utu‘uni mo akonaki ‘a e tangata;
51002021	‘o pehē, ‘Oua ‘e ala ki ai, ‘uma‘ā ha kamata, ‘io, pe momo‘i lave ki ai–
51002022	‘osi, ko e ngaahi me‘a ia kotoa pē ‘oku nofo ke ‘auha ‘i hono kai–
51002023	‘a ia ko e fa‘ahinga tu‘utu‘uni ‘oku matamata poto mo‘oni ko e ‘i ai ha fakalahi ‘o ‘ete lotu, mo ha fu‘u fakavaivai, mo e ta‘ema‘ema‘ekina hoto sino; ka ‘oku ‘ikai ko e ‘i ai ha‘ane momo‘i ‘aonga ke ta‘ofi ‘a e fai ke topono ‘a e kakano.
51003001	PEA kapau leva na‘e kaungā fokotu‘u kimoutolu mo Kalaisi, pea mou ngāue ki he ngaahi me‘a ‘o ‘olunga, ‘a e potu ‘oku ‘i ai ‘a Kalaisi, he‘ene ‘Afio mei he to‘omata‘u ‘o e ‘Otua.
51003002	Ke hu‘u ho‘omou tokanga ki he ngaahi me‘a ‘o ‘olunga, ‘o ‘ikai ki he ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ‘i māmani;
51003003	he kuo mou pekia, pea ko ho‘omou mo‘ui ‘oku fufū fakataha mo Kalaisi ‘i he ‘Otua.
51003004	Pea ka ‘iloange ‘e fakahā mai ‘a Kalaisi, ‘a ia ko ‘etau mo‘ui, pea ‘e toki fakahā ‘a kimoutolu foki fakataha mo ia ‘i he lāngilangi‘ia.
51003005	Ko ia, mou ‘ai ke mate leva homou ngaahi kupu ‘oku ‘i māmani, ko e fe‘auaki, anga‘uli, havala, holi pango; kae‘uma‘ā ‘a e mānumanu, ‘a ia ko e tauhi ‘aitoli tofu pē ia:
51003006	he ko e ngaahi me‘a ko ia ‘oku hoko mei ai ‘a e houhau ‘a e ‘Otua.
51003007	Ko e ngaahi me‘a ko ia na‘e fou ai ‘a kimoutolu ‘i mu‘a, lolotonga na‘a mou kei mo‘ui ki he ngaahi me‘a ko ia.
51003008	Ka ‘i he taimi ni ke mou tuku ‘e kimoutolu foki ‘a e me‘a pehē kotoa pē, ‘a e ‘ita, ‘a e lili, ‘a e lotokovi; ta‘ofi homou ngutu mei he lau‘ikovi mo e kape.
51003009	‘Oua ‘e loi ‘i ho‘omou feangai, he kuo mou hu‘ihu‘i ‘a e motu‘a tangata, mo ‘ene ngaahi falengā ngāue;
51003010	pea kuo mo ‘ai ‘a e tangata fo‘ou, ‘a ia ‘oku fai ai pē hono fakafo‘ou ‘i he ‘īmisi ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio na‘a ne ngaohi ia, ke ne hokosi ‘a e ‘ilo kānokano:
51003011	pea ko e tu‘u ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai ai ke Kalisi mo Siu, ke kamu mo ta‘ekamu, ke pāpeliane, Sitia, pōpula, tau‘atāina: ka kuo hoko ia kotoa ko Kalaisi pē, pea ko Kalaisi ‘oku ‘i ai takitaha.
51003012	Ko ia, ke mou fai ‘o taau mo e kau fili ‘e he ‘Otua, ‘a ia ‘oku tapu mo ‘ofeina ‘o mou ‘ai; ‘a e fatu ‘oku langa ‘i he fai meesi mo e anga‘ofa mo e faka‘aki‘akimui mo e anga kātaki mo e anga mokomoko;
51003013	pea ka ai ha taha ‘oku ne kovi‘ia ‘i ha taha ‘i ha me‘a, ke mou fekātaki‘aki pē mo fefakamolemole‘aki; ‘io, ‘o hangē foki ne fakamolemole kimoutolu ‘e he ‘Eiki, ke pehē pē mo kimoutolu.
51003014	Pea mou kofu tu‘a ‘aki ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia kātoa ‘a e ‘ofa, ‘a ia ko e fakama‘u ‘o e haohaoa.
51003015	Pea tuku ‘a e fakamelino ‘a Kalaisi ke fakamaau ‘i homou loto, ‘a ia foki na‘e fakaului kimoutolu ke lava ‘i ho‘omou sino taha: kae‘uma‘ā ke mou hoko ko e kau fai fakafeta‘i.
51003016	Ke mātu‘aki nofo‘ia kimoutolu ‘e he folofola ‘a Kalaisi, ‘o tu‘u ‘i he fa‘ahinga poto kotoa pē: ‘o mou fefai‘aki homou akonekina mo e valoki ‘aki ‘a e ngaahi Saame, mo e ngaahi himi, mo e ngaahi hiva fakalaumālie, ‘o fai fakakelesi pē, mo mou hiva ‘i homou loto ki he ‘Eiki.
51003017	Pea neongo pe ko e hā ha me‘a te mou fai, ha lea, pe ha ngaue, mou fai kotoa pē ‘i he huafa ‘o e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū, mo mou fakafeta‘i ‘iate ia ki he ‘Otua ko e Tamai.
51003018	‘a e kau fefine, mou anganofo ki homou ngaahi husepāniti, ‘a ia na‘e taau leva ke mou fai he ko e kakai lotu.
51003019	‘a e kau tangata, mou ‘ofa ki homou ngaahi uaifi, ‘o ‘oua ‘e kona homou loto kiate kinautolu.
51003020	‘a e fānau, mou talangofua ki ho‘omou mātu‘a ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē, he ko e me‘a faka‘ofo‘ofa ia ‘i he lotu.
51003021	‘a e ngaahi tamai, ‘oua te mou fakahoha‘asi ho‘omou fānau, na‘a faifai pea nau loto kina.
51003022	‘a e kau tamaio‘eiki, mou talangofua ki ho‘omou ngaahi ‘eiki fakasino ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē; ‘o ‘ikai ‘i he fai fakamamata, ‘o hangē ko ha kakai kimoutolu ‘oku fai ke mālie‘ia ‘a e tangata pē, ka mou fai lototō pē, telia ‘a e ‘Eiki.
51003023	‘Ilonga ha me‘a te mou fai, ngāue fie ngāue ki ai, he ko e ngāue ki he ‘Eiki, ‘o ‘ikai ki he kakai:
51003024	‘o mou ‘ilo, ko e ‘Eiki ia te mou ma‘u mei ai ‘a e totongi totonu, ko e ma‘u tofi‘a. Ko e ‘Eiki, ko Kalaisi ia ‘oku mou nofo tamaio‘eiki ki ai.
51003025	Seuke, ‘ilonga ‘a ia te ne ngāue ta‘etotonu te ne ma‘u ‘a e totongi ‘o ‘ene ngāue ta‘etotonu na‘e fai: pea tala‘ehai ‘oku ‘i ai ha filifilimānako.
51003026	‘a e ngaahi ‘eiki, mou fai ho‘omou ngāue foki, ‘o ‘atu ki ho‘omou kau tamaio‘eiki ‘a e me‘a ‘oku totonu mo taau, ko ho‘omou ‘ilo ‘oku ‘i ai hamou ‘Eiki foki ‘i Langi.
51004001	Mou faka‘utumauku ho‘omou hū; pea mou ‘ā ‘i hono fai, pea fai mo e fakafeta‘i.
51004002	Pea ‘oua na‘a ngalo ke hūfia kimautolu foki, koe‘uhi ke fakaava mai ‘e he ‘Otua ha matapā mo‘o e folofola,
51004003	ke mau tala ‘a e misiteli ‘o Kalaisi, ‘a ia ‘oku ou nofo ha‘isia ai foki:
51004004	‘io, koe‘uhi ke u lea fakahā ‘aki ‘a e me‘a ko ia, ‘a ia ‘oku taau mo kita ke fai.
51004005	Ke fakapotopoto ho‘omou fakafeangai ki he kakai ‘o tua‘ā, ‘o lamalama ke ngāue‘aki ‘a e faingamālie.
51004006	Ke kelesi‘ia ai pē ho‘omou lea ki ai, mo fakaifo ‘aki ha māsima, ‘o mou ‘ilo ‘a e anga ‘o e tali ‘oku totonu ke fai kiate kinautolu takitaha.
51004007	Ko e me‘a ki he‘ete ngaahi me‘a, ‘e fakahā atu ‘e Tikiko, ko si‘i kāinga ‘ofeina, mo e tokoni lototō, mo e kaungā tamaio‘eiki mo au ‘i he ngāue ‘a e ‘Eiki.
51004008	‘A ia kuo u fekau tonu atu ki he me‘a ko ia, ke mou ‘ilo ‘ema ngaahi me‘a, pea ke ne fakafiemālie homou loto.
51004009	Te na ō mo ‘Onesema foki, ko si‘i kāinga lototō mo ‘ofeina, ‘a ia foki ‘oku mei homou feitu‘u. ‘E ‘a‘au atu ‘e kinaua ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku fai ‘i heni.
51004010	‘Oku ‘ofa atu ‘a ‘Alisitako, ‘a ia ‘oku nofo pilīsone mo au, pea mo Ma‘ake, ko e tama ‘a mehikitanga ‘o Pānepasa: ‘a ia kuo mou ma‘u tu‘utu‘uni ki ai; (kapau te ne a‘u atu kiate kimoutolu, mou tali lelei ia):
51004011	kae‘uma‘ā ‘a Sīsū ‘a ia ‘oku hingoa ko Siusitasa. Ko kinautolu pē ‘o e ha‘a kamu ‘oku kau mo au ‘i he ngaue ma‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua: ko e tu‘unga me‘a ia kuo fakafiemālie kiate au.
51004012	‘Oku ‘ofa atu ‘a ‘Epafasi, ko e tamaio‘eiki ‘a Kalaisi Sīsū mei homou feitu‘u; ‘a ia ‘oku ne fai fefa‘uhi ai pē ‘i he‘ene ngaahi hū koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu, ko e kole ke mou tu‘u ma‘u ‘i he tu‘utu‘uni kotoa pē ‘a e ‘Otua, kuo mou fakamotu‘atangata mo ‘ilo‘ilo pau.
51004013	Seuke, ‘oku ou fakamo‘oni kiate ia, ‘oku lahi ‘ene feinga koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu, mo e kāinga ‘i Leotisia mo Hailapoli.
51004014	‘Oku ‘ofa atu ‘a Luke ko si‘i faito‘o, pea mo Tīmasi.
51004015	Mou tala hoku ‘ofa ki he kāinga lotu ‘i Leotisia, kae‘uma‘ā ‘a Nīmifa mo e siasi ‘i hono ‘api.
51004016	Pea ka ‘osi leva ‘a e lau ‘o e ‘ipiseli ni kiate kimoutolu, pea tuku ke lau ia ‘i he siasi ‘o e kakai Leotisia, pea ke mou lau foki ‘a e ‘ipiseli mei Leotisia.
51004017	Pea ke mou lea kia ‘Ākipo, ‘o pehē, Tokanga ki he lakanga kuo ke ma‘u ‘i he ngāue ‘a e ‘Eiki, ke ke ‘osiki ia.
51004018	Ko e fetapa ‘eni ‘oku fai‘aki ‘a e nima ‘o‘oku, Paula. Manatu‘i si‘oku ngaahi ha‘i. Ke nofo mo kimoutolu ‘a e kelesi.
52001001	TŪ ko kimautolu, ‘a Paula mo Silivenusi mo Tīmote, ko ‘emau tohi ki he siasi ko ia ‘o e kakai Tesalonaika, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘i he ‘Otua ko e Tamai, pea mo e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi. ‘Ofa ke mou ma‘u kelesi mo e fiemālie.
52001002	‘Oku mau fakafeta‘i ma‘u ai pē ki he ‘Otua koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu kotoa pē, ‘o mau takua kimoutolu ‘i he‘emau ngaahi lotu;
52001003	ko e ‘ikai motu ‘emau manatu ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e ‘Otua ko ‘etau Tamai ki he ngaue ‘o ho‘omou tui, mo e fakafitefita‘a ‘o ho‘omou ‘ofa, mo e kīkītaki ‘o ho‘omou ‘amanaki, ‘a e ‘amanaki ki hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi:
52001004	kae‘uma‘ā ko ‘emau ‘ilo, si‘i kāinga ‘ofeina ‘e he ‘Otua, ko e kakai kimoutolu kuo fili mo‘oni.
52001005	He tala‘ehai na‘e hoko atu ‘emau Kōsipeli ko e nge‘esi lea pē, ka na‘e ō mo e mālohi, pea ō mo e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni pea mo e loto ta‘etāla‘a. Seuke, ‘oku mou ‘ilo ‘a e anga na‘a mau anga‘aki ‘i homou lotolotonga, koe‘uhi ā ko kimoutolu.
52001006	Kae‘uma‘ā foki, na‘a mou hoko ko e kau fa‘ifa‘itaki kiate kimautolu pea mo e ‘Eiki; he neongo na‘e hoko ‘a e folofola mo e fu‘u mamahi, ka mou tali fiefia pē, ko e fiefia tupu ‘i he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni.
52001007	Ko ia, kuo mou hoko ai ko e fa‘ifa‘itaki‘anga kiate kinautolu kotoa pē ‘i Masitōnia mo ‘Akeia kuo lotu.
52001008	‘Io, ko kimoutolu kuo ongo mei ai ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Eiki ki Masitōnia mo ‘Akeia, ‘o ‘ikai ngata ai, ka kuo pavake ‘a ho‘omou lotu ki he potu kotoa pē, ‘o pehē ‘oku fai ki he ‘Otua. Ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai te mau kei tala ha me‘a, he koe‘uma‘ā;
52001009	he ‘oku fai ‘e he kakai homau ongoongoa–‘a e anga ‘o ‘emau hoko atu kiate kimoutolu; mo ho‘omou tafoki ki he ‘Otua; ‘o fulitu‘a ki he ngaahi tamapua, ke hoko ko e kau tamaio‘eiki ‘a e ‘Otua ‘oku mo‘ui mo mo‘oni;
52001010	pea ke nofo‘aki tali ‘a e ha‘u mei langi ‘a hono ‘Alo ne ne fokotu‘u mei he kau pekia, ‘io, ‘a Sīsū ‘a ia ‘oku ne fakahaofi kitautolu mei he houhau ‘oku tu‘unuku mai.
52002001	SEUKE, ‘oku mou lāu‘ilo, kāinga, ‘a e anga ‘o ‘emau hoko atu kiate kimoutolu; tala‘ehai ko e me‘a ma‘ama‘a.
52002002	Kaekehe, neongo kuo toki fakamamahi‘i kimautolu mo ngaohikovi‘i ‘i Filipai, ‘a ia ‘oku mou ‘ilo ki ai, ka ko e me‘a ‘i homau ‘Otua na‘a mau fai mālohi ‘emau malanga‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli ‘a e ‘Otua kiate kimoutolu, neongo na‘e lahi ‘a e faingata‘a.
52002003	He ko ‘emau fai akonaki ‘oku ‘ikai tupunga ‘i ha‘amau hē, ‘uma‘ā ha‘amau tokanga ta‘etaau, mu‘a hake hano fai fakahekeheke.
52002004	Ka ko e anga na‘a mau anga‘aki ‘i homau sivi ‘e he ‘Otua, pea lelei ai kiate ia ke tuku kiate kimautolu ‘a e Kōsipeli, ko ia ia ‘oku mau lea ai ni: ‘oku ‘ikai te mau fai ke mālie‘ia ai ‘a e kakai, ka ko e ‘Otua, ‘a ia ‘oku ne sivi homau loto.
52002005	‘Io, ‘anefē ha‘amau fai ha lea ko e fakalai? ‘oku mou ‘ilo pē; pea ‘anefē ha‘amau fai ha me‘a ‘a ia ko e kofu pē ‘o ha‘amau mānumanu? ko e ‘Otua ē ko e fakamo‘oni ki ai.
52002006	Pea ‘anefē ha‘amau tangi ke fakahīkihiki‘i ‘e he kakai, ‘e kimoutolu, pe ‘e ha kakai kehe? ka na‘e faingofua pē ‘emau fai faka‘ei‘eiki, he ko e kau ‘Aposetolo ‘a Kalaisi.
52002007	Kaekehe na‘a mau ‘i homou lotolotonga ‘o angalelei pē; hangē tofu pē ha fefine toutama ‘a ia ‘oku ne tauhi si‘ene fānau ‘a‘ana,
52002008	pehē ‘i he‘emau ‘ofa u‘uu‘u kiate kimoutolu na‘a mau faka‘amu ke ‘atu, ‘o ‘ikai ko e Kōsipeli pē ‘a e ‘Otua, ka ko si‘emau mo‘ui foki–kae fēfē, he ne mou hoko ko homau ‘ofa‘anga.
52002009	He ‘oku mou manatu, ‘e kāinga, ‘emau fakaongosia mo ‘emau fakafitefita‘a. Na‘a mau malanga‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli ‘a e ‘Otua kiate kimoutolu, ka mau ngāue ‘i he ‘aho mo e pō kiate kimautolu, ke ‘oua na‘a fakamafasia hamou toko taha.
52002010	Ko kimoutolu ‘a e fakamo‘oni, ‘io, mo e ‘Otua foki, ki he molumalu mo totonu mo ta‘emele ‘emau fakafeangai kiate kimoutolu ‘a e kau lotu.
52002011	‘Ā, ‘oku mou ‘ilo pē, hangē ko e fai ‘a ha tamai ki he‘ene fānau ‘a‘ana, na‘e pehē ‘emau enginaki kimoutolu tāutaha, mo lōtaki, mo tapou.
52002012	Ke mou laka ‘o taau mo e ‘Otua, ‘a ia ‘oku ne ui kimoutolu ke hū ki hono pule‘anga mo hono lāngilangi.
52002013	Ko ia, ko kimautolu foki ‘oku mau fai ta‘etuku ‘emau fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otua; koe‘uhi ‘i ho‘omou tali ‘a e folofola ongo telinga–‘a ia na‘e fakafofonga ‘iate kimautolu, ka ko e me‘a ‘a e ‘Otua–fakafeta‘i na‘e ‘ikai ko e lea ‘a e tangata na‘a mou ma‘u, ka ko e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua, he ko ia mātē pē, pea ko e me‘a foki ‘oku ngāngāue ‘iate kimoutolu ‘oku tui.
52002014	He vakai, na‘a mou hoko, kāinga, ko e kau fa‘ifa‘itaki ki he ngaahi siasi ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘a e ngaahi siasi ‘i Siutea ‘oku ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū; he ‘oku tatau homou tautekovia ‘e homou kakai pea mo kinautolu ‘e he kakai Siu.
52002015	‘a e fa‘ahinga na‘a nau fakapoongi ‘a Sīsū ko e ‘Eiki, mo e kau palōfita, pea fakafe‘ātungia kimautolu: pea ‘oku ‘ikai te nau fai ha anga ‘oku mālie ki he ‘Otua; pea ko e fakafili ki he kakai kotoa pē, he‘enau ta‘ofi ‘emau malanga ki he Senitaile ke nau mo‘ui.
52002016	‘Ā, ko e fai ai pē ke fakakakato ‘enau ngaahi hia; ka kuo tō kiate kinautolu ‘a e houhau ‘o li‘oa mai.
52002017	Pea ko kimautolu, kāinga, ‘i homau vaetu‘ua meiate kimoutolu; (ko ‘etau femātaaki pē na‘e vaetu‘ua, kae ma‘u pē ‘a e loto) kuo te‘eki ke meimei houa, pea makehe atu ‘emau feinga ke tau toe femātaaki ko e holi ka ko ha holi.
52002018	Ko ia, na‘a mau tokanga ke ‘alu atu, ‘io, ‘e au Paula; ‘o ‘ikai tu‘o taha pē, kae tu‘o ua: ka na‘e felei homau hala ‘e Sētane.
52002019	He kofa‘ā ia homau ‘amanaki‘anga, mo e fiefia‘anga mo e pale te mau pōlepole ai ‘i he ‘ao ‘o hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū, ‘oka hā mai? ‘Ikai ko kimoutolu foki?
52002020	‘Io, ko kimoutolu ko homau fakalāngilangi, mo homau fakafiefia.
52003001	KO IA, ‘i he ‘ikai te ma kei fakama‘uma‘u, na‘a ma pehē, ‘e lelei mu‘a ke tuku au toko taha ‘i ‘Ātenisi;
52003002	ka u fekau atu ‘a Tīmote ko si‘i tokoua ‘omaua, pea ko e kau ngāue mo e ‘Otua ‘i he Kōsipeli ‘o Kalaisi; koe‘uhi ke ne poupou kimoutolu, pea ke ne enginaki telia ho‘omou lotu:
52003003	ke ‘oua na‘a ue‘i ha toko taha ‘i he ngaahi mamahi ko ia. Seuke, ‘oku mou lāu‘ilo ko e me‘a ia ‘oku tau nofo ki ai.
52003004	He na‘a mo e taimi ko ia na‘a mau ‘iate kimoutolu ai, na‘a mau sinaki tala atu, ko hotau nafa ke fakamamahia–‘a ē ā kuo hoko foki, pea kuo e‘a ni ia kiate kimoutolu.
52003005	Ko hono ‘uhinga ia na‘e ‘ikai te u kei mafakama‘uma‘u ai ‘e au foki, ka u fekau atu ke u ‘ilo ki ho‘omou lotu, na‘a ‘iloange kuo fai homou ‘ahi‘ahi‘i ‘e he Toko Taha-Fakatauvele, pea hoko ‘emau ngangau ko e kulanoa.
52003006	Ka kuo toki lava mai ‘a Tīmote meiate kimoutolu, pea kuo ne talanoalelei‘ia mai ho‘omou tui mo ho‘omou ‘ofa; kae ‘uma‘ā ho‘omou manatu ‘ofa mai ma‘u ai pē; mo ho‘omou holi ke sio kiate kimautolu, ‘o hangē tofu pē ko ‘emau holi ke mamata atu.
52003007	Pea ‘i he‘emau fanongo ki he me‘a ko ia, kāinga, neongo e fu‘u faingata‘a mo e mamahi na‘a mau ‘i ai, ka na‘a mau ma‘u fiemālie ‘iate kimoutolu koe‘uhi ko ho‘omou tui.
52003008	Seuke, kuo mau mo‘ui leva ‘o kapau ‘oku mou tu‘u ma‘u ‘i he ‘Eiki.
52003009	‘Io, ko e hā ha fakafeta‘i te mau fa‘a ‘atu ki he ‘Eiki koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu, ke hoa mo e fu‘u fiefia ‘oku mau fiefia ‘aki ‘i he ‘ao ‘o homau ‘Otua, koe‘uhi ā ko kimoutolu.
52003010	Pea ‘oku makehe ange fau ‘emau lotu ‘i he pō mo e ‘aho ke tau femātaaki, pea ke mau fakakakato ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku mou kei tōmui ai ‘i he lotu.
52003011	Pea tauange mo e ‘Afio ‘a e ‘Otua ko ‘etau Tamai, mo hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū, ke ne faka‘atā homau hala kiate kimoutolu!
52003012	Pea ‘ofa ke ngaohi kimoutolu ‘e he ‘Eiki ke lahi mo hulu atu ho‘omou fe‘ofa‘aki, mo ho‘omou ‘ofa ki he kakai kehe, ‘o hangē ko e ‘ofa ‘amautolu kiate kimoutolu!
52003013	Koe‘uhi ke ne fakatu‘uma‘u homou loto, ke ta‘emele hono mā‘oni‘oni ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e ‘Otua ko ‘etau Tamai, ‘oka hoko mai hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū ‘oku ha‘ofia ia ‘e he‘ene kau mā‘oni‘oni kotoa pē.
52004001	PEA ko e me‘a ‘e taha, kāinga, ‘oku mau kole kiate kimoutolu, mo enginaki ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū, ko e ‘alunga na‘a mou ma‘u meiate kimautolu ‘oku totonu ke fai ai ho‘omou laka ke hōifua ai ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘io, ko e ‘alunga ‘oku mou lolotonga laka ai ni, ke fakautuutu ho‘omou hulu atu ‘i he me‘a ko ia.
52004002	He ‘oku mou ‘ilo ‘a e anga ‘o e ngaahi fekau na‘a mau ‘atu kiate kimoutolu mei he ‘Eiki ko Sīsū.
52004003	He ko eni ‘a e finangalo ‘o e ‘Otua ko homou fakamā‘oni‘oni‘i. ‘O pehē, ke mou faka‘ehi‘ehi mei he fe‘auaki.
52004004	Ke mou ‘ilo takitaha ke ma‘u hono hama (uaifi) ‘o‘ona ‘i he fai mā‘oni‘oni mo e fakaalaala:
52004005	‘o ‘oua ‘e fai havala ‘o hangē ko e Senitaile ta‘e‘ilo ‘Otua.
52004006	Ke ‘oua na‘a ai hamou toko taha te ne hala loto‘api ki hono kāinga, ‘o fai kākā ‘i he me‘a ni; koe‘uhi ko e ‘Eiki ia ‘oku ‘a‘ana ‘a e ‘eke ki he alā me‘a pehē kotoa pē, ‘o hangē foki na‘a mau lea ai mu‘a kiate kimoutolu, mo fakamamafa ki ai.
52004007	He tala‘ehai na‘e ui kitaua ‘e he ‘Otua ki he ta‘etaau, ka ke fai mā‘oni‘oni.
52004008	Ko ia foki, ‘ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku ne anga ta‘etoka‘i, ‘oku ‘ikai ko e tangata ‘oku ne ta‘etoka‘i, ka ko e ‘Otua; ‘a ia kuo ne foaki foki ma‘amautolu hono Laumālie ‘o‘ona ‘io, ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni.
52004009	Pea ko e me‘a ki he ‘ofa ki he kāinga lotu, koe‘uma‘ā ‘emau tohi atu ai kiate kimoutolu, he ko e ha‘a akonekina ‘e he ‘Otua kimoutolu ke fe‘ofa‘aki.
52004010	‘Io, ‘oku mou fai ia foki ki he kāinga kotoa pē ‘oku ‘i Masitōnia kātoa.
52004011	Ka ‘oku mau enginaki atu, kāinga, ke fakautuutu ho‘omou hulu atu ‘i he me‘a ko ia, pea ke mou kakapa ke mou mo‘ui haunoa, pea ke takitaha fai hono lakanga, pea ke mou ngāue‘aki homou nima; ‘o hangē ko ‘emau tu‘utu‘uni kiate kimoutolu.
52004012	Koe‘uhi ke taau ho‘omou fakafeangai ki he kakai ‘o tua‘ā, pea ke ‘oua te mou mo‘ui falala ki ha taha.
52004013	‘Oku ‘ikai te mau loto foki ke mou mūnoa, kāinga, ‘i he me‘a ki he kakai kuo mohe; ke ‘oua te mou mamahi ‘o hangē ko e kakai kehe, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘anau ‘amanaki.
52004014	He kapau leva ‘oku tau tui ne pekia ‘a Sīsū, pea toetu‘u, pehē foki ko e kakai na‘e fakamohe ko e me‘a ‘ia Sīsū, ‘e ‘omi kinautolu ‘e he ‘Otua fakataha mo ia.
52004015	He ko e me‘a ni ‘oku mau tala atu ko e folofola tonu ‘a e ‘Eiki, neongo kitaua ‘e tolonga ‘o a‘usia ‘a e hoko mai ‘a e ‘Eiki, molekemama‘o ha‘ata mu‘omu‘a ‘iate kinautolu kuo mohe.
52004016	Koe‘uhi ‘e hā‘ele mei he langi ‘a e ‘Eiki ‘e ia, pea ai ha vakavakaō, ‘a e angi ‘a ha ‘āngelo pule, mo e ifi ‘a e talupite ‘a e ‘Otua; pea ko e pekia ‘ia Kalaisi ‘e tomu‘a tu‘u:
52004017	hili ia, ko kitaua kuo ta tolonga ‘o a‘usia, ‘e punakaki kitaua fakataha mo kinautolu ‘i he ngaahi ‘ao ki he ‘atā, ke fakafetaulaki ki he ‘Eiki, pea hili ia te ta ‘i he ‘Eiki ma‘u ai pē.
52004018	Ko ia ke mou fetokoni‘aki kimoutolu ‘aki ‘a e ngaahi lea ko eni.
52005001	PEA ko e me‘a ki he ngaahi taimi mo e ngaahi kuonga, kāinga, koe‘uma‘ā ha‘amau tohi atu.
52005002	He ‘oku mou ‘ilo kānokano, ko e hoko mai ‘a e ‘aho ‘o e ‘Eiki ‘oku hangē ko e ha‘u ‘a e kaiha‘a ‘i he pō.
52005003	Tokaange ha taimi ‘oku nau pehē, ‘Oku tau lelei mo tu‘umālie, fakafokifā ‘oku tu‘u mai ‘a mala, ‘o hangē ko e langā ki he fefine feitama: pea ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito te nau hao.
52005004	Ka tala‘ehai ‘oku mou ‘i he po‘uli, kāinga, ke mo‘utāmakia kimoutolu ‘e he ‘aho ko ia, ‘o hangē ha kaiha‘a.
52005005	He ko e fānau kimoutolu kotoa pē ‘a e maama, mo e fānau ‘a e ‘aho; ‘oku ‘ikai ‘a e pō kitaua, ‘uma‘ā ‘a e po‘uli.
52005006	‘Āua; pea ke ‘oua te ta mohe ‘o hangē ko e kakai kehe, ka ta ‘ā pē ‘o faka‘ehi‘ehi mei he konā.
52005007	He ko kinautolu ‘oku mohe ‘oku mohe ‘i he pō; pea ko kinautolu ‘oku konā ‘oku konā ‘i he pō.
52005008	Ka ko kitaua ko e kakai ‘o e ‘aho; ko ia, ta faka‘ehi‘ehi mu‘a mei he konā. Kae‘uma‘ā kuo ta ‘ai ‘a e kofu tau ko e tui mo e ‘ofa, pea mo e ‘amanaki mo‘ui mo‘ota tatā tau.
52005009	He na‘e ‘ikai ke tu‘utu‘uni kitaua ‘e he ‘Otua ke houhau‘ia, ka ke lava‘i mai ‘a e fakamo‘ui ‘i hota ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi;
52005010	‘a ia na‘a ne pekia koe‘uhi ko kitaua, koe‘uhi, pe ‘oku ta ‘ā, pe ‘oku ta mohe, kehe ke ta fakataha ‘i he mo‘ui feangai mo ia.
52005011	Ko ia, ke mou fetokoni‘aki kimoutolu, pea fefai‘aki homou langa hake, hangē ā foki ‘oku mou fai.
52005012	Pea ko eni ‘oku mau kole kiate kimoutolu, kāinga, ke mou ‘ilo ‘a kinautolu ‘oku fakafitefita‘a ‘iate kimoutolu, pea ‘oku ‘anautolu homou pule‘i ‘i he ‘Eiki, mo homou tākitala‘i.
52005013	Pea ke mou tokanga ‘ofa ‘aupito ‘aupito kiate kinautolu, koe‘uhi ko si‘enau ngāue. Mou fekoekoe‘i.
52005014	Pea ko eni, kāinga, ‘oku mau enginaki atu ke mou tākitala‘i ‘a e kau maumau tu‘utu‘uni; lōtaki ‘a e lotosi‘i; poupou ‘a e vaivai; ke mou anga mokomoko ki he kakai kotoa pē.
52005015	Vakai ke ‘oua na‘a ai ha taha ‘e totongi ‘a e kovi ‘a ha taha ‘aki ha kovi; kaekehe ke mou tuli ai pē ki he me‘a ‘oku lelei ma‘a e taha, pea ma‘a e kakai kotoa pē.
52005016	Fiefia ma‘u ai pē.
52005017	Lotu ta‘etuku.
52005018	Fakafeta‘i ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē, he ko e tu‘utu‘uni ia ‘a e ‘Otua ma‘amoutolu ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū.
52005019	‘Oua ‘e fu‘ifu‘i ‘a e Laumālie:
52005020	‘oua ‘e ta‘etoka‘i ‘a e ngaahi malanga palofisai;
52005021	ka mou sivi kotoa pē: ‘ilonga pē ‘a e lelei, puke ma‘u ia;
52005022	‘ilonga ha me‘a ‘oku fa‘ahinga mo e kovi, faka‘ehi‘ehi mei ai.
52005023	Pea ko e ‘Afio ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘a‘ana ‘a e nonga, ‘ofa ke ne fakamā‘oni‘oni‘i faka‘āufuli ‘a kimoutolu! ‘Io, ‘i he hoko mai ‘a hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, ‘ofa kuo haofaki homou laumālie, mo e loto, mo e sino, ‘o kakato mo ta‘emele!
52005024	Ko ia ‘oku ne ui kimoutolu ki ai, ko e Toko Taha ia ‘oku fai ki he‘ene lea, pea te ne fai foki ‘a e me‘a ni.
52005025	Kāinga, mou hūfia kimautolu.
52005026	Mou fekita ki he kāinga kotoa pē ‘aki ha ‘uma tapu.
52005027	Ko e ‘Eiki ē ‘oku ou fekau atu ai kiate kimoutolu, ke mou lau ‘a e ‘ipiseli ni ki he kāinga kotoa pē.
52005028	Ko e kelesi ‘a hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, ‘ofa ke ‘iate kimoutolu ia!
53001001	TŪ ko kimautolu, ‘a Paula mo Silivenusi mo Tīmote, ko ‘emau tohi ki he siasi ko ia ‘o e kakai Tesalonaika, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘i he ‘Otua ko ‘etau Tamai pea mo e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi.
53001002	‘Ofa ke mou ma‘u kelesi mo e fiemālie mei he ‘Otua ko ‘etau Tamai, mo e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi.
53001003	Kāinga, ‘oku hā mai ko ‘emau ngāue ke fai, ko e fakafeta‘i ma‘u ai pē ki he ‘Otua koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu; ‘io, ko hono taau ia, koe‘uhi ko e fu‘u tupulekina ‘o ho‘omou tui, pea mo e fakalahi ‘o ho‘omou ‘ofa, ko e ‘ofa ‘a e taha ki he taha.
53001004	Ko ia, na‘a mo kimautolu ‘oku mau pōlepole ‘iate kimoutolu ‘i he ngaahi siasi ‘o e ‘Otua, koe‘uhi ko ho‘omou kātaki mo ho‘omou tui; neongo e ngaahi fu‘u fakatanga ‘omoutolu, mo e ngaahi mamahi ‘oku mou lolotonga fetakai.
53001005	‘A ia ko e fakamo‘oni ‘oku ‘i ai ha fakamaau totonu ‘a e ‘Otua, ke faifai pea fakahā ai ho‘omou taau mo e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua, ‘a ia foki ko e me‘a ‘oku tautekovia ai kimoutolu.
53001006	‘O kapau leva ‘oku me‘a ‘a e ‘Otua ‘oku totonu ke tongi mamahi kiate kinautolu ‘oku fakamamahi‘i kimoutolu:
53001007	pea ke totongi kiate kimoutolu kuo fakamamahi‘i ‘aki ha mālōlō, ‘a ia te mou ma‘u fakataha mo kimautolu, ‘oka fakapū mai ‘a e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū mei he langi ‘i ha uloafi, pea ha‘ofia ‘e hono lahi ko e kau ‘āngelo,
53001008	he‘ene fai sauni ki he kau ta‘e‘ilo ‘Otua, pea ki he kau ta‘etalangofua ki he Kōsipeli ‘o hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū;
53001009	ko e fa‘ahinga ia te nau kai hono nunu‘a ko e faka‘auha ta‘engata, ‘o mama‘o mo e fofonga ‘o e ‘Eiki, pea mama‘o mei he lāngilangi ‘o ‘ene māfimafi;
53001010	‘i he ‘aho ko ia te ne hoko mai ke hā hono lāngilangi he‘ene ho‘ata ‘i hono kau mā‘oni‘oni, pea hā hono fakaofo he‘ene ho‘ata ‘i he kakai na‘e tui; (‘o hangē pē ko ho‘omou tui ki he fakamatala na‘a mau fai atu).
53001011	Pea koe‘uhi ke lava ‘a e me‘a ko ia, ko ia ‘oku mau hūfia foki kimoutolu ma‘u ai pē; koe‘uhi ke me‘a mo finangalo ‘e homau ‘Otua ‘oku mou taau mo e lakanga ne ui kimoutolu ki ai: pea ke ‘ilonga ha fakakaukau ‘o ho‘omou fie faitotonu, pea ke ‘ilonga ha feinga ‘o ho‘omou tui, ke ne fakaai ia ke tu‘u kaukaua;
53001012	kae faifai pea hā ‘a e lāngilangi ‘o e huafa ‘o hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū, he‘ene ho‘ata ‘iate kimoutolu; pea ke hā homou lāngilangi he‘ene ho‘ata ‘iate ia: ‘o fakatatau ki he kelesi ‘a hotau ‘Otua, mo e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi.
53002001	PEA ko e me‘a ki he hoko mai ‘a hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, mo hotau fakatahataha kiate ia, ‘oku mau kole atu, kāinga,
53002002	ke ‘oua na‘a ue‘ingofua kimoutolu mei homou ‘alunga; kae‘uma‘ā ke ‘oua te mou puputu‘u ‘i ha palofisai, pe ‘i ha lea pe tohi, neongo te nau lau ‘oku meiate kimautolu ia; ‘o pehē kuo hokosia ‘a e ‘aho ‘o e ‘Eiki.
53002003	Ke ‘oua na‘a fakahekea kimoutolu ‘e ha toko taha ‘i ha anga ‘e taha; he ‘oku ‘oua pē ia ke motu‘a hoko ‘a e fu‘u fakaholomui, pea mo e fakapū mai ‘a e tangata ko Malakilao, ko e Fanautama ‘a Mala, ko Fakafili;
53002004	‘a ia ‘ilonga ha ‘Otua ‘oku lau ko e ‘Otua, pe ha me‘a ‘oku fai ki ai ‘a e lotu, pea ‘oku ne fakafekāke‘i hake ki ai; ‘io, ‘oku ne mātu‘aki hū ki he Potu Tapu ‘o e ‘Otua, ‘o ne nofo ai, ‘o ne fakahāhā ia ko e ‘Otua.
53002005	‘Oku ‘ikai te mou manatu koā, na‘a ku tala ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia ‘i he‘eku ‘iate kimoutolu mu‘a?
53002006	Pea ko eni ‘oku mou ‘ilo ‘a e me‘a ‘oku pukepuke hono fakapū, kae‘oua ke hoko hono kuonga totonu.
53002007	He na‘a mo eni ‘oku ngāngāue hono misiteli ‘o e Malakilao; ka ko e ‘oua pē ke hiki ‘a e toko taha ‘oku pukepuke, pea ‘e toki fakapū mai ‘a Malakilao:
53002008	‘a ia ‘e tāmate‘i ‘e he ‘Eiki ko Sīsū ‘aki ‘a e mānava ‘o hono fofonga, pea faka‘auha ‘aki ‘a e fotuaki ‘o ‘ene hoko mai.
53002009	Ka ko e hoko mai ‘a e toko taha ko ia ‘e fakatatau ki he fa‘a ngāue ‘a Sētane, he‘ene fai‘aki ‘a e ngaahi fa‘ahinga mana kehekehe, mo e me‘a faka‘ilonga mo e me‘a fakaofo, ka ko e koto loi pē;
53002010	mo e fai‘aki ‘a e fa‘ahinga fakahekeheke kotoa pē ki he kakai, ka ko e koto kākā: ‘io, ‘o fai ki he kakai ‘oku fakatau ki mala, ko e totongi ‘o e ‘ikai te nau tali ‘a e ‘ofa ki he mo‘oni ka nau mo‘ui ai.
53002011	Pea ko hono ō ia ‘o e fekau atu kiate kinautolu ‘e he ‘Otua ha feinga fakahē, koe‘uhi ke nau tui ki he loi:
53002012	kae faifai pea fakamaau ‘a kinautolu kotoa pē ‘oku ‘ikai tui ki he mo‘oni, ka ‘oku nau mālie‘ia ‘i he me‘a ‘oku hala.
53002013	Ka ko kimautolu, ko ‘emau ngāue ke fai, ko e fakafeta‘i ma‘u ai pē ki he ‘Otua koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu, si‘i kāinga ‘ofeina ‘e he ‘Eiki, koe‘uhi ko e fili kimoutolu ‘e he ‘Otua mei he kamata‘anga, ke mou ma‘u ‘a e fakamo‘ui, ‘i he fakamā‘oni‘oni‘i kimoutolu ‘e he Laumālie, pea ‘i ho‘omou tui ki he mo‘oni:
53002014	‘a ia na‘e ui kimoutolu ki ai ‘e he‘emau Kōsipeli, ke mou lava‘i ‘a e lāngilangi ‘o hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi.
53002015	‘Āua; ko ia, kāinga, ke mou tu‘u pē, pea puke ‘a e ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni na‘a mou ako ai ‘i he‘emau ngaahi lea mo e tohi.
53002016	Pea ko e ‘Afio ‘a hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, mo e ‘Otua ko ‘etau Tamai, ‘a ia ne ne ‘ofa‘i kitautolu, mo ne tuku mai ha tokoni ta‘engata mo ha ‘amanaki lelei ‘i he fai fakakelesi–
53002017	‘ofa ke ne tokoni‘i ho‘omoutolu loto, pea ‘ilonga ha‘amou ngāue lelei, pe lea, ‘ofa ke ne poupou ai kimoutolu!
53003001	KO hono faka‘osi ‘eni. Kāinga, mou hūfia kimautolu, koe‘uhi ā ke lele atu ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Eiki, pea fakahīkihiki‘i, ‘o hangē hono fai ‘iate kimoutolu foki.
53003002	Pea koe‘uhi ā ke fakahaofi kimautolu mei he kakai angakehe mo pau‘u: he tala‘ehai ‘oku lotu kotoa pē.
53003003	Ka ko e ‘Eiki ko e toko taha ia ‘oku fai ki he‘ene lea, pea te ne poupou kimoutolu, ‘o le‘ohi mei he Fili.
53003004	‘Io, ‘oku mau falala ‘i he ‘Eiki ‘oku mou fai, pea te mou fai, ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku mau fekau atu.
53003005	Pea ‘ofa ke taki tonu ‘e he ‘Eiki homou loto ki he ‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua, mo e kātaki ‘a Kalaisi.
53003006	Pea ko eni, kāinga, ‘oku mau fekau atu ‘i he huafa ‘o e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, ke ‘ilonga ha kāinga ‘e laka hala, ‘o makehe mo e tu‘utu‘uni na‘a nau ma‘u meiate kimautolu, pea mou fake‘ehi‘ehi mei ai.
53003007	He ‘oku mou lāu‘ilo ‘a e me‘a ‘oku totonu ke mou fai ‘i ho‘omou fa‘ifa‘itaki kiate kimautolu. He tala‘ehai na‘a mau laka hala ‘i he‘emau ‘iate kimoutolu;
53003008	‘uma‘ā ha‘amau kai mā mofisi pē, kaekehe na‘a mau kai ‘i he ongosia mo e fitefita‘a, he na‘a mau ngāue ‘i he ‘aho mo e pō ke ‘oua na‘a mafasia hamou toko taha.
53003009	‘Oku ‘ikai ko ‘eku pehē na‘e tapu, ka koe‘uhi ke mau hoko ko e taipe kiate kimoutolu ke mou fa‘ifa‘itaki mai.
53003010	Kae ‘uma‘ā, lolotonga ‘emau ‘iate kimoutolu, ko eni ‘a e fekau na‘a mau tuku atu, Ka ‘ikai fie ngāue ha taha, pea ‘oua foki na‘a ne kai.
53003011	He ko eni kuo mau fanongo ‘oku ‘i ai hamou ni‘ihi ‘oku laka hala, ‘o ‘ikai te nau momo‘i ngāue ma‘anautolu, ka nau makaka noa.
53003012	Ka ‘oku mau fekau mo enginaki ‘i he ‘eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi ki he alā kakai pehē, ke nau ngāue haunoa ke kai si‘anau mā totonu.
53003013	Pea ko e me‘a kiate kimoutolu, kāinga, ‘oua te mou fiu ‘i he fai lelei.
53003014	Pea ka ai ha taha ‘oku ‘ikai ke talangofua ki he‘emau lea ‘i he ‘ipiseli ni, ‘ai ke ‘ilonga ‘a e tangata ko ia, pea fakakehekehe mo ia mōno fakamaa‘i.
53003015	Kae ‘oua ‘e lau ia ko e fili, kae tākitala‘i ia hangē ko e tokoua.
53003016	Pea ko e ‘Afio ‘a e ‘Eiki, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘a‘ana ‘a e nonga, ‘ofa ke ne ‘atu ‘a e nonga ‘i he taimi kotoa pē mo e me‘a kotoa pē! ‘Ofa ke ‘iate kimoutolu kotoa pē ‘a e ‘Eiki!
53003017	Ko e fetapa ‘eni ‘oku fai‘aki ‘a e nima ‘o‘oku Paula; ‘a ia ko e faka‘ilonga ‘i he‘eku ‘Ipiseli kotoa pē: ko e anga ‘eni ‘o ‘eku mata‘itohi.
53003018	Ko e kelesi ‘a hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, ‘ofa ke ‘iate kimoutolu kotoa pē ia.
54001001	TŪ KO AU PAULA, ko e ‘aposetolo ‘a Sīsū Kalaisi ‘i he fekau ‘a e ‘Otua ko hotau Fakamo‘ui, mo Sīsū Kalaisi ko hotau ‘Amanaki‘anga.
54001002	Ko ‘eku tohi kia Tīmote ko hoku foha mo‘oni ‘i he lotu. ‘Ofa ke ke ma‘u kelesi mo e meesi mo e fiemālie, mei he ‘Otua ko e Tamai, mo Kalaisi Sīsū ko hotau ‘Eiki.
54001003	Hangē ko ‘eku kole koe ‘i he‘eku ‘alu ki Masitōnia, ke ke nofo hifo ‘i ‘Efesō, koe‘uhi ke ke fekau ha ni‘ihi ke tuku ‘enau ako‘aki ‘a e me‘a kehe;
54001004	kae‘uma‘ā ‘enau nofo ki he ngaahi talatupu‘a, mo e lau hokohoko ta‘e-hano-iku‘anga–‘a ia ko e fa‘ahinga me‘a ‘oku ngali tupu mei ai ha me‘a ke fakakikihi ki ai, ‘o ‘ikai ko e tokāteline faka‘otua ‘a ia ‘oku ‘o tui–
54001005	Ka ko e me‘a ‘oku sio ki ai ‘a e fekau, ke ai ha ‘ofa tu‘u ‘i he loto ma‘a, mo e konisēnisi ‘ata‘atā, mo e tui ta‘eloi;
54001006	‘a ia kuo le‘eia mei ai ha ni‘ihi, ‘o nau afe ki he laufanō:
54001007	lolotonga ‘oku nau lau ko e kau faiako ‘i he Lao kinautolu, ka tā ‘oku ‘ikai ‘uhinga kiate kinautolu ‘a e ngaahi lea ‘oku nau fai, pe ko e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku nau fu‘u fakapapau ki ai.
54001008	Pea ko eni ‘oku tau ‘ilo ‘oku lelei pē ‘a e Lao ‘o kapau ‘e fakalao pē ‘ete ngāue‘aki,
54001009	‘o te ‘ilo ‘eni, ‘oku ‘ikai ke fokotu‘u ‘a e Lao ma‘ana ‘oku mā‘oni‘oni; ka ma‘a e kau malaki lao mo e angatu‘u, ma‘a e kau faka‘otuamate mo e angahala, ma‘a e kau ta‘eanga molumalu mo e maumau tapu, ma‘a e kau tā tamai mo e tā fa‘ē,
54001010	ma‘a e kau fakapō, ‘a e kau fe‘auaki, ‘a e kau fai fakasōtoma, ‘a e kau kaiha‘a tangata, ‘a e kau loi, ‘a e kau maumau fuakava; pea mo e me‘a kehekehe neongo pe ko e hā, ‘a ia ‘oku fehālaaki mo e tokāteline haohaoa.
54001011	Ko e ‘alunga ē ‘o e Kōsipeli ‘o e lāngilangi ‘o e ‘Otua Mohu Monū‘ia; ‘a e Kōsipeli ko ia ne tu‘anaki au ‘o tuku ki ai.
54001012	‘Oku ou fakafeta‘i kiate ia na‘a ne fakamafeia au, ‘io, kia Kalaisi Sīsū ko hotau ‘Eiki, koe‘uhi ko ‘ene lau au ko e toko taha ke ala falala‘anga, he‘ene fokotu‘u au ki he lakanga ni.
54001013	Neongo ko e toko taha au na‘e laukovi ki he ‘Otua ‘i mu‘a, mo fakatanga mo pau‘u; ka na‘e fai meesi kiate au, koe‘uhi na‘a ku fai ta‘e‘ilo pē, he ko e ta‘etui.
54001014	‘Io, na‘e mātu‘aki ope mai ‘a e kelesi ‘a hotau ‘Eiki, pea ō mo ia ‘a e tui mo e ‘ofa, ‘a ia ‘oku tu‘u ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū.
54001015	‘Ē, ‘oku mo‘oni ‘a e lea, pea taau ke tali ‘e he loto kotoa– “Na‘e ha‘u ‘a Kalaisi Sīsū ki māmani ke fakamo‘ui ‘a e kakai angahala."
54001016	‘A ia ‘oku ou fungani ai: ka na‘e fai meesi kiate au koe‘uhi ko e me‘a ni, koe‘uhi ke fakahā ‘e Kalaisi Sīsū ‘iate au ko e fungani angahala hono kātokatoa ‘o ‘ene kātaki, mo‘o taipe ma‘anautolu te nau tui falala kiate ia ‘amui ke ma‘u ‘a e mo‘ui ta‘engata.
54001017	Pea ke ‘o e Tu‘i ‘Itāniti, ko e Ta‘e‘auha, ko e Ta‘ehāmai, ko e ‘Otua pē Taha, ke ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘a e faka‘apa‘apa mo e kolōlia ‘o laui kuonga pea ta‘engata. ‘Ēmeni.
54001018	Ko e fekau ko eni ‘oku ou tuku kiate koe, nga‘ata Tīmote, ‘i he funga ‘o e ngaahi palofisai na‘e fai mu‘a kiate koe. Ke ke kofu ‘aki ‘a e ngaahi palofisai ko ia, ka ke fai ‘a e tau lelei.
54001019	‘Oku ke puke ma‘u ‘a e tui, kae‘uma‘ā ‘a e konisēnisi ‘ata‘atā: he ko e ni‘ihi, ‘i he‘enau teke‘i ‘a e me‘a ko ia, kuo nau tūkia ‘i he me‘a ‘oku kau ki he tui:
54001020	‘a ia ‘oku ‘i ai ‘a ‘Aiminia mo ‘Ālekisānita, ‘a ia na‘a ku tuku ange kia Sētane mōna kinisi, ke na tuku ‘ena laukovi ki he ‘Otua.
54002001	KO IA, ‘oku ou fuofua enginaki ‘a e fai ‘o e ngaahi hū, mo e lotu, mo e hufekina, mo e fakafeta‘i, koe‘uhi ko e kakai kotoa pē.
54002002	Koe‘uhi ko e ngaahi tu‘i, mo kinautolu kotoa pē ‘oku mā‘olunga, koe‘uhi pē ke malu ‘etau mo‘ui, mo fiemālie, ‘o tau mātu‘aki fai fakalotu mo anga māopo.
54002003	Ko e me‘a lelei ia, pea ko e me‘a ‘e hāngai fofonga ki ai ‘a e ‘Otua ko hotau Fakamo‘ui;
54002004	‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘oku ne finangalo ke ma‘u mo‘ui ‘e he kakai kotoa pē, pea ke nau a‘usia ‘a e ‘ilo kānokano ki he mo‘oni.
54002005	He ‘oku taha pē ‘a e ‘Otua, taha foki ‘a e Fakalaloa ‘i he vaha‘a ‘o e ‘Otua mo e tangata, ko Kalaisi Sīsū ko e tangata.
54002006	‘A ia na‘a ne foaki ia ‘e ia ko e fetongi huhu‘i ‘o e kakai kotoa pē, kae toki fai hono fakamatala ‘i hono ngaahi kuonga totonu.
54002007	‘A ia ko e me‘a na‘e fokotu‘u au ki ai, ko e malanga mo e ‘aposetolo; (ko ‘eku lea mo‘oni ‘oku ‘ikai ko ‘eku loi) ‘io, ko e faiako ‘a e Senitaile ‘i he lotu mo e mo‘oni.
54002008	Ko ia, ko hoku loto ke fai lotu ‘e he kau tangata ‘i he potu kehekehe, ‘o hiki hake ‘a e nima ma‘a, ‘o ta‘eha ‘ita pe ha tāla‘a.
54002009	Pehē foki, ko hoku loto ki he kau fefine, ke nau teu ‘aki kinautolu ‘a e kofu ‘oku ngali ke ‘ai, pea ō mo e anga mā mo e anga fakama‘uma‘u: ‘o ‘oua ‘e fai‘aki ‘a e fafatu ‘o e lou‘ulu, pe ko e koula mo e mata‘itofe mo e kofu mahu‘inga.
54002010	Ka nau fai ke teunga‘ia ‘i he ngaahi ngāue lelei, ‘a ia ko e me‘a ‘oku taau mo e kau fefine ‘oku nau lāvutu ke tauhi ki he ‘Otua.
54002011	Ko e me‘a ‘a e fefine ke tali pē ‘a e akonaki, ‘o fakalongo pē mo fakavaivai ai pē.
54002012	Ka ko e fai akonaki, ‘oku ‘ikai te u tuku ki he fefine; ‘uma‘ā ‘a e pule ki he tangata; ka ke nofo fakalongo pē.
54002013	He ko ‘Ātama na‘e fua ngaohi, kae kimui ‘a ‘Ivi.
54002014	Kae‘uma‘ā na‘e ‘ikai oloa ‘a ‘Ātama, ka ko e ‘ū kākā‘ia ‘a e fefine, ‘o ne tō ai ki he faihala.
54002015	Ka ko hono hala ki he mo‘ui ‘oku fou ‘i he fai fanau; ‘o kapau te nau nofo ma‘u ‘i he tui mo e ‘ofa mo e mā‘oni‘oni, ō mo e fakama‘uma‘u.
54003001	OKU mo‘oni ‘a e lea–Ka feinga ‘e ha taha ke ma‘u ‘a e lakanga ‘o e faifekau pule, ko ‘ene holi ki ha ngāue lelei.
54003002	Ko ia, ko hono tonu ‘o e faifekau pule ke ta‘emele, ko e husepāniti ‘o ha fefine pē taha, ko e toko taha ‘oku faka‘ehi‘ehi mei he konā, ‘oku anga fakama‘uma‘u, ‘oku maau ‘ene tō‘onga, ‘oku fa‘a fakaafe ‘āunofo, ‘oku poto ‘i he faiako.
54003003	Ko e toko taha ‘oku ‘ikai uaine‘ia; ko e toko taha ‘oku ‘ikai fa‘a tā, ka ‘oku anga kātaki; ‘oku ‘ikai fie fakakikihi, ‘oku ‘ikai ‘ofa ki he pa‘anga;
54003004	Ko e toko taha ‘oku pule lelei ki hono fale ‘o‘ona, ‘oku mapule‘i ‘ene fānau ‘i he faka‘apa‘apa ai pē:
54003005	(ka ‘o kapau ‘oku ‘ikai lava ‘e ha tangata ke pule ki hono fale ‘o‘ona, pea fēfē ha‘ane tauhi ‘a e Siasi ‘a e ‘Otua?)
54003006	Ko e toko taha ‘oku ‘ikai ko e toki liliu; na‘a ‘ao‘aofia hono loto ‘i he ‘afungi, ‘o ne tō ai ki he tautea ‘o e Tēvolo.
54003007	Kae‘uma‘ā ko hono tonu ke ne ongoongolelei mei he kakai ‘o tua‘ā, na‘a tō ia ki he laua, pea mo ha tauhele ‘a e Tēvolo.
54003008	Pehē foki ko hono tonu ‘o e kau akonaki ke nau anga māopo, ‘o ‘oua ‘e ngutungutuua, ‘oua ‘e nofo ke inu kava lahi, ‘oua ‘e havala ki he pa‘anga ‘uli:
54003009	ko e kakai ‘oku nau tauhi ‘a e misiteli ‘o e lotu ‘i he konisēnisi ma‘a.
54003010	Pea ‘oua ke sivi foki kinautolu; pea ka ‘ikai ha lau ki ai, pea nau toki fai ‘a e ngāue ‘a e akonaki.
54003011	Pehē foki ko hono tonu ‘o e kau fefine ke nau anga māopo, ‘o ‘oua ko e kau fakakovi; ko ha ni‘ihi ‘oku faka‘ehi‘ehi mei he konā, ‘o falala‘anga ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē.
54003012	Ke ma‘u ‘e he kau akonaki ha uaifi pē taha, ‘o nau pule‘i lelei ‘enau fānau, mo honau fale ‘onautolu.
54003013	He ko kinautolu ne nau lava lelei ‘a e ngāue ‘a e akonaki, ‘oku nau ma‘u ai ma‘anautolu ha tu‘unga lelei, mo e fu‘u loto mālohi he‘enau tui, ko e tui kia Kalaisi Sīsū.
54003014	Kuo u tohi atu ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ni, neongo ‘eku ‘amanaki ‘e vave ‘eku ‘alu atu.
54003015	Koe‘uhi, ‘o kapau te u tuai atu, ke ke ‘ilo ‘a e anga ‘oku totonu ke fai‘aki ‘i he lotolotonga ‘o e Fale ‘o e ‘Otua, ‘a ia ko e Fakataha tonu ‘a e ‘Otua Mo‘ui, ko e pou mo e tu‘unga ‘o e Mo‘oni.
54003016	‘Io, ko e mo‘oni ka ko ha mo‘oni, ko e me‘a taumama‘o ‘a e misiteli ‘o ‘ete lotu– ‘A ia Na‘e fakahā he kakano, Na‘e fakatonuhia he laumālie, Na‘e mātā ‘e he kau ‘āngelo, Na‘e malangaekina ki he Senitaile, Na‘e tui ki ai ‘i māmani, Na‘e ‘ohake ‘o ‘afio he lāngilangi.
54004001	KA ‘oku folofola fakapatonu mai ‘e he Laumālie, ‘o pehē, ‘E hiki ha ni‘ihi mei he totonu ‘o e lotu ‘i he ngaahi kuonga ‘amui, he‘enau nofo ki he ngaahi fa‘ahikehe fakahala, mo e ngaahi tokāteline ‘a e kau tēvolo:
54004002	ko e me‘a ‘i he fakamatamatalelei ‘a e kakai ‘oku lea loi, ‘a e kakai kuo tā faka‘ilonga ho‘onautolu konisēnisi,
54004003	‘a e kakai ‘oku nau tapui ‘a e mali, ‘o fekau ke faka‘ehi‘ehi mei he ngaahi fa‘ahinga me‘akai, ‘a ia ko e ngaahi me‘a na‘e ngaohi ‘e he ‘Otua ma‘a e kakai ‘oku tui mo ‘ilo kānokano ki he mo‘oni, ke nau kai mo e fakafeta‘i.
54004004	He ‘ilonga ha me‘a kuo ngaohi ‘e ke ‘Otua ‘oku lelei ia, pea ‘oku ‘ikai ha me‘a ke li‘aki, kapau ‘e ma‘u mo e fakafeta‘i:
54004005	koe‘uhi kuo hoko ko e me‘a mā‘oni‘oni he folofola ‘a e ‘Otua mo e hūfia.
54004006	Kapau te ke enginaki ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ni ki he kāinga, te ke hoko ko e faifekau lelei ‘a Kalaisi Sīsū, ‘i ho‘o fakamaheni ai pē koe ‘i he ngaahi tala fakalotu, pea mo e ngaahi fakamatala ‘o e tokāteline lelei na‘a ke ako fakatotolo ki ai.
54004007	Ka ko e ngaahi tala tupu‘a fakaetangata na mo fakafinemātu‘a, fakafisi koe ki ai: ka ke ngaohi koe ke anga ki he lotu mo‘oni.
54004008	He ko e ngaohi ‘o e sino ‘oku ‘aonga ki ha me‘a si‘i pē, ka ko e lotu mo‘oni ‘oku ‘aonga ki he me‘a kotoa pē; he ‘oku ne ma‘u tala‘ofa ki he mo‘ui ko eni, pea mo ia ka hoko mai.
54004009	‘Oku mo‘oni ‘a e lea pea taau ke tali ‘e he loto kotoa.
54004010	He ko e me‘a ia ‘oku tau fakafitefita‘a ki ai mo tau, koe‘uhi kuo tu‘u ‘etau falala ki he ‘Otua Mo‘ui, ‘a ia ko e Fakamo‘ui ‘o e kakai kotoa pē, kae lahi kiate kinautolu ‘oku tui.
54004011	Ke ke tu‘utu‘uni ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ni mo ako‘aki.
54004012	‘Oua na‘a tuku ke fakasīkaka‘i koe ‘e ha taha ko ho‘o talavou; kaekehe ke ke hoko ko e toko taha ke fa‘ifa‘itaki ki ai ‘e he kakai lotu, ‘i he lea, ‘i he ‘ulungāanga, ‘i he ‘ofa, ‘i he tui, ‘i he anga ma‘a.
54004013	Nofo ki he lau lēsoni, mo e fai ha tokoni, mo e faiako, kae‘oua ke u ‘alu atu.
54004014	‘Oua na‘a ke tuku noa pē ‘a e mafai ‘oku ‘iate koe, ‘a ia na‘e foaki kiate koe ‘i he palofisai mo e hilifaki nima ‘e he kau Faifekau.
54004015	Ke ke mamafa ki he ngaahi me‘a ko ia; ke ke ngāue ki he ngaahi me‘a ko ia; koe‘uhi ke hā ki he kakai kotoa ho‘o laka ki mu‘a.
54004016	Lamalama kiate koe mo e me‘a ‘oku ke ako‘aki: ke ke nofo‘aki fai ‘a e ongo me‘a ko ia; he ‘i ho‘o fai pehē, te ke fakamo‘ui koe mo kinautolu foki ‘oku fanongo kiate koe.
54005001	‘OUA na‘a ha‘aki valoki‘i ha motu‘a, ka ke fai fakaoleole pē ‘o hangē ko ho‘o tamai; fai ki he kau talavou ‘o hangē ko ho tokoua.
54005002	Ki he kau fine‘eiki ‘o hangē ko ho‘o fa‘ē; ki he kau finemui ‘o hangē ko ho tuofefine, ‘o mātu‘aki anga ma‘a.
54005003	Tokanga‘i ‘a e kau fefine uitou ‘oku paea mo‘oni.
54005004	Ka ‘o kapau ‘oku ma‘u fānau pe makapuna ‘e si‘i uitou, ‘oua mu‘a ke ako‘i kinautolu ke nau fai ‘a e tō‘onga totonu ki hoto fāmili, pea ke fai ‘a e totongi ki he‘enau mātu‘a: he ko e me‘a ia ‘e hāngai fofonga ki ai ‘a e ‘Otua.
54005005	Pea ko eni, ko e uitou ‘oku paea mo‘oni pea tuku tuēnoa, kuo tu‘u ‘ene ‘amanaki ki he ‘Otua, pea ‘oku ne nofo ki he fai ‘o e ngaahi hū mo e lotu ‘i he pō mo e ‘aho.
54005006	Ka ko e uitou ‘oku fakausousa, neongo ko e mo‘ui ka kuo mate.
54005007	Ko e ngaahi me‘a ko ia foki ke ke tu‘utu‘uni ki ai koe‘uhi ke nau ta‘emele.
54005008	Ka ‘oka ai ha taha ‘oku ‘ikai tokanga ki hono kāinga, kae‘uma‘ā hono fāmili, ‘oku ne faka‘ikai‘i ‘ene lotu, ‘io, ‘oku ne kovi ange ‘i ha hīteni.
54005009	Ke ‘oua na‘a tu‘u ha taha ‘i he tohi ‘o e Kau Uitou, ‘oku si‘i hono ta‘u ‘i he onongofulu, ko e uaifi ‘o e tangata pē taha.
54005010	Ko e toko taha kuo fakaongolelei he‘ene ngaahi ngāue ‘aonga, ha‘ane tauhi ha fānau, ha‘ane fakaafe ha ‘āunofo, ha‘ane fufulu ‘a e va‘e ‘o e kau lotu, ha‘ane tokoni‘i ha kakai kuo mo‘ua ha mamahi, kapau na‘e ‘ilonga pē ha ngāue lelei pea ne feinga ki ai.
54005011	Ka ko e kau uitou ‘oku mālōlō ke ke fakafisi ki ai; he ka faifai pea mālohi ‘enau hoha‘a ‘ia Kalaisi, te nau tangi ke mali:
54005012	‘o nau nofo mo kinautolu ‘enau hala, ‘a ‘eni, Kuo nau maumau ‘enau fuakava mu‘a.
54005013	Kae‘uma‘ā te nau hoko ai ‘o fakapikopiko ‘i he‘enau ‘alu fano ‘i he ngaahi ‘api; ‘o ‘ikai ko e fakapikopiko pē, ka ko e fa‘a lau, mo kaunoa, ‘o talanoa ‘aki ‘a e ngaahi me‘a na‘e totonu ke ‘oua ‘e lau.
54005014	Ko ia, ko hoku loto ki he kau uitou ‘oku mālōlō, ke nau toe mali, ke nau fanau, ke nau pule he fāmili, ‘o ‘oua ‘e ‘atu mo‘o e fili ha me‘a ke tu‘unganaki ‘aki ‘ene lau‘ikovi.
54005015	He na‘a mo ‘eni kuo afe hanau ni‘ihi, ‘o muimui kia Sētane.
54005016	Kapau ko ha kau uitou ‘oku kāinga mo ha fefine lotu, ke tokoni kiate kinautolu ‘e ia, ‘o ‘oua ‘e tuku ke mafasia ai ‘a e Siasi: kae ‘i he Siasi ke tokoni ki he kau uitou ‘oku paea mo‘oni.
54005017	Ko e kau faifekau ‘oku pule lelei, ‘ē, ko honau taau ha tokoni lōua; kae‘uma‘ā ‘a kinautolu ‘oku fakafitefita‘a ‘i he malanga mo e faiako.
54005018	He ‘oku lau ‘e he Tohitapu, Ko e pulu ‘oku ne ‘au‘au ‘a e koane ‘e ‘ikai te ke ha‘iha‘i hono ngutu. Mo eni, ‘Ilonga ha taha ‘oku ngāue, ‘oku taau ke ne ma‘u ha‘ane totongi.
54005019	‘Oua te ke tali ha faka‘ilo ‘o ha faifekau, ka ‘i he ‘i ai ha fakamo‘oni ‘e toko ua pe toko tolu:
54005020	ka ko kinautolu ‘oku faihala ke ke valoki ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e kakai kotoa, koe‘uhi ke manavahē hono toe.
54005021	Ko e ‘Otua ē, mo Kalaisi Sīsū, pea mo e kau ‘Āngelo Fili, ‘oku ou na‘ina‘i atu ke ke tauhi ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ni, ‘o ‘oua ‘e fua fakapapau ha me‘a, pe fai ‘i he filifilimānako.
54005022	‘Oua te ke hilifaki nima leva ki ha toko taha, ‘uma‘ā ha‘o kau ‘i he ngaahi angahala ‘a e kakai kehe: kehe ke ke tauhi KOE ke ma‘a.
54005023	Tuku ho‘o inu pē ‘a e vai, ka ke fai‘aki ha me‘i uaine, koe‘uhi ko ho fatu mo ho‘o fa‘a mahamahaki.
54005024	‘Oku fu‘u e‘a ‘a e angahala ‘a e kakai ni‘ihi, ‘o mu‘a ki he fakamaau, kae kimui ‘a e angahala ‘a e ni‘ihi.
54005025	Pehē foki ‘oku fu‘u e‘a ‘enau ngaahi ngāue lelei; pea ko e ngaahi ngāue ‘oku ‘ikai pehē, tala‘ehai ‘e lava ke fufū.
54006001	‘ILONGA kinautolu ‘oku mo‘ulaloa ‘o pōpula, ke nau lau ‘oku taau ke nau faka‘apa‘apa ‘aupito ki he‘enau ngaahi ‘eiki, na‘a lau‘ikovi ‘a e huafa ‘o e ‘Otua, mo ‘ene akonaki.
54006002	Pea ko kinautolu ‘oku lotu ‘enau ngaahi ‘eiki, ke ‘oua te nau fakataau koe‘uhi kuo nau kāinga; kaekehe, ke ‘āsili ‘enau tauhi kiate kinautolu, koe‘uhi ko e kakai lotu mo ‘ofeina ia ‘a ia ‘oku ‘aonga ki ai ‘enau ngāue ‘ofa. Ko e ngaahi me‘a ko ia ke ke ako‘aki mo enginaki.
54006003	Kapau ‘e nofo ha taha ke ako kehe, ‘o ‘ikai te ne hiki ki he lea ‘oku haohaoa, ‘io, ki he ngaahi folofola ‘a hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, mo e akonaki ‘oku fakalotumo‘oni.
54006004	‘Ā, ko e toko taha ia kuo ‘ao‘aofia hono loto ‘i he ‘afungi, ka tala‘ehai ‘oku ne ‘ilo ha me‘a; ka ‘oku ne mahaki ‘aki ‘a e ‘eke me‘a ta‘efa‘a ‘iloa, mo e fakakikihi‘i lea pē; ‘a ia ko e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku tupu mei ai ‘a e meheka, ‘a e fetu‘usi, ‘a e felau‘ikovi‘aki,
54006005	‘a e femahalokovi‘aki, ‘a e fepaki ai pē ‘a e kakai kuo popo honau loto, kuo to‘o meiate kinautolu ‘a e ‘ilo totonu, ‘a e kakai ‘oku nau mahalo ko e lotu mo‘oni ko e me‘a fakatupu koloa pē.
54006006	Ka ‘oku mo‘oni ko e me‘a fakakoloa ‘aupito ‘a e lotu mo‘oni, ‘oka ō mo e loto topono.
54006007	He tala‘ehai na‘a tau ha‘u mo kitautolu ha me‘a ki māmani, koe‘uhi foki ‘e ‘ikai te tau lava ke ‘alu mo kitautolu ha momo‘i me‘a:
54006008	pea ‘i he‘etau ma‘u ‘etau me‘akai mo e kofu, te tau fe‘unga pē ‘i he me‘a ko ia.
54006009	Ka ko kinautolu kuo pau honau loto ke koloa‘ia, ‘oku nau tō ki he ‘ahi‘ahi, mo e tauhele, mo e ngaahi holi kehekehe, ‘a ia ‘oku fakasesele pea ko e me‘a ‘oku te lavea ai; ko e fa‘ahinga me‘a ‘oku nau lōmekina ‘a e kakai ki he ‘auha mo e mala‘ia.
54006010	He ko e ‘ofa ki he pa‘anga ko e aka ‘oku tupu mei ai ‘a e ngaahi kovi kotoa pē, pea ko e ni‘ihi ‘i he‘enau ala ki he me‘a ko ia kuo nau hē mei he lotu, pea kuo nau hokohoka‘i ‘aki ‘a kinautolu ‘a e ngaahi mamahi lahi.
54006011	Ka ko koe, tangata ‘o e ‘Otua, hola mei he ngaahi me‘a pehē; ka ke tuli ki he faitotonu, ki he lotu mo‘oni, ki he tui, ki he ‘ofa, ki he kātaki, ki he anga vaivai.
54006012	Tau ‘a e tau lelei ‘o e tui, puke ki he mo‘ui ta‘engata, ‘a ia ne ui koe ki ai, pea na‘a ke fai ‘a e tukupā lelei ‘i he ‘ao ‘o ha kau fakamo‘oni tokolahi.
54006013	Ko e ‘Otua ē, ‘a ia ‘oku ne tauhi ‘a e mo‘ui ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē, mo Kalaisi Sīsū, ‘a ia na‘a ne fakamo‘oni ki he‘ene tukapā lelei ‘i he pule ‘a Ponitō Pailato.
54006014	‘Oku ou na‘ina‘i atu ke ke tauhi ‘a e fekau ke ta‘emele mo ta‘efa‘a lau‘i, ‘o a‘u ki he fakahā mai ‘o hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi.
54006015	‘A ia te ne fai ‘i hono ngaahi taimi totonu, ‘e he ‘Ene ‘Afio ko e Pule Mohu Monū‘ia mo Tāfataha; ko e Tu‘i ‘o kinautolu ‘oku tu‘i, mo e ‘Eiki ‘o kinautolu ‘oku ‘eiki.
54006016	‘A ia ‘oku ‘a‘ana toko taha pē ‘a e ta‘efa‘amate, he‘ene ‘afio ‘i he maama ta‘efa‘a fotuaki; ‘a ia kuo te‘eki ke mātā ‘e ha tangata, pe te ne lava ke sio ki ai–ke ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘a e faka‘apa‘apa, pea mo e pule ta‘engata, ‘Ēmeni.
54006017	Ke ke na‘ina‘i kiate kinautolu ‘oku koloa‘ia fakaemaama ko eni, ke ‘oua te nau anga hiki, ‘uma‘ā ke tu‘u ‘enau falala ki he koto ta‘ema‘u na ko e koloa; ka ki he ‘Otua, ‘a ia ‘oku ne ‘omi ‘a e me‘a kehekehe ‘o fu‘u lahi, ma‘atau fiemālie pē.
54006018	Na‘ina‘i ke nau ngāue ‘aonga, ke nau koloa‘ia ‘i he ngāue lelei, ke nau nima homo ‘o anga fietokoni;
54006019	‘o nau fa‘oaki ai ma‘anautolu ha tu‘unga lelei ki he ‘amui, koe‘uhi ke nau puke ki he mo‘ui mo‘oni.
54006020	‘E Tīmote, ke ke le‘ohi ‘a e me‘a kuo tuku kiate koe, ‘o ke fulitu‘a ki he ngaahi koto lau fakaetangata pē, mo e ngaahi fakakikihi ‘a e me‘a na ‘oku lau ko e ‘Ilo-loloto, ka ko e lau hala:
54006021	‘a ia kuo ‘i ai ha ni‘ihi kuo nofo ki ai, ‘o nau le‘eia mei he tui totonu. ‘Ofa ke ‘iate kimoutolu ‘a e kelesi.
55001001	TŪ ko au Paula, ko e ‘aposetolo ‘a Kalaisi Sīsū ‘i he tu‘utu‘uni ‘a e ‘Otua, koe‘uhi ā ko e palōmesi ‘o e mo‘ui ‘oku ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū.
55001002	Ko ‘eku tohi kia Tīmote, ko hoku foha ‘ofa‘anga. ‘Ofa ke ke ma‘u kelesi mo e meesi mo e melino, mei he ‘Otua ko e Tamai, mo Kalaisi Sīsū ko hotau ‘Eiki.
55001003	‘Oku ou fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otua, ‘a ia ‘oku ou tauhi ki ai ‘aki ‘a e lotu na‘a ku ma‘u mei he‘eku mātu‘a, ‘o u fai‘aki ‘a e konisēnisi ‘ata‘atā–ko ‘eku fakamo‘oni ia ki he ta‘emotu ‘eku manatu‘i koe ‘i he‘eku ngaahi hū ‘i he pō mo e ‘aho.
55001004	He‘eku holi ke ta fe‘iloaki, ko ‘eku manatu ki ho lo‘imata, ka u fonu fiefia–
55001005	‘io, ‘oku ou fakafeta‘i ‘i he‘eku manatu ki he tui ta‘eloi ‘oku ‘iate koe; ‘a e tui na‘e fua nofo ‘i ho‘o kui ko Loisi, pea mo ho‘o fa‘ē ko ‘Iunisi; pea ‘oku ou falala ‘oku ‘iate koe foki.
55001006	Ko ia, ‘oku ou fakamanatu ai kiate koe, ke ke hunuaki ho‘o mafai mei he ‘Otua, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘iate koe ‘i he hilifaki ‘o hoku nima.
55001007	He ko e Laumālie na‘e foaki ‘e he ‘Otua kiate kitaua, na‘e ‘ikai ko e Laumālie anga fo‘i, ka ko e anga mālohi, mo ‘ofa, mo valoki.
55001008	Ko ia, ‘oua te ke maa‘i ‘a e fakahā ‘o hotau ‘Eiki, pe te ke maa‘i au ko ‘ene pōpula: kaekehe, ke ke kau mo au ‘i he kai mamahi koe‘uhi ko e Kōsipeli ‘i he funga ‘o e māfimafi ‘o e ‘Otua.
55001009	‘A ia na‘a ne fakamo‘ui kitautolu, mo ne ui ki ha lakanga tapu; ‘o ‘ikai koe‘uhi ko ha ngāue ‘atautolu, ka koe‘uhi ko hono finangalo ‘o‘ona, pea koe‘uhi ko e kelesi na‘e foaki mai ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū mei he ngaahi kuonga ‘o ‘Itāniti:
55001010	ka na‘e fakae‘a ‘i onopooni ‘i he fakahā mai ‘o hotau fakamo‘ui ko Sīsū Kalaisi; ‘a ia na‘a ne fakaka‘anga ‘a Mate, ka ne huluhulu ‘a e mo‘ui mo e ta‘e‘auha ‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli.
55001011	‘A ia ko e me‘a na‘e fokotu‘u au ki ai, ko e malanga mo e ‘aposetolo mo e faiako.
55001012	Ko hono ‘uhinga foki ia ‘oku ou mo‘ua ai ‘i he ngaahi mamahi ni; ka ‘oku ‘ikai te u mā ai: he ‘oku ou ‘ilo pē ‘a ia kuo u tui ki ai, pea ‘oku ou ‘ilo pau ‘oku ne mafai ke tauhi ‘eku me‘a kuo u tuku kiate ia, ‘o a‘u ki he ‘aho ko ē.
55001013	Ko e anga ē ‘o e ngaahi lea mo‘ui na‘a ke fanongo ai meiate au, ‘i he tui mo e ‘ofa ‘oku ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū.
55001014	Ko e me‘a lelei ko ia kuo tuku kiate koe, ‘ē, ke ke tauhi ‘i he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni, ‘a ia ‘oku nofo ‘iate kitautolu.
55001015	‘Oku ke ‘ilo foki kuo hiki kotoa pē meiate au ‘a kinautolu ‘i ‘Ēsia; kae‘uma‘ā ‘a Faikelo mo Heamokena.
55001016	‘Ofa ke meesi ange ‘a e ‘Eiki ki he fāmili ‘o ‘Onesifolo: he na‘e tu‘o lahi ‘ene tokoni‘i au, pea na‘e ‘ikai te ne maa‘i hoku kii‘i.
55001017	Ka ‘i he‘ene ‘i Loma, na‘a ne fai velenga hoku kumi ‘o ne ma‘u au.
55001018	‘Ofa ange ē ‘Eiki ke ne ma‘u meesi mei He‘ene ‘Afio ‘i he ‘aho ko ē, pea ko ‘ene ngaahi fu‘u tokoni na‘a ne fai ‘i ‘Efesō ‘oku ke lāu‘ilo ki ai ‘e koe.
55002001	KA ko koe, nga‘ata, ke ke hoko ‘o kaukaua ‘i he kelesi ‘oku ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū.
55002002	Pea ko e ngaahi me‘a na‘a ke fanongo meiate au ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e kau fakamo‘oni tokolahi, ke ke tuku ia ki ha kau tangata ala falala‘anga ke tauhi, ko ha ni‘ihi te nau mafai ke ako‘aki ki ha kakai kehe foki.
55002003	Kai pē ho ‘inasi ‘i he mamahi, ‘o taau mo e sōtia lelei ‘a Kalaisi Sīsū.
55002004	Ka ko ha sōtia ‘oku mo‘ua ‘i he tau, tala‘ehai te ne tuku ke ne fihia ‘i he ngaahi mo‘ua ‘o e mo‘ui ni, koe‘uhi ke hōhō‘ia ‘iate ia ‘a e ‘eiki na‘e fokotu‘u ia ki he tau.
55002005	Kae‘uma‘ā, ka ko ha taha ‘oku kau ‘i ha fe‘auhi, tala‘ehai ‘oku fakapale‘i ia ‘o kapau ‘oku ‘ikai te ne fai ‘o hangē ko e lao.
55002006	Ka ko hā kau fa‘a, ko ia pē ‘oku fakaongosia ‘oku ‘a‘ana ke motu‘a ‘inasi ‘i he fua ‘o e ngoue.
55002007	Feinga ke ma‘u ‘a e ‘uhinga ‘o ‘eku lea, koe‘uhi ‘e ‘atu ‘e he ‘Eiki ‘a e poto ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē.
55002008	Manatu ai pē kia Sīsū Kalaisi, hono fokotu‘u mei he pekia, ‘ene tupu mei he hako ‘o Tēvita–‘o hangē ko ‘eku kōsipeli,
55002009	‘a ia ‘oku ngaohikovia au ‘i hono fai, ‘io, ‘o a‘u ki hoto ha‘isia ‘o hangē ko ha angahala; ka tala‘ehai ‘oku ha‘isia ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua.
55002010	Ka ko hono ‘uhinga ‘eni ‘o ‘eku kātaki ‘a e me‘a kehekehe ma‘a e kakai fili, koe‘uhi ā ke ta‘imālie fakamo‘ui ‘a kinautolu foki, ‘a e fakamo‘ui ‘oku ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū, pea ō mo ia ‘a e kolōlia ta‘engata.
55002011	‘Oku mo‘oni pē ‘a e lea, He kapau na‘a tau mate mo ia, te tau mo‘ui mo ia; kapau ‘oku tau kātaki, te tau kaungā tu‘i foki mo ia;
55002012	kapau te tau fakafisinga ia, pea ‘e fakafisinga ‘a kitautolu ‘e ia;
55002013	kapau ‘oku tau li‘aki ‘etau tui, ka ‘oku ne piki ai pē ‘e ia ki he‘ene lea; he tala‘ehai ‘oku ne lava ke faka‘ikai‘i ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio.
55002014	Ko e ngaahi me‘a ni ke ke fakamanatu ki he kakai, ‘o fakamamafa ‘aki ‘a e ‘Eiki, ke ‘oua te nau fakakikihi ‘i ha lea pē, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘ikai hano ‘aonga, ka ki he fakalusa pē ‘o e kakai ‘oku fanongo.
55002015	Ka ko koe, ke ke feinga ke fakahā koe ki he ‘Otua ‘oku ke tu‘u mo e lau; ko e tangata ngāue ‘oku ‘ikai mā, ko ho‘o tofa totonu ‘a e folofola ‘o e mo‘oni.
55002016	Ka ke faka‘ehi‘ehi mei he ngaahi koto lau fakaetangata; he ko e kakai ko ia, ‘e fakautuutu ‘enau makehe mo e lotu:
55002017	pea ko ‘enau lea, te ne keina ‘o hangē ha kainiloto. ‘Oku ‘i he fa‘ahinga ko ia ‘a ‘Aiminia mo Failito;
55002018	ko e ongo me‘a ne le‘eia mei he mo‘oni, he‘ena pehē, ko e me‘a ki he toetu‘u kuo hoko ia: pea ‘oku nau fakahinga ai ‘a e lotu ‘a e ni‘ihi.
55002019	Ka neongo ia, ka ‘oku tu‘u pē ‘a e tu‘unga ma‘uma‘uluta ‘a e ‘Otua, he pulusi ai ‘a e sila ko eni, ‘Oku ‘ilo ‘e he ‘Eiki ‘a kinautolu ‘oku ‘o‘ona: mo eni, ‘Ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku ne hu‘ekina ‘a e huafa ‘o e ‘Eiki, ke ne faka‘ehi‘ehi mei he faihala.
55002020	Ka ‘ilonga ha fale lahi, ‘oku ‘ikai ke ngata ‘i he ngaahi ipu koula mo siliva, ka ‘oku ‘i ai foki mo e ngaahi ipu ‘akau mo ‘umea, pea ko e ni‘ihi ke kinokinoifie, ka ko e ni‘ihi ke palakū.
55002021	Pea ka ai ha taha te ne fakama‘a ia ke matanga mei he fa‘ahinga ko ia, te ne hoko ko e ipu ke kinokinoifie, ko e ipu kuo fakatāpui, ko e ipu ‘oku ‘aonga ki he Tangata‘eiki, kuo teu ki he ngāue lelei kotoa pē.
55002022	Ka ko e ngaahi holi fakatalavou ke ke hola mei ai; ka ke tuli ki he mā‘oni‘oni, ki he tui, ki he ‘ofa, pea ki he fe‘ofo‘ofani mo e kakai ‘oku lotu ki he ‘Eiki mei he loto ma‘a.
55002023	Ka ko e fa‘a ‘eke me‘a, ‘a ia ko e koto launoa pea ‘ikai ha poto ‘i ai, ke ke fakafisi ki ai, ko ho‘o ‘ilo ‘oku tupunga fakakikihi.
55002024	Ka ko e tamaio‘eiki ‘a e ‘Eiki ‘oku ‘ikai taau ke ne fakakikihi, kaekehe ke ne angalelei ki he kakai kotoa pē, ke ne poto ‘i he faiako, ke ne makātaki ‘a e kovi:
55002025	ke ne fai anga malū ‘ene tautea ‘a kinautolu ‘oku fakatau‘ilea, hei‘ilo ‘e faifai pea ‘ange ‘e he ‘Eiki ‘a e fakatomala ke nau tafoki ki he ‘ilo‘i totonu ‘o e mo‘oni;
55002026	pea ke nau ‘ā mei he‘enau konā ke fai hono finangalo, ‘o hao mei he tauhele ‘a e tēvolo, ‘a ia kuo ne pō kinautolu.
55003001	KA ko eni ‘a e me‘a ke ke sinaki ‘ilo ki ai; ka hokosia ‘a e kuonga fakamui, ‘e ai ha ngaahi taimi faingata‘a.
55003002	He ko hono kakai te nau ‘ofa kiate kinautolu pē, te nau ‘ofa ki he pa‘anga, te nau fielahi, te nau anga ta‘etoka‘i, te nau lea fie‘otua, te nau talangata‘a ki he mātu‘a; ko e kau ta‘ehounga, ko e kau anga ta‘emolumalu,
55003003	ko e kau ta‘e-‘ofa-ki-ho‘ota, ko e kau ta‘efakamolemole, ko e kau fakakovi, ko e kau ta‘efakama‘uma‘u, ko e kau anga fakamanu, ko e kau ta‘e‘ofa ki he lelei,
55003004	ko e kau lavaki, ko e kau ‘ohonoa, ko e kau loto ‘ao‘aofia ‘i he ‘afungi, ko e kau ‘ofa ki he mālie ‘o ‘ikai ‘ofa ki he ‘Otua,
55003005	ko e kakai ‘oku ma‘u ‘a e nge‘esi ‘o e lotu, ka kuo nau li‘aki hono kakano: ke ke fulitu‘a ki he kakai pehē foki.
55003006	He ‘oku ‘i he fa‘ahinga ko ia ‘a e kakai ‘oku totolo ki he ngaahi fale, pea taki pōpula ha longolonga‘i fefine kuo mafasia ‘i he ngaahi angahala, pea ‘oku tākiekina ‘e he ngaahi holi;
55003007	‘o nau ako ai pē, ka tala‘ehai ‘oku nau lava ke a‘usia ‘a e ‘ilo‘i totonu ‘o e mo‘oni.
55003008	Pea hangē ko e tu‘u ‘a Siani mo Siamepi kia Mōsese, ‘oku pehē foki mo e tu‘u ‘a e fa‘ahinga ni ki he mo‘oni: ko e kakai kuo popo honau loto, pea ‘i he lau ki he lotu ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘anau momo‘i sia‘a.
55003009	Ka tala‘ehai te nau faka‘a‘au atu: he ko ‘enau vale, ‘e faifai pea mātu‘aki e‘a ki he kakai kotoa, ‘o hangē tofu pē ko e vale ‘anaua.
55003010	Ka ko koe, na‘a ke ma‘u mo‘ao fa‘ifa‘itaki‘anga ‘a e faiako ‘a‘aku, ‘a ‘eku tō‘onga, ‘a ‘eku tu‘utu‘uni pau, ‘a ‘eku tui, ‘a ‘eku anga mokomoko, ‘a ‘eku ‘ofa, ‘a ‘eku kātaki;
55003011	‘a hoku fa‘a fakatanga‘i, ‘a e ngaahi fu‘u mamahi na‘e tō kiate au ‘i ‘Aniteoke mo ‘Aikoniume mo Līsita, ‘a e ngaahi fu‘u fakatanga ko ia na‘a ku mo‘ua ai: ka na‘e hamusi au mei ai kotoa ‘e he ‘Eiki.
55003012	‘Io, pea ko kinautolu kotoa pē ‘oku loto ke lotu mo‘oni ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū ‘e fakatanga‘i kinautolu foki.
55003013	Ka ko e kakai kovi mo fakahekeheke te nau faka‘a‘au atu mei he kovi ki he kovi, he‘enau kākaa‘i ‘a e kakai kehe, pea kākaa‘i mo kinautolu.
55003014	Ka ko koe, ke ke nofo ‘i he ngaahi me‘a na‘a ke ako ai, ‘a ia na‘e fakamahino atu, ko ho‘o ‘ilo ki he anga ‘o e kakai na‘a ke ako mei ai.
55003015	Pea mo e talu ho‘o valevale kuo ke maheni mo e Tohitapu, ‘a ia ‘oku ne mafai ke fakapoto koe ke ma‘u ‘a e fakamo‘ui ‘i he tui ‘oku ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū.
55003016	Ko e potu Folofola kotoa pē ne fakamānava mei he ‘Otua, ‘oku ‘aonga foki ki he akonaki, ki he faka‘ilo hala, ki he fakatonutonu, ki he ngaohia ke mā‘oni‘oni:
55003017	koe‘uhi ā ke tu‘u kakato ‘a e tangata faka‘otua, kuo ‘osi sāuni ki he ngāue lelei fuli pē.
55004001	KO E ‘Otua ē, mo Kalaisi Sīsū, ‘a ia ‘oku ne ene ke fakamaau ‘a e mo‘ui mo e pekia–‘io, ‘oku ou na‘ina‘i ‘aki foki ‘ene hā mai, pea ‘aki hono pule‘anga–
55004002	ke ke malanga‘aki ‘a e folofola, fa‘a fai pē ‘i he faingamālie mo e ‘ikai ha faingamālie, faka‘ilo hala, valoki, enginaki ‘i he anga kātaki ‘aupito, pea ‘aki ‘a e fa‘ahinga ako kehekehe.
55004003	Koe‘uhi ‘e faifai pea hoko ha kuonga, ‘a ia ‘e ‘ikai te nau kātaki ai ‘a e tokāteline haohaoa; ka te nau fokotu‘uniu hanau kau akonaki, ‘o fakatatau ki he ngaahi holi ‘anautolu, he veli honau telinga:
55004004	pea te nau le‘ei honau telinga mei he mo‘oni, ka nau tafoki ki he ngaahi talatupu‘a.
55004005	Ka ko koe, ke ke faka‘ehi‘ehi mei he konā ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē; kātaki e ngaohikovia, fai ‘a e ngāue faka‘evangeliō, fai hono kotoa ‘o ho lakanga.
55004006	He ko e me‘a kia au kuo kamata lilingi hoku toto ko e kava ‘o e feilaulau; pea ‘oku tu‘unuku mai ‘a e taimi ‘o ‘eku hiki.
55004007	Kuo u tau ‘a e tau lelei, kuo u lava‘i ‘a e fakapuepue, kuo u tauhi mai ‘a e tui totonu.
55004008	Hili ‘eni kuo tuku tauhi ma‘aku ‘a e pale ‘o e mā‘oni‘oni, ‘a ia ‘e toki ‘omi kiate au ‘i he ‘aho ko ē ‘e he ‘Eiki ko e Fakamaau totonu; ‘o ‘ikai kiate au pē, ka kiate kinautolu kotoa pē foki kuo ‘ofa ki ha‘ane hā mai.
55004009	Ke ke feinga ke ha‘u vave kiate au:
55004010	he kuo li‘aki au ‘e Tīmasi, he‘ene ‘ofa ki he maama ko eni; pea kuo ne ‘alu ia ki Tesalonaika, mo Kilisiki ki Kalētia, mo Taitusi ki Talamati.
55004011	Ko Luke pē toko taha ‘oku ‘iate au. Fakaheka ‘a Ma‘ake ‘o mo omi mo koe: he ‘oku ne ‘aonga kiate au ke tokoni ‘i he Ngāue.
55004012	Ka ko Tikiko, na‘a ku fekau ia ki ‘Efesō.
55004013	Ke ke ha‘u mo koe ‘a e pulupulu na‘a ku tuku ‘ia Ka‘apo ‘i Taloasi; pea mo e ngaahi tohi, kae‘uma‘ā ‘a e ngaahi tohi kili‘i manu.
55004014	Ko ‘Ālekisānita, ko e tuki ukamea, na‘e lahi ‘a e kovi na‘a ne fai kiate au: ‘e totongi ‘e he ‘Eiki kiate ia ‘o hangē ko ‘ene ngaahi ngāue.
55004015	Ke ke vakavakai foki ‘e koe ki he toko taha ko ia, he na‘e lahi ‘ene tau‘i ‘emau ngaahi lea.
55004016	‘I he‘eku fuofua fakamatala na‘e ‘ikai ha toko taha ‘e poupou au, ka ka li‘aki au ‘e kinautolu kotoa pē: ‘ofa ke ‘oua na‘a lau ia kiate kinautolu.
55004017	Ka ko e ‘Eiki, na‘a ne ofi mai, mo ne fakamālohi‘i hoku loto, koe‘uhi ke kakato ‘iate au ‘a e tala ‘o e Kōsipeli, pea fanongo ki ai ‘a e Senitaile kātoa: pea na‘e hamusi au mei he ngutu ‘o e laione.
55004018	‘Io, ‘e hamusi au ‘e he ‘Eiki mei he ngāue kovi kotoa pē, pea te ne fakamo‘ui au, ‘o a‘u ki he‘ene fakahū au ki hono pule‘anga fakalangi–ke ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘a e kolōlia ‘o lauikuonga pea ta‘engata. ‘Ēmeni.
55004019	Tala hoku ofa kia Pisa mo ‘Akuila, pea mo e fāmili ‘o ‘Onesifolo.
55004020	Ko ‘Elasito, na‘a ne nofo ‘i Kolinitō; ka na‘a ku tuku ‘a Talofima ‘i Mileto ‘oku mahaki.
55004021	Feinga pē ke ke ha‘u ‘i he te‘eki ke hoko ‘a e momoko. ‘Oku ‘ofa atu ‘a ‘Iupulo, mo Piutena, mo Laino, mo Kalōtia, pea mo e kāinga kotoa pē.
55004022	‘Ofa ke ‘i ho laumālie ‘a e ‘Eiki. ‘Ofa ke ‘iate kimoutolu ‘a e kelesi.
56001001	TŪ ko au Paula ko e tamaio‘eiki ‘a e ‘Otua, kae‘uma‘ā ko e ‘aposetolo ‘a Sīsū Kalaisi ma‘a e tui ‘a e kau Fili ‘e he ‘Otua,
56001002	pea ma‘anau ‘ilo kānokano ki he mo‘oni, ‘a e mo‘oni ‘oku ne langa‘i ‘a e lotu, ‘i he ‘amanaki ki he mo‘ui ta‘engata, ‘a ia ne tala‘ofa ‘e he ‘Otua ta‘efa‘a loi mei he ngaahi kuonga ‘o ‘ītāniti.
56001003	Ka na‘a ne fakahā ‘i hono ngaahi kuonga totonu ‘a ‘ene folofola, ‘i he malanga ‘a ia na‘e tu‘anaki au ‘o tuku ki ai, ‘i he fekau ‘a hotau ‘Otua Fakamo‘ui–
56001004	ko ‘eku tohi kia Taitusi, ko hoku foha mo‘oni ‘i he lotu ‘oku ta taha ai. ‘Ofa ke ke ma‘u kelesi mo e fiemālie, mei he ‘Otua ko e Tamai, mo Kalaisi Sīsū ko hotau Fakamo‘ui.
56001005	Ko hono ‘uhinga ‘eni ‘o ‘eku tuku koe ‘i Kēliti, koe‘uhi ke ke fai atu ‘a e fakatonutonu ‘o e ngaahi me‘a na‘e toe, ‘o fakanofo faifekau ‘i he kolo hokohoko ‘o hangē ko ‘eku tu‘utu‘uni atu–
56001006	kapau ko e toko taha ia ‘oku ‘ikai ha lau ki ai, ko e husepāniti ‘o ha fefine pē taha, ‘oku ‘i ai ‘ene fānau ‘oku lotu, pea kuo ‘ikai faka‘ilo kinautolu ‘i ha fakamaveuveu, pe ko e fānau talangata‘a.
56001007	He ko hono tonu ‘o ia ‘oku pule ‘i he siasi ke ta‘elau‘i, he ko e sētuata ‘a e ‘Otua; ko e toko taha ‘oku ‘ikai tangi ke tu‘u ‘ana, ‘oku ‘ikai ‘itangofua, ‘oku ‘ikai uaine‘ia, ‘oku ‘ikai fa‘a tā, ‘oku ‘ikai havala ki he pa‘anga ‘uli;
56001008	ka ko e taha ‘oku fa‘a fakaafe ‘āunofo, ‘oku ‘ofa ki he me‘a ‘oku lelei, ‘oku anga fakapotopoto, ‘oku faitotonu, ‘oku mā‘oni‘oni, ‘oku anga fakama‘uma‘u.
56001009	‘Oku ne piki pē ki he tokāteline mo‘oni, ‘a ia na‘a ne ako ai; koe‘uhi ke ne mafai fakatou‘osi ke enginaki ‘aki ‘a e tokāteline haohaoa, pea ke ikuna ‘a kinautolu ‘oku faka‘ikai.
56001010	He ‘oku ‘i ai ha kau talangata‘a, (ko honau tokolahi mei ha‘a Kamu), ‘oku lea launoa, mo fakahala‘i ‘a e loto ‘o e kakai;
56001011	‘ē, ko hono totonu ke tau tāpuni ‘a e ngutu ‘o e kakai ko ia, he ko e fa‘ahinga ‘oku nau fakahinga ‘a e ngaahi fāmili honau kotoa, he‘enau ako‘aki ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ta‘etaau ko ‘enau sio koloa ‘uli.
56001012	‘Oku lau ‘e he toko taha ‘o e kakai na, ko e fo‘i palōfita ‘onautolu, ‘o ne pehē, Ko e anga ai pē ‘o e kau Kēliti ke loi: ko e fanga manu fekai kinautolu; ko e koto kete pe fakapikopiko.
56001013	‘Oku mo‘oni ‘a e tala ko ia, ko ia ke ke valoki māsila kinautolu, koe‘uhi ke mo‘ui lelei ‘enau lotu;
56001014	‘o ‘oua te nau nofo ki he ngaahi talatupu‘a faka-Siu, mo e ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni ‘a ha kau tangata ‘oku afe mei he totonu.
56001015	‘Oku ma‘a ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē kiate kinautolu ‘oku ma‘a; ka kiate kinautolu kuo ‘uli mo ta‘etui ‘oku ‘ikai ke ma‘a ha me‘a, ka kuo ‘uli pē honau loto mo e konisēnisi fakatou‘osi.
56001016	‘Oku nau lau ‘oku nau ‘ilo ‘a e ‘Otua, ka ‘i he‘enau ngaahi ngāue ‘oku nau faka‘ikai‘i ia, ‘e he‘enau fakalielia mo talangata‘a, mo e ‘ikai ha‘anau momo‘i sia‘a ‘i ha ngāue ‘oku lelei.
56002001	KA ko koe, ke ke lea‘aki ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku taau mo e akonaki haohaoa.
56002002	‘O pehē, ko e me‘a ki he mātu‘a tangata ke nau faka‘ehi‘ehi mei he konā, ke nau anga maopo, ke nau anga fakama‘uma‘u, ke mo‘ui lelei ‘enau tui, ‘enau ‘ofa, ‘enau kātaki.
56002003	Ke pehē foki mo e kau finemātutu‘a; ke ngali mā‘oni‘oni ‘enau anga, ‘o ‘oua ko e kau fakakovi, ‘uma‘ā ko ha ni‘ihi ‘oku pōpula ki he inu kava lahi;
56002004	ka ko e ako‘anga me‘a lelei, koe‘uhi ke nau kiee‘i ‘a e kau fefine ‘oku mālōlō ke nau ‘ofa ki honau ngaahi husepāniti, pea ‘ofa ki he‘enau fānau.
56002005	Ke nau anga fakapotopoto, ke nau angama‘a, ke nau ngāue ‘i ‘api, ke nau angalelei, ke nau anganofo ki honau ngaahi husepāniti na‘a lau‘ikovi ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua.
56002006	Pehē foki ke ke enginaki ‘a e kau talavou ke nau anga fakama‘uma‘u.
56002007	Pea ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē ke ke hā koe ko e fa‘ifa‘itakinga ngāue lelei: ‘i ho‘o akonaki ke ke hā ‘oku ke ta‘epopo mo anga maopo, pea haohaoa ho‘o lea, ‘o ‘ikai ala lau‘i;
56002008	koe‘uhi ke mā ‘a ia ‘oku ‘i he fa‘ahi ‘e taha, ko e ‘ikai ha‘ane me‘a ke lau kiate kitautolu ‘oku kovi.
56002009	Ke ke enginaki ke anganofo ‘a e kau tamaio‘eiki ki he ngaahi ‘eiki ‘anautolu, ‘o fai ke nau hōhō‘ia ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē, ‘o ‘oua ‘e fakatau‘itala;
56002010	‘o ‘oua ‘e to‘oto‘onoa: ka nau mātu‘aki fai‘aki ‘a e lototō mo‘oni; koe‘uhi ke teunga‘ia ‘iate kinautolu ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē ‘a e tokāteline ‘a hotau ‘Otua Fakamo‘ui.
56002011	He kuo fakahā mai ‘a e kelesi ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘a e kelesi ‘oku ‘omi fakamo‘ui ki he kakai kotoa pē,
56002012	‘oku ne ngaohia kitautolu ke tau fakafisi ki he faka‘otuamate, mo e ngaahi holi fakaemāmani; ka tau mo‘ui anga fakama‘uma‘u mo angatonu mo anga fakalotu ‘i he maama ko eni:
56002013	he‘etau nofo‘aki tali ki he ‘amanaki mohu monū‘ia, ‘io, ko e fakahā mai ‘o e lāngilangi‘ia ‘o Sīsū Kalaisi, ko e ‘Otua Lahi pea ko hotau Fakamo‘ui.
56002014	‘A ia na‘a ne foaki ia ‘e ia koe‘uhi ko kitautolu; koe‘uhi ke ne huhu‘i kitautolu mei he maumau lao kotoa; pea fakama‘a ma‘ana hano kakai tonu ‘o‘ona, ha kakai ‘oku mamahi‘i ‘a e ngaahi ngāue lelei.
56002015	Ko e ngaahi me‘a ni ke ke lea‘aki mo enginaki mo valoki ‘aki, ‘o fai fakapule ai pē. ‘Oua na‘a tuku ke ta‘etoka‘i koe ‘e ha taha.
56003001	FAKAMANATU kiate kinautolu ke nau anganofo ki he ngaahi pule mā‘olunga, mo e ngaahi tu‘unga; ke nofo talangofua pē; ke nofo teu ki he ngāue lelei kotoa pē:
56003002	ke ‘oua te nau lau‘ikovi ha taha: ke ‘oua na‘a ko e kau veipā, ka ko e kau faka‘atu‘i pē, ‘o mātu‘aki fai‘aki ‘a e anga kātaki ki he kakai kotoa pē.
56003003	He ko kitautolu foki ‘i mu‘a, ko e kau ta‘eloto, talangata‘a, mo ‘alu hē; ‘o tau nofo pōpula ki he ngaahi holi mo e ngaahi mālie kehekehe; ‘o tau mo‘ui‘aki ‘a e fakama‘ito‘a, mo e meheka, ko e fehi‘anekina kitautolu pea tau fetāufehi‘a‘aki.
56003004	Ka ‘i he faifai pea fakahā mai ‘a e angalelei ‘a hotau ‘Otua Fakamo‘ui, mo ‘ene ‘ofa ki he tangata,
56003005	na‘e ‘ikai tupu ‘ene fakamo‘ui kitautolu mei ha ngaahi ngāue na‘a tau fai ‘i ha‘atau mā‘oni‘oni, ka ko e me‘a pē ‘i he‘ene ‘alo‘ofa na‘a ne fakamo‘ui kitautolu, ‘i he pālutu‘anga ‘o e fanau‘i fo‘ou, pea mo e fakafo‘ou ‘e he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni:
56003006	‘a ia na‘a ne lilingi mai ‘o lahi kiate kitautolu ‘ia Sīsū Kalaisi ko hotau Fakamo‘ui;
56003007	koe‘uhi ke fakatonuhia kitautolu ‘i he kelesi ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio, ‘o tau hoko ai ko e ngaahi ‘ea ki he mo‘ui ta‘engata, kae ‘amanaki pē.
56003008	‘Oku mo‘oni ‘a e lea ko ia, pea ko hoku loto ke ke fu‘u fakapapau ki he ngaahi me‘a pehē, koe‘uhi ke ‘ilonga kinautolu kuo tui ki he ‘Otua, ke nau tokanga ke nofo ki he ngaahi ngāue lelei. Ko e ngaahi me‘a pehē ‘oku lelei mo ‘aonga ki he kakai.
56003009	Ka ko e ‘eke me‘a launoa, mo e ngaahi lau hokohoko, mo e ngaahi fetu‘usi, mo e ngaahi fakakikihi ‘i he Lao, ke ke faka‘ehi‘ehi mei ai, he ko e ngaahi me‘a ta‘e‘aonga ia mo ikunoa.
56003010	Ko e tangata ‘oku fakatupu mavahevahe, ke ke tākitala‘i tu‘o taha, tu‘o ua, pea ke toki mavahe mei ai;
56003011	‘i ho‘o ‘ilo, ko e toko taha pehē kuo fulikivanu, pea ‘oku ne ‘ū angahala pē, neongo ‘oku tala ‘e hono loto ‘oku ne halaia.
56003012	Ka u ka fekau atu ‘a ‘Ātema, pe ko Tikiko, ke ke fai feinga ke vave mai kiate au ki Naikopoli: he kuo u tu‘utu‘uni ke fa‘ahita‘u momoko ‘i he potu ko ia.
56003013	Ko e me‘a kia Sena ko e tufungalao, mo ‘Āpolosi, ke ke nima mo e va‘e ‘a e tokonaki ‘o ‘ena fononga atu, ke ‘oua te na masiva ‘i ha me‘a.
56003014	Kae‘uma‘ā ke ako ‘a e kakai ‘otautolu ‘i he fai ‘o e ngaahi ngāue lelei, he‘enau tokoni ki hona tokonaki, telia na‘a nau ta‘eha fua.
56003015	‘Oku ‘ofa atu ‘a e kāinga kotoa pē ‘oku ‘iate au. Tala hoku ‘ofa ki he kakai kotoa pē ‘oku ‘ofa kiate kimautolu ‘i he lotu. ‘Ofa ke ‘iate kimoutolu kotoa pē ‘a e kelesi.
57001001	TŪ ko kimaua–‘a Paula ko ha nofo pilīsone ‘a Sīsū Kalaisi, pea mo si‘i kāinga ko Tīmote–ko ‘ema tohi kia Filimone ko homa ‘ofa‘anga, mo e kaungā ngāue ‘omaua.
57001002	Pea kia ‘Afia, ko si‘oma sisitā, pea kia ‘Ākipo, ko homa hoa tau, pea ki he siasi ‘oku ‘i ho ‘api.
57001003	‘Ofa ke mou ma‘u kelesi mo e fiemālie mei he ‘Otua ko ‘etau Tamai mo e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi.
57001004	‘Oku ou fakafeta‘i ma‘u ai pē ki hoku ‘Otua, ‘o u takua koe ‘i he‘eku ngaahi lotu;
57001005	he‘eku fanongo ki ho‘o fai ‘ofa mo e tui ki he ‘Eiki ko Sīsū, pea mo e kau lotu kotoa pē:
57001006	koe‘uhi ke ngāue mālohi ho‘o feohi fakalotu, ‘o taka ‘i he ‘ilo kānokano ‘o e me‘a lelei kehekehe ‘oku ‘iate kitautolu, ‘o hu‘u kia Kalaisi.
57001007	He kuo lahi ‘eku fiefia mo ‘eku fiemālie ‘i ho‘o ‘ofa, koe‘uhi ‘oku nonga ‘a e loto ‘o e kāinga lotu ‘i ho‘o ngāue, ‘alā.
57001008	Ko ia, neongo te u lava noa pē ‘ia Kalaisi ke tu‘utu‘uni ke ke fai ‘a e me‘a ‘oku totonu, ka ‘oku ou fie fai ko e kole pē, ‘o tu‘unga ‘i he ‘ofa.
57001009	Pea ‘i hoto anga ko ia, ‘a kita Paula, ko e motu‘a, pea ‘i he taimi ni ko e nofo pilīsone foki ‘a Sīsū Kalaisi,
57001010	‘oku te kole atu koe‘uhi ko si‘oku foha, ‘a ia kuo u ma‘u ‘i hoku ha‘isia, ‘io, ‘a ‘Onesema:
57001011	‘a ia na‘e ‘ikai ‘aonga kiate koe ‘i mu‘a, ka ‘i he taimi ni ‘oku ‘aonga kiate koe mo au, ‘a ia kuo u fakafoki atu.
57001012	Ko e tangata ko ia, ‘a ia ‘oku tatau mo ha kakano ‘o hoku manava–
57001013	‘ē, na‘a ku mei loto ke ta‘ofi ia mo‘oku, koe‘uhi ke ne fetongi koe ‘i hoku tauhi, lolotonga ‘oku ou mo‘u ha‘isia koe‘uhi ko e Kōsipeli.
57001014	Ka na‘e ‘ikai te u fie fai ha me‘a ta‘e te te ma‘u ha‘o poa, na‘a hā ho‘o ‘ofa, ‘o hangē ha fakakoloto, ‘o ‘ikai ko e fai loto lelei.
57001015	He na‘a ko hono ‘uhinga ia ‘o ho‘omo māvae fo‘i houa pē, koe‘uhi ke ke ma‘u mo‘ou ‘o ta‘engata;
57001016	‘o ‘ikai kei hangē ko ha pōpula, kae makehe mo ha pōpula, ‘io, ko ha tokoua ‘ofeina–‘oku ne mātu‘aki pehē kiate au, kae huanoa ha‘ane pehē kiate koe; he ‘oku ‘o‘ou ia ‘i he sino pea ‘i he lotu fakatou‘osi.
57001017	Ko ia, kapau ‘oku ke lau au ko ho kaume‘a, pea ke tali ‘a e tangata ko ia ‘o hangē ko au.
57001018	Ka ‘o kapau na‘a ne ngāue ta‘etotonu kiate koe ‘i ha me‘a, pe ‘oku ne mo‘ua, tohi ia kiate au.
57001019	Ko au Paula, ‘oku ou tohi ‘aki hoku nima ‘o‘oku, te u totongi ia ‘e au (tuku kehe ho mo‘ua kiate au, ‘a ia foki ko ho kotoa).
57001020	‘Io, nga‘ata, taumaiā ke ke ‘aonga foki kiate au ‘i he ‘Eiki: fakafiemālie hoku loto ‘ia Kalaisi.
57001021	Kuo u tohi atu ‘i he‘eku falala te ke talangofua mai, he‘eku ‘ilo ‘e hulu atu ho‘o fai ‘i he me‘a kuo u tala.
57001022	Kae‘uma‘ā foki, ke ke teuteu ha loki mo‘oku; he ‘oku te ‘amanaki ‘e tali ho‘omou ngaahi lotu, pea ‘e tuku atu au kiate kimoutolu.
57001023	‘Oku ‘ofa atu ‘a ‘Epafasi, ‘a ia ‘oku nofo pilīsone mo au ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū:
57001024	mo si‘oku kaungā ngāue ko Ma‘ake, mo ‘Alisitako, mo Tīmasi mo Luke.
57001025	Ko e kelesi ‘a hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, ‘ofa ke ‘i homou laumālie ia.
58001001	NA‘E fakakongokonga mo anga kehekehe ‘a e fai mu‘a ‘e he ‘Otua ‘ene folofola ki he Mātu‘a ‘i he kau Palōfita, ka ‘i he faka‘osi ‘o ono‘aho na‘a ne folofola kiate kitautolu ‘i ha ‘Alo;
58001002	‘a e Toko Taha na‘a ne tu‘utu‘uni ko e ‘ea ‘e ‘o‘ona ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē, ‘a ia foki na‘e fou ai ‘ene ngaohi ‘a e ngaahi ‘univeesi;
58001003	ko e Toko Taha ‘a ia ko e ulo atu ‘o Hono lāngilangi, mo e ‘īmisi ‘o ko ne ‘Afio mo‘oni, mo ne pou pē ‘a e ‘univeesi ‘aki ‘a e folofola ‘a ‘Ene Māfimafi, pea ‘i he hili ‘ene feia ‘a e fakama‘a angahala, na‘a ne nofo hifo mei he to‘omata‘u ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘i ‘olunga;
58001004	kuo ne hoko ‘o fu‘u mā‘olunga ‘i he kau ‘āngelo, ke hoa mo e fu‘u hulu atu ‘o e huafa kuo tō mo‘ona ‘i ho‘onautolu.
58001005	He ko hai ‘i he kau ‘āngelo ne folofola ki ai ‘i ha taimi, ‘o pehē, Ko hoku ‘Alo koe, Kuo u fakatupu koe he ‘aho ni? Mo ne toe folofola, Te u nofo au ko ‘ene Tamai, Pea ‘e nofo ia ko hoku Foha.
58001006	Kae‘uma‘a, ‘oka ne ka toe ‘omi ‘a e Ta‘okete ki māmani, ‘Oku ne me‘a, Pea ke hū ā kiate ia ‘a e kau ‘āngelo fua pē ‘a e ‘Otua.
58001007	Pea ‘i he‘ene lau foki ki he kau ‘āngelo, ‘oku ne me‘a ‘o pehē, ‘A ia ‘oku ne ngaohi ‘ene kau ‘āngelo ko e ngaahi matangi, Pea ko ‘ene kau ngāue ko e ulo‘i afi.
58001008	Ka ko ‘ene lau ki he ‘Alo ‘oku pehē, ‘E ‘Otua, ko ho taloni ‘oku ne a‘usia ‘a e kuonga ‘o ‘ītāniti: Pea ko e sēpita ‘a Faitotonu, Ko ha sēpita ia ‘o hono pule‘anga.
58001009	Ne ke manako ki he faitotonu, Ka ke fehi‘a ki he maumau lao; Ko ia ko e ‘Otua, ‘io, ko ho ‘Otua Na‘a ne pani ‘aki koe ‘aki ‘a e lolo ‘o e fiefia, ‘O lahi hake ‘i ho ngaahi kaungāme‘a.
58001010	Mo ‘eni, Ko koe, ‘Eiki, ‘i he kamata‘anga na‘a ke tanu pou ‘a māmani; Pea ko e ngāue ‘a ho nima ‘a e ngaahi langi.
58001011	‘E ‘auha ia; ka ke tu‘u ai pē koe; ‘Io, te nau faka‘au kotoa ke motu‘a ‘o hangē ko ha kofu;
58001012	Pea te ke fatufatu ia ‘o hangē ko ha pulupulu; ‘Io, ‘e fetongi ia hangē ha kofu: Ka ka pehē pehē ai pē ‘a e ‘Afiona Pea ko ho ngaahi ta‘u ‘e ‘ikai ngata.
58001013	Kae‘uma‘ā ko hai ‘i he kau ‘āngelo kuo ne folofola ai ‘i ha taimi, Nofo koe mei hoku to‘omata‘u, Kae‘oua ke u ngaohi ho ngaahi fili ko ho tu‘ungava‘e.
58001014	‘Ikai ko e kau laumālie ngāue ‘a kinautolu fua pē, ‘oku kouna atu ke fai ha lakanga, koe‘uhi ko kinautolu te nau hokosi ‘a e fakamo‘ui?
58002001	KO E me‘a ia ‘oku totonu ke ‘āsili ai ‘etau fakatokanga ki he ngaahi me‘a kuo ongo mai, na‘a ‘iloange te tau ‘auhia atu ‘o tovale mo ia.
58002002	He kapau ā na‘e pau leva ‘a e lea na‘e talafono‘aki ‘e he kau ‘āngelo, pea ‘ilonga ha laka kehe pe ha talangata‘a na‘e tō ki ai hono totongi totonu.
58002003	Pea te ta hao fēfē kitaua, ‘o kapau kuo ta ta‘etokanga‘i ‘a e fakamo‘ui ‘oku pehē fau? he na‘e kamata hono talafono‘aki ‘e he ‘Eiki, pea na‘e fakapapau kiate kitautolu ‘e kinautolu na‘e fanongo ki ai.
58002004	Pea na‘e kaungā fakamo‘oni foki ‘a e ‘Otua ‘aki ha ngaahi faka‘ilonga, mo ha ngaahi me‘a fakaofo, mo ha ngaahi mana kehekehe: kae‘uma‘ā ha ngaahi tufakanga Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni, ne vahevahe ‘o fakatatau ki he finangalo ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio.
58002005	He tala‘ehai na‘a ne tuku ki lalo ki he kau ‘āngelo ‘a e tu‘u ka hoko, ‘a ia ‘oku tau lea ki ai.
58002006	Ka ‘oku fakapapau mai ‘e ha taha ‘i ha potu ‘e taha, ‘o pehē, Ko e hā ‘a e tangata, ke ke manatu kiate ia? Pe ko e hako ‘o e tangata, Ke ke ‘a‘ahi kiate ia?
58002007	Na‘a ke tuku ia ke mā‘ulalo si‘i pē ‘i he kau ‘āngelo; Na‘a ke fakakalauni ia ‘Aki ‘a e lāngilangi mo e faka‘apa‘apa‘ia. Pea na‘a ke fakanofo ia Ke pule ki he ngaahi ngāue ‘a ho nima:
58002008	Na‘a ke tuku ke ‘i he lalo va‘e ‘o‘ona ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē. ‘Io, ‘i he‘ene tuku ki lalo ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē kiate ia, na‘e ‘ikai te ne fakatoe ha momo‘i me‘a ta‘etuku ki lalo ‘iate ia. Ka ‘i onopooni, tala‘ehai ‘oku tau vakai kuo tuku ki lalo ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē kiate ia.
58002009	Ka ko e toko taha pē ‘oku tau sio ki ai, ‘a ia na‘e ngaohi ke mā‘ulalo si‘i pē ‘i he kau ‘āngelo, ‘a Sīsū; ‘a ia, ko e me‘a ‘i he‘ene kātaki ‘a e mamahi ‘o e pekia, kuo fakakalauni ‘aki ‘a e lāngilangi mo e faka‘apa‘apa‘ia; koe‘uhi ‘i he ‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua ke ne kamata ‘a e mate ma‘a e tangata takitaha.
58002010	He na‘e taau mo ‘Ene ‘Afio, ‘a ia ‘oku ma‘ana ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē, pea ‘oku fo‘ou ‘iate ia ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē, ke ne taki ki he lāngilangi ha ngaahi foha tokolahi, he‘ene fakahaohaoa ‘a e Takimu‘u ‘o honau fakamo‘ui ‘i he‘ene kātaki ‘a e ngaahi mamahi.
58002011	He ko Ia ‘oku fakatāpui, mo kinautolu ‘oku tapui, ‘oku tupu kotoa pē mei ha toko taha: ko hono ‘uhinga ia foki ‘oku ‘ikai te ne mā ai ke lau kinautolu ko e ngaahi tokoua, he‘ene pehē,
58002012	Te u fakahā ho huafa Ki hoku ngaahi tokoua; Te u hiva‘aki koe I he lotolotonga ‘o e fakataha.
