58002013	Pea ‘oku ne toe pehē, Te u nofo au ko e falala kiate ia, Mo ne pehē foki, Ko au ‘eni mo e fānau kuo foaki ‘e he ‘Otua kiate au.
58002014	‘Āua; ko ia, ko e me‘a ‘i he ‘inasi ‘a e fānau ‘i he toto mo kakano, pehē na‘e ‘inasi ‘a ia foki ‘i he ongo me‘a ko ia; koe‘uhi, ko e me‘a ‘i he‘ene mate, ke ne fakaka‘anga ‘a e toko taha ‘a ia ‘oku ‘a‘ana ‘a e mālohi ‘o e mate, ‘a ia ko e Tēvolo.
58002015	Pea ke ne fakatau‘atāina ‘a e fa‘ahinga ko ia kotoa pē kuo nau mo‘ui‘aki ‘a e nofo pōpula, he‘enau manavahē ki he mate.
58002016	He tala‘ehai koā, ko ha kau ‘āngelo ia ‘oku ne pukenima‘i; ka ko e hako ‘o ‘Epalahame ia ‘oku ne pukenima‘i.
58002017	Ko ia ai, na‘e pau ke fakatatau ai ia mo hono ngaahi tokoua ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē, koe‘uhi ke ne hoko ko ha Taula‘eiki Lahi ‘oku ‘ofangofua mo lototō, ke ne tokanga ki he‘enau ngaahi me‘a mo e ‘Otua, koe‘uhi ke ne fai ‘a e fakalelei ‘i he angahala ‘a e kakai.
58002018	He ko e me‘a kuo ne mamahi ai ‘e ia ‘i hono ‘ahi‘ahi‘i, ‘oku ne lava ke tokoni ai kiate kinautolu ‘oku ‘ahi‘ahi‘i.
58003001	KO IA, ‘e hoto ngaahi tokoua tapu, si‘i kau ‘i ha ui mei langi, mou tokanga‘i ‘a e ‘Aposetolo mo Taula‘eiki Lahi ‘o ‘etau lotu, ‘io, ‘a Sīsū;
58003002	‘ene lototō kiate ia na‘a ne ngaohi ia, ‘o hangē foki na‘e lototō ‘a Mōsese ‘i he ‘api kotoa ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio.
58003003	He kuo lau ‘a e toko taha ko eni ‘oku ne taau mo ha fakahīkihiki lahi ‘ia Mōsese, ke hoa mo e lahi hake ‘o e mahu‘inga ‘o‘ona na‘a ne langa ‘a e ‘api, ‘i he mahu‘inga ‘o e ‘api.
58003004	Seuke, ‘ilonga ha ‘api, kuo pau na‘e langa ‘e ha taha; pea ko ia na‘a ne langa ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē ko e ‘Otua.
58003005	Pea ko Mōsese foki na‘a ne lototō ‘i he ‘api kotoa ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio, ko e matāpule pē, mo‘o fakamo‘oni ki he ngaahi me‘a ka folofola‘aki ‘amui.
58003006	Ka ko e lototō ‘a Kalaisi, ko e fai ‘a ha ‘Alo ‘oku pule ki he ‘api ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio; ‘a ia ko hono ‘api ‘a kitautolu, ‘o kapau te tau kuku ma‘u ‘o a‘u ki he ngata‘anga ‘a ‘etau lotolahi, mo ‘etau viki ‘i he‘etau fakatu‘amelie kuo ma‘u.
58003007	Ko ia–hangē ko e folofola ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni, Ko e ‘aho ni pē–kapau te mou fanongo ki hono le‘o.
58003008	‘Oua na‘a fakafefeka homou loto; ‘O hangē ko ia ne fai ‘i Fakahouhau, ‘O tatau mo e ‘aho ‘o ‘Ahi‘ahi ‘i he Toafa:
58003009	‘A ia na‘e ‘ahi‘ahi au ‘e ho‘omou ngaahi kui, He‘enau ala‘aki mai; ‘O nau mamata ki he‘eku ngaahi ngāue ‘O fāngofulu ta‘u.
58003010	Ko ia, na‘a ku ‘ita ki he to‘utangata ko eni, ‘o u pehē, ‘Oku nau hē ma‘u ai pē ‘i honau loto; Pea na‘e ‘ikai te nau a‘usia ‘a e ‘ilo‘i ‘o hoku ngaahi ‘alunga.
58003011	‘A ē ne u fuakava ai ‘i he‘eku ‘ita ko au ē, ha‘anau hū ki hoku Mālōlō‘anga!
58003012	Ko ia, mou vakai, ‘e kāinga, na‘a ‘iloange ‘e ai ‘i hamou toko taha ha loto kovi he ta‘etui, ‘a ia ‘oku hiki mei he ‘Otua ‘oku mo‘ui.
58003013	Ka mou feenginaki‘aki pē, ‘o hokohoko ‘aho pē, lolotonga ‘oku kei lau atu ko e ‘aho ni; na‘a fakafefeka hamou taha ‘i he kākā ‘a angahala.
58003014	He kuo tau hoko ko e kau ‘inasi ‘ia Kalaisi, ‘o kapau ā ‘oku tau kuku ma‘u ‘o a‘u ki he ngata‘anga ‘a e lotopau na‘a tau kamata ‘aki.
58003015	[‘A ia ‘oku hā] ‘i hono pehē mai, Ko e ‘aho ni, ‘o kapau te mou fanongo ki hono le‘o, ‘oua na‘a fakafefeka homou loto, ‘o hangē ko e fai ‘i Fakahouhau.
58003016	He ko hai ‘a kinautolu na‘e fanongo kae fakatupu houhau? ‘Ā, ‘ikai ko kinautolu ia kotoa pē na‘e ‘alu atu mei ‘Isipite ‘ia Mōsese?
58003017	Pea ko hai na‘a ne ‘ita ki ai ‘o fāngofulu ta‘u? ‘ikai ko kinautolu ia na‘e angahala, ‘a ia na‘e mokulu honau ngaahi kupu ‘i he Toafa?
58003018	Pea ko hai ‘a kinautolu na‘a ne fuakava ki ai, ‘e ‘ikai te nau hū ki hono mālōlō‘anga? ‘Ikai ko kinautolu na‘e talangata‘a?
58003019	Pea ‘oku tau vakai, na‘e ‘ikai te nau lava ke hū, koe‘uhi ko ‘enau ta‘etui.
58004001	‘ĀUA; ko ia, neongo ‘oku toe pē ha palōmesi ke ta hū ki hono mālōlō‘anga, ke tau manavahē mu‘a na‘a faifai pea hā kuo tōmui hamou toko taha.
58004002	He ko kitautolu foki kuo tala ki ai ha ongoongolelei, ‘o hangē ko kinautolu: ka ko e lea ‘o e ongoongo na‘a nau fanongo ki ai, na‘e ‘ikai ‘aonga ki he fa‘ahinga ko ia, ko e ‘ikai fakataha kinautolu ‘e he‘enau tui mo e kakai na‘e tuitala ki ai.
58004003	He ‘oku ta hū ki he mālōlō‘anga, ‘a kitaua na‘e tui, ‘o hangē ā ‘ene folofola, ‘A ē ne u fuakava ai ‘i he‘eku ‘ita, Ko au ē ha‘anau hū ki hoku mālōlō‘anga! Neongo kuo ‘osi ‘a e ngaahi ngāue talu mei he fokotu‘u ‘o māmani.
58004004	He kuo ne folofola ‘i ha potu ‘e taha, ‘i he‘ene lau ki he Sāpate, ‘o pehē, Pea na‘e mālōlō ‘a e ‘Otua ‘i hono fitu ‘o e ‘aho mei he‘ene ngaahi ngāue kehekehe.
58004005	Pea ‘i he potu tohi ko eni ‘oku ne toe folofola mai, Ko au ē, ha‘anau hū ki hoku mālōlō‘anga!
58004006	Tā ‘oku kei toe ha ni‘ihi ke hū ki ai, pea ko kinautolu na‘e tomu‘a tala ki ai ‘a e ongoongolelei na, na‘e ‘ikai te nau hū ki ai koe‘uhi ko e talangata‘a.
58004007	Ko ia, ‘oku ne toe kotofa ha ‘aho, ‘o pehē, Ko e ‘aho ni pē–ko ‘ene folofola ē ‘ia Tēvita, kuo hili ha taimi, ko futu: ‘o hangē ko ia na‘e lau ‘anenai, Ko e ‘aho ni pē–kapau te mou fanongo ki hono le‘o, ‘Oua na‘a fakafefeka homou loto.
58004008	He ka ne fakamālōlō kinautolu ‘e Sīsū, (‘a ia ko Siosiua) pehē ne ‘ikai te ne folofola ki mui ki ha ‘aho kehe.
58004009	‘Āua; pea tā ‘oku toe pē ha mālōlō faka-Sāpate ma‘a e kakai ‘a e ‘Otua.
58004010	He ko ia na‘a ne hū ki hono mālōlō‘anga, na‘a ne mālōlō ‘e ia foki mei he‘ene ngaahi ngāue, ‘o hangē tofu pē ko e ‘Otua mei ha‘ana.
58004011	Ko ia, ke tau tōtōivi ke hū ki he mālōlō‘anga ko ia, na‘a ai ha taha ‘e tō ki he anga talangata‘a ko ia.
58004012	He ko e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua, ko e koto mo‘ui mo e koto mālohi, pea māsila ange ‘i ha heletā fakatoumata fua pē; ‘o ne ‘asi atu ‘o maioio‘i ‘a e loto mo e laumālie, ‘io, hono ngaahi hokonga mo e uho; pea ‘oku ne vavanga‘i ‘a e ngaahi holi mo e fakakaukau ‘o e loto.
58004013	Pea ‘oku ‘ikai ha me‘a kuo ngaohi ‘e ta‘e‘ata pē ki he ‘Ene ‘Afio: ka ‘oku telefua mo tokaima‘ananga ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē ki he fofonga ‘o ia ‘oku tau fakamaau ki ai.
58004014	Ko ia, ‘i he‘etau ma‘u leva ha Taula‘eiki Lahi ‘oku fungani, ‘a ia kuo ne ‘asi atu ‘i he ngaahi langi, ‘io, ‘a Sīsū ko e ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otua, ko ia, ke tau puke ma‘u ‘a ‘etau lotu.
58004015	He tala‘ehai ‘oku tau ma‘u ha Taula‘eiki Lahi ‘oku ta‘emalavea ‘i hotau ngaahi vaivai‘anga, kaekehe ‘oku tau ma‘u ha toko taha kuo ‘osi ‘ahi‘ahi ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē, hangē ko kitautolu, kae ‘ikai ha‘ane angahala.
58004016	Ko ia, ke tau ‘unu‘unu atu mālohi ai ki he taloni ‘o kelesi, ke tau ma‘u meesi, mo tau ta‘imālie ha kelesi ke tokoni mai.
58005001	HE ‘ilonga ha Taula‘eiki Lahi, ko e me‘a ‘i hono to‘o mei he kakai, ko ia ‘oku fakanofo ia ma‘a e kakai, ke tokanga ki he‘enau ngaahi me‘a mo e ‘Otua; ke ne ‘atu koe‘uhi ko e angahala ‘a e ngaahi me‘a‘ofa mo e ngaahi feilaulau.
58005002	Ko e toko taha ‘oku ne lava ke fai faka‘atu‘i ki he fai vale, mo e kakai kuo hē; koe‘uhi kuo kāpui mo ia foki ‘e he vaivai‘anga.
58005003	Pea koe‘uhi ko e me‘a ko ia, kuo pau ai ke ‘atu ha feilaulau ma‘a e angahala; ‘o ‘ikai‘ia ko e kakai pē, ka ma‘ana foki.
58005004	Kae‘uma‘ā ‘oku ‘ikai ke to‘o ‘e ha taha ‘a e lakanga ko ia ma‘ana, ka ‘i hono ui ki ai ‘e he ‘Otua, ‘o hangē foki ko ‘Ēlone.
58005005	Ko ia, na‘a mo Kalaisi, na‘e ‘ikai te ne hākeaki‘i ‘e ia ia ke Taula‘eiki Lahi, ka ko ia pē na‘a ne folofola kiate ia, Ko hoku ‘Alo koe; Kuo u fakatupu koe he ‘aho ni.
58005006	Hangē foki ko ‘ene folofola ‘i he potu ‘e taha, Ko e taula‘eiki koe ‘o laui ‘ītāniti ‘I he ‘alunga ‘o Melekiseteki.
58005007	Ko e toko taha ko ia ‘i he ngaahi ‘aho ‘o ‘ene nofo kakano, na‘a ne ‘atu ‘a e ngaahi lotu, mo e ngaahi hū tōtōaki, kiate ia na‘e mafai ke fakahaofi ia mei he mate, ‘o ne fai‘aki ‘a e fu‘u kalanga, mo e tangi lo‘imata: pea na‘e tali ko e me‘a ‘i he‘ene fai fakaongoongo.
58005008	‘Io, neongo ko e ‘Alo ia, ka na‘a ne lava ‘i ‘ene talangofua, ko e ako ‘e he‘ene ngaahi mamahi.
58005009	Pea kuo fakahaohaoa leva, na‘a ne hoko ma‘anautolu fua pē ‘oku talangofua kiate ia, ko e tupu‘anga ‘o ha fakamo‘ui ‘oku laui ‘ītāniti;
58005010	he ui ia ‘e he ‘Otua, ko e Taula‘eiki Lahi ‘i he ‘alunga ‘o Melekiseteki.
58005011	‘A ia ‘oku lahi ‘emau fakamatala ke fai ki ai, pea faingata‘a hono faka‘uhinga; koe‘uhi ko ho‘omou hoko ko e kau ongongata‘a.
58005012	He neongo na‘e totonu ke mou faiako, koe‘uhi ko ho‘omou fuoloa, ka ko homou taau ‘eni ke toe ako kiate kimoutolu ‘e ha taha ‘a e motu‘alea ‘o e ngaahi ‘elemēniti ‘o e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua. ‘Io, kuo mou hoko ko ha kakai ‘oku tuha mo ha hu‘akau pē, ‘o ‘ikai mo e me‘akai mālohi.
58005013	He ‘ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku me‘akai ‘aki ‘a e hu‘akau, ‘oku ne ta‘epoto ‘i he folofola ‘o e mā‘oni‘oni, he ko e valevale ia.
58005014	Ka ko e me‘akai mālohi ‘oku ‘anautolu ‘oku matu‘otu‘a, ‘a kinautolu ‘a ia ko e me‘a ‘i he‘enau fa‘a fai, kuo ako honau ngaahi ongo‘anga ke sivi ‘a e lelei mo e kovi.
58006001	KO ia, tau tuku ā ‘a e fakamatala ‘o e ngaahi ‘elemēniti faka-Kalaisi, ka tau tuiaki atu ki he haohaoa; ‘o ‘oua na‘a tau tanupou ai pē he fakatomala mei he ngaahi ngāue mate mo e tui falala ki he ‘Otua.
58006002	He tokāteline ‘o e ngaahi papitaiso mo e hilifaki nima, ‘o e toetu‘u ‘o e pekia mo e fakamaau ta‘engata.
58006003	Pea te tau fai ia, ‘o kapau ‘e lelei ki he finangalo ‘o e ‘Otua.
58006004	He ‘ilonga kinautolu ne fakamāmangia mu‘a, mo kamata ki he me‘a‘ofa fakahēvani, pea ne hoko ko e kau ‘inasi ‘i he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni,
58006005	pea ne kamata hono lelei ‘o e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua, mo e ngaahi ivi ‘o e tu‘u ka hoko:
58006006	ka nau hinga pē: ‘oku ‘ikai ‘aupito lava ke toe fakafo‘ou kinautolu ke nau fakatomala, he‘enau kalusefai fo‘ou kiate kinautolu ‘a e ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otua, ‘o fai fakahāhā pē ‘a hono fakamaa‘i.
58006007	Seuke, na‘a mo ha kelekele, ‘a ia kuo ne inumia ‘a e ‘uha ‘oku fa‘a tō ki ai, pea fakatupu ha ngaahi ‘akau ‘oku ‘aonga kiate kinautolu ‘a ia ‘oku ngoue‘i foki ma‘anautolu, ‘oku fai tāpuekina ‘a e kelekele ko ia mei he ‘Otua:
58006008	ka ‘oka tupu mei ai ‘a e ‘akau talatala mo e talatala‘āmoa, ‘oku li‘aki ia, pea kuo ofi hono fakamala‘ia; ‘a ia ko hono iku‘anga ko e vela.
58006009	Ka neongo foki kuo mau lea pehē, ka ‘oku mau mātu‘aki tui, si‘oku ‘ofa‘anga, ‘e ‘amoutolu ‘a e ngaahi lelei na, ‘io, ko e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku hoa mo e fakamo‘ui.
58006010	He tala‘ehai ‘oku fai ta‘etotonu ‘a e ‘Otua ke ne fakangalo‘i ho‘omou ngāue, mo e ‘ofa ki hono huafa na‘e hā ‘iate kimoutolu ‘i ho‘omou tokoni ki he kakai lotu, ‘a ia foki ‘oku mou kei fai.
58006011	Ka ‘oku mau faka‘amu ke hā ‘iate kimoutolu takitaha ha feinga hangē ko ia, ke fakama‘uma‘uluta ho‘omou fakatu‘amelie, ‘o a‘u ki he ngata‘anga.
58006012	Koe‘uhi ke ‘oua te mou hoko ko e kau fakapikopiko, ka ko e kau fa‘ifa‘itaki ‘o e kakai kuo nau hokosi ‘a e ngaahi tala‘ofa ‘i he‘enau tui mo e kītaki.
58006013	He ko ‘Epalahame na‘e fai ha tala‘ofa ki ai ‘e he ‘Otua; pea ‘i he ‘ikai ha toko taha mā‘olunga hake ke ne lea tuki ai, ko ia na‘a ne lea tuki ‘i He ‘ene ‘Afio,
58006014	‘o pehē, Ko au ē te u mātu‘aki tāpuaki‘i koe, pea te u mātu‘aki fakatokolahi‘i koe.
58006015	Pea ‘i hono pehe‘i, na‘a ne kītaki, ‘o ne lava‘i ‘a e tala‘ofa.
58006016	Seuke, ‘oku lea tuki ‘a e kakai ‘iate ia ‘oku mā‘olunga, pea ka ai ha‘amo fakakikihi, ‘oku fakangatangata ‘e ha lea tuki, pea pau ai ‘a e me‘a.
58006017	Ko ia, ko e ‘Otua, ‘i he‘ene finangalo ke ‘āsili hā ki he ngaahi ‘ea ‘o e tala‘ofa hono mata‘eliliu ‘o ‘Ene tu‘utu‘uni, ko ia na‘a ne fakamamafa ‘aki ha lea tuki:
58006018	koe‘uhiā, ko e me‘a ‘i he ‘i ai ‘a e ongo me‘a ta‘emaliliu ‘e ua, ‘a ia na‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito lava ke loi ai ‘a e ‘Otua, ko ia ke ai hatau tokoni mālohi, ‘a kitaua kuo ta hola hūfanga ke puke ki he ‘amanaki ‘oku tala humaki mai:
58006019	‘a e ‘amanaki ko ia ‘oku tau ma‘u mo‘o taula hotau laumālie, ko e taula mālohi mo ma‘uma‘uluta, pea kuo lī ki he loto tatau;
58006020	‘a ia kuo hū ki ai ‘a Sīsū ma‘atautolu, ko hotau Takilele, he‘ene hoko ko e Taula‘eiki Lahi ‘i he ‘alunga ‘o Melekiseteki, ‘o laui ‘ītāniti.
58007001	HE ko e Melekiseteki ko ia, ‘a e Tu‘i Salema, ‘a e taula‘eiki ‘a e ‘Otua Taupotu, ‘a e toko taha na‘e fakafetaulaki kia ‘Epalahame ‘i he‘ene foki mai mei he taa‘i ‘o e ngaahi tu‘i, mo ne tāpuaki‘i ia;
58007002	‘a e toko taha foki na‘e tuku ma‘ana ‘e ‘Epalahame hono vahehongofulu ‘o e me‘a kotoa; ‘a ia ko e ‘uhinga ‘o hono ‘uluaki hingoa ko e Tu‘i ‘o e Mā‘oni‘oni, pea hoko mo hono hingoa ‘e taha ko e Tu‘i Salema, ‘a ia ko e Tu‘i ‘o e Melino;
58007003	ta‘eha‘ane tamai, ta‘eha‘ane fa‘ē, ta‘ehano hohoko, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘ikai ha kamata‘anga ‘o hono ngaahi ‘aho, pe ha ngata‘anga ‘o ‘ene mo‘ui; kae‘uma‘ā ‘oku fakatatau ki he ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otua–ko e Melekiseteki ko ia ‘oku ne nofo taula‘eiki ai pē.
58007004	‘Ē, vakai ā; hono ‘ikai lahi ‘a e tangata ko ia! he na‘e ‘atu ki ai ‘e ‘Epalahame ‘a e vahehongofulu, ‘a e fungani ‘o e vete, ‘io, na‘e ‘atu ‘e ‘Epalahame ko e Pēteliake!
58007005	Pea ko eni, ko kinautolu ‘o e hako ‘o Līvai ‘oku ma‘u ‘a e lakanga fakataula‘eiki, ‘oku ‘i ai ‘enau tu‘utu‘uni fakalao ke to‘o ‘a e vahehongofulu mei he kakai; ‘a ia ko e ma‘u mei honau kāinga, neongo ko e mātu‘aki tupu kinautolu mei he mānava ‘o ‘Epalahame.
58007006	Ka ko e toko taha ‘eni, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘ikai kākunga ke hoko ki he fa‘ahinga ko ia, ka kuo ne to‘o ‘a e ‘inasi hongofulu meia ‘Epalahame; ‘io, pea kuo ne tāpuaki‘i ‘a e toko taha na‘e ‘a‘ana ‘a e ngaahi tala‘ofa.
58007007	Pea tala‘ehai ‘e fa‘a faka‘ikai ki ai, ‘oku tāpuaki‘i ‘a e si‘i ‘e he lahi.
58007008	Kae‘uma‘ā foki, ‘i he me‘a ko eni, ‘oku ma‘u ‘a e ngaahi vahe hongofulu ‘e ha kakai ‘oku mate; ka ‘i he me‘a ko ena, ‘oku ma‘u ‘e ha toko taha ‘a ia ‘oku fakahā‘ia mai ‘oku ne mo‘ui.
58007009	‘Io, tapu mo kimoutolu, ko Līvai foki, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘a‘ana ‘a e ngaahi vahe hongofulu, na‘e fakatukuhau‘i ia ‘ia ‘Epalahame;
58007010	he na‘a ne kei ‘i he mānava ‘o ‘ene kui ‘i he fakafetaulaki kiate ia ‘e Melekiseteki.
58007011	Pea ko eni, ka ne lava ‘a e fakahaohaoa ‘i he fai‘aki ‘a e taula‘eiki faka-Līvai, (he ko ia ia ‘a e me‘a na‘e tu‘unga ki ai ‘a e ma‘u Lao ‘e he kakai ‘Isileli pea koe‘uma‘ā ke fokotu‘u ha taula‘eiki ‘oku fa‘ahinga kehe ‘i he ‘alunga tokua ‘o Melekiseteki, ‘o ‘ikai ‘i he ‘alunga ‘o ‘Ēlone?
58007012	He ko e pehē leva kuo liliu ‘a e taula‘eiki, tā kuo pau ‘oku ‘i ai ‘a e liliu ‘o e lao.
58007013	Ka na‘e fai: he ko e toko taha ‘oku kau ki ai ‘a e lea ko ia, ‘oku ne kau ki ha matakali kehe, ko e matakali kuo te‘eki si‘i ke nofo hanau taha ki he ngāue ‘o e ‘ōlita.
58007014	He ‘oku mātu‘aki mahino kuo tupu hotau ‘Eiki mei ha‘a Siuta, ‘a ia ko e matakali na‘e ‘ikai ha momo‘i lau taula‘eiki mei ai ‘e Mōsese.
58007015	Kae‘uma‘ā ē, ‘oku ‘āsili hā ‘a e me‘a ko ia, ‘o kapau leva ‘oku ‘i he tatau ‘o Melekiseteki ‘a e fokotu‘u ‘o ha taula‘eiki kehe,
58007016	ha toko taha ‘oku ‘ikai te ne hoko pehē mei ha lao ‘oku fakaekakano hono tu‘utu‘uni, ka ‘oku ne hoko ki ai ‘i he ivi ‘o ha mo‘ui ‘oku ta‘emavete:
58007017	he ‘oku fakahā mai ia ‘o pehē, Ko e taula‘eiki koe ‘o ta‘engata ‘i he ‘alunga ‘o Melekiseteki.
58007018	‘Āua, he ‘oku hoko ai ‘a e tāmate‘i ‘o e tu‘utu‘uni ‘oku mu‘omu‘a, koe‘uhi ko hono me‘a na‘e vaivai mo ta‘e‘aonga.
58007019	(He tala‘ehai na‘e ai ha momo‘i me‘a ‘e fakahaohaoa ‘e he Lao) pea ‘oku hoko ai ‘a e fakahū mai, ‘o kanoni ‘aki, ha falala‘anga lelei hake, ‘a ia ‘oku tau fakaofiofi ai ki he ‘Otua.
58007020	Pea ko e me‘a ‘i he ‘ikai hoko ia ta‘eha lea tuki; (he ko kinautolu na‘a nau hoko ‘o taula‘eiki ta‘eha lea tuki;
58007021	ka ka ō mo e hoko ‘a‘ana ha lea tuki, fai ‘e ia na‘e folofola kiate ia ‘o pehē, Kuo lea tuki ‘e he ‘Eiki, pea ‘e ‘ikai te ne liliu, Ko e taula‘eiki koe ‘o ta‘engata).
58007022	Ko ia, ‘oku hoa mo ia ‘a e lelei lahi hake ‘o e fuakava, ‘a ia kuo hoko ‘a Sīsū ko hono Talifaki.
58007023	Kae‘uma‘ā, ko kinautolu na‘e fokotu‘u tokolahi ke taula‘eiki, koe‘uhi ko e ta‘ofi ‘e he mate ‘enau fai ma‘u pē.
58007024	Ka ko e toko taha ni, ko e me‘a ‘i he‘ene tolonga ‘o ta‘engata, ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai liua ‘ene lakanga taula‘eiki.
58007025	Ko ia ai foki ‘oku ne mafai ke fakamo‘ui opeope ‘a kinautolu ‘oku ha‘u ki he ‘Otua ‘iate ia, ko ‘ene mo‘ui ma‘u ai pē ke hufekina kinautolu.
58007026	He na‘e tuha foki mo kitautolu ha Taula‘eiki Lahi ‘oku pehē, ha taha ‘oku mā‘oni‘oni, mo ‘ata‘atā mei he kovi, mo ta‘emele; ha taha kuo mavahe mei he kakai angahala, pea kuo hoko ‘o motu atu ‘i he ngaahi langi.
58007027	Ko e toko taha ‘oku ‘ikai pau ke ne fua ‘atu ma‘ana ‘i he ngaahi ‘aho kotoa pē ha ngaahi feilaulau koe‘uhi ko ha‘ane ngaahi angahala ‘a‘ana, ‘o hangē ko e kau Taula‘eiki Lahi ko ia, pea hili ia ke ne fai ma‘a e kakai; he na‘a ne fai ia ke tātu‘otaha pē, he‘ene ‘oatu ‘e ia ia.
58007028	He ko e Lao, ‘oku ne fokotu‘u ke taula‘eiki ha kau tangata, ha ni‘ihi ma‘u vaivai‘anga; ka ko e folofola ‘o e lea tuki, ‘a ia na‘e hoko ki mui ‘i he Lao, ‘oku fokotu‘u ai ha ‘Alo, ‘a ia kuo ‘osi fakahaohaoa ‘o ta‘engata.
58008001	PEA ko eni, ‘i he ngaahi me‘a ‘oku tau lau ki ai, ko eni pē ‘a e me‘a ‘oku tu‘ukimu‘a: ko e ‘i ai hotau Taula‘eiki Lahi ‘oku pehē fau, he kuo ne nofo hifo mei he to‘omata‘u ‘o e taloni ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘i he ngaahi langi.
58008002	Ko e Faifekau ‘o e Potu Toputapu, mo e Tāpanekale mo‘onia; ‘a ia ne fokotu‘u ‘e he ‘Eiki, ‘o ‘ikai ‘e ha tangata.
58008003	He ‘ilonga ha Taula‘eiki Lahi, kuo fokotu‘u ia ke ‘atu ‘a e ngaahi me‘a‘ofa, mo e ngaahi feilaulau: ko ia ai, kuo pau ke ai ha‘ane me‘a ke ‘atu ‘e he Taula‘eiki Lahi ko eni foki.
58008004	Pea ko eni, ka ne ‘i māmani ia ‘e ‘ikai te ne kākunga ke taula‘eiki, koe‘uhi ‘oku ‘i ai ha ni‘ihi ke ‘atu me‘a‘ofa ‘i he tu‘utu‘uni ‘a e Lao.
58008005	Ka ko e fa‘ahinga ‘oku nau ngāue ki he fakatātā mo e ‘ata ‘o e ngaahi me‘a fakalangi: ‘o hangē ko e na‘ina‘i ‘o Mōsese ‘i he‘ene ene ke fokotu‘u ‘a e Tāpanekale. He na‘e folofola kiate ia ‘o pehē, Tokanga ke ke ngaohi ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘o fakatatau ki he fakatātā‘anga na‘e faka‘ali‘ali kiate koe ‘i he mo‘unga.
58008006	Ka ‘i heni ‘oku ne ma‘u ha lakanga ‘oku hulu atu, ke hoa mo e lelei hake ‘o e fuakava ‘oku ne nofo ko hono Fakalaloa: ‘a ia ko e fuakava kuo tu‘unga ki he ngaahi palōmesi lelei hake.
58008007	He ka ne ta‘emele ‘a e ‘uluaki fuakava ko ia, tala‘ehai ‘e kumi ha potu ke tu‘unga ki ai hano ua.
58008008	He vakai ‘oku ne tala‘i honau mele he‘ene pehē, Ko e folofola ‘eni ‘a e ‘Eiki, Ko eni ‘oku ‘unu mai ha taimi te u fakakakato ai ki ha‘a ‘Isileli mo ha‘a Siuta ha fuakava fo‘ou;
58008009	‘a ia ‘oku ‘ikai hangē ko e fuakava na‘a ku fokotu‘u mu‘a ma‘a ‘enau ngaahi kui, ‘i he ‘aho ko ia na‘a ku pukenima‘i kinautolu ke taki atu mei ‘Isipite; he na‘e ‘ikai te nau nofo ‘i he‘eku fuakava ko ia, pea na‘a ku tuku ‘eku tokanga‘i kinautolu–ko e folofola ia ‘a e ‘Eiki.
58008010	‘Io, ‘oku folofola ‘a e ‘Eiki, he ko eni ia ‘a e fuakava ‘a ia te u fokotu‘u ma‘a ha‘a ‘Isileli hili ‘a e taimi ko ia; Te u ‘ai ‘eku ngaahi lao ki honau ‘atamai, pea te u tohi tongi ia ki honau loto: pea te u nofo au ko honau ‘Otua, pea te nau nofo kinautolu ko hoku kakai.
58008011	Pea tala‘ehai te nau takitaha ako hono kaungā kolo, pe ko hono tokoua, ‘o pehē, Ke ke kumi ke ‘ilo ‘a e ‘Eiki; koe‘uhi te nau lāu‘ilo kotoa pē kiate au mei he iiki ki he lalahi.
58008012	He te u fakamolemole ‘enau ngaahi fai ta‘etotonu; pea ko ‘enau ngaahi angahala ‘e ‘ikai te u toe manatua.
58008013	‘Uē! ko ‘ene pehē leva, Ha Fuakava FO‘OU, tā kuo ne fakaluku ai ‘a e ‘uluaki. Pea ko eni, ko e me‘a kuo kamata luku, pea ‘oku faka‘au‘au hifo, kuo ofi ‘ene mole.
58009001	PEA ko ia, ko e ‘uluaki fuakava foki na‘e ai hono ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni lotu, mo e Fale Tapu ‘o māmani.
58009002	He na‘e fokotu‘u ha Tāpanekale, ‘a ia ko hono ‘uluaki feitu‘u na‘e ‘i ai ‘a e tu‘unga maama, mo e tēpile, mo e fokotu‘unga mā: ko e feitu‘u Tāpanekale ia ‘oku ui ko e Potu Tapu.
58009003	Pea ‘i he tuku mai hono ua ‘o e tatau, na‘e ‘i ai ‘a e feitu‘u Tāpanekale ‘oku ui ko e Potu Toputapu.
58009004	‘A ia ‘oku kau ai ‘a e ‘ōlita tutu‘anga ‘inisēnisi, ‘a ia na‘e koula, mo e ‘a‘ake ‘o e kovinānite, ‘a ia na‘e ‘ufi‘ufi koula hono feitu‘u kotoa pē, ‘a ia na‘e ‘i ai ‘a e ‘ainga mana na‘e koula, mo e tokotoko ‘o ‘Ēlone, ‘a ia na‘e muka mai, mo e ongo maka tohi‘anga fuakava.
58009005	Pea na‘e tu‘u ‘i ‘olunga ‘a e ongo Selupimi ‘o e Sikaina na‘e fakamalumalu ‘a e hōifua‘anga–ka ko e ngaahi me‘a ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai ke lava ke lea fakafo‘ime‘a ki ai ‘i he taimi ni.
58009006	Pea ko eni, kuo fokotu‘u leva ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia, na‘e hū ‘a e kau taula‘eiki ki he ‘uluaki feitu‘u Tāpanekale ‘i he taimi kotoa pē, he fai ‘o e ngaahi ngāue fakalotu.
58009007	Ka ko hono ua na‘e tu‘o taha pē ‘i he ta‘u, pea fai ‘e he Taula‘eiki Lahi toko taha pē; pea na‘a mo ia na‘e ‘ikai te ne hū ‘o ta‘e te ne ‘alu mo ia ha toto, ‘a ia na‘a ne ‘atu koe‘uhi ko ia, pea koe‘uhi ko e ngaahi faivale ‘a e kakai:
58009008	ko e fakamahino mei ai ‘e he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni ‘a e me‘a ni, Kuo te‘eki ke fakae‘a ‘a e hala ki he Potu Toputapu, lolotonga ‘oku kei ‘i ai ‘a e ‘uluaki feitu‘u Tāpanekale.
58009009	‘A ia ko e fakatātā ki he kuonga ‘oku lolotonga ni, pea hangē ko ia ‘oku lolotonga ‘atu ‘a e ngaahi me‘a‘ofa mo e ngaahi feilaulau, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘anau mafai ke fakahaohaoa fakakonisēnisi ‘a ia ‘oku lotu ‘aki ia.
58009010	Ko e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ō pē mo e ngaahi tō‘onga kai mo inu, mo e ngaahi papitaiso kehekehe, ko e koto tu‘utu‘uni fakakakano pē, ne hilifaki mai ke ‘Oua ke hoko ‘a e kuonga ‘o e Fakafo‘ou.
58009011	Ka ‘i he a‘u mai ‘a Kalaisi, ko e Taula‘eiki Lahi ‘o e ngaahi lelei ka hoko ni, na‘a ne fou atu ‘i he Tāpanekale lahi mo haohaoa ange ko ē, ‘a ia ne ‘ikai ngaohi ‘e he nima, ‘e ia ko e pehē na‘e ‘ikai ‘o e ‘ūnivēsi ko eni,
58009012	‘uma‘ā ha‘ane ‘alu ‘aki ‘a e toto ‘o e kosi mo e kafi, ka ‘aki hono ta‘ata‘a ‘o‘ona pē, ‘o ne hū ai ke tātu‘otaha ki he Potu Toputapu na, ‘o ne lava‘i ai ha huhu‘i ta‘engata.
58009013	He kapau ā na‘e lava ‘e he toto ‘o e fanga kosi mo e fanga pulu mo e efuefu ‘o ha pulu fefine, ‘i hono luluku ‘aki ‘a e kakai kuo ta‘ema‘a–kapau na‘e lava ‘e ia ke fakama‘a ‘a e kakano.
58009014	Huanoa ‘a e ta‘ata‘a ‘o Kalaisi, ‘a ia na‘a ne ‘oatu ‘e ia ia ta‘ehano mele ki he ‘Otua, fai ‘e ha laumālie laui ‘ītāniti–huanoa ‘ene fakama‘a ‘e he ta‘ata‘a ko ia hotau konisēnisi mei he ngaahi ngāue mate, ke tau tauhi ‘a e ‘Otua ‘oku mo‘ui.
58009015	Pea ko hono ‘uhinga ia ‘oku ne nofo ko e Fakalaloa ‘o e Fuakava Fo‘ou: koe‘uhi ‘i he fai ‘o ha mate mo‘o huhu‘i ‘o e ngaahi angahala ne hoko lolotonga ‘a e ‘uluaki fuakava, kae toki ma‘u ‘e kinautolu kuo ui ‘a e palōmesi, ko e tofi‘a ta‘engata.
58009016	He ka ai ha fuakava kuo fai, kuo pau ke kau ai ‘a e mate ‘o ia ne ne fai ia.
58009017	He ‘oku mamafa ha fuakava ‘oka ō mo e mate ha ni‘ihi: he ‘anefē ia ha ma‘u ha fuakava, ka ‘oku mo‘ui ‘a ia na‘a ne fai?
58009018	Ko ia ai, na‘a mo e ‘uluaki fuakava na‘e ‘ikai fokotu‘u ta‘eha toto.
58009019	He hili hono lea‘aki ‘e Mōsese ‘a e tu‘utu‘uni takitaha, ‘o fakatatau ki he Lao, ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e kakai kotoa pē; na‘a ne to‘o ‘a e toto ‘o e fanga kafi mo e fanga kosi, mo e vai, mo e fulufulu‘i sipi kula, mo e va‘a ‘īsope, ‘o ne luluku ‘aki ia ‘a e tohi foki, mo e kakai kotoa pē,
58009020	‘o ne pehē, Ko eni ‘a e toto ‘o e fuakava, ‘a ia kuo tu‘utu‘uni ma‘amoutolu ‘e he ‘Otua.
58009021	Kae‘uma‘ā na‘a ne luluku pehē foki ‘a e Tāpanekale, mo e nāunau kotoa ‘o e lotu, ‘aki ‘a e toto:
58009022	‘io, ‘i he tu‘utu‘uni ‘a e Lao ‘oku ‘ikai mei ai ha me‘a ka ‘oku fakama‘a ‘aki ‘a e toto: pea ka ‘ikai ha lilingi toto, ‘oku ‘ikai ha fakamolemole.
58009023	‘Āua, tā na‘e pau ke fakama‘a ‘aki ‘a e ngaahi me‘a pehē ‘a e ngaahi fakatātā ‘o e ngaahi me‘a ‘i he langi; ka ke fai‘aki ha feilaulau lelei hake ‘i hena ki he ngaahi me‘a tonu fakalangi.
58009024	He tala‘ehai kuo hū ‘a Kalaisi ki he Potu Toputapu ne ngaohi ‘e he nima, ko e fakatātā pē ‘o e mo‘onia, ka ki he langi tonu, ke fakahā ni ia ki he fofonga ‘o e ‘Otua ma‘atautolu.
58009025	Kae‘uma‘ā na‘e ‘ikai te ne hū ke ne ‘oatu tu‘o lahi ia, ‘o hangē ko e hū ‘a e kau Taula‘eiki Lahi ki he Potu Toputapu ‘i he ta‘u kotoa pē ‘aki ha toto kehe.
58009026	He ka ne pehē, pea tā ne pau ke to‘o lahi hono feia talu e tanu pou ‘o māmani: ka ‘i hono anga ko eni, kuo tātu‘otaha ‘ene hā ‘i he faka‘osi ‘o e ngaahi kuonga, ke tāmate‘i ‘a e angahala ‘aki ‘ene feilaulau ‘a‘ana.
58009027	Pea hangē kuo tu‘utu‘uni ki he kakai ke mate tātu‘otaha pē, pea hili ia ko e fakamaau pē;
58009028	pehē foki mo e Mīsaia, ko e me‘a ‘i hono ‘oatu tātu‘otaha ke fua ‘a e angahala ‘o e tokolahi, ko ia te ne toe hā, ta‘eha angahala, ki he kakai ‘oku nofo‘aki tali kiate ia, mo‘onau fakamo‘ui.
58010001	HE ko e me‘a ‘i he ma‘u ‘e he Lao ‘a e ‘ata pē ‘o e ngaahi lelei ka hoko, ‘o ‘ikai ko e ‘īmisi totonu ‘o e ngaahi me‘a, ko ia ‘i he fai hokohoko ta‘u ‘aki ‘a e ngaahi feilaulau pē ko ia, ‘a ia ‘oku nau ‘atu ‘o ‘ikai ngata, ‘oku ‘ikai te nau momo‘i lava ke fakahaohaoa ai ‘a e kakai ‘oku ha‘u ki he ‘Otua.
58010002	He ka ne pehē, ‘ikai ‘e tuku hono ‘atu? koe‘uhi ko e ‘ikai ke kei ongo‘i ha angahala ‘e he kakai ‘oku lotu ‘aki ia, ‘o kapau kuo ‘osi ‘a fakama‘a kinautolu.
58010003	Ka ‘i he fai ‘o e ngaahi feilaulau ko ia, ‘oku ‘i ai ha fakamanatu angahala ‘i he ta‘u kotoa pē.
58010004	Seuke, he ‘oku ‘ikai malava ke ‘ave angahala ‘e he toto ‘o e fanga pulu mo e fanga kosi.
58010005	Ko ia ai, ‘i he hoko ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio ki māmani, ‘oku ne me‘a, Na‘e ‘ikai te ke tangi ki ha feilaulau pe ha foaki, Ka kuo ke teuteu ha sino mo‘oku:
58010006	Ko e ngaahi feilaulau li‘aki, Mo e ngaahi feilaulau he angahala na‘e ‘ikai te ke hōhō‘ia ai.
58010007	Pea u toki pehē, Ko eni kuo u ha‘u (‘I he takainga tohi kuo tohi kia au) Ke fai ho‘o tu‘utu‘uni, ‘e ‘Otua.
58010008	Na‘a ne pehē ‘anenai, Ko e ngaahi feilaulau, mo e ngaahi foaki, mo e ngaahi feilaulau li‘aki, mo e ngaahi feilaulau he angahala, na‘e ‘ikai te ke tangi ki ai, ‘uma‘ā ha‘o hōhō‘ia ai, ‘a e ngaahi fa‘ahinga me‘a ‘oku ‘atu ‘i he tu‘utu‘uni fakalao.
58010009	Ka ‘oku ne pehē ‘eni, Ko eni kuo u ha‘u ke fai ho‘o tu‘utu‘uni. Tā ‘oku ne ‘ave ‘a e ‘uluaki koe‘uhi ke ne fokotu‘u ‘a hono ua.
58010010	Pea ‘i he tu‘utu‘uni ko ia kuo ‘osi tapui kitautolu, ko e me‘a ‘i he ‘oatu ‘o e sino ‘o Kalaisi ke tātu‘otaha pē.
58010011	Pea ‘ilonga ha taula‘eiki, ‘oku ne tu‘u ‘o hokohoko ‘aho pē he fai ‘ene ngāue, ‘io, he ‘atu tātu‘olahi ‘a e ngaahi feilaulau tatau ai pē, ‘a ia ko e ngaahi feilaulau ‘e ‘ikai si‘i lava ‘i ha taimi ke ‘ave ‘aupito ‘a e angahala.
58010012	Ka ko e Toko Taha ni, hili ‘ene ‘atu koe‘uhi ko e angahala ha fo‘i feilaulau tofu pē taha ‘o ta‘engata, na‘a ne nofo hifo mei he to‘omata‘u ‘o e ‘Otua.
58010013	Pea tālunga ia mo ‘ene nofo‘aki tali kae‘oua ke ngaohi hono ngaahi fili ko hono tu‘unga va‘e.
58010014	He ‘i he ‘oatu feilaulau tātu‘otaha ko ia, kuo ne fakahaohaoa ‘o ta‘engata ‘a kinautolu kuo tapui.
58010015	Kae‘uma‘ā ‘oku fakahā ia kiate kimautolu ‘e he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni foki:
58010016	he hili ‘ene pehē ‘Oku folofola ‘a e ‘Eiki, Ko eni ia ‘a e fuakava te u fai ma‘anautolu hili ‘a e taimi ko ia, Te u ‘ai ‘eku ngaahi lao ki honau loto, pea te u tohi tongi ia ‘i honau ‘atamai; hili ia ‘oku ne toki pehē,
58010017	Pea ko ‘enau ngaahi angahala, pea mo ‘enau ngaahi maumau lao, ‘e ‘ikai te u toe manatua.
58010018	Pea ka ai leva ha fakamolemole ‘o e ngaahi me‘a ko ia, pea ‘oku ‘ikai ā ha toe ‘atu feilaulau koe‘uhi ko e angahala.
58010019	Ko ia, kāinga, ko e me‘a ‘i he‘etau ma‘u ‘a e lotolahi ‘i he ta‘ata‘a ‘o Sīsū, ke hū ki he Potu Toputapu;
58010020	‘i he hala fo‘ou mo mo‘ui ne ne tofa mo‘otautolu, he‘ene ‘asi atu ‘i he tatau, ‘a ia ko hono kakano;
58010021	pea ‘i he‘etau ma‘u ha taula‘eiki ‘oku fungani, ‘a ia ‘oku pule ki he ‘api ‘o e ‘Otua;
58010022	ko ia ke tau ‘unu‘unu atu mo e loto mo‘oni, kuo ma‘uma‘uluta ‘etau tui, kuo luluku hotau loto ‘o fakama‘a mei he konisēnisi kovi, pea kuo pālutu hotau sino ‘i he vai fakama‘a.
58010023	Ke tau kuku ma‘u, ta‘engaue, ‘a e fai fakahā ‘o ‘etau fakatu‘amelie, (seuke, ko ia na‘a ne tala ‘a e ngaahi palōmesi ko e toko taha ‘oku fai ki he‘ene lea).
58010024	Pea ke tau fetokanga‘aki, ke fefaka‘ai‘ai‘aki ‘a kitautolu ki he fe‘ofa‘aki mo e ngāue lelei:
58010025	‘o ‘oua na‘a tau li‘aki ‘etau ngaahi fakataha, ‘o hangē ko e anga ‘o e ni‘ihi; ka mou feenginaki‘aki, pea ‘āsili he ‘oku mou sio ki he fakaofiofi mai ‘a e ‘aho.
58010026	He kapau ‘oku tau angahala fie angahala hili ‘etau ‘ilo kānokano ki he mo‘oni, ‘oku ‘ikai kei toe ha feilaulau koe‘uhi ko e angahala.
58010027	Ka ‘oku toe pē ‘ete nofo‘aki tali ilifia ki he fakamaau, pea ‘oku toe pē ‘a e fua‘a ‘a ha afi, ‘a ia te ne keina ‘a e kakai ‘oku angatu‘u.
58010028	Ka ta‘etoka‘i ‘e ha taha ‘a e lao ‘a Mōsese, na‘e ‘ikai felave ha ‘ofa; ka ‘oka ai ha fakamo‘oni ‘e toko ua, pe toko tolu, ‘oku ne mate tāmate‘i.
58010029	Mou faka‘uta ki he kovi ange ‘ānoa ‘o e tautea ‘e lau ‘oku tuha mo ia kuo ne mala ‘i he ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otua, pea kuo ne lau ‘a e ta‘ata‘a fuakava ko e me‘a noa pē, ‘a e ta‘ata‘a ne fakatāpui ai ia, pea kuo ne pā‘usi‘i ‘a e Laumālie ‘oku mei ai ‘ete kelesi!
58010030	He ‘oku tau ‘ilo ‘a e anga ‘o e Toko Taha ko ia ‘oku ne pehē, ‘Oku ‘a‘aku ‘a e sauni, Ko au te u ‘atu hono tuha– Ko e folofola ē ‘a Sihova. Mo ne toe pehē ‘E fakamaau ‘e he ‘Eiki hono kakai.
58010031	‘Ē, ko e me‘a fakailifia ke te tō ki he nima ‘o e ‘Otua ‘oku Mo‘ui.
58010032	Ka mou fakamanatu hake ‘a e ngaahi ‘aho mu‘a, ‘a ia, hili homou fakamaama, na‘a mou fai kītaki pē ‘a e fu‘u fefa‘uhi, ‘a ia ko e koto fakamamahi pē.
58010033	Ko e me‘a ni‘ihi ‘i he fakatakataka ‘aki kimoutolu he ngaahi manuki mo e fakatanga; pea ko e me‘a ni‘ihi ‘i ho‘omou hoko ‘o kaungāme‘a mo kinautolu na‘e mo‘ui ‘aki ‘a e me‘a ko ia.
58010034	He na‘e ‘ikai ngata pē ‘i ho‘omou kaungā mamahi mo kinautolu na‘e nofo pilīsone; ka na‘a mou tali fiefia foki ‘a e fa‘aoa ‘o ho‘omou nga‘oto‘ota, ko ho‘omou ‘ilo ‘oku ‘i ai ha‘amou koloa ‘oku lelei hake pea tolonga.
58010035	Ko ia, ‘oua te mou li‘aki ho‘omou lotolahi; he ko e me‘a ia ‘oku lahi hono fakakoloa, he ‘oku tuha mo kimoutolu ‘a e kītaki;
58010036	koe‘uhi ke mou fai ke ‘osi ‘a e finangalo ‘o e ‘Otua, ‘o mou lava‘i ‘a e tala‘ofa.
58010037	He ‘oku toe pē ha ki‘i momo‘i taimi, pea ha‘u ‘a Tu‘unukumai; ‘io, ‘e ‘ikai te ne fakatotoka.
58010038	Ka ko e tangata mā‘oni‘oni ‘a‘aku, te ne mo‘ui ‘i he tui: ka ‘o kapau te ne holomui, ‘e ‘ikai hōifua hoku laumālie ‘iate ia.
58010039	Ka ko kitaua ‘oku ‘ikai ko e ha‘a holomui ‘oku tō ki mala, ka ko e ha‘a tui ai pē ke ma‘u mai hota laumālie.
58011001	PEA ko eni, ko e anga ‘o tui, ‘oku ne fakasino ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ‘amanekina, ‘oku ne mafakamo‘oni ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ‘ikai hā.
58011002	He vakai, ko eni ia ‘a e me‘a na‘e ma‘u ai ‘e he kau Mātu‘a ‘enau ongoongolelei.
58011003	Ko tui ‘oku tau ‘utangi ai, ne langa ‘a e ngaahi ‘ūnivēsi ‘e he folofola ‘a e ‘Otua; ‘o pehē, kuo ‘ikai tupu ‘a e me‘a ‘oku tau sio ki ai mei ha ngaahi me‘a ‘oku hā.
58011004	Ko tui na‘e ‘atu ki he ‘Otua ‘e ‘Ēpeli ha feilaulau, ‘o lelei hake ‘i ha‘a Keini; ‘io, ko ia ia na‘e fakamo‘oni ai ma‘ana ‘oku ne mā‘oni‘oni he na‘e fakamo‘oni ‘e he ‘Otua ‘i he funga ‘o e ngaahi me‘a na‘a ne ‘omi: pea ko ia ia ‘oku ne kei lea ai, neongo kuo pekia.
58011005	Ko tui na‘e hiki ai ‘a ‘Īnoke, ke ‘oua te ne mamata ki he mate; pea na‘e ‘ikai ‘iloa, koe‘uhi kuo hiki ia ‘e he ‘Otua: he ‘i he te‘eki ke hiki ia ne fakamo‘oni ma‘ana, kuo ne fakahōifua ‘a e ‘Otua.
58011006	Ka ‘oka ta‘ekau ‘a e tui, ‘oku ‘ikai momo‘i lava ha‘ate fakahōifua ia: he ko ia ‘oku ‘unu‘unu ki he ‘Otua, kuo pau ‘oku ne tui ‘oku ‘i ai ia, pea te ne hanga ‘o totongi kiate kinautolu ‘oku kumi hakili kiate ia.
58011007	Ko tui na‘e ngāue ai ‘a Noa, ‘i hono valokia ki ha ngaahi me‘a kuo te‘eki hā mai; pea ‘i he‘ene manavahē ki ai, na‘a ne fa‘u ‘a e ‘A‘ake mo‘o fakamo‘ui hono ‘api: ‘io, ko ia ia na‘a ne fakahalaia ai ‘a māmani, ‘o ne hoko ko e ‘ea ki he mā‘oni‘oni fakatui.
58011008	Ko tui na‘e talangofua ai ‘a ‘Epalahame ‘i hono ui, ‘o ne ‘alu atu mei hono fonua ki ha potu te ne toki ma‘u mōno tofi‘a; ‘io, na‘a ne ‘alu atu, ‘o ‘ikai te ne ‘ilo pe ko ‘ene ‘alu ki fē.
58011009	Ko tui na‘a ne hanga ‘o ‘āunofo ai ki he Fonua ‘o e Tala‘ofa, ‘o hangē ko e nofo muli; ‘o ne fale ‘aki ‘a e tēniti pē, fakataha mo ‘Aisake mo Sēkope, ‘a ia na‘a nau kaungā‘ea ki he tala‘ofa ko ia.
58011010	He na‘a ne nofo ‘amanaki ki he kolo ‘oku ‘o‘ona ‘a e ngaahi tu‘unga, ‘a ia ko hono fakafuofua mo hono tufunga lahi ko e ‘Otua.
58011011	Ko tui na‘e ma‘u mālohi ai ‘a Sela foki ke tu‘itu‘ia, ‘io, neongo kuo ne tauhili mo e taimi ko ia, ko e me‘a ‘i he‘ene lau ko e toko taha ia ‘oku fai ki he‘ene lea ‘a ia kuo ne tala‘ofa.
58011012	Ko ia ai, foki na‘e tupu mei ha toko taha, pea na‘a mo ia ko e koto mate pē, ‘io, na‘e tupu meiate ia ha kakai ke hangē ko e fetu‘u ‘o e langi hono tokolahi, pea hangē ko e ‘one‘one ‘i he matātahi ‘a ia ‘oku ‘ikai malau.
58011013	Ko kinautolu ni kotoa pē na‘a nau pekia tui pē, kuo ‘ikai te nau lava‘i ‘a e ngaahi tala‘ofa; ka kuo nau sio ki ai mei he mama‘o, pea kuo nau fetapa ki ai, pea kuo nau fakahā, ko e ‘āunofo mo e muli kinautolu ‘i māmani.
58011014	He ka pehē ha lea ‘a ha ni‘ihi, ‘oku hā mahino mei ai ‘oku nau ha‘ao hanau fonua tonu.
58011015	Seuke, ka ne nau manatu ki he fonua ko ia na‘a nau ha‘u mei ai, na‘a nau ma‘u ai pē ha faingamālie ke nau foki.
58011016	Ka ‘i hono anga ko eni, ko e fonua lelei hake ‘oku nau holi ki ai, ko hono ‘uhinga ko e fonua fakalangi: ko ia, ‘oku ‘ikai maa‘i kinautolu ‘e he ‘Otua ke ui ia ko honau ‘Otua, he na‘a ne teuteu mo‘onautolu ha kolo.
58011017	Ko tui ne feilaulau ‘aki ai ‘e ‘Epalahame ‘a ‘Aisake ‘i hono ‘ahi‘ahi na‘e fai; ‘io, ko ia kuo ne tali ‘a e ngaahi tala‘ofa na‘e kamata ‘e ia ke feia hono foha tofu pē taha;
58011018	‘io, ‘e ia na‘e folofola ki ai, ‘E ngata ‘ia ‘Aisake ‘a e lau ko ho hako.
58011019	He na‘a ne pehē, Na‘a mo e pekia, ka ‘oku mafai ‘e he ‘Otua ke fokotu‘u mei ai; ‘io, na‘a ne toe ma‘u foki ia mei ai ‘i he lau fakatātā.
58011020	Ko tui ne tāpuaki ai ‘e ‘Aisake ‘a Sēkope mo ‘Īsoa, ‘o ne lau ki he ngaahi me‘a kaha‘u foki.
58011021	Ko tui na‘e tāpuaki‘i ai ‘e Sēkope ‘a e ongo foha ‘o Siosifa tāutaha, ‘i he‘ene teu pekia, pea ne hūfaki ki hono ‘ulu‘i tokotoko.
58011022	Ko tui na‘e lau ai ‘e Siosifa ki he ‘Ekisoto ‘a ha‘a ‘Isileli, ‘i he‘ene teu pekia, ‘o ne fai tu‘utu‘uni ki hono ‘anga‘anga.
58011023	Ko tui na‘e fufū ai ‘a Mōsese ‘e he‘ene mātu‘a ‘i hono fanau‘i, ‘o māhina tolu, koe‘uhi na‘a na vakai ko e tama faka‘ofo‘ofa ia; ‘io, na‘e ‘ikai te na manavahē ki he fekau ‘a e tu‘i.
58011024	Ko tui na‘e fakatale‘i ai ‘e Mōsese ‘i he‘ene tangata hono lau ko e tama ‘a e ‘ōfefine ‘o Felo;
58011025	he‘ene fili mu‘a ke kaungā ngaohikovia mo e kakai ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘i ha‘ane ma‘u fakataimi pē ha mālie tu‘u he angahala;
58011026	he na‘a ne lau ‘a e manuki‘i ‘o Kalaisi ko e koloa na‘e hulu atu ‘i he ngaahi fokotu‘unga koloa ‘o ‘Isipite: he na‘a ne sio fakamama‘u atu ki he totongi.
58011027	Ko tui na‘a ne li‘aki ai ‘a ‘Isipite, ‘o ‘ikai te ne manavahē ki he tuputāmaki ‘a e tu‘i: he na‘a ne kītaki he‘ene sio ki he Tu‘i Ta‘ehāmai.
58011028	Ko tui na‘a ne fai ai ‘a e Pāsova mo e afuhi ‘aki ‘a e toto, koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a ala kiate kinautolu ‘e ia ‘oku faka‘auha ‘a e ngaahi ‘uluaki.
58011029	Ko tui na‘a nau ‘asi atu ai ‘i he Tahi Kulokula, ‘o hangē ko e ‘alu ‘i he mōmoa; ‘a ia ‘i he ‘ahi‘ahi ki ai ‘e he kakai ‘Isipite na‘e fōngia ai kinautolu.
58011030	Ko tui na‘e holo ai ‘a e ngaahi ‘ā ‘o Sielikō, ‘i he hili hono ‘alu takai‘i ‘o ‘aho fitu.
58011031	Ko tui na‘e ‘ikai ‘auha ai ‘a Lēhapi fe‘auaki, fakataha mo e kau talangata‘a; he kuo ne tali lelei ‘a e ongo mataki.
58011032	Pea ko ‘eku toe lea atu ke hā? he ‘oku si‘i ‘a e taimi ke fakamatala kia Kitione mo Pēlaki mo Samisoni mo Sēfita, kia Tēvita foki mo Sāmiuela mo e kau palōfita;
58011033	‘a e fa‘ahinga, ‘a ia ‘i he fai‘aki ‘o tui na‘a nau ikuna ‘a e ngaahi pule‘anga, na‘a nau feia e mā‘oni‘oni, na‘a nau lava‘i ‘a e ngaahi tala‘ofa, na‘a nau tāpuni ‘a e ngutu ‘o e fanga laione,
58011034	na‘a nau tāmate‘i ‘a e mālohi ‘o e afi, na‘a nau hao mei he mata ‘o e heletā, na‘e fakaake mālohi mei he vavai, na‘a nau hoko ‘o to‘a ‘i he tau, na‘a nau tulia ‘a e ngaahi matatau ‘o e muli.
58011035	Ma‘u ai ‘eni fafine honau pekia kuo toetu‘u; ka ka fakamamahi‘i ‘a e tu‘unga me‘a ni‘ihi, ‘o ‘ikai te nau fie tali ‘a e lau fakahaofi, koe‘uhi ke nau lava‘i ‘a e toetu‘u lelei hake.
58011036	Pea na‘e ‘ahi‘ahi‘i ‘aki ha ni‘ihi ‘a e ngaahi manuki fakamamahi, mo e haha, kae‘uma‘ā ‘a e nofo ha‘isia mo e pilīsone.
58011037	Na‘e tolomaka‘i ha ni‘ihi, na‘e kilisi ua, na‘e fakapoongi heletaa‘i; na‘a nau hēhētu‘u, ‘o kofu kili‘i sipi mo kili‘i kosi, he kuo nau masiva mo fakatanga‘i mo ngaohikovia;
58011038	(ka ko e fa‘ahinga na‘e ‘ikai ke taau mo kinautolu ‘a e maama ko eni) na‘a nau nofo holo ‘i he ngaahi toafa mo e ngaahi mo‘unga mo e ngaahi ‘ana ‘o e fonua.
58011039	‘Io, ko kinautolu ni, neongo na‘a nau ma‘u kotoa pē ha ongoongolelei ‘i he‘enau tui, ka na‘e ‘ikai te nau lava‘i ‘a e Tala‘ofa:
58011040	koe‘uhi kuo tokonaki ‘e he ‘Otua ha me‘a lelei hake ma‘atautolu, pea koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a fakahaohaoa ‘a kinautolu ta‘e te tau kau ai.
58012001	‘AUA, pea ko e me‘a ‘i he kāpui ‘a kitautolu ‘e ha ‘ao kau fakamo‘oni ‘oku fu‘u pehē fau, ko ia ke tau hu‘ihu‘i ‘a e fakamamafa kotoa pē, mo e angahala ‘oku tau mo‘uangofua ki ai, pea tau kītaki atu ‘etau lele he fakapuepue kuo tala humaki mai kiate kitautolu;
58012002	‘o tau sio fakamama‘u atu ki he Takimu‘a ‘i he tui mo hono Fakaa‘u, ‘io, ‘a Sīsū; ‘a ia, ko e me‘a ke ne ma‘u ‘a e fiefia na‘e tala humaki kiate ia, ko ia na‘a ne kātaki ‘a e mate kalusefai, na‘e ‘ikai te ne toka‘i hono fakamaa‘i, pea kuo ne nofo hifo foki mei he to‘omata‘u ‘o e taloni ‘o e ‘Otua.
58012003	Seuke, mou fua kimoutolu mo e Toko Taha na‘a ne kātaki ‘a e fu‘u angatu‘u pehē fau ko ia ‘a e koto angahala kiate kinautolu, telia na‘a mou mafasia he po‘epo‘ea homou laumālie.
58012004	Kuo te‘eki ke mou talitu‘u ke toto ‘i ho‘omou fuhu mo e angahala.
58012005	Pea kuo ngalo ‘aupito ‘iate kimoutolu ‘a e enginaki ‘a ia ‘oku ne lea kiate kimoutolu ‘o hangē ha fānau, Si‘oku foha, ‘oua te ke ta‘etokanga‘i ‘a e kini ‘oku fai ‘e he ‘Eiki, ‘uma‘ā ha‘o vaivai ‘i ho valoki‘i ‘e ia.
58012006	He ko ia ia ‘oku ‘ofa ki ai ‘a e ‘Eiki, ‘a ia ‘oku ne kinisi; ‘io, ‘oku ne taa‘i ‘a e foha takitaha ‘oku ne ma‘u.
58012007	Ko homou kinisi ia ‘oku mou kātaki na: ko e ngaohi ‘o e fānau ia ‘oku fai ‘e he ‘Otua kiate kimoutolu; he ko e fe‘ia ha foha ‘a ia ‘oku ‘ikai ke kinisi ‘e he‘ene tamai?
58012008	He kapau leva ‘oku mou ‘ata‘atā mei he kinisi, ‘a ia kuo ‘inasi ai kotoa pē, pea tā ko e koto tupu fe‘auaki kimoutolu, pea ‘oku ‘ikai ko e fānau.
58012009	Kae‘uma‘ā, na‘a tau ma‘u mu‘a ke kinisi kitautolu ‘a e ngaahi tamai ‘a hotau kakano, pea na‘a tau faka‘apa‘apa ki ai; hono ‘ikai taau ange noa pē ‘etau anganofo ki he Tamai ‘a e ngaahi laumālie, ka tau mo‘ui?
58012010	‘Io, ko e fa‘ahinga ko ē foki na‘a nau kinisi kitautolu ‘o ‘aho si‘i pē, ‘o fakatatau ki he me‘a na‘e hā lelei kiate kinautolu; ka ko e toko taha ko ē, ko e fai ke ‘aonga mo‘oni, koe‘uhiā ke tau kau ‘i he mā‘oni‘oni ‘a‘ana.
58012011	Pea ko eni, ka fai ha kinisi, tala‘ehai ‘oku tau ongo‘i leva ko e me‘a fakafiefia ia, kaekehe, ko e me‘a fakamamahi; ka ‘e faifai pea tupu ai kiate kinautolu kuo ‘osi ‘a ako ai, ha fua ‘oku hoa mo e melino, ko e koto mā‘oni‘oni.
58012012	Ko ia, mou ‘ai ke mafao ‘a e ngaahi nima ‘oku tāupe, mo e ngaahi tui ‘oku mate;
58012013	pea tofa ‘aki homou topuva‘e ha ngaahi ‘alunga totonu, koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a fasi ‘a si‘i ketu, kaekehe ke ne mo‘ui.
58012014	Tuli ke mou melino mo e kakai kotoa pē; pea ki he mā‘oni‘oni, ‘a ia ka ‘ikai ma‘u, ‘e ‘ikai mamata ‘e ha taha ki he ‘Eiki.
58012015	‘O mou vakavakai lelei, na‘a ai ha taha kuo ne kamata fakatōtōmui mei he kelesi ‘a e ‘Otua; ‘io, na‘a ai ha aka kona ‘oku tupu hake ‘o fakafiu‘i kimoutolu, pea pihia ai hono kotoa;
58012016	‘io, na‘a ‘oku ‘i ai ha taha fe‘auaki, pe ha taha ‘oku fakaetangata pē, hangē ko ‘Īsoa, ‘a ia na‘a ne fakatau ki ha fo‘i me‘akai pē taha ‘a e tu‘unga hoko na‘e ‘o‘ona.
58012017	He ‘oku mou ‘ilo, ‘i he faifai pea ne loto mo ia foki ke tō ma‘ana ‘a e tāpuaki, ka na‘e li‘aki pē; ‘io, na‘e ‘ikai te ne ‘ilo ha ava ki he‘ene fakamatala, neongo na‘a ne kumi hakili ki ai, mo tangi lo‘imata.
58012018	He tala‘ehai kuo mou ‘unu‘unu ki he me‘a ‘oku faa‘i, mo e afi kuo tutu, pe ki he loa mo e fakapo‘uli mo e afā, pe ki he le‘o ‘o e talupite mo e ongo mai ha ngaahi fo‘i folofola;
58012019	‘a ia ‘i he fanongo ki ai ‘a e kakai na‘a nau fakafisi, ke ‘oua na‘a toe fai ha lea kiate kinautolu:
58012020	he na‘e ‘ikai te nau kātaki ‘a e me‘a na‘e tu‘utu‘uni, pea neongo ko ha manu pē ‘e lave ki he mo‘unga, ka ‘e tolomaka‘i.
58012021	‘Io, na‘e pehē hono fakailifia ‘o e me‘a na‘e hā, ko ia na‘e pehē ai ‘e Mōsese, ‘Oku ou manavahē ‘aupito mo tetetete.
58012022	Ka kuo mou ‘unu‘unu ki he mo‘unga ko Saione, mo e kolo ‘o e ‘Otua Mo‘ui ko Selusalema fakalangi, pea ki he ngaahi toko mano ‘āngelo.
58012023	Ko e kātoanga mo fakataha ‘o e ngaahi ‘uluaki foha kuo tohi ‘i langi, pea ki he ‘Otua ko e Fakamaau ‘o e kakai kotoa pē, pea ki he ngaahi laumālie ‘o e kau angatonu kuo fakahaohaoa.
58012024	Pea kia Sīsū ko e Fakalaloa ‘o e Fuakava Fo‘ou, pea ki he ta‘ata‘a luluku, ‘a ia ‘oku ne lea ‘o lelei hake ‘ia ‘Ēpeli.
58012025	‘Ē, vakai ke ‘oua te mou fakafisi ‘a e toko taha ‘oku lea ni. He kapau na‘e ‘ikai hao ‘e kinautolu, he‘enau fakafisi kiate ia na‘e folofola mai ‘i māmani, huanoa kitaua, ‘o kapau te ta fulitu‘a kiate ia ‘oku folofola mei langi:
58012026	‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio na‘e lulu‘i ‘e hono le‘o ‘a māmani ‘i he taimi ko ia, ka ‘i he taimi ni kuo ne tala‘ofa ‘o pehē, ‘Oku toe tu‘o taha pē ‘eku lulu, ‘a ia ‘e ‘ikai fai ki māmani pē, ka ki he langi foki.
58012027	Pea ko eni ko e lea ko ia, ‘Oku toe tu‘o taha pē, ‘oku ne fakahā ‘a e ‘ave ‘o e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku lulu‘i, he ko e ngaahi me‘a kuo ngaohi; koe‘uhiā ke tu‘u ai pē ‘a e ngaahi me‘a mata‘elulu‘i.
58012028	Ko ia ko e me‘a ‘i he‘etau ma‘u ha pule‘anga, ‘a ia ‘e ‘ikai fa‘a lulu‘i, ke tau fakafeta‘i mu‘a, pea ke tau fai ai ki he ‘Otua ha ngāue te ne hōhō‘ia ai, fai mo e faka‘apa‘apa mo e manavahē,
58012029	he ko hotau ‘Otua ko e afi faka‘auha.
58013001	KE tu‘u ma‘u ho‘omou fe‘ofa‘aki fakalotu.
58013002	‘Oua te mou loto ngalongalo he fakaafe ‘āunofo: he ‘i he fai ‘a e me‘a ko ia, kuo tali ‘e ha ni‘ihi ha kau ‘āngelo.
58013003	Mou manatua ‘a kinautolu ‘oku nofo pilīsone, ‘o hangē ‘oku mou kaungā nofo pilīsone mo kinautolu: manatua ‘a e ngaohikovia ‘i ho‘omou ongo‘i ‘oku mou ‘i he sino foki mo kinautolu.
58013004	Ke lau‘i lelei ‘a e mali ‘e he kakai kotoa pē; pea ke ta‘e‘uli‘i ‘a e mohenga: he ko e kau fe‘auaki, mo e tono‘unoho ‘e fakamaau kinautolu ‘e he ‘Otua.
58013005	Ke ta‘emānumanu ho‘omou tō‘onga; pea mou fiemālie ‘i he ngaahi me‘a ‘oku mou ma‘u ni: he kuo folofola mai ‘e He‘ene ‘Afio, ‘E ‘ikai si‘i te u mahu‘i meiate koe, kae‘uma‘ā ha‘aku momo‘i li‘aki koe.
58013006	Ko ia ‘oku tau mālohi ai ke lea ‘o pehē, Ko e ‘Eiki ko hoku tokoni; ‘e ‘ikai te u manavahē: ko e hā tū ha me‘a ‘e fai kiate au ‘e ha tangata?
58013007	Fakamanatu hake ki he kakai na‘e takimu‘a kiate kimoutolu, ‘a e fa‘ahinga na‘e tala kiate kimoutolu ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua: pea mou fakatokanga‘i ‘a e iku‘anga ‘o ‘enau mo‘ui, ‘o fa‘ifa‘itaki ki he‘enau tui.
58013008	Ko Sīsū Kalaisi ‘oku tatau ai pē he ‘aneafi, mo e ‘aho ni, ‘io, ‘o ta‘engata.
58013009	‘Oua na‘a tuku ke ‘auhia kimoutolu he ngaahi tokāteline kehekehe mo fo‘ou. He ko hono lelei ke poupou ‘a e loto ‘aki ‘a e kelesi, ‘o ‘ikai ‘aki ‘a e ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni kai, ‘a ia na‘e ‘ikai ‘aonga kiate kinautolu na‘e fou ai.
58013010	‘Ā, ‘oku ‘i ai hatau ‘ōlita, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘ikai ngofua ke kai mei ai ‘e kinautolu ‘oku tauhi ki he Tāpanekale.
58013011	He ko e ngaahi manu ko ia, ‘a ia na‘e ‘omi honau toto ki he Potu Toputapu ‘e he Taula‘eiki Lahi, na‘e tutu ‘o ‘osi honau ‘anga‘anga ‘i tu‘a ‘apitanga.
58013012	Ko ia, ko Sīsū foki, koe‘uhiā ke ne fakatāpui ‘a e kakai ‘aki hono ta‘ata‘a ‘o‘ona, ko ia na‘a ne ‘alu atu ki he tu‘a matanikolo ke feia ai.
58013013	Pea ko ia, tau ‘alu atu kiate ia ki tu‘a ‘apitanga, ‘o fua hono manukia‘anga.
58013014	He tala‘ehai ‘oku tau ma‘u ‘i heni ha kolo tu‘u ma‘u, ka ‘oku tau ha‘ao ‘a e kolo ko ia ka hoko mai.
58013015	‘Āua, ko ia ke tau ‘atu ‘iate ia pē, ma‘u ai pē, ha feilaulau fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otua, ‘a ē ko e fua ‘o e loungutu ‘oku takua hono huafa.
58013016	Kae‘uma‘ā, ‘oua na‘a ngalo ‘a e fai ‘ofa mo e fai tokoni: he ko e alā feilaulau pehē ‘oku hōhō‘ia ai ‘a e ‘Otua.
58013017	Mou tuitala ki he kau tu‘ukimu‘a ‘omoutolu, pea fakavaivai kiate kinautolu; he ko kinautolu ia ‘oku nau ‘ā ke le‘ohi homou laumālie, he ko kinautolu te nau fakamatala kimoutolu ‘amui; koe‘uhiā ke nau fai fiefia ‘enau ngāue ko ia, ‘o ‘ikai fai mo e to‘e; he ‘e ta‘e‘aonga ia kiate kimoutolu.
58013018	Mou hūfia kimautolu; he ‘oku mau pehē ‘oku ‘ata‘atā homau konisēnisi: he ko homau loto ke taau ‘emau mo‘ui ‘i he me‘a kotoa.
58013019	Pea ‘oku ‘āsili ‘eku kole ke mou fai pehē, koe‘uhi ke vave hoku fakafoki atu kiate kimoutolu.
58013020	Pea ko e ‘Otua ‘oku ‘a‘ana ‘a e fakamelino, ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio na‘a ne toe ‘omi mei he pekia ‘a hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi ‘a e Tauhi fungani ko ia ‘o e fanga sipi ‘i he ta‘ata‘a ‘o e Fuakava Ta‘engata.
58013021	‘Ofa ke fakakakato kimoutolu ‘e He‘ene ‘Afio ‘i he me‘a lelei fuli pē ke mou ‘osiki hono finangalo, he‘ene feia ‘iate kitautolu ‘a e me‘a ‘oku hōhō‘ia ai hono finangalo ‘ia Sīsū Kalaisi; ke ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘a e kolōlia, ‘o lauikuonga pea ta‘engata. ‘Ēmeni.
58013022	Kāinga, ‘oku ou kole atu ke mou kātaki ‘eku lea tokoni ni, he ‘oku nounou pē ‘a e ‘ipiseli kuo u fai atu.
58013023	Ke mou ‘ilo pē, kuo veteange hota tokoua ko Tīmote; pea kapau ‘e vave ‘ene ‘alu atu, te u ‘a‘ahi kiate kimoutolu fakataha mo ia.
58013024	Tala hoku ‘ofa ki he kau takimu‘a kotoa pē ‘omoutolu, pea ki he kakai lotu fuli pē. ‘Oku ‘ofa atu ‘a e kakai ‘o ‘Ītali.
58013025	‘Ofa ke ‘iate kimoutolu fuli pē ‘a e kelesi. ‘Ēmeni.
59001001	TŪ ko au sēmisi, ko e tamaio‘eiki ‘a e ‘Otua mo e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, ko ‘eku tohi ki he matakali ‘e hongofulu mā ua ‘oku nofo movetevete: ‘ofa atu.
59001002	Si‘oku kāinga, mou lau ko e koto fakafiefia ‘oka mou ka tō ki he ngaahi ‘ahi‘ahi kehekehe;
59001003	ko ho‘omou ‘ilo, ko e sivi ‘o ho‘omou tui ‘oku ne fakatupu ‘a e kātaki.
59001004	Pea ko eni, tuku ke fai ‘e kātaki ‘ene ngāue ke haohaoa, koe‘uhi ke mou haohaoa, mo tu‘u kakato, ‘o ta‘emasiva ‘i ha me‘a.
59001005	Ka ‘o kapau ko e poto ‘oku masiva ai ha taha, ke ne kole mei he ‘Otua, ‘a ia ‘oku ne foaki ‘ata‘atā pē ki he kakai kotoa pē, ‘o ‘ikai ‘atu mo e lau; pea ‘e foaki ia ki ai.
59001006	Ka ke ne kole tui pē, ‘o ‘oua ‘e tāla‘a. He ko ia ‘oku tāla‘a ‘oku ne hangē ko e peau ‘o e tahi ‘oku fakateka ‘o fepālekina ‘e he matangi.
59001007	‘Io, ke ‘oua na‘a mahalo ‘e he tangata ko ia te ne ma‘u ha me‘a mei he ‘Eiki.
59001008	Ko e tangata lotolotoua ia, ta‘emaau ‘ene anga kotoa pē.
59001009	Pea ko eni, ke vīkiviki si‘i tokoua lotu ‘oku mā‘ulalo ‘oka hākeaki‘i ia:
59001010	ka ko si‘i koloa‘ia ‘oka fakatōkilalo‘i: he ‘oku hangē ko e fisi‘i mohuku ‘ene mole ‘a‘ana.
59001011	He na‘e hopo ‘a e la‘ā mo ‘ene faka‘a‘afu, pea mae ‘a e mohuku, pea ngangana hono fisi, pea mole hono matamatalelei. ‘E pehē pē foki ‘a e kekena ‘a si‘i koloa‘ia, ‘oka fai atu hono ‘alunga ko ia.
59001012	Monu‘ia ā ka ko e tangata ‘oku ne kātaki ha ‘ahi‘ahi: he ‘oka ‘osi hono sivi, te ne ma‘u ai ‘a e kalauni ‘o e mo‘ui, ‘a ia kuo ne tala‘ofa kiate kinautolu ‘oku ‘ofa kiate ia.
59001013	Ke ‘oua na‘a lau ‘e ha toko taha ‘Oka ‘ahi‘ahi‘i, ‘Oku mei he ‘Otua hoku ‘ahi‘ahi‘i: he ko e ‘Otua ‘oku ‘ikai ma‘ahi‘ahi‘i ‘e he kovi, pea ‘oku ‘ikai ke ‘ahi‘ahi‘i ha taha ‘e He‘ene ‘Afio.
59001014	Ka ‘oku ‘ahi‘ahi‘i ‘a e tangata takitaha he tohoaki ia ‘e he‘ene holi ‘a‘ana, mo taki ‘aki ha mounu.
59001015	Faifai pea tu‘itu‘ia ‘a e holi ko ia, ‘o ne fanau‘i ha angahala: pea ko e angahala ko ia, ‘oka kakato, ‘oku ne fā‘ele‘i ‘a e mate.
59001016	Si‘oku kāinga ‘ofa‘anga, ‘oua te mou hē.
59001017	‘Ilonga ha foaki lelei, pea ‘ilonga ha me‘a‘ofa haohaoa, ko e ‘alu hifo pē ia mei he Tamai ‘a e ngaahi maama, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘ikai ‘i He‘ene ‘Afio ha feto‘oaki, pe ko ha nenefu tupu ‘i ha‘ane liliu.
59001018	Koe‘uhi ko hono finangalo pē ‘o‘ona na‘a ne fakatupu ai ‘a kitautolu ‘aki ‘a e folofola ‘o e mo‘oni, koe‘uhi ke tau hoko ko e polopolo tokua ‘o e ngaahi me‘a kuo ne ngaohi.
59001019	Seuke, ‘oku mou lāu‘ilo pē, si‘oku kāinga ‘ofeina: ka ke vave ‘a e tangata fua pē he fanongo, kae fakatotoka ki he lea, pea fakatotoka ki he ‘ita.
59001020	He ko e ‘ita ‘a e tangata ‘oku ‘ikai te ne ngāue ki he mā‘oni‘oni faka‘otua.
59001021	Ko ia, mou hiko ‘a e veve kotoa pē, mo e ngaoha‘a ‘o e lotokovi, ‘o mou tali anga vaivai ‘a e folofola kuo tō, ‘a ia ‘oku mafai ke fakamo‘ui homou laumālie.
59001022	Ka mou hoko ko e kau fai ki he folofola, ‘o ‘ikai ko e kau fanongo pē, ‘o mou kākaa‘i kimoutolu.
59001023	He ka ai ha taha, ‘a ia ko ha fanongo pē ki he folofola, ka ko ha ta‘efai ki ai, ‘oku tatau ia mo ha siana ‘oku ne fakasio ki he fōtunga na‘e tupu mo ia ‘i ha sio‘ata:
59001024	he kuo ne fakasio leva kiate ia, pea ne ‘alu, pea ngalo leva pe ko e hā hono anga.
59001025	Ka ko ia ‘oku ne fakasio hifo ki he lao haohaoa, ‘a e lao tau‘atāina, ‘o ne ta‘utu ai, kae‘uma‘ā ‘oku ‘ikai te ne hoko ko ha taha fanongo kae ngalo, ka ko ha taha fai ngāue, ‘ē, ‘e monū‘ia ‘a e toko taha ko ia ‘i he‘ene fai.
59001026	Ka ai ha taha ‘oku lau ko e lotu ia; ‘osi, ‘oku ‘ikai te ne ‘ai piti hono ‘elelo, ka neongo ia ka ‘oku ne kākaa‘i pē hono loto, ‘ē, ko e lotu ‘a e toko taha ko ia ko e launoa,
59001027	Ko eni ia ‘a e tō‘onga lotu ‘oku ma‘a mo ta‘ehano ‘uli ‘i he ‘afio ‘a e ‘Otua ko ‘etau Tamai, ‘a ‘ete ‘a‘ahi ki he fa‘ahinga mātu‘a mate mo e kau uitou ‘i he‘enau mamahi, ‘a ‘ete tauhi kita mei māmani ke ta‘ehato ‘ila.
59002001	SI‘OKU kāinga, ke ‘oua na‘a taka filifilimānako ho‘omou fai‘aki ‘a e tui hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, ‘a e ‘Eiki ‘oku ‘a‘ana ‘a e lāngilangi.
59002002	He vakai, kapau ‘e hū ki homou falelotu ha matāpule ‘oku fuhi ai ‘a e mama koula, pea kofu ngingila, pea hū ki ai foki ha masiva ‘oku kofu fakalielia;
59002003	pea ‘oku mou tokanga leva kiate ia ‘oku ‘ai ‘a e kofu ngingila na, pea mou pehē, Sī, me‘a mai koe ki he potu ‘a hou‘eiki; ka ke pehē ki si‘i masiva, Tu‘u atu koe hena, pe nofo ki lalo ‘i hoku tu‘ungava‘e ni.
59002004	‘Ē, ‘ikai ne taka fakata‘eta‘etui ho‘omou me‘a, ‘o mou hoko ko e kau fakamaau fifili kovi?
59002005	Fanongo mai, si‘oku kāinga ‘ofa‘anga, ‘ikai na‘e fili ‘e he ‘Otua ‘a kinautolu ‘oku masiva ‘i māmani ke koloa‘ia ‘i he tui, pea ke ‘ea ki he pule‘anga na‘a ne tala‘ofa kiate kinautolu ‘oku ‘ofa kiate ia?
59002006	Ka ko kimoutolu kuo mou fakalielia‘i ‘a si‘i masiva na. ‘Ikai ko e kau koloa‘ia ia ‘oku nau fakapōpula‘i kimoutolu, mo nau toho ‘a kimoutolu ki he ngaahi fakamāu‘anga?
59002007	‘Ikai ko kinautolu ia ‘oku nau talakaa‘i ‘a e huafa lelei ko ia, ‘a ia ‘oku ui ‘aki kimoutolu.
59002008	‘Io, kapau mo‘oni ko ho‘omou tauhi ke haohaoa ‘a e lao fakatu‘i na, ‘o fai ki he potu tohi ko ia, Te ke ‘ofa ki ho kaungā‘api ‘o hangē ko ho‘o ‘ofa kiate koe, tā ‘oku mālō ho‘omou ngāue:
59002009	ka ‘o kapau ‘oku mou filifilimānako, ko e angahala ia ‘oku mou fai, he ‘oku faka‘ilo kimoutolu ‘e he lao ko ia ko e talangata‘a.
59002010	He ko ia kuo ne tauhi hono kotoa ‘o e lao, ka ne humu ‘i ha me‘a ‘e taha, kuo ne mo‘ua ki hono kotoa.
59002011	He ko ia na‘a ne folofola mai, ‘Oua na‘a ke tono ‘unoho, na‘a ne pehē foki, ‘Oua na‘a ke fakapō. Pea neongo ‘oku ‘ikai te ke tono ‘unoho, ka ke fakapō pē, kuo ke hoko ko e maumau lao.
59002012	‘Ē, ke pehē ho‘omou lea, pea pehē ho‘omou ngāue, ke taau mo ha kakai ‘oku ene honau fakamaau ‘aki ‘a e lao tau‘atāina.
59002013	He ‘e fai ta‘emeesi ‘a e fakamaau kiate ia na‘e ‘ikai fai meesi. ‘Oku luki ‘a meesi ki he fakamaau.
59002014	Si‘oku kāinga, ko e hā tū hano ‘aonga ‘a e pehē ‘e ha taha, ‘oku ne tui; ‘osi, ‘oku ‘ikai hā ai ha ngāue? ‘e mafakamo‘ui ia ‘e he‘ene tui ko ia?
59002015	Ko eni, kapau ‘e masiva kofu ha tangata lotu, pe ha fine lotu,
59002016	mo ‘ikai ‘aupito ma‘u si‘a me‘a tokoni pea ka pehē ange ‘e hamou toko taha, ‘Alu ā, ‘oku fai pē homou fakamāfana, ‘oku fai pē homou fakamākona; ka ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ange ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku tangi ki ai ‘a e sino; ko e hā hono ‘aonga, ‘ō?
59002017	Pehē foki ‘a e tui, kapau ‘oku ‘ikai ke ō mo e ngāue, ‘oku mate pē ia, he‘ene tu‘u taha.
59002018	Kuo pau ke pehē atu ‘e ha taha, Ko ho‘o me‘a tokua ‘a e tui, ka ko ha‘aku ‘a e ngaahi ngāue: pe‘i faka‘ali‘ali mai ho‘o tui ‘ata‘atā mo e ngaahi ngāue, ka u faka‘ali‘ali atu ‘eku tui he hā ‘i he‘eku ngaahi ngāue.
59002019	‘Oku ke tui, ‘oku taha pē ‘a e ‘Otua; ‘io, mālō ia: pea ‘oku tui pehē mo e kau tēvolo, pea nau tetetete.
59002020	Ka ‘oku ke loto ke mahino atu koā, siana ta‘eloto, ‘a e ka‘anga ‘a e tui ‘oku ta‘eō mo e ngaahi ngāue?
59002021	‘Ē, ‘ikai na‘e fakatonuhia ‘etau kui ko ‘Epalahame mei he ngaahi ngāue, he‘ene ‘oatu ‘a ‘Aisake ko hono foha, ‘o hilifaki ki he ‘ōlita?
59002022	‘Oku ke vakai, ko ‘ene tui na‘e ngāue fakataha mo ‘ene ngaahi ngāue, pea ko ‘ene ngaahi ngāue na‘e fakahaohaoa mei ai ‘ene tui:
59002023	pea na‘e fakamo‘oni ‘a e folofola na‘e pehē, Pea na‘e tui ‘a ‘Epalahame ki he ‘Otua, pea na‘e lau ia ma‘ane mā‘oni‘oni: pea na‘e ui ia ko e Takanga ‘o e ‘Otua.
59002024	Vakai ā, ‘oku fakatonuhia ‘a e tangata mei he ngaahi ngāue, ‘o ‘ikai mei he tui pē.
59002025	Pea pehē foki, ‘Ikai na‘e fakatonuhia ‘a Lēhapi fe‘auaki mei he ngāue, he‘ene tali ‘a e ongo talafekau, ‘o ne fakato‘oto‘o ‘ena ō ‘i ha hala kehe?
59002026	He hangē ā ‘oku mate ‘a e sino ‘oka mavahe mei he laumālie, pehē foki ‘oku mate ‘a e tui ‘oka mavahe mo e ngāue.
59003001	SI‘OKU kāinga, ‘oua te mou hoko ko e koto akonaki kotoa pē, ko ho‘omou ‘ilo ‘e ‘otautolu ‘a e tautea ‘oku lahi hake.
59003002	He ‘oku lahi ‘a e me‘a ‘oku tau humu ai kotoa pē. Toki ai ha tangata ‘oku ‘ikai ke humu ‘i he lea, pea ko e tangata haohaoa ia, mo mafai ke ‘ai piti ki he sino kotoa.
59003003	Ko eni, kapau te tau ‘ai piti ki he ngutu ‘o e fanga hoosi ke nau talangofua kiate kitautolu, uē, ‘oku tau male‘ei fano leva honau sino kotoa.
59003004	Vakai foki ‘a e ngaahi vaka, neongo honau fu‘u lalahi, pea fakaoma ‘e he ngaahi matangi mālohi, ka ‘oku maliu fano ‘e he ki‘i momo‘i fohe ‘uli ki he me‘a ‘oku ‘oho ki ai ‘a e loto ‘o e faka‘uli.
59003005	Pehē foki, ko e ‘elelo ko e kupu si‘i, pea ‘oku lau me‘a lalahi. Vakai, hono ‘uke ‘a e me‘i afi ‘oku vela ai ‘a e fu‘u vao!
59003006	Pea ko e ‘elelo ko ha afi ia–‘oiau, ‘a e ‘univeesi angahala ko ē! Ko e tu‘unga ‘eni ‘o e ‘elelo ‘i hotau ngaahi kupu, ko ia ia ‘oku ne fakamele ‘a e sino kotoa, ‘o ne tutu ‘a e siakale ‘o natula, pea ‘oku tutu ia mei heli.
59003007	Seuke, ‘ilonga ha ‘ulungāanga ‘o e fanga manu mo e manupuna, ‘o e me‘a totolo mo e me‘a tahi, ka ‘oku mafakalalata pē, ‘io, kuo loa hono fakalalata ‘e he ‘ulungāanga ‘o e tangata.
59003008	Ka ko e ‘elelo kuo te‘eki mafakalalata ‘e he tangata; ko e kovi matemate‘āliku, ko e koto kona fakamate.
59003009	Ko ia ia ‘oku tau fakamālō ‘aki ki hotau ‘Eiki mo e Tamai, pea ko ia ia ‘oku tau tutuku‘i ‘aki ‘a e kakai ‘a ia ‘oku ngaohi ‘i he tatau ‘o e ‘Otua.
59003010	‘Oku tō mai mei he ngutu pē taha, ‘a e fakamālō mo e tutuku‘i. Si‘oku kāinga, ‘oku ‘ikai totonu ke pehē ha me‘a.
59003011	Kapau ko ha vai, pea ‘oku puna koā mei ha matavai pē taha ‘a e vai melie mo e vai kona?
59003012	‘O lava koā, si‘oku kāinga, ke fua ‘ōlive ‘e he fiki, pe ke fua fiki ‘e he vaine? ‘Āua, pehē ‘e ‘ikai fakapuhi ‘e he vai kona ha vai melie.
59003013	Ko hai ia koā ‘iate kimoutolu ‘oku poto mo ‘ilome‘a? ‘Ē, ke ne ‘ai ke hā ‘ene ngaahi ngāue ‘i he lelei ‘ene tō‘onga, ‘o fai‘aki ‘a e anga vaivai ‘a poto.
59003014	Kae lolotonga ‘oku ‘i homou loto ‘a e meheka kona mo e tangi ke tu‘u ‘ata, pea ‘oua te mou ‘afungi, ‘o fakasīkaka‘i mo lohiaki‘i ‘a e mo‘oni.
59003015	‘Oku ‘ikai ko eni ia ‘a e poto ‘oku ‘alu hifo mei ‘olunga, ka ‘oku taka fakaemāmani pē, pea taka faka‘atamai pē, pea taka fakatēvolo.
59003016	‘Ilonga ha potu ‘oku ‘i ai ‘a e meheka, mo e tangi ke tu‘u ‘ata, ‘oku ‘i ai ‘a e maveuveu mo e ngāue kovi fuli pē.
59003017	Ka ko e poto ‘oku mei ‘olunga, ko hono anga tu‘u mu‘a ko e ma‘a, pea hoko ai mo ‘ene melino mo ‘ene anga faka‘atu‘i, ‘o taka fakaoleole, ‘o mohu manava‘ofa, pea fuhi ai ‘a e fua lelei, pea ‘oku ‘ikai ngutungutuua, ‘oku ‘ikai momole‘olunga.
59003018	Pea ko eni, ko e fua ko e mā‘oni‘oni, ko hono tō ‘oku fai ‘i he melino ‘e kinautolu ‘oku fakatupu melino.
59004001	‘OKU mei fē ‘a e ngaahi tau, pea mei fē ‘a e ngaahi fetu‘usi ‘oku ‘iate kimoutolu? ‘Ikai ‘oku nau tupu mei he me‘a ni, ‘io, mei he ngaahi holi kovi, ‘a ia ‘oku fai tau ‘i homou ngaahi kupu?
59004002	‘Oku mou holi me‘a, ‘o ‘ikai ma‘u; ‘oku mou fai fakapō ai, ‘o meheka, ka ‘oku ‘ikai te mou lava ke ma‘u; ‘oku mou fetu‘usi leva ‘o tau. ‘Ā, ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ma‘u koe‘uhi ‘oku ‘ikai te mou kole:
59004003	‘oku mou kole, pea ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ma‘u, koe‘uhi ā ‘oku mou kole kovi, he ko e fai pē ke tauhi ‘aki ho‘omou ngaahi holi kovi.
59004004	‘a e koto tono tangata, ‘ikai ‘oku mou ‘ilo, ko e takaua mo māmani ko e fakafili ia ki he ‘Otua? Ko ia, ‘ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku loto ke takaua mo māmani ‘oku ne nofo ai ko e fili ‘o e ‘Otua.
59004005	‘Io, ‘oku mou pehē koā ko e launoa ‘a e folofola ko ia, ‘a ia ‘oku ne pehē, Ko e Laumālie kuo ne tuku ke nofo ‘iate kitautolu ‘oku ne feinga‘i kitautolu, ‘o a‘u ki he fua‘a?
59004006	Ka ‘oku lahi ange ai ‘ene foaki kelesi. Ko ia ai, ‘oku ne pehē, ‘Oku tali teke‘i ‘e he ‘Otua ‘a e ‘afungi, ka ‘oku ne foaki kelesi ki he anga vaivai.
59004007	Ko ia, mou fakavaivai‘i kimoutolu ki he ‘Otua. Ka mou tali teke‘i ‘a e Tēvolo, pea te ne hola meiate kimoutolu.
59004008	‘Unu‘unu atu ki he ‘Otua, pea ‘e ‘unu‘unu mai ia kiate kimoutolu. Fakama‘a homou nima, ‘a kau angahala; pea fakatāpui ‘a homou loto, ‘a kau siosio ua.
59004009	Mou fakamamahi, mo to‘e, mo tangi: ke liliu ho‘omou kata ko e to‘e, mo ho‘omou fiefia ko e fakamāmāhu‘i.
59004010	Fakavaivai‘i kimoutolu ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e ‘Eiki, pea te ne hākeaki‘i kimoutolu.
59004011	Kāinga, ‘oua te mou felau‘ikovi‘aki. Ko ia ‘oku ne lau‘ikovi hono tokoua, pe ‘oku anga‘i hono tokoua, ‘oku ne lau‘ikovi ‘a e Lao, pea anga‘i ‘a e Lao: ka ‘o kapau ‘oku ke anga‘i ‘a e Lao, tā ‘oku ‘ikai ko ha fai ki he Lao koe, ka ‘oku ke fakamaau ia.
59004012	‘Oku taha pē ‘a e Fokotu‘u-lao, mo e Fakamaau, ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘oku ne mafai ke fakamo‘ui, pea ke faka‘auha: ko hai tū koe ke ke anga‘i ho kaungā‘api?
59004013	Me‘a mai ‘eni, ‘a kimoutolu ‘oku lau, ‘o pehē, Ko e ‘aho ni, pe ko e ‘apongipongi, te mau fononga ki he kolo ko ē, pea mau nofo ai ‘o ta‘u kātoa, pea te mau fai fakatau ai ‘o ngaohi pa‘anga: ‘osi, ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo ‘a e me‘a ‘o e ‘apongipongi.
59004014	He ko e hā tū ho‘omou mo‘ui? Ko e mao pē kimoutolu, ‘a ia ‘oku hā fuoloa si‘i, pea toki mole foki.
59004015	‘Ē, na‘a mou mei pehē, Kapau ko e finangalo ‘o e ‘Eiki te mau mo‘ui, ‘o fai ‘a ē mo ē.
59004016	Ka ‘i hono anga ko ia, ‘oku tu‘unga ho‘omou pōlepole ‘i ho‘omou ‘afungi: ko e alā pōlepole pehē ‘oku kovi.
59004017	Ko ia ‘oku ne ‘ilo ha lelei ke fai ka ‘oku ‘ikai fai, ko ha‘ana angahala ia.
59005001	ME‘A mai ‘eni, ‘a ha‘a koloa‘ia, fei mo tangi, ‘o ‘oiauē fakapō ‘i ho‘omou ngaahi mamahi ‘oku tu‘unuku mai.
59005002	Kuo popo ho‘omou koloa, pea kuo anea ho‘omou ngaahi kofu.
59005003	Kuo ‘osi ‘ume‘umea ho‘omou koula mo e siliva; ‘io, ko hono ‘ume‘umea te ne talatalaaki‘i kimoutolu, pea te ne keina homou kakano ‘o hangē ko e afi. Kuo mou fa‘oaki koloa ‘i he kapa ‘o e kuonga.
59005004	Ko ena ‘a e totongi ‘o e kau ngāue na‘e utu homou ta‘u, ‘a ia kuo ta‘ofi meiate kinautolu: ‘oku kaila ia meiate kimoutolu; kae‘uma‘ā ko e tangi ‘a e kau tu‘usi kuo tau atu ki he fofonga ‘o e ‘Eiki Sāpaoti.
59005005	Kuo mou mo‘ui fakahāuē ‘i māmani, mo fakausousa; kuo mou fangapesi homou loto ‘i he ‘aho tāmate‘i.
59005006	Kuo mou fakahalaia, kuo mou fakapoongi ‘a e angatonu; tala‘ehai ‘oku ne talitu‘u kiate kimoutolu.
59005007	Ko ia, kāinga, mou kātaki pē ‘o a‘u ki he hoko mai ‘a e ‘Eiki. Vakai, ‘oku nofo‘aki tali ‘a e fa‘a ki he fua mahu‘inga ‘o e kelekele; pea ‘oku ne kātaki hono tauhi, kae‘oua ke tō ki ai ‘a e ‘uha mu‘a mo e ‘uha mui.
59005008	Ke mou kātaki mo kimoutolu; poupou homou loto: he kuo ofi ‘a e hoko mai ‘a e ‘Eiki.
59005009	Kāinga, ‘oua te mou felāunga‘aki, na‘a fakamaau? kimoutolu: ko ena ‘a e fakamaau ‘oku tu‘u ‘i he matapā.
59005010	Si‘oku kāinga, kapau ‘oku mou fiema‘u ha fa‘ifa‘itaki‘anga ‘o e mamahi mo e kātaki, ko e kau Palōfita ‘ena, ‘a ia na‘a nau lea ‘i he huafa ‘o e ‘Eiki.
59005011	Vakai, ‘oku mau lau ko e monū‘ia ‘a kinautolu kuo kātaki, Kuo mou fanongo ki he kātaki ‘a Siope; mou vakai foki hono iku‘anga mei he ‘Eiki: tā ‘oku ‘ofa u‘uu‘u ‘a e ‘Eiki, mo ‘ofangofua.
59005012	Ka sinoeme‘a, si‘oku kāinga, ‘oua te mou lea tuki; pe ki he langi, pe ki he fonua, pe ki ha me‘a ‘e taha: ka ke ‘Io pē ho‘omou ‘io, mo ‘Ikai pē ho‘omou ‘ikai; koe‘uhi ke ‘oua te mou mo‘ua ‘i he fakamaau.
59005013	‘Oku ngaohikovia koā hamou taha? Ke ne lotu pē. ‘Oku loto fiefia ha taha? Ke ne fai ha hiva.
59005014	‘Oku ‘i ai hamou taha ‘oku mahaki? Ke ne ui ange ‘a e kau mātu‘a ‘o e siasi; pea te nau lotua ia, ‘o tākai ‘aki ‘a e lolo ‘i he huafa ‘o e ‘Eiki.
59005015	Pea ko e lotu ‘a tui te ne fakamo‘ui ‘a e mahaki, pea ‘e fokotu‘u ia ‘e he ‘Eiki; pea neongo kuo ne fai ha angahala, ka ‘e fakamolemole ia.
59005016	Ko ia, mou fevete‘aki ho‘omou ngaahi angahala, pea fehūfia‘aki; koe‘uhi ke mou mo‘ui. Ko e lotu fakamātoato ‘a e tangata mā‘oni‘oni ‘oku ‘aonga lahi.
59005017	Ko ‘Ilaisiā ko e tangata alāanga mo kitautolu, pea ne mātu‘aki lotu ke ‘oua na‘a ‘uha: pea na‘e ‘ikai tō ha ‘uha ki he fonua, ‘o ‘osi ha ta‘u ‘e tolu mo e māhina ‘e ono.
59005018	Pea ne toe fai ‘ene lotu, pea na‘e tuku hifo ‘e he langi ha ‘uha, pea tupu mei he kelekele hono fua.
59005019	Si‘oku kāinga, kapau ‘e taki hē hamou toko taha mei he mo‘oni, pea fakafoki mai ia ‘e ha taha;
59005020	ke mou ‘ilo pē, ko ia kuo ne fakafoki mai ha angahala mei he‘ene ‘alu hē, ko ‘ene fakahaofi ha laumālie mei he mate, mo ne ‘ufi‘ufi ha fu‘ufu‘unga angahala.
60001001	TŪ ko au Pita, ko e ‘aposetolo ‘a Sīsū Kalaisi, ko ‘eku tohi ki he kakai fili ‘a ia ‘oku nau nofo movetevete ‘i Ponitō, Kalētia, Kapatōsia, ‘Ēsia, mo Pitinia,
60001002	ko e fili ‘o fakatatau ki he mu‘aki ‘afio‘i ‘e he ‘Otua ko e Tamai, ‘i homou fakatāpui ‘e he laumālie ke iku ki he talangofua, mo e luluku ‘aki ‘a e ta‘ata‘a ‘o Sīsū Kalaisi. ‘Ofa ke fakalahi kiate kimoutolu ‘a e kelesi mo e fiemālie.
60001003	Ha taha ā ke fakamālō‘ia, pe ko e ‘Otua mo Tamai ‘a hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi; ‘a ia, ‘i he lahi ‘o ‘ene meesi, na‘a ne fakatupufo‘ou kitautolu ke ma‘u ha ‘amanaki ‘oku mo‘ui, ko e me‘a ‘i he toetu‘u ‘a Sīsū mei he pekia;
60001004	‘io, ke ma‘u ha tofi‘a ‘oku ta‘e‘auha mo ta‘emele mo ta‘emae, ‘a ia kuo ta‘ofia ‘i hēvani mo‘omoutolu;
60001005	‘a kimoutolu ‘oku le‘ohia, he kāpui ‘e he māfimafi ‘a e ‘Otua ko e me‘a ‘i he tui, ke lava‘i ‘a e fakamo‘ui ‘a ia kuo ‘osi sāuni ke fakae‘a mai ‘i he kuonga fakamui.
60001006	‘A ia ‘oku mou hākailangitau ai, neongo kuo fai nai ‘i he taimi ni, ‘o kapau na‘e ‘ikai ala ta‘ofi, homou fakamamahi fuonounou, he mo‘ua ‘i he ngaahi ‘ahi‘ahi kehekehe:
60001007	koe‘uhi ā ke hā ho‘omou tui, ‘ene lava ke tu‘u ‘i he sivi–‘a ia ko e me‘a mahu‘inga ange ‘i he koula, ‘a ē neongo ko e me‘a ‘auha, ka ‘oku ‘ahi‘ahi‘i ia ‘aki ‘a e afi–‘io, ke hā ia kuo ne lava ‘a e fakamālō mo e lāngilangi‘ia mo e faka‘apa‘apa‘ia ‘i he fakapū mai ‘o Sīsū Kalaisi.
60001008	‘A ia neongo kuo te‘eki te mou mamata ki ai, ka ‘oku mou ‘ofa ki ai; ‘a ia ai ‘i he taimi ni neongo ‘oku ‘ikai te mou mātā ia, ka ‘i ho‘omou tui ki ai, ‘oku mou hākailangitau ‘i he fiefia ‘oku ‘ikai malea‘aki, pea ‘oku fai hēvani;
60001009	ho‘omou ma‘u ‘a e me‘a ‘oku hu‘u ki ai ho‘omou tui, ko e fakamo‘ui ‘o homou laumālie.
60001010	‘a e fakamo‘ui ko ia na‘e ‘eke lahi mo fakatotolo atu ki ai ‘a e kau Palōfita, ‘a kinautolu na‘a nau kikite ki he kelesi na‘e ta‘ofi ma‘amoutolu:
60001011	he‘enau fakatotolo atu, pe ko e fē ia ‘a e kuonga, pea fakafēfē hono anga, ‘a ia na‘e lau ki ai ‘e he Laumālie ‘o Kalaisi na‘e ‘iate kinautolu, he‘ene sinaki fakahā ‘a e ngaahi mamahi na‘e tu‘utu‘uni ma‘a Kalaisi, mo e ngaahi lāngilangi ‘e hoko ai.
60001012	‘A kinautolu na‘e faka‘ilo ki ai, tokua na‘e ‘ikai ma‘anautolu, kae ma‘amoutolu ‘enau tokonaki ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia ‘a ia kuo fakahā ‘i onopooni kiate kimoutolu, ‘iate kinautolu kuo nau malanga‘aki atu ‘a e Kōsipeli ‘aki ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni na‘e fekau hifo mei he langi–‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku holi ‘a e kau ‘āngelo ke fakasio hifo ki ai.
60001013	Ko ia, mou ‘ai ‘a e no‘o ‘o homou loto, mo laka faka‘ehi‘ehi, pea mātu‘aki ‘amanaki ki he kelesi ‘oku ene hono ‘omi ‘i he fakapū mai ‘o Sīsū Kalaisi.
60001014	Fai ‘o ngali mo ha fānau talangofua, ‘o ‘oua te mou tuku kimoutolu ke anga ki ho‘omou ngaahi holi mu‘a, fai ‘i he ta‘e‘ilo;
60001015	ka mou anga ki he Toko Taha Mā‘oni‘oni ne ne ui kimoutolu, ‘o mou hoko kimoutolu foki ko e mā‘oni‘oni ‘i ho‘omou tō‘onga kotoa pē:
60001016	koe‘uhi kuo tohi ‘o pehē, Te mou mā‘oni‘oni, he ‘oku ou mā‘oni‘oni.
60001017	Pea kapau ā ‘oku mou tautapa kiate ia ‘oku ne fakamaau ta‘efilifilimānako, kae fakatatau ki he ngāue ‘a e tangata takitaha, ‘o mou lau ko ho‘omou Tamai ia, pea mou fai manavahē pē ho‘omou fakafeangai lolotonga ho‘omou ‘āunofo ni:
60001018	ko ho‘omou ‘ilo, na‘e ‘ikai fai‘aki ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘auha, ha siliva pe ha koula, homou huhu‘i mei he anga ta‘e‘aonga ne tuku fakaholo mai mei he mātu‘a;
60001019	ka na‘e fai‘aki ha ta‘ata‘a ma‘ongo‘onga, he ko e toto ‘o ha lami ta‘emele mo ta‘e‘ila, ko e ta‘ata‘a ‘o Kalaisi:
60001020	‘a ia ne mu‘aki tu‘utu‘uni ‘i he te‘eki tanu pou ‘a māmani, ka na‘e fakae‘a pē ‘i he faka‘osi ‘o ono‘aho koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu,
60001021	‘a kimoutolu ‘oku nofo ko e kau tui pīkitai ki he ‘Otua ‘iate ia, ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio na‘a ne fokotu‘u ia mei he pekia, mo ne ‘ange kiate ia ke lāngilangi‘ia: ko ia ‘oku sio ki he ‘Otua ‘a ho‘omou tui mo ho‘omou ‘amanaki foki.
60001022	Ko eni kuo mou fakatāpui homou laumālie ‘i he fai talangofua ki he mo‘oni ke lava ‘a e fe‘ofa‘aki fakalotu ‘oku ta‘eloi, ko ia ke mou tōtōivi ho‘omou fai ‘ofa ‘a e taha ki he taha, ‘o fai mei he loto.
60001023	He kuo fakatupufo‘ou kimoutolu, kae ‘ikai ‘aki ‘a e tenga ‘auha, ka ‘aki ‘a e tenga ta‘e‘auha, ‘o fou ‘i he folofola ‘a e ‘Otua ‘a ia ‘oku mo‘ui mo tolonga.
60001024	Koe‘uhi ā ‘oku hangē ko e mohuku ‘a e kakano kotoa pē, pea ko hono nāunau kotoa ‘oku hangē ko e fisi‘i mohuku. Kuo mae ‘a e mohuku, pea ngangana hono fisi;
60001025	ka ko e folofola ‘a e ‘Eiki ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata. Pea ko ia ia ‘a e folofola ne ‘atu kiate kimoutolu ‘i he malanga‘aki ‘o e Kōsipeli.
60002001	KO IA, mou hu‘ihu‘i ‘a e loto kovi kotoa pē, mo e kākā kotoa pē, mo e fa‘a mālualoi, mo e fa‘a meheka, mo e fakakovi kotoa pē;
60002002	pea mou fai ‘o hangē ko e fānau toki fā‘ele‘i, ‘o mou holi ki he hu‘akau fakaloto ‘oku ta‘ehu‘i, koe‘uhi ke mou tupu ai ke a‘usia ‘a e fakamo‘ui:
60002003	‘o kapau mo‘oni ne mou kamata ‘oku sai ‘a e ‘Eiki.
60002004	‘A ia ‘i ho‘omou ‘unu‘unu ki ai–‘io, ki he Maka Mo‘ui, ‘a ia kuo fakatale‘i ‘e he tangata, ka ‘i he ‘Afio ‘a e ‘Otua ko e maka taunga fili, ko e maka mahu‘inga–
60002005	pea mou tuku ke langa hake kimoutolu foki, he ko e koto maka mo‘ui, mo‘o fale fakalaumālie; ke mou hoko ko e tu‘unga taula‘eiki tapu, ke ‘atu feilaulau fakalaumālie, ‘a ia ‘oku hōifua ai ‘a e ‘Otua ‘ia Sīsū Kalaisi.
60002006	Koe‘uhi ‘oku tu‘u ‘i ha potu folofola, Ko eni ‘oku ou ‘ai ‘i Saione, mo‘o maka tuliki lahi, ha maka kuo fili, ha maka mahu‘inga: pea ko ia ‘oku tui falala ki ai ‘e ‘ikai fakamaa‘i.
60002007	‘Āua, tā ko hono mahu‘inga ‘oku ma‘amoutolu ‘oku tui: ka ki he kau talangata‘a, Ko e maka ne fakatale‘i ‘e he kau tufunga Kuo hoko ‘o tuliki tau‘olunga: ko e maka tūkia‘anga foki, mo e makatu‘u fakatupu fifisi–
60002008	‘a e fa‘ahinga ‘oku nau humu ‘i he‘enau talangata‘a ki he folofola, ‘a ia foki na‘e tu‘utu‘uni kinautolu ki ai.
60002009	Ka ko kimoutolu ko e ha‘a fili, ko e tu‘unga taula‘eiki fakatu‘i, ko e kakai tapu, ko e fa‘ahinga ‘oku ma‘ane me‘a tonu, koe‘uhi ā ke mou ongoongoa atu ‘a e ngaahi lelei ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio, ‘a ia na‘a ne ui mai kimoutolu mei he po‘uli ki he maama fakaofo ‘a‘ana:
60002010	‘a kimoutolu ‘a ia ko e ‘ata‘i kakai ‘i mu‘a, ka ko eni ko e kakai ‘a e ‘Otua; ko e kakai na‘e ‘ikai fai ha meesi ki ai, ka ko eni kuo ma‘u meesi.
60002011	Si‘oku ‘ofa‘anga, ‘oku ou enginaki atu, ke mou fai ‘o ngali mo e ‘āunofo mo e muli, ‘o mou faka‘ehi‘ehi mei he ngaahi holi fakakakano; he ko e fa‘ahinga me‘a ia ‘oku fai tau ki he laumālie.
60002012	‘O mou ‘ai ke taau ho‘omou fakafeangai ki he Senitaile; koe‘uhi, ‘i he me‘a ‘oku nau lau‘ikovi ai kimoutolu, tokua ko e faikovi, ke nau mamata ki ho‘omou ngaahi ngāue lelei, pea langa‘i ai ‘enau fakahīkihiki‘i ‘a e ‘Otua ‘i he ‘aho ‘o e ‘a‘ahi.
60002013	Mou fakavaivai kimoutolu ki he tu‘unga kotoa pē kuo fokotu‘u ‘e he tangata, koe‘uhi ko e ‘Eiki:
60002014	ki he tu‘i, he ko e mā‘olunga; ki he ngaahi kōvana foki, he ‘oku fou ‘iate ia honau fekau ke tautea ‘a e faikovi, kae fakamāloo‘i ‘a e failelei.
60002015	He kuo tu‘utu‘uni pehē ‘a e ‘Otua, ke mou fakamo‘ulongoa ‘aki ho‘omou failelei ‘a e vale ‘a e kau siana ta‘eloto na.
60002016	Fai ‘o ngali ko ha kau tau‘atāina, ‘o ‘ikai hangē ko ha kakai ‘oku ngāue‘aki ‘a e tau‘atāina ko e pulonga ‘o e lotokovi, kae ngali ko ha kau tamaio‘eiki ‘a e ‘Otua;
60002017	ko ia mou faka‘apa‘apa ki he tangata takitaha; mou ‘ofa ki he ha‘a lotu; mou manavahē ki he ‘Otua; mou faka‘apa‘apa ai pē ki he tu‘i.
60002018	‘a e kau sevāniti, mou anganofo ki he kakai ‘oku pule kiate kimoutolu, ‘o ‘apasia ‘aupito; ‘o ‘ikai kiate kinautolu pē ‘oku lelei mo fai faka‘atu‘i, ka ki he angakehe foki.
60002019	He ko e me‘a ‘eni ‘e fakafeta‘ia, ‘a e kātaki ‘e ha taha ‘a e ngaahi fakamamahi ‘oku ‘ai ta‘etotonu kiate ia, koe‘uhi ko ‘ene ongo‘i ‘a e ‘Otua.
60002020	He kapau kuo mou fai angahala, pea tuki ai kimoutolu, ‘o mou ‘ūkuma pē, ko e hā ha ongoongo ‘e ma‘u? ka ‘o kapau ‘oku mou fai lelei kae ngaohikovia, ‘o mou ‘ūkuma pē, seuke, ko e me‘a ko ia ‘oku fakafeta‘ia mei he ‘Otua.
60002021	‘Io, ko e me‘a ia na‘e ui kimoutolu ki ai: he na‘e kātaki mamahi ‘a Kalaisi foki koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu, ‘o ne tuku ha fa‘ifa‘itaki‘anga kiate kimoutolu, ke mou muimui ofi, ‘o topuva‘e taha mo ia.
60002022	‘A ia na‘e ‘ikai te ne momo‘i fai ha angahala, pe ne ‘ilo ha kākā ‘i hono fofonga:
60002023	‘a ia ‘i hono leakovia na‘e ‘ikai te ne tali ‘aki ha leakovi; ‘i hono ngaohikovi‘i na‘e ‘ikai te ne fakamana; ka ne tuku ia kiate ia ‘oku fakamaau totonu:
60002024	‘a ia na‘a ne fua ‘a e ngaahi angahala ‘atautolu, ‘e ia, ‘i hono sino, ‘i he ‘akau; koe‘uhi ‘i he‘etau mate ki he‘etau ngaahi angahala, ke tau mo‘ui ki he mā‘oni‘oni: ‘a ia ko hono kafo ne mei ai homou faito‘o.
60002025	He na‘a mou nofo hē hangē ko e fanga sipi; ka ko eni kuo mou foki ki he Tauhi mo Le‘ohi ‘o homou laumālie.
60003001	PEHĒ foki, ‘a e kau fefine, mou anganofo ki homou ngaahi husepāniti; koe‘uhi ka ai ha ni‘ihi ‘oku talangata‘a ki he folofola, hei‘ilo ‘e ma‘u mai kinautolu ‘aki ‘a e ngaahi tō‘onga ‘a honau ngaahi uaifi, kae ‘ikai ‘aki ha lea;
60003002	he‘enau mamata ki he ma‘a ‘o ho‘omou fakafeangai mo taka ‘apasia.
60003003	Pea ko e teu ‘o e fa‘ahinga ko ia ke ‘oua na‘a ko e teu ‘i tu‘a–ko e fī ‘o e ‘ulu mo e ‘ai ‘o e koula mo e tui ‘o e ngaahi kofu–
60003004	ka ke nau teu ‘aki ‘a e tangata fufū ‘o e loto, ‘io, ‘aki ‘a e me‘a ta‘e‘auha ko e anga vaivai mo e anga malū, ‘a ia ko e me‘a mahu‘inga ‘aupito ‘i he ‘afio ‘a e ‘Otua.
60003005	He na‘e pehē foki ‘a e teu ‘a e kau fefine mā‘oni‘oni ‘i mu‘a, ‘a ia na‘e tu‘u ‘enau falala ki he ‘Otua; he na‘a nau anganofo ki honau ngaahi husepāniti.
60003006	Hangē ko Sela na‘a ne talangofua kia ‘Epalahame, ‘o ne ui ia ko hono ‘eiki, ‘a ia kuo mou hoko ko ‘ene fānau, kapau ‘oku mou failelei, pea kapau ‘oku ‘ikai te mou manavahē ‘i ha manavahē kovi.
60003007	Pehē foki mo kimoutolu tangata, ko ho‘omou nonofo mo e fefine ke fai fakakaukau‘i, he ko e hama vaivai; ‘o mou tu‘utu‘uni hanau faka‘apa‘apa, ‘o taau mo ha kakai ‘oku nau kaungā ‘ea foki mo kimoutolu ki he kelesi ko e mo‘ui; koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a ta‘ofi ho‘omou ngaahi lotu.
60003008	Pea ko ‘eku lea faka‘osi; ke mou uouangataha, ke mou tau‘aki kaungā mamahi, ke mou fe‘ofa‘aki fakalotu, ke mou manava‘ofa, ke mou anga vaivai:
60003009	‘o ‘oua te mou totongi ‘a e kovi ‘aki ‘a e kovi, pe ko e leakovi ‘aki ‘a e leakovi, kaekehe mou tāpuaki‘i; he na‘e fakaului kimoutolu ki he me‘a ko eni, ke tō mo‘omoutolu ha tāpuaki.
60003010	He, Ko ia ‘oku loto ke ‘ofa ki he mo‘ui, Pea ke ‘ilo ha ngaahi ‘aho lelei, Ke ne ta‘ofi hono ‘elelo mei he kovi, Mo hono loungutu ke ‘oua ‘e lea‘aki ‘a e kākā,
60003011	Pea ke ne faka‘ehi‘ehi mei he kovi, Ka ne fai ‘a e lelei; Ke ne kumi ki he melino, ‘Io, ‘o tuli ki ai.
60003012	He ko e ongo fo‘i fofonga ‘o e ‘Eiki ‘Oku na siofi ‘a e mā‘oni‘oni; Pea ko hono ongo telinga ‘Oku fakafanongo ki ha‘anau lotu: Ka ko e fōtunga ‘o e ‘Eiki, ‘Oku ne hanga ki he kau faikovi.
60003013	Pea ko hai tū ‘e ngaohikovi‘i kimoutolu, ‘o kapau ‘oku mou mamahi‘i ‘a e lelei?
60003014	‘Io, pea neongo te mou mo‘ua ‘i he ngaahi mamahi koe‘uhi ko e mā‘oni‘oni, ka ‘oku mou monū‘ia ai pē. Kae ‘oua te mou manavahē ‘aki ‘a e manavahē ‘anautolu, ‘uma‘ā ha‘amou puputu‘u.
60003015	Ka mou ‘ai ke tāpuhā ‘a Kalaisi ‘i homou loto, ko e ‘Eiki pē ia: ‘o mou ‘osi teu ai pē ke fai ha fakamatala kiate ia fua pē te ne ‘eke kiate kimoutolu ‘a e ‘uhinga ‘o e ‘amanaki ‘oku mou ma‘u; kae fai ‘i he anga vaivai mo e tailiili, kuo ‘ata‘atā homou konisēnisi;
60003016	koe‘uhi ‘i he me‘a ‘oku nau lau‘ikovi ai kimoutolu, ke nau mā ‘a kinautolu ‘oku tukuaki‘i ho‘omou tō‘onga lelei faka-Kalaisi.
60003017	He ‘oku lelei mu‘a ke mou mo‘ua ‘i he mamahi koe‘uhi ko e failelei, ‘o kapau ‘oku finangalo pehē ‘e he ‘Otua, ‘i ha‘amou mo‘ua pehē, ko ha faikovi.
60003018	He ko Kalaisi foki na‘a ne mo‘ua mamahi tu‘o taha koe‘uhi ko e ngaahi angahala, ko e angatonu ma‘a e ta‘eangatonu, koe‘uhi ke ne fakaofiofi ‘a kitautolu ki he ‘Otua; pea na‘e tāmate‘i ‘i hono anga kakano, ka na‘e fakamo‘ui hake ‘i hono anga laumālie;
60003019	‘a ia foki na‘a ne ‘alu ‘aki ‘o malanga ki he ngaahi laumālie nofo pilīsone;
60003020	‘a kinautolu na‘e talangata‘a mu‘a, ‘i he taimi na‘e tatali ‘a e Angamokomoko ‘a e ‘Otua ‘i he kuonga ‘o Noa, lolotonga ‘oku teu ‘a e ‘A‘ake; ‘a ia ‘i he hū ki ai ha toko si‘i, ko e toko valu tokua, na‘e fakamo‘ui ‘aki ‘a e vai.
60003021	‘A ia ‘oku ne fakamo‘ui ‘a kimoutolu foki ‘i onopooni, ‘a e me‘a na‘a ne taipe ki ai, ko e papitaiso; (‘o ‘ikai ko e hu‘ihu‘i ‘e he kakano ‘a e ‘uli, ka ko e kumi ‘e ha konisēnisi ‘ata‘atā ki he ‘Otua) ko e me‘a ‘i he toetu‘u ‘a Sīsū Kalaisi:
60003022	‘a ia ‘oku ne ‘afio mei he to‘omata‘u ‘o e ‘Otua, he kuo ne ‘alu ki he langi; pea ko e kau ‘āngelo mo e kau ma‘u tu‘unga mo e kau ma‘u mālohi kuo tuku ki lalo kiate ia.
60004001	PEA ko ia, ko e me‘a ‘i he kātaki mamahi ‘e Kalaisi ‘i hono anga kakano, ko ia ke mou ‘ai ‘e kimoutolu foki mo‘omou kofu tau ‘a e fakakaukau pē ko ia, ‘o pehē, Ko ia kuo ne kātaki mamahi ‘i he kakano kuo faka‘ata‘atā mei he angahala;
60004002	Koe‘uhi ke ‘oua te mou toe mo‘ui‘aki ‘a e ngaahi holi ‘a e tangata, ka ko hono toe ‘o homou taimi ‘i he kakano ke mou mo‘ui ‘aki ‘a e finangalo ‘o e ‘Otua.
60004003	Seuke, kuo lahi pē ‘a e taimi kuo hili ke fai‘aki ‘a e loto ‘o e Senitaile; ‘a ia na‘a mou fou ‘i he ngaahi pau‘u fakalielia, mo e ngaahi holikovi, mo e fa‘a uaine‘ia, mo e ngaahi kātoanga kai, mo e ngaahi kātoanga inu kava; pea mo e me‘a ko ia ‘oku tāpuhā ‘a e ngaahi feingalotu ki he ‘aitoli:
60004004	‘a ia ‘oku nau ofo ‘i he ‘ikai te mou ō ai mo kinautolu ki he pitenga ko ia ‘o e mo‘ui fakalusa, ‘o nau lau‘ikovi kimoutolu–
60004005	‘a e fa‘ahinga te nau hopo ‘i he ‘ao ‘o‘ona, ‘a ia ‘oku ne tali teuteu ke ne fakamāu‘i ‘a e kau mo‘ui mo e kau pekia.
60004006	He ko hono ‘uhinga ia na‘e malanga‘aki ai ‘a e Kōsipeli ki he kau pekia foki, koe‘uhi ke nau nofo kuo fakamaau? fakatangata honau anga kakano, ka nau mo‘ui faka‘otua ‘a honau anga laumālie.
60004007	Ka ko eni kuo panaki ‘a e ngata‘anga ‘o e me‘a kotoa pē: ko ia mou fakama‘uma‘u mu‘a, ‘o mou mo‘ui faka‘ehi‘ehi, koe‘uhi ke mou fa‘a lotu,
60004008	sinoeme‘a ke mou tauhi ai pē ho‘omou fe‘ofa‘aki ke tūkuingata pē: he ko e ‘ofa ‘oku ne ‘ufi‘ufi ha fu‘ufu‘unga angahala.
60004009	Ke mou fefakaafe‘aki ta‘eha lāunga.
60004010	Ke mou fetauhi‘aki kimoutolu ‘aki ‘a e mafai fakalaumālie ne mou takitaha ma‘u, ‘i he ‘alunga ‘o ‘ene ma‘u, ‘o taau mo ha kau sētuata lelei ‘o e kelesi faifio ‘a e ‘Otua.
60004011	Kapau ko e fai malanga ‘a ha taha, ke ne fai ko e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua; kapau ‘oku fai ha tauhi ‘ofa ‘e ha taha, ke ne fai ‘o ngali ko ha toko taha kuo ne ma‘u ‘ene mafai mei he ‘Eiki; koe‘uhi ke fakahīkihiki‘i ‘a e ‘Otua ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē ‘ia Sīsū Kalaisi, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘a e kolōlia mo e māfimafi ‘o laui kuonga pea ta‘engata. ‘Ēmeni.
60004012	Si‘i ‘ofa‘anga, ‘oua te mou ofo ‘i he vela kuo hoko kiate kimoutolu mo‘omou ‘ahi‘ahi‘i, ‘o hangē ko ha me‘a fo‘ou ia kuo hoko noa atu:
60004013	kaekehe ke mou fiefia, ‘o fakatatau ki ho‘omou kau ‘i he ngaahi mamahi ‘a Kalaisi; koe‘uhi ke mou fiefia foki mo hākailangitau ‘i he fakae‘a ‘o ‘ene lāngilangi‘ia.
60004014	Ka kuo manukia kimoutolu ‘i he huafa ‘o Kalaisi, tā ko e toki kakai monū‘ia kimoutolu; he ‘oku nofo‘i kimoutolu ‘e he Laumālie ‘oku ‘a‘ana ‘a e lāngilangi, ‘io, ko e Laumālie ‘o e ‘Otua.
60004015	Seuke, ke ‘oua na‘a ai hamou toko taha ‘e mo‘ua ha mamahi ko ha‘ane fakapō, pe kaiha‘a, pe fai kovi, pe ko ha‘ane kaunoa ‘i ha me‘a.
60004016	Ka ‘oka ngaohi pehe‘i ia ko ‘ene Kalisitiane, ke ‘oua te ne mā, ka ne fakahīkihiki‘i ‘a e ‘Otua koe‘uhi ko e hingoa ko ia.
60004017	He ko e kuonga ‘eni ke kamata ‘a e fakamaau mei he ‘api ‘o e ‘Otua: pea kapau ‘oku fua fai kiate kitautolu, ko e hā tū honau iku‘anga, ‘a kinautolu ‘oku nau talangata‘a ki he Kōsipeli ‘a e ‘Otua?
60004018	Pea kapau ‘oku ‘ikai ke meimei hao ‘a e mā‘oni‘oni, pea ‘e tu‘u ‘i fē ‘a e faka‘otuamate mo e angahala?
60004019	Ko ia, ko kinautolu foki ‘oku mo‘ua ‘i he ngaahi mamahi ‘i he finangalo ‘o e ‘Otua, ke nau tuku honau laumālie ‘i he failelei ki he Tupu‘i-‘Otua ‘a ia ko e Toko Taha ‘oku fai ki he‘ene lea.
60005001	KO ia, ‘oku ou tokoni atu ki he kau faifekau ‘oku ‘iate kimoutolu, ‘a au ‘oku kaungā faifekau mo kimoutolu, mo e fakamo‘oni ki he ngaahi mamahi ‘o Kalaisi, mo e ‘inasi foki ‘i he lāngilangi ‘oku ene ke fakae‘a mai.
60005002	‘Ē, mou fei mo tauhi ‘a e fanga sipi ‘a e ‘Otua ‘oku ‘iate kimoutolu, ‘o ‘oua na‘a fai fakakoloto hono le‘ohi, ka ‘i he loto fiefai ‘i he funga ‘o e finangalo ‘o e ‘Otua; ‘o ‘ikai ko e sio pa‘anga ‘uli, ka ‘i he ‘ofa ki he ngāue;
60005003	pea ‘oua te mou fakafie‘eiki ki he ngaahi potungāue, kae hoko ko e fa‘ifa‘itaki‘anga ki he fanga sipi.
60005004	Pea ‘i he faifai pea fakae‘a mai ‘a e Tauhi Lahi, pea te mou ma‘u ‘a e pale ‘amalani ‘o e lāngilangi‘ia.
60005005	Pehē foki mo kimoutolu ‘a e kau fakaongo, mou anganofo ki he kau faifekau. ‘Io, mou no‘o kotoa pē ‘aki ‘a e fefakavaivai‘aki: he ‘oku tali teke‘i ‘e he ‘Otua ‘a e ‘afungi, ka ‘oku ne foaki kelesi ki he anga vaivai.
60005006	Ko ia, mou fakavaivai‘i kimoutolu ‘i he lalo nima māfimafi ‘o e ‘Otua, koe‘uhi ke ne hākeaki‘i kimoutolu ‘oka hoko hono taimi.
60005007	‘O mou lī atu ā hono kotoa ‘o ho‘omou lotomo‘ua ki he ‘Ene ‘Afio; he ‘oku ne mamahi‘i kimoutolu.
60005008	Mou laka faka‘ehi‘ehi, mou ‘ā: ko homou fili ko e Tēvolo ‘oku ne ‘alu fano ‘o hangē ko ha laione ngungulu, he‘ene kumi ha taha ke ne mātu‘aki folo.
60005009	‘A ia ke mou tali teke‘i, he tu‘u ma‘uma‘uluta he tui; mo mou ‘ilo ‘oku tatau ‘aupito mo e ngaahi mamahi na ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku mo‘ua ai homou fa‘ahinga ‘i māmani.
60005010	Ka ko e ‘Otua, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘a‘ana ‘a e kelesi kotoa pē, ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio kuo ne ui ange kimoutolu ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū ki he lāngilangi ta‘engata ‘o‘ona, ‘oka hili ho‘omou kātaki mamahi ‘o fuonounou, te ne fakakakato kimoutolu ‘e He‘ene ‘Afio, te ne poupou, te ne fakakaukaua, te ne pulusi ki he tu‘unga.
60005011	Ke ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘a e māfimafi ‘o laui kuonga pea ta‘engata. ‘Ēmeni.
60005012	Ko ‘eku ki‘i tohi atu ‘eni ‘ia Silivenusi, ko e kāinga tōnunga ‘i he‘eku lau ‘a‘aku; pea ko ‘eku enginaki mo fakapapau atu ko e kelesi mo‘oni ‘eni ‘a e ‘Otua: pea ‘i ho‘omou ‘i ai, mou tu‘u ai.
60005013	‘Oku ‘ofa atu ‘a e fefine ‘i Pāpilone ‘oku kaungā fili, pea mo Ma‘ake ko si‘oku foha.
60005014	Mou fefekita‘aki ‘aki ha ‘uma ‘ofa. Ke ‘iate kimoutolu ‘a e melino, ‘a kimoutolu kotoa pē ‘oku ‘ia Kalaisi.
